igbo: Mary Stirling bụ onye American labor unionist
Stirling rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpụ akpụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ na Filadelfia
Na 1880, ọ sonyeere mpaghara Knights of Labour ọhụrụ, Garfield Assembly 1684, nke ọ bịara soro Mary Hanafin gbaa ọsọ
N'afọ 1885, a họpụtara Stirling dị ka General Venerable Sage nke mgbakọ nke njikọ ahụ ọzọ
A họpụtakwara ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke kọmitii Knights of Labor iji chịkọta data gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na ọrụ
N'afọ 1886, ọ nwetara vootu asaa na ntuli aka maka onyeisi oche nke kọmitii na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
Mary Tillman Smith (1904-1995), bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya nke South America nké bírí ma rụọ ọrụ na Mississippi ọtụtụ ógè ndụ ya
O mepụtara ihe osise siri ike, mara mma, na nke na-egosipụta ihe, na-ejikarị ihe osise ụlọ na osisi ma ọ bụ tin
Ọrụ ya nwere ihe osise dị iche iche na agba siri ike, mgbè mgbè na-enwe ntụpọ na akara na-eme ka ọ dị ndụ, n'akụkụ mgbe ụfọdụ ederede na-adịghị ahụkebe nke a na-etinye na monochrome dị iche iche

A na-egosi ọrụ ya n'ụwa niile ma na-anakọta ya na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, nke a ma ama site na Metropolitan Museum of Art, yana ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe ochie ndị ọzọ gụnyere High Museum of Art na Atlanta; de Young Museum of Art dị na San Francisco; Museum of Fine Arts, Houston; Milwaukee Art Museum; Birmingham Museum of Art; na Smithsonian American Art Museum; yana nchịkọta nke Mahadum Tufts, Mahadum Willamette, na Mahadum Mississippi
Ọ natala ihe ngosi onwe ya na gallery na United States na Europe, a gụnyekwara ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu
A na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Southern, otu nke gụnyere Thornton Dial na Nellie Mae Rowe
Onye nlekọta na ónyé nchịkọta William Arnett kwalitere ọrụ ya nke ukwuu
Smith bụ nwá nwanyị nke ndị na-ekere òkè
Smith bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ iri na atọ ma na nwata nwéré nnukwu nsogbu ịnụ ihe
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas nke ise, n'agbanyeghị ikewapụ onwe ya na owu ọmụma nkwarụ ya kpatara ya
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Smith 'chọtara ụzọ isi na-ese ihe'
Smith lụrụ di ugboro abụọ, otu ugboro n'alụmdi na nwunye dị mkpirikpi na Gus Williams na 1922 na John Smith n'oge ụfọdụ n'afọ ndị 1930
Alụmdi na nwunye ya nke abụọ dịkwa mkpụmkpụ, na-agwụ mgbe Smith hụrụ na njedebe afọ nke di ya na-arụ ọrụ ugbo dị mkpụmbi
Mkpesa ya banyere njehie ahụ, ihe karịrị otu puku dollar, mèrè ka John Smith 'iziga ya'
Smith wee kwaga Hazelhurst, Mississippi, ibi n'onwe ya
N'afọ 1941, ọ mụrụ nwa ya nwoke, Sheridan L
Major, ọ bụ ezie na ọ lụghị nna ya
Smith rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ubi ma rụọ ọrụ ụlọ ndị ọzọ ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 1970s
N'afọ 1985, Smith nwere ọrịa strok nke méré ka okwu ya na ide ihe ghara ịdị mma
Ọ belatara ọsọ iji mepụta naanị ọrụ abụọ n'otu ụbọchị mgbè ọ dara ọrịa strok
Ka mmepụta ọrụ ya na-ebelata, Smith nwetara ego ole na ole, ọ kwụsịrị ise ihe na 1991
Ọ nwụrụ na 1995
Smith malitere ise ihe na ngwụcha afọ 1970
Ọ gbanwere ụlọ ya na ogige ya, ebe dị ihe dịka otu acre, n'ime ebe dị n'èzí nke 'ụdị ọha na eze nke akụkọ ndụ onwé ime mmụọ'
Ọrụ ya na-egosipụta ihe na nke onwé ya gosipụtara echiche ndị nọ n'uche ya ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ozugbo Smith jikọtara ya na ndị na-anakọta ihe osise, ọ gbalịrị ịgbaso ihe achọrọ
A na-emekarị ọrụ Smith na ihe ndị dị mfe, dị ka plywood, tin corrugated na akụkụ ndị ọzọ a rụgharịrị arụgharị
N'ọrụ mbụ ya, ọ na-ejikarị naanị otu ma ọ bụ abụọ agba nke ágbá
Ihe oyiyi ya 'na-echetara ihe nkpuchi ememe West Africa' na ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ihe atụ
E jirila nka ya tụnyere ndị na-ese ihe dịka Jean-Michel Basquiat
Ọrụ ya bụkwa nke onwe ya
Otu n'ime isiokwu kachasị amasị ya bụ ise foto nke ezinụlọ, ndị enyị na ndị agbata obi
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya gosipụtara ndị mmadụ na-eweli aka ha elu, onyinyo jikọtara ya na ecstasy ma ọ bụ nghọta ime mmụọ
Mary Thomas, nke a maara dị ka Queen Mary, (ihe dị ka 1848-1905) bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nke 1878 'Fireburn' ọrụ riot, ma ọ bụ nnupụisi, n'àgwàetiti St
Croix na Danish West Indies
Mary Thomas si Antigua wee rute St
Croix n'afọ 1860 iji rụọ ọrụ n'ubi ndị dị n'àgwàetiti ahụ
N'afọ 1878 ọ biri na ubi Sprat Hall
O nwere ụmụ atọ mana ọ lụbeghị di
Tupu nnupụisi ahụ, a mara ya ikpe maka izu ohi na imeso ụmụ ya ihe ọjọọ
Ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme atụwo aro na ndị ọchịchị jiri ahịrịokwu ndị dị otú ahụ mee ihe iji mebie ndị na-emegide ha

Mgbe nnwere onwe nke ndị Afrịka na-agba ohu na 1848 na Danish West Indies, iwu ọrụ nke 1849 setịpụrụ ụgwọ ọrụ na ọnọdụ ọrụ maka ndị ọrụ ugbo niile ma machibido nkwekọrịta maka ụgwọ ọrụ ka mma ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ ọrụ
Nke a mere ka ọrụ ubi ghara ịdọrọ mmasị, ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ họọrọ ịhapụ ubi na agwaetiti iji chọọ ọnọdụ ka mma n'ebe ọzọ
Gọọmentị meghachiri omume na ụkọ ndị ọrụ site n'ime ka o sie ike maka ndị ọrụ ịhapụ agwaetiti ahụ, na-achọ asambodo ahụike na ịkwụ ụgwọ maka paspọtụ
Mgbe a ga-atụle ụgwọ ọrụ n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke 1878, a jụrụ arịrịọ ndị ọrụ, a tụkwara ọnọdụ ọhụrụ siri ike maka njem
Nke a kpaliri ihe a na-akpọ ọgba aghara Fireburn, nke a kpọrọ ọgba agha ọrụ kachasị ukwuu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Denmark, n'oge a gbara ihe karịrị ubi 50 ọkụ
N'ihi ọrụ ya dị ka onye ndú n'oge nnupụisi ahụ, a bịara mara Mary Thomas dị ka 'Queen Mary'
Ndị ọrụ ahụ họọrọ ya na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ndị ọzọ, 'Queen Agnes' na 'Queen Matilda', dị ka ndị eze nwanyị iji rụọ ọrụ ememe na ememe n'oge nnupụisi ahụ
Thomas rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa ma kpọọ onwe ya 'kaptịn' na nnupụisi ahụ
A na-ekwu na, n'otu nnupụisi ahụ, Thomas kpọrọ ndị na-achọghị isonye ka e gbupụ ha isi
E jidere ya ma kpee ya ikpe ya na ndị isi ndị ọzọ nke nnupụisi ndị ọrụ
N'oge ikpe nke ndị isi ọrụ, o nyere akaebe megide onye ndu ọzọ, Thomas Graydon, nke a makwaara dị ka 'Colonel Peter', onye a mara ikpe ọnwụ
A mara Mary Thomas ikpe ọnwụ maka ịgba ọkụ na ịpụnara mmadụ ihe mana a gbanwere ikpe ya ka ọ bụrụ mkpọrọ ndụ ya niile
A kpọfere ya na Copenhagen ma tinye ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ụmụ nwanyị, Christianshavn, n'afọ 1882, mana n'afọ 1877, e zigara ya na Christiansted, St
Croix, iji rụọ ọrụ fọdụrụ n'ụlọ ikpe ya
Thomas nwetara ọnọdụ ọkara akụkọ ifo na ọdịnala ọdịnala Virgin Islands, ebe abụ a ma ama na-echeta omume ya na nnupụisi ahụ
A na-akpọ Queen Mary Highway na St
Croix aha ya

N'afọ 2018, ndị na-ese ihe Jeannette Ehlers na La Vaughn Belle mepụtara nnukwu ihe a tụrụ atụ n'ihu ọha, Abụ m Queen Mary, nke na-egosi ihe oyiyi dị mita 7 (23 ft) nke Mary Thomas nọ ọdụ n'ocheeze na-eji ọkụ na mma mkpara
A kpughere ihe oyiyi ahụ na Copenhagen na 2018; ọ bụ ihe ncheta ọha na eze mbụ nke Denmark maka nwanyị ojii
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akpọrọ Fireburn The Screenplay A story of passion ignited, nke dabeere na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke St
Croix nke onye edemede Caribbean-American Angela Golden Bryan dere na 2018
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-asọpụrụ Eze Nwanyị Mary na ndị isi ndị ọzọ nke nnupụisi ahụ
site n'aka m
Mary Tombiri (amụrụ na 23 Julaị 1972) bụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ na-agba ịnyịnya na Naijirịa
Na 1994 Commonwealth Games ya, ya na Faith Idehen, Christy Opara-Thompson na Mary Onyali, meriri nrite ọla edo na 4 x 100 mita relay
Àtụ Footer IAAF World Cup Champions 4x100 m Women
Mary Kuksie Twala (14 Septemba 1939 4 Julaị 2020) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya maka Africa Movie Academy Award maka Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Twala gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ mmepụta mpaghara South Africa
O nwere ọrụ ọbịa na oge mbụ nke Generations
N'afọ 2007, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri obodo, Ubizo The Calling N'afọ 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado na Hopeville, ihe nkiri ahụ ritere ọtụtụ onyinye n'ọtụtụ ememme na ememme onyinye
Twala mere 'Ma Dolly' na ihe nkiri ahụ, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 6th Africa Movie Academy Awards
Mgbe ọ gachara usoro ọgwụgwọ nke mere ka ọ ghara ime ihe nkiri ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa, Twala laghachiri na Vaya n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2016, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na Comatose, ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara ndị isi na-eme ihe n'Afrịka gụnyere Bimbo Akintola na Hakeem Kae-Kazim

N'afọ 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri egwuregwu, Beyond the River Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2017, a mara ọkwa na Twala ga-apụta na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn ọhụrụ na Mzanzi Magic, The Imposter
A mụrụ Twala na 14 Septemba 1939 na Soweto Johannesburg
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ndaba Mhlongo ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ha bụ nne na nna Somizi Mhlongo na Archie Mhlongo (nwụrụ n'afọ 1985)
Mary Twala nwụrụ na Julaị 4, 2020 n'ihe dịka elekere iri na otu nke ụtụtụ na ụlọ ọgwụ onwe onye Parklane, Johannesburg
E liri ya na July 9, 2020 na Soweto
N'ihi iwu COVID-19, ọ bụ naanị ihe na-erughị mmadụ iri ise nwere ike ịga olili ozu ya
Mary Uduma (a muru na abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Mei na afọ otu puku narị iteghete na iri ise na abụọ (1952)) bụ onye isi nzube ahia Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye isi ala Nigeria Internet Registration Association (NIRA) ugboro abụọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche Nigeria Internet Governance Forum
Uduma gụrụ akwụkwọ ndekọ ego na Institute of Management Technology, Enugu (IMT)
O mechara gaa Mahadum nke Lagos wee nweta nzere BSc na mgbakọ na nwepụ nke bekee kpọrọ akaụntin
Uduma rụrụ ọrụ na Audit nke gọọmenti etiti dị ka onye isi ọrụ mgbe ọ ka na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na Ivory Merchant Bank
N'afọ 1995, Uduma sonyeere Nigerian Communications Commission dịka onye nnyere aka n'ihe gbasara ego
Na 1999 ọ ghọrọ osote onye nduzi na ngalaba tarifu na ụgwọ
A kwagara ya na nhazi ụlọ ọrụ na afọ puku abụọ na ise ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ tupu ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke ikikere
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ihe gbasara ndị ahịa na na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na otu (2011)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka osote onye isi oche nke Nigeria Internet Registration Association (NIRA) tupu ọ pụta dị ka onye isi nke abụọ nke otu ahụ
Ahọpụtakwara ya ọzọ dịka Onye isi nke atọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nigeria Internet Governance Forum (NIGF)

Ọ nọchitere anya NIGF na mmemme ụbọchị ụmụ nwanyị n'emume umunwanyi na mba ụwa niile, bụ nke e mere na Abuja na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na itenani, wee kwuo maka ntinye ụmụ nwanyị na-ekwu okwu na amụma metụtara oghere ịntanetị ma na mpaghara ma na mba ụwa
N'afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na isii (2016), ọ nwetara nturu ugo pụrụiche site n'aka NIRA Presidential Award, nke Nigeria Internet Registration Association (NIRA)
Mary Data Uranta bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, onye na-emepụta ihe, ihe nlereanya, onye na-agụ egwu, na onye ọchụnta ego
A mụrụ Mary Data Uranta ma zụlitekwa ya n'obodo Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Niagiria
Ọ gara asọmpi ịma mma Missi Niger Delta, ebe o nwetara ọkwa nke abụọ
Ọrụ mbụ ọ nwetara bụ n'afọ 2000 n'ihe nkiri, Girls Hostel
N'afọ 2006, ọ nwetara nlebara anya dị ukwuu site n' ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri Nollywood, Secret Mission
O gosipụtakwara na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere Love Doctor, Critical Passion, Pradah, Secret Shadow, na Blood Game
Aside from being an actress, Uranta is an entrepreneur through her own movie production company
She established the Mary Uranta Foundation, a charity organisation which helps improve the lives of underprivileged children in Opobo Rivers State
Her contributions to the film industry has earned her a City People Award, Best of Nollywood Award nomination and the African Youth Ambassador Award
Uranta grew up primarily in Port Harcourt, the capital city of Rivers State
She has seven siblings and four step-brothers
Describing her upbringing, Uranta commented that she 'had a great childhood
I never had it rough or tough growing up
Fine, I'm from an average home
But it's never been bad
I had all I wanted as a child[]we were one happy family'
Mary Wambui bụ nwanyị Kenya na-azụ ahịa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ nọchiri onye bụbu onye isi ala Mwai Kibaki dị ka onye omeiwu nke Othaya
E kwuru na ọ bụ nwunye nke abụọ nke Kibaki
Ezinụlọ Wambui na-ekwu na Mwai lụrụ Mary na 1972 n'okpuru iwu omenala Kikuyu ma nwee nwa nwanyị, Wangui Mwai
N'afọ 2004, ndị mgbasa ozi kọrọ na Kibaki nwere di nke abụọ a na-ekwu na ọ lụrụ di n'okpuru iwu omenala, Mary Wambui, na nwa nwanyị, Wangui Mwai
Mgbe akụkọ ahụ gasịrị, Ụlọ Steeti wepụtara nkwupụta a na-edeghị aha na naanị ezinụlọ Kibaki bụ nwunye ya, Lucy na ụmụ ha anọ
The Washington Post kpọrọ mkparị ahụ dum dị ka 'ihe nkiri ọhụrụ nke Kenya'
N'afọ 2009, Kibaki, ya na Lucy Kibaki na-ewe iwe, nwere nzukọ ndị nta akụkọ iji kwughachi ụwa na ọ nwere naanị otu nwunye
Ọ bụ ezie na a gọnahụrụ ya ọnọdụ dị ka nwunye, a na-enye Wambui ọnyà niile nke di na nwunye onye isi ala gụnyere ndị nche na limousines
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Standard dere na Eprel 5, 2007, Winnie kwuru na ya na Artur Margaryan, onye a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ onye ọrụ ego si Armenia, bu n'obi ịlụ n'ọdịnihu
Tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ omeiwu, a na-akọwakarị Mary Wambui dị ka onye na-akwado National Rainbow Coalition (NARC) ma mesịa bụrụ 'The National Alliance activist' mgbe ọ gbanwere iguzosi ike n'ihe
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na nso nso a na ndị mgbasa ozi na Kenya, Wambui kwuru na ya nwere ụmụ ise mana ọ na-ala azụ ịkọwa aha ha
Mary Wangari Wamae, nke a na-akpọkarị Mary Wamae, bụ onye ọka iwu, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ si Kenya
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa na Equity Group Holdings , na-ahụ maka ego na obodo Kenya, yana ndị enyemaka na mba ndị dị na mpaghara Africa Great Lakes
A họpụtara Mary n'ọkwa onyo-na-ya ugbu a na Julaị 2018
A mụrụ Mary ma zụlite ya n'ime ime obodo, na mpaghara Nyeri ugbu a
Otu nne
zụrụ ya, tinyere otu neanwanyị nyịụmụ nwokeụnna anọ, bụ́ onye isi na-akpata rapyá ata ego bụ ọrụ ugbo
O nwekwara nzere bachelọ nke iwu, nke onwetara na Mahadum Nairobi
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diploma diploma na iwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Kenya
A nabatara ya na ụlọ ọkà ikpe Kenya
O nwetara nzere Master of Arts na Gender and Development Studies na Mahadum Nairobi
Emechara nyé ya nzere masta na Leadership Innovation and Change, site na York St John University, na Nottingham, United Kingdom
Tupu ọbanye na Equity Bank na 2004, Mary bụ onye mmekọ na ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke Mary Wangari & Company Advocates, nke ọji aka yá malite wéré chia ya rụọ afọ irí na ịtọ
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ego mgbe ụlọ ọrụ á ka bụ Equity Building Society, wee jee ozi dị ka Onye isi nke Ọrụ Iwu
N'afọ sochirinụ, a gbasaa ọrụ ya tinyere yá ọrụ odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ
Ọrụ ya ji nke nta nke nta na-amụba kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
Tupu ọ malite ọrụ ya ugbu a, a kọwara ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye isi otu nke Strategy, Ọrụ Iwu na Onye odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ otu
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kewara ọkwá ahụ ma were mmadụ abụọ were dochie anya ya
N'ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ụlọ akụ, Mary na-elekọta ndị enyemaka otu ahụ na DR Congo, Rwanda, South Sudan, Tanzania na Uganda
Mary Wangari Wamae bụ nne nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ
Mary Amelia Warner, née Huddart (1804-1854), onye amara aha ya dika Oriakụ Warner, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye njikwa ihe nkiri Bekee
A mụrụ Warner na Manchester na 1804 nye nna bụ Thomas Huddart, onye chemist si Dublin, na nwunye ya, Ann née Gough nke Limerick
Nna ya mere ihe ngosi na Crow Street Theatre na Dublin
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị egwu na Greenwich maka ntinye abamuru nna ya, Mary Huddart ghọrọ onye a ma ama dị afọ iri na ise onye otu ụlọ ọrụ Brunton na Plymouth, Exeter, Bristol na Birmingham
Na 1829 ọ na-eme ihe ngosi na Dublin

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba 1830, dị ka Miss Huddart nke si Dublin, ọ pụtara na Drury Lane Theatre, n'egosipụta dị ka Belvidera na Venice Preserved to the Pierre of William Macready, onye ndụmọdụ ya jisiri njikọ aka ya n'aka ndị njikwa Polhill na Lee
A hụla ya na London na ụlọ ihe nkiri Surrey na Tottenham Street
Ọ laghachiri na Dublin, wee rụọ ọrụ onye ndu azụmaahịa n'okpuru Calcraft

N'afọ 1836, n'okpuru njikwa Alfred Bunn, Mary Huddart nọ ọzọ na Drury Lane, ebe ọ kwadoro Edwin Forrest dịka Lady Macbeth, Emilia, na ihe Ọdịdị agwa ndị ọzọ, ma bụrụ Marian mbụ na Sheridan Knowles 's The Wrecker's Daughter ọganihu ya na oya dukpuru ya na ntinye aka ya na Haymarket maka mmepụta nke mbụ na London nke The Bridal, mmegharị nke Knowles nkeThe Maid's Tragedy
Na nke a ọ gosiputara na Evadne n'abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa Jun,1837, megide Macready dị ka Melantius
O gosiputarakwara ka Portia nye Samuel Phelps 's Shylock, yana Helen McGregor nye Rob Roy ya
N'ihe dị ka oge a ọ lụrụ
N'oge okochi nke 1837 oriaku Warner sonyeere Macready na Covent Garden Theater, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ, na-akwado ya n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke Shakespear ma na-ewulite aha ya
Ọ bụ onye amaara ka Joan mbụ nke Arc na egwu Thomas James Serle nke aha ahụ
Ọrịa gbochiri ya igosiputa agwa onye dike nwanyị na Covent Garden bu Atenian Captive nke Thomas Noon Talfourd , mana o so na Haymarket n'abalị anọ nke Ọgọst 1838
Warner so Macready gaa Drury Lane, wee nọrọ na 29 Eprel 1842 bụrụ Queen na Hamlet, na nabalị iri n'ọnwa Disemba, bụrụ Lady Lydia Lynterne mbụ nọ na Westland Marston bụ nwa nwanyi patricia

Na 1843, ya na Samuel Phelps mere ihe omume na Bath, na n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Mee 1844, ya na TL Greenwood, malitere njikwa nke Sadler's Wells, na-emeghe dị ka Lady Macbeth, na-ekwu okwu site na Serle
O weere akụkụ dị ka Julia na The Hunchback (Knowles), Lady Teazle, na Lady Townley na The Provoked Husband ( John Vanburgh na Colley Cibber ) nke ọgbugba afọ ndụ ya malitere ikwusi ya
Ọ tụgharịrị na Nọvemba The Scornful Lady, na-emegharị site Serle, na-egwu na ya Lady; na n'April 1848 Alụmdi na Nwunye Abụọ, ọzọ na mmegharị Serle
N'ịla ezumike nka site na ntufu ọtụtụ ego, Warner kwadoro Macready na Haymarket n'oge ọ na-eme ihe nlegharị anya jee nke oma
N'abali iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị 1851 Sadler's Wells meghere maka abalị ole na ole tupu mmalite nke oge niile, iji nye ya ohere ịme ngosi agwa ya kacha mara amara tupu ịmalite America
Ihe gosipụtara na ọ bụ ọhụụ ikpeazụ ya na England mere n'August ka Oriaku Oakley na Jealous Wife
O nwetara nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na America
Ihe ịrịba ama nke ọrịa kansa na-egosi onwe ha, Warner bịara England, a wara ya ahụ, ma laghachi New York
N'ịbụ onye na-enweghị ike imezu nkwa ya, ọ laghachiri London n'adịghị mma
N'abali iri nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1853, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ site na mmejọ di ya, Warner gara n'ụlọ ikpe akwụghị ụgwọ
Egolitere ego, nke Queen na Angela Burdett-Coutts nyere aka, wee nweta uru na Sadler's Wells
Macready na Burdett-Coutts weghaara ebubo nke ụmụ ya, nwoke na otu nwanyị

Ka Mgbe ọ dịchara obi mgbu ogologo oge, Warner nwụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Septemba 1854 na na ebe nọmba 16 Euston , Euston Square ma e lie ya n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Highgate Cemetery na ili (nomba6111) nke na-enwekwaghị ihe odide a na-agụ agụ
N'ihu ọha na eze dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ bụ naanị Helen Faucit na MrsCharles Kean
kariri ya n'oge ya
N'ime ihe dị ka afọ 1837 Mary Huddart lụrụ Robert William Warner, onye nwe ụlọ nke Wrekin Tavern, Broad Court, Bow Street, nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị nwoke na-ede akwụkwọ na-agakarị
Mary Watson nwere ike buru
Mary Watson (17 Jenụarị 1860 – 1881), bụ dike n'Australia
Ọ dị afọ 21 ma lụọla ihe na-erughị ọnwa iri na asatọ mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ihi akpịrị ịkpọ nkụ na No
5 Island na Howick Group ugbu a a na-akpọ Watson's Island n'ebe ugwu Cape Flattery na Far North Queensland, Australia, na 1881

Ya na nwa ya dị ọnwa anọ, Ferrier, na onye ọrụ China merụrụ ahụ, Ah Sam, kwọfere ụbọchị asatọ na ihe dị ka kilomita iri anọ n'ime ụgbọ mmiri e gbuturu egbutu, bụ́ nke e ji eme slugs nke oké osimiri, mgbe ndị Aboriginal na-esochi ya
wakporo ọdụ ọdụ di ya na-anọghị ya na Lizard Island
Akwụkwọ ndekọ ya nke na-akọwa ụbọchị ikpeazụ ha ka achọtara na ozu ha n'afọ 1882, na Watson ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya nke dike ọsụ ụzọ maka ọtụtụ ndị Queensland
A mụrụ Mary Watson na Fiddler's Green na mpụga St Newlyn East nso Truro, Cornwall, England, na 17 Jenụwarị 1860, ada Mary Phillips na Thomas Oxnam, wee kwaga Queensland na ezinụlọ ya n'afọ 1877

N'ịbụ onye nakweere ọkwá dị ka onye nchịkwa na ezinụlọ onye na-azụ ahịa, na iri na asatọ ọ si Maryborough gaa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Cooktown dịpụrụ adịpụ, ebe ọ zutere ma lụọ onye ọkụ azụ bêche de mer, Captain Robert F
Watson, na Mee 1880
Robert Watson kpọọrọ ya gaa guzobe ọdụ ịkụ azụ na Agwaetiti Ngwele, ma ọ bụghị onye ọ bụla
Na Septemba 1880, ọ hapụrụ Watson na nwa ha nwoke ya na ndị ọrụ China abụọ a maara dị ka Ah Sam na Ah Leung, ebe ya na onye otu ya Percy Fuller mere njem ịkụ azụ ogologo n'ime akpa ha

N'izu ole na ole ka e mesịrị, otu oriri nke ndị Aboriginal Guugu Yimithirr mere otu n'ime njem ha na-emekarị site n'ụgbọ mmiri gaa n'àgwàetiti ahụ, bụ ebe Robert Watson hiwere ezinụlọ ya n'ihe owuwu nkume dị nso na obere mmiri mmiri, bụ nanị mmiri dị n'àgwàetiti ahụ
Ma eleghị anya, Watson mebiela n'amaghị ama na emume ụmụ amaala na-adịghị mma nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Ndị Aborigine wakporo Ah Sam, bụ onye merụrụ ahụ ube asaa, ma gbuo Ah Leung n'ogige akwụkwọ nri ọ na-elekọta
Watson tụrụ ndị otu ahụ ụjọ site n'ịgba egbe egbe wee jiri obere nri na mmiri tinye n'oké osimiri n'oké osimiri kukumba nke igwe, na-atụ anya na ụgbọ mmiri na-agafe agafe ga-eburu ya
Ndị otu ahụ siri na abụọ ruo asaa Ọktoba, na-agbadata mgbe ụfọdụ n'elu mmiri na agwaetiti
Ntinye akwụkwọ akụkọ ikpeazụ ya kwụsịrị 'Enweghị mmiri
Ọnwụ anwụ na akpịrị ịkpọ nkụ'
Mgbe ụgbọ mmiri na-agafe agafe kọrọ na mkpọmkpọ ebe nke Mrs Watson si nkume cottage, na ọkụ na-ere n'àgwàetiti ahụ, e chere na a tọọrọ ma ọ bụ gbuo Watson

Ndị uwe ojii gbagoro n'elu na ndị agha obodo n'okpuru Inspector Hervey Fitzgerald si Cooktown gbagburu ọtụtụ ndị Cape York dị n'ụsọ osimiri—ikekwe ihe ruru 150— sitere n'otu mpaghara ala atọ na mmegwara
Ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ndị a gbara, a ga-azọrọ ma emechaa, etinyere aka na ihe omume ahụ
A hụrụ ozu Watson na nwa ya ka ọnwa ole na ole gachara n'etiti mangroves dị na No
5 Howick Island, nke ka nọ na tankị ígwè, ma ugbu a, mmiri ozuzo dị ọhụrụ kpuchie ya site na oke mmiri ozuzo na nso nso a
Ah Sam anwụọla n'akụkụ osimiri dị nso
Isi iyi e zoro ezo dị n'agwaetiti ahụ, ma ha ahụghị ya
Mgbe e weghachiri ozu ahụ na Cooktown, otu narị mmadụ isii na iri ise duuru ha gaa lie ha n’ebe a na-eli ozu Abụọ Mile (ebe a na- eli ozu Cooktown ugbu a), n’ụzọ e si aga n’ubi ọla edo Palmer River
N'ime afọ ndị na-esote, e degharịrị akụkọ Watson n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na akụkọ ndị mmadụ, gụnyere abụ ndị dike, na-enwekarị mmasị na-elebara akụkụ ndị Aboriginal na ndị China anya nke ihe omume ahụ
Afọ ise ka ọ nwụsịrị, ewelitere ndenye aha ọha iji kwado ihe ncheta Mary Watson, isi iyi mmanya mabul n'okporo ámá, nke emechara n'afọ 1886

Akọwala ụdị akụkọ a dị egwu nke ukwuu site n'aka onye edemede Australia bụ Ion Idriess n'otu n'ime aha ya amachaghị ama The Opium Smugglers (1948), Robert Drewe metụrụ ya aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, The Savage Crows (1976)
Otu agwa Arthur C Clarke na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke afọ 1963 na-akọ akụkọ nke ọma na-ekwupụta ma ndị Aborigine na ndị ọrụ China na-agbanwe naanị agwaetiti ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Dolphin Island
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka nke Queensland na-ejide tankị ígwè, paddles, na Akwụkwọ Nsọ Watson
Ọbá akwụkwọ John Oxley na-ejide akwụkwọ akụkọ ya abụọ (akwụkwọ akụkọ ya mgbe niile na Lizard Island na nke o dere n'oge njem ụgbọ mmiri)
A na-ewere akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ahụ dị ka akụ nke Ọba akwukwọ nke Queensland nke e gosipụtara na blọọgụ John Oxley Library
James Cook Historical Museum dị na Cooktown nwere ihe atụ nke tankị ígwè
Mary Wilhelmine Williams (Amụrụ n'ọnwa May 14, 1878 na March 10, 1944) bụ ọkachamara na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Latin America
Ọ nọ na bọọdụ ndị nchịkọta akụkọ nke Hispanic American Historical Review site n'afọ 1927 ruo afọ 1933 ma bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke Conference on Latin American History n'afọ 1928 ruo afọ 1934
Mary Wilombe (amụrụ na 22 Septemba, na afọ 1997) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere Red Arrows na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia
Wilombe nọchitere anya Zambia na afọ 2014 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
Maryam Abacha (amụrụ 4 Maachị 1947) bu nwunye Sani Abacha, onye ochichi ndi agha Naijiria site na 1993 rue 1998

N'afọ 1999, Maryam Abacha kwuru na di ya mere ihe dị mma nye Naijiria; Otu onye ọrụ gọọmentị Naịjirịa kwuru na Maryam Abacha kwuru na iji mee ka gọọmentị kwenye ka ọ gbanarị ya, dịka onye isi ala, Olusegun Obasanjo, bụ onye Sani Abacha tụrụ mkpọrọ
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2000, Maryam Abacha nọgidere na Nigeria wee gaa n'ihu na-ekwupụta ịdị ọcha nke di ya n'agbanyeghị ọtụtụ mmebi iwu mmadụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ ya
O bi na Kano steeti, Naijiria
Maryam na Sani Abacha nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ na ụmụ nwoke asaa
Nwa nwokekachanụ Maryam Abacha dị ndụ bụ Mohammed Abacha
A mụrụ Maryam Okogwu na 1 November 1948 na Asaba (Nke bụzi Delta State), ebe ọgara agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị
nne na nna ya bụ Hajiya Asabe Halima Mohammed si n'obodo bụzi Niger State, a Hausa, na Leonard Nwanonye Okogwu si na Asaba, bụ onye Igbo
Ọ mechara laa na Ugwu Hausa gaa Kaduna ede ọ gara Queen Amina's College Kaduna maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
She graduated as a secretary at the Federal Training Centre, Kaduna
Later she obtained a diploma in secretaryship Àtụ Clarify from La Salle Extension University (Chicago, Illinois) and a Certificate in Computer Science from the NCR Institute in Lagos

Maryam Babangida (1 Nọvemba 1948 27 Disemba 2009) bụ nwunye General Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida, onye bụ onye isi ala Naịjirịa site na nafọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na ise ruo nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na atọ
A katọrọ di ya maka nrụrụ aka zuru oke n'oge ọchịchị ya
E nyere ya otuto maka ịmepụta ọnọdụ nke First Lady nke Naịjirịa ma mee ka ọ bụrụ nke ya
Dika nwunye onye isiala Naijiria, ọ maputara atụmatụ dị iche iche nke gunyere imezi ndu umunwaanyi
The 'Maryam Phenomenon' became a celebrity and 'an icon of beauty, fashion and style', a position she retained after her husband's fall from power
Maryam Okogwu was born on 1 November 1948 in Asaba (present-day Delta State), where she attended her primary education
Her parents were Hajiya Asabe Halima Mohammed from the present Niger State, a Hausa, and Leonard Nwanonye Okogwu from Asaba, an Igbo
She later moved north to Kaduna where she attended Queen Amina's College Kaduna for her Secondary education
She graduated as a secretary at the Federal Training Centre, Kaduna
Later she obtained a diploma in secretaryship Àtụ Clarify from La Salle Extension University (Chicago, Illinois) and a Certificate in Computer Science from the NCR Institute in Lagos

Hajia Maryam Inna Ciroma (a mụrụ n'abali iri na otu n'ọnwa itoolu n'afọ1954) a họpụtara ya dika onye isi oche nke na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara Ụmụ nwanyi na Nigerian n'ọnwa asaa n'afọ 2005 onye mere nghọpụta bụ President Olusegun Obasanjo
E ji Saudatu Bungudu gbanwee ya mgbe President Umaru Yar'Adua mere nghọpụta nke ya n'ọnwa Asaa n'afọ 2007
A mụrụ Ciroma na 11 September 1954 na State Borno
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ n'a Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria, ebe O nwetara akara mmụta na Science Politics, ma mesịa nweta akara diploma na Nchịkwa Ọha
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye editọ cadet na NTA Kaduna, tupu ya abanye na ọrụ gọọmenti etiti ebe Ọ rụrụ ọrụ site n'afọ 1980 na 1985
O mesịrị ghọọ Onyeisi Oche /Onyeisi Nchịkwa Ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ Intis
Ọ bụ nwunye nke Mallam Adamu Ciroma, , onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Central Bank nke Naijiria na Minista nke na-ahụ maka Ego onye bụkwara onye isi oche nke nzukọ Ọchịchị Obasanjo na 2003
N'afọ 2003, Ciroma dọrọ ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchichi n'okpuru People's Democratic Party (PDP) maka ndị Borno South Senatorial District

A họpụtara ya dika Minista Steeti maka Women Affairs na July 2005, dochie Rita Akpan Ọ nọgidere n' ọkwá a mgbe enwere ntụgharị January 2007 Na August 2005, ọ malitere njem nlekọta mba nile nke mpaghara 36 Steeti nke Naijiria n'ụdị metụtara ikike ụmụntakịrị na ịkpa ókè megide ụmụ nwanyị
Tupu nhoputa ndi ochichi afo 2007, o dụrụ ọdụ ka edotara ndi Nwanyi ọkwa ọchichi , nakwa otu esi emegbu ndi nwanyi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
N'oge Ọchichi ya, Gọọmenti etiti kwadoro 'National Gender Policy in pursuance of gender equality and children welfare in the country'
Na Ọnwa mbụ n'afọ 2007, Ụlọ ọrụ ya nyere Iwu 'National Guidelines and Standards of Practice for Orphans and Vulnerable Children'
N'okwu okwu ya na May 2007 nk atụmatụ ahụ na akụkọ a, Ciroma kwuru, sị 'N'ọbụrụ n'enweghị mkpebi siri ike iji gboo mkpa ụmụntakịrị, A gaghị enwe ohere izute Mbido Millennium Development Goals'
Mgbe ọpụrụ n'ọkwa ọrụ ya, Ciroma mechara bụrụ onye isi ndi Nwanyi nke ndi PDP
Hajia Maryam Inna Ciroma rụkwara dika onye isi na-aghazi National Inland Waterways Authority, Lokoja, Kogi State Naijiria
O wetara ọtụtụ mgbanwe nakwa nchekwa ndụ n'ụzọ Mmiri di iche-iche nke ala Naijiria
Na December 2014 otu ụmụakwụkwọ nke ECOWAS a na-akpọ West African Students Union Parliament-WASUP nyere ya ugwu nke 'WASUP Kwame Nkrumah Honor' (wwwwasuonlineorg)
Onye nghazi WASUP na Naijiria nke aha ya bụ Comr
Daniel Emeka Nwachukwu kọwasiri ya dika nwanyi ike, onye ndu nakwa onye ụmụ nwanyi na ndi na-etolite etolite nwere ike ilegide anya makwa soro omume ya
Maryam Elisha (amụrụ Maryam Rikoto Elisha) bụ onye nlereanya Naijiria, nwanyị mara mma, na onye na-emepụta ejiji
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Rikaoto site na ụdị ejiji ME n'afọ 2009, afọ abụọ ka e chiri ya Miss Valentine
A kpọrọ Elisha otu n'ime mmadụ iri abụọ kachasị nwee mmetụta na Naịjirịa
Elisha si na Kebbi steeti mana amụrụ ya na Kano steeti nye nna onye uwe ojii lara ezumike nká ugbu a na nne nwanyị na-azụ ahịa
Ọ bụ nwa nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ asaa

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Kano steeti tupu ọ kwaga Lagos steeti ịmụ Asụsụ Bekee na Mahadum Lagos Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ gara New Jersey Fashion School, na United States, ebe a zụrụ ya ọnwa asatọ na imewe ejiji
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2017, Elisha nwere ọnọdụ nke fọdụrụ ihe nta ka o duga ya n'ọnwụ
Otu onye ọrụ chọtara Elisha mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ dị ka ihe nlereanya ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ asatọ
Dị ka onye nlereanya, ọ bụ ihu nwa agbọghọ nke Airtel Nigeria (Zain), mgbe ọ bụ Vmobile
O mekwara ihe ngosi maka ụdị ndị ọzọ kachasị elu nke gụnyere Delta Soap, Sterling Bank na Nigeria
MTN Nigeria, Lucozade Boost na Diamond Bank
Mgbe ọ na-amụ Asụsụ Bekee na Mahadum nke Lagos, Elisha banyere ma merie Miss Valentine Beauty Pageant, 2007
N'afọ 2008, ya na onye mmeri ọzọ, Damilola Otunbanjo, Sisi Oge nke Lagos, rụkọrọ ọrụ iji kwado maka ezi nlekọta ahụike na mkpọsa megide mmechuihu nke ndị bu nje HIV / AIDS
Nkwado a wetara Elisha aha Miss Environment, site na Lagos State Waste Management Authority, na nkwanye ùgwù site n'aka onye bụbu gọvanọ nke Lagos steeti, Babatunde Fashola
Elisha sonyekwara na asọmpi ịma mma nke Miss Nigeria 2013 mana o meriri
E hiwere akara ahụ na 2009 ma na-eme kapeeti uhie na uwe mgbede
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asọmpi asọmpi na ndị mmeri na asọmpi obodo na nke mba ụwa etinyela atụmatụ nke Rikaoto By ME
N'afọ 2014, n'ihi mkpakọrịta nke Most Beautiful Girl in Nigeria (MBGN) 2013, Anna Ebiere Banner na akara Rikaoto, Elisha rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ejiji na MBGN 2014
N'afọ 2015, Elisha na ụdị ejiji ya nwetara nlebara anya ọha na eze n'ihi ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndị na-asọmpi ọ yi na onyinye ha meriri
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Encomium Magazine n'afọ 2016, Elisha kpughere ihe dị ka ndị eze nwanyị mara mma iri na anọ pụtara na-eyi atụmatụ ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ọzọ nke 2016 na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Punch, Elisha kwuru na “Nwa agbọghọ kachasị mma na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2015, Unoaku Anyadike, pụtara n'elu ise n'oge asọmpi ịme ihe ngosi na Miss World 2015
Ọzọkwa, Miss Tourism Nigeria 2014, Collete Nwadike, bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ meriri Exquisite Face of the Universe na 2015
O ritekwara uwe kachasị mma na asọmpi ahụ
Elisha tinyekwara uwe agbamakwụkwọ na Rikaoto site na nchịkọta ME
Akara a egosila ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ejiji dịka New York Fashion Week, Miami Fashion Week, Washington based DC Fashion Week, Paris Fashion Week, Mercedes Fashion Week, na The African Fashion Week Nigeria
Rikaoto By Me bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ejiji e nyere ọrụ imepụta uwe maka onye bụbu onye isi ala Naịjirịa, Goodluck Jonathan
Elisha na-eje ozi dị ka onye ọka ikpe na ihe ngosi
A kpọrọ ya Pageant Couturier of the Year na 2016 Xperience Womanity Awards, nke emere na Enugu steeti n'ọnwa Eprel
N'afọ 2017, o ritere ihe nrite abụọ, Pageant Designer of the Year na Pageant Couturier of the Year, na Xperience Womanity Awards
Gọọmentị Lagos steeti n'okpuru ọchịchị gọvanọ Akinwunmi Ambode gbakwunyere Elisha dị ka otu n'ime akụkọ ihe ịga nke ọma nke steeti ahụ, na ememe ncheta afọ iri ise nke steeti ahụ
Maryam Qaasim (Somali Maryam Qaasim Axmed, Arabic Maria قاسم) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe mmadụ na ọrụ ọha na eze nke Somalia site na Nọvemba 2012 ruo Jenụwarị 2014
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Tayo Political Party
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2017, Praịm Minista Hassan Ali Khaire họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka enyemaka na njikwa ọdachi
A mụrụ Qaasim n'ezinụlọ sitere n'ezin ụlọ Barwani (Bravanese)
Ọ bụ dọkịta site na ọzụzụ
Qaasim jere ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ịmụ nwa na onye na-amụ ụmụ nwanyị, na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe dị iche iche, gụnyere Somalia, Yemen, Netherlands na United Kingdom
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ bụ onye nkuzi mahadum
N'ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Qaasim rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Mmepe Ụmụ nwanyị na Mmekọrịta Ezinụlọ na Gọọmentị Federal Transitional
Ọ bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke Kọmitii Praịm Minista Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed (Farmajo)
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012, a họpụtara Qaasim ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Tayo Political Party (TPP)
Ọ bụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị na Mogadishu nke Farmajo guzobere
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2012, Praịm Minista Abdi Farah Shirdon họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe ọha na eze na Gọọmentị Federal nke Somalia
A na-akpọ ya Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe mmadụ na ọrụ ọha na eze, Qaasim jikọtara agụmakwụkwọ, ahụike, ọrụ, ndị ntorobịa na egwuregwu na ụmụ nwanyị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2013, gọọmentị etiti n'okpuru Minista nke Ahụike Qaasim malitere atụmatụ atụmatụ atụmatụ nke ngalaba ahụike (HSSPs) maka mpaghara ọ bụla nke Somalia
Usoro ahụike mba ọhụrụ ahụ na-ezube inye ụmụ amaala niile nlekọta ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ site na 2016
Ka ikike ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị na-etolite, ụlọ ọrụ UN ga-eme n'oge na-adịghị anya site na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na nke onwe na-enye ọgwụ mgbochi n'etiti mmemme ahụike ndị ọzọ metụtara ya
A na-eji HSSPs akpọrọ $ 350 nde USD n'ozuzu ya, n'etiti 70%-75% e wepụtara maka ọrụ ahụike
Ozugbo emechara, a na-atụ anya na usoro nlekọta ahụike mba ọhụrụ ga-emeziwanye isi obodo mmadụ na ngalaba ahụike, yana imeziwanye ego maka mmemme ahụike na akụrụngwa ahụike n'ozuzu
Oge Qaasim dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe mmadụ na ọrụ ọha na eze kwụsịrị na 17 Jenụwarị 2014, mgbe e kewara Minista ahụ iji kwe ka e mepụta ọkwa kansụl isii
Na 21 Machị 2017, Praịm Minista Hassan Ali Khaire kwupụtara na DrMaryan Qasim ga-ejide ọkwa ọhụrụ nke Minista nke Humanitarian na Disaster Management
Maryam Saleh (amụrụ n'afọ 1985 ma ọ bụ n'afọ 1986), nke aha zuru ezu ya bụ Maryam Saleh Saad bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu (nke gụnyere Psychedelic Rock, Trip-hop) na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nna ya bụ onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye nkatọ Saleh Saad, onye ya na ya rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na osote onye nduzi mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọkụ n'afọ 2005 na Beni Suef
Otu n'ime ndị enyi nna ya bụ Sheikh Imam, onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe ọ nọ
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ pụtara na egwuregwu dị iche iche dịka Laila Soliman's Lessons in Revolution, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na ihe nkiri Ibrahim El-Batout A Shams (2008), nke ọ bụrụ abụ aha ya
N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 2008, o guzobere otu egwu ya bụ Jawaz Safar, nke a na-akpọ naanị ngwá egwu Oud na Tabl

N'afọ 2008, o guzobere otu egwu Baraka (Arabic), abụ Sheikh Imam bụ Nixon Baba, Valery Giscard d'Estaing Ya Wad Ya Yu Yu, ya wādd yā yū yū na Ya wāddy yū yō El-Bahr Byidhak Leh '( 'Ihe mere oké osimiri ji chịa') nke nwanne ya nwanyị Nagham Saleh kpuchiri ma mesịa bụrụ
Kemgbe afọ 2010 ya na onye egwu Lebanọn bụ Zeid Hamdan na-arụkọ ọrụ; a kọwara egwu ahụ dị ka Arab trip-hop

Maryam Saleh pụtara dị ka nwanyị akwụna Mona Farkha na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi Egypt nke afọ 2011 A Tin Tale (Arabic حدوتة من صاج, Hadouta Men Sag ; Director Aida El-Kashef) dị ka akụkụ nke Dubai International Film Festival
Maryam Touzani (a mụrụ n'abalị 18, ọnwa Julaị, afọ 1980) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme egwuregwu
A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri Adam
A mụrụ Touzani n'afọ 1980 na Tangier
N'afọ 2003, ọ nwetara nzere masta na Media Communication and Journalism na London
Mgbe ahụ ọ malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye nta akụkọ na-elekwasị anya na ihe nkiri
Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ede ihe nkiri ma na-eduzi ụfọdụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na nke akụkọ
N'afọ 2011, o mere obere Quand ils dorment
Ọ meriri ihe nrite iri na asaa, gụnyere nke ndị ọka ikpe pụrụ iche na Huesca International Film Festival, mmemme ruru eru maka Oscars
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2014, o mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ Sous Ma Peau Vieille
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe ngosi a, ọ gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri na aha Much Loved nke e wepụtara n'afọ 2015
Ọ bụ di ya Nabil Ayouch duziri ihe nkiri ahụ ebe ọ bụ ya mere edemede ahụ
Na ngwụcha afọ 2015, o mere obere oge nke abụọ ya bụ Aya va à la plage
N'afọ 2017, ya na di ya, onye nduzi Nabil Ayouch dere ihe nkiri Razzia
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ 'Salima' na ihe nkiri ahụ
Mgbe ahụ, n'afọ 2019, Touzani duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Adam A họọrọ ihe nkiri ahụ maka Cannes Film Festival na ngalaba 'Un Certain Regard'
Mgbe e mesịrị na 12th Festival International du Film Francophone de Namur nke Angoulême
A họọrọ ya dịka ntinye Moroccan maka Best International Feature Film na 92nd Academy Awards, mana a họpụtabeghị ya
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Academy of Oscars
N'afọ 2022, e nyere ihe nkiri ya The Blue Caftan Un Certain Regard FIPRESCI Prize na 2022 Cannes Film Festival
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Franco-Moroccan ibe ya bụ Nabil Ayouch
Yahaya chọrọ ime ihe nkiri site na nwata, ihe nkiri ndị Hausa ọ na-ekiri kpaliri ya
O mere nke mbụ ya n'ihe nkiri Gidan Abinci, nke Barauniya nakwa Tabo sochiri, ebe ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ
Ọ nwetara aha mgbe ọ gbanwere ọrụ dị mkpa maka Bilkisu Shema na Mansoor, nkiri na-akpali akpali nke Ali Nuhu duziri
Maryan Nuh Muse (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 1, 1997) bụ onye Somalia na-agba ọsọ
O sonyere na 2016 Summer Olympics na ọsọ 400 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị; oge ya bụ 1 1014 na okpomọkụ
Tupu egwuregwu Olimpik, ọ sonyere na 2014 Youth Olympic Games na ọzụzụ ya dị n'ámá egwuregwu dị na Mogadishu
O kwenyere na ndị Somalia na-eme egwuregwu na-arụsi ọrụ ike maka egwuregwu Olimpik na-esote
Maryann Ekeada (amụrụ na 23 Julaị 1979) bụ onye Naijiria judoka nke sonyere na-asọ mpi na ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị dị mfe
O ritere ihe nrite medal atọ na African Judo Championships n'etiti afọ 1997 na 2004
Maryland bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Ébé o nọ Njikota Obodo Amerika
Marylize Biubwa bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na ekwute on ụmụ nwanyị
Ọrụ Biubwa dabeere na ikpe ziri ezi nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-nkwusi ike na enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị, ebe ụmụ nwanyị ya bụ na nchikọta lekwasịrị anya n'ihe gbasara ikike mmadụ
Ọ bụ onye isi ojii ma burukwa nwanyị na-edina nwanyị ibe ya
Marzouki (Arabic) bụ aha nna nke dị ná Arabụ, ọ nwere ike ịpụta
Asụsụ Masa bụ otu asụsụ Chad nwere njikọ chiri anya nke ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Chad na ugwu Cameroon
Asụsụ Masa edepụtara na Blench (2006) bụ
A na-eji exonym Zime mee ihe maka Herdé, Ngeté, Pévé, na Mesmé
N'otu aka ahụ, Kaɗo bụ aha ọnụọgụgụ maka asụsụ Peve–Kaɗo, nke a na-akpọkwa abụọ n'ime ha Lamé
Shryock (1997 32) na-agbakọta asụsụ Masa dị ka
Ntụnyere nke ọnụọgụ n'asụsụ ọ bụla
Masali Baduza (a mụrụ n'afọ 1996) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri
A kpọrọ ya kpakpando na-arị elu na onye Royal Television Society ga-ekiri
Baduza malitere ọrụ ya karịsịa na ihe nkiri ma pụta na South African crime thriller Trackers, nke bụ ihe ngosi kachasị elu nke M-Net maka afọ 2019
Nwa nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ isii, Baduza si East London, Eastern Cape
Ọ na-asụ asụsụ abụọ bụ Xhosa na Bekee
O nwetara ọzụzụ na Los Angeles campus nke New York Film Academy, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Associate n'afọ 2016
Masango nwere ike izo aka na ,

Maskulizim ma ọ bụ maskulinizim nwere ike na-ezo aka n'echiche na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-achọ iwepụ mmekọahụ megide ụmụ nwoke, mee ka ikike ha na ụmụ nwanyị dị nhata, ma na-eme ka ịrapara ma ọ bụ kwalite àgwà ndị a na-ewere dị ka ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwoke
Okwu ndị ahụ nwekwara ike na-ezo aka na mmegharị ikike ụmụ nwoke ma ọ bụ mmegharị ụmụ nwoke, [lower-alpha 1] yana ụdị mmegide ụmụ nwanyị

Dị ka ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Judith Allen si kwuo, Charlotte Perkins Gilman mepụtara okwu nwoke n'afọ puku iteghete na iri na anọ , mgbe o nyere usoro okwu ihu ọha na New York nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Ọmụmụ na Maskulism'
O doro anya na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ ahụ enweghị mmasị na okwu ahụ ma gbalịa ịgbanwe ya

Allen na-ede na Gilman jiri nwoke na-ezo aka na mmegide nke ụmụ nwoke na-asọ oyi na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na, n'ụzọ sara mbara karị, iji kọwaa omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọdịbendị ụmụ nwoke na nnọchite nke mmekọahụ ha, ma ọ bụ ihe Allen na-akpọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mmekọahụ nke okwu ọdịbendị androcentric

Gilman zoro aka na ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na-emegide ntuli aka ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ụmụ nwoke - ụmụ nwanyị ndị ha na ụmụ nwoke ndị a na-arụkọ ọrụ bụ 'umunwanyi ndị aghaghị ije na ihu' - ma kọwaa Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ dị ka 'maskulism na ya kasị njọ '
[nkọwa ndị ọzọ citations) needed]
Na nzaghachi maka nkuzi ahụ, W

Sampson dere n'akwụkwọ ozi o degaara New York Times na ụmụ nwanyị ga-ekekọrịta ụta maka agha 'Ọ baghị uru ime ka à ga-asị na ụmụ nwoke lụrụ ọgụ, gbalịsie ike ma rụsie ọrụ ike maka onwe ha, ebe ụmụ nwanyị nọrọ n'ụlọ, na-achọ ka ha ghara ime ya, na-ekpe ekpere n'ihu ụlọ arụsị maka udo, ma na-eji atọm ọ bụla nke mmetụta ha mee ka obi dị jụụ
' [ihe dị mkpa]

Na Oxford English Dictionary (2000) na-akọwa oke nwoke, na n'otu aka ahụ nwoke, dị ka 'Ịkwado ikike nke ụmụ nwoke; nrubeisi ma ọ bụ kwalite echiche, ụkpụrụ, wdg, na-ewere dị ka ụdị nke ụmụ nwoke; (karịa n'ozuzu) mgbochi nwanyị, machismo' [lower-alpha 2] Dị ka Susan Whitlow si kwuo na The Encyclopedia of Literary and Cultural Theory (2011), a na-eji okwu ndị ahụ 'na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ofe ọzụzụ'

Ọkà mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze bụ Robert Menzies dere n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa na okwu abụọ a bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na ikike ụmụ nwoke na akwụkwọ ndị na -emegide nwanyị 'Onye na-eme egwuregwu na-enweghị atụ nke na-abanye n'ime oghere ndị a na-atụghị anya ya na-enweta ụgwọ ọrụ iyi nke diatribes, nche pụta , akụkọ ọjọọ, na-azọrọ na ya nwere ikike, ịkpọ òkù ngwá agha, na ndenye ọgwụ maka mgbanwe n’ijere ụmụ nwoke, ụmụaka, ezinụlọ, Chineke, oge gara aga, ọdịnihu, mba, ụwa, na ihe ndị ọzọ nile na-abụghị nke nwanyị”

Ọkà mmụta na-amụ banyere nwoke na nwanyị bụ Julia Wood na-akọwa nwoke dị ka echiche na-ekwusi ike na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke kwesịrị inwe ọrụ na ikike dị iche iche n'ihi ọdịiche dị mkpa n'etiti ha, nakwa na ụmụ nwoke na-ata ahụhụ site na ịkpa ókè na 'mkpa iweghachite ọnọdụ ha kwesịrị ekwesị dị ka ụmụ nwoke'
Ndị ọkà mmụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ Arthur Brittan na Satoshi Ikeda na-akọwa nwoke dị ka echiche na-akwado ọchịchị nwoke na ọha mmadụ

[lower-alpha 3] Maskulinism, dị ka Brittan si kwuo, na-ekwusi ike na e nwere 'ọdịiche dị mkpa' n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị ma na-ajụ arụmụka ụmụ nwanyị na mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị bụ ihe owuwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Dị ka Ferrel Christensen si kwuo, onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Canada na onye isi oche nke mbụ Alberta ije maka oruru okike ha hà n'ezie, 'Emere ịkọwapụta 'oke nwoke' na-eme ka ọ sie ike n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na mmadụ ole na ole jiri okwu ahụ mee ihe

na ọ bụghị ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma ọ bụla' Ọ dị iche n'etiti 'ndị na-enwe ọganihu na-aga n'ihu', bụ ndị na-anabata ọtụtụ mgbanwe ọha mmadụ na-akwalite site n'aka ndị inyom feminists, mgbe ha kwenyere na ụfọdụ usoro iji belata mmekọahụ megide ụmụ nwanyị amụbawo ya megide ụmụ nwoke, na 'ụdị nke extremist' nke nwoke na nwanyị na-akwalite oke nwoke

Ọ rụrụ ụka na ọ bụrụ na nwoke na nwanyị na-ezo aka na nkwenye na a na-akpachapụ anya na ndị nwoke/ụmụ nwanyị, na ekwesịrị iwepụ ịkpa ókè a, ọ bụchaghị esemokwu n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị na nwoke, ma ụfọdụ na-ekwu na ha abụọ bụ
Otú ọ dị, ọtụtụ ndị kwenyere na a na-akpa ókè megide otu nwoke na nwanyị, ma si otú a na-eji otu akara ma jụ nke ọzọ

Ọkà mmụta sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ Georgia Duerst-Lahti na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti nwoke, nke na-egosipụta ụkpụrụ nke mmegharị nwoke na nwanyị, na nwoke, nke na-ezo aka n'echiche nke patriarchy

Ndị ọkà mmụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ Melissa Blais na Francis Dupuis-Déri na-akọwa nwoke dị ka ụdị nke mmegide nwanyị; ha na-eme ka nwoke na nwoke, na-ekwu na nke mbụ bụ onye edemede Warren Farrell
Okwu a na-ahụkarị, ha na-arụ ụka, bụ 'mmegharị ụmụ nwoke'; ha na-ede na enwere nkwekọrịta na-arịwanye elu na mgbasa ozi asụsụ Frenchi na a ga-akpọ mmegharị ahụ dị ka nwoke

Dị ka Whitlow si kwuo, echiche nwoke dị ka Farrell na nke onye ọkà mmụta gbasara nwoke na nwanyị RW Connell mepụtara n'akụkụ echiche nke atọ nke feminizim na echiche ndị na-abụghị nwoke, ma nwee mmetụta site na-ajụ ajụjụ banyere ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị ọdịnala na nwanyị na ihe okwu ndị dị ka nwoke na nwanyị pụtara
Dị ka Bethany M
Coston na Michael Kimmel si kwuo, ndị otu mythopoetic men's movement na-akọwa dị ka nwoke

Nicholas Davidson, na The Failure of Feminism (1988), na-akpọ maskulism 'virism' 'Ebe echiche nwanyị bụ na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-akpata site na nchịkwa nke ụkpụrụ nwoke, echiche virist bụ na ọ bụ ọdịda nke ụkpụrụ ndị ahụ kpatara ha' Christensen na-akpọ virism 'ụdị dị oke egwu nke nwoke na nwoke'
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ahụ maka nwoke na-emegide ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, na-ekwere na ụlọ akwụkwọ nwoke na nwanyị na-akwalite ọdịmma ụmụ nwoke
Data sitere na United States n' afo 1994 kọrọ na ụmụ nwoke na-ata ahụhụ pasenti iri iteghete na anọ nke ọnwụ n'ebe ọrụ
Farrell ekwuola na ụmụ nwoke na-arụ ọrụ ruru unyi, nke na-achọ anụ ahụ, na ọrụ dị ize ndụ
Ndị nwoke na-ekwu na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke igbu onwe ya n'ime ụmụ nwoke karịa ụmụ nwanyị
Farrell na-egosipụta nchegbu banyere ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwoke na-egosi dị ka ihe ọchị, na mgbasa ozi na ebe ndị ọzọ

Ha na-ekwupụtakwa nchegbu banyere ime ihe ike a na-eme ụmụ nwoke na-eleghara anya ma ọ bụ ibelata ma e jiri ya tụnyere ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị, na-ekwusi ike na njirimara nwoke na nwanyị na ime ihe ike n'ụlọ

Ihe ọzọ na-echegbu Farrell bụ na echiche ọdịnala nke ịdị ọcha nke nwanyị ma ọ bụ ọmịiko maka ụmụ nwanyị, nke a na-akpọ mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị dị mma, na-eduga n'ọhụụ na-ezighị ezi maka ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ikom na-eme mpụ yiri nke ahụ, n'enweghị ọmịiko maka ndị nwoke na -eme ihe ike n'ime ụlọ
ikpe mgbe onye mere ya bụ nwanyị, na ịchụpụ nke mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị n'ihe gbasara mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị
Usoro nwoke na ọmụmụ gbasara nwoke na nwanyị, nke na-elekwasị anya ugboro ugboro na ụzọ nwanyị ma ọ bụ ụzọ nwanyị, na-enyocha mmegbu n'ime nwoke, ọha mmadụ site n'echiche nwoke
Dị ka Oxford Edensibia si kwuo, 'Maskulinists na-ajụ echiche nke nwoke bụ isi zuru ụwa ọnụ, na-arụ ụka na tupu feminism ọtụtụ ụmụ nwoke enweghị ike dị ka ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge mkpochapụ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, Saụt Afrịka hụrụ mmegharị nke ndị otu na-ezisa ozi ọma nke Ndị Kraịst, nke Nzukọ Ndị Nwoke Dị Ike na Nzukọ Ụmụ nwanyị Kwesịrị Ekwesị na-eduzi

Nke ikpeazụ hụrụ mmepe nke 'formenism' 'Formenism, dị ka masculinism, na-akwado nkwenkwe na ịdị elu nke ụmụ nwoke karịa ụmụ nwanyị (n'ikwu ya n'ụzọ ọzọ, ọ bụ naanị ụmụ nwoke nwere ike ịbụ ndị isi), mana n'adịghị ka masculinism, ọ bụghị echiche nke ụmụ nwoke mepụtara ma kwado, kama ọ bụ nke ụmụ nwanyị wuru, kwadoro ma kwado
' Òtù Ndị Nwoke Dị Ike na-alaghachi azụ n'echiche Victorian nke Iso Ụzọ Kraịst Muscular
Ndị ọkà mmụta nwanyị na-arụ ụka na enweghị nlebara anya nke otu a na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ọgụ maka ịha nhata agbụrụ na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe iyi egwu nye ụmụ nwanyị na nkwụsi ike nke mba ahụ

Ọkà mmụta Miranda Pillay na-arụ ụka na arịrịọ ndị Mighty Men dị na nguzogide ya na ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị dị ka ihe na-ekwekọghị n'ụkpụrụ Ndị Kraịst, na n'ịwelite patriarchy na 'ọnọdụ dị elu', karịa ihe ịma aka site na ndị ọzọ na-ekwu maka ike
Òtù Ụmụ nwanyị bara uru bụ ihe enyemaka nye ụmụ nwoke dị ike n'ịkwado menism, nkwenye na ịdị elu nke ụmụ nwoke karịa ụmụ nwanyị

Onye ndu ha, Gretha Wiid, na-ata ọgba aghara South Afrịka ụta maka nnwere onwe nke ụmụ nwanyị, ma na-ezube iweghachi mba ahụ site na ezinụlọ ya, na-eme ka ụmụ nwanyị na-edo onwe ha n'okpuru ụmụ nwoke ọzọ

A na-ekwu na ihe ịga nke ọma ya bụ n'ihi na ọ na-ekwu na Chineke kere ndị isi nwoke na nwanyị, mana na ụmụ nwanyị abaghị uru karịa ụmụ nwoke, nakwa na iweghachi ọrụ ọdịnala nwoke na nwanyị na-eme ka nchegbu dị adị na South Afrịka ca mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị
Edensibia
Masego Montsho (amụrụ na abalị iri na ise, na onwa isii, na afọ 1991) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ Motswana nke na-agbachitere Botswana Defence Force XI FC na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Botswana
Montsho agbaala bọọlụ maka Botswana Defence Force XI na Botswana
Montsho gbara ọsọ maka Botswana na ọkwa dị elu n'afọ 2016 Africa Women Cup of Nations qualification na 2021 COSAFA Women's Championship
Mashegu bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Niger State, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Mashegu dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mpaghara ahụ
Ekebidoro Mashegu site n'osimiri Niger dị n'ọdịda anyanwụ ya na osimiri Kaduna dị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ
Ọ nwere mpaghara puku iteghete,otu narị na iri asatọ na abụọ km 2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị puku narị abụọ na iri na ise, irí abụọ na abụọ na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị iteghete na iri abụọ na atọ
Mashour bụ okwu Arabic
O nwere ụdị ụfọdụ, gụnyere Mashhour
A na-eji ya dị ka aha nwoke na kwa aha nna
Ndị nwere aha a gụnyere

mbidoMasimba Hwati bụ onye na-ese ihe na-eme ihe nkiri site na mba Zimbabwe, na-arụ ọrụ na mba ụwa na njikọ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ, arụmọrụ na ụda, nke a maara maka ihe ọkpụkọ mgbasa ozi atọ na-abụghị nke omenala
Hwati gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Harare Polytechnic School of Art and Design n'afọ 2003 ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ceramics na Painting
Hwati kụziri Visual Arts na 3D Art na Harare Polytechnic School of Art and Design
Ọ bụ onye PhD Candidate na Akademie Der Bildenden Künste Wien ,Österreich, onye MFA site na Penny W

Stamps School of Art and Design University of Michigan, Ann Arbor Ọ bụ onye na-adịbeghị anya, gụnyere na ngosi nke Montreal Museum of Fine Art (MMFA), Face To Face From Yesterday to Today, Non-Western Art na Picasso
N'afọ 2015, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị omenkà atọ ahọpụtara maka Pixels Of Ubuntu / Unhu maka Zimbabwean Pavilion na 56th Venice Biennale
Ọ bụ onye nchọpụta nsọpụrụ na Rhodes University Fine Arts Department na Grahamstown, South Africa

Hwati na-enyocha mgbanwe na mbido nke usoro ihe ọmụma nke sitere na nzụlite ya mgbe ọ na-anwale ihe nnọchianya na echiche ndị metụtara ihe ọdịbendị, gosipụtara dị ka mmegharị nke a maara dị ka 'The Energy of Objects'
[nkọwa dị mkpa]
Hwati na-anwa ịrụ ọrụ site na ihe ndị bụ isi, na-emepụta ihe ndị dị na-acha ọcha, na ịmepụta ihe site na ihe ndị bụ isi
Ọrụ ya na-eji isiokwu nke oge a na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ nke ọma na ihe ndị a chọtara, na-agbanwe ihe ndị dị ugbu a n'ime ihe ndị dị na ọrụ nka
Hwati na-ekwu na ọ ga-enwe ike ịchọta ma ọ dịkarịa ala 35 ọdịiche na ihe ọ bụla enyere, mana ọ na-ekwu ọtụtụ mgbe ọ na-enweghị ike ịghọta ihe karịrị iri
Mahadum nke Michigan School of Art dere banyere ngosi Hwati nke afọ 2015 n'ebe ahụ
Onye na-ese ihe na Zimbabwe Masimba Hwati na-enyocha isiokwu ndị na-esote ọchịchị site n'inweta ihe ndekọ na ihe ma gosipụta ha n'ọnọdụ ọhụrụ

Site n'ịkwado ọrụ ihe ọkpụkpụ, Hwati na-anakọta ihe akụkọ ihe mere eme, ihe ọdịbendị sitere na ụgbọala na akpụkpọ ụkwụ, iji kpochapụ ígwè na ihe ndị a chọtara, na-agbanwe ma na-edozi ha n'ime obodo nke oge a
A kpọrọ Masimba Hwati aha n'etiti 12 'Ndị a ga-ele anya' site na New African Magazine n'ihu 1-54 Contemporary Art Fair na London na Somerset House
N'afọ 2006, o ritere ihe nrite National Art Merit Award, ihe nrite nka kachasị elu na Zimbabwe
Hwati bụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya mba atọ na-egosi ugbu a na ngosi Zimbabwean Pavilion; Pixels Of Ubuntu / Unhu na 56th Venice Biennale
Julius Masimba Musodza (a mụrụ na 29 Machị 1976) bụ onye edemede Zimbabwe
A mụrụ Musodza n'oge mmalite nke Zimbabwe ọhụrụ, nwa mbụ nke onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị na Ministry of Lands
Ezinụlọ Musodza sitere na ndị Buja nke Mutoko, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Zimbabwe
A na-agba ume ịgụ ihe n'ezinụlọ Musodza
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Avondale Primary School, Harare na St Mary Magdalene's High School, Nyanga
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ zụrụ onwe ya dịka onye na-ede ihe nkiri, na-ere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Media For Development Trust n'afọ 2002
N'ihe na-erughị otu ọnwa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ka ejighị n'aka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-emetụta Zimbabwe, Musodza kwagara United Kingdom, ebe ọ bi kemgbe ahụ
Ọ bi na obodo Middlesbrough nke North East England
Onye na-agụ akwụkwọ nke ọma mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, Musodza chọsiri ike ịbụ onye edemede site n'oge ọ chọpụtara na ọ ga-ekwe omume iji ya nweta ihe ọ ga-eri
Musodza enyela aka na StoryTime e-zine, nke onye edemede na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na Zimbabwe nke Sweden, Ivor Hartmann, Jungle Jim, Bookends, Winter Tales na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ guzobere

Ọ bụkwa onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ sayensị mbụ doro anya n'asụsụ Shona, MunaHacha Maive Nei? Musodza na-ekwu na ọ malitere ide akụkọ sayensị na ChiShona mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, mgbe ọ sụgharịrị Frankenstein nke Mary Shelley maka nne nne ya
Ojiji ọ na-eji ChiShona eme ihe na-agbagha nghọta a na-ahụkarị na asụsụ ụmụ amaala enweghị 'ọkaibe' nke iji kọwaa ma kọwaa echiche 'dị mgbagwoju anya' dịka a na-achọta na akụkọ sayensị
O kwukwara na ọ bụ Ngũgĩ wa Thiong'o's Decolonising The Mind kpaliri ya

Musodza na-enyocha ide sayensị - akụkọ ifo na ChiShona n'otu edemede, Ide na ibipụta 'Ihe mgbagwoju anya' n'asụsụ Afrịka, nke pụtara na Vector 289, magazin nke British Fantasy Association Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị edemede Zimbabwe abụọ gosipụtara na Geoff Ryman's 100 African Writers of SF
Na mgbakwunye na blọọgụ onwe onye abụọ, Musodza, onye na-akwado Zionism, blọọgụ maka The Times of Israel
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, Vengeance is Mine (2001) nke Tawanda Gunda
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụghị ruo mgbe ọ biri na Middlesbrough ka ọ malitere ịchụso ime ihe nkiri nke ọma
Ọ pụtara n'egwuregwu dị mkpirikpi, To Be Or Not To Be, nke onye obodo ya bụ Dictator Maphosa dere, dịka akụkụ nke egwuregwu dị mkpirisi Boro Bites nke Kansụl Middlesbrough kwadoro (August, 2010)
N'afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere Arc Sketch Group, mgbatị nke ụlọ ọrụ Writers Block North East, nke na-eme ihe ngosi eserese na Arc Theatre, Stockton-on-Tees ruo mgbe ọ gbasara n'afọ 2012
Kemgbe ahụ, Masimba Musodza abụwo ihe nkiri na TV ọzọ, na-apụta na mmepụta dịka Beowulf Return to the Shieldlands (Episode 11), ebe ọ na-eme onye agha Vani
A pụkwara ịhụ ya na mmemme teaser na UK trailer maka Ken Loach's I, Daniel Blake
Ọ pụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na fim dị mkpirikpi I Need help (Ben Stainsby, 2018), ebe ọ na-eme 'The Wise Man'
A na-eji exonym Zime mee ihe maka Herdé, Ngeté, Pévé, na Mesmé
N'otu aka ahụ, Kaɗo bụ aha ọnụọgụgụ maka ịkpọ Peve–Kaɗo, nke a na-akpọkwa abụọ n'ime ha Lamé
A na-asụ Maslam na Malta
A na-asụ Sahu (Sao), ụdị dị iche iche nwere njikọ chiri anya na Saho, kilomita ole na ole n'ebe ugwu na mpaghara ndịda Makari, yana kwa na mpaghara Goulfey na Kousseri na ngalaba Logone-et-Chari
A na-asụkwa ya na Chad
Na 1980s, enwere ndị na-ekwu okwu 5,000 ma ọ bụ ntakịrị ntakịrị na Cameroon (ALCAM 1984)
Masoja Josiah Msiza (a mụrụ n'October 5, 1964) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, na-ede uri na onye na-eti egwu
A maara ya nke ọma maka igosipụta 'Nkunzi Mhlongo' na telenovela Uzalo nke nwetara ihe nrite
A mụrụ Msiza na Kwa-Thema, obodo dị na mpaghara Gauteng nke South Africa
Ịhụnanya ya maka ime ihe nkiri malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ 9 ma nwee mmasị isonye na nkuzi nka na ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, o sonyere na asọmpi ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya nke ọ meriri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ chọtara ọrụ dịka onye na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala ma mesịa chụọ ya na ndị ọzọ na-egwe ihe n'okpuru ala na-etinye aka n'ọgbaghara
Mgbe a chụpụrụ ya, o kpebiri ịchụso nrọ ya ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma gosipụta ọrụ izizi ya n'egwuregwu a na-akpọ 'Mfowethu' nke Gibson Kente duziri
Msiza malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-ede uri ma mesịa bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, onye na-eti egwu na onye na-akọ akụkọ

Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ama ama dịka Kalushi The Story of Solomon Mahlangu na A Million Colours Otú ọ dị, ọrụ ya kachasị pụta ìhè bụ ngosipụta ya nke onye omekome obi ọjọọ Nkunzebomvu 'Nkunzi' Mhlongo na ihe ngosi telivishọn a na-elekarị na South Africa Uzalo
Ọ pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ usoro TV dịka Scandal!, Shreads and Dreams, Rhythm City, Intersexions, Sokhulu & Partners, na Making Cents with the Sitholes
N'afọ 2016, ọ nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na telivishọn na telenovela a na-akpọ 'Ring of Lies'
N'afọ 2004, o dere uri maka South African National Football Team n'oge asọmpi AFCON nke emere na Tunisia
O dekwara ma mee uri mgbasa ozi maka ụlọ ọrụ redio kachasị ukwuu na South Africa Ukhozi FM
Na June 22, 2019, Masoja Msiza ya na Dudu Khoza gosipụtara Cothoza Music Awards nke mbụ kwa afọ nke otu A cappella Ladysmith Black Mambazo na-enweta ọtụtụ onyinye kwadoro
Msiza bụ nna ụmụ atọ, otu nwa nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Masoud Zarei ( Persian , a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1981 na Tehran, Iran ) bụ onye Iran na-agba bọọlụ, onye otu klọb IPL Mes Kerman ugbu a
Mmelite ikpeazụ 16 Disemba 2009
Masquerade ma ọ bụ Masquerader nwere ike na-ezo aka
Massa Lemu bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye edemede si Malawi nke na-arụ ọrụ na eserese, eserese, na arụmọrụ na ọrụ echiche dabeere na ederede
Ọ na-akọwa nka ya dị ka 'ntinye aka na nkọwa nke ebe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya anyị niile bi na ya'
A mụrụ Massa Lemu n'afọ 1979 na Blantyre
Mmetụta mbụ ya na nka bụ nwanne nna ya nwụrụ anwụ, David Zuze, onye na-ese ihe dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ; Lemu na-ele nwanne nna ya na-ese foto
Lemu nwetara nzere bachelọ nke agụmakwụkwọ (nke nwere isi na Fine Arts) na Mahadum Malawi n'afọ 2003 na Master of Arts in Painting na Savannah College of Art and Design (USA) n'afọ 2009
Ihe osise Lemu gụnyere njikọta nke ihe okike, nke mmadụ mere, na nke e chepụtara echepụta dị ka akụkụ nke ịza ajụjụ banyere okwu
Ọrụ arụmọrụ ya gụnyere iji akụkụ okporo ámá na saịtị ndị ọzọ ndị na-enweghị akwụkwọ na-ejikarị, dịka akụkụ nke ọrụ gbasara ịkwaga
Lemu egosila ọrụ ya na ebe ngosi dị na mba Malawi nakwa mba United States
A tụlere ọrụ ya n'akwụkwọ gụnyere Texphrastic, Cite (Houston, Texas), Reflections (Blantyre, Malawi) na akwụkwọ Steve Chimombo akpọrọ Aids, Artists and Authors (Zomba, Malawi)
Ọ kụziri ihe ọmụmụ na mahadum gụnyere Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth na Richmond, Virginia, na Mahadum Rice na Houston, Texas
Lemu bụ Core Critical Studies Fellow na Glassell School of Art na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston site n'afọ 2010 ruo n'afọ 2012, ebe ọ na-eme nchọpụta ma dee banyere nka Africa nke oge a
Lemu mere nnyocha na biopolitics nke ndị otu nka Africa nke oge a dị ka nwa akwụkwọ PhD na Mahadum Stellenbosch
PRECARIOT bụ onyinyo onwe onye nke onye na-ese ihe dị ka onye na-agagharị na kọntinent na-enweghị nsogbu mgbe niile

Precariat bụ okwu nke jikọtara okwu ahụ na-akọwa ụdị ndị ọrụ na ndị ọkachamara na-akwaga mba ọzọ na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma, na-arụ obere ọrụ nwa oge, na-enweghị olu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma na-enwekwu nkụda mmụọ maka ọnọdụ ndụ na ọrụ ha
Lemu na-ekwu na akụkụ mgbanwe ya dọtara mmasị ya, na-anabata akara ahụ ma na-ewere ya dị ka aha ya

Maka Lemu, onye hụrụ mba n'anya ochie ahụ dị mpako, ma dị njikere ịnwụ maka ala nna ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ naanị ihe onwunwe ya bụ ala na-adịghị akwụsi ike na nke a na-amaghị ama nke enweghị ntụkwasị obi, na-ekwu na ọ na-eme ihe na ala a a na-ejighị n'aka
PRECARIOT na-elekwasị anya na usoro nyocha na nyocha, akara na akara iji mee ka eziokwu nke ịkwaga pụta ìhè
Dị ka Lemu si kwuo, Passages for the Undocumented malitere ihe karịrị otu afọ gara aga na nzaghachi maka nsogbu bara uru ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na-eche enweghị ohere iji gosipụta nka ya ihu
N'ịbụ onye ndị panhandlers ọ zutere kpaliri, Lemu malitere iṅomi usoro ha, na-ede okwu nke ya na akara katọn ma na-eguzo na nkuku okporo ámá gburugburu Houston
Okwu mmeghe ahụ na-elekwasị anya na ahụmịhe Lemu dị ka onye na-ese ihe na-akwaga mba ọzọ n'ime nkwupụta ndị na-ejikọta ọrụ nka echiche na mgbanwe ọdịbendị

Na Stranded Fishes and Masks on Wheelchairs, ihe osise ndị dị na ngosi ahụ jiri ihe oyiyi Gule Wamkulu nke ndị Chewa nke Malawi dị ka ebe ọpụpụ iji kwuo maka ọtụtụ isiokwu dịka itinye na mwepu, mkpebi siri ike na ntachi obi
Ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyekwara foto ndị na-eji onyinyo azụ ahụ, chambo karịsịa, iji kwuo maka ịkwaga, mmetọ, na mmetọ
A kpaliri onye na-ese ihe iji onyinyo azụ ahụ mee ihe dị ka ihe atụ maka ịkwaga na mmetọ mgbe ọ hụrụ azụ Tilapia nke East Africa na mmiri mmiri na-emetọ emetọ nke Houston n'afọ 2010
Dị ka onye edemede, e bipụtara Lemu na ndị a
Massa (ma ọ bụ Masana, Masa) bụ asụsụ Chad nke ndị Masa na-asụ n'ebe ndịda Chad na n'ebe ugwu Cameroon
Ọ nwere ihe dị ka 200,000 ọkà okwu
Asụsụ ndị a bụ Bongor, Bugudum (Budugum), Domo, Gizay, Gumay, Ham, Walia, Wina (Viri), Yagwa
Kim, asụsụ agbata obi, bụ nke e kewapụrụ dị ka Masa
A na-asụ Masa n'akụkụ ndịda nke ngalaba Mayo-Danay na Far North Region, na mpaghara Yagoua, Kalfou, Wina, Yele, na Guéré
A na-asụ Central Masa n'akụkụ Osimiri Logone, nke nwere ụdị anọ
Ụdị dị iche iche, dị ka edepụtara site n'ebe ugwu ruo n'ebe ndịda, bụ Yagwa (asụ na Yagoua), Domo (n'obodo Domo), Walya, na Buguëum
Asụsụ Muzuk, nke a na-ewere dị ka Asụsụ Munjuk (ALCAM 1983), bụ n'ezie Asụsụ Masa ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-aghọta ya na ụdị Masa ndị ọzọ (Ousmanou 2007)
Ndị na-asụ Muzuk na-asụsụ abụọ, ma na-asọpụta olumba Muzuk nke Masa, yana Munjuk
A na-asụ ya n'ebe ndị kpọrọ nkụ nke West (Guidigis, Mayo-Kani, Far North Region)
A na-asụ Masa na Cameroon na Chad, na ndị na-asụrụ ya 103,000 na Cameroon
Massachusetts bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Ezinụlọ Massad (Arabic, /ˈ пропуˈæd/; a na-edekwa Massaad ma ọ bụ Mas'ad), bụ ezinụlọ Ndị Kraịst Ọtọdọks nke ndị Arab

N'ịbụ ndị sitere na Jdeideh Marjayoun, Lebanon, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara South America na United States (karịsịa Oklahoma) n'oge ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19 na mmalite Senchụ́rì 20 n'ihi mmegbu na-arịwanye elu nke Ndị Kraịst na Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman nke ndị Alakụba
Massengo bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere

Massinissa (Tamazight pronunciation / пропуɪˈnɪsə/ na Neo-Tifinagh ⵎⴰⵙⵙⵉⵏⵉⵙⵙⴰ nke a makwaara dị ka Massinissa; amụrụ na 8 Nọvemba 2001) Amara site na aha nkwanye ugwu ya dị ka Sidi Massinissa nke Rif, bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ nke Riffian mụrụ Moroccan
Ọ bụ nwa nwa nwa nke Prince Amghar Sidi Mohand Ameziane nke Rif, onye ikpeazụ Tribal Monarch nke Rif na onye ndu mbụ na-emegide ọchịchị nke Morocco
A mụrụ Massinissa na Al-Hoceima, Rif, Morocco ma mesịa kwaga Mataró, Catalonia, Spain ebe ya na ezinụlọ ya tolitere
Ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwú nke Riffian a ma ama Abdelhak Akandouch, onye guzobere otu egwu Twattoun [ar], na onye edemede na onye na'egwuregwu Riffian Asmaa Aouattah

Akandouch malitere njem ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, na-esonye na nzukọ, ngagharị iwe na mkpọsa nke ezinụlọ ya haziri iji kwalite njirimara Amazigh, ọdịbendị na asụsụ, ụmụ nwanyị, ikike mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nnwere onwe nke Catalonia
Dị ka nna ya, Massinissa hụrụ nka n'anya, ma malite ime ihe nkiri, ịbụ abụ, na klas egwu mgbe ọ bụ nwata
O meela ihe nkiri dị iche iche na egwu na nka n'obodo ya Mataró

E gosipụtara Massinissa na ezinụlọ Akandush Azuaattah na ụlọ ọrụ TV TV nke mba Catalonia TV3, mgbe Massinissa bụ naanị onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, na ihe ngosi Amb ulls de nen iji dekọọ ụdị ndụ ezinụlọ ahụ ma kọọ akụkọ Massinissa
Ọ bụ onye Riffian ma nwee ụmụ amaala abụọ nke Morocco, United Kingdom, na Spain
Massinissa tolitere n'ezinụlọ na-eme ngagharị iwe
Nne ya bụ onye ndú na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na mpaghara Rif n'afọ ndị 1980s ma nwee mmegide na mkpagbu site n'aka ndị ọchịchị Morocco
Nna ya, onye bụkwa onye na-eme ihe ike, dere ma bụrụ abụ a ma ama na Riffian, na-ekwu maka mmegide na mpaghara ahụ na ndị isi Riffian dị ka Abd el-Krim
Nne na nna ya, ahụmahụ gbasara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ịkpa ókè ọha na eze, na nzụlite ndị mbịarambịa, mere ka mmegide bụrụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ndụ Massinissa kemgbe amụrụ ya

N'afọ 2018, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na Europe, kpughere ọnọdụ obi ọjọọ na nke iwu na-akwadoghị nke ụmụ anụmanụ na ugbo ụlọ ọrụ na Catalonia ma napụta ụmụ anụmanụ n'ụlọ ndị ahụ

Na ngwụcha afọ 2019, n'ihi mmeghachi omume ọha na eze, mgbasa ozi, na mwakpo ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a hụghị Akandouch n'ihu ọha na-eme ihe ọ bụla gbasara ikike ụmụ anụmanụ ma gosipụta na ọ gbanwere uche ya n'ịkwalite ọdịbendị ya (aha Amazigh) na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

N'afọ 2019, Akandouch sonyeere ọgbakọ Fridays for Future's Climate Strike na Barcelona dị ka mgbatị nke ọrụ ya wee sonye na 2019 'International Rebellion' omume site na Extinction Rebellion na London, Barcelona, na Madrid
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa nzukọ mbụ nke Catalan Climate Action Summit na Barcelona nke Gọọmentị Catalonia haziri
Ọ gakwara nzukọ COP25 na Madrid nke United Nations haziri (ndị ọzọ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe Greta Thunberg na odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN Antonio Guterres gakwara COP25 na Madri)

Master Juba (m
1852 ma o bu 1853) na nkembu bu onye Afrika nke Amerika na gba nkwa di na afọr imerime 1840
O bu otu mpkurụ ndi ojie ji mbu bidóró emume ngosi na Njikota Obodo Amerika I gwu egwuregwu na élú ogbo maka ndi nkiri óchá na onye ogẹ nke ahu wuru onye ojie só ndi ocha ministrel
'Master Juba' buru áhà maka ogbo; madu si o bu onye kwa méréní gara ka áhà ogbo 'Boz's Juba' na ezíbóté áhà ya ha si bu William Henry Lane
Maka ákwúkwó, o nweríkí bu na madu abụọ maa o bu atọ jikotárá na íshí madu
