Mata Sy Diallo (Amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1945) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Senegal
A maara ya dị ka 'ọdụm nke Ndoukoumane', ebe a mụrụ ya, Diallo si n'ezinụlọ dị ala
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo na Kaolack tupu ọ bụrụ onye ama ama na mba

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kansụl dị ka minista na-ahụ maka mbata na ọpụpụ site n'afọ 1991 ruo afọ 1992; ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke National Assembly site n'afọ 1995 ruo afọ 2001, na 2003 a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche ya nke Mouvement National des Femmes de l'Espoir et du Progrès
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na idu ndú nke Socialist Party nke Senegal
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị Toucouleur, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na mmalite ọrụ ya na Kaffrine
Àtụ Infobox settlement
Matahi bụ ndagwurugwu ime obodo dị na Whakatāne Distrịktị na Bay nke Plentị Rịjịọnụ nke North Island nke New Zealand
Rua Kenana Hepetipa, onye amụma Maori, onye na-agwọ ọrịa n'okwukwe na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ala, guzobere ebe obibi ahụ na 1910
O guzobere ebe obibi nke Maungapohatu afọ atọ tupu mgbe ahụ
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, Rua biri n'etiti Matahi, ya na nwunye ya nke nta Te Atawhai Tara ma ọ bụ Piimia, na Maungapohatu, ya na nwanyị mbụ ya Pinepine Te Rika
Site na 1912, Matahi gafere oge uto, ebe Maungapohatu gafere ọdịda
Rua nọrọ oge na-arịwanye elu na Matahi, ọ nọkwa ebe ahụ mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1937
N'oge ọrịa influenza nke afọ 1918, mpaghara ahụ enweghị ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ndị nwụrụ n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Bay nke Plenty
E bibiri àkwà mmiri Matahi ma mebie ebe ahụ n'oge nnukwu idei mmiri na Machị 1964
Otu n'ime ụmụ ụmụ Rua ga-eji helikọpta napụta mgbe o merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu n'oge ihu igwe siri ike
Ka ọ na-erule 1986, ụfọdụ ụmụ na ndị na-eso ụzọ Rua laghachiri Matahi na ezinụlọ ndị na-eto eto iji biri nso na marae ha na ụzọ ndụ ọdịnala
N'afọ 2010, nwanne ya nwoke nke obere bụ Whairiri Tamataonui Terewa gburu nwoke Bay of Plenty bụ Pomare Mason na ndagwurugwu ahụ, n'oge arụmụka banyere onye nwe ụlọ
E mechiri ndagwurugwu ahụ, ma mechie Matahi Valley Road, n'ihi idei mmiri na mgbapụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014
Idei mmiri metụtakwara ndagwurugwu ahụ na Machị na Eprel 2017
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2016, otu nne na ụmụ anọ furu efu na mpaghara echedoro Te Urewera, na Lions Hut na Matahi Valley Road ghọrọ isi maka ọrụ ọchụchọ ahụ
Ndị ikwu nyochara mpaghara ahụ n'onwe ha, megide ndụmọdụ gọọmentị, wee chọta ìgwè ahụ ihe dị ka minit 30 site n'okporo ụzọ ndagwurugwu
Ndagwurugwu ahụ bụ obodo (ebe agbụrụ) nke ndị Tuhoe
O nwere kwa ọtụtụ marae
Ụlọ Matahi Marae na Te Huinga ō te Kura nwere njikọ na Ngāi Tamatuhirae ma guzobe ya na 1925
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, Gọọmentị nyere $ 508,757 site na Provincial Growth Fund iji kwalite Tataiāhape Marae, Piripari Marae, Matahi Marae na Tanatana Marae, na-emepụta ọrụ 98
Omuriwaka Marae na Te Tātua o Hape ki Tūarangi ụlọ nwere njikọ na Ngāi Tamatuhirae
Ụlọ Tuapo Marae na Te Ao Hou nwere njikọ na Tamakaimoana
Whakarae Marae na Toi te Huatahi ụlọ nwere njikọ na Whakatāne Hapū na Ngāi Tama ma guzobe ya na 1930
Ma Daalụ kwa nụ o
Te Kura Mana Māori o Matahi bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na-agbakọta agụmakwụkwọ asụsụ Maori maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nke afọ 1 ruo 8, nke nwere mpịakọta nke 18 ka ọ na-erule Julaị 2022
Matal, nke a makwaara dị ka Muktele na Balda, bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon
Ndị Matal bi na nsọtụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke ugwu Mandara, site na Parékwa massif na ndịda ruo Méri
Ha na-ebikwa na mbara ala Mayo-Ranéo (Baldama na Zouelva cantons na Mora arrondissement, ngalaba Mayo-Sava, Far North Region)
Ha ruru mmadụ 18,000
Mattress Lot bụ onye na-ere matarasị na ụlọ na-ere ahịa na Portland, Oregon
Michael na Mary Ruth Hanna, di na nwunye, guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Jenụwarị 2, 2010
Matarasị Lot na-ebu matarasị nke Oregon ụlọ ọrụ Matarasị, Ngwaahịa Ụda Ụda na mfe izu ike rụrụ
Matarasị Lot na-ebukwa àkwà ikpo okwu na oche site na Ngwongwo ehihie na abalị
Matarasị Lot bụ ma eleghị anya onye na-ere matarasị mbụ na US iji nye nnyefe matarasị site na ịnyịnya ígwè
Matarasị Lot na-enye ndị ahịa ego ma ọ bụrụ na ha ejiri ịnyịnya ígwè rute
Matarasị Lot bụ ọkachamara na matarasị latex na-adịgide adịgide na matarasị ndị a na-eme n'ógbè ahụ, na-enweta uru na mmegharị 'azụ ahịa mpaghara'
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Mattress Lot meghere maka azụmahịa, onye edemede na-enweta Pulitzer Prize Tom Hallman dere profaịlụ dị ogologo banyere onye guzobere Matarasị Lot Michael Hanna
A chụrụ Michael Hanna n'ọrụ na Comcast Cable na Mee 2009
Di na nwunye Portland gbaziri $ 8,000 wee zụta nnukwu ụgbọala nke matarasị nke abụọ nke Sealy Factory
Ha gbazitere ohere n'ime ụlọ ahịa ụgbọ ala na-enweghị azụmaahịa wee mepee Mattress Lot na Jenụwarị 2, 2010
Azụmaahịa ahụ nwetara uru n'ime ọnwa isii mbụ
Onye nwe ya, Michael Hanna, gara n'ihu kwuo maka ahụmịhe ya na Nzukọ Ted X nke emere na Mahadum Concordia
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2011, Mattress Lot wepụtara akara ngosi na okwu 'A Lot More Mattress for Less'
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ Oregon Mattress Company kpọrọ ha 'Onye na-azụ ahịa nke Afọ'
Matarasị igwe igwe, nke a makwaara dị ka matarasị Mmiri, bụ igwe igwe Mmiri eji eme ihe na matarasị
A na-eji coils eme ihe na isi (nkwado nkwado) nke matarasi ime mmiri, nke bụ ojiji mbụ ha
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, a na-eji obere 'micro-coils' eme ihe na upholstery (nkwado nkasi obi) nke matarasị, karịsịa na isi coil ('coil-on-coil' owuwu), mana mgbe ụfọdụ na ụdị isi ndị ọzọ
E webatara coils Matarasi n'etiti-ọgwụgwụ narị afọ nke 19, ma nọgide na-ewu ewu na narị afọ nke 21, okachasi ndị mere n'oge na United States
E nwèrè ihe doséré ka onye isi oche nkeji nke ụmụaka hụrụ n'anya ụdị matarasị anọ
Isi ihe achọrọ bụ 'mgbasa ozi', nke pụtara mgbanwe na nkwụsi ike ka a na-agbanye spring - na mbụ dị nro, iji kwekọọ n'ahụ, mgbe ahụ siri ike, iji nye nkwado
N'usoro na-arịwanye elu nke nzaghachi na ọnụahịa, ụdị ndị a bụ
Ọ bụ ezie na e mepụtara coil springs na narị afọ nke iri na ise, ejighị ha mee ihe na matarasị ruo n'etiti narị afọ nke 19, na-esote ojiji nke upholstery coil sprins na oche na ụgbọ ala
E webatara microcoils na narị afọ nke 21, ma site na 2014 [update] bụ obere akụkụ nke ahịa
Ọ bụ Louis Andrew Vargha nyere ikike ikike ikike nke ihe ndina ahụ
Ụfọdụ nzaghachi nke oge a na coils n'ime matarasị a na-awụfu na
Ahịa mattress coil na-elekwasị anya - ndị na-ebute ụzọ bụ Leggett & Platt (nke e guzobere na 1883) nke Carthage, Missouri na AGRO International (nke e hiwere na 1948) nke Bad Essen, Germany

Ndị ọzọ gụnyere HSM (ụlọ ọrụ) (nke a na-akpọ Hickory Springs, nke e guzobere na 1944) nke Hickoray, North Carolina; Spinks (nke e guzobere n'afọ 1840) nke Leeds, United Kingdom na Subiñas (nke e hiwere na 1959) nke Mungia, mpaghara Biscay, Spain
Àtụ Bedding
Matarasị uwa, Inc
ma ọ bụ Matarasị uwa nke Michigan bụ ụlọ ahịa matarasị na Michigan na Indiana na Midwestern United States
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Genoa Township, Michigan
Ụlọ ahịa na-anọkarị n'onwe ha ma dị n'ime obodo ndị nwere ụlọ ihi ụra kama nnukwu ụlọ ahịa igbe
N'afọ 2002, Matarasị ụwa nwere ụlọ ahịa atọ na Michigan
Matarasị uwa bụ, dị ka akụkọ ngwá ụlọ taa si kwuo, onye na-ere ahịa dị elu maka ụlọ ahịa Matarasị Discounters isii ụmụ na Metro Detroit; Matarasị Diskounters na-apụ n'ahịa Michigan
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2009, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ebe iri abụọ na abụọ
Na Mee 2009, ọ nwetara ụlọ ahịa Matarasị Gallery asaa na Indianapolis; ụlọ ahịa Matpress Gallery, nke bụbu nke Indianapolis Taa ime ụlọ otu, mechiri n'April 2009
Ụlọ ahịa ahụ meghere ọzọ dị ka ebe Matarasị ụwa na June 2009
N'afọ 2011, ụlọ ahịa ahụ nwere ụlọ ahịa 28, 21 na Michigan na 7 na Indianapolis
Otu n'ime ụlọ ahịa ya na Michigan dị na Ann Arbor
N'oge ahụ, ọ nwere ndị ọrụ 100
Na Mee 2011, Art Van ngwá ụlọ nwetara Matarasị uwa nke Michigan nke kwuru na ọ ga-edebe aha Matarasị ụwa na ndị ọrụ
Art Van kwuru na ọ nwere ike ịmegharị ụlọ ahịa ụfọdụ dị ka Art Van PureSleep
Nchịkọta nke Matarasị ụwa nyere Art Van ụlọ ahịa mbụ ya na mpụga Michigan
Ọnụ ego nke nnweta ahụ egosighi
Art Van kenyere Armando Murillo, onye bụbu onye ọrụ nke guzobere ọrụ Pure ụra na mpụga Michigan, dị ka osote onye isi oche na-arụ ọrụ Matarasị uwa
N'afọ 2013, Matarasị ụwa dara ogbenye, ebe ọtụtụ meghere ọzọ dị ka ụlọ ahịa Art Van ụra dị ọcha
Matbucha (Hibru) bụ ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke ndị Juu Moroccan ma salad e siri esi nke nwere tomato e siri esi na ose a na-etinye galik na ose chili, ma jiri nwayọ sie ya ruo ọtụtụ awa

A na-ejikarị challah ma ọ bụ 'achịcha ụlọ' (achịcha ọdịnala Moroccan nke ndị Juu naanị maka ijere ya na matbucha), ọ bụkwa ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke a na-ejikwa dị ka akụkụ nke ihe na-eri nri, mgbe mgbe dị ka akụkụ ya salatim, ma ọ bụ salad
Matbucha bụ nri a ma ama na Israel, ebe ndị Juu si Morocco wetaara ya
Enwere ike iji ya mee ihe dị ka ntọala maka shakshuka
A na-akwadobe Matbucha site na isi tomato, ose, na galik n'elu okpomọkụ dị ala ruo ọtụtụ awa ruo mgbe ha siri nri n'ime ihe dị nro, nke siri ike yiri jam n'usoro
A na-ere matbucha a na-emepụta n'ahịa n'Izrel niile n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa nri ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ, ọ dịkwa na ụdị friji na ụdị dị iche iche
Akara gụnyere Sabra, Osem, na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, matbucha abụrụla nke dị na United States n'okpuru akara NY Shuk, n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Matengo bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndi obodo Tanzania
Ndị na-asụ ya na-asokarị otu asụsụ, asụsụ ndị agbata obi anaghịkwa aghọta
Asụsụ Matengo nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ ndi Ngoni n'ihi na ha abụọ nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme yiri nke mmalite
Annacleta Mathapelo Siwisa bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi dị ka onye omeiwu maka Economic Freedom Fighters
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na itoolu
Na nzuko omeiwu, Siwisa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Portfolio na Ọrụ Ọha na Infrastructure
Ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ (búrú Mathematics na asụsụ bekee) omúmú màkà mà, ụdị, ámá, na ihe gbanwe
Ndi ọmúmúónúọgụgụ nà kpàchányá Í lé ihe nṇòmi, màkà Í rütá ihe bụ ezíbȯté ihe dị na ùwà
Ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ dị mkpà Í bì ihe né mé na ùwà; ȯ bụ ihe mèrè kà ndi ozor á búghị ndi ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ na mú ya
Na úbọchị tá, orü di ímérímé jịrị ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ à rü
Orü, obiạ, ọrü-órü, na Í ruu ihe né jí ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ Í rü
Ha na kpó ndi na rü nchéchichè nka onye ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ
Ọ dị nlụlítá ụkà nke ndi ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ náa jü màkà ihe ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ dí kà ónúọgụgụ di nà àlà mgbé mádu ánóghị ya
Onye ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ Benjamin Peirce si ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ bụ 'obiạ nke ha nè jị ẹ rü ihe di mkpà'
Albert Einstein, nà áká ozor, sị na 'otụ íwú ọmúmú-ónúọgụgụ kwùrù ihe bu ùwà nke ányí na hü, ọ dígí ézíbóté; na mgbe ha gi bu ézíbóté, ha gágị à bụ ihe bu ùwà nke ányí na hü'
Ronald Maurice Bean, ónyé a maara nke ọma dị ka Mathematics (nke a makwaara dị ka Allah Mathematics) (amụrụ n'October 21, 1972), bụ ónyé na-emepụta hip hop na DJ màkà Wu-Tang Clan na ọrụ ya na ọrụ ya
O mepụtara akara ngosi Wu-Tang Clan

A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Jamaica, Queens, New York, nwanne ya nwoke mere ka Mathematics mara hip hop bụ ónyé na-eweta ihe ndekọ nke ndị ọsụ ụzọ dị ka Grandmaster Flash & The Furious Five, Treacherous Three na Cold Crush Brothers
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na 1987 DJing block parties na park jams na Baisley Projects, na-aga site na aha Supreme Cut Master
N'afọ 1988, ọ ghọrọ DJ oge niile màkà ónyé na-eti egwu Victor C, na-eme ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na klọb na kọleji na New York City
N'afọ 1990, Mathematics jikọtara ya na GZA / Genius, ónyé ga-aghọ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Wu-Tang Clan n'oge na-adịghị ányá, mana n'oge ahụ na-agba mbọ iwulite ọrụ na akara Cold Chillin
Njikọ a mere ka Mathematics nweta ebe na njem mbụ ya, The Cold Chillin Blizzard Tour (ya na ihe ndị a ma ama dị ka Biz Markie, Big Daddy Kane, Kool G
Rap & DJ Polo na Marley Marl)
Mathew Knowles (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 9, 1952) bụ onye isi ndekọ America, onye ọchụnta ego na onye nkuzi mahadum
A maara ya nke ọma màkà ịbụ ónyé njikwa nke Destiny's Child
O nwetakwara ọrụ nke ụmụ ya nwanyị Beyoncé na Solange Knowles
Knowles bụ ónyé guzobere Music World Entertainment, nke na-agụnye mba, ozioma na egwu ụmụaka
Knowles bụkwa onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ónyé na-eme ntụli aka ogologo oge nke National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences (NARAS) ma na-eje ozi na Kọmitii Grammy Board
A mụrụ Knowles na Gadsden, Alabama, nwa Lou Helen Knowles (née Hogue) na Matthew Q
Knowles (April 4, 1927 ♡ December 30, 1996)
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1974 na Mahadum Fisk dị na Nashville, Tennessee, ébé ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Economics na nzere Bachelor of Science na Business Administration
O nwèrè MBA na Strategic Planning na Organizational Culture site na Cornerstone Christian Bible College
Knowles malitere ọrụ azụmahịa ya na ire ahịa nke ọfịs na ngwá ọrụ ahụike
Ọ kwagara Houston na 1976 wee rụọ ọrụ màkà Xerox Corporation ruo afọ iri, ọkachasị na ngalaba ahịa usoro ahụike
Knowles rụrụ ọrụ na-ere CT / MRI na ụlọ ọgwụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ahịa neurosurgical
N'afọ 1992, Knowles hapụrụ ọrụ a iji tinye onwé ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu ya, Music World Entertainment, nkè o guzobere n'afọ ahụ

Mathias Nwafor Ugochukwu // (nụrụ) (site na afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri abuo na isii ruo na afo otu puku, nari iteolu na iri iteolu)(1926-1990), bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria a ma ama si Anambra Steeti
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe si n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ na nnukwu mmepụta na mpaghara ahụ
A na-akpọ ya mgbe ụfọdụ site na aha ọzọ ya, Ugobuzuo
Ọ bụ enyi nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Igbo dị iche iche dịka K
Mbadiwe na onye bụbu osote onye isi ala Naijiria, Alex Ekwueme
Mmekọrịta ya na osote onye isi ala nwere ike buru ihe kpalitere njide ya n'okpuru ọchịchị General Buhari
A mụrụ Mathias Ugochukwu na Nsogwu, Umunze na Orumba South LGA nke Anambra steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị St Augustine, Umunze
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, ọ hapụrụ Obodo ya bu Umunze gawa Jos ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta ebe obibi maka Rufus 'Ofor Jos' Ofor, onye ọchụnta ego Igbo si Enugwu-ukwu, Anambra State
Otú ọ dị, na-atụ anya ohere ọzọ, ọ hapụrụ Jos wee sonye na ndị uwe ojii na Anambra Steeti nke oge ahu
Tupu ọ banye n'usuu ndị agha, ọ na-etinye aka na obere azụmaahịa
Dị ka onye ọrụ, ọ banyere ma merie 50,000 pound na Irish Sweepstake
Mgbe ọ chịkọtara ego ahụ, ọ hụtara ụlọ-ọrụ nkeonwe ya na-emezu ma na-arụpụta ihe na ojuju afo, o wee banye azụmaahịa oge niile
Dị ka onye ọchụnta ego, o guzobere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, na-emepụta ma kwudosie ụlọ ọrụ siri ike
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ njem, ma soro John Holt guzobe azụmahịa, mesịa bụrụ onyeisi oche nke John Holt Inc
O tinyekwara ego dị ukwuu na izụ ahia akụkụ mapụtara amapụta akụkụ, mbubata akwa, ahịa ịre ụlọ na mmepe ala
Dị ka onye ọchụnta ego Igbo, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ndị nduzi nke African Development Corporation, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwekwara CT Onyekwelu na Louis Ojukwu dị ka ndị otu
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ akụkụ nke ọrụ iji kwalite ọchụnta ego Africa ma NCNC
kwadoro ya
N'afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri isii na anọ (964), a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Nigerian Industrial Development Bank, na-aghọ onyeisi oche mbụ ya

N'ime afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asaa (1970) gawa, ọ zụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ndi enyemaka dị iche iche nke John Holt dị ka akụkụ nke iwu Indigenization; ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọchụnta ego Igbo ole na ole nwere ego zuru ezu iji nweta òkè na ụlọ ọrụ mba dị iche iche na Naịjirịa
Mathibeli bụ aha Africa nyere aha na aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Mathilda Blanchard (amụrụ Mathilda Landry) (December 10, 1920-July 1, 2007) bụ onye ndu ndị ọrụ Canada
Akpọrọ ya la pasionaria acadienne n'ihi ntinye aka ya na agbachitere ndị ọrụ Acadian New Brunswick, ọkachasị na ahia nri oke osimiri
A mụrụ ya na Caraquet, New Brunswick, na Disemba 10, 1920, Mathilda Blanchard tolitere n'ezinụlọ nọ n'etiti
Ezinụlọ ya nwere mgbọrọgwụ na òtù ndị ọrụ a haziri ahazi

Nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere, Sylvia Landry-Blanchard, jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke International Pulp and Paper Union Local 464 na Rumford, Maine ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ ma mesịa bụrụ onye otu ndị isi nke Maine AFL-CIO
Sylvia na Mathilda ga-emesị lụọ ụmụnne abụọ si n'otu ezinụlọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 20, o nyeere aka agha ahụ, na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na Windsor, Ontario na Montréal
Enweghị ike ịkpata ego zuru oke iji debanye aha na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, Blanchard kama ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ntutu isi
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri ise, Blanchard haziri òtù ndị ọrụ nwere onwe ha na ụlọ ọrụ nhazi azụ n'akụkụ mmiri niile nke Acadian

Nkwado ya maka ndị ọrụ oge na omume ya n'ezoghị ọnụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù n'etiti ndị enyi na ndị iroOnye isi Union na onye bụbu onye omeiwu Yvon Godin jiri Blanchard tụnyere onye isi ọrụ Quebec Michel Chartrand, na-ekwu na ha nwere ụdị ejiji yiri nke ahụ
Onye edemede Acadian Rino Morin Rossignol dere na 'iwe ya dị egwu na okwu ya na-atụ egwu'
Abụọ n'ime ụmụ atọ Blanchard sokwa na ihe gbasara Acadian

Michel-Vital Blanchard bụ onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ akwụkwọ yana mwepu nke Moncton na 1968 - akụkọ ihe mere eme nke bụ kọrọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ L'Acadie l'Acadie?!? nke Michel Brault na Pierre Perrault dere
Na mgbakwunye, nwa Blanchard Louise duziri Parti acaddien na nkenke, tupu mgbasa ya na 1981
N'etiti afọ 1960, Blanchard guzobere Canadian Union for the Fisheries Industry and Affiliated Workers, nke na-anọchite anya ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ 10,000
Blanchard sonyere n'ọtụtụ ọgbaghara iji melite ndụ ndị ọrụ oge na ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ azụ
N'afọ 1972, Blanchard jere ozi dị ka onye isi maka mmegharị iji mee ka akụ na ụba nke North East New Brunswick dị iche iche, nke na-alụ ọgụ na enweghị ọrụ

Ọrụ Blanchard na Acadian Affiliated Fisheries Workers Union na itinye aka na Kọmitii nke 12 maka Ikpe Ziri Ezi na New Brunswick mere ka o sonye na ngagharị iwe megide mgbanwe na Inshọransị Ọrụ na 1992 na 1994
Ngagharị iwe ahụ nyere aka mee ka e merie ndị otu Liberal Party na Acadian-majority ridings nke Acadie - Bathurst na Beauséjour n'oge ntuli aka gọọmentị etiti nke Canada na 1997
Blanchard kwadokwara maka ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na-enyeghị awa zuru ezu iji ruo eru maka Inshọransị Ọrụ

Blanchard ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ gbara ọsọ maka idu ndú ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Canada n'oge ntuli aka ndị isi Progressive Conservative Party nke New Brunswick na 1969, na-abịa nke atọ n'azụ Richard Hatfield, onye ghọrọ onye isi ala nke New Brumswick n'afọ sochirinụ
Blanchard ga-emecha gbaa ọsọ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya na ntuli aka gọọmentị etiti nke afọ 1972, na-enweta 3% nke votu na ịgba ịnyịnya nke Gloucester
Dị ka onye ọrụ Acadian Jean-Marie Nadeau si kwuo, ọrụ nke ndị otu ọrụ dịka Mathilda Blanchard na Yvon Godin dị oke mkpa maka ndị ọrụ na New Brunswick
Blanchard bụ onye na-akwado akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye na-agbachitere ọchịchị ndị eze Britain
N'oge Prince Charles gara n'obodo Village Historique Acadien na 1996, Blanchard mebiri usoro iwu ma nata aka ya n'aka Prince na akwụkwọ ya A Vision of Britain A Personal View of Architecture
National Film Board nke Canada mepụtara ihe ngosi banyere Blanchard na 1997
Onye nduzi Ginette Pellerin ghọtara ọdịdị a n'ezoghị ọnụ, na-ekwu, sị
A gbara Blanchard ajụjụ ọnụ na 1972 National Film Board ihe nkiri Un soleil pas comme ailleurs nke Léonard Forest
Mathilde Moreau bụ onye Ivory Coast na-ese ihe
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ecole Nationale des Beaux Arts na Abidjan ebe ọ nwetara DCSA (Advanced Diploma of Fine Arts) n'afọ 1986
N'afọ 1983-1994 ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Fine Arts na Harris School of Modern na Abidjan
Mgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Prọfesọ nke Ihe osise na Ecole Nationale des Beaux Arts na Abidjan n'etiti afọ 1994-2006
N'agbata afọ 2003 na 2005, ọ bụ onye nnyocha na Central Academy of Fine Arts na Beijing na ihe osise ọdịnala ndị China
Kemgbe afọ 2006, ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Ecole Nationale des Beaux Arts na Abidjan
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị bu ụzọ nke otu Vohou-Vohou amụrụ na L'Ecole des Beaux Arts nke Abidjan na 1970s
Vohou-Vohou bụ ịjụ iji ihe osise dị oke ọnụ
Ndị ọzọ bu ụzọ bụ Yusuf Bath, Kra N'Guessan, Théodore Koudougnon, Mathilde Moreau
Mathlouthi (Arabic) bụ aha nna Tunisian nke na-enweghị isiokwu Arabic doro anya Al-/El-XI nke a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Tunisian na kwa ndị mba France
Ndị ama ama nwere aha ezinụlọ a gụnyere
Matilda Gogo Lambert bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya na onye isi oche nke Tilda Goes Green Foundation
O mere mpụta ihe nkiri ya na ihe nkiri The Celebrities ya na Mike Ezuruonye
Ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama wee nweta ọrụ ndu ya na ihe nkiri Nollywood ndị ọzọ
Matilda Gogo Lambert amụrụ ya na 13 Eprel wee zụlite ya na Port Harcourt
O si Andoni LGA, Rivers State
Lambert gụrụ akwụkwọ mbu ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụaka ndị uweojii na ma mụọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Federal Government Girl's College, Abuloma na Port Harcourt
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mahadum Abuja maka nzere bachelọ na Philosophy wee nweta nzere masta na Socio-Political Philosophy na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka

Lambert malitere ọrụ omee ihe nkiri ya n'afọ nke abụọ ya na mahadum mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri The Celebrity gunyere Mike Ezuruonye Ihe omume ya na ihe nkiri ahụ mere ka ọ pụta ìhè wee malite ikiri na fim ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2020, o wepụtara ihe nkiri, Unroyal nke o gosiputara bụrụ onye ndu dị ka Princess Boma
Ihe nrụpụta ya ndị ọzọ nke 2022 gụnyere Deepest Cut, Instaguru na Kendra
Matilda Obaseki bụ onye na eme ịhe nkịrị Nigerian film actress bukwru ọye edemede scriptwriter Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na emume ịhe nkịrị na ewu ewu nke TV a na akpọ Tinsel
A mụrụ Obaseki na 19 Maachị 1986 na Benin City, Oredo Local Government Area, Edo State ebe o tolitere
Ọ bụ ọdụdụ nwa n’ime ụmụaka asaa
Obaseki lụrụ Arnold Mozia na Benin City na 21 Septemba 2013 mgbe ọ mụsịrị nwa mbụ ya otu afọ gara aga na 31 August 2012
Ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke nke abụọ na 1 Jenụwarị 2015
Obaseki tolitere na Benin City, ebe o nwere Mmụta Nke Praịmarị na secondiri
Ọ kwụsịrị ịmụ Bekee na University of Benin iji lekwasị anya n'ọrụ ya bu ịme ịhe nkịrị
Obaseki bidoro ọrụ ya n’afọ 2007, mana amara ya nke ọma na oru ya na ịhe nkiri nke Tinsel, ebe ịhe ana akpọ ya be Angela Dede
Tupu ọsoro mee Tinsel, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ịmeịhe nkịrị nwa agbọghọ ogbeye na ịhe emume TV nke US, nke pụtara na usoro atọ

Matilde Alvim bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Portugal, otu n'ime ndị na-ahụ anya maka ịhazi ọgbaghara ihu igwe ụmụ akwụkwọ (Fridays for Future) na Portugal nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke onye na-eme ihe ike na Sweden Greta Thunberg
Alvim si na parish nke Quinta do Anjo, nke bụ akụkụ nke Palmela, na Setúbal District nke Portugal, n'ebe ndịda nke isi obodo Lisbon na nso Arrábida Natural Park
Nwa akwụkwọ na Palmela Secondary School mgbe ngagharị iwe ụmụ akwụkwọ malitere, ọ bụzi nwa akwụkwọ anthropology na Faculty of Social and Human Sciences nke Mahadum NOVA Lisbon
Ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi kpaliri ya site na nwata, na-echeta na akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ banyere nnukwu ebe mkpofu Pacific metụtara ya nke ukwuu
Nke a mere ka ọ ghọta na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi, ọkachasị nsogbu ihu igwe, enweghị ike idozi site n'omume onye ọ bụla naanị na ọ dị mkpa ịga na isi iyi nke nsogbu ahụ
Karịsịa, ọ na-ata ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala ụta, nke, ọ na'ekwu, etinyela ego na mgbasa ozi aghụghọ na mkpọsa lobbying iji mee ka gọọmentị ghara ịgbaso nkwa mba ụwa na-ebelata ikuku
Ọ na-ekwu na ụwa ga-eru na nnọpụiche carbon site na 2030, kama 2050, ụbọchị gọọmentị Portugal tụrụ aro
Alvim tinyere aka na mmegide ihu igwe na 2019, ya na enyi ya, Beatriz Barroso

Ha dị njikere na mbụ iji gosipụta onwe ha, dị ka Greta Thunberg, mana nkwado maka 'Fridays for Future' ụlọ akwụkwọ na-eme ngagharị iwe gbasara ngwa ngwa, na ngagharị iwe mbụ na Lisbon na-esote ngagharị iwe Friday na mba ahụ dum
Ihe karịrị ìgwè ụmụ akwụkwọ iri atọ sonyere, na nkwado pụrụ iche na Porto na Coimbra
Na 15 Machị 2019, ụmụ akwụkwọ pụkụ ịrị abụọ gbakọtara na Lisbon
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2019, Alvim degaara Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi akwụkwọ ozi, na-akatọ ụzọ gọọmentị si emeso ọnọdụ ihu igwe
N'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ, ọ jụrụ atụmatụ maka ọdụ ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ Lisbon na maka ịdọrọ Osimiri Sado
Otu n'ime ihe ndị ọzọ ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe chọrọ bụ mkpa ọ dị ịmachibido iji gas eme ihe na Portugal ma kagbuo atụmatụ maka paịpụ gas

N'otu ụbọchị ahụ ka mbipụta nke akwụkwọ ozi ya, Alvim so na kọmitii nnabata nke nabatara Greta Thunberg na Lisbon, mgbe ọ si New York laghachi Europe, na-aga nzukọ ihu igwe nke United Nations (UN), nke a na-akpọ COP25, nke na-ewere ọnọdụ na Madrid
Thunberg, onye jụrụ ife n'ụgbọelu n'ihi mmetụta ụgbọ elu nwere na gburugburu ebe obibi, jiri ụgbọ mmiri rute
Alvim kwuru okwu na-ekwughachi ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị o mere n'akwụkwọ ozi o degaara minista

N'oge ọrịa COVID, mgbe ngagharị iwe na-ekweghi omume, Alvim nọgidere na-eme ka nsogbu mgbanwe ihu igwe bụrụ ihe na-ebute ụzọ n'uche ndị mmadụ, na-ede edemede maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ma na-agba ya ajụjụ ọnụ
Àtụ Sandbox
Pauline Matilde Theodora Bajer bụ onye amụrụ na (4 Jenụwarị 1840 ruo 4 Machị 1934) bụ onye Danish na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-eme udo
A mụrụ Pauline Matilde Theodora Schlüter na 4 Jenụwarị 1840 na Frederikseg, Herlufmagle Sogn, Næstved Municipality, Denmark
Nna ya bụ onye nwe ala
Ọ lụrụ Fredrik Bajer, onye ọ maara kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ma mee ka o kwenye na ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị inwe ọnọdụ hà nhata na ụmụ nwoke na ọha mmadụ
N'oge dị mkpirikpi Mathilde Bajer bụ onyeisi oche nke Danish Women's Society (Dansk Kvindesamfund), nke o nyere aka chọta na 1871

N'afọ 1885 ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Women's Progress Association (Kvindelig Fremskridtsforening) nke lụrụ ọgụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'afọ 1915
Mathilde na di ya na-akwado ibe ha mgbe niile, Mathilde Bajer na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Danish Peace Society (Dansk Fredsforening) nke Fredrik Bajer raara nye
Quaker English na pacifist Priscilla Hannah Peckover zutere Fredrik na Matilde Bajer n'oge nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị Nordic na afọ 1888
Peckover kwụrụ Matilde Bajer ụgwọ ka o wee nwee ike isonye na nzukọ udo mba ụwa
Mathilde Bajer nwụrụ na 4 Machị 1934 na Copenhagen
Àtụ Notes

Matoke, nke a makwaara dị ka matooke, amatooke na Buganda (Central Uganda), ekitookye na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Uganda, ekitooke na ọdịda anyanwụ Uganda, kamatore na Lugisu (Eastern Uganda), ebitoke na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Tanzania, gitoki na Rwanda, Burundi na aha a na-akpọ East African Highland banana, bụ osisi unere triploid nke sitere na Great Lakes nke Africa
A na-ewepụta mkpụrụ osisi ahụ na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, jiri nlezianya wepụ ya, wee sie ya ma na-agbakarị ya ma ọ bụ na-agbanye ya n'ime nri
Na Uganda na Rwanda, a na-esi mkpụrụ osisi ahụ na steam, a na'elekwa nri a na-achịkọta achị anya dị ka nri mba na mba abụọ ahụ
Unere Matoke bụ ihe oriri a na-ahụkarị na Uganda, Tanzania na mba ndị ọzọ dị na Great Lakes
A makwara ha dị ka Mutika / Lujugira subgroup
Mkpụrụ osisi ndị na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, nke sitere na otu otu unere, unere owuwa anyanwu Afrika Highland (Musa AAA-EA), bụ ndị a mara n'asụsụ Bantu nke Uganda dị ka matoke
Ọ dịla anya ịta unere na-abụkarị ihe a na-ahụkarị n'akụkụ ọdọ mmiri Victoria nke Uganda, na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ na Kilimanjaro nke mba Tanzania
A na-amata unere nke Ugwu Uganda site na unere ndị ọzọ site na ọtụtụ ntụpọ ojii (ma ọ bụ na-adịkarịghị nchara ma ọ bụ ọla nchara) na pseudostems ha, na-enye ha ọdịdị nke ọla a nụchara anụcha
Akpụkpọ ahụ kachasị elu nke pseudostems ha bụ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, nke a na-etinye n'elu akwa na-acha pinki na purple
Akwụkwọ ha na-adịkwa akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma na-adịghị mma, ọdịiche doro anya mgbe ị na-eji ha tụnyere n'akụkụ n'akụkụ na osisi unere ndị ọzọ site n'ebe dị anya
Inflorescence nwere peduncles kpuchiri ntutu siri ike
Bracts bụ ovate ruo lanceolate n'ụdị na mpụga nke na-acha odo odo na nchara nchara na mpụba nke dị n'ime nke na-agba ọbara ọbara na-acha ọbara ọbara na odo n'akụkụ ala
Okooko osisi ndị nwoke nwere tepals na-acha creme na lobes odo odo
Anthers na-acha pinki pinki, ebe stigmata na-acha oroma
Mkpụrụ osisi ahụ na-agbanye ma nwee ike ịdịgasị iche n'ogologo
A na-eme ka ha na-ebu ibu site na ntụziaka na-enweghị isi
Mkpụrụ osisi ahụ na-acha ọcha na mkpụrụ osisi na-eto eto ma na-acha creme na mkpụrụ osisi ndị tozuru etozu
Banana nke East African Highland bụ ụdị osisi triploid (AAA)
Aha ha bụ Musa acuminata Colla (AAA-EA)
Aha ndị ọzọ gụnyere Musa brieyi De Wild
Nne na nna ha bụ ụdị unere ọbara (M
acuminata ssp
zebrina) nke ụdị unere ọhịa Musa acuminata
Banana nke onwunwa anyanwụ mbà Highland bụ obere ìgwè nke na-ezo aka n'ihe dị ka 200 n'otu n'otu (ma ọ bụ clones)
Enwere ike kewaa ha n'ime ìgwè ise dị iche iche nke clones a maara dị ka clone set
A mara ihe karịrị aha mpaghara 500 maka cultivars sitere na subgroup EAHB
E webatara unere dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka n'oge na-adịghị anya site na Ndịda Ọwụwa Ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia n'oge mbụ ruo narị afọ nke isii AD, ma eleghị anya site na azụmahịa
Ha dị iche na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa site na ụdị AAA ndị ọzọ, ebe ha malitere na mpaghara Great Lakes nke Africa ruo ihe karịrị otu puku afọ
A naghị ahụ ha ebe ọzọ n'ụwa, a na-akpọkwa Great Lakes nke Africa etiti nke abụọ nke ụdị unere dị iche iche n'ihi nke a (nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia bụ nke mbụ)
A na-ewere unere dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka dị ka nke dịgasị iche iche na Uganda, Burundi, na Rwanda

Otú ọ dị, nyocha mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa ekpughere na unere niile dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka bụ otu mkpụrụ ndụ ihe ndụ ihe nkesa, ebe ọ ga-abụ na ọ sitere n'otu clone nna nna nna (nke e webatara n'Africa n'ime afọ 2000 gara aga) nke nwere mmụba nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ site na mgbasa nke ahịhịa
Ogige mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa nke unere nke East African Highland sitere na otu ihe omume ngwakọta, nke kpatara nsogbu mkpụrụ ndụ ihe ọkụkụ n'oge ntọala nke mkpụrụ ndụ ihe ubi
Triploid East African Highland unere bụ unere na-adịghị amị mkpụrụ, a na-agbakwunye ya n'ụzọ na-enweghị mmekọahụ ruo ọtụtụ ọgbọ site n'ọgbọ ndị ọrụ ugbo na-esote kemgbe ha webatara n'Africa

Nke a nwere ike iduga n'ịpụta mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa nke na-adị nso na isogenic somatic mutants (ya bụ, ụdị unere dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka taa) nke ndị ọrụ ugbo na gburugburu ebe obibi họọrọ n'Ebu Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afríka
Banana nke East African Highland bụ otu n'ime ihe oriri kachasị mkpa na mpaghara Great Lakes nke Afrika, ọkachasị maka Uganda, Tanzania, Burundi, na Rwanda
Onye ọ bụla na-eri unere kwa afọ na Uganda bụ nke kachasị elu n'ụwa na 070 kg (15 ) kwa ụbọchị kwa onye ọ bụla
Gụnyere Rwanda na Burundi, oriri bụ ihe dị ka 250 ruo 400 kilogram (550 ruo 880 ) kwa onye kwa afọ (ihe dị ka unere atọ ruo 11 kwa ụbọchị)
Uganda bụ nke abụọ kachasị emepụta unere n'ụwa
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ebupụ ihe kacha nta, ebe a na-ejikarị ihe ọkụkụ eme ihe maka oriri ụlọ
Banana nke East African Highland dị mkpa dị ka ihe ọkụkụ nri, aha obodo matoke (ma ọ bụ karịa matooke) bụ otu okwu maka okwu 'nri' na Uganda
Ọzọkwa, a na-eji akụkụ nke unere East African Highland nke a mara dị ka mbidde emepụta mmiri / biya
A na-eji mma akpụcha matoke, na-ekpuchi ya na akwụkwọ osisi ahụ (ma ọ bụ akpa plastik), ma tinye ya n'ime ite nri (Swahili sufuria) n'elu osisi unere
A na-etinye ite ahụ n'elu icheku ọkụ ma ọ bụ ọkụ osisi ma na-etinye matoke ahụ n'ime mmiri ruo awa ole na ole, a na-awụnye mmiri n'ime ala ite nri ọtụtụ ugboro
Ogwe osisi ndị dị n'ala nke ite ahụ na-eme ka mkpụrụ osisi ndị a na-ekpuchi n'elu ọkwa mmiri ọkụ
Ọ bụ ezie na esighị ya, matoke na-acha ọcha ma sie ike; isi nri na-eme ka ọ dị nro ma na-acha odo odo
Mgbe ahụ, a na-achịkọta matoke ahụ mgbe a ka na-ekpuchi ya na akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ akpa ma na-ejikarị ya na akwụkwọ unere ọhụrụ
A na-eri ya na ofe e ji akwụkwọ nri, ahụekere, ma ọ bụ ụdị anụ ụfọdụ (ụmụ ewu ma ọ bụ anụ ehi) mee
A na-ejikwa Matoke eme nri ụtụtụ a ma ama a na-akpọ Katogo na Uganda
A na-esikarị Katogo dị ka ngwakọta nke unere na ahụekere ma ọ bụ anụ ehi, ọ bụ ezie na anụ ma ọ bụ nke ewu bụkwa ihe a na-ahụkarị
Na Bukoba, Tanzania, a na-esi matoke (ma ọ bụ ebitooke) na anụ ma ọ bụ azụ catfish a na-ese anwụrụ ọkụ, na agwa ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ osisi
Usoro a na-ewepụ mkpa ọ dị ịkwadobe ofe dị iche
N'ime usoro nri a, a naghị achịcha matoke
Ruo mmalite afọ 1980, nke a bụ nri a na-ahụkarị na Bukoba ma a ga-eri ya n'afọ niile
Matraasi orthopedic (ma ọ bụ mattress orthopaedic) bụ mattress e mere iji kwado nkwonkwo, azụ na ahụ dum
A na-agwa ngwaahịa ahụ site na nyocha ahụike nke orthopaedics nke na-elekwasị na ímé ihe ọ bụla n'ime anyị si nọrọ ndị ọzọ anya na nsogbu ma ọ bụ nkwarụ nke ọkpụkpụ azụ na nkwonkwo

E mepụtara site na iji Tinye na ụgbọ ịnyịnya matarasị orthopaedic iji lụso nsogbu ndị mmadụ nwere ike inwe na azụ ọjọọ ma ọ bụ nkwonkwo site n'inye matarasị siri ike nke na-enye nkwado a kapịrị na ụdị nke ụwa ọnụ
Site na ihe ọhụrụ na nchọpụta gbasara ọkpụkpụ na ọrụ nkwonkwo na 1950s, ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta matarasị mere mgbalị imeziwanye ngwaahịa ha ma nye ha mmeri karịa ndị asọmpi ha

Otú ọ dị, ebe ọ bụ na enweghi ụkpụrụ gọọmentị ma ọ bụ aha gọọmentị nke ga-eme ka otu matarasị bụrụ orthopaedic karịa ndị ọzọ n'ọtụtụ mba, na matarasị niile nke oge a na-akwado azụ na nkwonkwo ruo n'ókè dị ala ma ọ bụ karịa, ojiji nke oge a nke okwu 'orthopaedic' aghọwo okwu ahịa
Iwu anaghị achọ ndị na-emepụta matarasị, na mba niile, ka ha nye ihe akaebe nke ule iji kwado nkwupụta nke matarasị ịbụ orthopaedic
Àtụ Bedding
A mụrụ Uwatse na 10 Mee 1981 na Warri, Delta Steeti na mpaghara ndịda Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ nwa John Uwatse (onye injinia) na Pat Omare (onye ọchụnta ego)
Ọ bụ onye mbụ n'ime ụmụnne asaa, o nwere ụmụnne nwoke anọ na ụmụnne nwanyị atọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ John F
Kennedy International na Our Lady's High School na Effurun
Ọ gara Federal Government College Warri
Ọ bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na Delta State University, Abraka, ma nwee ọmụmụ na mba ọzọ na ọmụmụ French na Vileji du Benin, Togo
Matse jikọtara ya na Wazobia FM, mgbe nyocha gara nke ọma na Lagos n'afọ 2008
Ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi ehihie a na-akpọ Coolele Zone, na ụlọ ọrụ redio Pidgin na-asụ Bekee nke e bidoro gosiputawa na 2007

Ịbawanye ewu ewu ya n'ihi ọgụgụ isi ya na ọrụ mgbasa ozi mere ka o merie ọtụtụ onyinye gụnyere, Nigerian Broadcasters Merit Awards, Best of Nollywood Awards na The Future Awards E dekwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto iri kachasị ike na Naijiria na mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 2011, ọ kwupụtara ọpụpụ ya na Wazobia FM site na soshal midia
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Encomium Magazin, ọ kọwara na ihe mere o ji wee hapụ Wazobia FM maka Nigeria Info bụ n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịma onwe ya aka na ihe 'siri ike, nke ga-eme ka mbara igwe ya gbasaa'
Ọ kọwara mgbanwe ya na mgbasa ozi site na Pidgin English gaa na Bekee dị ka nnukwu ihe ịma aka ya n'oge ọ nọ na Nigeria Info FM
Na Septemba 2013, Nigeria Info chụrụ Matse, mkpebi ọ weere dị ka enweghị mmetụta na enweghị ekele n'ụzọ nke ndị were ya n'ọrụ n'oge gara aga
N'afọ 2014, Sola Filani nke YNaija kọwara mmetụta ya na redio Naịjirịa dị ka nke na-aga n'ihu 'na-aga n'ihu' ọtụtụ afọ mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ịbụ onye na-ahụ maka ikuku
Ọ kọwara mkpebi ya ịhapụ redio dị ka ụzọ isi tụleghachi ndụ ya na ịnọ ezinụlọ ọhụrụ ya nso
Ugbu a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na blọọgụ nri wwwmatsecookscom Na Machị 2014, ọ kọwara na 'Matse Cooks' ga-enye ozi nwere nghọta banyere nri na ihe ọṅụṅụ ndị dị mkpa n'ọdịbendị nye ndị Afrịka
Onye mgbasa ozi, Linda Ikeji kọrọ na Matse na-emekwa nri na-esi ísì ụtọ na oge na ọnụ ọgụgụ azụmahịa
N'afọ 2016, YNaija depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 100 kachasị akpali akpali na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2020, Social Animal depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ede blọogụ nri 121 kachasị elu n'ụwa
Na mmalite 1990s, Moeti rụrụ ọrụ maka Ministri Ahụike Botswana
O sonyezie UNAIDS, wee ruo n'ọkwa onye ndu otu nke Africa na Middle East Desk, nke dabeere na Geneva, site na 1997 ruo 1999
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ahụike mpaghara maka ụlọ ọrụ UNICEF mpaghara maka East na South Africa

Clarence Matthew Baker (ubochí irí n'ọnwa Decemba, 1921 , rụo ụbọchị irí nà otu n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1959) bụ ónyé America na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na onye na-ese ihe osise, nke a maara nke ọma màkà ịdọrọ ndị dike na-atọ ụtọ ógè ochie dị ka onye na-alụ ọgụ mpụ Phantom Lady, na ndị na-atọ egwu

Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na 1940s na 1950s Golden Age nke akwụkwọ ndị na-atọ ọchị, ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke mbụ a maara n'Afrịka na America iji nweta ihe ịga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ ndị na'atọ ọchị
O dekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ 'ihe osise' nke St
John Publications' digest-sized 'It Rhymes with Lust (1950), akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ na-ese onyinyo n'agbanyeghị na e chepụtara okwu ahụ n'oge ahụ
A nabatara Baker na Will Eisner Comic Book Hall of Fame na 2009
Enwere ike ịhụ mmetụta ya na ndị na-ese ihe dịka Dave Stevens na Adam Hughes
A mụrụ Baker n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Disemba, 1921, na Forsyth County, North Carolina
Mgbè ọ dị obere, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, ma mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1940, ọ kwagara Washington, DC
N'ịbụ ónyé ọrịa obi gbochiri ka a banye n'ọrụ agha US n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ malitere ịmụ nka na Cooper Union, na New York City
Ọ banyèrè na ihe ọchị site na Jerry Iger Studio, otu n'ime ndị 'nchịkọta' nke 1930s ruo 1940s nke nyere ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na-abanye na usoro ọhụrụ ahụ ihe ọchị

Iger chetara na Baker batara n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ya na otu ihe nlele nke ihe osise na-acha anụnụ anụnụ n'ime ọfịs ya; o chere na nwanyị ahụ màrà mma nke na ọ were Baker n'ọrụ n'ebe ahụ, dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'azụ tupu e nye ya edemede mbụ ya
Ọrụ mbụ Baker gosipụtara na ọ na-eme ihe ọchị bụ ide ihe na inking ụmụ nwanyị na akụkọ 'Sheena, Queen of the Jungle' dị peeji iri na abụọ na Fiction House's Jumbo Comics #69 (nke dị n'ihu na Nov
1944), nke Robert Webb na Alex Blum dere
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Baker bụ ndị e dere na mbụ na penciled backgrounds nakwa ụmụ nwanyị màkà ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ, a na-enwekwa ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ ya, na onye na-ese ya maka ọrụ ya
O mepụtara aha ngwa ngwa dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe 'Good Girl' kachasị mma na azụmaahịa màkà nlebara anya ya na nkọwa zuru ezu mgbè ọ na-ese ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge a, nke a maara dị ka Golden Age of Comic Books, Baker rụrụ ọrụ maka ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ gụnyere Fiction House, Fox Comics, Quality Comics, na St
John Publications
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ya na ónyé na-ese Jon D'Agostino jikọrọ aka n'onwe ya n'okpuru aha Matt Bakerino na Charlton Comics
Enyi Baker bụ Frank Giusto na onye na-ese ihe Lee J
Ames ekwuola na Baker bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya
Nwanne Baker bụ Fred Robinson gbakwunyere banyéré Baker na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ St
John bụ Archer St
John, 'Ha nwere mmekọrịta chiri anya
Amaghị m kpọmkwem ihe ọ bụ'

Ihe osise ya ndị ọzọ màkà akwụkwọ ndị na-atọ ọchị gụnyere aha agha na-atọ ụtọ Canteen Kate, nke Baker sere 22 niile, yana akụkọ dị na akụkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Tales of The Mysterious Traveler; ihe nkiri 'Sky Girl' na Fiction House's Jumbo Comics, nke nwéré ihe ndị mbụ na mbipụta ndị ọzọ na-agba ọsọ site na #69-139 (November 1944 Ōz Disemba 1952); 'Flam', 'South Sea Girl', 'Glory Forbes', 'Kayo Limited'
Baker gosipụtara Lorna Doone màkà Classic Comics na Disemba 1946, otu onyinye ya na naanị onyinye ya na usoro a ma ama

Ọ bụ ónyé a na-akwanyere ùgwù n'ozuzu ma ọ bụghị onye a na'ekwuputa na ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe maka Fox's Rulah, Jungle Goddess #1717X27 (Ọgọst 1948 June 1949, aha zuru ezu mgbè ọ weghaara nọmba nke Zoot Comics)
O mepụtara Flamingo dị ka na-atọ ọchị site na 1952 ruo 1954
[citation needed] Aha edemede ya gụnyere Curt Davis
Baker kpụrụ ụmụ nwanyị ka ha bụrụ ndị mara mma, ndị mara mma n'ezie, jupụtara n'àgwà n'akụkọ nke ha n'adịghị ka ụzọ e si egosi ụmụ nwanyị na egwuregwu ndị ọzọ nke oge ahụ
Baker mepụtara ma ọ bụ soro mepụta ihe onye edemede John Arcudi na-akpọ 'onye isi ojii mbụ a maara na ndị America na-atọ ọchị'

Ónyé dike ọhịa dị ka Tarzan Voodah, nke Baker sere ma bụrụ nke ónyé édémédé a na-amaghị ama dere, gosipụtara na ónyé na-ebipụta McCombs 'Crown Comics # 3 (ụbọchị mkpuchi nke ọdịda 1945, ụbọchị ire ere nke Septemba 19, 1945)
Dị ka Grand Comics Database si kwuo, dabere na nka sitere na 'The Matt Baker Checklist' nke Alberto Becattini na Jim Vadeboncoeur Jr
na Matt Baker The Art of Glamour (nke e depụtara n'okpuru References), 'Voodah na-acha ka nwa amaala Africa na egwuregwu a, mana mgbè mbipụta a gasịrị, a na-acha ya ka Caucasian'
Ọ bụkwa onye Caucasian n'ihu ya

Ka e mesịrị n'ime afọ iri ahụ, Baker rụrụ ọrụ n'efu maka Atlas Comics, onye bu ụzọ na 1950 nke Marvel Comics, malite na akụkọ akụkọ akụkọ dị peeji ise n'ozuzu ya, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị ihe a na-ejighị n'aka, nke a na-enye onye edemede na-ede akwụkwọ Stan Lee, na aha omnibus Gunsmoke Western # 32 (Dec

N'oge ụfọdụ n'oge a, na-arụ ọrụ site na ụlọ ọrụ Vince Colletta, Baker gara n'ihu na-ese akụkọ maka Atlas 'Western Outlaws, Quick Trigger Action, Frontier Western, na Wild Western; karịa maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-eme ihe ọchị Love Romances, My Own Romance, na Teen-Age Romance; na otu akụkọ ọ bụla maka akụkọ akụkọ karịrị nke mmadụ / sayensị akụkọ ifo Strange Tales, World of Fantasy, na Tales to Astonish ('M Fell to the Center of the Earth, March # 2, 1959)
Baker nyekwara ihe osise maka mbipụta Dell Movie Classic nke Eze Richard na ndị Ntụte
Na ngwụcha afọ iri ise ọ gbasara n'ọrụ ihe osise, dịka ọmụmaatụ maka mkpirisi 16 nke o mere nke Howard J
Lewis ' The Complete Guide to Better Bowling (1956, Maco Magazine Corporation) maka General Motors 'Information Rack Service nọmba 1R-58-46 na mbipụta mbụ nke St
John detective pulp digest Manhunt
Ọrụ ikpeazụ a maara bụ peeji isii 'I Gave Up the Man I Love!' na ụlọ ọrụ My Own Romance #73 (Jan
Ọrụ ikpeazụ a maara dị ka nke a na-ekwukarị ma a na-ejighị n'aka bụ peeji mbụ nke akụkọ peeji isii 'Happily Ever After' na Marvel's Love Romances #90 (Nov
Ọ nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi n'August 11, 1959
A nabatara Baker na Will Eisner Comic Book Hall of Fame na 2009
Matthew Nwozaku Chukwudi Blaise bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka ikike na nkwuchite ọnụ ndị ndịna nwanyị
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2020, mgbe e gbusịrị nwoke na-edina nwoke na Naịjirịa, Blaise mepụtara mgbasa ozi Twitter tinyere Ani Kayode Somtochukwu na Victor Emmanuel
Mmadụ atọ ahụ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na mmepụta hashtag '#EndHomophobiainNigeria' na Twitter Naijiria ruo ọtụtụ ụbọchị

N'ịbụ onye ndị ọrụ Special Anti-Robbery Squad jidere ma yie ya egwu maka 'mmekọ nwoke idina nwoke', Blaise malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ngagharị iwe nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2020 nke End SARS, ebe a wakporo ha maka ibu ihe ngosi nke edere okwu 'Queer Lives Matter'
Ha kwadokwara otu ndị ọzọ na-eme ngagharị iwe ahụ
Mgbe ọgbugba egbe nke Lekki n'afọ 2020 gasịrị, Blaise malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Safe HQuse iji kwado ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na ndị lanarịrị
Blaise adighibabụọ, ma ọ na-eji nnochiaha ha / ha
Ka ọ na-erule Ọktọba , ha na-aga Alex Ekwueme Federal University Ndufu Alike Ikwo na Naịjirịa, na-agụ gbasara Bachelor of Arts na English na Literary Studies

Blaise bịara n' ekewapụ okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ banyere mmekọahụ ha na soshal midia mgbe otu onye ụkọchukwu kuru ha ọkpọ ma kpagbuo ha maka ịbụ nwoke n'edina nwoke n'afọ 2019, ndị ọzọ nọ na chọọchị ahụ etinyeghị aka
Blaise bụ onye ndu ndị ntorobịa Women Deliver N'afọ 2020; ha dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ n'oge ahụ
Nakwa n'afọ 2020, ha bụ ndị mmeri nke The Future Awards Africa 'Prize for Leading Conversations', na The Initiative for Equal Rights' award for 'SOGIESC Rights Activist of the Year'

N'ọnwa June n'afọ 2021, e gosipụtara ha na obere ihe nkiri nke Dafe Oboro nke so na akụkọ mkpuchi oge okpomọkụ 2021 nke Dazed N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2021, e nyere ha 'Generation Change Award' na 2021 MTV Europe Music Awards na Budapest
Matthew Hindley (amụrụ n'afọ 1974, Cape Town, South Afrịka) bụ onye South Afrịka na-ese ihe
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Michaelis School of Fine Art, Cape Town n'afọ 2002, ebe e nyere ya Michaelis Prize
Dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto a ma ama na mba ahụ, ihe osise Hindley siri ike, uri na nke na nke na-enyocha ihe ngosi dị iche iche dị egwu na nke South Afrịka

Ihe ngosi nke naanị ya na nso nso a gụnyere An Everlasting Once na Brundyn + Gonsalves, Cape Town (2011) na Twilight of the Idols na Biksady, Budapest (2013) Ihe ngosi Hindley nke eserese na David Krut Cape Town dabara na mmalite nke akwụkwọ ahụ, The Five Magic Pebbles & akụkọ ndị ọzọ
E mere ngosi eserese ya a ma ama bụ Mbilite n'Ọnwụ (Der Brennende Wald) na Everard Read Cape Town gallery, n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015
Na mgbakwunye, o gosipụtara na Eli na Edythe Broad Museum, Michigan (2012) na Kochi Muziris Biennale, India (2012)
N'afọ 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'usoro eserese sitere na akụkọ ifo nke Afrịka nke onye odee South Afrịka bụ Don Mattera, maka akwụkwọ nke Rhodeworks bipụtara, na Berlin, Germany

N'afọ 2015, ihe osise ya bụ akụkụ nke imago mundi, Benetton Collection na Venice Biennale, na nnukwu ihe ọkpụkpụ ọhaneze ya Speak Naturally and Continuously arụnyere n'elu ọnụ ụzọ nke South African National Gallery na Cape Town, South Afrịka
E wughachiri ihe osise a na ngwụsị afọ 2018 / mmalite afọ 2019 ma meghee ya na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Mee 2019

Mattmax (amụrụ Matthew Abiodun Aina ) bụ onye nduzi vidio egwu Naịjirịa, onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye nduzi azụmahịa, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Mattmax bụ onye isi na onye nwe Mattmax Productions
O deela ma duzie vidiyo egwu maka ọtụtụ ndị na-ati egwu n'ọtụtụ ụdị nke gụnyere Timaya, Terry G, Olamide, Burna Boy, J
Martins, Dj Xclusive, Dj Spinall, Omawumi, na Waje
A mụrụ ya nye nne na nna Ndị Kraịst ma kpọọ ya Matthew Abiodun Aina, Mattmax gụrụ na Sayensị Kọmputa na Yaba College of Technology, Lagos
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ mụrụ mmetụta anya na ịntanetị

Dị ka o si kwuo, 'Ihe niile m maara taa bụ nkuzi m kuziri onwe m, ịsụ ngọngọ na ịntanetị ebe a na ebe ahụ' Mattmax lụrụ Eniola Adeola Aina nke Dartistebyawele ma na-aga Cathedral Church Of Christ, Lagos
Mgbe otu afọ nke ọmụmụ onwe onye siri ike, onye na-eti egwu bụ Slim Joe bịakwutere Mattmax iji duzie vidiyo egwu maka egwu ya, 'O ti yanyan'
Vidio ahụ karịrị atụmanya Slim Joe wee bụrụ ihe a ma ama
Mgbe ọ hụrụ ọrụ ya na TV, Mattmax kpebiri na ọ gaghị akwụsị
Ka ọtụtụ afọ gachara, ọ sere Olamide 'Voice of the street' na D Banj 'Don't tell me nonsense', na-etinye ya n'ebe a ma ama
Vidio ya enwetala ọtụtụ nhọpụta na onyinye, nke gụnyere nhọpụta asaa na Nigerian Music and Video Awards

Mattmax na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nye ndị na-agu egwu n'ụdị dị iche iche, dị ka Burna Boy na Timaya E depụtara Mattmax dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi vidio egwu iri kachasị elu na Naijiria site na blọọgụ Naijaloaded
Matarasị smart bụ matarasị nke nwere nzube ná ndụ gị ihe mmetụta iji nyochaa usoro ụra
Ngwaahịa nwere ike iwere ụdị ihe mkpuchi matarasị, ihe mkpuchi materase, ma ọ bụ matarasị dum
Mattrise ikuku bụ mattrise ikuku ma ọ bụ ebe ihi ụra

N'ihi ịdị elu yá na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ndị kasị dị umeala, a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe dị ka ihe eji egwuri egwu mmiri ma ọ bụ ngwaọrụ flotation, na mba ụfọdụ, gụnyere UK na South Africa, a na'akpọ lilo ('Li-lo' bụ akara ahịa a kapịrị ọnụ - nke sitere na ahịrịokwu 'na-ala ala') ma ọ bụ Readybed
Mattress ikuku, nke a makwaara dị ka lgwe ikuku ma ọ bụ àkwà ikuku, bụ mattress na-afụli elu nke e ji polyvinyl chloride (PVC) ma ọ bụ plastik urethane ma ọ bụ rọba mee
Enwere ike ịbelata ọnụ nke ndị Kraịst Oge mbụ Nile dị ka ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge ochie nakwa ijikọta matarasị ahụ ma buru ya ma ọ bụ chekwaa ya n'ụdị dị obere
A na-eme ka ha na-afụli elu site na ịfụ n'ime valvụ, ma ọ bụ site na ntuziaka ma ọ bụ mgbapụta eletrik
Ụfọdụ na-afụli elu na-akpaghị aka mgbe a na-emeghe valvụ, ruo nrụgide ụfọdụ na inflation ọzọ aka ma ọ bụ site na mgbapụta

matarasị ikuku eme ihe maka ogige ntụrụndụ, iji ụlọ eme ihe nwa oge ma ọ bụ oge zuru oke, a pụkwara imeziwanye ya iji jikọta ndị mere n'oge ochie nakwa ike ịbelata ọtụtụ ojiji (dịka, ogige ntụgharị na ojiji ndị ọbịa) ebe ndị ọzọ bụ otu nzube
Mattresses ikuku nwere ike ịnwe ọdịdị a haziri nke ahazi, dị ka ịkpụ ndị mmadụ n'ihe banyere ụkpụrụ ndị ziri ezi ntụziaka oriri ụkwụ maka iji ya mee ihe na mpaghara ibu nke ụgbọala pickup ma ọ bụ SUV

Ogwe ụra dị arọ, nke dị obere ma dị arọ ma bụrụ nke dị arọ maka ime ụlọikwuu na ime njem azụ, ma nwee ike ịnwe ihe mkpuchi na nchekwa onwe lekwasịrị ụmụ ndị ikom abụọ ahụ n'ebe ụfụfụ n'okpuru ụlọ ikuku
Ụlọ ikuku dị elu na-eji rọba vulcanized, kpuchie ya na ákwà ma ọ bụ polyurethane na mkpokoro ákwà ọ bụ akọrọ (ing)
Àkwà ikuku na-adịgide adịgide ga-adị ka àkwà site n'ime nkịtị ma e wezụga inwe hose (otu ụlọ ikuku) ma ọ bụ hoses (ọnụ ụlọ ikuku abụọ) na-apụta n'isi àkwà

A ga-ejikọta eriri ndị a na ngwaọrụ ikuku, nke nwere mmasị nwanyị Mmekọahụ ike ọzụzụ ihe mepụtara site na iji bịa na ímé ihe ọ bụla n'ime anyị si egosi ịhụnanya n'ebe nile na ímé ihe ọ na ímé ihe ọ ga abụ ọma valvụ abụọ, nke ga-enwe njikwa (s) dịpụrụ adịpụ ka onye ọ bụla wee nwee ike idozi nkwụsi ike nke akụkụ ya na mkpa nke ya
Enwere ike idozi nkwụsi ike ahụ n'elu ma ọ bụ n'ala, site na ịpị bọtịnụ dị mfe, na remote (s)

Otu ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa gọọmentị USA adọla aka ná ntị megide ikwe ka ụmụ ọhụrụ na-ehi ụra na matarasị ikuku, n'ihi na ha nwere ike ịdị nro ma na-eme ka ụmụaka dị obere (karịsịa ndị na-erubeghị ọnwa 8) ghara iku ume n'ime oghere ma ọ bụ mgbe ha nọ n'etiti matarasị na ala àkwà

Tụkwasị na nke a, e nweela ọtụtụ nnyocha gọọmentị na iwu ndị e mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'ihi ọdịdị na-egbu egbu nke phthalate plasticizers dị n'ime ọtụtụ akwa ikuku PVC vinyl na ngwaahịa vinyl ndị ọzọ dị nro
European Union emeela mgbalị yiri nke ahụ iji gbochie ojiji nke ihe vinyl na ihe egwuregwu na ihe ndina

Mattresses ikuku buru ibu, nke dị mgbagwoju anya (nke a maara dị ka 'ihe ndina ikuku' n'ebe ndị na-asụ Bekee na Britain) abịala n'ahịa n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya nke e bu n'obi maka iji ndị ọbịa ma ọ bụ dị ka àkwà na-adịgide adịgide n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra

Ogologo àkwà maka àkwà ikuku nwa oge sitere na ejima ruo n'ogo eze, mana ndị na-emepụta àkwà ndị ọbịa ole na ole na-enye ọnụ ọgụgụ eze ka a na-ere ọtụtụ àkwà ifufe ndị ọbịa na mpụga United States ebe matarasị ndị eze abụghị ọkọlọtọ
Ọtụtụ ebe ikuku na-adịgide adịgide na-eji akwa na ihe ndina dị mfe ịchọta
California King (ma ọ bụ Western King) ákwà na ihe ndina nwere ike isi ike ịchọta ebe ọ bụ na e bu ụzọ chepụta nha a maka ụlọ ọrụ mmiri
A na-ebuli ndị ọbịa e welitere elu ma ọ bụ àkwà nwa oge n'ala iji mee ka ndị ọrụ ghara ịnọ n'ala ma nye ahụmịhe matarasị ọdịnala
Ọ bụ ezie na àkwà ikuku 'ebuli elu' dị n'ala, emeghị ha maka iji ha mee ihe n'oge niile, ebe ala nke àkwà ahụ bụ ụlọ ikuku ọ bụghị ntọala siri ike
Mattresses ikuku nwekwara ike imeziwanye ndụ (ma nwee ike inye ụfọdụ enyemaka) maka ndị na-arịa azụ mgbu
Inwe ikike idozi nkwụsi ike nke matarasị iji nweta ọdịdị ahụ dị iche iche, nha, na ịdị arọ, nwere ike ịbụ ihe na usoro ọgwụgwọ
A na-eji matarasị ikuku eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ iji chebe ndị nọ n'àkwà pụọ na ọnyá nrụgide, nke nwere ike ịkpata ọnyá na-eyi ndụ egwu

Tụkwasị na nke a, matarasị ikuku arụpụtara na-enweghị ihe ndị nwere ike ịhapụ VOCs ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ na-egbu egbu site na usoro nrụpụta (nke nwere ike ime ka nsogbu ahụ na ụmụaka ma ọ bụ ndị ọzọ na'ahụ anya) dị
Okwu ikuku mattress nwekwara ike izo aka na ọdọ mmiri mmiri ma ọ bụ ihe eji egwuri egwu n'ụsọ osimiri, nke nwere akpa ikuku na ọtụtụ (na-abụkarị anọ ma ọ bụ ise) tubes na-agba ọsọ
A na-akpọkwa ya 'lilo' (UK, AUS, NZ, SA), 'ụgbọ mmiri ikuku', 'ụgbọelu ikuku', 'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ', ma ọ bụ 'ụgbọ (ing) mat (ike) ', a na-eji ya ala n'elu mmiri
E debara aha Li-Lo maka ngwaahịa ihe rubberised na UK na 19 Apr 1944 na USA na 25 Sep 1947 site na P
Cow na Co Ltd
A na-akpọsa matarasị ikuku na-afụli elu maka ntụrụndụ dị ka otu n'ime ngwaahịa Li-Lo na British Industries Fair na London 1949
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-eyi ihe ndina ikuku, a naghị ewu ya nke ọma ma ọ nwere ike ọ gaghị adịgide na-afụli elu n'abalị niile, na-eme ka ọ ghara ịdị irè maka iji ya dị ka àkwà
'Ụra ikuku' a na-agbanwe agbanwe na-adịgide adịgide ghọrọ ihe a ma ama karịsịa mgbe onye isi ahịa Select Comfort malitere nnukwu mkpọsa ahịa n'ihe dị ka afọ 2001
Comfortaire rụrụ ebe ikuku mbụ ahụ na 1981, nke Select Comfort mechara zụta, na Jenụwarị 2013 maka $ 155m
Select Comfort mara ọkwa na Machị 30, 2017, na ha na-akwụsị ahịa mkpọsa nke atọ, nke Comfortaire Line nke ngwaahịa, na-emechi Comfortaire Brand
Ndị nrụpụta ndị ọzọ gụnyere Boyd Specialty, InnoMax, na American National
Ebe ikuku dị ọnụ ala nke a na-eji eme ogige ma ọ bụ ndị ọbịa gụnyere Aerobed, nke ụlọ ọrụ Jarden The Coleman Company rere
Matuumbi, nke a makwaara dị ka Kimatuumbi na Kimatumbi, bụ asụsụ a na-asụ na obodo Tanzania na mpaghara Kipatimu nke Kilwa District, n'ebe ndịda nke osimiri Rufiji
Ọ bụ asụsụ Bantu, P13 na nhazi Guthrie
Kimatuumbi nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ nke ndi Ngindo, Rufiji na Ndengereko
Ihe dị ka mmadụ 70,000 na-asụ ya, dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo
Matuumbi bụ mmụba nke okwu Kimatuumbi maka 'ugwu' (ụdị otu kituumbi, klas 7/8)

Maud Frances Eyston Sumner (1902 rụọ 1985) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ Sumner na Johannesburg, Transvaal Colony
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Roedean na Johannesburg, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Oxford site na 1922 ruo 1925 wee mụọ ihe osise na Westminster School of Art
N'ịbụ onye na-adọrọ mmasị na nka French, ọ kwagara Paris na 1926, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ afọ anọ na Academie de la Grande Chaumière

Ọ bụ akụkụ nke nka nka a na-akpọ Ateliers d'Art Sacré ma hụ ụdị ihe osise ọhụrụ nke ndị nna ukwu George Desvallieres na ónyé guzobere ya Maurice Denis na-akụzi n'anya, ebe ihe nkiri kwa ụbọchị jupụtara na okpukpe
Ọ bụ ónyé na-emepụta ihe màkà ónyé na-arụpụta ugegbe Goddard & Gibbs
Ọ bụ ezie na e kewapụrụ ya na ụwa nka South Africa, Walter Battiss kpọrọ Sumner ka ọ gosipụta ya na New Group na 1938

E nyéré ya Medal of Honour site na Suid-Afrikaanse Akademie vir Wetenskap en Kuns na Nọvemba 1971, ya na ihe ngosi 'semi-retrospective' nke na-aga nke ọma na South African Association of Art Gallery na Pretoria
N'oge ọ nọ na Paris n'afọ 1978, a chọpụtara na Sumner nwèrè ọrịa GuillainãoBarré
Ọ nwụrụ na mbido Jenụwarị 1985 n'ụlọ ya na Melrose, Johannesburg
Àtụ Infobox football biography Maureen Eke onye amụrụ na abalị iri na itoolu n’ime onwa iri na abuo n'afọ 1986
Ọ bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa n’agba bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke òtù Mba ụwa dị ka onye ọnọ n'etiti (midfielder)
O so na otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa
O so n'òtù egwuregwua na 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup
Na ogo klọb ọ na-agbara Delta Queens FC nọ na Delta State, Nigeria
Maureen Koech (a mụrụ na 21 Mee 1989) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ pụtara na KTN's Lies that Bind
A mụrụ Maureen Koech na Mee 21, 1989
A zụlitere ya na Nairobi, ọ gara Nakuru High School
O mechara sonye na Mahadum Strathmore n'agbata afọ 2009 na 2013, ebe ọ debanyere aha na Business Information and Technology (BBIT) ma mesịa banye n'ime ihe nkiri
Koech malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na-eme ihe nkiri na Alliance Française
E wezụga igosi na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, ọ pụtara na Lies that Bind, usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Kenya nke meriri ihe nrite maka usoro TV kachasị mma n'afọ 2012 Kalasha film and television awards
Na Mahadum Strathmore, ọ sonyeere Drama School (DRAMSCO), ebe o sonyere na ihe nkiri
O mere nke mbụ ya na usoro telivishọn nke campus Changing Times azụ n'afọ 2010, ebe ọ na-egwu Shiks
Ya na Ian Mugoya, Nice Githinji, Kevin Ndege na ndị ọzọ na-arụkọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2011, ọ gara nyocha na Kenya National Theatre ma a họrọ ya dịka otu n'ime ndị isi na-eme ihe nkiri soap opera Lies that Bind
O mere Patricia, nwa agbọghọ na-eto eto nke na-achọgharị onwe ya
Omume ya na ihe ngosi ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Award n'afọ 2013
N'afọ 2014, o gosipụtara na obere ihe nkiri, Sticking Ribbons
E wezụga ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ banyekwara na ụlọ ọrụ egwu
O dekọrọ ihe ngosi mbụ ya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, wee kwụsịtụ egwu iji chọpụta onwe ya dịka onye egwu
Ọ na-eme pop obodo ma nwee otu egwu n'okpuru aha ya bụ Mokko
Ọ na-akpọ ụbọ
O wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, 'No Letting', n'afọ 2014

Meisi Maureen Malumise (amụrụ ya na 7 Mee nke afo 1934), nke a makwaara dịla Maureen Madumise, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo South Afrika lara ezumike nká nke nọchitere anya African National Congress (ANC) na National Assembly site na afo 1994 ruo 2009
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke mbụ na afo 1994 ma merie nhọpụta ọzọ na 1999 na 2004
Malumise jere ozi na mpaghara Free Steeti
N'oge nke atọ ya na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ANC na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ahụike
Maureen Nkeiruka Mmadu (amụrụ 7 Mee afọ 1975) Ọ bụ nwaafọ Naijiria bụ onye nchikwa na bọọlụ ma ọ bu bu midFielder
Dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ ọ na-anọchi anya Avaldsnes IL n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, otu Ngalaba nke mbụ dabere na ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ nke Norway
Ọ gbaraa ọtụtụ ndị otu bọọlụ na Toppserien nke Norway ya na Linköpings FC na QBIK na Swedish Damallsvenskan
O gwuburu ndi Klepp IL egwuregwu na Norwegian Toppserien
Mmadu gbara Kolbotn na Oslo, Norway maka oge 2010, wee nyere ha aka i nọ n'ọkwa nke atọ na otu egwuregwu Toppserien
Enwere ike ịhụ ya ka ọ na-egwuru Avaldsnes IL na asọmpi nke Oslo na 5 Febụwari afọ 2012

Ọ bụ onye otu na-ahụ maka Naịjirịa ma mee ihe karịrị otu narị egwuregwu maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa, gụnyere ịpụta ugboro anọ na FIFA World Cups wee sọọ mpi na 2000 na 2004 Summer Olympics
OMaureen Modiselle bụ onye isi ala nke North West Province, South Africa site na afọ 2009 ruo mgbe e wepụrụ ya n'oge na afọ 2010
A mụrụ ya na Vryheid, na 7 Febụwarị na afọ 1941
Modiselle laghachiri Mafikeng na 1990, mgbe ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na North America na Canada
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Kọmishọna Ukwu nke South Africa na Republic of Trinidad na Tobago
Maureen Solomon // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na 23 Disemba 1983) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri Naijirịa 80 n'oge ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijirịa

A mụrụ Solomon na steetị Abia, Naijirịa n'obodo Isuochi ebe ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị ma nweta asambodo mbụ ya na asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị okenye West African site na ụlọ akwụkwọ praemrị na nke sekọrịta abụọ nke Isuochi na steeti abia
Solomon kpughere n'ajụjụ ọnụ na ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ma na-atụ anya mgbe niile ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Solomon mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na azụmahịa ihe nkiri Naijirịa
na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Alternative nke Lancelot Oduwa Imasuen duziri

Solomon kọwara ihe nkiri mbụ ya nke bụ maka ihe nkiri Alternative dị ka njehie n'akụkụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijirịa bụ Lancelot Oduwa Imasuen onye weere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ege ntị edebanyere aha ma nye ya edemede iji buru ya n'isi ma mesịa rụọ / mee
Solomon kpughere na n'ezie ọ nọ n'ebe a na-ege ntị n'oge ahụ
Solomon natara oku n'ụbọchị na-esote ma kenye ya ọrụ nke a kwụrụ ya maka ($ 20, kwa mgbanwe ego nke afọ 2001) Solomon hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijirịa na 2011
Solomon lụrụ Maazị Okereke na 2005, onye dọkịta ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Maurencia Natalie Gillion bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchianya na-adịgide adịgide na National Council of Provinces, ụlọ elu nke South African Parliament
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị nnọchi anya mpaghara Western Cape, na-anọchiteanya African National Congress (ANC)
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nhọrọ nke ndị omeiwu na Ahụike na Ọrụ Ọha
Gillion jere ozi dị ka onye otu Western Cape Provincial Parliament site na afo 2014 ruo na afọ 2019
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo nke Overberg District Municipality n'etiti afọ 2006 na afọ 2010
Gillion jere ozi dị ka onye otu Western Cape Provincial Parliament site na afo 2014 ruo afọ 2019
N'ime ANC, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke pati ahụ site na afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2015 nakwa dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba mpaghara nke pati site na afo 2015 ruo afọ 2019
Na 23 Mee 2019, a ṅụrụ Gillion iyi dị ka onye nnọchi anya na-adịgide adịgide na National Council of Provinces
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya isii na-adịgide adịgide si Western Cape
Na 24 June, ọ natara ọrụ kọmitii ya
A họpụtara Gillion ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nhọrọ na Ahụike na Ọrụ Ọha na 26 June

Maurice Herbert Mugisha, bụ onye nta akụkọ obodo Ugandan, onye mgbasa ozi na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi gọọmentị, Uganda Broadcasting Corporation (UBC), malite n'ọnwa Ọktoba na afọ 2018
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Business Administration, nke Makerere University Business School (MUBS) nyere, na Nakawa Division nke Kampala, isi obodo Uganda, n'afọ 2003
Malite dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ na afọ 2006, ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa 'Onye isi nke mmepụta akụkọ', n'oge ọ hapụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018
Mgbe ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Uganda were ya n'ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi nchịkwa

Mugisha lụrụ onye ama ama, Irene Birungi onye bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ugandan, onye mgbasa ozi na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ onwe onye maka nchịkwa n'ọfịs onye isi ala nke Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, malite na Septemba afọ 2017
Ha bụ nne na nna nke otu nwa nwoke (site na mmekọrịta gara aga n'akụkụ Birungi), na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ha nwere
Maurice Mugisha bụ onye nchoputa, ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi na All Round Consult, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na mpaghara Bukoto nke Kampala, isi obodo Uganda
Maurice Poli (2 Disemba 1933 - 26 Eprel 2020) bụ onye France na-eme ihe nkiri, na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmepụta ndị Ịtali
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri olenaole sonyere n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụdị niile mepụtara na Ịtali n'ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ
A mụrụ ya na Bizerte, Tunisia, Poli mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 1961, na obere ọrụ na Mauro Bolognini's The Lovemakers
O mechara gbanwee ọrụ ndị isi na ọrụ nkwado, a na-emekarị ya dịka nwoke siri ike ma ọ bụ onye ọjọọ
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na TV, na-arụ ọrụ nkwado na Belle na Sebastian na ọrụ ndu na usoro ndị nledo dị mkpirikpi Frédéric le Gardian
N'ịgbaso ejiji nke oge ahụ maka aha egwu America, na ọkara nke abụọ nke afọ 1960, a kpọrọ ya Monty Greenwood na ọtụtụ Spaghetti Westerns
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ gara biri na Rom, Ịtali ma tinye onwe ya n'ihe omume ntụrụndụ ya nke ndụ ya niile nke geology na archaeology
Mauritania bu otu obodo no na Afrịka

Mauritel bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi bụ isi na Mauritania guzobere na 1999 na Nouakchott
Àtụ Etisalat
N'afọ 1820, na nzaghachi nye arịrịọ sitere n'aka ndị Britain na-achị Mauritius, gọọmenti eze ukwu dị na London mepụtara ego mkpụrụ ọlaọcha na ụdị 1⁄4, 1⁄8, na 1⁄16 dollar
Otu dollar a na-ekwu okwu ya bụ otu dollar Spanish na ego mkpụrụ ndị a bụ ndị a maara dị ka 'Anchor Dollars' n'ihi arịlịka ahụ pụtara na ha
E mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime dollar ndị a n'afọ 1822, ọ bụghị naanị maka Mauritius kamakwa maka British West Indies
Na mgbakwunye na nke a, e mepụtara ego mkpụrụ 1⁄2 dollar maka Mauritius
Ka otu afọ ma ọ bu abụọ gasịrị, e mepụtara akụkụ nke dollar ọla kọpa maka Mauritius, British West Indies, na Sierra Leone
Dollar bụ ego Mauritius ruo n'afọ 1877
Na mbido, ọ bụ dollar Spanish, na ego akwụkwọ na mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ na-ewepụta na 1820s (lee mkpụrụ ego Anchor)
Na mbụ, a na-etinye dollar ahụ na ọnụ ahịa nke 2 Indian rupees, mgbe ahụ na 4 shillings sterling
N'afọ 1822, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego maka 25 na 50 sous n'ihi na a nọgidere na-eji livre nke ndị France na-achị
Dollar ahụ na-agagharị n'akụkụ sterling na rupee ndị India
E jiri ọnụego mgbanwe na-abụghị nke gọọmentị kwadoro nke pụtara ka rupee 2 bụrụ otu d
na dwere eme r mee ihe, ọ bụ ezie na nke a mere ka rupee ahụ dị oke ọnụ ruo oge ụfọdụ
N'afọ 1877, e webatara rupee Mauritian
Ọ nọchiri dollar na ọnụego nke 2 rupees = 1 dollar

Maurren Higa Maggi (amụrụ na ọnwa June 25, na afọ 1976, na São Carlos) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu n'egwuregwu na Brazil na onye nwetara ọla edo nke Olympic
Ọ bụ onye South America na-edekọ ihe ndekọ na 100 mita ihe mgbochi na ogologo ịwụli elu, na 1271 sekọnd na 726 mita n'otu n'otu
O nwekwara ihe kachasị mma nke mita 1453 na ịwụli elu atọ bụbu ihe ndekọ South America
Ọ bụ nwanyị Brazil mbụ meriri nrite ọla edo nke Olympic na egwuregwu otu
N'afọ 2003, Maurren banyere n'ihe ihere ịzụ ori mgbe achọtara clostebol na sample ya
O kwuru na mpempe akwụkwọ gel na-egbochi mmerụ ahụ nke o ji mee ihe nwere anabolic steroid n'ime ihe mejupụtara ya
A kwụsịtụrụ Maurren ruo afọ abụọ, na-egbochi ya isonye na 2003 Pan American Games
Ọ hapụrụ ịga egwuregwu Olympic n'ihi ime ọ di
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 2009 Troféu Brasil Caixa de Atletismo na Keila Costa, na-efunahụ ihe omume ahụ na nke mbụ kemgbe 1998
Maurren lụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ Antônio Pizzonia, onye ya na ya nwere nwa nwanyị, Sophia
Mauerick Frankera Ahanmisi (amụrụ na Julaị 17, 1991) amụrụ n'Amerịka bụ onye Filipino-Naijiria bụrụ ọkachamara basketball player maka Converge FiberXers nke Philippine Basketball Association (PBA)
Ahanmisi nọrọ otu afọ na Stoneridge Prep na Simi Valley, California, mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Golden Valley High School na Santa Clarita, California na 2009
Dị ka onye okenye, ọ na-enweta akara 202 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla ma mechaa ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ebute akara na onye na-agba égbè atọ na GVHS
Ọ gbara bọọlụ AAU na Branch West Basketball Academy n'okpuru nkuzi nke Bob Gottlieb
N'afọ 2010, ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ozi nke ebumnuche igwu egwu maka Mahadum Minnesota
Ahanmisi gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Mahadum Minnesota, ụlọ akwụkwọ NCAA Division I, site na 2010-2014, nke ka ukwuu n'ọrụ nchekwa
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama na-eme ihe na bench ma na-eduga otu nke abụọ nke otu ahụ
O nyeere Golden Gophers aka imeri n'asọmpi National Invitational Tournament n'afọ 2014
Richard Pitino, nwa onye nkuzi Rick Pitino nke Louisville, na-azụ Gophers
N'afọ 2014, Ahanmisi kpebiri ịhapụ United States mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji ma soro ya rụọ ọrụ basketball na Philippines, site n'ịgba egwu maka Cafe France Bakers na PBA Developmental League
Na ọrụ mbụ ya na Philippines, o mere ka ọnụnọ ya dị ozugbo, na-enweta akara iri na iri na asatọ na nkeji iri na ise nke mbụ nke mere ka Cafe France nwee mmeri
Na 2015 PBA D-League Foundation Cup eliminations, ọ duziri ndị otu ahụ n'ịgba goolu, na-enweta akara 139 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla, ebe ọ na-enyekwa 68 rebounds na 40 assists kwa ọpụpụ
O nyere aka iduzi Café France na asọmpi PBA-D-League nke mbụ ya site n'ịchịkwa Foundation Cup
Dabere na ndepụta nke PBA wepụtara na Ọgọọst 10, 2015, Ahanmisi bụ otu n'ime ndị Fil-Foreigners iri na isii tinyere akwụkwọ maka akwụkwọ PBA nke afọ 2015
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nke atọ n'ozuzu site na Rain ma ọ bụ Shine Elasto Painters na 2015 PBA draft
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ kachasị elu na Elasto Painters

N'egwuregwu mbụ ya dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ megide Mahindra n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, ọ gbara akara iri na otu n'ime akara iri na anọ ya naanị na nkeji nke anọ, mgbe ọ na-eduga Elasto Painters na mmalite nke abụọ na 2015 All-Filipino Cup
N'oge nnọkọ All-Filipino, ọ nwetara akara 83, 4 rebounds, na 23 nyere aka n'egwuregwu, mgbe ọ na-ejupụta n'efu nke Paul Lee merụrụ ahụ maka ọtụtụ n'ime asọmpi ahụ
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọọst n'afọ 2019, e rere Ahanmisi na Alaska Aces maka Chris Exciminiano na 2019 nke mbụ
Na Jụn 6, 2022, Ahanmisi bịanyere aka na Converge FiberXers, otu ọhụrụ nke weghaara ikike Alaska Aces
Ahanmisi si n'ezinụlọ nwere agbụrụ dị iche iche
Nna ya, Victor Ahanmisi bụ onye Naijiria, ebe nne ya Marissa (née Frankera) bụ onye Filipino, onye si Alcala, Pangasinan
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ, Jerrick na Mylenne
Jerrick na-egwuri egwu ugbu a maka Magnolia Hotshots na PBA
Mavhungu Maureen Lerule-Ramakhanya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu African National Congress, Lerule-Ramakhanya bụ onye bụbu onye isi obodo nke Vhembe District Municipality
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Limpopo Provincial na Mee, na afọ 2019
A họpụtara ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu
Na Maachị, na afọ 2020, a họpụtara Lerule-Ramakhanya dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka Transport na Community Safety
A kpọgara ya n'ọkwa agụmakwụkwọ nke kansụl ndị isi na June 2022
Lerule-Ramakhanya bụ onye otu African National Congress ogologo oge
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo nke Makhado Local Municipality na 1 Disemba, na afọ 2008, na-anọchi Glory Mashaba
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012, kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara ANC kpebiri iwepụ ndị isi obodo atọ
Ndị otu ahụ chere na nnyefe ọrụ na-adịghị mma bụ n'azụ mkpebi ya
Lerule-Ramakhanya bụ otu n'ime mmadụ atọ ahụ ma ọ kwụsịrị dịka onye isi obodo na 22 Eprel
A họpụtara Farisani Mutavhatsindi dị ka onye nọchiri ya
Na 14 Disemba, na afọ 2018, a họpụtara Lerule-Ramakhanya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo nke Vhembe District Municipality
Ọ nọchiri Florence Radzilani, onye gbara arụkwaghịm mgbe ọ sonyere na esemokwu VBS Mutual Bank
Onye ọka ikpe ụlọ ikpe dị elu Frans Kgomo ṅụrụ iyi n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Maka ntuli aka mpaghara nke e mere na 8 Mee, na afọ 2019, Lerule-Ramakhanya nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na atọ na ndepụta mpaghara nke pati ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Limpopo Provincial dị ka ANC meriri oche 38
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka MPL na 22 Mee, na afọ 2019
ANC họọrọ ya dị ka onye ha na-azọ ọkwa onye ọkà okwu, a họpụtakwara ya

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Maachị, na afọ 2020, onye isi ala Stanley Mathabatha họpụtara Lerule-Ramakhanya dị ka onye otu ndị isi na-ahụ maka Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Njem na Nchebe Obodo, na-anọchi Dickson Masemola
Mgbanwe ndị ahụ malitere n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Rosemary Molapo nọchiri ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu

N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Juun, na afọ 2022, Mathabatha mere mgbanwe nke ndị isi ya, ebe ọ kwagara Lerule-Ramakhanya na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ ma họpụta onye MEC agụmakwụkwọ na-apụ apụ Polly Boshielo dị ka MEC ọhụrụ maka Transport na Community Safety
Lerule-Ramakhanya lụrụ Happy Ramakhanya na Julai, na afọ 2011

Àtụ Infobox record labelMavin Records (amakwaara dịka Supreme Mavin Dynasty) bụ akara ndekọ onye mmepụta ndekọ na ihe nkiri bụ Don Jazzy tọrọ ntọala akara ndekọ a n'ụbọchi asato n'ọnwa May, afọ 2012 Mbido akara a bịara na mmezu mgbe emechiri Mo 'Hits Records, akara ndekọ nke onye mmepụta akpọburu aha ya na D'banj nwekọtara Akara a bụ ụlọ maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Korede Bello, Dr SID, D'Prince, Di'Ja, Johnny Drille, Ladipoe, DNA Twins, Rema, Ayra Starr, 6xSlatt na Crayon

Ndị mmepụta ihe nkiri dịka Don Jazzy n'onwe ya, Altims na Baby Fresh n'ọkwa n'okpuru akara a Na afọ 2014, DJ Big N bụrụ onye n'etiri akara egwu Tiwa Savage, Wande Coal, Reekado Banks na Iyanya bụcha ndị adị na mbu binye aha ha na akara ahụ N'abali asatọ n'ọnwa May, afọ 2012, akara ahụ wepụtara album mkpokọta Solar Plexus N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2019, Mavin Records nwetara ntinye ego nke nde kwuru nde site na Kupanda Holdings, enyemaka nke Kupanda Capital na TPG Growth
Mavin Records malitere n'ihi ọpụpụ D'banj na Mo'Hits

Tupu anyi e kwuo okwu maka ọpụpụ D'banj na Mo'Hits, e nwere ebubo na D'banj bịnyere aka na Mo'Hits nọ na nchekwa Don Jazzy N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke Sunday Punch, Don Jazzy kwuru òkwu banyere ọpụpụ D'banj na Mo Hits, na-asị, 'Anyị na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, ihe niile nọ na-agakwa nke ọma
O nwere ebe o rúru m lee ọnọdụ ahụ anya mgbe ahụ ka anyị abụọ kpebiri na ọ naghị arụkwa ọrụ nke ọma mgbe ahu ka onye ọbụla gara nke ya'

Don Jazzy kwuru na Igbanwe aha hịara ya ahụ Dịka BellaNaija si kwuo, Aha a bụ 'Mavin' na-akọwa onye nwere onyinye nwekwa nka na aka ọrụ ọ bụla Mgbe o guzobere aha ndekọ aha ya, Don Jazzy kwuru na ọ na-ahụ Mavin Records ịbụ ụlọ ike nke egwu n'Africa n'oge na-adịghị anya Mgbe ahazigharịrị Mo 'Hits ka ọ bụrụ Mavin, Don Jazzy bịnyere aka na onye na-agụ egwú Naijiria bụ Tiwa Savage
Ụlọ ọrụ Pulse nke Naijiria kwuru na Jazzy nwere mmasị na ụkpụrụ ọrụ na ọnyịnya ya
Ụlọ ọrụ Pulse nke Naijiria kwukwara na Mavin Records binyere aka na ndị nrụpụta Aluko 'Altims' Timothy na Sunday 'BabyFresh' Enejere

N'ụbọchi asaa n'ọnwa May, afọ 2012, akara ndekọ ahụ malitere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ gọọmentị ya na Mavin league, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ịkparịta ụka nke e mere iji kwado ndị hụrụ ha na-anya ma n'eso ha n'ụwa niile Don Jazzy bịnyere aka na nkwado ụlọ ọrụ Samsung na Loya Milk mgbe ha guzobere akara ahụ; Tiwa Savage bịnyerekwara aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado nke Pepsi

N’ime otu afọ ị emegharịrị akara a, akara ndekọ a wepụtara 'Take banana” na “Oma Ga” dịka otu egwu ndi si na mpịakọta nke albọm mbụ ha akpọrọ Solar Plexus N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2014, Don Jazzy bịnyere Di'Ja, Reekado Banks na Korede Bello aka na Mavin Records izu atọ dị iche iche dịkọrọ ọnụ N'ụbọchị nke mbụ n'ọnwa Mee, afọ 2014, Mavin Records weputara otu egwu a na-akpọ ' Dorobucci ' iji too ya N'ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'`ọnwa Febụwarị, afọ 2015, Don Jazzy, Tiwa Savage na kongacombịnyere aka na nkwekọrịta N’ụbọchi iri ato n'ọnwa Ọktoba, afọ 2016, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na Naijiria kwuru na Iyanya e bịnyela aka na akara ndekọ Mavin Records

Iyanya na Don Jazzy kwadoro akụkọ a na Instagram N'ụbọcghị iri na asatọ n'`ọnwa Febụwari, afọ 2017, Don Jazzy kwupụtara maka mbinye aka nke Johnny Drille, Ladipoe na DNA na akara ndekọ Mavin Records Na-ọnwa Machị 2019, ọ kwupụtakwara mbinye aka nke Rema na-akara ndekọ Mavin N'ụbọchị iri atọ n'`ọnwa Mee, Mavin kpughere na ha na Crayon ebinyela aka na akara ndekọ Mavin N’echi ya, akara ndekọ a wepụtara otu egwu agụkọrọ ọnụ “All is in Order” N'`ụbọchị iri na otu n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2021, akara ahụ gosipụtara mbinye aka nke Ayra Starr bụ nwanyị dị afọ iri na asatọ na-agụ abụ afropop
N'iga n'ihu, Don Jazzy gara na Twitter ma bo Coal ebubo nke izu ohi ọgụgụ isi O tinyere ihe ngosi onyonyo nke “Baby Face”, nke e kwuru na e mere na afo gara aga

Wande Coal dere ọtụtụ oge, na-akagbu ebubo Jazzy O tinyekwara njikọ gosiri mgbe mbụ emere egwu a n'ebe ana arụ egwu Onye ọkaiwu na-ahụ maka ihe nkiri/egwuruegwu bụ Demilade Olaosun gwara ndị ntaakụkọ Premium Times okwu gbasara akụ ọgụgụ isi (IP)

O kwuru na abụ a bụ ihe onwunwe nke Mavin Records ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-emepụta, hazie ma kwupụta ya site n'aka onye ọrụ akara ahụ Onye ọka iwu ahụ kwukwara na ebe ọ bụ na emeghị ka ọha na eze nweta nkwekọrịta ndekọ Wande Coal, nkọwa enweghị ike ịdị banyere akụ ọgụgụ isi nke ọrụ egwu ndekọ a N'ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Nọvemba, afọ 2013, Mavin Records zipụrụ nkwupụta mgbasa ozi na-ekwupụta ọpụpụ Wande Coal
Nkwupụta mgbasa ozi ahụ bịara mgbe obere oge gachara maka esemokwu Twitter dị n'etiti Don Jazzy na Wande Coal
N'ajụjụ ọnụ redio na Beat FM na ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, Iyanya kwupụtara ọpụpụ ya na Mavin Records, na-asị, 'Abanyela m ugbu a na Temple Music mana abụ m aga m abụ onye Mavin na ndụ m nile
Ọ bụghị esemokwu
A họpụtara Mavin Records maka Ndekọ Kasị Mma na-Afọ na enọ ntụrụndụ ndi obodo nke afọ 2013 Akara a nwere meri n'ụdi ihe ndi edere na enọ ntụrụndụ ndi obodo nke afọ 2014
