Ọ bụ ezie na Godywn, Don Jazzy na Di'jja rụrụ orụ, o binyeghi aka na-akara Mavin
Mavis Adjei bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri ugbu a na Netherlands
Adjei si n'obodo diamond nke Akwatia na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Swedru Secondary School na Central Region nke Ghana site n'afọ 1994 ruo afọ 1996
N'ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri abụọ na ise, ọrụ ihe nkiri ya gụnyere ihe nkiri a ma ama na Amsterdam Diary, Love & Politics, Church Money, Obaa pa, Salãm na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
O sonyekwara n'ọtụtụ usoro ncha na Ghana
Adjei bi na Netherlands ya na ụmụ ya ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Tyra na Kayla, na nwa ya nwoke, Kieran
Edemsibịa
Mavis Akoto (amụrụ na 22 Machị na afọ 1978) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ
O sonyere na asọmpi 4 × 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2000 Summer Olympics
Mavis Lengalenga Muyunda (nwụrụ n'afọ 2019) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ZambiaMavis Muyunda bụ onye omeiwu UNIP maka mpaghara Katuba
Site na 1983 ruo 1988 Muyunda bụ onye minista steeti nke National Commission for Development Planning
Site na 1988 ruo 1990 ọ bụ onye minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi
Site na 1990 ruo 1992 ọ bụụrụ onye ozi maka mmiri, ala na akụ ndị sitere n'okike
Mavis Muyunda bụ onye otu UNIP nke ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara Katuba Site na 1983 ruo 1988 Muyunda bụ minista steeti nke National Commission for Development Planning
Site na 1988 ruo 1990 ọ bụ minista nke steeti maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ
Site na 1990 ruo 1992 ọ bụ minista maka mmiri, ala na akụrụngwa
N'afọ 2002, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nke onye isi ala maka ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye otu UNIP Cenral Committee
O mechara bụrụ Kọmishọna Ukwu na Tanzania na Great Lakes
Muyunda nwụrụ na 25 Eprel 2019 na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Nkụzi Mahadum dị na Lusaka
E nyere ya emume olili ozu n'ụbọchị iri atọ nke ọnwa Eprel

Mavis Ogun (amụrụ 24 Ọgọst afọ 1973) bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Naijiria gbara bọọlụ dịka onye agbachitere otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa O sonyere na otu egwuregwu nke FIFA World Cup 1991, na 1999 FIFA World Cup
Mavis Iona Pusey (ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Septemba, 1928 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel, 2019) bụ onye America na-ese ihe na-enweghị atụ nke a mụrụ na Jamaica
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ na ónyé na-ese ihe nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe osise ya siri ike, nke na-abụghị nke nnọchiteanya
Pusey nwetara mkpali site na iwu ọbọdọ
Ọ bụ onye na-eduga abstractionist ma na-arụ ọrụ ndị sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ala na-agbanwe agbanwe mgbè niile
A mụrụ Pusey n'ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Septemba, 1928, na Retreat, Jamaica, Nné na nnà ya nwụrụ mgbè amụrụ ya
Mgbè ọ dị afọ 9, Pusey mụtara otú e si àkwá ákwà na ime uwe site n'aka nwanne nné ya
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta uwe na Kingston

Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Pusey kwagara New York City iji nweta akara ugo mmụta n'ịmepụta ejiji na Traphagen School of Fashion Mgbè afọ ole na ole nke nsogbu ego gasịrị, Pusey hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ wee rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa ndị na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ
Mgbè ahụ, ọ debanyere aha na nkụzi nka dị mma na Art Students League nke New York, ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na ógè ọrụ ya ma nye ya ohere ịkwado onwe ya ego

N'ụlọ ọrụ a, Pusey nwetara agụmakwụkwọ site na Ford Foundation ma kwe ka ọ gaa ọmụmụ ihe ma mụọ n'okpuru ndị na-ese ihe dịka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Harry Sternberg na Will Barnet, ónyé na-ese foto na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ
Ọ gwara The New York Amsterdam News na 1978, 'Na mberede, m banyere na klas nke Will Barnetz nke eserese
Mgbè otu ọnwa m kwuru, na-eche na ọ nọ na klas na-ezighi ezi
Mana n'oge a, etinyela m aka nke ukwuu n'ihe osise m, ọ nọrọ m'
Site n'ịmụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Barnet, a kpọbatara Pusey n'ụwa nke Modern Art ma gbaa ya ume ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ya na eserese
N'afọ 1968, Pusey kwagara Paris ma nwee ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Galerie Louis Soulanges na Paris, France
Mgbè ọ bi na Paris, Pusey hụrụ ọgba aghara ụmụ akwụkwọ nke 1968 nke ga-akpali ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na mbipụta ya kachasị dị ịrịba ama, Mai Juin (1968)
Pusey laghachiri na US ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na nnukwu ihe ngosi nke 1971 nke akpọrọ Contemporary Black Artists in America na Whitney Museum of American Art

Otu n'ime ọrụ sitere na ihe ngosi nke 1971, nnukwu ihe osise Dejygea (1970), so na ndị a gụnyere na ihe ngosi 2017, Magnetic Fields Expanding American Abstraction, 1960s to Today, na Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art
Pusey ghọkwara ónyé nkụzi ma kụzie n'ebe dị iche iche, gụnyere The New School, Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, na Mahadum Rutgers
N'afọ 1988, Pusey kwagara Pusey wee kwaga Orange, Virginia wee malite ịkụzi na Woodberry Forest School, ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwoke niile
Pusey nwèrè ọrụ n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta dị iche iche na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie gafee United States, gụnyere
Mawa (nke eji Mahwa, Mahoua were mara) bụ asụsụ ndi Afro-Asia nke dị na Chad etiti
Mawa bụ asụsụ na-adịghịzi adị ma nke a na-ejighị n'aka nke Naịjirịa
O doro anya na ọ dị iche na asụsụ nke Chad nke a makwaara dị ka Mawa, ya mere, a naghị ahapụ ya
Maximillian James Aarons (amụrụ na 4 Jenụwarị 2000) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ bụ onye bekee nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbachitere EFL Championship otu egwuregwu Norwich City
Ọ bụ onye na-agbachitere aka nri, mana ọ pụkwara igwu egwu dị ka onye na-agachitere aka ekpe
Aarons malitere ọrụ ya na Luton Town, wee kwaga ụlọ akwụkwọ Norwich City na 2016
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọkachamara afọ atọ na Canaries na June 2018, tupu ya emee nke mbụ ya na egwuregwu EFL Cup megide Stevenage na 14 Ọgọst
Goolu mbụ ya dị elu bịakwara na EFL Cup, ka ọ kwubiri mmeri nke Cardiff City izu abụọ ka e mesịrị
Aarons mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na 2 Septemba, malite na East Anglian derby megide Ipswich Town, ebe otu abụọ ahụ nwetara otu goolu otu goolu
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ gbatịkwuru nkwekọrịta ya na klọb ahụ ruo n'ọnwarị 2023
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya na 2018 - 19 Championship Team of the Season, e nyekwara ya onyinye 2018 - 19 EFL Young Player of the Season
A kwalitere ya na Norwich na Premier League mgbe o meriri Blackburn Rovers
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya maka EFL Young Player of the Season
Na Jenụwarị 2022, Aarons mere egwuregwu nke 150 ya maka Norwich City na egwuregwu Premier League megide West Ham United
Mgbe ọ banyere n'òtù mbụ nke Norwich City na mbido oge 2018 na 19, Aarons nwetara oku na ndị otu England na-erubeghị afọ 19 na Septemba 2018

N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019, a gụnyere Aarons n'òtù England U21 maka oge mbụ wee mee nke mbụ ya n'oge mmeri 2021 U21 Euro qualifying ha meriri Turkey n'ụbọchị isii nke ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2019

N'agbanyeghị na ọ na-eme egwuregwu n'England, na Maachị 2021, a kọrọ na a ga-akpọ Aarons ka ọ bịa n'òtù mba Jamaica, dịka akụkụ nke atụmatụ nke Jamaican Football Federation iji kpachara anya lekwasị anya n'ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu a mụrụ na England na ndị bekee maka ịkpọ oku iji mụbaa ohere mba ahụ nwere iru eru maka Iko Mba Ụwa nke 2022
Onye isi oche JFF Michael Ricketts kwuru na Aarons ga-etinye akwụkwọ maka paspọtụ Jamaica iji gbaa bọọlụ maka mba ahụ
Otú ọ dị, Aarons mechara kpughee na Jamaica akpọtụbeghị ya, na-ekwu, sị 'Enwere m ike igwu egwu maka Jamaica mana anụtụbeghị m ihe ọ bụla site n'aka ha ma ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla
Enwere m ndị mmadụ na-ezipụ m ozi, ndị ezinụlọ ole na ole si Jamaica, m ga-ekwu na anụbeghị m ihe ọ bụla'
Aarons kpughekwara na o nweghị mmasị igwu egwu maka onye ọ bụla ọzọ ma e wezụga mba ya, na-ekwu, sị 'ihe m na-elekwasị anya bụ England'

Max FM, nke bụbu Radio Continental, bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio FM nke Naijiria nke dị na Lagos
O nwekwara ụlọ ọrụ redio nwanne nwanyị n'okpuru otu akara ahụ na Abuja
Redio Continental malitere n'okpuru aha Link FM na nnyefe mbụ ya na 1023 FM na Lagos
Mgbe ọnwa iri gasịrị, a gbanwere aha ya Unity 1023 FM, na-elekwasị anya na ntụrụndụ, akụkọ na egwuregwu
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, TVC Communications nwere ihe omume na Federal Palace Hotel dị na Lagos iji mee emume mwepụta nke 1023 Max FM

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbakwunyere ndị na-eme ihe ngosi Murphy Ijemba na Shine Begho, ma jide ndị na-egosi ihe ngosi Wale PowPowPow nke mmemme Wetin Day na Jones Usen nke TVC NewsTVC kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-etinye egwu maka igwe mmadụ iri na ise ruo iri atọ na anọ
TVC Communications dochikwara Continental Broadcasting Services dị ka aha azụmaahịa maka ngalaba azụmahịa
Na Septemba afọ 2018, TVC Communications malitere Max 909 FM na Abuja
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-agbaso otu usoro egwu egwu dịka ụlọ ọrụ Lagos

Ihe omume na ndị na-egosi gụnyere Max Breakfast na Jennifer Nzewunwah na Eyo Henry, Max Hits na Azuka Nsonwu; Watin Dey na Wale PowPowPow, Max Drive na Naomi Oboyi; Max Mix na Nellie, yana ihe ngosi sitere na Jones Usen na Murphy Ijemba
Maximilian 'Max' Siedentopf (amụrụ na 27 June 1991) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Namibia-German, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na onye nduzi

A maara ya maka ịtọ ntọala nke akpọrọ Toto Forever na Namib Desert nke nwere mgbanaka nke nnukwu blọk ọcha n'elu nke ndị ọkà okwu isii na-ejikọta na onye ọkpụkpọ MP3 na-eji ike anyanwụ eme ihe nke a haziri iji nọgide na-akpọ egwu 1982 Africa site n'aka ndị America Toto
E kpugheghi kpọmkwem ebe ihe ntinye ahụ dị
Siedentopf tolitere n'obodo Windhoek na Namibia, ma na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Berlin, Los Angeles, Amsterdam, na London
Ọ bụbu onye na-egwu mmiri asọmpi
Na June 2019, Siedentopf pụtara na vidiyo egwu maka 'Mine Right Now', abụ nke onye na-agụ egwu Norwegian Sigrid
Nke a bụ n'ihi na a kagbuola ụgbọ elu Sigrid, onye na-agụ egwu ahụ enweghị ike ịpụta na vidiyo ahụ n'onwe ya
Maxine Case (amuru Jenụwarị 17, 1976 na Cape Town ) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa, na onye edemede akụkọ dị mkpirikpi

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya mpụta mbụ, Ihe niile anyị hapụrụ n'ekwughị, ( Kwela Books, 2006) meriri 2007 Commonwealth Writers' Prize for Best First Book, Africa Region ma bụrụ onye mmeri nke Herman Charles Bosman Prize 2007
Ọ bụ onye otu 2009 International Writing Programme na Mahadum Iowa na onye ode akwụkwọ bi na Obodo mgbapu / Pittsburgh site na Nọvemba 2009 ruo February 2010

Maxine Cassin (1927–2010) bụ onye na-ede uri, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye mbipụta nke metụtara ma bipụta ọtụtụ ndị na-ede uri New Orleans, ọkachasị Everette Maddox, onye guzobere usoro ọgụgụ uri Maple Leaf Bar
A mụrụ Maxine Cassin na New Orleans na 1927 sitere na ndị Armenia na ndị Juu
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Newcomb nke ụmụ nwanyị niile (nke bụ akụkụ nke Mahadum Tulane ugbu a), na-enweta MA na nkà ihe ọmụma
N'afọ 1954, ọ lụrụ Joe Cassin, onye lanarịrị Bataan Death March n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ; ha nwere otu nwa nwoke
N'afọ mgbe 1950s, Cassin na Richard Ashman deziri akwụkwọ akụkọ Poetry New Orleans
Ndị nyere aka gụnyere William Stafford, Donald Hall, Judson Jerome, Sylvia Plath, na Vassar Miller

Akwụkwọ akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ bipụtara Miller 's Adam's Footprint (1956) na Struggling to Swim on Concrete (1984), yana mkpokọta Maddox, Raeburn Miller, Martha McFerren, Tom Wright, Harold Witt, Felix Stefanile, Rosewell Graves
Lowrey, Charles L
Black, Ralph Adamo, Charles DeGravelles (onye na-edezi akwụkwọ akụkọ mgbe e mesịrị), na Paul Petrie
O bipụtakwara uri na nka nke Malaika Favorite, yana foto Clarence John Laughlin
Cassin, yana Maddox na Yorke Corbin, deziekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ Maple Leaf Rag mbụ
N'afọ 2005, Hurricane Katrina manyere ndị Cassin ka ha si n'ụlọ ha dị na Uptown New Orleans kwaga Baton Rouge
N'agbanyeghị ahụ ike na-ada ada na nka nka, Cassin gwara ndị na-ede uri, ndị na-ese ihe, na ndị enyi ndị ọzọ site na Weebụ Wide Web, na-abụkarị site na ozi ndị e denyere na mkpụrụedemede isi obodo

Ọ gara n'ihu na-ebipụta na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị bụ isi ka ngwụcha afọ 2006; Nke Callaloo 's post-Katrina gosipụtara 'Egwu ịhụnanya atọ sitere n'aka onye obodo,' nke Cassin gụkwara n'oge mkparịta ụka October 26, N'afọ 1995 na WWNO -FM's Fred Kasten
Maxine Cassin nwụrụ na Baton Rouge n'ime ụbọchị nke ọnwụ Joe na Maachị, 2010
New Orleans Poetry Journal Press

Maxine Jones (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1962),[lower-alpha 1] bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu nke a maara nke ọma dị ka ónyé guzobere otu R&B / pop En Vogue, otu n'ime ìgwè ụmụ agbọghọ kachasị ere n'ụwa n'oge niile
Ọ bụrụ abụ ndị isi na egwu egwu 'My Lovin' (You're Never Gonna Get It) na 'Don't Let Go (Love)', ha abụọ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma mba ụwa ma ree ihe karịrị otu nde
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Jones ereela ihe karịrị nde irí abụọ na En Vogue
Ọrụ ya emeela ka o nweta ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta, gụnyere American Music Awards abụọ, Billboard Music Award, MTV Video Music Awards anọ, na Soul Train Music Awards anọ
N'afọ 1988, ndị na-emepụta Denzil Foster na Thomas McElroy họọrọ Jones na Dawn Robinson na Cindy Herron ka ha nọrọ n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị atọ
Mgbè agbakwunyere Terry Ellis na usoro ahụ, otu áhụ ghọrọ quartet wee họrọ aha En Vogue
Ha malitere idekọ abọm mbụ ha na 1989 ma mechaa na 1990
N'afọ 1990, En Vogue wepụtara egwu mbụ ha 'Hold On', nké ghọrọ egwu mbụ na chaatị Hot R&B / Hip-Hop Songs
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, otu ahụ wepụtara abọm mbụ ha Born to Sing, nke rere otu nde na United States
N'ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Septemba, 2011, Ellis, Jones, na Herron wepụtara otu 'I'll Cry Later' site na abọm ha na-abịanụ nkè a haziri maka ntọhapụ December

Mkparịta ụka màkà ntọhapụ nke abọm ahụ mèrè ka Jones hapụ En Vogue, nke ya na Robinson kwurịtara na Access Hollywood ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu afọ ka e mesịrị n'ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 2012
Olu Maxine na-agbasa octaves atọ na akara abụọ
Ọ bụ ónyé mezzo-soprano
Dị ka ónyé otu En Vogue, a na-ekwukarị na Jones na-eme ka akụkụ dị ala nke abụ ha kwekọọ
E dekọrọ akara ya kachasị ala n'abụ 'Love Won't Take Me Out' ebe ọ bụrụ abụ Gī2
E dekọrọ akara kachasị elu ya na Silent Night (Happy Holiday Mix)', ebe ọ na-abụ abụ B5
Jones na-edekarị egwu dị arọ n'òtù ahụ
Ọ bụrụkwara abụ ndị isi na egwu ha kachasị egwu gụnyere 'Whatta Man', 'Don't Let Go (Love)', 'Give It Up, Turn It Loose', na abụ ha 'My Lovin' (You're Never Gonna Get It)
Àtụ Calendarna onwa May bu ubochi nke ise na afo na kalenda Julian na Gregorian bu nke ato n'ime onwa asaa nwere ogologo ubochi 31
Mee bụ ọnwa nke mmiri n'Ebe Ugwu Ụwa, na ụbịa n'ebe ndịda Hemisphere
Ya mere, May na Southern Hemisphere bụ oge nke ọnwa Nọvemba na Northern Hemisphere na vice versa
Mbubreyo May na-abụkarị mmalite nke oge ezumike ọkọchị na United States (Ụbọchị Ncheta) na Canada (Ụbọchị Victoria) na-agwụ n'ụbọchị ọrụ, Mọnde mbụ nke Septemba
Akpọrọ May (na Latin, Maius) aha maka chi nwanyị Gris Maia, bụ onye e ji mara chi nwanyị ọmụmụ nke oge Rome, Bona Dea, onye ememe ya mere na May

N’aka nke ọzọ, onye Rom na-ede uri bụ Ovid na-enye usoro ọmụmụ nke abụọ, bụ́ nke o kwuru na a na-akpọ ọnwa May maka ndị maiores, Latịn maka “ndị okenye,” nakwa na a kpọrọ ọnwa na-abịa (June) aha maka iuniores, ma ọ bụ “ndị na-eto eto
(Fasti VI88)
N'okpuru kalenda nke Rom oge ochie, emume Bona Dea dara na May 1, Argei dara na May 14 ma ọ bụ May 15, Agonalia dara na May 21, na Ambarvalia na May 29
E mere Floralia n'April 27 n'oge Republican, ma ọ bụ April 28 na kalenda Julian, ma dịgide ruo May 3
Lemuria (ememe) dara na 9,11, na 13 Mee n'okpuru kalenda Julian
Kọleji nke Aesculapius na Hygia mere emume abụọ nke Rosalia (emume), otu na Mee 11 na otu na Mee 22
1 Mee bu ubochi nke 1st (nke mbụ) na onwa ana kpo Mee
Na Gregorian calender, 1 Mee bu ubochi nke 121st (122nd na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo
Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 244 du mgbe afo na agwu
10 Mee bu ubochi nke 10th (nke iri) na onwa ana kpo Mee
Na Gregorian calender, 10 Mee bu ubochi nke 130th (131st na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo
Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 235 du mgbe afo na agwu
11 Mee bu ubochi nke 11th (nke iri na out) na onwa ana kpo Mee
Na Gregorian calender, 11 Mee bu ubochi nke 131st (132nd na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo
Anyi nwere agugu ubochi 234 du mgbe afo na agwu
12 Mee bu ubochi nke 12th (nke iri na abụọ) na onwa ana kpo Mee
Na Gregorian calender, 12 Mee bu ubochi nke 132nd (133rd na afo nke ana-kpo leap year) na afo

May El Calamawy (mkpọpụta [māɑjj (el) ʔælæmæːwiː]; amụrụ n'October 28, 1986) bụ onye Egypt-Palestinian na-eme ihe nkiri nke na-arụ ọrụ ma biri na United States kemgbe 2015
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na usoro telivishọn America Ramy dị ka Dena Hassan, na Moon Knight dị ka Layla El-Faouly
A mụrụ Calamawy na October 28, 1986, na Bahrain n'aka nna onye Ijipt nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-echekwa ego, na nne Palestine-Jordan
O nwere nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya
A zụlitere ya na Bahrain, ọ nọrọ afọ isii na Doha, Qatar, na Houston, Texas, tupu ya eruo afọ iri na abụọ
Calamawy na-asụ Bekee na Arabic
A kpaliri ya ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ kiriri ihe nkiri 1992 Death Becomes Her mgbe ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị
Calamawy gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Bahrain, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ kwagara Boston, Massachusetts, iji mụọ gbasara mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ, n'ihi na nna ya chọrọ ka ọ mee nke ahụ
Ọ biri na Dubai ruo afọ ise tupu ọ laghachi na United States iji chụsoo ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
O tinyere akwụkwọ na Emerson College wee gwa ndị mụrụ ya, 'Ọ bụrụ na m banye, m ga-aga'
A nabatara ya o wee nweta BA
na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri
Calamawy agụọla akwụkwọ na William Esper Studio na New York City
Calamawy malitere ọrụ ya na-eme ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi ma na-eji aha ya zuru ezu, May El Calamawy
O mechara gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ May Calamawy Mgbe ọ gachara kọleji, o sonyere na New York Arab American Comedy Festival
Site na 2009 ruo 2014, ọ na-eke oge ya n'etiti Dubai na Abu Dhabi, na-eme ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na onye na-anya ụgbọelu TV
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ na ihe nkiri Tobe Hooper nke afọ 2013 bụ Djinn, ihe nkiri egwu mbụ a ga-emepụta na United Arab Emirates

N'afọ 2017, ọ nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro na obere usoro ihe nkiri National Geographic The Long Road Home na ọrụ ndị ọbịa na The Brave na Madam Secretary N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ bụ onye ọbịa na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn mpụ nke CBS FBI
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018, a mara ọkwa na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na usoro ihe nkiri Hulu Ramy, dịka nwanne Ramy, Dena Hassan
N'afọ 2020, o nwere ọrụ olu dị ka Ellie Malik na egwuregwu vidio NBA 2K21
N'afọ 2021, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Together Together, ya na Ed Helms na Patti Harrison

Na Jenụwarị nke otu afọ ahụ, a mara ọkwa na ọ ga-apụta na usoro ihe nkiri Disney+ a kpọrọ Moon Knight, nke gosipụtara na Machị 30, 2022, ebe Calamawy gosipụtara Layla El-Faouly, onye Egypt na-amụ banyere ihe ochie na nwunye nke Marc Spector (nke Oscar Isaac gosipụtara)
Layla bụ onye Arab mbụ na dike na Marvel Cinematic Universe
Ọ nwere alopecia areata, a chọpụtakwara ya na mbụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ
E tinyere alopecia ya n'ime akụkọ nke onye ya bụ Dena Hassan na Ramy n'oge oge nke abụọ nke ihe ngosi ahụ
Kemgbe afọ 2015, Calamawy ebiela na United States
Akinmayokun Awodumila (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 28 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1984 ), nke a maara dịka May D, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-agba egwu
Ọ bịanyere aka na R&B duo P-Square's record label Square Records
A mụrụ May D Akinmayokun Awodumila na Lagos, Nigera, n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ asaa
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Lagos, ebe ọ gụrụ maka nkwukọrịta ọha na eze
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'otu afọ ahụ ọ bịanyere aka na labelụ 2011
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012, a mara ọkwa na May D anọkwaghị na akara ahụ, dị ka akụkọ Premium Times kwuru
Na 13 Mee 2011, May D wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Soundtrack' site na labelụ Square Records
Vidio egwu ahụ, nke Clarence Peters duziri, wepụtara na 12 Jenụwarị 2012
Vidio ahụ nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri na ọwa YouTube ha tupu akara ahụ ehichapụ ya
Na 25 Septemba 2012, May D hiwere akara ndekọ onwe ya nke a maara dị ka Confam Entertainment
Na 18 Julaị 2020, May D kwupụtara na aka Twitter ya na ya na Davido Music Worldwide bịanyere aka
May De Silva (Amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ ) bụ onye ọkachamara na njikwa Seychelles nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Kọmishọna nke Kọmitii Anti-Corruption Seychelles kemgbe ọnwa Machị 16, 2017
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Anse Royale, Mahé
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ulster ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta postgraduate ya mgbe ọ gụsịrị Management na Executive Leadership

Ọ bụ onye otu International Boards na Panels dị iche iche gụnyere Gender Advisory Panel na Office of the First and Deputy First Minister of Northern Ireland, Belfast City Council for Good Relations Partnership ma ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Strategic Women's Reference Group nke Northern Ireland Policing Board
N'ụbọchị 16 Machị 2017, ọ nọchiri Lucy Athanasius dị ka Chief Executive Officer nke Anti-Corruption Commission Seychelles mgbe Danny Faure, Onye isi ala nke Republic of Seychelles, họpụtara ya

N'ọnwa Julaị 2020, a họpụtara Ms De Silva na Commission of Inquiry of the liquidation of the former Plantation Club Hotel nke onye bụbu onye isi oche nke ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe, Justice MacGregor na Auditor General, Maazị Gamini Herath na-eduzi
Ms De Silva bụkwa onye otu Seychelles National Committee of the Anti-Money Laundering and Counter Financing of Terrorism - nke a họpụtara n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2019
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2021, ọrụ Ms De Silvaʹs gbanwere site na onye isi oche gaa na Kọmishọna nke Kọmitii Anti-Corruption Seychelles nke weghaara ikike ọhụrụ nke ilekọta Kọmitii Omume Ndị Ọchịchị
N'okwu ikpe dị elu, De Silva duziri nyocha nke onye bụbu minista Dolor Ernesta
May Edward Chinn (Eprel 15, afo 1896 - Disemba 1, afo 1980) bu dibia bekee nke nwanyi America
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye Amerịka nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bellevue Hospital Medical College, ugbu a NYU School of Medicine, na nwanyị mbụ onye America America na-arụ ọrụ na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Harlem
N'ime omume onwe ya, o nyere nlekọta maka ndị ọrịa ojii bụ ndị na-agaghị enweta ọgwụgwọ na ụlọ ọcha
Ọ bụkwa onye nkwado siri ike maka nyocha ọrịa kansa n'oge
Amụrụ Chinn na Great Barrington, Massachusetts ma zụlitere ya na New York City
Nna ya, William Lafayette Chinn, mụrụ ohu na afo 1852 na Manassas, Virginia
Ọ gbapụrụ n'ịbụ ohu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Nne ya, Lula Ann Evans, mụrụ na afo 1876 na Norfolk, Virginia
Ọ bụ onye America America sitere na ndị Chickahominy, otu pere mpe n'ime ebo Algonquin buru ibu
Lula Ann Evans rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ụlọ na ala nke Charles L
Tiffany, onye na-ere ọla bi na Irvington, New York
Site na ego ọ nwetara, Lula Ann zọpụtara nke ọma iji ziga nwa ya nwanyị na Bordentown Manual and Training Industrial School, ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ebi na New Jersey
Mgbe Chinn nwetasịrị osteomyelitis nke agba, ọ laghachiri New York maka ịwa ahụ
N'ịbụ onye ya na ezinụlọ Tiffany ndị ọcha bi, Chinn kpugheere egwu oge ochie ma kụziere German na French
Mgbe e rere ụlọ ezinụlọ Tiffany n'ihi ọnwụ Charles Tiffany, Chinn na nne ya laghachiri na New York City ebe ọ maliteghachiri akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze wee mụọ piano
N'agbanyeghị na ọ gụbeghị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'ihi ịda ogbenye, Chinn nwetara ule ntinye akwụkwọ na Columbia Teachers College, na-agụ akwụkwọ na afo 1917
Chinn buru ụzọ mụọ egwu mana ọ gbanwere isi ya na sayensị ka ya na onye prọfesọ egwu ịkpa oke kpakọrịtara ma nweta otuto maka akwụkwọ sayensị
Jean Broadhurts, onye prọfesọ banyere nje bacteria na kọleji ghọtara ikike sayensị ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ agadi ya nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, Chinn rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ nyocha ahụike ahụike dịka onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ nyocha
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Columbia Teachers College na afo 1921 wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ nyocha
Otú ọ dị, ịhụnanya Chinn nwere n'ebe egwu anwụghị anwụ ka ọ nọgidere na-akụziri ụmụaka ndị na-eto eto ihe piano ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eso Paul Robeson ruo afọ anọ na afo 1920
Chinn bụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Delta Sigma Theta
Na Febụwarị afo 1921, ọ so na otu ụmụ nwanyị izizi bidoro na Alpha Beta Chapter nke sorority n'akụkụ Eslanda Goode Robeson
Chinn gara n'ihu na-amụ ọgwụ na Bellevue Hospital Medical College, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ African-American gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1926
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Chinn chọpụtara na ọ nweghị ụlọ ọgwụ ga-ekwe ka ọ na-eme ihe ùgwù n'ihi na anabataghị ndị America America isonye na ebe obibi ụlọ ọgwụ na ebe nyocha n'ụlọọgwụ ụlọ ọgwụ New York
Ụlọ ọrụ Rockefeller lere ya anya nke ọma maka mkpakọrịta nyocha ruo mgbe ha chọpụtara na ọ bụ onye isi ojii
Site na akpụkpọ ahụ ya mara mma na aha ikpeazụ ya, ọtụtụ ndị chere na ọ bụ onye ọcha ma ọ bụ onye China
Ụlọ ọgwụ Harlem bụ naanị ụlọ ọrụ ahụike n'obodo ahụ nyere Chinn ọzụzụ
Chinn bụ nwanyị mbụ America-Afrika ga-abanye ebe ahụ yana soro ndị ọrụ ahụike na oku ụgbọ ihe mberede
O chere ihe mgbochi ọzọ ihu mgbe ụlọ ọgwụ jụrụ ime ihe ùgwù ya n'ebe ahụ
O mechara gwa Muriel Petioni, onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Society of Black Women Physicians, na ndị ọrụ ojii kwụsịrị ya n'ihi na ha chere na ọ na-agafe dị ka onye ọcha, ma ọ chọghị imebi ọnọdụ ya
Chinn guzobela omume nkeonwe, na-ahụ ndị ọrịa n'ọfịs ya ma na-eme usoro n'ụlọ ha
Ahụmahụ a kpaliri ya inweta nzere masta na ahụike ọha na Mahadum Columbia na afo 1933
N'afọ 1940, ụlọ ọgwụ Harlem nyere Chinn ịnakwere ihe ùgwù, n'otu akụkụ n'ihi mkpali nke Mayor Fiorello La Guardia maka ntinye aka na mgbagha Harlem Riot nke 1935
Na afo 1944, Strang Clinic goro Chinn ka o mee nnyocha banyere ọrịa cancer, ma ọ nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo afọ 29 sochirinụ
Society of Surgical Oncology kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu, na afo 1975, o guzobere otu ọha iji kwalite ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America ka ha gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike
Ọ nọgidere na-eme omume onwe ya ruo afọ 81
Mgbe ọ na-aga nnabata na Mahadum Columbia iji sọpụrụ enyi ya, Chinn dara wee nwụọ na Disemba 1, afo 1980, ọ dị afọ 84
May Kassab (amụrụ na Disemba 8, 1981) bụ nwanyị na-agụ egwú na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Egypt
Ọ bịanyere aka na Rotana, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ egwu na Middle East
Maya (Anne) Evans bụ onye kansụl na Hastings Borough Council ọ nọchitere anya Hollington ward na East Sussex

Kemgbe a họpụtara ya na 2018, Maya bụ onye mmeri ndị agha nke Hastings (nke na-enyere ndị agha ochie na-enweghị ebe obibi aka), doziri otu ọrụ iji belata plastik a na-eji eme ihe, ma họpụta onye otu kọmitii maka mgbanwe ihu igwe, gburugburu ebe obibi na ntụrụndụ
N'oge ọrịa na-efe efe, ọ nọ na-ọkwá dị elu n'ime kansụl ahụ; nke a mere ka Hollington bụrụ onye a na-ebute ụzọ mgbe niile ma nata ọrụ dị mkpa
Maya bụ onye otu kọmitii maka gburugburu ebe obibi ugbu a ma kọwaa ya dị ka onye mmeri mgbanwe ihu igwe na 2019

Maya bụkwa onye na-eme mkpọsa udo nke e jidere n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2005 n'ihu ihe ncheta agha Cenotaph na London, maka ịjụ ịkwụsị ịgụ aha ndị agha Britain e gburu na Iraq mgbe agha Iraq nke afọ 2003 gasịrị

Evans, onye na-emegide agha site na Hastings, ghọrọ onye mbụ na UK ka a mara ikpe n'okpuru Serious Organized Crime and Police Act 2005 maka isonye na ngagharị iwe na-enweghị ikike n'ime 1 kilomita nke Parliament Square
A tọpụrụ ya n'ọnọdụ na ịkwụ ụgwọ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2006, Evans meriri n'ikpe mkpegharị ikpe megide ikpe ha
Evans bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-eme mkpọsa na-òtù 'Voices for Creative Non-Violence UK' na-elekwasị anya na esemokwu na-aga n'ihu na Afghanistan
Evans anoro na njem ikwu okwu na UK na 2006, 2007 na 2012, akwụkwọ ozi ya na-apụta mgbe niile na The Guardian na The Independent ma ruo 2011 nwere column mgbe niile na Peace News kwa ọnwa

N'ụbọchị iri n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2007, ụbọchị ikike mmadụ, otu nrụgide Liberty nyere Evans Peter Duffy Award 'maka ọrụ mkpọsa ya na mkpebi ya maka nnwere onwe' na 'obi ike iguzo maka ikike anyị bụ isi maka mkpesa udo na nnwere onwe ikwu okwu'
Ọ bụ onye otu International Organization for a Participatory Society

N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2009, Evans chọrọ nyocha ikpe banyere iwu mbufe ndị mkpọrọ nke metụtara ndị Afghanistan ndị ndị agha Britain jidere, wee soro kwupụta na a tara ha ahụhụ, gụnyere site na iti ha ihe na ọkụ eletrik, mgbe e nyere ya ndị ọchịchị Afghanistan dịka National Directorate of Security (NDS)
Ikpe ahụ, n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, gụnyere ihe aka ebe sitere n'aka ndị uwe ojii Royal Military, [citation needed] ma mee ya na nzuzo, na ọtụtụ n'ime aka ebe ndị ọka iwu Evans enweghị

Ndị ọka ikpe kọwara mkpebi ha, na 25 June 2010, dị ka 'mmeri dị nro' maka Evans, na-ekwu bi na enwere 'ezi ihe ize ndụ na ndị e jidere na NDS Kabul ga-ata ahụhụ ma ọ bụ mmeso ọjọọ' na ndị e nyefere ga-abụ 'ya mere na-emebi iwu nke odeakwụkwọ nke steeti ma bụrụ iwu na-akwadoghị', mana nnyefe na ụlọ ọrụ NDS ndị ọzọ (Kandahar na Lashkar Gah) nwere ike ịga n'ihu ma ọ bụrụ ha ala na e mezuru ọnọdụ akọwa pụtara, dị ka ikike nke ndị n'okpuru ndị a kapiri ọnụ, dị ka ndị lekota ndị lekotara, dị ka iwu na-ahụ maka ndi lekotara aka, dị ka ihe ndị lekoti mgbe niile

Mgbe mkpebi ikpe ahụ gasịrị, United Nations Assistance Mission na Afghanistan 'chọtara ihe aka ebe siri ike na ndị ọrụ NDS nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ise na-ata ndị mkpọrọ ahụhụ', gụnyere ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu ụlọ ọrụ, na Kandahar, nke ụlọ ikpe dị elu kwuru na ọ dị mma maka nyefe ndị mkpọrọ
N'afọ 2010, Evans kporo oku maka nyocha ikpe maka ebubo igbu ndị nkịtị site n'aka ndị agha Britain na Afghanistan

Na-abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2011, Evans meriri na-okwu dị iche megide mbelata enyemaka iwu maka ikpe nyocha ikpe nke e wetara maka ọdịmma ọha na eze, na-enyefe na ebu na-uche nke mbelata ahụ bụ izere ịza ajụjụ gọọmentị kama ịchekwa ego
Lord Justice Laws na Maazị Justice Stadlen chọpụtara na gọomentị ekwputaghị 'ezi ihe kpatara' n'azụ mmezigharị ha na-atụ aro maka enyemaka iwu, nakwa na usoro mkparịta ụka ahụ 'dị njọ n'ụzọ iwu'
A na-eto mkpebi ahụ megide mbelata ahụ dị ka 'mmeri dị ịrịba ama maka ọchịchị iwu'

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2011, Evans sonyeere Voices for Creative Nonviolence na ndị nnọchi anya udo mbụ nke Britain na Afghanistan, na-eleta ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ iji nye aka nke ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka udo nke Britain
Ọ gara Kabul ọzọ na Krismas 2012 dị ka onye ọbịa nke ndị na-eme udo n'Afghanistan

Maya Horgan Famodu bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria-American, onye nhibe ụlọọrụ na onye mmekọ nke Ingressive, ụlọ ọrụ na-enye ntinye ahịa, nyocha teknụzụ na ọrụ ọrụ ahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ na azụmahịa na-agbasa n'Africa
O hiwekwara Ingressive Capital, nke na-etinye ego n'ime ụlọ ọrụ nkà na ụzụ dị n'Africa

Ọ kwadoro Summit High Growth Africa Summit, ogbako ụbọchị abụọ maka otu esi amalite azụmahịa Africa dị elu, ma guzobe Tech Meets Entertainment Summit, ihe omume lekwasịrị anya maka ndị na-eme ememme Africa na ụlọ ọrụ nkà na ụzụ iji wuo mmekorita na-emepụta ego

Maya (ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya, Sean Burrowes na Blessing Abeng ) mechara hiwe ụlọọrụ Ingressive for Good, ụlọ ọrụ a anaghị akwụ ụgwọ nke na-enye ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu, ọzụzụ nkà na ụzụ na ntinye talent maka ndị ntorobịa Africa
Maya Horgan Famodu sitere na nna Naijiria na nne America
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ntorobịa ya na Minnesota, United States
Ọ gara kọleji Pomona wee gụchaa ma nweta nzere bachelọ nke Arts na sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi wee mechaa mmemme Prelaw na Mahadum Cornell
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ, Horgan Famodu rụrụ ọrụ na JPMorgan Chase, tupu ọ malite Ingressive na 2014 na Ingressive Capital na 2017
Ọ malitere Ingressive Capital n'ihi ihe ịma aka ndị enyi ya chere ihu n'inweta nkwado ego maka azụmahịa ha

Mmemme Ingressive Campus Ambassador (ICA) bụ atụmatụ ọzọ nke Ingressive na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na Nigeria, Kenya, Ghana, South Africa, Rwanda na Congo na-enye ego, akụrụngwa na nkuzi maka ụmụ akwụkwọ sayensị kọmputa

Mmemme a nwere ọdụ na Mahadum Port Harcourt, Mahadum Uyo, Kwara State Polytechnic, Ladoke Akintola University of Technology, Mahadum Babcock, Mahadum Rivers State, Cross River University of Technology, Federal University of Petroleum Resources Effurun, University of Benin nke a bu nke ewepụtara na Ghana na 2018
N'afọ 2016, o mebere Summit High Growth Africa Summit, ogbako ụbọchị abụọ maka otu esi amalite, nakwa inweta ego maka azụmahịa Africa n'ụzọ dị elu
Maya Horgan Famodu pụtara na Forbes Africa 30 Under 30 na 2018 na ngalaba teknụzụ
Maya nwere mmasị ịnya ọgba tum tum ya, njem na ịgba egwu
Ọ bụ onye ndepụta blọgụ na Huffington Post site na 2012 ruo 2015
Maya Jribi (January 29, 1960 May 19, 2018) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia
Site na 2006 ruo 2012, ọ bụ onye ndú nke Progressive Democratic Party (PDP)
Site na njikọta PDP na Republican Party na Eprel 2012, ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 2017, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke pati etiti
Nna ya si Tatouine, ebe nne ya si Algeria
Ọ gara akwụkwọ ya na Radès Tunisia, tupu ọ mụọ ihe ọmụmụ ihe ndị dị ndụ na Mahadum Sfax, site na 1979 ruo 1983
N'oge ahụ, ọ sonyere ma bụrụ onye otu ụmụ akwụkwọ, nke a maara dị ka UGET, na Njikọ Tunisian nke Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ
O dere maka Erraï kwa izu na mgbe e mesịrị maka akwụkwọ akụkọ PDP Al Mawkif
Ya na Ahmed Najib Chebbi, Maya Jribi guzobere Progressive Socialist Rally, nke e guzobere na 1983, nke e mechara kpọwa Progressive Democratic Party (PDP)
Kemgbe afọ 1986 ọ bụ onye otu ndị isi otu ahụ
Na 25 Disemba 2006, a họpụtara Jribi ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke PDP
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-eduzi otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Tunisia
Site na 1 ruo 20 Ọktoba 2007, Jribi, ya na Najib Chebbi, sonyere n'ọgba ọsọ agụụ iji mee mkpesa megide ịkwaga isi ụlọ ọrụ pati ahụ na Tunis, nke kpatara nnukwu nsogbu ahụike nye ya
Jribi bụ onye isi nke ndepụta ntuli aka nke PDP na Ben Arous maka ntuli aka ndị omebe iwu n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2011
Ndepụta PDP nwetara otu oche na Ben Arous dịka nsonaazụ ntuli aka mbụ si dị
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2012, PDP jikọtara ya na ndị ọzọ na-adịghị ekpe okpukpe iji guzobe ndị Republican Party na Maya Jribi ghọrọ onye ndú nke otu a
O gosipụtara ọkwa ya maka onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Iwu nke Tunisia na Nọvemba 22
Otú ọ dị, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Democratic Forum for Labour and Liberties (Ettakatol), Mustapha Ben Jaafar meriri ya site na votu 145 na 68 na-akwado ya
Maya Jribi bụ onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị n'ezoghị ọnụ
Ọ kpọrọ Israel dị ka 'ihe owuwu ndị Zionist', ma kwuo na ọ ga-egbochi ndị njem ala nsọ Israel ileta ụlọ nzukọ El Ghriba na agwaetiti Djerba
Maya Jribi, kwupụtara ezumike nká ya, n'oge mgbakọ nke Republican Party na 2017
Na Machị 2018, Center for Research, Studies, Documentation and Information on Women nyere ya otuto maka ndụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị mma
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2018 ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa
Onye isi ala nke Tunisia, na nkwupụta gọọmentị, kpọrọ ọnwụ ya ọnwụ nke 'onye na-eme ihe n'eziokwu' ma kelee àgwà mmadụ ya na ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'ọnwa Machị afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ , ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nyocha, ọmụmụ, akwụkwọ na ozi gbasara ụmụ nwanyị nyere ya otuto maka ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
Onye isi ala nke mba Tunisia kwara arịrị, na nkwupụta mgbasa ozi gọọmentị, maka ọnwụ nke onye na-eme ihe na-eme ma kelee àgwà mmadụ ya na ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ya
Na Mee 21, Ministrị nke Ihe Ndị Nwanyị mara ọkwa na nzukọ ndị isi na isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere aha Maya Jribi ugbu a
Mayaki Seydou (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1949) bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Naijiria
Seydou sonyere na 1972 Summer Olympics na Niger
N'egwuregwu mbụ ya, Seydou meriri Mehmet Kunova nke Turkey tupu Stefan Förster nke East Germany emeri ya
N'okpuru ebe a bụ nsonaazụ nke Mayaki Seydou, onye ọkpọ ọkpọ dị arọ si Niger nke sonyere na Munich Olympik na Munich nke afọ 1972
Mayaula Mayoni (1945 - 2010) bụ onye na-edekọ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eti egwu, na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Ọ bụbu onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo afọ 1980s
Otu n'ime egwu kachasị mma nke Mayaula Mayoni nwụrụ anwụ bụ Cherie Bondowe
Mayen Adetiba (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe egwuregwu nkiri, ọ gara n’ihu ibu onye ọrụ Injinịa ama ama n' obodo
A mụrụ Adetiba n'afọ 1954 na Naijiria
Na mbụ ọ chọrọ ị bụ onye odebe, mgbakọ ego bụ nke ndị oyibo kporọ Accountant, mana o mechara ga- gụọ ihe gbasara ịchụ nta akụkọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ihe nkiri a kpọrọ The Bar Beach Show , ọ kpara agwa dika nwunye Lakunle Ojo n'egwregwu Village Headmaster
Ọ sokwa mepụta ihe egwregwu Kongi's Harvest bụ nke pụtara ihe n'afọ 1980
Ọ gara obodo oyibo na US maka agụmakwụkwọ nke mahadum ebe ọ nwetara ọrụ n'ihi nne na nna ya enweghị ike izitere ya ego n'ihi ihe mgbochi nwepụ ihe n'ala Naijiria
Ọ nọrọ nwantịtị oge na Mahadum nke New York tupu ọ gafee na Mahadum nke Columbia iji mụọ maka injinia nke na-ahụ maka eletriki
A gwara ya na injinia ịrụ okporo ụzọ, akwa mmiri, ụlọ di iche iche wdg bụ nke akpọrọ civil engineer ga aka nata ugwu na nsọpụrụ karia injinia eletriki, nke a mere ka ọ gbanwee gụwazie civil engineer
Mgbe ọ gbanwere ịgụ Civil injinịa na Mahadum Columbia, ọ bụghị naanị na ọ bụ naani nwaafọ Naịjirịa, kama kwa ọ bụ naanị ya bụ nwa nwaanyị ojii na-enweta ọzụzụ ị bụ injinia a
Ọ gara n’ihu nweta nzere nke Mastas na Mahadum Cornell
Ọ lụrụ Mazi Dele Adetiba ha mụta nwa nwaanyị aha ya bụ Kemi onye nke a mụrụ na Lagos na Jenụwarị n'afọ1980
A hoputara ya dika onye isi ndi otu a kpọrọ Association of Consulting Engineers of Nigeria ma bụrụkwa osote onye isi n'otu ọzọ a kpọrọ Nigerian Society of Engineers ugboro ato
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ ahọpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Executivi Kọmitii nke otu 'Nigerian Society of Engineers'
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ịrụ ọrụ nke metụtara Ụlọ ọrụ African Union Southern Africa Regional nke dị na Malawi nakwa nnukwu ụlọ a kpọrọ Summerhill Baptist Church dị na Lagos
Ọ rụrụa ọrụ ebe a na anaghị ego maọbụ ihe nrite ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2017 a họpụtara ya ịnọ n' ihe nkiri nwa ya nwaanyị a kpọrọ 'King Women' ebe Kemi Adetiba gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ
O sonyeere 'King Women' ndị ọzọ bụ Chigul, Taiwo Ajai-Lycett, TY Bello na Tara Durotoye

O weputara nkpuchi egwu nke Davido bụ 'The Money' ma onye na-agụ egwu chọpụtara ya na Twitter
Mayorkun bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ndekọ aha Davido Music Worldwide (DMW) n'afọ 2016; ewepụtara otu mpụta mbụ ya 'Eleko' n'okpuru labeelu a
Mayorkunkun wepụtara albọm studịo mbụ ya Onye isi obodo Lagos na Nọvemba 2018
A mụrụ Mayorkun n'abalị̀ iri abụọ na atọ n'afọ, 1994 na Osun State
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n’ime mmadụ atọ, amụrụ n’ezinụlọ nke ndị na-eme egwuregwu ntụrụndụ
Nne ya bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ma nna ya, onye na-ese ihe na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Mayorkun so na ndị ukwe mgbe ọ dị obere ebe ọ, dịka o siri kwuo, 'mụtara mbupute egwu'
Ọ nwere asambodo na ngalaba na-ahụ maka ngụkọta ego na University of Lagos, ọ nọkwa n ’ụlọ akụ (bank) tupu a chọpụta ya n’afọ 2016
Mayorkun kpebiri ịhapụ ọrụ ụlọ akụ ya chọọ ọzọ n'ihi ụgwọ ebughi ibu,mgbe Davido hụrụ vidiyo mkpuchi ya na February 2016
Davido sooro ya na Twitta na Instagram, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị Davido jụrụ ya ma ọ ga - emeli ihe karịrị ikpọ pịano
O nwetara oku ekwentị Davido n’otu ụbọchị ahụ o dere akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm wee zigara Davido ụfọdụ n’ime egwu ndị o degoro
Davido kpebiri ịdebananye aha ya na Davido Music Worldwide
Mayorkun wepụtara otu mkpụrụ egwu mbụ ya n’okpuru akara akpọrọ “Eleko” n’afọ 2016
Vidio nke abụ a chịkọtara ndị nkiri nde mmadụ na ụbọchị iri mbụ
N'aha ya, Mayorkun nwere ọtụtụ egwu n'abụghị albọm nke gụnyere Yawa, Sade, Che Che na Mama
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2018, ọ wepụtara ndị abụghị albọm bụ 'Posh' na 'Fantasy' nke na-egosi Olu Maintain na atụmanya nke albọm Studịo mbụ ya nke akpọrọ 'The Mayor of Lagos'
Emepụtara The Mayor of Lagos Lagos n'abalị na isii nke ọnwa Nọvemba 2018
N'abalị̀ mbụ nke ọnwa Disemba 2018, ọ pụtara na eserese Billboard albọm nke ụwa ,nke ọ nọ n'ogo ọnụ ọgụgụ iri na ise
Mayorkun malitere njem na mba niile na 2017 nke o mere ihe ngosi egwu n'ihe karịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ iri atọ na ise
O mechiri afọ 2017 site n'iji isi egwu ya nke mbụ na Lagos akpọrọ 'The Mayor of Lagos '
The Mayor of Lagos na-aga n'ihu na 2018 site na ihe ngosi na obodo Ibadan na isi obodo, Abuja
Ọzọkwa, a mara ọkwa ụbọchị maka mbipụta nke Lagos
N’afọ 2018, Mayorkun mere njem ga UK tinyere onye otu labeelụ yabú Dremo, ebe ọ mmere ngosi ihe dị ka obodo isii
Ọ rụkwara n'akụkụ onye isi labeelụ Davido na wireless festival

Mayowa Adegbile (Mayowa Abisola Adegbile; amụrụ na 10 Septemba 1986) bụ onye Naịjirịa Philanthropist amara nke ọma dị ka otu n'ime ndị Naịjirịa atọ sonyere na mmadu iri kachasị elu na ngwụcha afọ 2014 na asọmpi Google Africa Connected

Adegbile bu ụzọ jiri YouTube na-enweta ego maka ebumnuche ya, Ashake Foundation nke o chepụtara dịka ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmaahịa maka ndị nne di ha nwụrụ, inye ha ngwaọrụ ga-enyere ha aka ibi ndu ma kwado ezinụlọ ha

Adegbile malitere Ashake Foundation na 2012 na ọnụọgụ ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ (22) ndi di ha nwugoro na umuaka iri atọ na isii (36) ma nye ha ego nkwado azụmaahịa na akụrụngwa nke mere ka ewepụrụ ha ụbiam ma kwado ụmụaka ha ilaghachi na ụlọ akwụkwọ
Na Julaị, 2017, ndị Junior Chamber International nyere Adegbile onyinye dika otu n’ime mmadụ iri na-eto eto kacha mma na Naijiria maka ọrụ Humanitarian na Voluntary Leadership

Mayowa Nicholas nwaafọ Naịjirịa amụrụ na abalị iri abụo na abụo n'ime ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1998, bụ onye n'eji ejiji nlereanya
Ọ bụ onye ejiji nlereanya Naịjirịa mbụ nke chawapụtara na ngósìpụ̀tà Dolce &Gabbana, Saint Laurent, na Calvin Klein
Mayowa Nicholas bụ onye mmeri ikpeazụ na asọmpi Elite Model Look 2014 (ya na onye nlereanya ejiji nke Italian bụ Greta Varlese )

A na-ejikarị ihe nzuzu mara omume ya na-atọ ọchị site na nzuzu, adịghị ike ma na na-atọ ọchị na nkwụsị dị nkọ site na eziokwu

Na Sapele, ọ rụrụ ọrụ áká ka o wee nwee ike ịkwado onwe ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma kwado ezinụlọ ya

Ahaa bụ 'Mbaise' sitere na agbụrụ ise Agbaja, Ahiara, Ekwereazu, Ezi na Ihite na Oke Uvuru
Ogbe ọchịchị atọ dị na Mbaise ruru ihe dịka narị anọ na anọ ; Aboh Mbaise gbara 185 km2 , Ahiazu Mbaise kpuchie 111 km2 , na Ezinihitte Mbaise kpuchiri 108 km2
Mbaise batara n'okpuru ọchịchị Briten n'afọ 1902 n'oge agha Anglo-Aro, mgbe ndị ochi agha mbawanye nke British meriri Aro Confederacy na Owerri na Mbaise
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1906, na ngwụcha ọrụ ahụ, Mbaise nke oge a jikọtara n'okpuru ọchịchị Briten na ụfọdụ obodo nnwere onwe
Iji lekọta ndị ezinụlọ, e hiwere ụlọ ikpe obodo na Obohia na 1907 wee bufee ya na Nguru na 1909
N'afọ 1929, e bibiri ụlọikpe Nguru n'ihi agha ụmụ nwanyị Igbo
E meghekwara ụlọ ikpe mpaghara na Obohia, Itu, Ife na Enyiogogu maka nzaghachi ọchịchị ụlọ nke afọ 1930
Ejikọtara mpaghara ahụ dị ka ngalaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nhazi na 1941
E hiwere kansụl site n'afọ 1945, na-adabereghị na obodo ndị kwụụrụ onwe ha
Ọ bụ site na kansụl ka e si kee ọchịchị ime obodo atọ ahụ site na kansụl
Ahiazu Mbaise bụ njikọ nke kansụl Ahiara na Ekwerazu, na Aboh Mbaise bụ otu jikọrọ ndị kansụl Oke-Ovoro na Agbaja
Ezinihitte Mbaise nọọrọ naanị ya ma ewezuga Isu Obiangwu na Umuohiagu, obere obodo abụọ jikọtara Ngor-Okpala sitere na mpaghara Agbaja
Ruo mgbe ndị mba Europe rutere Naijiria, isi ihe nweta ndị Mbaise na-enweta bụ na ọrụ ugbo
N'ala Igbo, ọchịchị gbadoro ụkwụ n'ọkwa na omenala
Otu obodo (nchịkọta ndị nwoke kwa izu) bụ ọkwa kachasị elu nke nhazi, na amala na-achị
Aladinma na-egosipụta ike ọchịchị ugbu a
Chinua Achebe kọwara ndụ tupu oge ọchịchị n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ Things Fall Apart
Mgbe ewepụtara ọchịchị ndị Britain na Southern Protectorate nke Naịjirịa, gọọmentị guzobere ụlọ ikpe obodo na Nkwogwu Nguru n'afọ 1905 ma wuo ebe obibi maka ndị Britain n'ebe ahụ
Rogers Stewart, onye tụgharịrị ịnyịnya ígwè ya, e jidere ma gbuo ya n'okwu gbasara njirimara na-ezighi ezi
ngosi pụta Mmegwara iwe na Ahiara nke afọ 1906 , nke ndị Captain Brian Douglas na Harold Hastings duziri, malitere mmegwara na mpaghara ahụ
N'afọ 1927, gọọmentị na-achị mba ahụ malitere ịkwụ ụtụ isi
A mụbara ego ụtụ isi n'afọ1929, Agha Ụmụ nwanyị malitekwara ime mkpesa megide mmegbu ọha na eze na nke akụ na ụba
E bibiri ụlọ ikpe obodo dị na Nkwogwu ma chụpụ ebe obibi gọvanọ ahụ
E guzobere ụlọ ikpe na Itu (nye Ezinihitte); Afor Enyiogugu (nye Agbaja); Obohia (nye Ekwerazu); Orie-Ahiara (nye Ahiara); na Uvuru (nye Oke-Uvuru)
Nabalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Juun afọ 1941, Mbaise ghọrọ njikọ nke agbụrụ ise Agbaja (Nguru, Okwuato, Enyiogugu, Obiangwu, na Umuohiagu), Ekwerazu, Ahiara, Ezinihitte, na Oke-Uvuru
E meghere ebe nchekwa akụ na Enyiogugu n'afọ 1942, ma wega ya na Aboh n'afọ 1948
Obiangwu na Umuohiagu, nke bụ akụkụ nke Agbaja, sonyeere Ngor Okpala n'afo 1957
Mbaise nwere ọchịchị ime obodo atọ ugbu a Ahiazu, Aboh-Mbaise, na Ezinihitte
N'etiti afọ 1955 na 1958, Mbaise County Council malitere ọrụ mmepe abụọ dị ịrịba ama Mbaise Secondary School na Mbaise Joint Hospital (nke bụzi General Hospital), ha abụọ dị na Aboh
Ndị bị na Mbaise bụ ndị Igbo
Ihe dị ka pasentị iri ise na ise bụ ndị Katọlik, pasentị irí atọ na ise bụ ndị Protestant na okpukpe ndị ọzọ mejupụtara ndị fọdụrụnụ
Ụfọdụ emume ọdịnala na omenala pụ̀tara na mmetụta ndị ọdịda anyanwụ
Emume ụbọchị asatọ nke Ahianjoku na asọpụrụ chi ji; kemgbe afọ 1946, emume ọhụrụ nke abalị iri na ise nke onwa ọgọstụ kwa afọ abụwo ụdị emume Ndị Kraịst nke emume Ahịanjọkụ
Oji Ezinihitte na-eme emume Ezinihitta n'abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị kwa afọ
Itu Aka, tupu oge ọrụ ugbo, na-agba ndị mmadụ ume ịnagide gburugburu ebe obibi, ọgbara ọhụrụ na ihe ịma aka ọhụrụ
A na-enye nri ndị bụ, ugba, na mmanya raffia
A maara ụmụ nwanyị Mbaise maka ịmụ nwa ha
Iji bụrụ eghu ukwu, nwanyị ga-amụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala ụmụ iri; ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị amụọla ihe ruru iri na ise
Ọdịbendị Mbaise mejupụtara na egwu na ịgba egwú Igbo
A na-akpọ egwu na osisi ụbọ́, ụbọ aka, udu dị ogologo mkpụmkpụ na nwee oghere, ite, ogene, mpi achara na mpalaka
E nwere ịgba egwú maka ịmụ nwa, alụmdi na nwunye, olili ozu, ọrụ obodo, na emume nnọrịkọta ndị ọzọ
A na-agba egwu agbacha ekurunwa maka ịmụ nwa
A na agba alija na ogelengebong maka alụmdi
A na-eme Eseike, esse, ekwerikwe mgba na nkwa Ike na olili ozu ụmụ nwoke, na uko na Ekereavu maka olili ozu ụmụ nwanyị
Nwoga, onye wetara otu Abigbo na United States n'oge afọ 1980, dere na ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na'agba egwú na-eji nkà ihe ọmụma, na-akatọ, na-adọ aka ná ntị ma na-eto ya na arụmọrụ ha
Ndị bi na Mbaise ugbu a karịrị otu nde, ọrụ ugbo ka bụ ọrụ bụ isi ihe nweta ha
Yams, cassava, mkpụrụ nkwụ, akwụkwọ nri na mkpụrụ osisi bụ isi ngwaahịa ugbo

Mbali Dhlamini (amụrụ n'afọ 1990 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na foto na oge
Site n'afọ 2008 ruo afọ 2009, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ obibi akwụkwọ na Artist Proof Studio na Johannesburg

N'ọrụ ya, Dhlamini na-ekwu maka nsogbu ndị na-esote ọchịchị na ime mmụọ (Series 'Non-Promised Land Bana Ba Thari Entsho') na nkà nke indigo dyeing na Senegal (Series'Look Into')
Site n'ọnwa Ọktoba ruo n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2021, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi n'ụlọ nke Embassy of Foreign Artists nke Swiss Canton nke Geneva
N'ọnwa Disemba 2021, ya na Phumulani Ntuli, natara Visionary Award nkè afọ 2021/2022 site na The Javett Art Centre na Mahadum Pretoria

Dị ka onye ikwu kacha nso nke ezinụlọ Ekoid nke asụsụ Southern Bantoid, Mbe dị nso na asụsụ Bantu
Ọ bụ ụda ma nwee usoro aha aha nke Niger-Congo
Mkpụrụedemede igbo bụ i e ɛ a ɔ o u a ɔ o u

Mkpụrụ okwu Mbe niile ma e wezụga labialʹvelars (databox) na n nwere ibe labialised
(//jʷ// bụ [ɥ]) Na mgbakwunye, nkwụsị ndị na-abụghị labialised (m p b k ɡ; palatalised ŋ ga-abụ ɲ) na mmiri (l r) nwere ibe palatalised
E nwere ụdaume ole na ole na-apụta naanị na ideophones, dị ka //fʲ hʲ//
Ihe ọzọ na-adọrọ mmasị dị n'etiti fortis na lenis //kʷ//
Fortis (ogologo?) /kwā/ ọkara-gbasa ụdaum/e/ na-esonụ dịka /e/, ebe lenis /kwā / emeghị

(Blench)

Mbeki Mwalimu bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri nke ahụmahụ ihe nkiri na TV

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Kenya n'afọ 2004 na Mbalamwezi Players tupu ọ banye na Festival Of Creative Arts (FCA) n'afọ 2007 ma kemgbe ahụ ọ ghọrọ aha ezinụlọ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye njikwa mmepụta, onye nduzi na onye mmepụta

A ma ya ama maka egwuregwu n'ime FCA na ọrụ ya dịka Zoe Mackenzie na 2018 Swahili telenovela Selina na Maisha Magic ma gosipụtakwa na ihe nkiri Sincerely Daisy, nke malitere na Netflix na Ọktoba 9, afọ 2020
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-egosi TV na Kenya Broadcasting Corporation ma kwado ihe ngosi Good Morning Kenya na The Ultimate Choir
O hiwere ụlọ ihe nkiri ya Back to Basics na 2018, na ebumnuche nke ịzụlite ndụ ihe nkiri na Kenya
Ọ bụkwa onye otu kọmitii na Kenya Actors Guild (KAG)
Ọ malitere Mbeki Mwalimu Initiative (TMI), ntọala ezubere iji mee ka ndụ ụmụaka nọ ná mkpa dị iche site n'inye ihe ndị bụ isi na ndụmọdụ
O ritere ihe nrite Best Theatre Director n'afọ 2018 - Sanaa Awards
Mbeku // (ege ntị) (site n'okwu Igbo maka mbe) bụ mbe aghụghọ na Igbo na Ndida Afrika folktales
N'otu akụkọ aetiological, nnụnụ na-akpọrọ Mbekwu gaa oriri n'eluigwe
Mgbe ọ na-eri nri niile, nnụnụ ahụ na'egbochi ya ịlaghachi n'ụwa, ọ dara, nke bụ otu mbe si nweta ụkpụrụ na mkpokoro ha
N'akụkọ ifo Igbo, Mbekwu (ma ọ bụ Mbe) mere ka nke akporo Na broker Grasshopper (Ukpana) kwenye inyere aka n'obi mwute ụgha maka ọnwụ nna nna ya, ka o wee nwee ike inweta nri n'aka ndị ikwu ya
Igurube ahụ raara ya nye ndị ikwu ya, ndị gburu ya
Mbelata Mgbasa Ihe Mgbapụta - Voluntary Emission Reductions ma ọ bụ Verified Emission Reduktions (VERs) bụ ụdị carbon offset gbanwere na ahịa afọ ofufo ma ọ bụ n'elu ahịa màkà ego carbon

Ka mbelata ndekọ ego na-arụ ọrụ, a ghaghị ịmepụta akụkụ kwesịrị ekwesị nke akụ sitere n'okike ka akụ ndị sitere n'okike wee nwee ike ịba uru na akụ na ụba ahịa

Ala mmiri mmiri bụ gburugburu ebe obibi nke na-ejupụtakarị n'elu ala ma ọ bụ mmiri dị n'ime ala iji kwado ahịhịa ndị a na-emekarị maka ọnọdụ ala jupụtara, dị ka cattails, bulrushes, maple red, osikapa ọhịa, blackberries, cranberries, na peat moss
N'ihi na ụfọdụ ala mmiri dị iche iche bara ụba na mineral na nri na-enye ọtụtụ uru nke ma ala na gburugburu mmiri ha nwere ụdị dị iche iche ma na-enye ihe ndabere dị iche iche maka eriri nri

Ala mmiri mmiri bụ ihe a na-apụghị imegharịgharịgharị n'oge mmadụ na n'akụkụ ụfọdụ enweghị ike imegharị ya ọzọ

Mmiri bụ ihe dị mkpa achọrọ iji dịrị ndụ kwa ụbọchị
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, mmiri enweela mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ọganihu na ọganihu mba na gburugburu ụwa
Mmiri dị n'ime ala bụ mmiri nke dị na mpaghara ndị jupụtara n'okpuru ala, a na-akpọ elu elu nke mpaghara ahụ jupụtara na tebụl mmiri
A na-ejide mmiri dị n'ime ala na oghere na mgbaji nke ihe ndị dị n'okpuru ala dị ka ájá, gravel na nkume ndị ọzọ, a na-akpọ ihe ndị a nkume aquifers
Mmiri dị n'ime ala nwere ike isi na ihe okwute pụta ma ọ bụ nwee ike ịgbapụta ya
Mmiri dị n'ime ala na-enye olulu mmiri na mmiri mmiri maka onwe, ọrụ ugbo, na nke ọha na eze na-eji ihe karịrị otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ndị bi n'ụwa eme ihe kwa ụbọchị maka mmiri ọṅụṅụ ha

A na-ewere mmiri dị n'ime ala dị ka ihe a na-apụghị imegharịgharịgharị n'ihi na ihe na-erughị pasentị isii nke mmiri gburugburu ụwa na-ejuputa ma na-emegharị ọhụrụ n'oge oge mmadụ nke afọ 50

Ndị mmadụ na-eji mmiri na-adịghị emezigharị nke dị ọtụtụ puku afọ, na mpaghara ndị dị ka Egypt, ha na-eji mmiri nke nwere ike ime ka ọ dị ọhụrụ otu nde afọ gara aga bụ nke a na-apụghị imeghari n'oge mmadụ
N'ime mmiri ala a na-eji arụ ọrụ ugbo 16 ruo 33% bụ nke anaghị emeghari
A na-eme atụmatụ na ebe ọ bụ na 1960s mmịpụta mmiri dị n'ime ala amụbaala okpukpu abụọ, nke mere ka mmiri dị n'ime ala mụbaa
N'ihi mmụba a nke mbelata, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke kacha agwụcha, iji mmiri dị n'ime ala maka ịgba mmiri aghọwo ihe na-agaghị ekwe omume ma ọ bụ na-akwụ ụgwọ

Iji mmiri dị n'ime ala emebiga ihe ókè, ndị agadi ma ọ bụ ndị na-eto eto, nwere ike iweda ọkwa mmiri dị n'okpuru ala ma kpoo mmiri iyi, nke nwere ike inwe mmetụta dị ukwuu na gburugburu ebe obibi n'elu
Mgbe a na-ewepụ mmiri dị n'ime ala dị mfe ịnwetaghachi nke ọma, nke a na-ahapụ ihe fọdụrụ na àgwà mmiri dị ala
Nke a bụ n'otu akụkụ site na mwepu sitere n'elu ala, na-ekpuchi akwa ma ọ bụ mmiri mmiri dị n'akụkụ nke nwere saline ma ọ bụ mmiri emetọru
Gburugburu ụwa oke mbelata mmiri dị n'ime ala site na nchekwa nwere ike buru oke nke nwere ike bụrụ ihe na-atụnye ụtụ na ịrị elu oke osimiri
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọha mmadụ na-anabata mbelata akụrụngwa mmiri site n'ịgbanwe ebumnobi njikwa site na ọnọdụ na imepụta ngwa ọhụrụ iji kwalite nchekwa na mbugharị ngwa ahịa dị ugbu a

Enwere echiche abụọ dị iche iche maka mbelata mmiri dị n'ime ala, nke mbụ bụ na a na-ahụta mbelata n'ụzọ nkịtị na naanị dị ka mbelata oke mmiri na mpaghara juputara, n'agbanyeghị echiche ịdị mma mmiri
Echiche nke abụọ na-ele mbelata dị ka mbelata oke mmiri dị n'ime ala dị ọhụrụ na nchekwa
Ịkwalite akụrụngwa nwere ike ịpụta ịkwalite ogo mmiri ma ọ bụ ịba ụba nke mmiri
Enwere ike imeri mmebi n'ihi nlebara anya dị mma site na ọgwụgwọ, ebe enwere ike ibelata oke mbelata metric naanị site na ibelata mwepu ma ọ bụ ịba ụba nchaji
Ntunye ihe eji arụ ọrụ nke oke mmiri ozuzo na mmiri mkpofu nke ime obodo emela nke ọma weghaghachi mbelata mmiri dị n'ime ala
N'ọdịnihu, a ga-eji teknụzụ ntinye na nchacha mma eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe iji mee ka njide nke mmiri na-asọpụta na mmiri na-ekpofu ihe

Ndị nchọpụta bụ ndị mepụtara mmelite nke akụkọ Club of Rome's Limits to Growth na-achọpụta na ọtụtụ ndị na-agọnahụ ịdị adị nke nsogbu ụkọ, gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Nke a nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'ịchọghị ịgbanwe usoro oriri nke onwe ya ma ọ bụ ikesa akụrụngwa sitere n'okike dị ụkọ karịa, ma ọ bụ n'usoro nchekwa nke mmụọ
Ụkọ ihe onwunwe na-ebute nsogbu omume bụ isi gbasara nkesa na oke nke akụ ndị sitere n'okike
Asọmpi pụtara na ndị kachasị elu na-enweta ọtụtụ ihe onwunwe, nke na-apụtakarị West mepere emepe

Nsogbu nke omume bụ, n'ihi akụkọ ihe mere eme dị otú ahụ, nke mere ka mba dị iche iche nwee ọganihu dị iche iche na asọmpi, enwere ike ịtụle asọmpi iji kesaa ihe onwunwe n'ụzọ ziri ezi na nke ziri ezi?
