Hurry Down Sunshine bụ akwụkwọ mere emencheta kachasị re na afọ 2008 nke onye edemede Michael Greenberg
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-akọ akụkọ maka nwa ya nwanyị na ọgụ ọ lụrụ n'ọrịa isi mgbaka
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwetara nlebara anya maka ụdị edemede ya na ọdịnaya ọkpụkpọ eji dee ya

Na The New York Times, onye nyocha Rachel Donadio lekwasịrị anya na nlebara anya Greenberg maka obodo New York City, o dere na ọrụ ahụ 'jupụtara ụdị ihe odide ndị dị ụkọ karị n'obodo ebe ezigbo kooks enweghị ike ibi'

Onye na-enyocha ọdịbendị na akwụkwọ nke aha ya bụ Jacob Appel toro akwụkwọ ncheta ahụ 'otu n'ime ọrụ ndị a dị oke ụkọ nke edemede na-arụ ọrụ ọma ma akụkọ ịhụnanya ma ebubo mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọ bụghị akụkụ abụọ metụtara ike siri egwu nke ọzọ
Meeza (ميزة) bụ onye na-enye usoro ịkwụ ụgwọ eletrọniki nke Ijiptu maka azụmahịa ụlọ n'ime Ijipt
Ọ bu Gọọmentị Ijiptu na-akwado ya ma bụrụ nke ụlọ akụ etiti Ijiptu na ụlọ ọrụ mba Ijiptu (EBC) n' achịkwa
Meeza na-enye ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ eletrọniki yiri MasterCard na Visa mana enwere ike iji ya mee ihe naanị n'ime Ijiptu
Aha Meeza pụtara 'ọganihu' n'asụsụ Arabic nke Ijiptu
E guzobere Meeza na mbido 2019, iji nye atụmatụ ịkwụ ụgwọ mba na-akwado otu ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị ego na Egypt
Ka ọ n' erule ngwụcha afọ 2019, Meeza enyewo ihe dị ka kaadị ịkwụ ụgwọ nde anọ maka iji ya mee ihe n'ime netwọk Ijiptu
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, Meeza malitere inye ndị Ijiptu kaadị a kwụrụ ụgwọ n'efu, nke enwere ike iji ya mee ihe n'ógbè ma enweghị ike iji ya na mpụga Ijiptu
Meeza na-emepụta kaadị ụlọ akụ na ngwa mkpanaka maka azụmahịa mpaghara n'ime Ijiptu
A na-anabata kaadị ịkwụ ụgwọ Meeza na ụlọ ahịa ahịa na ụlọ ọrụ Gọọmentị gafee Egypt, na mgbakwunye na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ e-commerce nke Ijiptu n'ịntanetị
Meeza na-enye ma kaadị ịkwụ ụgwọ a kwụrụ ụgwọ na kaadị debit aka ụntụ ụlọ akụ

Kaadị ndị a na-enye site na ọtụtụ nnukwu ụlọ akụ dị na Egypt dị ka National Bank of Egypt (NBE), Banque Misr, Alex Bank, Banque du Caire, Commercial International Bank (CIB), na ụlọ akụ ndị ọzọ nke Ijiptu
Ngwaahịa kaadị Meeza na agụnyekwa kaadị na-enweghị kọntaktị maka ebe a na-ere ahịa na-akwado ha
Mefele bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon
Asụsụ ndị a bụ Mefele, Muhura, Serak, na Shugule
Blench (2006) weere Shugule (Shügule) dị ka asụsụ dị iche
Ndị na-asụ asụsụ Mefele (ihe karịrị 10,000 ndị na-asụrụ ya) na-esokarị ndị Mafa site na gọọmentị Cameroon
Otú ọ dị, ha onwe ha anaghị akpọ onwe ha Mafa, Mafa na-akpọkarị ha dị ka Bé Love (ọ bụ akara dị iche iche), nke a na-ekwukarị n'akwụkwọ dị ka Bou Love
E kewara mpaghara Mefele ụzọ abụọ nke obodo Mokolo kewapụrụ, nke ndị Mafa na-achị
Ndị Mefele bi n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke obodo Mokolo (mpaghara Mokolo, ngalaba nke Mayo-Tsanaga, Far North Region)
Mpaghara Mefele buru ibu dị na ndịda na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ yana gụnyere obodo nta nke Sirak na Mouhour
Mpaghara Mefele pere mpe, 10 km n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ, gụnyere obodo nta nke Sougoulé
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị Mefele (ma eleghị anya ụmụaka ruo n'ókè dị nta) na-aghọta ma na-asụ Mafa, ya mere a na-asụkarị asụsụ abụọ na Mafa
Meg Otanwa (amuru Febụwarị 14) bụ onye omere Naijiria na onye bụbu onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ
O kwuru na asụsụ na-amasi ya ma na-asụ asụsụ ise nke ọma
O mere Nollywood mpụta mbụ ya n'afọ 2011 na ihe nkiri a, I will take my chances wee gosi na fim dịka October 1 (2018), Ojuju (2014), Kpians The Feast of Souls (2014) na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ Nọvemba 2006 onye a ma ama mkpuchiri akwụkwọ Zen Magazine
Otanwa sitere na mpaghara na-asụ asụsụ Idoma nke Benue State, Nigeria, ọ toro na Lagos na ebe ndị ozo
O sitere na ezinụlọ polyglot ma na-asụ ihe dị ka asụsụ ise gụnyere Bekee, Yoruba, French, Hausa, asụsụ ala nna ya bụ Idoma na ụfọdụ Spanish

Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na asụsụ bekee, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta masta na Human Resources Management na TIME University, Tunis, Tunisia na emesia, maka Master of Business Administration
nzere na Mahadum Jean Moulin, Lyon, France

N'ịbụ onye na-arụ ọrụ ruo ogologo oge na African Development Bank, Tunis, Tunisia, Otanwa gbara arụkwaghịm wee malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri, na-eme ya Nollywood mpụta mbụ na 2011, egosi ya na ihe nkiri egba egwu nke Emem Isong, I'll Take my Chance
N'afọ 2014, ọ gbara n'ime ihe nkiri Kunle Afolayan, October 1 ; n'usoro ihe nkiri Bodunrin Sasore, Before 30, nke na-egosi 'Aisha'; na ihe nkiri Charles Novia, Atlanta
Egosiputara ya na telenovela 2016 Africa Magic 's mpụta mbụ, Nollywood's Hush, dị ka 'Koko Ogunbiade'
Ndị ọzọ egosikwara bụ Richard Mofe-Damijo, Thelma Okoduwa na Rotimi Adelegan

A họpụtara ya na 2017 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ụdị ihe nkiri na ihe nrite AMVCA maka usoro izizi MNET, nke ọ meriri, maka ọrụ ya na telenovela thriller, Hush
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nọkwa na kapeeti uhie nke mmemme 2018
N'ime ihe nkiri 2018 nke Tosin Igho akpọrọ, The Eve, a gosiri ya dịka 'Yewande', na-eso ụmụ nwanyị na nwoke na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Beverly Naya, Hauwa Allhabura, John Okafor na ndị ọzọ
N'ime ihe nkiri 2020, For Maria Ebun Pataki, nke Damilola Orimogunje duziri, emere ya dika 'Derin'
E gosipụtara ya dị ka 'Angela' na Dimeji Ajibola's sci-fi thriller, Ratnik, ewepụtara ya Disemba 1, 2020 gosikwara Osas Ighodaro, Karibi Fubara, Paul Utomi na ndị ọzọ

Ebubennem Megalyn Ann Echikunwoke (/ˈmɛɡəlɪn ɛˌtʃɪkʊnˈwoʊkeɪ/ MEG-ə-lin eh-CHIK-uun-WOH-kay; amụrụ na Mee 28, 1983), nke a makwaara dị ka Megalyn EK, bụ onye Amerika na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara karịsịa maka ọrụ ya na telivishọn na ihe nkiri

A mụrụ ya na Spokane, Washington, a chọpụtara ya mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri maka ụlọ akwụkwọ nka, ọ malitekwara ịrụ ọrụ ọkachamara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, na-apụta n'otu ihe omume nke The Steve Harvey Show
N'agbata afọ 2001 na afọ 2002, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Nicole Palmer, nwa nwanyi nke David Palmer, na usoro Fox 24, nke ọrụ ndị ọbịa sochiri na ER na Buffy the Vampire Slayer
N'agbata afọ 2004 na afọ 2005, ọ gosipụtara Angie Barnett, nwanne Steven Hyde, na sitcom That '70s Show
N'afọ 2006, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ndu na usoro The 4400 nke gara ruo n'afọ 2007, na-esote ọrụ ugboro ugboro na 90210 na House of Lies
Ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na mbido afọ 2010 gụnyere Whit Stillman's Damsels in Distress (2011), na ihe omume na-esote A Good Day to Die Hard (2013)
N'afọ 2016, o gosiputara Mari McCabe / Vixen na Arrowverse
N'afọ sochirinụ, o nwere ọrụ nkwado na CHiPs (2017), nke na-esote ya bụ An Actor Prepares (2018)
Na-esote, ọ sonyeere na ihe nkiri Night School (2018)
Na ngwụcha afọ 2018, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na New York na mmepụta nke Apologia na Broadway
A mụrụ Ebubennem Megalyn Ann Echikunwoke na Spokane, Washington na Mark Onigwe Versato Echikunvoke, nna Igbo Naijirịa, na Anita Laurie
Nna ya, onye kwagara na United States, bụ onye lanarịrị Agha Obodo Naijirịa, n'oge ọ nwere mmerụ ahụ égbè nke mere ka ọ butere ịba ọcha n'anya B
Mgbe Echikunwoke dị afọ anọ, nna ya, onye na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu na Spokane, nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa imeju, nke sitere na nsogbu ahụike ya metụtara agha
Nne ya kwagara ezinụlọ ya na Navajo Nation, ebe ọ zụlitere Echikunwoke na ụmụnne ya na obodo na-enweghị ụlọ ọrụ nke Chinle, Arizona
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, a chọpụtara Echikunwoke mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na mmepụta ihe nkiri na ogige oge okpomọkụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ nka
Ọrụ mbụ Echikunwoke gosiputara bụ onye ọbịa na The Steve Harvey Show na 1998

N'afọ sochirinụ, o nwere ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Julie Dash's Funny Valentines N'afọ 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkirí MTV Spyder Games dị ka Cherish Pardee, onye na-agụ egwú n'ụlọ kọfị, nke gbara n'afọ ahụ
O mechara rụọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na oge mbu nke 24 (2001 Dz 2002) dị ka nwa nwanyị David Palmer bụ Nicole
Na mbido afọ 2003, ọ pụtara dị ka Danika na-usoro ihe nkiri Like Family, ma bụrụ onye ọbịa na Buffy the Vampire Slayer, na ihe omume 'The Killer in Me' (2003)
Nke a sochiri ya na ọrụ ọbịa na Veronica Mars na 2004
N'agbata afọ 2004 na 2005, ọ pụtara na Fox's That '70s Show dị ka nwanne Steven Hyde, Angie Barnett
N'afọ 2006, a tụbara ya dị ka usoro na-aga n'ihu na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn akụkọ sayensị The 4400 dị ka ụdị okenye nke Isabelle Tyler dị omimi
Ọ hapụrụ ihe ngosi ahụ na 2007
Site na 2008 ruo 2009, ọ pụtara na oge 7 nke CSI Miami dị ka onye nyocha ahụike ọhụrú Dr
Tara Price
O nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro na TNT's Raising the Bar (2008ī2009) dị ka mmasị ịhụnanya nke onye ọka iwu Marcus McGrath, nke J
August Richards mere
N'afọ 2008, ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-agụ egwu na Leonard Chess biopic Who Do You Love? N'afọ 2011, ọ mere Holly na oge nke anọ nke 90210, ma mesịa pụta na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Damsels in Distress
O mere April na Showtime's House of Lies (2012) na Riley Parker na ihe nkịrị iwu nke Made in Jersey (nakwa 2012) na CBS
N'afọ 2014, o sonyere na usoro ihe nkiri Mind Games na ABC
N'afọ 2016, Echikunwoke pụtara na CW's Arrow dị ka DC Comics superhero Mari McCabe / Vixen maka otu ihe omume, ma kwupụta agwa ahụ na CW Seed animated series Vixen
N'ihi nkwa ndị gara aga, ọ nọghị na ya igwu egwu na Legends of Tomorrow, nke mere ka ewebata Vixen ọhụrụ nke Maisie Richardson-Sellers, nne nne nke Echikunwoke
Echikunwoke nwere ọrụ nkwado na Dax Shepard's CHiPs (2017), nke ihe ọchị An Actor Prepares (2018) sochiri
N'afọ ahụ, o nwere ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri Night School, nke nwetara ihe karịrị $ 100 nde
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ Claire na mmepụta nke Apologia maka Roundabout Theatre Company nke malitere n'October 16, 2018, ruo December 16, 2018

N'afọ 2019, o nwere ọrụ nkwado na Late Night O mechara nwee ọrụ dị mkpa na Almost Family, usoro ihe nkiri Fox nke na-akọ akụkọ ụmụ nwanyị atọ na-amụta na ha bụ ụmụnne mgbe dọkịta na-ahụ maka ọmụmụ a ma ama kpughere na o jirila sperm nke ya mee ihe karịa 100 ụmụ na ndị ọrịa ya
A kagbuola ya mgbe otu oge gachara
N'afọ 2007, Echikunwoke, Justin Long, Olivia Wilde na Kal Penn mere mkpọsa maka onye a họpụtara dịka onye isi ala nke Democratic Barack Obama n'afọ 2008

Ọ gụnyere njem nleta n'oge oyi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji na ụlọ mmanya na Iowa, nke a maara dị ka All-Actor All-Iowa All-Star Voter Education Tour, iji debanye aha ndị ọhụrụ na-eme ntụli aka na kọleji tupu ntuli aka
Nwa nwanne nne Echikunwoke bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Annette Echikunvoke
Megan Hall bụ onye odee South Africa
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1972 ma biri na Cape Town, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta BA Honors na Mahadum Cape Town, na-eso akara mmụta mahadum na bekee na Latin
Mpempe abụ mbụ ya, Nwa nke Anọ, (Akwụkwọ Modjaji, 2007) nwetara ihe nrite Ingrid Jonker maka 2008
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ bụ onye njikwa mbipụta maka akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu na akwụkwọ na Oxford University Press, mana hapụrụ na 2018 ma na-enwere onwe ya ugbu a
Megan Hall bụ onye odee South Africa
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1972 ma biri na Cape Town, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta BA Honors na Mahadum Cape Town, na-eso akara mmụta mahadum na bekee na Latin
Mpempe abụ mbụ ya, Nwa nke Anọ, (Akwụkwọ Modjaji, 2007) nwetara ihe nrite Ingrid Jonker maka 2008
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ bụ onye njikwa mbipụta maka akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu na akwụkwọ na Oxford University Press, mana hapụrụ na 2018 ma na-enwere onwe ya ugbu a
Megan Burns (née Sneddon; amụrụ n'abalị itoolu nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1985) bụ onye Scotland na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ Motherwell na Premier League ụmụ nwanyị Scotland
Sneddon gbara bọọlụ nke mbụ ya na Scotland mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii ma nwee egwuregwu otu narị na iri atọ nke ndị otu mba
Sneddon nọrọ afọ ise na Kilmarnock,ma nwee mmeri okpukpu atọ n'afọ 2002 mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na isii
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2006, ọ sonyeere Glasgow City
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, e gosipụtara mpụtara ya ya na klọb ahụ ka ọrụru ugboro otu narị na na mmeri goolu anọ asatara abụọ na megide ndị Spartan
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2011, a kpọrọ Sneddon n'ime ndị otu Scotland's Cyprus Cup, nke edepụtara dị ka onye egwuregwu Liverpool
O kpebiri ịhapụ Glasgow City mgbe ọ na-enweghị afọ ojuju na klọb ahụ
Sneddon gbara mpụtara nke mbụ ya nke klọb FA WSL na mmeri enyi na enyi na Hibernian
Otú ọ dị, na mbido oge bekee Sneddon bịanyere aka na Celtic
O kwuru ihe kpatara ya tinyere ndụmọdụ nke onye nkuzi Scotland bụ Anna Signeul maka mkpebi ahụ
Sneddon bịanyere aka na Rangers na ọnwa Jenụwarị 2013
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, Sneddon sooro ọtụtụ ndị otu Scotland ya site n'ịbịanye aka na Motherwell nwere ịnụ ọkụ n'obi
O kwuru banyere ịbịanye aka ya 'Obi dị m ụtọ na Motherwell enyewo m ohere ịmalite ọrụ m
Anọ m na-atụ anya ịlaghachi n'ámá egwuregwu ebe ọ bụ na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka m kụọ bọọlụ kemgbe Nọvemba
Ọ ga-adịkwa mma igwu egwu n'akụkụ ụfọdụ ihu ama
Ọ bịanyere aka na Motherwell ọzọ n'afo 2018
Sneddon gbara egwuregwu mbụ ya na Scotland ka oforo otu ụbọchị tupu afọ iri na asaa ya, na mmeri goolu asatọ asatara abụọ nke United States na mba Columbus, Ohio
A họpụtara Sneddon maka ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Scotland nọ n'ihi ndị n'erubeghi afọ iri abụọ na anọ ka ha gbaa bọọlụ na asọmpi Nordic n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008
Ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu ahụ na asọmpi ahụ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2011, Sneddon bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu Celtic anọ a bịakwutere maka igba egwuregwu bọọlụ nyee otu GB na Olympics afọ 2012

Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ mba ụwa ya mgbe Scotland erughi n'ogo ndị tozuru na asọmpi iko mba uwa nke FIFA kwadoro nke afọ 2015 akpọrọ 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup, na nkatọ ọkatoro n'ihu ọha usoro Anna Signeul ma na-ekwu maka ihe isi ike ndị egwuregwu nwere nkwa ịgba bọọlụ dị iche iche maka klọb na mba n'elu ọrụ na-abụghị egwuregwu ahụ
Megan Laura Walsh (amụrụ 12 Nọvemba 1994) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ ọkachamara na-egwu dị ka onye na- eche nche maka Brighton & Hove Albion nke FA Women's Super League na Republic of Ireland
Walsh bụ ngwaahịa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ Aston Villa
Ọ gbara mba ụwa maka England na ọkwa ntorobịa niile ruo n'okpuru-23 mana kwuputara maka Republic of Ireland na Nọvemba 2021, onye tozuru oke site na nna nna ya
N'ịgbaso ọdịda nke Notts County na mmiri 2017, Walsh bịanyere aka na Yeovil Town maka ndị ọzọ FA WSL Spring Series
Na Julaị 2019, na-eso mwepu Yeovil na FA Women's National League South, Walsh nọgidere na WSL mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na Brighton & Hove Albion
Walsh nọchitere anya Great Britain na 2017 Summer Universiade

Mgbe ọ nọchitere anya England na ọkwa ntorobịa n'etiti 2010-2020, a mara ọkwa na Walsh agbanweela nkwado mba ụwa na Ireland, tozuru oke site na nna nna ya mụrụ Wexford, na-enwetaghị ọkpụkpọ oku maka otu ndị isi England
Akpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị Ireland megide Slovakia na Giorgia
Walsh nwetara okpu mbụ ya maka Ireland na 19 February 2022 na mmeri 1-0 Russia meriri na iko Pinatar 2022
Àtụ Brighton & Hove Albion WFC
squad
Meganne Young (amụrụ na 22 Machị 1990) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi sị South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na The Kissing Booth franchise na usoro Starz Black Sails
A mụrụ Young na Cape Town nye nna South Africa na nne Australia
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na-agagharị, na-arụ ọrụ na Naịjirịa, Switzerland, na Sri Lanka ebe ọ gara International Baccalaureate na Overseas School nke Colombo

Ọ gara n'ihu na Advanced Diploma in Acting na CityVarsity Cape Town campus, na-emesị na 2011, tupu ọ gaa gụọ akwụkwọ na Guildford School of Acting na England dị ka onye na-amụ ihe n'ebe dị anya na 2014
Young malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, na-enweta ihe nrite 48 Hour Film na Fleur du Cap Theatre Award maka ọrụ ya
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Britain bụ Eye in the Sky
Ọ nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka Abigail Ashe na usoro Starz Black Sails O mekwara ka ndị ọbịa pụta na oge nke iri na anọ nke Supernatural na Legends of Tomorrow
N'afọ 2018, ọ nwetara ọrụ dịka Rachel na ihe nkiri Netflix mbụ The Kissing Booth Young gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ, The Kissing Booth 2 (2020) na The Kissing Boot 3 (2021)
Megaphorb bụ mpaghara nwere obodo mgbọrọgwụ dị ogologo, nke na-atọ ụtọ, nke na'oge niile
Obodo osisi na-enye ala mkpuchi ma na-adịkarị n'akụkụ ebe osisi ma ọ bụ ọhịa ma ọ bụ ala nke e kpochapụrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya
Ụdị ahịhịa a na-apụtakwa n'akụkụ ebe nsogbu dị ka n'akụkụ iyi ma ọ bụ osimiri
A na-ahụkarị mpaghara osisi ndị a n'ebe ugwu
Humpback whale ( Megaptera novaeangliae ) bụ ụdị anụ whale baleen
Ọ bụ rorqual ; onye otu ezinụlọ Balaenopteridae
Udako gbasara Azu Mmiri
Mathurin Jacques Brisson bu ụzọ chọpụta humpback dị ka baleine de la Nouvelle Angleterre na Regnum Animale nke 1756
Udaka gbasara Azu no na mmiriÀtụ Cladogram
Megersa bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere

Meghann Kay Burke (amụrụ n'October 11, 1980) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye isi nchịkwa nke National Women's Soccer League Players Association (NWSLPA), òtù ọrụ maka ndị egwuregwu na NWSL, ngalaba kachasị elu nke bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na United States
Burke duuru NWSLPA gaa na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta mbụ ya na 2022
Burke bụkwa onye egwuregwu bọọlụ lara ezumike nká na onye nkuzi
Dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ, Burke bụ onye na-edebe goolu maka ndị otu na Women's Professional Soccer (WPS), ọ bụkwa onye ọkpịsị aka na onye nkuzi maka klọb Asheville City SC nke Women's Premier Soccer League
Burke gara Mehlville High School ma bụrụ onye a kpọrọ Metro Goalkeeper of the Year na 1998
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu United States U16 na 1996-97
N'ime afọ anọ na Mahadum Saint Louis, Burke bụ onye mbido otu mbụ ma kpọọ aha ya na ndị otu dị iche iche
Ọ nwetakwara aha njirimara 'Burkeinator' ma kwupụta na ọ bụ onye egwuregwu nke afọ iri nke mahadum
Mgbe afọ 2000 gasịrị, Burke gosipụtara maka ọtụtụ ndị otu W-League na WPSL
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Bristol Rovers na 2004-05, na-enyere klọb ndị England aka iru ọkara ikpeazụ nke FA Women's Cup
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na SLU, Carolina Courage nke WUSA dere Burke
Ọ laghachiri n'ọkwa ọkachamara dị ka onye na-emepe emepe na Chicago Red Stars of Women's Professional Soccer (WPS) na 2010 tupu ọ banye Sky Blue FC dị ka onye nnọchi anya n'efu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2010
Burke gụrụ iwu ọrụ mgbe ọ na-egwu na WPS
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na dọkịta iwu na Northeastern University School of Law
N'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ ka na-egwu na WPS, Burke nyere aka ịhazi WPS Players Union iji nọchite anya ndị egwuregwu n'okpuru usoro nchịkwa ọhụrụ nke league
Burke rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Brazil & Burke na Asheville, North Carolina, dị ka onye na-agbachitere mpụ na onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ site na 2011 ruo 2021
NWSL Players Association (NWSLPA) were Burke n'ọrụ dị ka kansụl ya n'ozuzu ya na Mee 2017 na ntọala njikọ ahụ
Burke bụ onye otu nke onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ahụ bụ Yael Averbuch na 2010 mgbe ọ nọ na Sky Blue FC
Njikọ ahụ họpụtara Burke dịka onye isi ọrụ ya na Nọvemba 2020
N'April 1, 2022, NWSLPA were Burke n'ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa oge niile, na-anọchi Brooke Elby
Na June 2022, ndị otu AFL-CIO họpụtara Burke ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche
NWSLPA malitere mkparịta ụka na NWSL maka nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta mbụ ya (CBA) na Machị 2021
Njikọ na league kwadoro nkwekọrịta ahụ na Jenụwarị 31, 2022, ihe na-erughị otu ụbọchị tupu a na-atụ anya ka ndị egwuregwu kọọrọ klọb maka oge mbido 2022
Nkwekọrịta ahụ nyere mmelite na ụgwọ ọrụ na uru ndị ọkpụkpọ, ụlọ ọrụ, ezumike nne na nna na nke uche, na nzọụkwụ mbụ maka ụlọ ọrụ n'efu maka ndị egwuregwu ogologo oge

Burke kwuru na njikọ ahụ na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị otu egwuregwu nke egwuregwu ndị ọzọ ọkachamara iji nyere aka dee CBA, ọkachasị Women's National Basketball Players Association, ma rụọkwa ọrụ iji mee ka NWSL CBA pụta ìhè
CBA ọhụrụ ahụ nyere ndị egwuregwu oge zuru oke nke nkwekọrịta ha na-agwụ na August 26, 2022, nhọrọ ịmalite mkparịta ụka na klọb dị ka ndị nweere onwe ha
Otú ọ dị, league kọwara ndokwa a iji wepu ndị egwuregwu nwere nkwekọrịta ha nwere nhọrọ ịgbatị, ọbụlagodi na klọb ahụ ekpebieghị ma ọ ga-eme nhọrọ ma ọ bụ gwa onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ mkpebi ọ bụla ịgbatị
Nkọwa nke league ga-egbu oge mkparịta ụka ndị egwuregwu ahụ ruo na Nọvemba 15, oge a kara aka maka klọb iji mee nhọrọ
NWSLPA ekwenyeghị n'aha ndị egwuregwu 22 metụtara ndị tụrụ anya ịmalite mkparịta ụka n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ

Burke na onye isi oche NWSLPA Tori Huster rụkọtara ọrụ iji rụrịta ụka na nkọwa nke league site na onye nnọchiteanya nwere onwe ya dịka usoro CBA si dị, na October 17, 2022, onye nnọchite anya ahụ kpebiri na ọ kwadoro NWSLPA ma nye 22 n'ime ndị egwuregwu ahụ ọrụ n'efu
Burke na onye isi NWSL Jessica Berman toro iji usoro ikpe, nke CBA gbakwunyere, iji dozie esemokwu ahụ
N'ọnwa Julaị 2021, Burke dọrọ onye kọmishọna NSL n'oge ahụ bụ Lisa Baird aka na ntị na ndị egwuregwu ga-etinye mkpesa siri ike megide onye isi nchịkwa North Carolina Courage bụ Paul Riley

Otu mkpesa e tinyere na league n'otu ọnwa ahụ kwuru na Riley na-ekwurịta banyere ịdị arọ nke ndị egwuregwu n'ụzọ na-ekwesịghị ekwesị ma chọọ ka onye ọkpụkpọ zitere ya nkọwa gbasara ịdị arọ ya kwa ụbọchị ruo ọnwa abụọ
Na Septemba 2021, The Athletic bipụtara akụkọ na-akọwapụta ebubo nke mmetọ mmekọahụ nke ndị egwuregwu na omume ọjọọ nke Riley na-agafe ọtụtụ afọ na gafee NWSL na WPS
Ọ kọwakwara na NWSL leghaara ndị egwuregwu kọrọ banyere nsogbu ndị ahụ anya na 2015
Burke gwara Baird okwu ọzọ banyere akụkọ ahụ tupu Baird agba arụkwaghịm n'October 1, 2021
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2021, Burke tụrụ aro na arụkwaghịm Baird emeghị ka nsogbu ndị metụtara usoro ahụ dugara na mmetọ ahụ
Burke na NWSL rụkọtara ọrụ iji malite nyocha jikọrọ aka na akụkọ banyere mmetọ na omume ọjọọ
Njikọ na njikọ nke ọ bụla goro ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu ka ha rụọ ọrụ dị ka ndị nyocha onwe ha

Nnyocha jikọrọ aka ahụ kọrọ nsonaazụ ya na Disemba 2022, nke dugara na mmachibido iwu na-adịgide adịgide nke ndị nkuzi mbụ Riley, Richie Burke, Rory Dames, na Christy Holly, ma kpughee ọtụtụ ihe omume ọjọọ n'ọtụtụ n'ime ndị otu league
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2022, e gosipụtara Burke na ihe ngosi E 60, Truth Be Told, banyere ihe ihere mmegbu ahụ
N'ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ tụrụ aro na ụkpụrụ ọkachamara dị ala nke league n'afọ ndị mbụ ya nyere aka n'imegbu ahụ
Burke bụ onye nwe Asheville City SC ma nyere aka mepụta otu egwuregwu Premier Soccer League nke ụmụ nwanyị na Stacey Enos na Lydia Vandenbergh
Burke lụrụ Jasmine Beach-Ferrara, onye kọmishọna Buncombe County na onye isi nchịkwa nke otu nkwado LGBT Campaign for Southern Equality

Burke jere ozi dị ka onye isi ndụmọdụ maka Campaign for Southern Equality ma soro dee akwụkwọ brief nke nzukọ ahụ na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke United States na ikpe alụmdi na nwunye nwoke na nwoke Obergefell v
Hodges
Mehdi Hmili, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Tunisia
A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye nduzi nke obere ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Thala My Love, The Night of Badr na Li-La
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Tunis, Tunisia
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na ntụziaka na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Manouba dị na Tunis, ọ kwagara France maka ọmụmụ ọzọ
N'oge ndụ France, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Paris Film School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ duziri ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya X-Moment n'afọ 2009 na Li-La n'afọ 2011
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndị nkatọ gasịrị, ọ duziri obere oge nke abụọ ya The Night Of Badr, ihe nkiri ọzọ ojii na ọcha banyere onye na-ede uri nwoke na nwoke
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ọnwa Machị 2012
N'afọ 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke obere ihe nkiri Offside
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2016, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ Thala Mon Amour
E mechara wepụta ihe nkiri ahụ na ngwụcha afọ 2014 na France na Tunisia
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye na-ede uri a ma ama na Tunisia ebe o dere uri megide ọchịchị Ben Ali
O mekwara ihe nkiri 16mm abụọ, Instant Guilty na The Graduate
Meherzia Labidi Maïza (Arabic; 17 Disemba 1963 22 Jenụwarị 2021) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia na onye ntụgharị na onye ntụziaka
Ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche mbụ nke Nzukọ Iwu nke Tunisia
TMaïza bụ nwanyị kachasị elu a họpụtara na Middle East
Ọ dị mpako inye aka tinye nkwekọrịta iji chebe ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'ime iwu Arab Spring nke Tunisia
N'afọ 2004, Labidi-Maïza so dee Abraham, teta, ha ghọrọ ndị isi mgbaka! (Abraham, Wake Up
Ha na-agba ara) na Laurent Klein
O nyere nkuzi banyere agụmakwụkwọ na obodo ọdịbendị dị iche iche, ụmụ nwanyị, okpukpe na ọha mmadụ
Site na 2006, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Global Women of Faith Network
N'afọ 2009, Labidi-Maïza bụ onye otu European Council of religious leaders
Ọ bịara mara mba ụwa mgbe ọ kwadoro ọnọdụ dị nro karịa iyi niqab
Nke a bụ n'oge arụmụka French nke bu n'uche igbochi iyi ya na France
N'afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nsọpụrụ nke Religions for Peace, otu NGO dị na New York nke a nabatara na UN
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2011, a họpụtara Labidi-Maïza ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Ennahda Movement maka ndị Tunisia bi na mba ọzọ
O kwuru na ọ ritere uru site na nkwekọrịta nke chọrọ ka onye ọ bụla ọzọ bụrụ nwanyị
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, ọ ghọrọ osote onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ mgbe ọ natara 142 n'ime votu 214
N'afọ 2012, a kọwara Labidi-Maïza dị ka 'nwaanyị kachasị elu a họpụtara na Middle East'
Labidi-Maïza haziri arụmụka nke mụrụ iwu ọhụrụ nke Tunisia
Ọ dị mpako ịhụ na e tinyere ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Nkeji edemede 45 nke iwu
Huffington Post kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị asatọ 'mere ka ụwa bụrụ ebe ka mma' n'afọ 2014
Iwu Arab Spring nwere ahịrịokwu ndị na-akwado ya enweghị mmasị mana o kwuru, 'Ọ dị ka ịmụ nwa ihe mgbu, mana n'ikpeazụ onye ọ bụla nwere obi ụtọ mgbe nwatakịrị ahụ rutere'
Labidi-Maïza bụ nwa amaala France na Tunisia, nwa nwanyị nke nna nwere ụmụ asatọ gwara ha na ha niile ga-agụsị akwụkwọ tupu ha enwee ike ịtụle alụmdi na nwunye
Mba abụọ ya bụ isiokwu nke esemokwu nye ndị nkatọ ya
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na otu nwa nwoke
A họpụtara Labidi-Maïza ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndị mmadụ na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Tunisia n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014, n'oge a na mpaghara nke abụọ nke Nabeul na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Tunisia
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise ọ ka bụ onye otu gọọmentị Tunisia ma duzie kọmitii ya maka ụmụ nwanyị, ezinụlọ, ụmụaka na ndị agadi
A kọrọ na Labidi-Maïza butere COVID-19 na ngwụcha afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri abụọ ma n'etiti ọnwa Nọvemba ọ kwagara France iji nweta ọgwụgwọ
Ahụike ya kara njọ site na mbido Disemba wee nwụọ n'isi ụtụtụ nke 22 Jenụwarị 2021
Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na Tunisia, Sihem Badi kwuru na ọ naghị ata ahụhụ COVID-19
E weghachiri ozu Labidi-Maïza na Tunisia na 23 Jenụwarị ma lie ya na ili ozu Grombalia, Nabeul na 24 Jenụwarụ
Meiring bụ aha nke nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Meiya Tireira (amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1986) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ basketball maka Valencia Basket na Spanish Women's League
Onye otu egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị Mali, Tireira sonyere na egwuregwu ise niile nke Mali na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, na-enweta ngụkọta nke akara 16 ma na-ejide 19 rebounds
Meji Alabi (a mụrụ na 13 Disemba n'afọ 1988) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye na-ese foto na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ bụ onye nduzi ma rụọ ọrụ na Beyonce, Burna Boy, Wizkid, Davido, Tiwa Savage, Popcaan, Goldlink, Koffee na Nasty C
A mụrụ ya na Disemba 13, 1988, na London, Meji nọrọ ọtụtụ oge nwata ya na nna ya na-agagharị mgbe nne na nna ya kewara na 1989
Ọ na-agagharị n'etiti London, Bahamas, na Texas, USA
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti Spring Forest na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Stratford na Houston, Texas
Meji Alabi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke West London na klas mbụ summa cum laude distinction na ndekọ ego na ego, ma nwekwa nzere ikikere nke Nursing na St
Phillips College na San Antonio, Texas
N'afọ 2014, Meji Alabi na Jimi Adesanya hiwere JM Films
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Priorgold Pictures nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke dị na Lagos Naijiria, nke e kere iji gboo mkpa nke ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ site n'inye ngwá ọrụ na ndị ọrụ maka ime ihe okike ọhụụ
N'afọ 2014, ọ duziri vidiyo egwu maka 'Murda' nke Seyi Shay mere nke gosipụtara Patoranking, Shaydee
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke vidiyo a mere ka ọ nweta ọtụtụ nlebara anya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Naịjirịa ma a họpụtara ya n'otu afọ ahụ na MTV Africa Music Awards maka Best Video

Nakwa n'afọ 2014, ọ duziri vidiyo egwu maka ‘Crazy’ nke Seyi Shay mere nke gosipụtara Wizkid na a họpụtara vidiyo ahụ n'afọ 2015 maka Best Music Video of the Year (Artist and Director) na Nigeria Entertainment Awards nakwa Best Music Video na The Headies 2015
N'afọ 2016, ọ duziri vidiyo maka 'Kontrol' nke Maleek Berry nke gosipụtara ebili mmiri ọhụrụ nke ya na-eduzi vidiyo egwu maka ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ egwu Naịjirịa
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ duziri 'Aje' nke Alikiba mere nke meriri ihe nrite Best Music Video na Soundcity MVP Awards Festival na 2017
Kemgbe afọ 2018, Meji Alabi na Burna Boy rụkọrọ ọrụ na ụfọdụ ọrụ ya
Ọ duziri Pull Up, On The Low, na Gum Body nke gosipụtara Jorja Smith na abọm Burna Boy 'African Giant'
Meji duziri vidiyo maka Way Too Big, Wonderful, Monsters You Made nke gosipụtara Chris Martin na Real Life nke gosipụtara Stormzy na 'Twice As Tall' album
Meji Alabi na Wizkid rụkọrọ ọrụ na abọm Made in Lagos, ma na-eduzi ihe ndekọ maka vidiyo egwu maka Ginger nke gosipụtara Burna Boy, No Stress na Smile nke gosipụtara HER
N'afọ 2020, Meji Alabi jere ozi dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke Naijiria maka ọrụ ọhụụ Black Is King nke Beyonce Knowles-Carter mepụtara
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'akụkụ Ibra Ake na Jenn Nkiru iji mee ihe nkiri egwu 'Brown Skin Girl' nke meriri Grammy Award ma bụrụ onye nduzi maka otu ihe ahụ
N'afọ 2021, Meji Alabi na Black Dog Films rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke ọrụ ọhụụ maka mkpọsa 'Zero Malaria Draw The Line Against Malaria'

Ngagharị ahụ nwere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka Omotola Jalade-Ekeinde, onye na-eme ihe nkiri nakwa ọchụnta ego Osas Ighodaro, onye Kenya Olympic Gold-medallist na onye na-edekọ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke marathon Eliud Kipchoge, onye South Afrịka na-eme nchọpụta na onye ugwu Saray Khumalo, onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria Laolu Senbanjo onye isi ndị otu egwuregwu Rugby mba South Afrịka Siya Kolisi, na onye Rwanda-British n-eme ihe choreographer, Sherrie Silver

Melvin Earl Duncan bụ onye (amụrụ na Mee 22, 1950 na Davenport, Iowa) bụ kọwara onye guzobere Executive Director nke Nonviolent Peaceforce (NP), otu ndị nkịtị na-ahụ maka ụdo nke dị na Brussels
O nwere nzere bachelọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Macalester College na St
Paul, Minnesota na Master of Arts na Humanities na Leadership na New College of California

N'afọ 1979, Duncan nyere aka ịhazi Advocating Change Together (ACT), otu nkwado onwe onye mbụ na US maka ndị nwere nkwarụ mmepe ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Minnesota Jobs na Peace Campaign na Minnesota Alliance for Progressive Action
Ọrụ afọ ofufo ya gụnyere ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme udo n'ókè Nicaragua n'oge agha Contra, na-ebute ọgwụ na Iraq, na ịrụ ọrụ maka nhọpụta nke US Senator Paul Wellstone na 1990
Duncan zutere onye na-akwado udo, David Hartsough na Hague Appeal for Peace na May 1999
Ha abụọ malitere ịtọ ntọala maka otu mba ụwa na-abụghị nke gọọmentị iji tinye atụmatụ na-abụghị ime ihe ike n'ọrụ maka mgbochi na ibelata ime ihe ike na mpaghara esemokwu

Dabere na echiche Mohandas Gandhi banyere Shanti Sena ma ọ bụ 'ndị agha udo,' ihe nlereanya ahụ na-agụnye iji ndị na-ahụ maka udo na-azụ, ndị na-enweghị ihe agha na-arụkọ ọrụ na ndị otu mpaghara iji mepụta ohere maka ngwọta esemokwu na-enweghị ime ihe ike
E guzobere Nonviolent Peaceforce na afọ 2002 na Duncan dị ka onye isi nchịkwa ma kemgbe ahụ na-arụ ọrụ udo na Sri Lanka, Philippines, Guatemala na Sudan
N'afọ 2007, e nyere NP ọnọdụ ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na Kansụl akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke United Nations
Ihe nrite na nsọpụrụ Duncan gụnyere 2006 Distinguished Citizen Award site na Macalester College na 2007 International Pfeffer Peace Award site na Fellowship of Reconciliation
N'afọ 2008, Utne Reader kpọrọ ya otu n'ime '50 Visionaries who are Changing Your World'
Mel Gambôa (a mụrụ na 23 Mee 1984) bụ onye Romanian-Angolan na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nta akụkọ, na onye na-emepụta telivishọn
A mụrụ Gambôa n'afọ 1984 na Bucharest, Romania
Nwa nwanyị nke nna Angola na nne Romanian, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1998, na-esonyere otu ihe nkiri Horizonte Nzinga Mbandi dịka ọrụ na-abụghị nke ụlọ akwụkwọ

N'agbata afọ 2001 na afọ 2003, Gambôa biri na Madrid wee sonye n'òtù ihe nkiri Los Sobrinos del Mago de Oz dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-enyere onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri ụmụaka 'El Gnomo Jeromo' na 'Los Evangelios Apócrifos' nke Frank Huesca
N'afọ 2004, ọ laghachiri Luanda ma nyefee onwe ya n'ihe nkiri, na-ekere òkè n'ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe ma na-agụ akwụkwọ na nka
Gambôa sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ịgba egwú na ịkụ ọkpọ nke oge a n'Afrịka bụ Manésema n'afọ 2006 dịka onye nduzi mmekọrịta ọha na eze na onye isi ememe
N'afọ 2007, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na telivishọn
N'afọ 2010, Gambôa guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Together Now, nke, na mgbakwunye na inye ọrụ foto na vidiyo, mepụtara mmemme ọzụzụ maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na 'Photography Angola'
Gambôa jere ozi dịka onye na-egosi mmemme ntụrụndụ Tchilar na Channel 2 nke Public Television na Angola
N'afọ 2012, ọ malitere ịnabata ihe ngosi redio a na-akpọ Show da Mel na Rádio Despertar 910 FM
N'afọ 2017, Gambôa kwagara Los Angeles iji mezue agụmakwụkwọ ya na ihe nkiri
N'ihi nsogbu ego, a manyere ya iji mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta iji nweta ego maka onwe ya
Gambôa bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị ma kwuo na ụmụ amaala enweghị ike ịmara ihe na-eme na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Angola
Ọ na-eme tantra yoga na foto
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara okpukpe Buddha
Mel Streeter (1931 Jụn 12, 2006) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye na-egwu basketball na kọleji
A mụrụ ya na Riverside, California, ọ bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ bọọlụ nke abụọ nke Afrịka-Amerịka na Mahadum Oregon maka Ducks na mbido afọ 1950
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ na ndị agha US, ọ kwagara Seattle wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu
A mụrụ Streeter na 1931 ma too na Riverside, California, nwa nke onye na-ebubata ihe na onye na-esi nri
Streeter gara Riverside Polytechnic High School na California ebe ọ na-egwu basketball
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, e nyere ya ohere na otu basketball na UCLA, mana ọ jụrụ n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịmụ ihe owuwu
Ọ gara Mahadum Oregon na agụmakwụkwọ ndị agha ma bụrụ onye Afrịka Amerịka nke abụọ na otu egwuregwu basketball Ducks na naanị onye Afrịka Amerịka n'oge ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1955 na nzere architecture
N'afọ 1954, ọ lụrụ Kathleen Burgess, n'otu n'ime alụmdi na nwunye agbụrụ mbụ iwu kwadoro na Oregon
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwoke anọ Doug, Kurt, Jon, na Ken
Streeter nwere ọrịa amyloidoisis n'ime afọ ise ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Steeter rụrụ ọrụ na ndị agha na Fort Lawton ma biri na mpaghara Magnolia nke Seattle site na 1955 ruo 1957
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ndị agha na 1957, ọ nọrọ na Seattle wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
O tinyere akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ iri abụọ na abụọ tupu ọ chọta otu nke ga-ewe onye Afrịka Amerịka n'ọrụ
O mechara mepee ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na 1967, nke mesịrị too ruo ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ iri atọ tupu ndị mmekọ ahụ kewaa
Streeter jere ozi na kọmitii atụmatụ Seattle n'etiti afọ 1989 na 2000
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst n'afọ 2006, onye omeiwu Washington bụ Maria Cantwell gwara onye isi ala na ndị omeiwu okwu n'ịsọpụrụ Mel Streeter
O kwuru, sị, 'Maazị Onye isi ala, na mbido oge okpomọkụ a, Seattle tụfuru otu n'ime ndị isi ya kachasị mma na ndị na-akpali akpali
Dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ pụrụ iche na nwoke pụrụ iche, Mel Streeter hapụrụ akara ya na obodo anyị ma gbanwee ndụ ọtụtụ mmadụ
Dị ka otu n'ime ndị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ Seattle, Mel mebiri ihe mgbochi ma mepụta ohere ọhụrụ maka ndị ọzọ sochiri

Melanie Scholtz bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu jazz, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-agba egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke mere ngosi ya na Wynton Marsalis, The Jazz na Lincoln Center Orchestra, na Hugh Masakela
A mụrụ Scholtz na Cape Town South Africa n'ime ezinụlọ egwu
Ọ malitere ọmụmụ piano mgbe ọ dị afọ ise ma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ malitere ọzụzụ olu ya na onye ọmụmụ soprano May Abrahams
Site n'afọ 1997-2000 Scholtz gara Mahadum nke Cape Town ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Cum Laude na Performers Diploma na Opera
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town, Scholtz pụtara nghọpụta nwanyí South Africa nke afọ n'afọ 2001 South African Woman of the Year Awards show

N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ laghachiri na South African Woman of the Year Awards Show na South African Music Award Winner, Mozambican guitarist Jimmy Dludlu, na-eme egwu ha bụ Peaceful Moment nke Melanie dere abụ ahụ
N'afọ 2002, o ritere ihe nrite Best Jazz Vocalist Award na Old Mutual Jazz Encounters
Scholtz wepụtara abọm mbụ ya bụ Zillion Miles n'afọ 2006
Ọ bụ Thor Kvande mepụtara abọm ahụ ma dekọọ ya na Paris Studios na Cape Town
N'afọ 2010, Scholtz ritere ihe nrite Standard Bank Artist Award
Ole Jørn Myklebust bụ onye Scholtz na ya gara ma dekọọ abọm ya nke abụọ bụ Connected
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ wepụtara Living Standards, mgbalị mbụ ya na-edekọ ihe ọdịnala jazz
Scholtz wepụtara Freedom's Child - Melanie Scholtz na-abụ abụ James Matthews n'afọ 2013
Mmekọrịta ya na onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na onye na-ede uri bụ James Mathews bụ nke Mark Fransman mepụtara ma gosipụta onye saxophonist Soweto Kinch
Abọm ahụ nwere abụ iri na otu nke Matthews site na anthologies dị iche iche nke e debere na egwu Scholtz
N'otu afọ ahụ, Scholtz wepụtara Oge Anyị nke Bokani Dyer mepụtara
Scholtz kwagara Czech Republic n'afọ 2015 wee rụọ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ dị ka onye na-ede egwu mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ onwe ya na Europe
N'afọ 2017 Melanie kwagara New York City wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Jazz na Lincoln Centre nzukọ dị ka akụkụ nke ọmụmụ ihe na-egosipụta South African na American Jazz
E gosipụtara ya dị ka akụkụ nke The Great South African Songbook Tour na Wynton Marsalis na The Jazz na Lincoln Center Orchestra, na-eme na New York, Chicago, Vienna na South Africa
Melanie Cecelia du Bois, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Arendsvlei, 7de Laan na Sterk Skemer
A mụrụ Du Bois na Riverlea, Johannesburg, South Africa
N'afọ 2016, o kwupụtara na ọ na-alụ ọgụ na nsogbu uche, ọkachasị mgbe ọnwụ nwanne ya nwanyị na ịgba alụkwaghịm ya gasịrị
N'abalị 3 nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2015, nwa nwanne ya nwoke dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ Michael nwụrụ site n'iji T-shirt nke ya kwụgbuo onwe ya
Michael bụ nwa nwanne nwanyị Melanie nke okenye, Lucia Wilson
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 7, afọ 2015, na-alụ ọgụ na ndị furu efu, Lucia mechara gbuo onwe ya site n'ịkwụgbu onwe ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 46
Ọ gụsịrị diplọma na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Technikon Witwatersrand
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụrụ diplọma na Drama site na Trinity College London mechaa mee Associates Teachers Diploma na Drama site n'aka Trinity College London
N'afọ 2009, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke SABC2 Afrikaans soapie, 7de Laan
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nke onye na-emepụta ejiji 'Felicity Daniels' afọ 7 n'usoro ruo afọ 2016
N'afọ 2017 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na SABC3 comedy-drama Soap on a Rope ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka 'Zee'
N'afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Ronel Foster' na kykNET & kie soap opera Arendsvlei
Ewezuga nke ahụ, ọ kwupụtara na telenovela Doodsondes maka ọrụ 'Lal Uzun', nke Tugce Kocak gosipụtara
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya maka Kids Choice Award maka Best Actress ma mesịa họpụta ya maka Tempo Award maka Th Best Actress maka ọrụ ya na 7de Laan
Melati Riyanto Wijsen (amụrụ n'afọ 2000) na Isabel Wijsen (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2002) bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ihu igwe na mba Indonesia
A maara ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ ahụ maka mbọ ha na-agba iji belata oriri plastik na Bali
A mụrụ ụmụnne nwanyị ahụ na Bali na nne na nna Dutch na Indonesian
N'afọ 2013, mgbe Melati dị afọ iri na abụọ na Isabel dị afọ iri, ha malitere mkpọsa iji kpochapụ akpa plastik a na-eji eme ihe na Bali nke akpọrọ Bye Bye Plastic Bags
Iji nweta nlebara anya ọha na eze, ha mere ngagharị iwe n'isi ụtụtụ ruo n'isi abalị na 2016, na-achọ ka ya na gọvanọ Bali nke oge ahụ, I Made Mangku Pastika nwee nzukọ
Bye Bye Plastic Bags bụ atụmatụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na NGO nke ndị ntorobịa na-akpali ịsị mba na akpa plastik

N'oge na-adịghị anya, ozi nke ndị ntorobịa ruru ọkwa gburugburu ụwa dị ka TED, CNN, United Nations na ụmụnne nwanyị nyere aka wulite ume maka mmachibido iwu maka otu akpa plastik nke mechara malite na 2018 n'ihi mbọ nke ọtụtụ òtù na ndị mmadụ
Taa, enwere ike ịchọta akpa plastik Bye Bye n'ebe iri isii gburugburu ụwa na ndị otu ndị na-eto eto na-eduzi chọrọ iweta ozi nke ịsị mba na akpa plastik n'ụwa niile
Ihe a na-elekwasị anya na ike nke Bye Bye Plastic Bags anọwo na agụmakwụkwọ site n'ụdị ọmụmụ ihe, ngosi na akwụkwọ nta Na 2017 ha abụọ kwuru okwu na United Nations World Ocean Day na New York City
N'afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ha abụọ abụọ abụọ n'ime ndị ntorobịa ịrị abụọ na ise kachasị emetụta nke afọ 2018 site na magazin Time
N'afọ 2020, Melati bụ onye ọkà okwu a kpọrọ òkù na World Economic Forum na Davos
N'afọ 2019, e wepụtara ihe nkiri na Melati Wijsen nke akpọrọ Bigger than Us
Onye nduzi French bụ Flore Vasseur duziri ihe nkiri ahụ ma Marion Cotillard mepụtara ya
Melati bụ onye guzobere Youthtopia, ikpo okwu na-enye ndị ntorobịa ike

Mele Kolo Kyari (amụrụ na 8 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1965) bụ onye Naijiria na-amụ banyere ala, onye na-ere mmanụ ala na onye isi nchịkwa nke iri na itoolu (GMD) nke Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC)
Tupu nhọpụta a, Kyari bụ onye isi njikwa otu, ngalaba ahịa mmanụ ala nke NNPC na onye nnọchi anya mba Naịjirịa na Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) kemgbe afọ 2018
A mụrụ Kyari na 8 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1965 na Maiduguri, Borno Steeti
Ọ gara Government Community Secondary School Biu na Borno State n'etiti afọ 1977 na afọ 1982
N'afọ 1987, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị (BSc) na geology na sayensị ụwa na Mahadum Maiduguri

Mgbe Maikanti Baru lara ezumike nká na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 7 Julaị, na afọ 2019, gọọmentị nke Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara Kyari dị ka GMD nke iri na itoolu nke ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa National Petroleum Corporation
N'afọ 1991, ọ sonyeere NNPC Processing Geophysicist na Integrated Data Services Limited
N'afọ 1991, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Ngalaba Geological Survey nke Naịjirịa dị ka Field Geologist
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nchọpụta na National Petroleum Investment Management Services (NAPIMS) na afọ 1998
N'afọ 2007, Kyari duziri Production Sharing Contracts Management na Crude Oil Marketing Division (COMD)
N'afọ 2014, ọ ghọrọ General Manager, Crude Oil Stock Management ebe n'afọ 2015 a kwalitere ya n'ọkwa Group General Manager, COMD
Ọ bụ onye na-elekwasị anya na Open Government Initiative, atụmatụ ahụ na-enyere gọọmentị aka ịchọpụta onye na-azụ ma na-ere mmanụ
Na 13 Mee, na afọ 2018, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya mba Naijiria na OPEC

Meleko Mokgosi (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1981) bụ onye na-ese ihe nakwa ọkammụta na-ahụ maka eserese nakwa ihe osise na School of Art na Mahadum Yale Ọrụ ya gụnyere nnukwu eserese nke na-enyocha isiokwu nke colonialism, ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ịhụ mba n'anya, na ndụ na Southern Africa
A mụrụ Mokgosi n'afọ 1981 na Francistown, Botswana, nne ya na nne nne ya zụlitere ya n'obodo Maun
Ọ malitere eserese na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na ikike nke ime nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nka
N'afọ 2003, ọ kwagara United States, sonye na Whitney Independent Study Program, ma mụọ nka na Williams College na Mahadum California, Los Angeles (UCLA), nweta BA
na Master of Fine Arts degrees

[mgbe?] Mokgosi gụrụ akwụkwọ afọ anọ na onye America na-ese ihe bụ Mary Kelly, onye duziri ya n'ịzụlite omume dabeere na ọrụ, nke ọ kọwara dị ka 'lekwasịrị anya ọ bụghị n'ịmepụta ihe kama ịkọwa ọtụtụ ajụjụ'
Site n'afọ 2008–2011 Mokgosi mepụtara usoro eserese mbụ ya, Pax Afrikaner, nke nyochara xenophobia na njirimara mba na ndịda Africa
N'afọ 2012, Mokgosi bụ onye na-ese ihe na Studio Museum na Harlem

N'ebe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji mezue usoro eserese Pax Kaffraria ya, nke ọ kọwara bụ 'ịchọpụta otú ndị mmadụ nọ na ndịda Afrịka si eche echiche banyere mba' Mokgosi mere usoro ihe karịrị eserese iri ise n'isiokwu nke colonialism na Africa
Hammer Museum bipụtara akwụkwọ banyere ọrụ Pax Kaffraria n'afọ 2014

N'afọ 2014, Mokgosi malitere ọrụ Democratic Intuition nke nwere isi asatọ, nke ọ kọwara dị ka ihe gbasara 'otú ndị nkịtị si aghọta, meghachi omume, nwee ohere ịnweta, ma ghara ịnweta echiche nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya'
O gosipụtara isi abụọ mbụ nke ọrụ a na ngosi mbụ ya na New York na 2016

Meleko Mokgosi sokwa na Avram Alpert na Anthea Behm hiwere The Interdisciplinary Art and Theory Program na New York n'afọ 2018 usoro agụmakwụkwọ pụrụ iche maka ndị na-eme nka nke ọma iji mee ka nyocha nke usoro ihe ọmụma dị iche iche na ụwa nke nka
E nwere ụzọ abụọ dị iche iche na eserese Meleko Mokogosi
N'ime ọrụ ndị dị ka 'Wall of Casbah' (2009–2014), na 'Modern Art The Root of African Savages' (2012–2016) ọ na-ewere usoro ederede
Nke a na-agụnye imegharị akara ngosi nka na akwa na nkọwa iji gosipụta ịkpa oke ọdịbendị na ike ọchịchị na ihe mmụta ndị a na-anọpụ iche
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka Pax Afrikaner na Pax Kaffraria bụ ihe atụ ma na-esite na isi mmalite ọhụụ dị ka eserese akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Europe na ihe osise sinima
Ọrụ ndị a na-ejikọta ọtụtụ ihe osise, tropes na akara, iji weta anya dị oke mkpa na akụkụ nke njirimara mba, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị ọchịchị na ihe nketa nke post-colonial n'ime Southern Africa

Meleko Mokgosi na-etinyekarị ederede Setswana na eserese ya - ụzọ, ọ na-atụle na Ocula Magazine, nke 'na-emepụta ọnọdụ nke ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri na-amaghị asụsụ ahụ, ya mere na-ezo aka n'ọdịdị asymmetrical nke ụwa, nke na-adabere mgbe niile maka onye na-ekiri ọdịda anyanwụ'
Melhem (Arabic ملحم), nke a na-edekwa Milhim, bụ aha nna Arabic na kwa aha nwoke, nke pụtara 'Eze nke abalị'
Ndị ama ama na-ebu aha ahụ gụnyere
Matshidiso Melina Gomba bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress kemgbe afọ 2019
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na njem nleta ugbu a

Melinda Kgadiete (a mụrụ n'abali iri abụo na otu nke ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1992) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-agbara Mamelodi Sundowns Ladies FC na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa bọọlụ dị ka onye n'aha ịhụ maka onyinye goolu
Kgadiete agbarala klọb Mamelodi Sundowns na South Africa
Kgadiete sonyere na asọmpi nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị South Africa na 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na-egwu otu egwuregwu
Àtụ South Africa squad 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations
Melissa Kasri (amụrụ 13 Febụwarị 1998) bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria
O sonyere na 2015 FIVB Volleyball Ukwu ụwa Prix
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka NCB n'afọ 2015

Melktert (/ˈmɛlktɛrt/, Afrikaans maka mmiri ara ehi tart) bụ nri South Africa nke ndị Dutch bi na 'Cape' (South Africa) mepụtara na mbụ nke nwere ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke nwere ihe a na-etinye na mmiri ara ehi, ntụ ọka, shuga na àkwá
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mmiri ara ehi na àkwá dị elu karịa na omenala Portuguese custard tart ma ọ bụ Chinese egg tart, na-akpata ọdịdị dị mfe na ụtọ mmiri ara ehi siri ike

Nri nri a malitere n'etiti ndị bi na Dutch Cape Colony na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, a kwenyere na ọ malitere site na Dutch mattentaart, nri nri nri dị ka cheesecake nke gụnyere n'akwụkwọ nri Een Notabel Boexcken Van Cokeryen (A Notable Book of Cookery) nke Thomas van der Noot bipụtara n'ihe dị ka afọ otu puku, narị ise na iri na anọ (1514) Nchịkọta ụfọdụ na-achọ ka e sie custard n'ime mkpo, ebe ndị ọzọ na-akpọ ka a kwadebe custard tupu oge eruo, wee tinye ya n'ime akpụkpọ ahụ tupu a na-enye ya
A na-awụfụkarị cinnamon n'elu ya, a pụkwara itinye mmiri ara ehi e ji mee custard na osisi cinnamon tupu ịkwadebe ya
Ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ememe ụka na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ, na ihe a na-emekarị na nnukwu ụlọ ahịa South Afrika, enwere ike inye Melktert na oyi ma ọ bụ na okpomọkụ ụlọ, ma ọ bụ obere okpomọkụ
Àtụ South African cuisine[[Category Custard dessertsfartfartafafaart ishes]]
Melo (nke a makwaara dị ka Malo) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na mpaghara Gamo Gofa nke mpaghara ndịda, mba, na mpaghara ndịda
Ethiopia
Àtụ Languages of Ethiopia
A mụrụ Dr Melville Leonard Edelstein (1919 - June 16, 1976) na Nachum na Rose Edelstein na King William's Town

Nne na nna ya bụ Litvak bu ụzọ gaa UK ma mesịa gaa Cape Town n'afọ 1896 tupu ha esonye n'ìgwè nke 'boere-Jode' [Afrikaner ma ọ bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo ndị Juu] ebe nne na nna ya biri na Nachum malitere ma na-azụ ahịa na-aga nke ọma
Edelstein bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye nkuzi a na-akwanyere ùgwù ma tinye mgbalị ya na ọrụ enyemaka na ọrụ ọdịmma ọha na eze na Soweto
Ka ọ na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi ọrụ ọdịmma, Edelstein guzobere ọtụtụ ọrụ iji nyere ndị ntorobịa, ndị nwere nkwarụ, ndị ogbenye, na ndị a chụpụrụ n'ime Soweto aka, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe dị ka afọ 18
Onye Juu Ọtọdọks na-eme ihe, Edelstein anaghị etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma raara onwe ya nye ijere ọdịmma nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ ozi
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme udo nke jụrụ ịbanye n'Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ

Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze maka ngalaba ọdịmma nke Ngalaba Na-abụghị nke Europe, nke dara n'okpuru Obodo Johannesburg, o gosipụtara nchegbu dị ukwuu maka ndị Soweto, ebe ọ jere ozi afọ 18
Dr Edelstein bụ otu n'ime ndị ọcha abụọ nwụrụ na nnupụisi Soweto nke ụbọchị 16 n'ọnwa Juun afọ 1976, mgbe ìgwè ụmụ akwụkwọ iwe ji nkume tugburu ya

Dr Edelstein anọwo na-akwado mmeghe gọọmentị maka alaka nke Sheltered Workshop Programme ya na Orlando East, nke e mere iji nye ndị nwere nkwarụ ọrụ, mgbe akụkọ banyere ngagharị iwe ụmụ akwụkwọ ruru ọrụ ahụ
Ememe ahụ kwụsịrị ngwa ngwa ka a na-achụpụ ndị isi na ndị ọrụ n'obodo ahụ

N'inwe nchegbu banyere nchekwa nke onye ọrụ ibe nwanyị bụ Pierette Jacques, mgbe ọ laghachiri na Youth Center na Youth Center dị na Jabavu, Dr Edelstein gbara ìgwè mmadụ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ na-achịkọta iji gaa n'ọfịs ya
Edelstein wee gbaa ọsọ gafee n'ụlọọrụ ahụ, na-agwa ndị ọrụ ka ha pụọ ozugbo
Ka ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, otu ìgwè mmadụ iwe ji wakporo ụlọ ahụ wee jiri nkume tụgbuo ya
Onye nta akụkọ Peter Magubane mechara chọta ozu ya na ihe odide na-ekwu 'Kpachara anya na Afrikaans bụ ọgwụ kachasị ize ndụ maka ọdịnihu anyị'
Magubane kwuru, 'Ọ bụrụ na ha maara onye ọ bụ, nke a agaraghị eme'
Melvin Gibbs bụ onye America na-akpọ ụbọ akwara nke pụtara na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ abọm 200 n'ụdị egwu dị íchè iche
N'etiti ndị ọzọ, a maara Gibbs màkà ịrụ ọrụ na jazz na ónyé na-akụ egwu Ronald Shannon Jackson na onye na na-akụ ọkpọ Sonny Sharrock, na egwu rock na Rollins Band na Arto Lindsay
A mụrụ ya na Brooklyn, New York, Gibbs gara Medgar Evers College na Brooklyn Conservatory of Music
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Berklee College of Music, Gibbs bu ụzọ márá ọha na eze dị ka onye otu Defunkt, nke bụ isi ihe na mmalite afọ 1980 na New York
N'ime ihe ka ukwuu n'afọ ndị 1980, ọ na-akpọ egwu na Ronald Shannon Jackson's Decoding Society na ónyé na-akụ ọkpọ Vernon Reid na ónyé na'akụ ọkpọ Sonny Sharrock na ónyé na na-akụ saxophon John Zorn
Ya na Jackson na onye na-akpọ ụbọ Bill Frisell bụ onye otu Power Tools
Gibbs duziri otu egwu Eye and I na DK
Dyson onye guzobekwara Black Rock Coalition nke ọ bụ onye otu mbụ
Gibbs weere ọrụ nke ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ mgbe ọ nọ na Rollins Band na 1990s
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ikike ahụ, na-emepụta ndekọ màkà ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ na Rage Records
Melvin LeVarn Williams (amụrụ na Julaị 21, 1953) bụ onye America na-agụ egwú gospel
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya n'onwe ya, na 1988, site na ntọhapụ nke, Back to the Cross, nkè Compendia Music Group wepụtara
E wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya, In Living Color, na 1992, na nkwado nkè Blackberry Records wepụtara ọrụ ahụ
E wepụtara abọm nké atọ ya, Never Seen Your Face, na 1998, e wepụtara abọọm nke anọ ya, Duets, na 2001
E wepụtara abọm ya nké ise Crazy Like Love, na abọm nke isii, Love Like Crazy, n'otu ụbọchị ahụ na 2007
E wepụtara abọm nke asaa ya, The Best of Melvin Williams, na 2009
A tọhapụrụ abọm nkè asatọ ya, Where I Started From, na 2017 na akara ngosi ya, mmekọrịta Melvin Williams Entertainment na New Day Christian Distributors
Abọm ndị a niile, depụtara na chaatị Gospel Albums

A mụrụ Williams na July 21, 1953, na Smithdale, Mississippi, dị ka Melvin LeVarn Williams, nwá Leon 'Pop' Williams (November 24, 1908/1909 September 6, 1989), ọ nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala, na Amanda 'Mom' Williams (B 1919 ːD August 30, 2014), ọ nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ 94
Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye bụ Leonard, nwanne ya nwoke nke obéré bụ Doug Williams, nwanne ya nwanyị nke ọzọ bụ Frank Williams nwụrụ anwụ
Melvin na Doug na-arụkọ ọrụ Blackberry Records, Inc, akara ndekọ nke Williams Brother
Ọ bụ otu akụkụ nke The Williams Brothers, nke nnà ya guzobere na 1960
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu solo ya na 1988, site na ntọhapụ nke Back to the Cross site na Compendia Music Group, nké gosipụtara na No
6 na chaatị Gospel Albums
Na 1998 Never Seen Your Face, nké Blackberry Records wepụtara na Eprel 7, 1998, nke a ga-adị na chaatị Gospel Albums na No

Tony Cummings, na-egosi na nyocha iri n'ime irí nkè Cross Rhythms, kwetara, Williams bụ 'ónyé na-agụ nwèrè ike iwepụ mmetụta ọ bụla ikpeazụ site na abụ ndị na-emegide nchekasị na-akụda mmụọ na mmekọahụ dị ọnụ ala nke R&B na-ahọrọ kama okwu nke ịhụnanya dị elu nke Chineke'
Abọm nké ise na nke isii pụtara n'otu ụbọchị ahụ na 2007, Crazy Like Love na Love Like Crazy, nke Blackberry Records wepụtara na Febụwarị 6, 2007
Abọm abụọ a ga-edepụta n'otu ógè na chaatị Gospel Albums, nke mbụ na-edepụta na No
17 na nke ikpeazụ na No
Imed Memmich (Arabic عماد مميش; amụrụ na 8 Septemba 1966) bụ onye ọkà mmụta na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia na-eje ozi dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa obodo kemgbe 2021
Ncheta n'ozuzu na-ezo aka na ụzọ ichekwa ncheta nke ndị mmadụ ma ọ bụ ihe mmemmé
Ọ nwere ike ịbụ ụdị adreesị ma ọ bụ arịrịọ, ma ọ bụ ememe ncheta ma ọ bụ ncheta
Ncheta bụ mkpa zuru ụwa nílé n'ihi ndị a na-echeta ma ndị na-eru uju
Ọ bụ ezie na akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ bụ naanị ndị a ma ama ma na-eme ya naanị na klas kachasị elu, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ugbu a ka e were ya dị ka ikike mmadụ niile
N'ihe gbasara ikpe ziri ezi nke mgbanwe, a na-eji ncheta eme ihe iji sọpụrụ ndị e metọrọ maka mmegbu ikike mmadụ
Ihe ncheta gá enyerenwu gọọmentị aka idozi esemokwu na ndị metụtara site n'igosi nkwanye ùgwù na ikweta oge gara aga
Ha nwekwara ike inye aka guzobe ndekọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, na igbochi mmeghachi omume nke mmetọ
Ihe ncheta nwekwara ike igunyere ihe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mbọ ndị na-ewuli ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Ihe ncheta bụkwa ụdị nkwụghachi ụgwọ, ma ọ bụ mgbalị nkwụghachi ụgwọ nke na-achọ idozi mmebi ikike mmadụ n'oge gara aga
Ebumnuche ha bụ inye nkwụghachi ụgwọ n'ihi mfu nke ndị e metọrọ, ma dozie mmejọ ndị e mere nà mgbe mbụ
Ha na-ahụkwa n'ihu ọha na ndị a metụtara nwere ikike idozi na nkwanye ùgwù
Ụkpụrụ Isi nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu banyere ikike ịhazigharị na nkwụghachi ụgwọ na-aghọta 'ncheta na nkwanye ugwu nye ndị ahụ metụtara' dị ka ụdị nkwụghachi ụgwọ
E nwere ọtụtụ ụdị ncheta eji eme ihe dị ka atụmatụ ikpe ziri ezi mgbanwe
Ndị a gụnyere ncheta ụlọ, ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, na ihe omume ncheta ndị ọzọ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'ebe ugwu Uganda, e mepụtara ihe ncheta, emume ekpere kwa afọ, na àlà ili ozu iji meghachi omume na agha nke ndị agha Lord's Resistance Army mere na megide ya n'ebe ahụ
Ncheta nwere ike ịkpalite esemokwu ma buputa ụfọdụ ihe ize ndụ
N'ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-adịghị mma, ncheta nwere ike ime ka ọchịchọ ịbọ ọbọ dịkwuo elu ma mee ka ime ihe ike ọzọ
Ha bụ usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-anọchite anya uche ndị nọ n'ọchịchị
Màkà ya, o siri ike ịmepụta ha, ndị ọrụ enyemaka mba ụwa, ndị na-ahụ maka udo, na ndị NGO nọ n'ihe ize ndụ ịbanye na esemokwu banyere ịmepụta ma ọ bụ mmezi nke ebe ncheta
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ha nwekwara ike idozi mkpesa akụkọ ihe mere eme ma mee ka ọha mmadụ nwee ọganihu
Memphis ma ọ bụ Men-nefer (Arabic) bụ isi obodo oge ochie nke Inebu-hedj, aha mbụ nke Lower Egypt nke a maara dị ka mḥw ('n'ebe ugwu')
Mkpọmkpọ ebe ya dị nso n'obodo nta Mit Rahina (Arabic), na Marasar (obodo) Badrashin, Giza, Egypt
O yikarịrị ka aha nke oge a sitere na aha ndị Ijipt oge ochie maka Memphis mjt-rhnt nke pụtara 'Ụzọ nke Ram-Headed Sphinxes'
Tinyere ubi pyramid ndị gbatịrị n'ọzara dị larịị ihe karịrị kilomita iri atọ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ ya gụnyere Pyramids a ma ama nke Giza, edepụtara ha dị ka World Heritage Site Memphis na Necropolis ya
Ebe nrụọrụ ahụ meghere maka ọha na eze dị ka ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie

Dabere n'akụkọ ifo ndị Manetho kọrọ na mmalite narị afọ nke atọ BC, onye ụkọchukwu na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke biri na Alaeze Ptolemaic n'oge oge Hellenistic nke Ijipt oge ochie, Eze Menes tọrọ ntọala obodo ahụ
Ọ bụ isi obodo Ijipt oge ochie (Kemet ma ọ bụ Kumat) n'oge Alaeze Ochie ma nọgide na-abụ obodo dị mkpa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ijipt oge mbụ
Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ dị mma n'ọnụ Osimiri Naịl Delta, ọ bụkwa ebe a na-arụ ọrụ na-aga n'ihu
Isi ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ya, Peru-nefer (ekwesịghị ịgbagwoju anya na Peru-nefier na Avaris), gosipụtara nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ, ụlọ ọrụ, na ụlọ nkwakọba ihe na-ekesa nri na ngwaahịa n'alaeze oge ochie ahụ
N'oge uto ya, Memphis nwere ọganihu dị ka ebe etiti mpaghara maka azụmahịa, azụmahịa, na okpukpe
E kweere na Memphis nọ n'okpuru nchebe nke chi Ptah, onye na-elekọta ndị omenkà
Nnukwu ụlọ nsọ ya, Hut-ka-Ptah (nke pụtara 'Mgbachi nke ka nke Ptah'), bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ndị a ma ama n'obodo ahụ
Aha ụlọ nsọ a, nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Grik dị ka Aἴγυπτoς (Ai-gy-ptos) nke Manetho, kwenyere na ọ bụ mmalite nke aha Bekee ọgbara ọhụrụ igypt
Ekwenyere na ọdịda ya mechara bụrụ n'ihi mfu nke mkpa akụ na ụba ya n'oge ochie, na-eso ịrị elu nke Alexandria dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri
Okpukpe ya ebelatara ka a gbahapụrụ okpukpe ochie na-esochi Iwu nke Tesalonaịka (380 AD), nke mere Iso Ụzọ Kraịst nke Nicene bụrụ naanị okpukpe nke alaeze Rom
Taa, mkpọmkpọ ebe nke isi obodo mbụ ahụ na-enye ihe akaebe nke oge gara aga
Àtụ HieroMemphis enweela ọtụtụ aha n'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme ya nke ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ puku afọ anọ
Aha Ijipt oge ochie ya bụ Inebu-hedj (, nke a sụgharịrị dị ka 'mgbidi ọcha')
N'ihi ogo ya, a makwaara obodo ahụ site na aha ndị ọzọ dị iche iche bụ aha mpaghara ma ọ bụ mpaghara ndị nwere nnukwu aha n'otu oge ma ọ bụ ọzọ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, dị ka ederede nke Oge Mbụ nke etiti si kwuo, a maara ya dị ka Djed-Sut ('ebe na-adịgide adịgide'), nke bụ aha pyramid nke Teti
N'otu oge a na-akpọ obodo ahụ Ankh-Tawy (nke pụtara 'Ndụ nke Ala Abụọ'), na-emesi ọnọdụ dị mma nke obodo ahụ ike n'etiti Upper Egypt na Lower Egypt
Aha a yiri ka ọ sitere na Middle Kingdom (c
2055-1640 BCE), a na-ahụkarị ya n'ihe odide ndị Ijipt oge ochie
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta na-ekwusi ike na aha a bụ nke mpaghara nwere osisi dị nsọ, mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo ahụ nke dị n'etiti nnukwu ụlọ nsọ Ptah na ili dị na Saqqara
Na mbido Alaeze Ọhụrụ (ihe dị ka 1550 BC), a maara obodo ahụ dị ka mn-nfr (nke a na-akpọ Men-nefer, nke pụtara 'na-adịgide adịgide ma mara mma'), nke ghọrọ 'Memfi' na Bohairic Coptic
Aha 'Memphis' (Μέμφις) bụ mgbanwe Grik nke aha ha nyere pyramid nke Pepi I,[Fnt 1] nke dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo ahụ

Obodo nke oge a bụ Mit Rahina nwere ike ịnata aha ya site na aha ndị Ijipt oge ochie maka Memphis mjt-rhnt nke pụtara 'Ụzọ nke Ram-Headed Sphinxes' na-ezo aka n'okporo ụzọ oge ochie jikọtara Memphis na Saqqara, ebe ngagharị nke ehi ahụ nwụrụ anwụ gara olili ya na Serapeum nke Saqqara

Ka ọ na-anwa ịdọrọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na ihe okpukpe ndị Ijipt oge ochie n'ime nke ọdịnala ha, onye Gris na-ede uri Hesiod na Theogony ya kọwara aha obodo ahụ site n'ikwu na Memphis bụ nwa nwanyị nke chi osimiri Gris bụ Nilus na nwunye Epaphus (nwa Zeus na Io), onye tọrọ ntọala obodo ahụ ma gụọ ya aha nwunye ya
Na Bibulu, a na-akpọ Memphis Moph
Omenala ndị Alakụba nakweere usoro ọmụmụ Copt nke na-arụ ọrụ na etymon Māfah, nke sitere na Coptic ⲙⲁⲁⲃ, lit
'iri ato'
O mere ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ dị ịrịba ama na omenala ndị a metụtara Memphis ọ dị kilomita iri atọ n'ogologo, Manqāwus wuru ya maka ụmụ ya nwanyị iri atọ na Baysar biri ebe a na ụmụ ya iri atọ
Obodo Memphis dị 20 km (12 mi) ndịda Cairo, n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịl
Obodo na obodo ọgbara ọhụrụ nke Mit Rahina, Dahshur, Abusir, Abu Gorab, na Zawyet el'Aryan, ndịda Cairo, niile dị n'ime ókèala nchịkwa nke Memphis akụkọ ihe mere eme (mw-parser)

Obodo ahụ bụkwa ebe ahụ nke mara ókè ya n’etiti Elu Ijipt na Ndabere
(Nome 22nd nke Upper Egypt na 1st nome nke Lower Egypt)
Taa, ọ dịghị onye bi na ụkwụ nke obodo oge ochie ahụ
Obodo kachasị nso n'oge a bụ obodo Mit Rahina
Atụmatụ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi n'akụkọ ihe mere eme dịgasị iche iche n'etiti isi mmalite
Dị ka Tertius Chandler si kwuo, Memphis nwere ihe dị ka mmadụ 30,000 ma bụrụ ebe obibi kachasị ukwuu n'ụwa niile site n'oge ntọala ya ruo ihe dị ka 2250 BC na site na 1557 ruo 1400 BC
Bard na-akpachara anya ma na-eme atụmatụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi n'obodo ahụ dị ihe dị ka mmadụ 6,000 n'oge Alaeze Ochie
N'oge Alaeze Ochie, Memphis ghọrọ isi obodo Ijipt oge ochie maka ihe karịrị usoro ọchịchị asatọ n'usoro
Obodo ahụ ruru ọkwa dị elu n'okpuru Ọchịchị nke Isii dị ka ebe ofufe nke Ptah, chi nke okike na ọrụ nka
Alabaster sphinx nke na-eche ụlọ nsọ nke Ptah na-eje ozi dị ka ihe ncheta nke ike na ùgwù mbụ nke obodo ahụ
Triad nke Memphis, nke nwere chi okike Ptah, nwunye ya Sekhmet, na nwa ha nwoke Nefertem, bụ isi ofufe n'obodo ahụ
Memphis jụrụ mgbe usoro eze nke iri na asatọ na ịrị elu nke Thebes na ala-eze Ọhụrụ, mana ọ tụgharịrị n'okpuru ndị Peshia, tupu ọ daa n'ụzọ siri ike na ebe nke abụọ na-esote ntọala Alexandria
N'okpuru Alaeze Ukwu Rom, Aleksandria nọgidere bụrụ obodo kacha mkpa n'Ijipt
Memphis nọgidere bụrụ obodo nke abụọ nke Ijipt ruo mgbe e guzobere Fustat (ma ọ bụ Fostat) na 641 AD
E mesịa, a gbahapụrụ ya nke ukwuu wee ghọọ isi iyi nkume maka ógbè ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Ọ ka bụ mkpọmkpọ ebe dị egwu na narị afọ nke iri na abụọ, ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ ntakịrị karịa mbara ala nke mkpọmkpọ ebe dị ala na nkume gbasasịrịsị

Memry Savanhu (ọ bụkwa Memory Savanhu ) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe a mụrụ ma na-eme ihe nkiri nke Nollywood, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọchụnta ego, onye bi na Lagos, Nigeria mgbe o si London, UK kwalọta
O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri, Distance Between, n'afọ 2008 ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood dịka One Fine Day, On Bended Knees na '76
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Memkay Productions, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri
A kọrọ na a mụrụ Savanhu na mba Zimbabwe ma kpugheere Nigerian Guardian Newspaper na ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Zezuru
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ihe nkiri na London na New York Film Academy na Abu Dhabi, UAE gụrụ ihe nkiri
Savanhu nwere ihe nkiri mbụ ya nke Izu Ojukwu duziri nke akpọrọ, Distance Between, n'afọ 2008 nke gosipụtara Rita Dominic, Mercy Johnson, Kalu Ikeagwu na Yemi Blaq
Otu n'ime ihe ndị a ma ama o mepụtara bụ One Fine Day, Cougars Reloaded, Catwalq na On Bended Knees
E gosipụtara ya dị ka 'Eunice' na ihe nkiri agha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Izu Ojukwu n'afọ 2016, '76
Ndị ọzọ gosipụtara bụ Rita Dominic, Ramsey Nouah, Chidi Mokeme, Ibinabo Fiberesima na Daniel K
Daniel
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya na 'Best Actor UK Female' nke Zulu African Academy Awards (ZAFAA), nke emere na London, UK maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ, Maria's Vision
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya maka Zimbabwe International Women's Awards (ZIWA) nke emere na Birmingham, UK n'ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ ahụ dịka The Herald of Zimbabwe kọrọ
Ihe nrite a bụ maka onyinye ya na Nollywood, dị ka Youth Village si kwuo
Pulse Nigeria chịkọtara na Savanhu gbara alụkwaghịm ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Memuna Darku (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1979) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agba n'etiti
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na afọ 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup
Na klọb ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Ghatel Ladies na Ghana
Memunatu Sulemana (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Ghana bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Ghana
Na klọb, Sulemana gbara bọọlụ maka Post Ladies na Ghana
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Pelican Stars na Nigeria Women Premier League
Sulemana so n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana na afọ 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup, afọ 2003 FIFA Women'S World Cup na 2007 FIFA Women'es World Cup
Òtù ụmụ nwoke bụ òtù mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-akatọ mgbochi nke ọha mmadụ na-etinye ụmụ nwoke
Ndị na-akwado ihe gbasara nnwere onwe ụmụ nwoke na-enwekarị ọmịiko n'echiche ụmụ nwanyị

Ekwesighi ịnwe mgbagwoju anya na mmegharị nnwere onwe ụmụ nwoke na mmegharị dị iche iche dị ka mmegharị ikike ụmụ nwoke nke ụfọdụ na-arụ ụka na feminism nke oge a agafeela nke ukwuu ma tinyekwuo uche na ikike ụmụ nwoke

Òtù nnwere onwe nke ụmụ nwoke na-ekwusi ike na ego nke akụkụ ụfọdụ na-adịghị mma nke 'omenala' nwoke, ebe òtù ikike ụmụ nwoke bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu gbasara mmeso na-adịghị nhata ma ọ bụ na-ezighị ezi nke ụmụ nwoke site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ ọgbara ọhụrụ n'ihi, ma ọ bụ n'agbanyeghị àgwà ndị ahụ zuru ebe niile na ọdịnala nwoke ọdịnala
Òtù nnwere onwe nke ụmụ nwoke na-ezube ịtọhapụ ụmụ nwoke site na echiche na àgwà ha nke na-egbochi ha igosipụta mmetụta uche ha

Mmegharị nnwere onwe nke ụmụ nwoke, dị ka ndị feminists na ndị ọkà mmụta gbasara nwoke na nwanyị ghọtara, mepụtara ọtụtụ n'etiti ndị nwoke na-edina nwoke na nwanyị, ndị nọ n'etiti na Britain na North America dị ka nzaghachi maka mgbanwe ọdịbendị nke afọ 1960 na afọ 1970, gụnyere uto nke mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị, ọdịbendị, mmegharị nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị na nwoke na nwanyị, na mgbanwe mmekọahụ
Jack Sawyer bipụtara otu isiokwu akpọrọ 'Na nnwere onwe nwoke' na akwụkwọ akụkọ Nwee Onwe n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1970, ebe ọ tụlere mmetụta ọjọọ nke echiche nke ọrụ mmekọahụ nwoke
1971 hụrụ ọmụmụ nke ndị otu mkparịta ụka ụmụ nwoke na United States, yana nhazi nke Warren Farrell nke National Task Force na Masculine Mystique n'ime National Organization for Women

Robert Lewis na Joseph Pleck nwetara ọmụmụ nke mmegharị ahụ na mbipụta nke akwụkwọ ise banyere isiokwu ahụ na ngwụsị afọ 1974 na mmalite afọ 1975, nke sochiri mmụba nke mbipụta ndị a na-elekwasị anya na ndị na-ege ntị na ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ
Agbụrụ dí icheiche adịla n'ime òtù nnwere onwe nke ụmụ nwoke nke n'agbanyeghị mbọ kachasị mma ọ na-agba itinye nkewa dị otú ahụ n'oge ụfọdụ bụ nsogbu
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta profeminist na mmegide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmegharị ahụ na ikike ụmụ nwoke n'ọtụtụ ebe ekwuola na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'ime ọha mmadụ America emeela ka ụmụ nwoke na-abụghị ndị ọcha
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-ahụta ụmụ nwoke ojii ka ndị na-enweghị ike ịchịkwa mwakpo mmekọahụ ha
Ná mpaghara usoro echiche a, a na-egosi ụmụ nwoke ojii dị ka ndị na-enwe mmekọahụ dị ukwuu ruo n'ókè nke anụ ọhịa; ya mere, ha na-anọchite anya anụ ọhịa, ọ bụghị ụmụ nwoke
Otú ọ dị mkpa] Ndị East Asia America, e gosipụtara ha dị ka ndị na-adịghị mma na ndị na-erughị nwoke
Ifufe Nke abụọ nkè pro-feminism lebakwuo anya n'okwu banyere mmekọahụ, ọkachasị mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na-edina nwoke na nwoke hegemonic
Mgbanwe a dugara na imekọ ihe ọnụ n'etiti nnwere onwe ụmụ nwoke na nnwere onwe nwoke na nwanyị

N'otu akụkụ, imekọ ihe ọnụ a bilitere n'ihi na a ghọtara na nwoke bụ ihe owuwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nakwa dị ka mmeghachi omume maka 'ụmụ nwoke' zuru ụwa ọnụ nke a hụrụ na mmegharị ụmụ nwoke gara aga
E mepụtara Nzukọ ụmụ nwoke California (CMG) n'afọ 1978 site n'aka ndị ikom na-emegide mmekọahụ
Onye edemede Margo Adair, onye gara nnọkọ nke iri na abụọ n'afọ 1987, dere na ọ hụrụ ọnọdụ dị iche karịa ihe ọ bụla ọ hụtụrụla
Mgbe o chechara banyere ya, ọ chọpụtara na ọ bụ nke mbụ ọ na-enwe mmetụta nchebe zuru oke n'etiti nnukwu ìgwè ụmụ nwoke, ya na ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole ndị ọzọ
Ọ chọpụtakwara na a nabatara onye ọ bụla, a na-egosipụtakwa ịhụnanya n'etiti ndị sonyere n'ihu ọha
CMG na-ahazi ezumike atọ kwa afọ, lekwasịrị anya n'okwu ụmụ nwoke
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke na-aga Nzukọ ụmụ nwoke nke California bụ ndị na-edina nwoke ma ọ bụ nwoke na nwanyị
A haziri Radical Faeries na California na 1979 site n'aka ndị na-eme ihe ike na-edina ụdị onwe ha na-achọ ịmepụta ihe ọzọ iji banye n'ọdịbendị ụmụ nwoke
Men Who Stare at Goats (2004) bụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke Jon Ronson dere banyere nchọpụta ndị agha US gbasara echiche New Age na ngwa ọrụ military nwere ike iji Paranormal
Aha ahụ na-ezo aka n'ịgbalị igbu ewu site n'ile ha anya ma kwụsị obi ha
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ onye ibe nke usoro ihe nkiri TV nwere akụkụ atọ a na-agbasa ozi na Britain na Channel 4XCrazy Rulers of the World (2004) Nke mbụ ya akpọrọkwa 'The Men Who Stare at Goats'
E ji otu aha ahụ mee ihe nke ugboro atọ maka mmepụta ihe nkiri na afọ 2009

Isiakwụkwọ ise mbụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ na-enyocha mgbalị ole n'ime ndị isi Ndị agha US mere ná ngwụsị afọ 1970s nakwa mmalite afọ ndị 1980s iji jiri ihe karịrị ike mmadụ mee, nkà mmụta sayensị New Age, yana akụkụ dị iche iche nwere ikike mmegharị ụmụ nwoke maka ịkwalite ohere nchịkọta ọgụgụ isi agha US
Ndị a gụnyere Akwụkwọ ntuziaka Ọrụ nke First Earth Battalion (1979) na 'ìgwè ndị nledo' guzobere site na Army Intelligence na Fort Meade, Maryland, na ngwụcha afọ 1970

(Nke a bụ Stargate Project, nke akwụkwọ ahụ ekwughị aha ya) [ntụgharị dị mkpa] A na-etinye Ronson n'ụzọ akụkọ mere eme nke 'ndị ikom leere ewu' ndị agha Ndị agha pụrụ iche - Ndị e chere na ha nwalịrị ike mmụọ megide ụmụ ehi nwere ọbara ọcha na Fort Bragg, North Carolina, na ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ ọgwụ 'Goat Lab'
Ọ na-enyocha, ma wepụ ya, ọtụtụ ndị ga-achọ maka 'master sergeant' (Isi nke 2) onye a kọrọ na ọ gburu ewu naanị site n'ile anya na ya, n'ụbọchị mbụ nke mmemme ahụ
Onye nkuzi martial arts aha ya bụ Guy Savelli na-azọrọ ịbụ onye ahụ

N'etiti otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke akwụkwọ ahụ (Isi 611), onye edemede na-awụli elu gaa taa, 2004, ozugbo Abu Ghraib kpughere mkparị ma gbalịa ime njikọ dị n'ime mmemme ndị agha mbụ (nke a kwụsịrị ugbu a, yana ọtụtụ ihe ihie) na mmegbu sitere na Agha Terror mgbe 9/11 gasịrị (Abu Gharaïb, Guantanamo Bay, psyops in Iraq, wdgỌpụiche Nke a gụnyere iji abụ ụmụaka 'I Love You' site na Barney & Friends on Iraqi prisoners-of-war
Otu ihe jikọtara ya bụ ojiji a na-ekwu maka egwu na ozi subliminal n'oge nnọchibido Waco nke afọ 1993 na ọrụ FBI ndị ọzọ
Onye ọzọ bụ azụmahịa onwe onye 'franchises' na ndị ndụmọdụ nke lara ezumike nká n'ime 'ndị mmụọ ọjọọ'
A na-atụkwa aro njikọ dị n'etiti ndị mmụọ 'onwe' a na igbu onwe onye nke ọtụtụ mmadụ gburu egbu
Akwụkwọ Ronson zutere nyocha dị mma, nke na-enwekarị ọkụ Boston Globe kwuru na ọ bụ 'akwụkwọ ọchị ma bụrụ ihe mgbagwoju anya
Ronson pụtara dị ka cross pụrụ iche n'etiti Comedy Central Jon Stewart na The New Yorker Seymour Hersh
Janet Maslin nke New York Times kwuru na 'Ronson debere akwụkwọ ya n'ụzọ zuru oke
Ọ na-agagharị n'ụzọ ziri ezi, site na crackpot gaa na crack pot na ọchụchọ ya maka isi ihe okike ọhụrụ a'
Otú ọ dị, ụfọdụ ndị nkatọ nwere obi abụọ banyere ihe ha weere na arụmụka Ronson bụ nke a ma ama nakwa maka okwu ya
Nnyocha Alex Heard na U-T San Diego nwere isiokwu dị n'okpuru ya bụ 'Goats gbalịrị ijikọ ọrụ ndị omempụ site n'oge gara aga ruo ihe omume taa, ọ naghịkwa ada'
N'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, o dere, 'enweghị njikọ
Kama nke ahụ, enwere ọganihu n'ihe omume ndị na-ejikọghị ya n'ụzọ bara uru
Nsonaazụ ya bụ ngwakọta ọhụrụ dị ịtụnanya Echiche nkwekọrịta na-ezute ogo isii nke Kevin Bacon
A hapụrụ gị ka ị na-eche dị ka a gwara ya akụkọ ewu
E gosipụtara usoro Crazy Rulers of the World nke afọ 2004 n'akụkụ atọ

Menhat Helmy (1925-2004) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye ọsụ ụzọ na etMenhat Helmychings na printmaking nke Ijipt
A mụrụ Menhat Helmy na Helwan, Egypt na July 11, 1925 dị ka nwa nke abụọ n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne nwanyị asaa na ụmụnne nwoke abụọ

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọakwụkwọ Cairo's High Institute of Pedagogic Studies for Art na 1949 tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na mba ofesi na Slade School of Fine Art n'etiti afọ 1953 na 1555, ebe o lekwasịrị anya na eserese, grafiks, na etching
O mechara mụọ ihe osise na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na Morley College na London n'oge nke abụọ ọ nọrọ na London n'etiti afọ 1973-79
Ya na ndị dị ka Hussein El Gebaly, Abdullah Gohar, na Mariam A
Aleem, Helmy so n'ọgbọ ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ọrụ ise ihe
A na-eto ihe osise ojii na-acha ọcha nke Helmy maka mgbagwoju anya ha, yana maka ihe isi ike ha na mmezu
Helmy bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe mbụ na-ese onyinyo dum n'ime ọrụ ya, na-emegharị mmetụta nke eserese na eserese zuru oke na zinc tupu ọ gbanwee ha ka ha bụrụ mbipụta
Mgbe o nwetasịrị onyinye Slade Prize of Etching na 1955, Menhat Helmy gara n'ihu sonye na ngosi dị iche iche na gburugburu ụwa
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi obodo na Egypt site na 1956 gaa n'ihu ma mee ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na 1966
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ mba abụọ nke etchings na West Germany, Yugoslavia, Poland, Italy, Tokyo, na India
O meriri ihe nrite Saloon Du Caire na 1959 na 1960, ihe nrite Cairo Production Exhibition na 1957, na Ljublyana Honorary Prize na 1961

Helmy gara n'ihu bụrụ onye nkuzi na Fine Arts Institute na Cairo, Prọfesọ nke Fine Arts na Mahadum Helwan na Cairo, prọfesọ nsọpụrụ nke Etching na Accademia delle Arti del Disegno na Florence, Ịtali, na onye otu Print Maker Council na United Kingdom

Ọ bụ ezie na Helmy lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ n'afọ ndị 1980 n'ihi ọrịa akpa ume nke ọ butere site na kemịkal eji eme ihe na etchings ya, ọ gara n'ihu na-akụzi na Mahadum Helwan ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2004 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na asatọ
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ Helmy na Museum of Modern Arts na Egypt
Ọ dikwa na nchịkọta onwe onye na Egypt, Germany, Britain, UAE, na United States
Otu n'ime ihe osise ya, 'To the Point,' bụ nke nwa ya nwanyị, Sara Khallaf nyere Mahadum Cairo
E rere ihe osise ya, 'Procession to Work', n'ụlọ ahịa Christies n'afọ 2007
Sultan Sooud Al-Qassemi nke Barjeel Art Foundation nwetara ihe osise ya, 'Space Exploration', na 2019
Meninjaịtis bụ ọrịa nke siri ike n’emetụta ụbụrụ
Ihe n’egosi na mmadụ enwetala ya bụ ahụọkụ, isiọwụwa na olu mgbu
Ndịọzọ gụnyere isi ịgha ghara ghara, anọghị otu ebe, ịgbọ agbọ n’izere ebe nkpọtụ dị

Ọbụrụ n’ụkọ n’akọ ha, ọ na-egosi n’oji nwatakịrị a
Dịka iheatụ, meninjaitis nke nje meningokokal kpatara nwere ike iji ọkọ abịa
Mgbe ọgbaliri elu, ọ na-egosi n’ọbụ nje dị iche nke ọgwụ dị iche iche kpatara
Nje meninjaitis n’egbu mmadụ ogologo oge n’ihi ọ na-emetụta ụbụrụ n’ọkpụkpụ azụ
nke a n’egosi n’ọbụ ọrịa n’achọ ilebara anya mgbe niile
Iji mepee ya, a na-etinye ntụtụ n’ime ọkpụkpụ azụ ma mịpụta ihe dịka mmiri ma wega ya maka ime nnyocha
A na-eme nnyocha a site n’ebe eguzobere n’ụlọọgwụ maka ya
Ụfodụ n’ime ha nwere ike inwe ngwọta site n’iji ọgwụ ọgbụgba dị iche iche
Inye onye nwere ya ọgwụ dị mma
Ihe mbụ ekwesirị imere onye nwere ya bụ inye ha ma ọgwụ ya na nke nsochi
Inyekwa ọgwụ nke ga-eme ka ọghara ịgbali elu dịkwa mma
Ọrịa meninjaitis nwere ike ịkpata ọrịa ndịọzọ dịka ịda ogbu, akwụkwụ n’ọrịa ụbụrụ ndịọzọ maọbụrụ n’elebaraghị anya n’oge

Menna Allah Samy El-Fadali (amụrụ na 4 Septemba 1983) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu amụrụ na 1983

Menna sonyere na ihe nkiri sinima n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri malitere na ihe nkiri El Basha telmiz na Karim Abdel Aziz na Ghada Adel wee 'Youth Spicy,' 'Ghost,' na 'Vacuum Killer', na 'There is No Usefulness' na 'Karaoke' na 'light eyes' na 'The Dealer'

Menna Fadali gụrụ gbasara njem nleta na ile ọbịa, mana ọ kwụsịrị ọmụmụ ya mgbe ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri, mgbe nne ya, onye na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere onye nduzi Majdi Abu Amira aka, onye masịrị ya ma nye ya ọrụ na usoro Ayana Kalby na 2002
N'afọ sochirinụ, Menna sonyere na usoro nke Nader Galal duziri, na n'otu afọ ahụ na usoro nke nke Nader Galá
