Mensie Lee Pettway (amụrụ n'afọ 1939) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-ejikọta ya na otu Gee's Bend nke ndị na-ese akwa
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke National Museum of African American History and Culture na Milwaukee Art Museum
Nwa nwanyị nke ónyé na-emepụta ihe America Irby, na nwa nwa Hannah Wilcox, Mensie Lee Pettway tolitere na nkwado dị ukwuu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugbo n'ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge ezumike (NovemberīFebruary)
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbè ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ lụrụ Robert Lee Pettway, soro ya rụọ ọrụ ugbo, ma zụlite ụmụ asaa
Mensie Lee nwèrè mmasị ịghọrọ ogho ma mgbe o nyesịrị ezinụlọ ya aka ịghọrọ nke ha, ọ na-agakarị n'ụlọ ezinụlọ ndị ọcha, ezinụlọ Joe McHugh, wee kụọ 200 pound (91 ) nke ogho n'otu ụbọchị
Ọ na-echeta, 'Ọ na-amasị m isi nri na ịdọrọ ogho
Enwere m ike ịdọrọ narị pound abụọ n'otu ụbọchị
Ị na-enweta dollar atọ na otu narị azụ mgbè ahụ
Nke ahụ bụ nnukwu ego n'ihe dị ka afọ 1958 mgbè m nọ na klas nke iri
Mensie Lee ka bi na Alberta, Alabama
Mensie Lee bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Freedom Quilting Bee mgbè e guzobere ya na ụlọ Estelle Witherspoon
Ọrụ ya bụ isi bụ ịkpụ ihe ndị ọzọ na-akwa akwa
Ọ nwèrè ike ịkpụpụta ihe atọ ma ọ bụ anọ n'otu ụbọchị, ọ na-enyekwa ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ aka ịkwa akwa iji mezuo ihe achọrọ
Nne nne ya, Hannah Wilcox, ga-elu ma kpuchie ụkpụrụ ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Bee n'oge niile ọ dị
Usoro ya mepụtara akwa nwere akara mkpịsị áká pụrụ iche, ébé enweghị akwa abụọ, ma ọ bụ ọbụna akụkụ abụọ nke otu akwa ahụ, yiri
Oge ezumike nsọ bụ ụdị ezumike ebe mmadụ nwere ike ịnwe nhọrọ iji ezumike akwụ ụgwọ ma ọ bụ na-akwụghị ụgwọ site na ọrụ ha ma ọ bụrụ na ha na-ahụ nsọ nwanyị ma enweghị ike ịga ọrụ n'ihi nke a
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme ya niile, a na-ejikọta ezumike nsọ nwanyị na esemokwu na ịkpa ókè megide ụmụnwanyị, na mba ole na ole na-eme iwu; a na-ejikọta ya na nnabata dị ala na mba ndị ahụ mere iwu
Ụfọdụ na-ahụ ya dị ka nkatọ maka arụmọrụ ọrụ ụmụnwanyị ma ọ bụ dị ka mmekọahụ
Ndị na-akwado iwu ezumike nsọ nwanyị jiri ọrụ ya tụnyere nke ezumike ịmụ nwa ma lee ya anya dị ka onye na-akwalite ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị
Ụfọdụ ụmụnwanyị na-enwe ọnọdụ a na-akpọ dysmenorrhea nke na-akpata ihe mgbu n'oge nsọ nwanyị
Ihe ruru 80% nke ụmụnwanyị anaghị enwe nsogbu zuru oke iji mebie ọrụ kwa ụbọchị n'ihi nsọ nwanyị, ọ bụ ezie na ha nwere ike ịkọ na ha nwere nsogbu ụfọdụ tupu nsọ nwanyị
Ihe mgbaàmà na-egbochi ndụ nkịtị, na-eru eru dị ka ọrịa premenstrual, na 20 ruo 30% nke ụmụnwanyị
Na 3 ruo 8%, mgbaàmà siri ike
Premenstrual dysphoric disorder (PMDD) bụ ụdị ọrịa siri ike ma na-egbochi ọrịa premenstrual na-emetụta 18–58% nke ụmụnwanyị na-ahụ nsọ
E bu ụzọ tinye iwu ezumike nsọ nwanyị na ụfọdụ ngalaba ọrụ na post-Revolutionary Russia na mmalite narị afọ nke iri na itoolu; n'ihi ịkpa ókè megide ụmụnwanyị na-arụ ọrụ, ewepụrụ iwu ahụ n'afọ 1927
Otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụnwanyị dị na steeti Kerala nke ndịda India nyere ụmụakwụkwọ ya ezumike nsọ n'oge 1912
N'afọ ndị 1920, òtù ndị ọrụ Japan malitere ịchọ ezumike (seiri kyuka) maka ndị ọrụ nwanyị ha
N'afọ 1947, ụkpụrụ ndị ọrụ Japan mere ka iwu rụọ ọrụ nke nyere ụmụnwanyị na-ahụ nsọ nwanyị ohere ịhapụ ọrụ ụbọchị
Mkparịta ụka na-aga n'ihu banyere ma ọ bụ mkpa ahụike ma ọ bụ ihe ịkpa ókè
E nwere mmechuihu metụtara ezumike nsọ nwanyị; dị ka Levitt na Barnack-Tavlaris (2020) si kwuo, ọ nwere ike ime ka echiche dị iche iche dịgide ma na-aga n'ihu na ọgwụ nke ịhụ nsọ nwanyị
Ịga ezumike nwere ike ịchọ ịgwa ndị njikwa bụ ụmụnwoke banyere ihe nwanyị ahụ kwere na ọ bụ okwu onwe onye
Ọ nwere ike igosi ụmụnwanyị dị ka ndị na-enweghị ike karịa ụmụ nwoke ma ya mere ọ nwere ike ibute ịkpa ókè megide ụmụnwanyị
Otu aro iji wepụ ihere ahụ bụ inye ezumike ahụike ọzọ maka ndị nwoke na nwanyị niile
Na mpaghara Indonesia, n'okpuru Iwu Ọrụ No
13 na nke afọ 2003, ụmụnwanyị nwere ikike ụbọchị abụọ nke ezumike nsọ kwa ọnwa ọ bụ ezie na ndị a abụghị akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ

Na Japan, ebe ọ bụ na 1947, Nkeji edemede nke 68 nke Iwu Ụkpụrụ Ọrụ na-ekwu 'Mgbe nwanyị nke na-arụrụ ọrụ n'oge nsọ nwanyị ga-esi ike karịsịa rịọrọ ezumike, onye were ya n'ọrụ agaghị eji nwanyị dị otú ahụ n'ọrụ n'ụbọchị nke oge nsọ nwanyị

' Ọ bụ ezie na iwu ndị Japan chọrọ ka nwanyị na-agabiga nsọ nwanyị siri ike hapụ ya ka ọ gaa ezumike, ọ dịghị achọ ka ụlọ ọrụ nye ezumike akwụ ụgwọ ma ọ bụ ụgwọ ọzọ maka ụmụnwanyị na-ahọrọ ịrụ ọrụ n'oge nsọ nwanyị

Na Saụt Koria, ụmụnwanyị na-arụ ọrụ nwere ikike ezumike nsọ nwanyị dị ka Nkebi nke 71 nke Iwu Ụkpụrụ Ọrụ, a na-ahụkwa na a na-akwụ ụgwọ ọzọ ma ọ bụrụ na ha anaghị ewere ezumike nsọ nwanyị nke ha nwere

Na Taiwan, Iwu nke Ịdị n'Otu Mmekọahụ n'ọrụ na-enye ụmụnwanyị ụbọchị atọ nke ' ezumike nsọ' kwa afọ, nke a na-agaghị agụta maka ụbọchị iri atọ nke ' ezumike ọrịa nkịtị', na-enye ụmụnwanyị ruo ụbọchị iri atọ na atọ nke 'akwụkwọ metụtara ahụike' kwa afọ
Ụbọchị atọ ndị ọzọ anaghị abịa na ọkara ụgwọ ozugbo nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ gafere 30 a na-achịkwa
Na mba Europe, ka ọ na-erule 2021, ọ dịghị mba nwere ezumike nsọ nwanyị
Atụmatụ nke ndị omeiwu Ịtali iji webata iwu ezumike nsọ nwanyị n'afọ 2017 kpalitere arụmụka na mba Europe banyere otú ahụike nsọ nwanyị si emetụta ụmụnwanyị n'ọrụ
Iwu ahụ ga-ewebata iwu maka ụlọ ọrụ iji nye ezumike ụbọchị atọ a na-akwụ ụgwọ maka ụmụnwanyị na-arịa ọrịa nsọ nwanyị; e meghị iwu ahụ
Na mba Zambia, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2015, iwu kwadoro ụmụnwanyị ụbọchị ezumike kwa ọnwa n'ihi iwu ezumike nsọ ha, nke a maara dị ka 'Ụbọchị Nne'
Ọ bụrụ na a gọnahụrụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ ikike a, ọ nwere ike ikpe onye were ya n'ọrụ ikpe
Coexist, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọdịmma obodo Bristol, webatara 'ụkpụrụ oge' iji nye ụmụnwanyị mgbanwe na ọnọdụ ọrụ dị mma
N'inwe olileanya imebi iwu ahụ gbasara ịhụ nsọ nwanyị, Coexist ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na United Kingdom iji mejuputa iwu a
A na-akọ na Nike na-akwado ezumike nsọ n'ebe ọ bụla ọ na-arụ ọrụ, mana ndị mgbasa ozi gosipụtara iwu a n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi; Nike na-agbaso iwu ọrụ obodo ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ

'Open sesame' (French , ouvre-toi; Arabic) bụ ahịrịokwu anwansi n'akụkọ 'Ali Baba na ndị ohi iri anọ' na nsụgharị Antoine Galland nke Otu puku na otu abalị
Ọ na-emeghe ọnụ ọ́gbà ebe ndị ohi iri anọ zoro akụ
Okwu a pụtara na mbụ na nsụgharị French nke Antoine Galland nke abalị (1704X1717) dịka Sésame, ouvre-toi (English, 'Sesame
N'akụkọ ahụ, Ali Baba nụrụ ka otu n'ime ndị ohi iri anọ na-ekwu 'meghe Sesame'
Nwanne ya nwoke mechara o nweghị ike icheta ahịrịokwu ahụ, ma na-agbagwoju ya anya na aha ọka ndị ọzọ na sesame, na'ịbụ onye tọrọ atọ n'ime ọgba anwansi
A sụgharịrị okwu Galland n'ụzọ dị iche iche site na French gaa na Bekee dịka 'Sesame, mepee', 'Open, sesame' na 'Meghe, O sesamo'
Mkpụrụ Sesame na-eto n'ime oghere mkpụrụ nke na-ekewa mgbe ọ ruru ntozu oke, na ahịrịokwu ahụ nwere ike na ọ na - emeghe akụ, ọ bụ ezie na ejighị n'aka na okwu 'sesame' na 'osame ma ọ bụrụ mkpụrụ'
Echiche ndị ọzọ gụnyere
Stith Thompson kewara sesame mepere emepe dịka ihe D15522, 'Ugwu na-emeghe usoro anwansi'

Mercy Joy Akide Udoh (née Akide ; amuru ya na 26 Ọgọst 1975) bu onye egwu bọọlụ Naijiria n'oge gara aga
Mercy malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ ise ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ Seleipiri na nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ Ipali n'ubi aja nke Bundu Waterside, nọ nso ụlọ mkpọrọ Port Harcourt na Port Harcourt
Achọpụtara ọsọ ya site na nwata, mgbe ọ dị afọ 12, na Holy Rosary Secondary School dị na Port Harcourt, o sonyere e n'ọsọ ndị dị anya, na-agba ọsọ 400m, 800m na 1500m megide ndị asọmpi ochie
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri egwuregwu bọọlụ mpaghara, mana bọọlụ bụ egwuregwu ebe ọ pụtara n'ezie
Mercy nwetara aha otutu 'Ske', nke n'asụsụ obodo pụtara 'akpụkpọ anụ', mgbe ọ na-egwu egwu megide ụmụ nwoke na Mile 1 na Port Harcourt
N'ime ọtụtụ ndị na-enwe mmasị n'ebe ọ nọ n'oge ahụ bụ otu nwatakịrị a na-akpọ Chidi Odiah, bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ Nigeria ugbu na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ CSKA Moscow
N'ịtụle nkà ya karịsịa, otu ndị na-ahazi egwuregwu bọọlụ ntorobịa chịkọtara asọmpi ụmụ agbọghọ iji họrọ ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ga-abụ 'Ogige City Queens'

Mgbe afọ abụọ nke ndị Queens na-egwuri egwu, ma gbadaa nhụsianya nke Port Harcourt nke Larry's Angels, Akide hapụrụ Port Harcourt gaa Lagos ka ọ gaa n'ihu ma na agụmakwụkwọ na bọl na Jegede Babes n'okpuru nduzi nke Princess Bola Jegede
N'oge ahụ, otu egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria nọ n'afọ a na-eto eto ma Garden City Queens esoghị na otu kachasị elu dịka Jegede Babes, Ufuoma Babes na Larry's Angels
Klọb a na-agbakarị egwuregwu ngosi gburugburu steeti na Akide dịka ihe nkiri kpakpando
Ọ gbara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ goolu ise n'otu egwuregwu n'ime afọ abụọ ọ nọrọ na klọb
Otu n'ime egwuregwu enyi na enyi ahụ bụ megide ndị otu ama ama Jegede Babes, na agbanyeghị na ndị Queens meriri 6–1, Akide nwetara naanị goolu n'akụkụ ya
Ọ masịrị ya nke ukwuu bụ onye nwe klọb, Princess Bola Jegede nke na o nyere ya ohere ozugbo na klọb ya
Akide sonyeere Jegede Babes ka Naijiria na-eso na asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa nke ụmụnwaanyị malitere na China n'afọ 1991
N'ịbụ onye nwere ike n'ọrụ arụrụlarị, a kpọgara Akide na etiti etiti maka oge 1992 ebe o wepụtara oge iji gbanwee
Mana ka ọ na-eru oge 1993, ọ pụtara onye kacha nwee goolu na otu egwuregwu na iko
Ọ kwatara goolu iri na isii n'asọmpi yana 8 ọzọ na iko Challenge
O weere ụdị ahụ n'ime oge na- esote, na-ebute ihe mgbaru ọsọ 15 na asọmpi 1994 na 10 na Challenge Cup iji nweta onwe ya ịkpọ oku ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkwa nke Ismaila Mabo
N'ụzọ dị mwute, ebumnobi ya ezughị iji nyere Jegede aka inweta aha ọ bụla

Mgbe ọ lọghachiri na 1995 FIFA World Cup Women's World, Akide (onye nwetara aha otutu ya ugbu a nke Marvelous) ụlọikwuu na ụlọ ọrụ Warri dị na Ufuoma Babes, onye meriri otu egwuregwu na iko ugboro abụọ n'ime afọ abụọ gara aga
Ọ ga-abụ mmegharị ahụ na-enye afọ ojuju
goolu iri na asaa o nwere n'asọmpi na 9 na Challenge Cup nyere Ufuoma ọkpụ abụọ
Ọ bụ nke mbụ n'ime ọtụtụ aha
Oge na-esote, ọ kụrụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ 11 Njikọ na ihe mgbaru ọsọ 10 Challenge Cup na Ufuoma Babes nọgidere na- achị ha nke otu egwuregwu ụlọ
Akide ka gụchara na ọkaibe ọkaibe n'afọ 1997
O nyere goolu 14 league na goolu 8 Challenge Cup ka Ufuoma gbagoro okpukpu abụọ n'usoro
Pelican Stars chụpụrụ Ufuoma Babes n'oche abụọ na otu egwuregwu na iko n'afọ 1998 ebe Akide gbatara goolu 10 na-akụda mmụọ na 7 na Challenge Cup
trop o wetarahy
Pelican ọzọ meriri okpukpu abụọ n'agbanyeghị na Akide jisirike nye i naanị goolu egwuregwu itoolu na goolu 6 Challenge Cup
Ka oge na-aga, Akidnwetara agụmakwụkwọ n'efu a na Milligan College dị na Tennessee, USA, mgbe ya na Super Falcons rụchara ọrụ iko mba ụwa
Oge abụọ ya na Jegede Babes, bụ ebe o nyere ngụkọta goolu iri anọ n'iteghete n'ime oge abụọ, dọtara uche onye nchịkwa mba Ismaila Mabo na a kpọrọ Mercy ka ọ bụrụ ogige na 1994
Mana ọkpụ goolu ọzọ, 17 na otu egwuregwu na 9 na Challenge Cup mere ka e cheta ya
Mpụta mbụ ya nke mba ụwa bịara n'oge na-adịghị anya, asọmpi iko mba ụwa megide Sierra Leone na Ibadan na Mercy na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye ọkpọ
O ji ihe mgbaru ọsọ abụọ gosi ya
Ọ gbara otu ọzọ n'ụkwụ nloghachi iji kwadoo ọnọdụ ya na otu egwuregwu ahụ
Na 2001, akpọrọ ya aha onye egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Africa izizi nke afọ, wee bụrụ 1999 na 2004 FIFA World All-Star
Ọ gbara Naịjirịa bọọlụ n'asọmpi iko mba ụwa atọ nke FIFA ma nyekwaara Super Falcons nke Nigeria aka ị nweta aha asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Africa atọ (AWC) na 1998, 2000 na 2002
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2004, ọ lụrụ onye nta akụkọ egwuregwu bụ Colin Udoh n'obodo ya bụ Port Harcourt
Na 2005, FIFA kpọrọ ya aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya 15 maka bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị

N'agbata 2006 na 2008, Mercy rụrụ ọrụ na Stars Soccer Club, ebe ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa maka Stars U-16 Athena C Gold Girls ma rụọ ọrụ n'ime mmepe ntorobịa ( NGO na-ejikwa enyi ya Luke Concannon, onye nchịkwa nke U-13)

O nwere mmeri azụ azụ na azụ na asọmpi ndị na-eto eto na Tuskys Wareng Cross Country na 2007 na 2008
Ọ nataghị nhọpụta maka 2008 World Cross Country Championships, kama ọ lekwasịrị anya na ọsọ ọsọ

Mbụ, ọ gbakwunyere obere aha na mmeri 3000m nke ndị ntorobịa ya, na-eti Bizunesh Urgesa n'oge 8 5807 iji merie ọla edo na 2008 World Junior Championships na Bydgoszcz, mgbe ahụ ọ meriri ọla edo na 2008, na-agba ọsọ n'enweghị mmegide iji setịpụ oge ndekọ egwuregwu
Ọnọdụ ya na ndị otu Kenya na-agafe mba ụwa yiri ihe a na-ejighị n'aka na 2009 ka onye isi nchịkwa Julius Kirwa chụpụrụ ohere ya, na-ekwu na ọ gbara ọtụtụ agbụrụ n'oge ahụ
Cherono zaghachiri site n'ibute ụzọ ozugbo na Kenyan Trials ma merie obere agbụrụ site na sekọnd iri na atọ
Na 2009 World Cross Country Championships na Amman, Cherono sonyeere Genzebe Dibaba na asọmpi ogologo oge
Cherono butere ụzọ na nzọụkwụ ikpeazụ mana ihe siri ike na ịrịgo mita 40 mere ka Dibaba nwee ike ịgafe ya na Cherono mechara nweta ọlaọcha
Na 2009 African Junior Athletics Championships, Cherono jiri ihe dị ka sekọnd 13 belata na 3000 m ma Genzebe Dibaba meriri ya ọzọ na 5000 m ọsọ, jiri ọlaọcha mechie
O meriri n'okporo ụzọ ndị okenye n'afọ ahụ ma bụrụ onye nke atọ na Rieti IAAF Grand Prix, na-edekọ ihe kacha mma nke 8 4467 maka 3000 m
O were nke atọ maka oge nke abụọ na Memorial van Damme na Septemba, na-edekọ ihe kachasị mma na mita 1500 na mita 2000 ma bụrụ naanị ndị mmeri ụwa Gelete Burka na Vivian Cheruiyot kụrụ ya
O meriri n'asọmpi mgbagharị obodo na Kericho na ngwụcha afọ 2009, mana o nweghị ike iru n'elu atọ na 2010 Kenyan Trials
Ọkwa nke anọ ya zuru ezu iji nweta ọnọdụ na otu maka 2010 World Cross Country Championships
Cherono bilitere n'oge ahụ na Asọmpi mba ụwa na Bydgoszcz, otu ebe ahụ dị ka mmeri World Junior nke afọ 2008
Ya na ndị otu Kenya ya duziri n'ọtụtụ n'ime asọmpi ahụ ma merie site na sekọnd asaa, na-eduga n'ụlọ mmeri 1 Xia Xia 34 maka ndị otu Kenya
N'agbanyeghị nnukwu mmeri, ọ dịghị ya mkpa ịkwanye onwe ya na mmeri, mgbe e mesịrị kwuo, sị 'N'agba nke abụọ, enwere m ọtụtụ ihe fọdụrụ'
O mere njem mbụ ya na IAAF Diamond League sekit na Mee, na-agba ọsọ nke 14 4713 maka nke asaa na mita 5000 na Shanghai Golden Grand Prix

Na 2010 World Junior Championships in Athletics, Cherono ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-ejigide aha 3000 m ka ọ na-egbochi ihe ịma aka sitere n'aka Emebet Anteneh iji bụrụ onye mbụ nwetara ọla edo nke ihe omume ahụ
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 5000m, na-agwụ n'azụ Genzebe Dibaba
N'ịga na sekit ndị okenye, ọ gbara ọsọ na Rieti IAAF Grand Prix n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ na 3000 m n'azụ Sylvia Kibet, na-etinye ndụ ọhụrụ kachasị mma nke 8 4209
Ọ tụgharịrị uche ya gaa na mba ndị okenye wee merie na AK zutere na Kericho na Nọvemba, ebe nwanne ya nwanyị Caroline Chepkoech gara n'ihu merie asọmpi ndị na-eto eto
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu kachasị mma na Kenya's kwa afọ SOYA Awards
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2011 ọ gbara ọsọ na Nchọpụta Kenya Mgbagharị obodo na Eldoret, mana o mehiere ọsọ ya wee banye n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na njedebe
Cherono bịara nke iri na atọ na asọmpi mba ndị okenye na Febụwarị 2011
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ hapụrụ ebe maka ndị otu ụwa, ọ gara na 2011 African Cross Country Championships ma merie ọla edo na nrite n'akụkụ Viola Kibiwot na Doris Changeywo
Oge ya na-agafe mba gwụrụ na njedebe atọ kachasị elu na Trofeo Alasport
Na 2011 Diamond League circuit ọ debere n'elu atọ nke 5000 m na Prefontaine Classic na Meeting Areva
A họpụtara ya maka ndị otu egwuregwu nke Kenya na nke mbụ ya wee bịa nke ise karịa 5000 m na 2011 World Championships in Athletics
Ọ malitere mmeri 2012 site na mmeri dị ukwuu na Campaccio cross country

Ọ tụfuru ohere ya ịgba ọsọ na 2012 Summer Olympics mana ọ bụ onye na-achịkwa n'okporo ụzọ n'afọ ahụ ọ meriri Herculis, Athletissima na British Grand Prix 2012 IAAF Diamond League zutere ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na London Grand Prix, Weltklasse Zurich na Memorial van Damme
Ihe kacha mma nke 3000m nke 8 3851 nkeji bịara na Herculis
Mgbe oge egwu gasịrị, ọ meriri Cross Internacional de Venta de Baños na Cross de Itálica
Cherono meriri ule mba maka 5000 m wee gaa n'ihu na-azọrọ nrite ọlaọcha na ihe omume na 2013 World Championships in Athletics n'azụ Meseret Defar

Na 2013 IAAF Diamond League circuit ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 1500 m na Memorial Van Damme, onye nke abụọ n'ime 3000 m na DN Galan, ma tinye ya n'elu atọ nke 5000 m ma Prefontaine Classic na Weltklasse Zürich
Ọ laghachiri na Cross de Venta de Baños wee merie maka oge n'usoro
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, n'afọ 2016, Cherono bịara n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na 5000m ihe omume na Rio Olympics na 14 4289 site na ndị na-agba ọsọ iri na asaa
Cherono si n'obodo Kipajit, nso obodo Sotik
Ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ mgbe ọ nọ na Kipajit Primary School ma mesịa kwaga Chelimo Primary School dị nso na Kericho ma mesịa gaa Ngariet Secondary School na Sotik

Nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere Sharon Chepkorir bụkwa onye na-agba ọsọ
Nna ha John Koech na-elekọta ogige ọzụzụ n'obodo Kipajit
Cherono meriri n'asọmpi Most Promising Sportswoman of the Year na 2009 Kenyan Sports Personality of the Year awards, ma kwughachi site na mmeri n'otu ụdị ahụ n'afọ na-esote
Mercy Nnenda Chinwo bụ onye na-agụ egwú gospel nke Naijiria, onye na-abụ abụ, onye na'eme ihe nkiri, onye na na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ n'òtù ukwe ụmụaka na ụlo ụka ọ na ekpe, ọ meriri Nigerian Idol Season 2 na 2012

Otu afọ mgbe ọ meriri Nigerian Idol, ọ nwetara ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Yvonne Nelson, House of Gold ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Lucia, ya na Yvonne Jackson, Majid Michel, na Omawumi na ndị ọzọ

Mercy Amba Oduyoye (amuru n'afọ 1934) bụ Ghanaian Methodist theologian a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na nka mmụta okpukpe nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi nke Institute of African Women in Religion and Culture na Trinity Theological Seminary na Ghana
A mụrụ Oduyoye na Ghana n'afọ 1934
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na University of Ghana n'afọ 1963, nwetakwa akara ugo mmụta nke abụọ na Cambridge University n'afọ 1965, na ugo mmụta ogo na Cambridge n'afọ 1969
Site n'afọ 1967 rue 1979, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ mmụta ndị ntorobịa nke World Council of Churches ; site n’afọ 1987 rue 1994, ọ bụ onye osote onye ode akwụkwọ n’otu nzukọ ahụ
Ọ kuziri nkuzi na Harvard University, Union Theological Seminary na University of Ibadan

Ọ rụọla ọrụ dịka onye isi nke World Student Christian Federation ma hiwe Circle of Concerned African Women Theologians n'afọ 1989Oduyoye edela akwụkwọ anọ na artikulu kariri iri asatọ n'ọnụọgụ nke gbadoro ukwu na nka mmụta okpukpe nke ndị kristị site na echiche nke ndị feminist na Africa
Otu n'ime isi okwu ya bụ ka okpukpere chi na omenaala ndi Africa si emetuta ahụmahụ umu nwanyi Afrika
Karịsịa, o kwuola banyere nsogbu mmegbu akụ na ụba na-ebe ụmụ nwanyị Afrika nọ
Oduyoye e ritela honorary degrees na University of Amsterdam (1991), Stellenbosch University , University of the Western Cape n'afọ 2002 na Yale University n'afọ 2008

Mercy Tagoe (Tagoe-Quarcoo mgbe ọ lụsịrị di, amụrụ na 5 Febụwarị na afọ 1974) bụ onye nkuzi bọọlụ Ghana na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke gbara dịka onye na-agbachitere ndị otu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana

Meri Morrissey (amuru 1949) bu onye odee akwukwo n' America na onye na-akwado mmegide umu uwa

Meron Getnet bụ onye Etiopia na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-ede uri
A maara ya maka nkatọ ya megide nguzo gọọmentị n'oge ọchịchị Meles Zenawi
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ngosi na TV na Ethiopia, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Meaza Ashenafi na ihe nkiri Difret
Malite n'afọ 2013, Meron Getnet gosipụtara na ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Etiopia bụ Dana ebe ọ na-eme onye nta akụkọ aha ya bụ Helina
Meron mere ihe nkiri nke mbụ ya na Difret na 2014, ebe ọ na-eme Meron Ashenafi, onye ọka iwu nwanyị nke na-alụ ọgụ siri ike megide omenala nna ochie
Na Septemba 2014, na ihe ngosiputa mbụ nke Difret na Addis Ababa, a kagburu nlere ahụ na mberede n'ihi iwu ụlọ ikpe megide ngosi ya na Etiopia
Nke a mere ka ndị na-ege ntị nwee obi ụtọ na Meron, onye bịara, nke doro anya na ọ nwere obi nkoropụ
Mertlene Perkins (1917-2015) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na ndị otu Gee's Bend quilting collective
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston ma tinye ya na nchịkọta nké Metropolitan Museum of Art
Nné na nnà Perkins bụ Maggie Tripp na Isom Martin, n'otu n'otu
Nne ya bụ ónyé ọrụ ugbo na nnà ya na-arụ ọrụ n'ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Ọ hụrụ ya n'anya ịnọnyere nne ya, ya mèrè ọ malitere inyere aka n'ugbo ahụ n'oge ọ nwèrè ike, ihe dị ka afọ asatọ
Ha na-azụkarị ogho, ahụekere ọka, na poteto
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ afọ itoolu na Prairie, Alabama Ọ lụrụ Herman Perkins mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
Ha zụlitere ụmụ iri na abụọ ọnụ, itoolu n'ime ha dị ndụ ruo mgbè ha toro
Perkins mụtara ịkpa ákwà n'aka nne ya na nné nne ya
Quilting bụ ihe na-atọ Perkins ụtọ
N'ịgbaso omenala nke Gee's Bend improvisation style, ọ na-ekwu na 'M na-eme akwa nke m
Anaghị m eso echiche ónyé ọ bụla ma e wezụga nke m
Merton Daniel Simpson (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, 1928 , rụo ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Machị, 2013) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-adịghị ahụkebe na onye na-anakọta ihe osise na ónyé na'ere ahịa
A mụrụ Merton Simpson na Charleston, South Carolina
N'agbata afọ isii na afọ iri na otu, ọ na-etinye oge ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na-anata ọgwụgwọ màkà diphtheria na rheumatic fever
N'oge a, ọ malitere ịde ihe na eserese iji gafee oge
Mmasị ya na nka toro ma ọ malitere ise ihe na eserese n'ụzọ siri ike
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, onye na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ bụ William Halsey chọpụtara Simpson nke kpọọrọ Simpson n'okpuru nku ya
N'ime afọ anọ sochirinụ, Halsey kụziiri Simpson ihe ndị bụ isi nke eserese ma mee ka ọ mata echiche nke nka na-enweghị atụ
Jean Robertson Fleming, onye ọzọ na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ, nyekwara aka n'ịchọpụta nkà Simpson ma nyèrè ya aka ịzụlite nkà ya
N'etiti South nke ka kewara ekewa, ekweghị ka Simpson gaa nkụzi nka na ọbọdọ Gibbes Gallery ebe ónyé na-ese ihe William Melton Halsey na-arụ ọrụ
Simpson na ónyé nkuzi ya Halsey na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya ugboro ugboro
Simpson gàrà Burke High School na Charleston
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1949 Halsey, nwunye ya Corrie McCallum na onye bụbu ónyé nduzi nke Charleston Museum Laura Bragg kwadoro Merton Simpsonia nke mbụ solo art show
E mèrè oriri abụọ màkà ihe ngosi nka ahụ; 'otu maka ndị ọcha na otu màkà ndị ọcha ndị na-enweghị mmasị ịbịa oriri na ndị isi ojii'

Simpson ghọrọ ónyé Africa America mbụ natara prestigious afọ ise fellowship site na Charleston Scientific and Cultural Education fund wee hapụ South Carolina na 1949 gaa New York City mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gàrà Mahadum New York (NYU) màkà afọ mbụ ma bụrụ onye Cooper Union nabatara
Ọ gàrà nkụzi na NYU n'ehihie na Cooper Union n'abalị
Simpson nwetakwara ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa nke Herbert Benevy
Ọtụtụ ndị omenkà a ma ama bịara n'ụlọ ahịa etiti ma ka oge na-aga katọọ ọrụ Simpson ma soro ya nwee mmekọrịta
Na NYU, Simpson matara Hale Woodruff, William Baziotes na Robert Motherwell
Ụlọ akwụkwọ New York na-enwekwa mmetụta ya n'oge ahụ na Merton Simpson na Franz Kline, Max Weber na Willem de Kooning na ụlọ ahịa etiti
N'ime kọleji niile Simpson gara na New York, o nyèrè ụlọ ahịa etiti otuto màkà inye ya ezigbo agụmakwụkwọ ya
Mgbè afọ anọ gachara, Simpson laghachiri NYU iji maliteghachi ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1951, ọrụ ya pụtara n'ihe ngosi na Museum of Modern Art na n'afọ 1954 e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi Younger American Painters na Guggenheim Museum
Ka aha ya na-etolite, ọrụ nka ya mèrè ihe ngosi n'ọtụtụ gallery na New York City na ọbụna Washington, DC
Ka ọ na-erule 1955, Simpson nwèrè ihe ngosi otu ónyé na Bertha Schaeffer Gallery
Ka Simpson na-etolite na New York, ọ malitekwara inwe mmasị na School of Paris ma guzobe ebe obibi na capitol
Mpaghara ọhụrụ ahụ nwere mmetụta doro anya na nke doro anya na ụdị eserese ya nke ndị na-ese brush nke ụlọ akwụkwọ New York mepụtara nke ukwuu
Simpson kewara oge ya n'etiti Paris na New York ebe o guzobere gallery nke ya na 1950s
The Merton D

Simpson Gallery of Modern and Tribal Arts bụ nke a ma ama maka nchịkọta pụrụ iche nke Tribal arts, na maka ihe osise nke ndị ọgbọ ya Romare Bearden, Beauford Delaney, Norman Lewis, Charles Alston, Hale Woodruff na John Biggers, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Merton Simpson lụrụ Beatrice Houston, ónyé ọ hụrụ n'anya n'oge ọ bụ nwata si South Carolina na 1954
Ọ meghere ụlọ ngosi nka ya na Madison Avenue iji kwado ezinụlọ ya na-eto eto nke na-echeta ọmụmụ nwa mbụ ya, Merton Simpson Jr
Di na nwunye ahụ nwèrè nwá nwoke ọzọ aha ya bụ, Kenneth Simpson na 1959
Merton na Beatrice Simpson gbara alụkwaghịm na 2008
Ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ, Merton Jr
na Kenneth Simpson hapụrụ ya
N'afọ 2000, ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri Merton Simpson kwagara na nọmba irí atọ na asatọ nà West 28th Street na mpaghara Chelsea nke Manhattan
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ nwere nnukwu nchịkọta nke nka Africa na nke agbụrụ, nka nke ógè a na ọrụ Merton Simpson na akwụkwọ na ihe osise
Ihe ngosi gosipụtara na ọrụ Merton D
Simpson
Mervat Mostafa Amin (amụrụ na Nọvemba 24, 1948) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na El Minya nye Mohammed Mostafa Amin, onye dọkịta si Upper Egypt, na nne Scottish, onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị nke Victory College (mgbe e mesịrị El Nasr)
A zụlitere ya na Heliopolis
O nwekwara nzere bachelọ na English Literature site na Mahadum Ain Shams
Iwu ewu ya bịara na ọrụ ya na Abdel Halim Hafez na ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya, Abi foq al-Shagara
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Ijipt kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na 1970s na mmalite 1980s mgbe ọ na-eme ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ijipti
Mervat Amin lụrụ di ugboro ise

Ọ lụrụ onye Egypt na-akpọ ụbọ akwara Omar Khorshid n'oge na-adịghị anya, ma, mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ha gasịrị, ọ lụrụ onye Egyptian a ma ama na-eme ihe nkiri Hussein Fahmy site na 1974 ruo 1986, mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ahụ kwụsịrị na ịgba alụkwaghim
Ha nwere nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Menna
Mervat M
Tallawy (Egyptian Arabic; amụrụ n'afọ 1937) bụ onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo Ijipt
Mervat Tallawy nwere BA
na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nchịkwa azụmahịa site na Mahadum America dị na Cairo
Ọ gụchara akwụkwọ na Graduate Institute of International Studies (HEI) na Geneva, Switzerland
N'afọ 1963, ọ sonyeere Ministri Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-eme ná Mba Ọzọ nke obodo Ijipt
Site na afọ 1985 ruo afọ 1988, Ms
Tallawy bụ osote onye nduzi nke United Nations International Research and Training Institute for the Advancement of Women (UN-INSTRAW)
N'ikpeazụ, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Ijipt na Vienna, Austria, ruo afọ 1991
Site na afọ 1991 ruo afọ 1993, ọ bụ osote minista mba ọzọ
Site na afọ 1993 ruo afọ 1997, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya Ijipt na Japan
Tallawy rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ịnshọransị na mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke Ijipt site na afọ 1997 ruo afọ 1999

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2000, a họpụtara Mervat Tallawy ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations na odeakwụkwọ ukwu ya nke United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Western Asia (ESCWA)
N'afọ 2007, Bader Al-Dafa si Qatar nọchiri ya
Tallawy bụ onye otu Sawiris Foundation for Social Development na onye isi nke afọ 2011 e guzobere n'aka ekpe nke Egyptian Social Democratic Party
Mery Segunda Zamora García (amụrụ n'April 19, 1972) bụ onye isi syndicalist nke Ecuador, onye nkuzi, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke National Union of Educators (UNE) site na 2007 ruo 2010, oge nke dabara na mmalite nke ọchịchị Rafael Correa
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na-akatọ ọchịchị a, ọ bụkwa onye a na-ekwukarị okwu mkparị na mgbasa ozi Citizen Link nke Correa, nke mechara bụrụ ebubo iyi ọha egwu na mmebi na 2010
E mechara wepụ ikpe megide ya mgbe ọ rịọrọ arịrịọ nke ọma
Kemgbe afọ 2014 ọ bụ osote onye nduzi mbụ nke pati Popular Unity
A mụrụ Mery Zamora na Portoviejo na Eprel 19, 1972
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Escuela Fiscal Mixta Amalia Zevallos No
14, na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị na Colegio Nacional Mixto 18 De Octubre na Colegio 23 de Octubre
Na Instituto Normal Superior 23 de Octubre ọ nwetara utu aha onye nkuzi na Basic Education

N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, Zamora bụ onye ndú ụmụ akwụkwọ, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke kansụl ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Colegio 18 De Octubre na 1987, na onye isi oche ya nke kansụল ụmụ akwụkwọ nke colegio 23 de Octubre n'afọ 1990
N'afọ 1995, ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Frente de Lucha por el Ingreso al Magisterio (FLIM)
Ọ sonyeere Confederation of Women for Change na 1996

Ọ bụ osote onye nduzi mpaghara nke Frente Político Vanguardia del Magisterio na 2000, odeakwụkwọ nkwukọrịta nke UNE na Manabí Province site na 2000 ruo 2004, ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche mpaghara nke nzukọ ahụ site na 2004 ruo 2007
N'afọ 2007 ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala UNE
Dị ka onye isi oche nke UNE, otu n'ime nnukwu òtù ndị ọrụ na mba ahụ, Zamora malitere imegide usoro agụmakwụkwọ nke gọọmentị Rafael Correa, nke gụnyere nyocha nke ndị nkuzi
Nke a kpasuru Correa iwe, ọ ghọkwara nwanyị nke atọ a na-akatọkarị na mgbasa ozi Citizen Link, mgbe Lourdes Tibán na Cynthia Viteri gasịrị
Mgbe ihe mere na Septemba 30, 2010, e boro ya ebubo iyi ọha egwu na mmebi mgbe e gosipụtara vidiyo ekwentị mkpanaaka nke na-egosi ya na-akpali otu ụmụ akwụkwọ ime ihe ike na Guayaquil na Citizen Link
Zamora zaghachiri na ọ nọ na-arịọ ụmụ akwụkwọ ka ha gbasaa, nakwa na ndekọ ahụ gụnyere naanị obere akụkụ nke ọdịyo nke e wepụrụ n'ihe gbara ya gburugburu

Na June 12, 2013, ụlọ ikpe nke iri nke Guayas kwupụtara na ikpe mara Zamora maka mpụ ahụ, mana na May 27, 2014, ndị ọkàikpe atọ nke Ụlọikpe Ikpe Mba nabatara arịrịọ ya, abụọ n'ime ha mechara chụpụ n'ọkwa ha, otu onye gbara arụkwaghịm
Na Febụwarị 10, 2015, ikpe megide Zamora kwụsịrị
N'ime Democratic People's Movement (MPD), ọ onye nnọchi anya onye omeiwu Jorge Escala site na 2008 ruo 2013, na-apụta na National Assembly n'oge ụfọdụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2011, mgbe ọ ka na-eche ikpe mpụ megide ya na Guayaquil, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nduzi mpaghara nke MPD na Manabí
N'ọnwa Ọktoba ahụ, ọ ghọrọ osote onye nduzi mbụ ya
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2014 ọ gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa onye isi obodo nke Portoviejo, nweta ọnọdụ nke anọ na CREO Movement
Na Septemba 27, 2014, a họpụtara Zamora ka ọ bụrụ osote onye nduzi nke Popular Unity, nke pụtara mgbe agbasachara MPD
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2017 ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye omebe iwu maka mpaghara ndịda Manabí, mana enwetaghị oche
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, ya na ndị otu anọ ndị ọzọ rịọrọ ka a gụgharịa ya n'ihi enweghị nkwekọ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ
Meryem Hajri (amụrụ na 15 Septemba 1994) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na agba ọsọ dị ka onye na aga n'ihu maka otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Hajri gbara ọsọ maka Morocco na ọkwa dị elu n'oge 2018 Iso ntozu Iko Ụmụ nwanyị Afrika (agba nke mbụ)
Merzagua Abderrazak (ka amụrụ n'afọ 1967 na Morocco) bụ onye Morocco bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ na onye isi nkuzi
Na 4 August 2001, ọ gbara bọọlụ na 2001 Sultan of Selangor Cup dị ka onye ọbịa

N'ịbụ onye a kpọbatara dị ka onye egwuregwu mba ọzọ na Penang nke Malaysia na mmalite afọ 1990, Abderrazak bu ụzọ mee ka klọb ahụ gaa asọmpi abụọ kachasị elu na 1998 na 2001 tinyere ebe nke abụọ na 1999 na 2000 na nkà ya na ikike mgbaru ọsọ ya
A na-akpọ ya 'Great Merz' site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya, a kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ọzọ kachasị egwu na Malaysia na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia
N'ịga Gombak United nke Singapore n'afọ 2001, Abderrazak na onye bụbu onye nkuzi Penang ya bụ Moey Yok Ham na Guinean Ballamodou Conde na-eyi nọmba 9
Otú ọ dị, onye na-aga n'ihu enweghị ike itinye uche na bọọlụ n'ihi azụmahịa ezinụlọ ya na Morocco dara
N'ikpeazụ, ọ hapụrụ klọb ahụ iji kwado azụmahịa ezinụlọ ya, na-arịọ mgbaghara nye onye ndụmọdụ Moey Yok Ham n'ụzọ
A mara ọkwa dịka onyeisi nchịkwa Penang na ngwụsị afọ 2012, ebumnuche Abderrazak bụ ibuli klọb ahụ na Malaysia FAM League nke atọ
N'ime egwuregwu enyi atọ mbụ ndị otu ahụ gbara site na preseason, ha dekọrọ mmeri abụọ mana ha meriri otu ugboro megide Perak nke Malaysia Super League n'ihi ndị na-akwado ụlọ

Na-eduga klọb ahụ na asọmpi FAM League nke afọ 2013 na nkwalite na 2014 Malaysia Premier League, a machibidoro Abderrazak ịbụ onye nkuzi ha maka oge na-abịanụ na ọkwa nke abụọ ebe ọ na-enweghị akara nkuzi nke otu ahụ gụnyere
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, onye Morocco nwetara ikikere ya na ọtụtụ isi mmalite dị nso na Penang kwuru na ọ nwere ike ịlaghachi na-eduzi ndị otu steeti nke na-emetụbeghị
Abderrazak ka emechuihu na arụmọrụ Penang na 2017 Malaysia Super League n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na klọb mbụ ya nọ na ala nke tebụl league
Kemgbe ọpụpụ ya, ọ na-enyocha arụmọrụ Panthers na asọmpi

N'ịbụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka uwe Sungai Ara nke Penang na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na ngwụsị afọ 2014, ndị na-akwado ya, ndị egwuregwu na ndị isi kelere onye na-agba bọọlụ mbụ ahụ mgbe ọ bịarutere steeti Malaysia

N'ịkwalite ogo ahụike na mmụọ nke ndị egwuregwu tupu oge ahụ na ọnwa isii nke nkwadebe na egwuregwu enyi iri atọ, ebumnuche ya bụ inweta nkwalite na Malaysia Premier League site na 2016, na-egosipụta ekele nye bọọdụ ahụ
Penang
Penang
Meschac Gaba (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1961) bụ onye Beninese bụ onye ǹkà nchepụta ihe na Rotterdam na Cotonou
Ntinye ya nke ihe ndị a na-eme kwa ụbọchị na-ejikọta njirimara ọdịbendị Afrịka na ọdịda anyanwụ na azụmahịa
A maara ya nke ọma maka The Museum of Contemporary African Art 1997–2002, ntinye ụlọ iri na abụọ nke Tate Modern nwetara ma gosipụta n'afọ 2013
O gosipụtala na Studio Museum na Harlem n'afọ 2003 Venice Biennale
A mụrụ Meschac Gaba na Cotonou, Benin, n'afọ 1961
Ọ kpafuru site na ọzụzụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe ruo mgbe akpa ego a kwụsịrị n'ime ụmụ irighiri ihe mere ka ọ na-ese ihe osise na ihe ndị ahụ
Gaba bịara mara maka ntinye ya nke ihe ndị a na-eme kwa ụbọchị nke na-ejikọta njirimara ọdịbendị Afrịka na nke ọdịda anyanwụ na azụmahịa
O nwere ebe obibi na Amsterdam Rijksakademie n'afọ 1996 ruo afọ abụọ
Na enweghị ohere iji gosipụta ọrụ ya n'obodo ahụ, ọ malitere n'ime afọ ise sochirinụ iji mee ihe ngosi nka nke ya

Nke a ghọrọ ihe ncheta ya The Museum of Contemporary African Art 1997–2002, nke nwere ọnụ ụlọ iri na abụọ (ụfọdụ dabere na ọrụ ihe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ndị ọzọ nkeonwe) jupụtara na ihe ndị Gaba mere
N'ime ihe ngosi ahụ, a na-akọ akụkọ nkwupụta banyere nhụjuanya nka nke onye na-ese ihe n'etiti Africa na Europe
Ụlọ agbamakwụkwọ, nke o mere mgbe ọ hụrụ n'anya, nwere ihe ncheta dị ka ihe ngosi nka site na agbamakwụkwọ Gaba na onye nlekọta Dutch Alexandra van Dongen n'afọ 2000 na Amsterdam Stedelijk Museum
Ụlọ Ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ nwere akwụkwọ nka ma na-akọ banyere tebụl mgbagwoju anya Gaba
Ụlọ egwuregwu ahụ gosipụtara tebụl mgbagwoju anya na-eme ka tebụl
Ihe ngosi nka ahụ gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ebe
E gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ na mbụ n'afọ 2002 na Documenta 11
Gaba natara ohere Rotterdam nke ọ nwere ike ibi ma chekwaa ọrụ ahụ
Mgbe nwa ya nwoke rịọrọ ụlọ nkịtị, Gaba rere ma nye Tate Modern ọtụtụ ọrụ ahụ, ma e wezụga maka Ọbá akwụkwọ ya, nke Gaba laghachiri n'obodo ya
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2013, Gaba biri ọkara afọ n'obodo ya bụ Cotonou na ọkara nke ọzọ na Rotterdam ya na nwunye ya na nwa ya nwoke
Tate Modern gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ n'ozuzu ya n'afọ 2013 dị ka akụkụ nke mmemme afọ abụọ nke Tate nke ihe ngosi ndị na-elekwasị anya n'Afrịka
Ụlọ agbamakwụkwọ ahụ masịrị onye nkatọ nka Britain bụ Jonathan Jones, onye kọwara Museum dị ka akụkọ ndụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ, mkpesa na-egosi ike nke nka nke nka nke oge a

N'etiti imecha Museum na ihe ngosi Tate ya, Gaba gosipụtara n'afọ 2003 Venice Biennale ma mee ihe ngosi mbụ ya na United States na Studio Museum na Harlem, 'Tresses', usoro ihe nlereanya nke New York City na akara ngosi Benin nke e mere site na mgbatị ntutu isi
A kpọghachiri ihe eji eme ihe ahụ, nke ndị African-American pop stars dabere na ọdịbendị West Africa, na Africa
Gaba na-arụ ọrụ na onye na-akpa ntutu isi nke Benin iji mee ihe ọkpụkpụ site na foto ya
The New York Times dere na ọrụ ndị ahụ 'na-atọ ụtọ' ma bụrụ ndị a pụrụ ịmata n'aghọghị ihe osise
Gaba mere ihe ngosi ngosi nke mbụ ya, 'Exchange Market', na New York n'afọ 2014
N'ala ala, ihe ọkpụkpụ iri nke tebụl osisi na-enweghị ntụpọ nke ọ bụla nwere ihe mkpuchi waya, nke akwụkwọ ego Afrịka kwụgidere
E jikọtara tebụl ọ bụla na ụdị ngwaahịa ogho, koko, dayamọnd
N'akụkụ mgbidi ahụ, a na-etinye ọrụ ndị yiri ụlọ akụ nke e ji osisi, plexiglass, na ego a kwụsịrị
N'elu, nke na-echetara ụlọ egwuregwu nke ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke Gaba, e nwere tebụl foosball anọ na obere ihe ncheta dị ka ọkpọ cricket e sere n'aka na obere tebụl billiards
Artsy họọrọ ọrụ Gaba dị ka ihe ngosi nke afọ 2014 1 54 London art fair
Meselech Melkamu amụrụ na 27 Eprel, na afọ 1985 na Debre Marqos) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge

O meriri Meseret Defar iji merie nrite ọla edo nke mita 5000 na 2008 African Athletics Championships, mana a maara ya nke ọma maka ọsọ ya 29 5380 karịa mita 10,000 na afọ 2009, nke ruo n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2016 mere ya nke abụọ na ndepụta oge niile n'azụ onye na-edekọ ụwa Wang Junxia
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị asaa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme mebiri ihe mgbochi nkeji iri atọ na otu n'etiti ndị Etiopia anọ rụzuru ọrụ ahụ
Kemgbe afọ 2012, ọ na-asọ mpi na asọmpi okporo ụzọ
O meriri na 2012 Frankfurt Marathon na ndekọ ọmụmụ na nke kachasị mma nke 2 21 01 awa
O mere ọganihu ya na ndị na-eto eto na afọ 2004 site na mmeri na IAAF World Cross Country Championships ma were aha mita 5000 na World Junior Championships in Athletics
Ọ hapụrụ ihe nrite ndị okenye na afọ 2005, na-ewere nke anọ na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi na World Cross Country Championships na nke anọ na mita 5000 na World Championships

Ihe nrite mbụ ya dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu dị elu bịara n'afọ sochirinụ ka Melkamu meriri ọla nchara na agbụrụ dị ogologo na nke dị mkpirikpi na afọ 2006 IAAF World Cross Country Championships (na-emeri ọla edo abụọ)
Ọ gara n'ihu merie 10 kilomita Great Ireland Run n'ọnwa na-esote na ihe omume 31 41 nkeji
Ọ kwughachiri ọla nchara ya na afo 2007, na-enyere ụmụ nwanyị Etiopia aka imeri ọla edo ọzọ
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọlaọcha n'okporo ụzọ na All-Africa Games, na-agwụcha dị ka onye nke abụọ n'azụ Meseret Defar na mita 5000
Ọ bụ onye nke isii n'ebe ahụ na World Championships n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
Melkamu meriri nrite mbụ ya n'ime ụlọ karịa mita 3000 na Machị, na afọ 2008, ọzọ na-ewere ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Defar na World Indoor Championships
O nwetaghị ihe nrite na World Cross Country Championships (na-agwụ na nke itoolu), mana ọ meriri Defar iji merie mita 5000 na African Championships
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Etiopia na Summer Olympic Games na Beijing, na-emecha nke asaa na mita 5000 ikpeazụ n'oge 15 4903
(Ọ gwụchara ọsọ ahụ n'ọnọdụ asatọ mana ọ rịgooro na nke asaa mgbe e wepụrụ onye nke abụọ nke Elvan Abeylegesse ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị n'ihi ọgwụ ọjọọ)
Ọ laghachiri n'ọkwa na afọ 2009 World Cross Country Championships, na-ewere ọla nchara ọzọ
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Juun, o ji oge nke 29 5380 merie ihe ndekọ Afrịka na 10,000 mita na asọmpi na Utrecht, Netherlands, na-emeri oge Tirunesh Dibaba nke 29 5466
O meriri nrite mbụ ya n'ụwa n'ikpeazụ n'oge ahụ, na-agwụcha dị ka onye nke abụọ na Linet Masai na mita 10,000 na World Championships
Ọ gara n'ihu na nrite ọla nchara ya na afo 2010 World Cross Country Championships
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Julaị, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na asọmpi African Championships na Nairobi, na-emecha nke abụọ na Dibaba na mita 10,000
Iji mechie afọ ahụ, ọ meriri Obudu Ranch International Mountain Race na Obudu ime obodo nke Naịjirịa, nke okpukpu abụọ dị ka African Mountain Running Championships
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2011, ọ meriri n'asọmpi nke anọ ya na Jan Meda International Cross Country na Addis Ababa
In February 2013, she ran a half marathon personal best of 1 08 05 hours while finishing in seventh place at the Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon in the United Arab Emirates
Meseret Defar Tola (Amharic; amụrụ na 19 Nọvemba na afọ 1983) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na 3000 mita na 5000 mita
O ritere ihe nrite na asọmpi mba ụwa kachasị elu gụnyere ihe nrite ọla edo nke Olympic na World Championship karịa mita 5000
Ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ ụwa na ihe omume ahụ na afọ 2006, mebie ya ọzọ na afọ 2007 ma jide ya ruo na afo 2008, mgbe onye Etiopia ibe ya Tirunesh Dibaba meriri oge ya
N'afọ 2007 n'okporo ụzọ dị na Brussels Belgium, ọ ghọrọ naanị nwanyị, na-agba ọsọ kilomita abụọ n'ihe na-erughị nkeji 9 (8 5858)
Nke a bụ mmụba na ndekọ ụwa site na sekọnd iri na otu
Defar enweela ihe ịga nke ọma na 5000m na Olympic Games, na-ewere ọla edo na afọ 2012 London Olympics, na afọ 2004 Athens Olympics na ọla nchara na 2008 Beijing Olympics
O nweela ihe ịga nke ọma yiri nke ahụ na World Championships, na-ewere ọlaọcha na afo 2005 Helsinki Championships na ọla edo na afọ 2007 Osaka Championships
Defar nwere ihe ndekọ ime ụlọ maka mita 5,000, mita 3000 na ọsọ kilomita abụọ
Ọ na-achịkwa ihe omume ime ụlọ 3000m, na-emeri ọla edo anọ n'usoro na IAAF World Indoor Championships site na afo 2004 ruo na afọ 2010
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri ugboro abụọ na All-Africa Games, onye nwetara ihe nrite ugboro anọ na African Championships na onye nwetara ọla edo ugboro abụọ na World Junior Championships
Defar wepụrụ onwe ya na asọmpi na 2014 iji malite ezinụlọ
O kwere nkwa ịlaghachi n'afọ 2015 ọ bụ ezie na ọ naghị asọmpi na asọmpi August World Championships na Beijing
Defar meriri nrite ọla edo nke mita 5000 na egwuregwu Afro-Asian nke mbụ na afọ 2003
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na mita 5000 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2004 Summer Olympics na Athens na oge nke 14 4565 na mita 5000 na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics na London
O nwetakwara ọla nchara na afọ 2008 Beijing Olympics, nke tụgharịrị ọlaọcha mgbe e wepụrụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Turkey bụ Elvan Abeylegesse
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2007, ọ gbara ọsọ mita 3000 n'ime ụlọ na Stuttgart (Germany) n'oge ndekọ ụwa nke 8 2372
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2007, ọ gbara ọsọ kilomita abụọ na Carson, California na oge kachasị mma n'ụwa nke 9 1047
Na 1 Septemba 2007 ọ meriri ọla edo na 14 5791 na 5000 m na 2007 World Championships na Osaka, iji soro mmeri Olympic ya na ndekọ ụwa

N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2007, o setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma n'ụwa (8 5858) na ụmụ nwanyị 2-mile (32 ) na Van Damme Memorial meet, na-akpụ akpụ sekọnd 1189 site na akara 9 1047 ọ setịpụrụ na Mee na Carson, California
N'afọ 2007, Defar ritere ihe nrite nke nwanyị IAAF World Athlete of the Year
O ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 2005 World Championships na Helsinki, naanị Tirunesh Dibaba meriri ya
N'afọ 2006, ọ meriri World Indoor Championships karịa mita 3000, na-agbachitere aha ya site na 2004 IAAF World Indoor Championship

Na nzukọ Reebok Boston Indoor nke Jenụwarị 2008, Defar gbara oge nke 9 1050 na ihe omume kilomita abụọ (32 km) iji guzobe oge kachasị mma n'ime ụlọ ọhụrụ nke kilomita abụọ, na-emebi oge kachasị mma nke ime ụlọ gara aga karịa sekọnd iri na abụọ
Defar meriri nrite ọla edo nke atọ n'usoro World Indoor na 3000 m na afọ 2008 World Indoor Championships in Athletics
Na 2008 African Championships in Athletics, onye obodo ya Meselech Melkamu meriri Defar na 5000 m
Na 2008 Bislett Games, Tirunesh Dibaba mebiri ihe ndekọ ụwa nke 5000m nke Defar
O mere 3000/5000 m okpukpu abụọ na afọ 2008 World Athletics Final

Defar malitere oge egwuregwu afọ 2009 site n'imeziwanye ihe kachasị mma ya, na-etinye ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke 5000 m n'ime ụlọ nke 14 2437 na ihe kachasị mma n'ime ime ụlọ karịa kilomita abụọ (32 km) na 9 0626 ọsọ
O sonyere na asọmpi mita 10,000 na ule mba Britain na Julaị, na-anwa iwere ọnọdụ na ndị otu Etiopia na afọ 2009 World Championships in Athletics

N'agbanyeghị ọnọdụ mmiri na ikuku, ọ gbara ọsọ kachasị mma nke 29 5920 nkeji na-emebi ndekọ UK nke Paula Radcliffe, na-aghọ nwanyị nke ise na-agba ọsọ n'okpuru minit 30, ma nweta iru eru maka asọmpi na usoro ahụ

Na Berlin, Meseret na-eduga na afọ 2009 World Championships in Athletics Women's 10,000 mita ruo na mita 50 ikpeazụ mgbe ụkwụ ya yiri ka ọ na-ejikọta ya nke ọma, na-enye Linet Masai nke Kenya ihe nrite ọla edo ma ndị egwuregwu atọ ndị ọzọ gafere ya, na-agwụ na oge nke 30 5237
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ na 2009 World Championships na Athletics nke ụmụ nwanyị 5000 mita ikpeazụ ma na-eduga n'elu ụlọ ahụ, mana ndị Kenya abụọ na mita gafere ya, Vivian Cheruiyot na Sylvia Kibet
Ọ gara n'ihu merie ndị egwuregwu abụọ ahụ na 3000m na 2009 IAAF World Athletics Final otu ọnwa ka e mesịrị, na-etinye oge kachasị n'ụwa nke 8 3015 na usoro ahụ
N'ịgba ọsọ site na mmeri ọla nchara ya, o nwetara ọla edo nke anọ na 3000 m na 2010 IAAF World Indoor Championships
Ka ọ na-aga n'okporo ụzọ, ọ meriri nke atọ ya na Carlsbad 5000, ọ bụ ezie na oge ya nke 15 04 emeghị ka ihe ndekọ nke ya nwee nsogbu
Na 2010 African Championships in Athletics, ọ nọchitere anya Ethiopia na 5000 m wee merie ọlaọcha n'azụ Vivian Cheruiyot
O meriri ọla edo 3000m na afọ 2010 IAAF Continental Cup otu ọnwa ka e mesịrị
O mere ọkara marathon mbụ ya na Rock 'n' Roll Philadelphia Half Marathon ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na nke mbụ, na-emeri n'oge 1 07 44
Akara a ka mma na oge kachasị ọsọ nke Berhane Adere n'ala America maka ebe dị anya ma bụrụ nke ise kachasị ọsọ
Na mbido afọ 2011 o mere mgbalị ndekọ ụwa maka 3000 m n'ime ụlọ ma jiri ọsọ nke 8 3691 nkeji
Ọ bụ onye na-achịkwa na sekit dị n'èzí, na-enweta mmeri 5000m na FBK Games, Bislett Games na Meeting Areva
Mmeri mmeri ya kwụsịrị na afo 2011 World Championships in Athletics, ebe ọ malitere ịpụ na 10,000 m mgbe ahụ Vivian Cheruiyot na Sylvia Kibet meriri ya na 5000 m, wee nweta ọla nchara
Na afọ 2012 IAAF World Indoor Championships ọ chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ onye nke ise na-esote ma na-eduga ruo 100m ikpeazụ, mgbe ahụ ọ dara n'azụ Hellen Obiri wee mechaa ọsọ ahụ dị ka onye nke abụọ
Ọ bụ n'oge nke abụọ ka ọ na-esote n'oge n'èzí, ka ọ na'ọkwa nke abụọ na Cheruiyot ugboro abụọ na onye Etiopia ibe ya Tirunesh Dibaba
N'agbanyeghị nke a, mgbe ọ bịara na 5000m ikpeazụ na afọ 2012 London Olympics ọ meriri ndị na-asọmpi ya abụọ iji nweta aha Olympic nke abụọ ya n'ebe dị anya
Ọ malitere oge ịgba ọsọ n'ime ụlọ ya na afọ 2013 site na mmeri 3000m na nkeji 8 3528
Ka e mesịrị n'ọnwa ọ gbara ọkara marathon kacha mma nke 67 25 nkeji iji mebie ihe ndekọ na New Orleans Half Marathon
O meriri n'asọmpi 5000m na afọ 2013 World Championships in Athletics na Moscow n'oge 14 50 19
O meriri n'ọsọ ahụ site n'ịnọ nso n'ihu, mana n'ebughị ụzọ tupu ọ pụọ na 200m fọdụrụ

Mesfouf, ma ọ bụ masfouf (Arabic مسفوف) bụ nri Algeria na Tunisia nke bụ ụdị couscous nke nwere semolina na bọta ma ọ bụ mmanụ oliv
Nri a na-ewu ewu na Maghreb
Ọ bụ omenala iri mesfouf n'oge ọnwa dị nsọ nke Ramadan
A na-enye ya n'mmemme ọdịnala ma ọ bụ nri ezinụlọ
Na Algeria, a na-eri ya dị ka nri bụ isi e ji ahịhịa na agwa sie nke ọma
Dị ka ha si kwuo, ọ bụ ihe amamihe dị na ya na whey ma ọ bụ yogọt iji mee ka ọ dịkwuo mfe ịgbari nri n'agbanyeghị na ọ dị mfe karịa couscous
E nwere ọtụtụ usoro nri maka mesfouf, dị ka nke na-atọ ụtọ na nke na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ na-ahọrọ nke nwere akwụkwọ nri na anụ
Banyere ndị ọzọ, ha chọrọ ka a na-ejikọta ya na ahịhịa na mkpụrụ vaịn a mịrị amị dịka ọ dị na Tunis
Ndị Sfaxians na-ahọrọ ya ka e jiri almond na ụbọchị chọọ ya mma na mkpụrụ osisi kpọrọ nkụ (pistachios, hazel nuts) na custard
Ụfọdụ ndị na-amasịkwa ịwụsa mmiri ara ehi na mesfouf ma tinye shuga na ya iji mee ka ọ dị ụtọ, dị ka 'ọka', na ụfọdụ mkpụrụ vaịn kpọrọ nkụ na / ma ọ bụ ụbọchị
Banyere ụdị Djerbian nke mesfouf, ọ na-esi ísì ụtọ ma na-ejikarị ose na anụ kpọrọ nkụ na ahịhịa dị iche iche (galik, fennel, lavender))
Mesh Pillay bụ onye nchoputa na CEO na YW Capital ụlọ ọrụ na-enye ike Africa nwere akụ na ezigbo ala na ụlọ, akụrụngwa, ICT na mpaghara ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Assore BEE Trust na onye guzobere Elever Limited
Ọgbakọ ndụmọdụ YW Capital nwere ụfọdụ ndị kacha nwee mmetụta na ndị ike n'ofe kọntinent Africa
Na mbụ onye na-ahụ maka itinye ego na onye ọchụnta ego dabere n'etitiLondon￼￼ na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọ nọrọ oge na Deutsche Bank na Renaissance Capital, ma bụrụbu onye isi nke Equity Capital Markets maka ndịda Sahara Africa na Standard Bank
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọrụ ụlọ akụ na ndị ọchụnta ego ole na ole nwere ahụmahụ dị omimi nke Africa wee rute n'ime ọdọ mmiri ndị dị mkpa nke edobere maka Africa
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya itinye aka na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị nweonwe kacha ukwuu na kọntinent ahụ ma na-anọchite anya gọọmentị Africa dị iche iche
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ na-etinye aka na ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo kachasị ukwuu na kọntinent ma na-anọchite anya gọọmentị dị iche iche nke Afrịka
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ya na Laliga - Spanish Football League na-arụkọ ọrụ iji kwurịta nkwekọrịta azụmahịa ha n'ofe Africa na India
Ọ rụkọrọ ọrụ na ụfọdụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị India kachasị ukwuu nwere mmasị na Afrịka gụnyere, Tata Group, Jindal, Murugappa Group na ezinụlọ dị iche iche
Ọtụtụ n'ime ego ndị ọchịchị zuru ụwa ọnụ na-achọ nghọta ya banyere itinye ego ha na kọntinent gụnyere Abu Dhabi Investment Corporation (UAE), CDC (UK), Tamasek (Singapore) na PIF (Saudi Arabia)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town, Mahadum Duke, Mahadum Columbia, Imperial College (London)
Meskerem Assefa Legesse Wondimagegn (amụrụ na 20 Septemba na afọ1985 na Robe, Arsi) bụ onye Ethiopia na-agba ọsọ n'etiti na ogologo oge
Ọ nochitere anya Etiopia na 2008 na 2012 London Olympics
O nwere ihe kachasị mma nke onwe ya gụnyere 4 0212 nkeji maka mita 1,500, 8 4637 nkeji maka mita 3000 na 2 25 11 awa maka marathon
Meskerem na-asọ mpi karịsịa na 1500 m
Ọ bụ onye sonyere nke ugboro abụọ na World Championships in Athletics ma bụrụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na 2008 African Championships in Atletics
Meskerem malitere ịgba ọsọ n'etiti n'afọ 2001 ma mgbe ọ nọ na Oregon n'afọ 2003 ọ gbara ọsọ 800 mita kacha mma nke 2 0111 nkeji na 1500 mita kacha mma ya nke 4 0396
Ọ bi na United States ruo n'afọ 2007

Mmeri o meriri na All-Ethiopian Games na Addis Ababa na onye nke abụọ na Ethiopian Athletics Championships wetara ya ọnọdụ dị mma na 2007 All-Africa Games, ebe ọ nọ na ọnọdụ nke anọ na ọsọ nke 4 0983 nkeji

N'afọ na eso nke gara gara o wetara ihe nrite mbụ ya dị elu bụ ya bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha n'azụ Gelete Burka na 1500 m na 2008 African Championships in Athletics N'okporo ụzọ egwuregwu Brazil, o nwere mmeri atọ na-aga n'ihu gụnyere nkeji 2 0212 kacha mma na 800m na Rio de Janeiro
Ọsọ kachasị mma ya na 1500m n'oge ahụ bụ 4 0567 nkeji, nke bịara na nzukọ na Jerez de la Frontera
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Etiopia na 2008 Summer Olympics, mana e wepụrụ ya na agba nke mbụ nke okpomọkụ
Onye nke abụọ na asọmupi mba ahụ mere ka o keta nnukwu ọnọdụ na 2009 World Championships in Athletics
Ọ gafere agba nke mbụ, mana ọ malitereghị na ọkara ikpeazụ
1500m kacha mma ya n'afọ ahụ (4 0599) bụ na Prefontaine Classic na Eugene, Oregon, ọ setịpụkwara 3000m kacha mma nke nkeji 8 4637 na Meeting Lille Metropole
Nnukwu asọmupi ya nke afọ 2010 bụ African Championships, ebe ọ bụ onye nke ise n'elu 1500 m

N'ime ọkara mbụ nke afọ ahụ, ọ malitere ịpụ site n'etiti etiti gaa n'ịgba ọsọ dị anya ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Le Mans Cross Country, setịpụrụ oge mita 5000 nke nkeji 15 0349 maka nke atọ na GE Galan, merie Cooper River Bridge Run na ọsọ nke nkeji 32 31 maka 10K, ma nwee njedebe nke atọ na Carlsbad 5000 na Crescent City Classic 5K road races
N'agbanyeghị ihe ịga nke ọma na agbụrụ dị ogologo, Meskerem lekwasịrị anya na 1500 m na afọ 2011 wee nweta oru nsonaazụ kachasị mma ya
Ọ gbara ọsọ kachasị mma nke 4 0363 nkeji maka nke abụọ na Colorful Daegu Championships Meeting, wee meziwanye nke a ruo 4 0212 nkeji dị ka onye nke abụọ na nzukọ Golden Gala IAAF Diamond League
Ọ gbara ọsọ 4 0632 maka ọnọdụ nke abụọ ọzọ na nzukọ Brazzaville wee bụrụ nke asaa na ọsọ nke 4 0448 nkeji na ọkwa kachasị elu Herculis zutere
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Kalkidan Gezahegne n'etiti ndị na-agba ọsọ Ethiopia n'afọ ahụ
A họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ nọchite anya Etiopia n'ọkwa ụwa, mana e wepụrụ ya na okpomọkụ nke 2011 World Championships in Athletics
Ọ nọkwa n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na 1500 m na 2011 All-Africa Games, na-agwụcha n'elu ikpo okwu
Na mbido afọ 2012 ọ gbara ọsọ kachasị mma n'ime ụlọ nke 4 0765 nkeji maka 1500 m na 8 5318 nkeji maka 3000 m
N'èzí, oge kachasị mma ya bịara na Daegu, ebe ọ kwughachiri ọnọdụ ya nke afọ gara aga, na-abịa nke abụọ na 4 0652 nkeji
Mgbe egwuregwu Olimpik gaferer, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na asọmupi DécaNation
Meskerem Legesse (28 Septemba afọ 1986 wee ruo 15 Julaị afọ 2013) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ọsọ
O sonyere na mita 1,500 na 2004 Summer Olympics na Athens
Legesse ghọrọ ọkachamara ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe omume US n'ebe dị iche iche
O setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke ụmụaka na 800m ime ụlọ na oge nke 2 0103 na Fayetteville, United States na 14 Febụwarị 2004
Na 2004 Olympics, ọ gbara ọsọ oge nke 4 18 03 (ebe nke iri na abụọ na okpomọkụ nke mbụ), ọ gakwaghị n'ihu na ihe nrite
Legesse biri na Westport, Connecticut ma ọ nọghị na Ethiopia ruo afọ itoolu, kemgbe afọ 2004
Ọ lara ezumike nká na ịgba ọsọ n'ihi ọnọdụ ọrịa obi
Legesse nwụrụ na mberede izu atọ tupu ya amụọ nwa
Ya na nwa ya nwoke dị afọ abụọ nọ mgbe ọ dara na 15 Julaị n'afọ 2013 na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị na Hamden, Connecticut
Ndị dọkịta nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịzọpụta nwa ya a na-amụbeghị amụ

Ndị otu nyocha asụsụ gbara onye ikpeazụ na-asụ asụsụ a ajụjụ ọnụ mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri asatọ

(amụrụ na Machị 2, 1971), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Method Man, bụ ónyé A America na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu, ónyé mmepụta ndekọ, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya dị ka onye otu hip hop nke East Coast Wu-Tang Clan
Ọ bụkwa ọkara nke hip hop duo Method Man & Redman

O weere aha egwu ya site na ihe nkírí 1979 Method Man N'afọ 1996, Smith ritere Grammy Award maka Best Rap Performance site na Duo ma ọ bụ Group, màkà 'I'll Be There for You/You're All I Need to Get By', nke gosipụtara ónyé na-agụ egwu R&B nke America Mary J
Blige, ónyé ya na ya na-eme ihe nkiri ugbu a na Power Book II Ghost, nke sitere na ihe ngosi mbụ ya Power
Smith apụtala na ihe nkiri dịka 187 (1997), Belly (1998), How High (2001), Garden State (2004), The Wackness (2008), Venom (2005), Red Tails (2012), Keanu (2016), na The Cobbler (2014)
Na telivishọn, ya na ónyé na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro, ónyé na-eti egwu East Coast Redman, so mee ihe nkírí na Fox sitcom Method & Red
O nweela ọrụ ugboro ugboro na usoro HBO atọ, dị ka Tug Daniels na Oz, Melvin 'Cheese' Wagstaff na The Wire, na Rodney na The Deuce Method Man pụtakwara na ihe ọchị TBS The Last OG

A mụrụ ya na Machị 2, 1971, na Hempstead, Long Island, Smith kewara ógè ọ bụ nwata n'etiti ebe óbíbí nna ya na Long Island na ụlọ nne ya na mpaghara Park Hill nke Clifton, Staten Island, nke a maara dị ka Killa Hill

Methodist Boys High School, Lagos (MBHS Lagos) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka ụmụ nwoke dị na Victoria Island, Lagos
Naịjirịa E hiwere ya na 1878, ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị e guzobere na Naịjirịa
Ndị isi nke obodo Metọdist, gụnyere Charles Joseph George, zutere na 1874 iji kwurịta banyere ịmepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka ndị otu ha dị ka ihe ọzọ na CMS Grammar School, Bariga Lagos
Mgbe a na-akpata ego, a malitere iwu ụlọ ahụ ma wuchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Methodist Boys, Lagos na Jụn 1877
Na Maachị 14, 1878, e meghere ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ahụ n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro, na Rev
Terry Coppin dị ka onye isi mbụ
N'ọnwa Eprel 1878, a kpọbatara ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ
E nwere aha iri na abụọ na mpịakọta ahụ
N'etiti ụmụ nwoke iri na abụọ bụ George Stone Smith, onye mbụ na ndepụta ahụ ya mere Senior Foundation Scholar
E nwekwara ndị ọrụ ozi isii na-enye ọzụzụ
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ ahụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ amụbaala ruo ụmụ nwoke 23 na ndị ọrụ asaa, ọrụ amalitela n'ụzọ siri ike
Methodist Boys' High School, Lagos si otú a ghọọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Naijiria, mgbe CMS Grammar School, Bariga, Lagos tọrọ ntọala na 1859 na Baptist Academy, Obanikoro, Lagos na 1885
Baptist Academy malitere dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na 1855 wee gbanwee ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1885

MBHS Lagos na CMS Grammar School, Bariga, Lagos mechara jikọta ọnụ iji nye ụmụ akwụkwọ na-apụ apụ maka Igbobi College, Yaba, Lagos guzobere site na mmekorita nke Chọọchị Metọdist Nigeria na Anglican Communion na Nigeria, na 1932
Ụkpụrụ iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ Non Sibi Sed Aliis, nke pụtara Ọ bụghị Maka Anyị, Kama Maka Ndị Ọzọ
Abụ ụlọ akwụkwọ dị ugbu a bụ Land of Our Birth, We Pledge to You

A na-ejikarị ihe na-acha uhie uhie eme ihe maka mmemme

Ụlọ ndị ahụ bụ Didsbury House, Handsworth House, Kingswood House na Westminster House
Nke a bụ ebe a mụrụ nnukwu ndị na-eme egwuregwu si n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ pụta
Otu n'ime ha bụ Sunday Oliseh onye bụbu Captain nke Green Eagles, ndị otu mba dị elu, nke Naịjirịa
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ meriri Zard Cup maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1948 na Principal's Cup maka ụlọ ọrụ sekọndary na Lagos Steeti na 1961 n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Methodist Boys' High School, Lagos malitere na Broad Street, Lagos ma nọrọ na saịtị ahụ ihe karịrị otu nari afọ
N'ikpeazụ, Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti nyere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ala dị hekta iri isii na Ojoo, Lagos - Badagry Road, Lagos State maka ebumnuche nke ịgbasawanye na ịdị mma maka mmụta

Ọ bụ ezie na e mere mmepe dị ịrịba ama na ebe ọhụrụ ahụ maka ịkwaga ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ e mere atụmatụ maka 1982, Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos mechara weghara ebe ọhụrụ ahụ ma bụrụzi ebe na-adịgide adịgide nke Mahadum Steeti Lagos

N'afọ 1983, e kenyere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ala ọhụrụ dị 57-acre na Victoria Island, Lagos, dị ka ụgwọ maka Ojoo Site, Badagry, Lagos Steeti, nke Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti weghaara maka iji Mahadum Lagos Steeti
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ na Victoria Island
