Michael P

Kelly (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 31, 1954) bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye na-eme atụmatụ obodo nke duru ndị isi ụlọ ọha na eze nke ọtụtụ nnukwu obodo US, ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado iwu ọha na eze na-akwalite ụlọ dị ọnụ ala na mba ahụ
A mụrụ Kelly ma zụlite ya na San Francisco, California

Ọ natara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Architecture na Urban Planning na Mahadum Princeton na 1977, wee gaa n'ihu nata Masters of Architecture na Mahadim California, Berkeley, na 1983; na Master of Arts in Education na Mahadam San Francisco State n'otu afọ ahụ
Kelly malitere ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ọha na eze dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ maka San Francisco Housing Authority na 1983

Ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri, Kelly nwere usoro ọkwá dị iche iche na-aga n'ihu n'ihu na ikike ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa ya na-anọchite anya ya na-aghọ onye mbụ edebanyere aha na-eduzi ụlọ ọha na eze na US

N'afọ 1994, Kelly hapụrụ San Francisco ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na United States Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) dị ka onye ọkachamara na-ahụ maka mgbake nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere nsogbu, na-enye aka na teknụzụ maka ndị otu Transition Team na Housing Authority nke New Orleans
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 1995, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ New Orleans ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa ruo n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 2000, Kelly ghọrọ onye ndu nke District of Columbia Housing Authority (DCHA), otu n'ime mba ndị kasị ukwuu nwere ndị ọrụ 800 na mmefu ego na isi obodo nke ihe karịrị $3
300 nde

DCHA na-achịkwa ụlpuku asatọ 0 nke ọha na eze na ụlpuku iri na abụọ 0 n'okpuru Housing Choice Voucher Program (HCVP), na-enye ụlọ dị ọnụ ala maka ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ paseniri10 nke ndị bi na District
Na ngwụcha Septemba 2009, Kelly gbara arụkwaghịm na DCHA ka ọ bụrụ onye isi njikwa nke New York City Housing Authority (NYCHA)

Kelly jere ozi n'ọkwa a ruo na Machị 2011 mgbe onye odeakwụkwọ HUD Shaun Donovan na onye isi obodo Philadelphia Michael Nutter gwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-anabata nchịkwa nke Philadelphia Housing Authority (PHA), mgbe ahụ onye isi obodo Michael Nutter, ka ọ bụrụkwa onye isi nchịkwa na-adịgide adịgide na PHA

Kelly laghachiri Washington DC dị ka onye nduzi nke Ngalaba Ụlọ na Mmepe Obodo na Jụn 2012, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ ya na Philadelphia maka inwe mmekọrịta nkwekọrịta nke mebiri ụkpụrụ omume ọhụrụ nke PHA na-amachibido imekọ ihe ọnụ n'etiti ndị isi na ndị nọ n'okpuru
Na Maachị 25, 2015, Kelly laghachiri na NYCHA, ọzọ dị ka General Manager
NYCHA na-achịkwa ihe karịrị ụlọ otu narị na iri asaa na asatọ na ọ dịkarịa ala narị puku anọ ndị bi na ya
Kelly enweela ọtụtụ nhọpụta agụmakwụkwọ gụnyere Assistant Adjunct Professor na School of Architecture and Engineering na Howard University na Washington, DC
na Preceptor maka Project 55 Fellowship program na Princeton University, na-eduzi ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ nwere mmasị na ọrụ ọha na eze site na mkpakọrịta afọ

Site na 1997 ruo 2000, Kelly jere ozi dị ka Harvey-Wadsworth Prọfesọ nke Urban Affairs na Mahadum Tulane, yana onye nkuzi nleta na Mahadụ California na Berkeley School of Architecture n'oge mmalite afọ 1980
Ọ natara asambodo nkuzi na New Jersey na California, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mmemme Princeton na Nkwadebe nkuzi
Na mgbakwunye, Kelly arụwo ọrụ ọkachamara dị ukwuu
Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Council of Large Public Housing Authorities, otu ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru nke Washington, DC
nke ndị otu ya na-anọchite anya nnukwu obodo ukwu na US
Kansụl ahụ na-arụ ọrụ iji chekwaa ma melite ụlọ ọha na eze na ọnụ ala site na nkwado, nyocha, nyocha iwu na agụmakwụkwọ ọha

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote onyeisi oche nke National Organization of African Americans in Housing ma nọrọ na bọọdụ nke National Center for Housing and Child Welfare, nke District of Columbia Interagency Commission on Homelessness, na nke Canal Park Development Association
N'afọ 2009, ọ ghọrọ Onye isi oche nke Board of City Year, DC

Kelly bụ onye otu American Institute of Architects; National Housing Conference; National Association of Housing and Redevelopment Officials; American Planning Association; American Institute of Certified Planners; ọ bụkwa US Green Building Council's Leed Green Associate
Kelly bụ onye isi ugbu a na Housing Industry Professionals (HIP) ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka atụmatụ obodo na-etinye aka na ikpe ziri ezi nke ọha na eze site na atụmatụ obodo na imewe
Michael Phillip Austin bụ Divisional Fellow of Sustainable Ecosystems na CSIRO na Canberra, Australia
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye mba ọzọ nke Linnean Society (London) n'afọ 1997, ma nata Gold Medal site na Ecological Society of Australia n'afọ 1995
Michael Raeburn (22 Jenụwarị 1943 ma ọ bụ 1948) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri
Nne Raeburn bụ onye Egypt na nna ya bụ onye Britain
A mụrụ ya na Cairo, ọ biri na Rhodesia site na afọ atọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rhodesia, London na Aix-en-Provence
Mgbe o mechara ihe nkiri satirical ya nke afọ 1969 Rhodesia Countdown, a kpọrọ ya onye mbịarambịa a machibidoro iwu na Rhodesia, ma nọrọ afọ iri na abụọ n'ala ọzọ
N'ịbụ onye bi na London, Raeburn zutere James Baldwin n'afọ 1974
Ha abụọ ghọrọ enyi, na ndị hụrụ n'anya, n'afọ 1977 ha malitere ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ihe nkiri nke Giovanni's Room Marlon Brando kwetara ịrụ ọrụ Guillaume, Robert De Niro gosikwara mmasị na ọrụ ahụ
Na ụbọchị ọmụmụ Baldwin nke iri ise na atọ ya n'afọ 1977 a gwara ndị ọbịa na a ga-eme ihe nkiri ahụ
Otú ọ dị, Raeburn mechara hapụ ọrụ ahụ, na-enwe nkụda mmụọ na ego nke onye nchekwa ọrụ Baldwin chọrọ
Museé Dapper, Paris, 2010 ; Festival de Douarnenez, France, 2011 ; Museum of Cinema, Munich, 2012 ; Jeu de Paume Museum, Paris, 2014

Michael Randle (Amụrụ n'afọ 1933) bụ onye England na-eme mkpọsa udo na onye nchọpụta amaara maka itinye aka na-enweghị ime ihe ike na Britain nakwa maka ọrụ ya n'inyere onye nledo Soviet George Blake aka ịgbapụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Britain
A mụrụ ya n'England, Randle na ndị ikwu ya nọrọ n'Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na Ireland
Ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike n'ime òtù udo kemgbe ọ debanyere aha dị ka onye jụrụ ije ozi agha n'ihi akọ na uche na 1951
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Bekee na Mahadum London (1966), MPhil
na ọmụmụ udo na Mahadim Bradford n'afọ 1981 na PhD
na ọmụmụudo n'afọ 1994, kwa na Mahadam Bradford
Randle bụ onye otu Aldermaston March nke haziri Aldermast March mbụ megide ngwá agha nuklia nke Britain na Ista afọ 1958

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Direct Action Committee Against Nuclear War site n'afọ 1958 ruo afọ 1961, odeakwụkwọ nke Kọmitii nke 100 site n'afọ 1960 ruo afọ 1961 na kansụl na onye isi nke War Resisters' International site n'afọ 1960 ruo afọ 1988
Michael Ray Charles (amụrụ n'afọ 1967) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe nke amụrụ na Lafayette, Louisiana
O meriri Rome Prize na 2018
Ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ntorobịa ya na-etolite na Los Angeles, California, New Orleans, Louisiana na St
Martinville, Louisiana
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St
Martinville Senior High School na 1985
Ka ógè na-aga n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ banyèrè McNeese State University, Lake Charles, Louisiana
N'ime afọ atọ na ọkara sochirinụ, Charles gụrụ imepụta na mgbasa ozi tupu ọ nata nzere BFA na 1989
Mgbè ọ natasịrị akara ugo mmụta MFA ya na 1993 na Mahadum Houston, Houston, Texas, Charles malitere ịkụzi na Mahadim Texas na Austin na 2014, ọ nwetara ọkwa na Mahaduma Houston
Ọrụ na nyocha nke Charles bụ nyocha banyéré ihe nketa nke akụkọ ihe méré eme nke agbụrụ agbụrụ nke ndị Africa America
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha otú e si ele ndị Africa America anya n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke America nakwa otu ha si ele onwe ha anya n'ihi echiche na-eweda onwe ha ala

N'ihe osise ya na ihe osise ya mara mma na nke na-ese onyinyo, Charles na-eji ihe osise Black na stereotypes dị ka Sambo, Aunt Jemima, na-amụmụ ọnụ ọchị, na Uncle Tom, iji kwuo maka àgwà agbụrụ nke oge a
Ihe osise ya nwèrè ọdịdị ochie na nke oge ochie iji yie nka azụmahịa ógè ochie
Site na ndị a, ọ na-ewepụta mkpọsa satirical nke ya maka ngwaahịa efu a na-akpọ Forever Free
Ngwaahịa a na-anọchi anya nkwa ụgha nke nnwere onwe nke America nyere ndị Africa America na ọkachasị site n'ahịa ndị na-azụ ahịa site na foto ụgha ha
Iji gosipụta njikọ dị n'etiti oge gara aga na ugbu a, Charles na-ewere ihe odide Black nkịtị ma kọwaa ha n'ụzọ nke ógè a
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, onyinyo nke Aunt Jemima, nne, bụ otu ihe na-atọ ọchị nke Charles na-akatọkarị n'ọrụ ya
Omume nne abụwo onye na-elekọta ụlọ maka ezinụlọ White n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Otú ọ dị, n'ihe osise ebe Charles na-akọwa Norman Rockwellis Rosie the Riveter, a na-egosipụta Aunt Jemima dị ka ụdị dike
Ọ na-anọdụ ala n'ụzọ eze iji tụọ aro onyinye ya na-enweghị nkwenye na White na Black America (ihe ngosi nke na-agaghị adị na mgbasa ozi n'oge ahụ)
N'otu oge ahụ, ihe ngosi ya na-emegide nne bụ nkatọ siri ike maka ịdị ala ya na nka azụmahịa
Charles na-ahụ onyinyo nke anụmanụ na-enye nwa ara, tinyere ihe odide ojii ndị ọzọ, dị ka mgbalị ime ka ha ghara iyi ndị ọcha egwu
Enwere ike ịhụ otu ụdị ụzọ ahụ n'ụzọ Charles si emeso ihe oyiyi nke ihe odide Blackface na ihe ngosi minstrel
Charles yiri ka ọ kwenyere na site n'ịgbaso echiche ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na nke na-eweda n'ala, mmadụ nwere ike ikpughe echiche ịkpa oke agbụrụ na-adịgide adịgide
Charles so n'ime ndị otu mbụ nkè ndị na-ese ihe gosipụtara na usoro PBS nke afọ 2001, nke akpọrọ 'Art 21' Usoro mmiri ahụ na-eme ka ndị na-ese ihe kachasị elu nke narị afọ nke 21
N'afọ 2000, ọ bụ ónyé ndụmọdụ na ihe nkírí Spike Lee, 'Bamboozled' ma bụrụkwa isiokwu nke ọtụtụ ihe nkírí
Na Septemba 2019, Charles meghere ihe ngosi ọhụrụ na UMLAUF na Austin, Texas
Ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyere ma ọrụ ichié na nke ọhụrụ, ọrụ pụrụ iche banyéré ụgbọ ohu Clotilda, yana ihe ahọpụtara site na nchịkọta nyocha Charles nke ihe oyiyi agbụrụ na mgbasa ozi
Michael Steven Harper (March 18, 1938 May 7, 2016) bụ onye America na-ede abụ ma burukwa prọfesọ Bekee na Mahadum Brown, onye bụ onye na-ede abụ Laureate nke Rhode Island site n'afọ 19
Jazz na akụkọ ihe mere eme nwere mmetụta abụbụ uri ya
N'etiti mmetụta ndị kpụrụ edemede ya, o kwuru na ihe mmụta kachasị mkpa ọ mụtara n'aka ndị na-agụ egwú bụ phrasing, izi ezi nke phrasing
O bipụtara akwụkwọ iri nke abụ, abụọ n'ime ha bụ Dear John, Dear Coltrane (1970) na Images of Kin (1977) bụ ndị a họpụtara maka National Book Award
A gụnyere ọtụtụ n'ime abụ ya dị ka ihe atụ nke akwụkwọ edemede Africa-America na abụ jazz n'akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche
A mụrụ Harper na Brooklyn dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ atọ n'ime ezinụlọ ndị isi ojii dị ala
Nna nna ya, Roland Johnson, bụ dọkịta Canada a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke ọma ma bụrụ dọkịta na-enye Harper n'ụlọ ha
Ọ bụkwa onye isi na-emetụta mkpebi mbụ ya ịchụso pre-med na Los Angeles kọleji obodo
Nna ya Walter (onye aha ya nke abụọ, Warren) bụ onye malitere akwụkwọ ozi 'ọhụrụ' ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta post ọfịs
Nne ya Katherine Louise, nke a mụrụ Johnson bụ odeakwụkwọ ahụike
Banyere nne na nna ya, Harper kwuru n'otu oge, 'Ndị mụrụ m enweghị ego buru ibu, mana ha nwere nnukwu nchịkọta ndekọ'
Nke a ga-emecha metụta ọrụ ya, na-agwakọta uri na jazz
A mụrụ nwanne ya nwoke nke obere Jonathan Paul n'afọ1941 ma nwụọ n'ihe mberede ọgba tum tum n'afọ 1977
A mụrụ nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere, Katherine Winifred, n'afọ 1943
Ha tolitere na Bedford-Stuyvesant, akụkụ ugwu nke etiti Brooklyn, ruo mgbe ezinụlọ ya kwagara n'ụlọ ha na Los Angeles n'afọ 1951, ebe ọ gara Dorsey nke sekọndrị
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, Harper chọsiri ike ịpụ n'ụlọ nna ya banye n'ime nke ya, na-egosi ọchịchọ ya ịrụ ọrụ, mepụta ma mụta ihe n'ụzọ nke ya
N'afọ 1955, ọ gara Los Angeles City College, na mbụ na-edebanye aha na nkuzi pre-med na akwụkwọ edemede, na-agụsị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1959 na onye mmekọ nke nka
Na Los Angeles State College of Applied Arts and Sciences (nke bụzi California State University, Los Angeles, ọ nwetara nzere BA
na MA na ọmụmụ Bekee n'afọ 1961
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge na post ọfịs ma kpọọ ahụmahụ a 'ezi agụmakwụkwọ' ya
Ọ sonyeere Iowa ogbako ndị odee na Mahadum nke Iowa, ebe ọ na-eguzogide n'ụzọ dị ukwuu mmegharị nke ide na syllabics, nke ọ kpọrọ 'nke dị egwu'
N'oge ọ nọ na Iowa City Harper kwuru, 'Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ihe m mụtara
enweghị ihe jikọrọ ya na ogbako' n'ihi nnupụisi nke Civil Rights Movement n'oge ahụ
O nwetara MFA n' afọ 1963
Ọ kụziri Bekee na Contra Costa College na San Pablo, California na abụ ya pụtara na obere magazin
N'afọ 1968, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ede abụ na Lewis & Clark College ma kụzie na Reed College ma na Portland, Oregon
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, o tinyere ihe odide na Asọmpi Nrite abụ nke US, nke Gwendolyn Brooks nyere
Ọ bụ ezie na o merighị, Brooks na-akpọ ọrụ ya onye mmeri ya
Harper kwuru na Brooks nyere ya ọrụ ya
Na Brooks n'azụ ya, Mahadum Pittsburgh bipụtara akwụkwọ ya ma nyochaa ya na Time n'afọ 1970 na edemede mkpuchi nke Ralph Ellison
N'afọ 1996, Brooks nyere Harper George Kent Ihe nrite nke abụ maka Ndozigharị nsọpụrụ
N'afọ 1970, ọ kụziri na California State College na Hayward, California
Ọ sonyeere ngalaba Bekee na Mahadum Brown, ebe ọ kụziri ọmụmụ akwụkwọ na ọmụmụ abụ nye ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche ruo afọ ole na ole nke mmemme nzere Masta n'okike ide edemede
Otu n'ime ndị enyemaka nyocha ụmụ akwụkwọ ya bụ Denice Joan Deitch, nwa akwụkwọ na mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Academy of American Poets awardee, 1977 (nke bụzi Rev
Jade D
Benson, onye ozi Unitarian Universalist na onye na-ede uri / onye na-akọ akụkọ mkpirikpi)
Ọ kụzikwaara Michael Gizzi, Bob Kessler, Julia Thacker, na ndị ọzọ gara n'ihu dee, kụzie, ma ọ bụ jeere nka ozi n'ụzọ ndị ọzọ
Ụmụ akwụkwọ kpọrọ ya 'MSH', 'Onye isi', na 'Onye Ukwu'
Ọ nọgidere n'ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na Disemba 2013 ma bụrụkwa prọfesọ kachasị ogologo oge nke Bekee na Nkà edemede na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 1993, Nathan A
Scott dere na Princeton Encyclopedia of Poetry and Poetics na 'Harper emeela ọrụ nke, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwetara nkwanye ùgwù na mmasị dị ukwuu, kwesịrị ka a mara ya karịa ka ọ bụ' ịrị abụọ na ise

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na Brown, onye bụbu nwa akwụkwọ George Makari kwuru na Harper 'na-abanye n'ụzọ miri emi na ndụ onwe anyị, na-ama anyị aka ịtụgharị onye anyị chere na anyị bụ, [ma] gwa anyị ka anyị hapụ nwata ma banye n'ụdị nsogbu okike
Harper lụrụ di ma nwee nwa nwanyị, Rachel, onye bụkwa onye edemede, na ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Roland na Patrice
O mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm
Ọ biri na Providence, Rhode Island ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Mee 7, 2016
Harper nwere ụmụ abụọ nwụrụ mgbe a mụrụ ha, nke kpaliri ọtụtụ n'ime uri mbụ ya, gụnyere 'Nightmare Begins Responsibility'
Harper dere banyere ndị Afrika Amerika dị mkpa na akụkọ ihe mere eme, gụnyere Jackie Robinson dị ka Richard Wright, yana John Brown
O kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Terry Gross gbara ya n'afọ 2000, na ihe kachasị mkpa ọ mụtara n'aka ndị na-agụ egwú bụ phrasing, izi ezi nke nkebiokwu, izi ezi nke nkebi okwu, na oke elu na ikike ime mmụọ
Harper na-edekarị banyere nwunye ya, Shirley (nke a na-akpọkarị 'Shirl'), ụmụ ha, na ndị nna nna ha, yana ndị enyi na ndị isi ojii dị iche iche na akụkọ mere eme na ọdịbendị
[citation needed] Na abụ, Harper kwuru, sị 'Ezigbo uri bụ ezigbo abụ
Ọtụtụ mgbe, a pụghị itinye ya n'ime okwu, ma ọ bụ edemede dị mfe
' Nke a metụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ ya, ọkachasị 'Blue Ruth America' (1971) nke gosipụtara mba ahụ n'àkwà ụlọ ọgwụ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke afọ 2009, o kwuru banyere mkpa ọ dị ikwu okwu ọha na eze, na-ekwu na ndị mmadụ nwere nsogbu na Onye isi ala Barack Obama n'ihi na ọ na-ekwu maka ihe ndị na-esote mgbe a na-eji ọtụtụ n'ime ha 'na-ada ụda'
Abụ egwu jazz n'eso
Michael Nyuanu Teye (June 13, 1955) bụ onye otu nzuko omeiwu nke abụọ, nke atọ na nke anọ nke mba nke anọ
maka okpuru ọchịchị Manya na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Ghana nke a na-akpọkwa MTN
Nyuanu Teye lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst raara onwe ya nye na mkpakọrịta dị ka onye Baptist
A mụrụ Nyaunu Teye na 13 June 1955 na Manya Kpogunor na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nchịkwa na nchịkwa ọha na Ghana (GIMPA) ma nwee asambodo post-graduate na Business Administration na 2001
O nwetakwara Executive Masters ya na GIMPA
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego site na ọrụ ya ma nwee azụmahịa njem (onye na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya)
Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke ECOWAS Parliament

N'afọ 1996, a họpụtara ya na vootu 24,763 n'ime vootu 30,963 ziri ezi nke na-anọchite anya 5950% karịa ndị na-emegide ya Kodjiku Lawerence Kpabitey onye otu NPP, Robert Kwesi Nartey onye otu PNC, Samuel Terlabie onye otu CPP na John Tetteh Akuerter onye otu EGLE nke nwetara vootu 5,718, vootu 482, vootu 0 na vootu 0 n'otu

Ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke nzuko omeiwu nke abụọ nke mba Ghana nke anọ
(CPP), (NRP), na People's National Convention (PNC) sonyeere
Henry Derma Narh nke NPP nwetara votu 9,291

Ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke ndị omeiwu nke abụọ nke 4th Republic of Ghana (1997)

Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2004, O nwetara vootu 18,571 n'ime vootu 35,248 ziri ezi nke na-anọchite anya 5270% karịa ndị na-emegide ya Mrs Difie Agyarko Kusi onye otu NPP, Anim Amartey Francis Cecil onye otu IND, Emmanuel Kwame Adjei Okrah onye otu CPP, Robert Nartey Kwesi onye otu PNC na Cecilia Kosi Akuerter onye otu EGLE nke nwetara vootu 15,228, vootu 704, vootu 286, vootu 238 na vootu 221
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị otu mkpọsa onye isi ala
NDC kwụsịtụrụ ya na mpaghara Lower Manya Krobo maka omume ọjọọ ya na ndị otu atọ ndị ọzọ nọ na mpaghara ahụ
O mekwara asọmpi dị ka onye omeiwu nwere onwe ya na ntuli aka nke afọ 2012 mgbe ọ hapụrụ onye otu NDC
Michael Tolaydo (a mụrụ na 23 Julaị 1946), dịkwa ka Michael Ellis-Tolaydo, bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ihe nkiri America
A mụrụ ya na 23 Julaị 1946 na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na ihe ékwunka
N'egwuregwu ihe nkiri mbụ ya, ọ mere dịka otu n'ime ndị uwe ojii na mmepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Arsenic na Old Lace
Mgbe ahụ, ọ bụ akụkụ nke ọtụtụ egwuregwu Motti Lerner nke Sinai Peter duziri
Ọ kwagara DC site na NYC na mmalite afọ 1980
A họpụtala ya maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri Helen Hayes Award ma mesịa nata otu maka ime ihe nkiri
O mekwara ihe nkiri, The Admission, Apples from the Desert na New Jerusalem
A họpụtara ya ọzọ maka Helen Hayes Award maka ịkwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri maka ọrụ ya na New Jerusalem
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-achịkwa n'ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ na egwuregwu, The Accident, Benedictus, na The Pangs of the Messiah, Heroes nke o ritere Helen Hayes Award for Ensemble Acting
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa Prọfesọ Emeritus nke Ụlọ ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri, na Media Studies na St
Mary's College of Maryland
Mgbe afọ iri abụọ na itoolu nke ọrụ nkuzi gasịrị, ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2016
Michael Tsegaye (a mụrụ n'afọ 1975 na Addis Ababa ) bụ onye Ethiopia na-ese ihe na onye na-ese foto
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-egosi ọhụ nke ndụ na Ethiopia nke oge a
Ọ bụ ezie na ndepụta dị ukwuu nke ihe oyiyi ya sitere na njem ya na mba ọzọ
Michael Tsegaye tolitere na Addis Ababa ebe ọ gara Cathedral Elementary na Tikur Anbessa High School
Ọ debara aha na Ngalaba Economics nke Mahadum Addis Abeba tupu ọ gafee na School of Fine Arts and Design
N'ebe ahụ, ọ natara nzere diplọma ya na eserese na 2002, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ kwụsịrị eserese mgbe ọ malitere inwe nnukwu mmerụ ahụ na eserese mmanụ
O mechara chọta mmasị ya na foto
Michael Tsegaye na-arụ ọrụ maka mbipụta mba ụwa dịka Der Spiegel, Jeune Afrique, na enorm; yana ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Bloomberg na Reuters
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ maka ọtụtụ NGO mba ụwa na mba dị iche iche na ikike kemgbe afọ 2006, gụnyere Médecins Sans Frontières, UNESCO na GIZ
Karịsịa site n'afọ 2007 ruo n'afọ 2008, e were ya n'ọrụ na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na GIZ's Engineering Capacity Building Project (ECBP) na Addis Ababa
E wezụga ọrụ ọkachamara ya, Michael bụkwa onye na-ese ihe a ma ama nke na-elekwasị anya na ihe nkiri mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nakwa foto nka
O gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ngosi dị iche iche na New York, Paris, Berlin, Madrid, Morocco, Canada, Amsterdam, Mali, Miami, na São Paulo

Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na ọtụtụ magazin mba ụwa na katalọgụ dị iche iche nke gụnyere Snap Judgments New Directions in African Photography, nke Okwui Enwezor deziri, nke International Centre for Photography bipụtara na New York City na 2007
N'afọ 2011, Michael Tsegaye ritere ihe nrite nke mbụ maka European Union-African Union Professional Photography Competition dị ka onye nnọchi anya Eastern Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ese ihe na Thami Mnyele Foundation na 2010
Michael Bizwick Usi (aka Dr Manganya) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Malawi, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na onye egwu
Dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka 'Dr
Manga' na ihe nkiri Dr
Manga
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke usoro ihe nkiri MBC TV bụ Tikuferanji (Gịnị mere anyị ji nwụọ)
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1968
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Mulanje
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Adventist Development and Relief Agency (ADRA)
Ọ lụrụ Ella, onye nọọsụ na-arụ ọrụ na Blantyre Adventist Hospital
N'enweghị TV mba na Malawi, ọ nwetara iwu ewu ya site n'ịrụ ọrụ na redio na MBC Radio 1 na Malawi
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri
Ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka okwu ndị dị mkpa na Malawi ma gosipụta eziokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndụ Malawi
Usi na-etinye aka n'ịgbalị iwu ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na Malawi ma na-akwado mgbe niile maka uto nke ụlọ ọrụ na Malawi

N'afọ 2010 ọ pụtara na MWA (Malawi Washington Association) Extravaganza 2010 Panel mkparịta ụka nke MWA kwadoro na Malawian Embassy na Washington DC ebe ọ tụlere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Malawi na echiche ya gbasara mgbasawanye ya
Ihe a na-elekwasị anya na PhD ya, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Bedfordshire n'ihe dịka afọ 2015, bụ maka ndị ntorobịa na-emepe mba ha
Nnyocha ya gụnyere nyocha nke usoro itinye aka ndị ntorobịa n'ọtụtụ mba
Onye nlekọta ya bụ Prọfesọ Marilyn Leask, Dean nke Education na Tourism na mahadum Marilyn Leask
N'abalị 6 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019, onye isi otu United Transformation Movement (UTM) Saulos Klaus Chilima kpughere Michael Usi dịka onye ya na ya na-agba ọsọ maka ntuli aka atọ nke Mee 21
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2020, a họpụtara Michael Usi ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka njem nlereanya, anụ ọhịa na ọdịbendị nke Republic of Malawi na kọmitii nke Onye isi ala Lazarus Chakwera

Michaela Ewuraba Boakye-Collinson (a mụrụ na 1 Ọktoba 1987), nke a maara dịka Michaela Coel, bụ onye Britain na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-agụ egwu
Maka ọrụ ya na nke ikpeazụ, Coel mere akụkọ ihe mere eme dịka nwanyị ojii mbụ meriri Emmy Award for Outstanding Writing for a Limited Series, Movie, or Dramatic Special na 73rd Primetime Emmy Awards

A makwaara Coel maka ọrụ ya na ihe ndị ọzọ Netflix, gụnyere ndị ọbịa na usoro Black Mirror (2016–2017), nke gosipụtara dịka Kate Ashby na usoro Black Earth Rising (2018) na dịka Simone na ihe nkiri Been So Long (2018)
A mụrụ Michaela Ewuraba Boakye-Collinson na East London
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Ghana
Ya na nwanne ya nwanyị tolitere na East London, ọkachasị Hackney na Tower Hamlets, ya na nne ha
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik na East London, ma kwuo na, n'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ na-emegbu ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, na-ekwu na ọ bụ n'ihi ịnọpụ iche ya dịka naanị nwa akwụkwọ ojii n'afọ ndụ ya
Nkewa ahụ anọgideghị na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ zuru oke
Site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2009, Coel gara Mahadum nke Birmingham, na-amụ English Literature na Theology
O were Ché Walker masterclass mgbe ọ zutere Walker n'abalị igwe okwu
N'afọ 2009, ọ gafere na Guildhall School of Music and Drama, ebe ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ debanyere aha na afọ ise
O ritere ihe nrite Laurence Olivier Bursary, nke nyeere ya aka ịkwụ ụgwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
N'oge ya na Guildhall, Coel gara nzukọ Mark Proulx na Prima del Teatro ma were Kat Francois Poetry Course na Theatre Royal Stratford East
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Guildhall School of Music and Drama n'afọ 2012
N'afọ 2006, Coel malitere ime ihe nkiri na uri na Ealing

Ka ọ na-aga n'ihu na-eme mics na-emeghe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye nduzi Ché Walker gbara ya ume, onye hụrụ ya ka ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na Hackney Empire, itinye akwụkwọ na Guildhall
Dịka onye na-ede uri, Coel rụrụ ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gụnyere Wembley Arena, Bush Theatre, Nuyorican Poets Cafe na De Doelen, Rotterdam
Aha ya bụ Michaela The Poet
Coel sonyeere Talawa Theatre Company summer school program TYPT n'afọ 2009
N'oge ọ nọ na Talawa, Coel nọ na mmepụta TYPT 2009 nke Krunch, nke Amani Naphtali duziri
N'otu afọ ahụ, Coel wepụtara abọm akpọrọ Fixing Barbie, nke gosipụtara ọrụ ya dịka onye na-ede uri na onye egwu
N'afọ 2011, Coel wepụtara ndekọ We're the Losers
Ọ natara nyocha dị mma
N'afọ 2016 BAFTA Awards, Coel yi uwe, nke nne ya mere, nke e ji ákwà Kente mee
O kwuru na, dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Chewing Gum ya bụ Tracey, ọ ghọrọ onye okpukpe n'okwukwe Pentikọstal ma nabata alụkwaghịm
Coel kwụsịrị ime Pentikọstal mgbe ọ gara Guildhall
Ọ na-akọwa dịka aromantic

Michel Qissi (Arabic; a mụrụ Mohammed Qissi na 12 Septemba 1962) bụ onye Belgium Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Tong Po na ihe nkiri martial arts nke afọ 1989 Kickboxer
A mụrụ Qissi na Oujda, Morocco wee kwaga Brussels, Belgium mgbe ọ dị afọ 2
Ọ malitere ọzụzụ n'ịkụ ọkpọ mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, wee bụrụ onye mmeri amateur na klas ya dị arọ mgbe ọ dị 17
Ọ gakwara n'ihu na-amụ Shōtōkan Karate, Muay Thai na Kickboxing
Ọ ghọrọ enyi Jean-Claude van Damme mgbe ọ dị obere ma ha tolitere n'otu ịhụnanya maka ihe nkiri na ọzụzụ na nkà ọgụ
N'afọ 1982, Qissi na Van Damme kwagara na mba United States na olile anya ịghọ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1984, a tụbara ha abụọ dịka ndị ọzọ na ihe nkiri Breakin', tupu ha enwee nnukwu ezumike ha n'afọ 1986

Mgbe ha nwetasịrị ajụjụ ọnụ na Menahem Golan nke Cannon Films, ha nwetara nkwekọrịta foto atọ, nke mbụ n'ime ha bụ Bloodsport na-aga nke ọma, nke Van Damme gosipụtara na Qissi nwere obere ọrụ dị ka onye ọgụ asọmpi aha ya bụ Suan Paredes
N'afọ 1989, Qissi na Van Damme jikọtara ọnụ ọzọ maka ihe nkiri Kickboxer, nke Van Damme bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọzọ na Qissi bụ onye isi ihe nkiri ahụ, Tong Po
1990 hụrụ ha abụọ na-eme fim Lionheart, nke nwanne Qissi, Abdel, mere onye ọjọọ ahụ
Nke a ga-abụ ihe nkiri ikpeazụ Van Damme na Qissi mere ọnụ ruo afọ iri na isii, mana Qissi gara n'ihu weghachite ọrụ ya dịka Tong Po na Kickboxer 2
Ya na Van Damme pụtara na mkpirikpi na Kickboxer Vengeance
N'afọ 2014, Qissi mere ihe nkiri Bara na Salar Zarza, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ abụọ dịka Bara na Hamza
Michele Bruno (1941-2016) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-edozi ntụtụ isi na South Africa
Bruno biri na Johannesburg wee bịa na-eme drag na 1960s
Ọ bụ onye Miss Gay South Africa mbụ n'afọ 1969
A mụrụ Bruno n'afọ 1941 ma nne na nna ya bụ ndị mbịarambịa si Ịtali bịa South Africa
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1960, Bruno na-eme ihe dị ka drag queen, ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ụbọchị ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-edozi isi na Johannesburg
Bruno jiri nnọchiaha nwoke mee ihe ma were ya dị ka 'ụdị nwoke na nwanyị dị iche iche'
N'afọ 1960, Bruno sonyere na ihe ngosi drag mbụ na Jewish Guild Theatre
Bruno nwetara ọtụtụ ihere mgbe e jidere ya maka 'ịkwado onwe ya dị ka nwanyị' na mwakpo Forest Town nke 1966
E bipụtara aha Bruno, tinyere ndị ọzọ bịara na akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ 1969, a kpọrọ Bruno Miss Gay South Africa mbụ
Bruno gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-edozi ntutu isi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2016
Ọ bụ otu n'ime isiokwu nke ihe ngosi na Museum nke Africa, 'Joburg Tracks'
Mavatiku Michelino Visi, nke a na-akpọkarị Michelino, bụ onye na-edekọ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye na-egwu egwu na onye na-eti egwu, na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Ọ bụ onye otu egwu Congo African Fiesta Nationale, nke e mechara kpọwa Afrisa International, nke onye isi egwu Congo, Tabu Ley duziri
Mgbe e mesịrị, na mmalite afọ ndị 1970, Michelino hapụrụ Afrisa wee sonye na TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu ndị Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo n'afọ 1980s
Nne na nna Angola mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya, n'obodo Matadi nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Congo, Michelino kwagara Kinshasa, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Michelino bi ugbu a, na-egwu ma na-akụzi egwu na Paris, France
O nwere otu egwu nke ihe dị ka mmadụ asatọ
Michelle Abueng (amụrụ na 6 Mee, na afọ 2001) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Motswana nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka klọb Zambia Yasa FC na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Botswana

Ọ dọtara uche nke klọb Zambia Yasa Queens mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu megide Zambia na afọ 2018 African U-17 Women's World Cup Qualifying Tournament, mana ha enweghị ike ịbịanye aka na ya ruo 2019 ebe ọ ka bụ nwata n'oge ahụ
Ọ gbara goolu ise n'egwuregwu ya na Namibia na afọ 2020 African U-20 Women's World Cup Qualifying Tournament
O mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa na 2019 COSAFA Women's Championship na 1 Ọgọst na afọ 2019, na-agba naanị goolu na mmeri Namibia

Michelle Chinwendu Alozie (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprelụ n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Naijiria a mụrụ n'America nke na-agba bọọlụ nke na-eme egwuregwu dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ National Women's Soccer League Houston Dash na otu egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị nke Naijiria
A zụlitere Alozie na Apple Valley, California
Alozie gara Granite Hills High School n'obodo ya, Mahadum Yale na New Haven, Connecticut na Mahadum Tennessee
Alozie mere nke mbụ ya na Naijiria na 10 June 2021 dị ka onye nnọchi anya nkeji nke 65 na mmeri enyi na enyi na Jamaica
Michelle Attoh bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme telivishọn na CEO
nke ụlọ ọrụ Marketing and Events
A mụrụ ya na Ghana n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Ghana, Rama Brew
Michelle bụ onye na-achikọta Today's Woman na TV3
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ndị ọzọ ọ rụrụ n'ọrụ ya bu ndi edepụtara n'okpuru ebe a
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri a ma ama bụ Isidingo, Egoli Place of Gold
Amụrụ ya ma o tolite na Eastern Cape, South Africa
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị obere
O buru ụzọ sonye na ihe nkiri South Africa wee mee n'ọtụtụ ihe omume nkwago na mba ahụ dum
Na 1999, ọ kwagara Gauteng ịchụso ọrụ ọkachamara
N'oge ndụ ya na Gauteng, o mere ihe ngosi ọha na eze mbụ na Girl Talk 2000
Mgbe ahụ ọ pụtara dị ka 'Patty' ihe mgbu na spektakular Grease Stadium
O mere ihe ngosi telivishọn na usoro Egoli Place of Gold na 2009
N'ime usoro ihe omume ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Candice (Candy) Botha Smith' site na emumere nke iri ruo nke iri na asatọ
O gosipụtara ngosi obere oge dị ka ọbịa na usoro ihe nkiri bụ Generations
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado dị ka'Janine Cullanan' na usoro High Rollers wee sonye na Soap opera telivishọn ama ama bụ Isidingo ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Wendy'
Michelle Bello (amuru Michelle Aisha Bello ; 30 Septemba 1982) bu onye na eduzi ma mmepụta ihe nkiri BritishNaijiria na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ na mbipụta na Naijiria, Blu Star Entertainment Limited
A mụrụ Bello na London, England
Nke nta nke ụmụ abụọ, amụrụ Bello na September 1982 nye Abdullahi Dominic na Sylviane Bello
Bello bụ onye Naijiria, French, African-American na onye Congo
Ọ nọrọ afọ nwata ya na Lagos, Naịjirịa, ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ọ gawara England ebe ọ nwetara ma GCSE na asambodo A-level
Ọ bụ mgbe ọ na-etolite na England ka ọ chọpụtara na ọ na-agụsi ya agụụ ike ime ihe nkiri, ọ dịghị eleghachi azụ na ime ihe nkiri
Bello gawara United States na 2001 imuta communications (ihe mmụta puruiche na Visual Media) na American University nke di na Washington DC
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, o mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na n'oge mmemme ọmụmụ ihe ná mba ọzọ na in Prague, nke Czech Republic, Bello mere obere ihe nkiri 16mm mbụ ya akpọrọ Sheltered
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum America na 2005, ọ laghachiri na Nigeria ka ọ gbasoo ebum n'obi ya nke ịghọ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri / onye nduzi
Na 2007, Bello na onye na-emeputa ihe nkiri TV a ma ama na onye na-emekwa ihe ngosi Mo Abudu rụrụkoro ọrụ dị ka onye sonyere na-emepụta ihe na ihe ngosi MNet TV Moments with Mo
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ mepụtara vidiyo egwu na-emeri ihe nrite Greenland maka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ese foto TY Bello
Michelle mepụtara ma duzie ihe nkiri izizi ya akpọrọ Small Boy na ngwụcha 2007
N'ihu ụlọ, Small Boy gara n'ihu nweta ihe nrite abụọ nke African Movie Academy maka 'Best Art Direction' na 'Best Young Child Actor' na Eprel 2009
Emere ihe nkiri a na Lagos, Nigeria na Mee 2010
ya na ndị ama ama Nollywood na ndị ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe bịara
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Bello laghachiri na United States wee nweta nzere masta na Communications, ọkachamara na Film Directing, na Mahadum Regent dị na Virginia
O ji ohere ahụ mepụta nka ya wee mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Regent, a họpụtara Bello ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ICM Talent Agency nke a ma ama na 2011 Cannes Film Festival
Ọ gara ememme ihe nkiri Sundance n'afọ ahụ dịka akụkụ nke mmemme klas nke mahadum haziri wee zute ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama n'oge ọ nọrọ
Enyere Michelle ihe nrite Trailblazer a ma ama na nke chọsiri ike na ihe nrite Africa Magic Viewer's Choice Awards 2014 na nso nso a, nke mere na Lagos, Nigeria
Ndị ọka ikpe ndị votu kwuru na a na-enye ya ihe nrite a 'maka ntinye aka ya na igosi nkà ya, nka ya na ikike ya maka ụzọ dị mma na sinima Africa'
Ihe nrite a biara ya na ụgbọ ala Hyundai ọhụrụ

A họpụtara Flower Girl n'onwe ya maka ihe nrite AMVCA anọ gụnyere ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye na-akwado, onye na-eme ihe nkiri wee gaa n'ihu nweta, onye edemede kacha mma na ihe nkiri na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma
Michelle na-emepụta ihe nkiri ya nke atọ ugbu a
N'okpuru nche anwụ Blu Star Entertainment Limited, Bello bipụtara The Film Directory, akwụkwọ na-edepụta ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ewepụtara mbipụta nke mbụ na Septemba 2007 na Abuja Film Festival ma ndị ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị gụnyere Nigerian Film Corporation na National Film and Video Censors Board kwadoro ya
Dịka nwata n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'England, ikike egwuregwu Bello mere ka ọ banye na netball ụlọ akwụkwọ, igwu mmiri na ndị egwuregwu okirikiri
Na mgbakwunye na nke a, o wepụtara oge maka akụkụ egwu nke ọdịdị ya ma mụta ịkpọ saxophone na piano
Nna Bello nke Naijiria, Air Vice Marshal Abdullahi Bello (rtd), A mụrụ na Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State, wee ruo n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onyeisi ndị ọrụ ụgbọelu kacha nta na Africa na 1980
Ka afọ iri abụọ na ise nke ọrụ ọma gachara ọ kwụsịrị maka ezumike nka n'ọrụ ụgbọ elu Naịjirịa

Nne ya onye America/French, Sylvaline, bụ onye ama ama n'ihe gbasara nka nka nke Naijiria, na-akwalite arụmọrụ na nka n'ụlọ na mba ofesi dịka onye isi oche otu NGO Naijiria akpọrọ Masoma Africa Foundation fnke Arts
Site na nwata, nne Bello kpughere ya na ihe masars egwu, ihe ngosi na ihe nkiri nke ọ na-atọ ụtọ mgbe niile
Michelle Butler-Emmett (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 4 n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1983) bụ onye egwuregwu badminton nke South Africa
Ọ bụ onye nrite ọla ọcha nke All-Africa Games na ngwakọta abụọ na 2015 na ihe omume otu na 2011 na 2015
Butler-Emmett meriri n'asọmpi Afrịka n'asọmpi abụọ n'afọ 2013 na 2014, nakwa n'asọmpi abụọ nke ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ 2017
Ngwakọta okpukpu abụọ

Michelle Claire Edwards (ka amụrụ na 11 Julaị 1974) bụ onye egwuregwu badminton nke South Africa
Edwards gbara badminton na 2004 Summer Olympics, Aparna Popat nke India meriri ya na agba nke iri atọ na abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị
Na okpukpu abụọ nke ụmụ nwanyị, Nicole Grether na Juliane Schenk nke Germany meriri Edwards na onye ọlụlụ ya Chantal Botts na agba nke 32

N'afọ 2007, o ritere ihe nrite atọ na badminton na 2007 All-Africa Games, ihe nrite ọla edo na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na Chantal Botts, ihe nrite ọla ọcha na ụmụ nwanyị, na ihe nrite ọla nchara na ngwakọta abụọ
O sonyekwara na Summer Olympic Games nke afọ 2008 na 2012 na mmemme ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Na 2008 Summer Olympics ya na Chantal Botts sọrọ mpi, ha meriri Taipei na agba nke mbụ
Na 2012 Summer Olympics, onye ọlụlụ ya bụ Annari Viljoen
Ha gbakọrọ aka ruo nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ, ebe ha meriri ndị Russia abụọ bụ Valeria Sorokina na Nina Vislova

Michelle Dede bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe ngosi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O mebere ihe nkiri a akpọrọ Flower Girl ma tinyekwa aka na usoro ihe onyonyo a na-akpọ Desperate Housewives Africa na ihe nkiri 2017 ihe nkiri mkpali obi What Lies Within
Amụrụ ya na Germany, Dede tolitere n'ezinụlọ nwere mmetụta, nna ya bụ Brownson Dede, onye nnọchi anya onye Naijiria na Etiopia
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ izizi ya na Brazil, ọ gụrụ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị di na Australia na Ethiopia
O mechara gawa mba United Kingdom ka ọ gụọ Fashion Design na Marketing na American College dị na Lọndọn, UK O nwetara nzere ndị gụchara mahadum na Communications na PR site na otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọrụ ya malitere na-eso ezumike na Nigeria na nke ahụ mere ka ọ banye na ntụrụndụ
Na 2006, n'akụkụ Olisa Adibua, ọ kwadoro mbipụta mpụta mbụ nke Big Brother Nigeria, usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Naijiria dabere na usoro Big Brother
O mechara mepụta ihe nkiri 2013 Flower Girl tupu ọ gaa n'ihu igosi pụta dị ka Tari Gambadia na usoro TV Desperate Housewives Africa
Ọ kwụrụ na Oprah Winfrey bu mkpali ya dị ka onye na nabata ọbịa n'TV
N'afọ 2017, Dede gbara egwu na ihe nkiri mkpali obi Naijiria What Lies Within ya na Paul Utomi, Kiki Omeili na Tope Tedela
Na 2018 ọ gosiputara na Moms at War
Dede bụ nwanne nwanyị onye na- akpa ọchị Najite Dede na onye nnọchi anya ika maka ụlọ ọrụ ọkachamara mma Emmaus Beauty
Michelle McGrane bụ onye na- ede uri a mụrụ na Rhodesia n'afọ 1974
Ebipụtala uri ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmagụ obodo na mba ụwa na United Kingdom, Canada na United States
McGrane ebipụtala mkpokọta abụ abụọ, Fireflies & Blazing Stars (2002) na Hybrid (2003)
Nchịkọta nke atọ ya, The Suitable Girl, ka a ga-ebipụta na United Kingdom na'afọ 2010
Michelle Molatlou (1973 - 19 Disemba 2017), bụ onye omere South Africa, onye na-egosi ihe onyonyo na onye bụbu Miss Black South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn dịka; N'aha nke ịhụnanya, Mokgonyana Matswale na ọgbọ
O nwere otu nwanne nwoke, Kgosi Monye
Ọ lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Malope Mojapelo site na 2006 ruo 2014
Ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Ọ nwụrụ na 19 Disemba 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ na anọ mgbe ọ na-anata ọgwụgwọ maka ọrịa kansa afọ na National Hospital dị na Bloemfontein
Michelle Mosalakae (a mụrụ na 14 Septemba 1994), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye edemede na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Michelle Mosalakae na Mabopane, n'ebe ugwu Pretoria na nne na nna Tswana
Ọ zụlitere ịhụnanya ya maka ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị obere
Dịka nwa agbọghọ, ọ ga-eme ihe maka ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Mary's Diocesan, Pretoria, ebe n'oge a ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe niile
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gara Mahadum Rhodes, Grahamstown ebe ọ gụsịrị klas cum laude, na nzere na Bekee, na-enweta nsọpụrụ na ime ihe nkiri, iduzi na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2017, ọ nwetara ọrụ Zakithi onye na-eto eto na-agwọ ọrịa ọdịnala na ihe nkiri TV nke Mzansi Magic Isibaya
Ọrụ ahụ ga-abụ ọrụ ọganihu ya, na-eweta ya nkwanye ùgwù sara mbara ma mee ka ọ bụrụ aha ezinụlọ ozugbo
N'ihi arụmọrụ ya na Isibaya, a họpụtara ya maka Rising star na 2017 DStv Mzansi Viewers' Choice Awards

N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, n'akụkụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi MTV Base Kim Jayde, ndị mgbasa ozi Bontle Modiselle na Loot Love, a mara ọkwa Michelle dịka onye nnọchi anya Revlon, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye mbụ nwere albinism ka e mee ya onye nnọchianya maka nnukwu ihe ntecha mba ụwa
Ka ọ na-aga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye Congolese, Kamina na Mzansi Magic, The Queen (usoro TV South African)
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye Naledi Theatre Award maka arụmọrụ kachasị mma na egwuregwu maka ọrụ ya na Shoes & Coups, nke Palesa Mazamisa duziri ma dee
N'ọnwa Eprel 2022, Mosalakae mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri Netflix na-akpali akpali Silverton Siege ebe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri Rachel Paige
Mosalakae bụ Onye Kraịst
Ya na ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya na-akwado ya mgbe niile na-akpachi anya
Ọ nwere albinism, mgbanwe mkpụrụ ndụ nketa nke na-egbochi mmepụta melanin
Mosalakae anọwo na-akpa nganga mgbe niile maka onye ọ bụ
Ọ bụ nne ya Sarah na-elekọta ya, onye ya na ya dị nso

Michelle Nkamankeng (amụrụ ya na c2008) bụ onye edemede South Africa, sitere na Johannesburg, bụ onye ghọworo onye ode akwụkwọ kacha nta na South Afriika yana sitekwa na ịbụ onye isi iri nke ndị ode akwụkwọ kacha nta n'ụwa
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya akpọrọ Ichere Waves nke LANSM Printing Ltd bipụtara, bụ akụkụ mbụ nke usoro akwụkwọ anọ
Akwụkwọ dị n'usoro akụkụ anọ ya gụnyere 1
Na-echere na ebili mmiri, 2
Nwata ntakiri nke kwere na onwe ya, 3
Obere òké na nke ikpeazụ, 4
Mgbanaka ọla edo
Laurentine (Lolo) Nkamankeng bụ nne ya na onye njikwa, nna ya Paul Nkamankeng, na ụmụnne ya bụ Shawn, Sheena na Marion
Michelle Sank (amụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ ónyé na-ese foto na South Africa
Ọ hapụrụ South Africa na 1978 ma bírí na Exeter, nà South West England, kemgbe 1987
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nké Museum of Fine Arts Houston, Center for Photography nà Woodstock nà Royal Albert Memorial Museum
Michi Meko (amụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na Atlanta, Georgia
Ọ bụ ónyé natara Joan Mitchell Foundation Grant na Atlanta Artadia Award yana onye ikpeazụ maka 2019 Hudgens Prize
Ọrụ ya na-agụnye asụsụ anya nke ọkọlọtọ ụgbọ mmiri na ịchọta ụzọ ụgbọ mmiri, jikọtara ya na ihe ndị na-atọ ụtọ nke South America

N'ime usoro ihe omume ya dị iche iche, ọrụ ya na-etinye aka na mgbagwoju ányà na mgbagha nke ọ na-ekpughe site n'inyocha akụkọ ihe méré eme nke onwé ya, ọdịnala ndị Africa America, na akụkọ ndị na-eche ihu ma ọ bụ na-agafe akụkọ ndị e guzobere
N'afọ 2019, e gosipụtara Meko na Hulu na-asọ asọ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na Residence
Michigan bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Michika (Mwe-cika) bụ obodo na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo na Adamawa Steeti, Naijiria, ọ bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa nke gọọmentị mpaghara
Ọ dị na Northern Adamawa Steeti ma dị kpọmkwem n'ofe ókèala site na ebe ndị njem nleta a ma ama nke Mcedigyi na vecemwe Rhumsiki na Cameroon
Mwe-cika (Michika) bụ obodo nke anọ kachasị ukwuu na steeti Adamawa
Ndị isi agbụrụ na asụsụ na Michika bụ ndị Kamwe ma ha na-asụ asụsụ Kamwe
E guzobere gọọmentị ime obodo Michika na 1976
Ọ dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Republic of Cameroon
N'ókè ya dị n'ebe ugwu bụ gọọmentị ime obodo Madagali, ebe ọ na-ekerịta ókèala n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ site na mpaghara gọọmentị mpaghara Askira / Uba nke Borno Steeti
N'ebe ndịda, mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo Mubi North na Hong gbara ya gburugburu
Okwu 'Michika' bụ ụdị rụrụ arụ nke ahịrịokwu Kamwe maka 'Mwe-che ci-ka', nke bụ okwu Kamwe maka 'ịgagharị n'olu dara ụda'
Aha Mwecika(Michika) sitere na nkwupụta 'Mwe che ci ka ra Kwada Kwakaa'; nke ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na ndị okenye Kamwe kwuru na ọ na-asụgharị 'ugwu ebe Kwada Kwaka na-aga na nzuzo ịchụ nta
Site n'ihi ya, a na-eme ka ọ dị mkpirikpi ka ọ bụrụ 'Mwe che ci ka' ma mesịa bụrụ Mwecika(Michika)
Idris Alooma onye ọchịchị Kanuri nke narị afọ nke iri na isii zoro aka na Mwecika(Michika) na ndị Kamwe na odyssey ya
N'otu aka ahụ, Heinrich Barth onye nchọpụta German n'akwụkwọ ya, 'Travels in Africa' kọwara 1850 dere banyere obi ike nke ndị Kamwe nke Michika

Michika nwere mpaghara itoolu ya bụ Michika District, Nkafa District, Madzi District, Futu District, Garta District, Bazza/Yambule/Dakwa District, Zah/Ghye District, Vi/Bokka District na Sina/Kamale District
Asụsụ Dakwa a na-akpọkwa Bazza nke bụ ụdị rụrụ arụ nke okwu Margi pazza, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-ahọrọ ka a kpọọ ha Higgi
Ndị ọzọ na-akpọ ya hagyi ebe ndị ọzọ na-asụ ya higi

Ndị okenye Kamwe na-ekwu na higgi bụ igurube (hagyi) nke bụ okwu mkparị nke ndị Margi chepụtara iji kparịa ụmụ nwanyị Kamwe ndị nwere mmasị ịchụ nta igurube n'oge gara aga iji mee ka ndị Kamwe bụrụ ihe ọchị ma kwọọ ndị Kamwe n'ihi nnukwu agụụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ha nwere maka igurube na oge gara aga
Ndị Kamwe na-eleda okwu mkparị na nke obi ọjọọ 'higgi' anya n'ihi na ha higgi bụ mkparị nye ha
Ha na-akọwa onwe ha dị ka Kamwe (Kamwe pụtara 'Ndị otu agbụrụ
Ndị Kamwe na-arụsi ọrụ ike, na-ele ọbịa na ndị na-akwado mba
Ha na-akwanyere ndị agadi ùgwù dị ukwuu ma kwere na mkpakọrịta obodo na-akpọ Meshike na Vecemwe
Omume na ụkpụrụ nke ndị Kamwe na vecemwe bụ 'Dabeghi Nji Denama' nke a sụgharịrị ka ọ pụtara 'e nwere ike n'ịdị n'otu'
Kemgbe afọ 2017, ndị Kamwe anọwo na-eme emume ọdịnala Kamwe ha kwa afọ nke akpọrọ 'Tswe Wasinata' na Vecemwe
A na-eme ya kwa afọ na Satọdee mbụ ọ bụla n'ọnwa Eprel
Ebe a na-anọ eme ya bụ Government Secondary School Michika (GSS Michika) nke dị n'etiti obodo ahụ
Ọ na-adọta ndị njem nleta site n'ebe dị anya na nso

Ihe kachasị elu nke emume ọdịnala Kamwe kwa afọ bụ ngosipụta nke 'Tuvue' ihe ngosi Kamwe kachasị elu nke bụ ngosipụta kpakpando na 2006 Nigerian National Festival of Arts and Culture na Abuja ma mee ka onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo nwee mmasị
Eze Ukwu ya, Ngida Zakawa Kwache bụ Onye isi distrikti nke Michika
Ọ bụ 'ndị na-eme eze' họpụtara ya na Satọdee, 31 Disemba 2013, mgbe ọnwụ Coffor Maude onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi distrikti ruo afọ iri ise
Onye isi ala ya bụ Ngida Zakawa Kwache bụ Onye isi oche nke Kansụl Ndị isi Gọọmentị Obodo nke Michika
Gọọmentị ime obodo Michika bụ nke kacha nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na steeti Adamawa
Michika bụkwa obodo cosmopolitan ọ nwere alaka nke ọtụtụ ụlọ akụ, kọleji nke ahụike na teknụzụ, kọlejin teknụzụ na ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ewu ewu na Michika bụ Government Senior Secondary School (GSS) Michika
Ndị bi ebe ahụ bụ ndị Kraịst mejupụtara ihe dị ka 98% nke ndị bi ebe ahụ, ebe ndị fọdụrụ bụ ndị Alakụba na ụfọdụ ndị na-efe okpukpe ọdịnala
E nwere ihe dị ka ndị isi iri abụọ na isii na obodo nta iri asatọ na anọ gburugburu ugwu
Ndị bi na Michika buru ibu; atụmatụ dịgasị iche site na narị puku atọ na iri asaa na ise na narị puku asaa dabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ e ji mee ihe na usoro ya
E nwere ọtụtụ emume ọdịnala nke ndị Kamwe na-eme na Michika
Ndị kachasị n'etiti ha bụ Yawale, Wasinata, Ngarba, na ịgba egwu Zhitta n'etiti ememme ndị ọzọ
Enwekwara ebe ndị njem nleta na ebe ndị dị na Michika dị ka mmiri mmiri oyi nke Kwandree na Dlaka na ugwu Kamale na Kamale
Ndị isi akụkọ ihe mere eme a ma ama nke ndị Kamwe bụ Gelmai, nna nna Kamwe mbụ hapụrụ Etiopia
Kwada Kwakaa onye guzobere Michika

Michika emeela ndị ama ama dị ka Gọvanọ Mbụ nke Adamawa Steeti Abubakar Saleh Michika, Gọvanor mbụ nke Adamawa Boni Haruna, Gọranọ mbụ nke Lagos Steeti Mohammed Buba Marwa, Late Dr John Guli, Late Tumba Ra Wandate, Late Umaru Ngiki, Reverend Dr Samuel Dante Dali onye bụbu Onye isi Chọọchị nke Brethren na Naịjirịa, Most Rev Dr Stephen Dami Mamza (Bishọp Katọlik nke Yola Diocese), Major General John Samuel Zaruwa n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ndị na-eyi ọha egwu nke Boko Haram Islam weghaara obodo ahụ na Septemba 2014 mana ndị agha Naijiria weghachitere obodo ahụ na 29 Jenụwarị 2015

Onye bụbu onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan kwupụtara mmeghachi omume nke Michika Town site n'aka ndị na-eyi ọha egwu nke Boko Haram Islam na Tọzdee 29 Jenụwarị 2015; o mere ọkwa ahụ mgbe ọ na-eme njem mkpọsa na steeti Adamawa

Na Jenụwarị 2020, ndị na-eyi ọha egwu nke Boko Haram tọọrọ Rev Lawan Andimi, onye isi oche steeti nke Christian Association of Nigeria na odeakwụkwọ distrikti nke Church of the Brethren maka mpaghara Michika
Njide Andimi nwetara nlebara anya mba ụwa mgbe ewepụtara vidiyo nke ọ kwupụtara okwukwe Ndị Kraịst ya
E gburu Andimi na 20 Jenụwarị 2020
Mick Pearce (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 2 Juun n'afọ 1938) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ewu ụlọ
A mụrụ Pearce n'ọnwa Juun 2 1938, na Harare O nwetara diplọma ya na Architectural Association School of Architecture na London n'afọ 1962
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na UK, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Australia na China yana South Africa
N'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga, Pearce lekwasịrị anya n'ihe owuwu na-adịgide adịgide ma nyochaa ụkpụrụ nke biomimicry, nke bụ iṅomi usoro okike na iji ihe okike
Otu n'ime ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke ụdị ụlọ ya bụ ibelata mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ na-ahọrọ iji ihe ndị dị na mpaghara na teknụzụ ọdịnala dị ka igwe igwe
Otu n'ime ụlọ ya a ma ama bụ Eastgate Shopping Centre na Harare
Maka usoro nchịkwa okpomọkụ n'ime ụlọ ahụ, Pearce sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'ịrụ ikpo ọkụ
Site n'iji usoro a, ọ jikọtara nchekwa ike ma jiri ikuku ikuku na ikuku
Ụlọ ahụ na-eji ihe dị ka pasent 10 nke ike eji eme ikuku site na ụlọ ndị nwere nha ya
Pearce hapụrụ Zimbabwe n'afọ 2000 n'ihi esemokwu dị na obodo ya wee rụọ ọrụ na Australia, ebe ọ haziri Council House 2 (CH2) na Melbourne, n'etiti ụlọ ndị ọzọ
Mgbe ya na Vanke rụkọrọ ọrụ afọ atọ na China, ọ laghachiri Zimbabwe n'afọ 2012
N'afọ 2003, a kwanyeere Pearce ùgwù maka ihe ọhụrụ ya n'ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi na imewe na-adịgide adịgide site na Prince Claus Award si Netherlands
Ebe etiti Eastgate
Ụlọ ahịa Eastgate
Mickaël Bethe-Selassié (15 Febụwarị 1951 ruo 5 Disemba 2020) bụ onye Etiopia na-akpụ ihe a maara maka ọrụ ya na papier mâché
Ọ hapụrụ Ethiopia mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1970, na-amụ sayensị na kọleji
Ọ tụgharịrị na ihe ọkpụkpụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ, ma biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Paris
Enwere ike ịchọta ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke National Museum of African Art na Washington, DC
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi ihe okike na Disemba 5, afọ 2020
Mark Williams (amụrụ na Julaị 13, 1982), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha égwu ya bụ Mickey Factz, bụ ónyé America na-edekọ egwu hip hop si na Bronx borough nke New York City, New York
Mickey Factz gárá Adlai E
Stevenson High School, nke a maara màkà ịbụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke ónyé ọsụ ụzọ hip hop Afrika Bambaataa gara
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ ihe a ma ama màkà ịnapụta ụmụ akwụkwọ nke nkà egwu
Factz zutere egwu mgbè ọ dị obere na nna ya na-eti ya rap ugboro ugboro
Na nzaghachi, ọ malitere ịgụghachi abụ nkè ya, na-ekiri vidiyo egwu, ma na-amụ ihe ngosi nke ndị na-ese egwu kachasị amasị ya
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Factz gara New York University School of Law ebe ọ kwụsịrị iji chụsoo egwu
Micki Pistorius (amụrụ ná mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na iteghete nke afọ 1961 na Pretoria ) bu onye mba South Afrịka forensic ma obu onye nyocha akparamaagwa na onye ode akwukwo
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ n'ọrụ ya na onye mbụ profaịlụ na South Afrịka
Ọ na-ekwu na ya nwere 'cryptesthesia', nghọta na-enweghị mmetụta maka ndị na-egbu mmadụ
Nwa nwanne ya bụbu onye sprinter na onye ogbu mmadụ bụ Oscar Pistorius a mara ikpe
Pistorius tolitere na Pretoria nwere ọtụtụ ụmụnne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ ruo afọ asatọ, tupu o kpebie ịmụ nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ na Mahadum Pretoria, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Masters na isiokwu ahụ, ma ghọọ onye nkuzi nwere aha ọma maka ihe na-adịghị mma
Mgbe ọ na-eme thesis doctoral ya banyere ndị na-egbu egbu, nke mbụ na South Afrịka, ọ mepụtara echiche ya na-ejikọta mmepe nke Freudian psychosexual na igbu ọchụ
Ọ lụrụ di afọ asatọ, ma gbakwa alụkwaghịm n'ihi nrụgide ọrụ mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-akọwapụta ihe
Ọ bụ onye Katọlik

Pistorius sonyeere ndị uwe ojii nke mba South Aftịka (SAPS) n'afọ 1994, ebe o guzobere ma duzie Ngalaba Nnyocha Psych dị ka Chief Investigative Psychologist, ọkwa ya na Colonel; ọ guzobekwara Serious and Violent Crimes Component
Ka ọ na-erule n' afọ 1997, ọ zụrụ karịa ndị nchọpụta ruru otu narị iji nyochaa ndị omempụ, na ndị nọchiri anya ya abụọ, gụnyere Elmarie na Myburgh
O tinyere aka na ihe karịrị ọgbalị iri atọ n' ikpe ogbugbu mgbe ọ nọ na SAPS
N'ime ndị ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ya bụ Norman Afzal Simons, Moses Sithole, David Selepe, Stewart Wilken, Sipho Thwala, Velaphi Ndlangamandla, Cedric Maake, na David Mmbengwa
Ọ malitere nsogbu mgbakasị ahụ nke post-traumatic wee laa ezumike nka n'afọ 2000 ịbanye na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha nkeonwe
Gerrard Labuschagne were weghara ya
Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị, o degaara akwụkwọ jidere m onye na-egbu ochụ ka o wee 'sachapụ onwe ya' ahụmahụ nghọta ya mgbe ọ na-akọwapụta ihe
Ọ ka na-agba ajụjụ maka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị South Afrịka, wee pụta n'ụlọ ikpe dịka ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ
A na-amata Pistorius dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ahụ maka nkà mmụta uche nke ụwa, site n'aka ndị dị ka onye na-ahụ maka FBI Robert Ressler
Pistorius nwere ọmịiko maka ndị na-egbu mmadụ, bụ ndị ọ na-ekwu na ha abụghị 'anụmanụ; ha bụ ụmụ mmadụ nwere mkpụrụ obi tara ahụhụ
Agaghị m anabata ihe ha na-eme, ma enwere m ike ịghọta ha
' O sonyere na ọzụzụ nke ihe fọrọ obere ka ọ bụrụ narị abụọ nke ndị nchọpụta na nyocha nke igbu ọchụ

Aquatic Microbial Ecology bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ sayensị na-enyocha kwa ọnwa nke ndị ọgbọ na-ekpuchi akụkụ niile nke mgbanwe microbial mmiri, ọkachasị nje, prokaryotes na eukaryotes n'ime mmiri, limnetic, na ebe obibi brackish
Bougis na F
Rassoulzadegan guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ dị ka Marine Microbial Food Webs n'afọ 1985, wee nweta aha ya ugbu a n'afọ 1995
Ọ bụ Inter Research na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ugbu a
A na-edepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ma wepụ ya na
Microsoft Egypt bụ ngalaba nke Microsoft nke na-ere ngwaahịa Microsoft na Egypt
Microsoft guzobere alaka na Egypt na 1995 dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ, bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ nwere oke na 1997
Microsoft bidoro Cairo Microsoft Innovation Center na Septemba 2007
Ọ dị na Smart Village dị nso na Cairo
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịrụ ọrụ na nsogbu nyocha ọkwa ọkwa nke dị mkpụmkpụ maka ahịa
Ọ bụ Tarek El-Abbadi, onye njikwa mmemme ogologo oge na ụlọ ọrụ Microsoft Redmond, na-eduzi ya
Ụlọ akwụkwọ micec bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nkuzi dị na Ojota, na Lagos State, Nigeria
Ụlọ akwụkwọ micec nwere creche, mmụta mbụ, ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị
Ọ bụ Micheal OK Tejuosho duziri ya
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na-enye ebe obibi maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị ụbọchị
N'afọ 2010, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ji nnọkọ Krismas mechie nnọkọ ya
Mpaghara Mid-Western bụ nkewa nke Naijiria site na 1963 ruo 1991, site na 1976 ebe a na-akpọ steeti Bendel
Emebere ya na June 1963 site na mpaghara Benin na Delta nke Western Region, isi obodo ya bụ Benin City
A kpọgharịrị ya mpaghara na 1966, na 1967, mgbe e kewara ógbè ndị ọzọ gaa n'ọtụtụ steeti, ọ nọgidere na-emebi emebi, wee ghọọ steeti

Midaflur (INN; EXP 338) bụ 3-imidazoline siri ike nke nwere ihe na-eme ka ọkpụkpụ dị jụụ na ihe na-adọkpụ n'ime ụmụ mmadụ na ụdị anụmanụ na igbe akwụkwọ bụ ọgwụ ahụ n'ebe nile site n'aka ndị na ndị ọzọ na-enye nwa ara, na-egosipụta ọnụ dị elu na ogologo oge nke ọrụ
Ọ bụ ezie na a ka na-aghọtaghị ọgwụ ya nke ọma, midaflur yiri meprobamate na pentobarbital n'ihe gbasara mmetụta ndị a hụrụ mgbe ọ dị ike karịa
Mielie meal, nke a makwara dị ka nri ma ọ bụ nri ọka, bụ ntụ ọka siri ike (nke siri ike karịa ọka ma ọ bụ ọka) nke e ji ọka ma ọ dị na mpaghara Ndịda Afrịka mee, site na milho Portuguese
A makwara ya site na aha asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche dabere na obodo ma ọ bụ mba
Ọ bụ ndị Portugal si Amerịka weta ya n'Africa
Ọ bụ nri ndị Voortrekkers riri na mbụ n'oge The Great Trek, mana ọ ghọwo nri kachasị mkpa nke South Africa, n'ihi ikike ya ichekwa na-enweghị friji, ọ dị ọnụ ala ma baa ụba na ụlọ ahịa na ahịa niile

Ọ bụ nri a ma ama na South Africa, Mozambique, Lesotho, Eswatini, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Malawi, Botswana na ọtụtụ akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Southern Africa, nke a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ uphuthu, mmiri ara ehi na-esi ísì ụtọ, pap, yana umqombothi (ụdị biya)
A na-agbakwunye ihe na-esighị esi nke nri mielie na mmiri na-esi ísì, nke na-emepụta ma ọ bụ porridge ma ọ bụ pap / nshima / sadza siri ike
Mgbe a na-eme achịcha, a na-eji mmiri ara ehi eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ iji mepụta nri na-atọ ụtọ
Porridge na-enwekarị ọdịdị siri ike ma na-erikarị ya maka nri ụtụtụ na ndịda Afrịka
[citation needed] A na-eri papa siri ike na anụ na nri ofe yana oriri akwụkwọ nri
