Mien van Wulfften Palthe (N'ụbọchị 1 Eprel 1875 ruo ụbọchị 11 Nọvemba 1960; Broese van Groenou) bụ onye Dutch na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-ahụ n'udo

Dị ka onye otu Vereeniging voor Vrouwenkiesrecht (Society for Women's Suffrage) na Women's International League for Peace and Freedom, ọ gbalịrị inweta nnwere onwe maka ụmụ nwanyị ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado udo

A mụrụ Frederika Wilhelmina Broese van Groenou n'ụbọchị 1 Eprel 1875 na Djokjakarta, Dutch East Indies, akụkụ nke Alaeze nke Netherlands na Jeannetta Emilia (née Wieseman) na Wolter Broese van Greenou
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụnne asaa na nna ya na-eje ozi na Royal Dutch East Indies Army n'oge a mụrụ ya
N'afọ 1878, ọ hapụrụ ndị agha wee bụrụ onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ shuga ma na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ Tandjong Tirto
E zigara Broese na nwanne ya nwanyị nke ikpeazụ, Miel ka ha biri ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na The Hague n'afọ 1883
Ndị fọdụrụ n'ezinụlọ ahụ sonyeere ha n'ebe ahụ n'afọ 1890 wee guzobe ezinụlọ
Wolter gara n'ihu na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ shuga Javanese site na Netherlands ma dị ka onye nwere nnwere onwe nke kwenyere na ikike ụmụ nwanyị na udo ụwa, ọ gbara ụmụ ya nwanyị ume inweta agụmakwụkwọ ha
N'afọ 1891, e zigara Broese na Allenswood Boarding Academy, ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị pụrụ iche na Wimbledon, London
N'ịdebanye aha na Haagsche Kookschool (Hague Cooking School) n'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gara klas n'ebe ahụ tupu o kpebie inweta asambodo ya nke Lower Education Act [nl] N'afọ 1893
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere ike ịkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na asambodo ahụ, Broese chọrọ ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ ezie na na na mbụ ndị mụrụ ya anabataghị ha mechara nye nkwenye
N'agbata afọ 1898 na ngụsị akwụkwọ ya n'afọ 1900, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri Amsterdam
Miftah (Arabic) nwere ike ịbụ
Miga bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Jigawa Steeti, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Miga
Ọ nwere mpaghara 586 km 2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị Puku narị irí abụọ na asatọ, narị anọ na iri abụọ na anọ na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị asaa na irí na otu
Miglena Markova (Bulgarian Миглена Мaркова, amụrụ na 16 Febụwarị 1983 na Sofia) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
Ya na Anet-Jacqueline Buschmann mechara nke anọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ sculls na 2004 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Miglena Angelova Mikhaleva (Bulgarian; amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị anọ na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Miguel Giménez Igualada (1888, Iniesta, Spain - 1973, Mexico) bụ onye edemede na-ahụ maka onwe onye na Spain nke a makwaara dị ka Miguel Ramos Giménez na Juan de Iniesta
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, Igualada tinyere aka n'ihe omume iwu na-akwadoghị
O n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na-atụ aro ka e mepụta otu Spanish Union of Egoists, ma site n' afọ 1920s ọ bụ onye otu anarcho-syndicalist Confederación Nacional del Trabajo

N'etiti ọtụtụ ụzọ isi nweta ihe ọ ga-esi nweta ihe ọ bụ onye na-ere ahịa n'okporo ámá, onye ọkwọ ụgbọala tagzi, onye na-elekọta ubi, onye njikwa ubi shuga na onye nkuzi nwere ọgụgụ isi na Libertarian Atheneum na Las Ventas, Madrid
N'agbata Ọktọba 1937 na Febụwarị 1938 ọ dezigharịrị magazin anarchist nke onwe ya bụ Nosotros
Max Stirner nwere mmetụta siri ike na Igualada
Site n'ihe odide ya, ọ kwalitere Stirner n'ime Spain, ma bipụta mbipụta nke anọ nke akwụkwọ Stirner, The Ego and Its Own, na-ede okwu mbido ya
N'afọ 1968, o bipụtara akwụkwọ banyere Stirner, nke a raara nye ncheta nke onye anarchist ibe ya bụ Émile Armand, ma dee ma bipụta traktị, Anarchism
Igualada mechara biri na Argentina, Uruguay na Mexico, ma nọrọ na Nzukọ Mbụ nke Mexican Anarchist Federation na 1945
N'ime nnukwu ọrụ ya Anarchism Igualada na-ekwu na 'humanism ma ọ bụ anarchism,n'ihi m bụ otu ihe ahụ'
Ọ na-ahụ onye anarchist dị ka onye 'na-anabataghị ịmanye anyị echiche na onye na-anaghị ekwe ka a tụọ otu echiche nke onwe ya n'elu ụbụrụ ọzọ, na-emegbu ya

ebe ọ bụ na anarchy abụghị maka m naanị ịgọnahụ, kama ọ bụ ọrụ abụọ nke ịma ihe; na nke mbụ, ịmara nke onye ahụ n'ihe ọ pụtara n'ime ụwa mmadụ, na-agbachitere àgwà ya megide ihe ọ bụla ọzọ a na-etinye n'èzí; na nke abụọ, ebe a bụ nnukwu ịma mma nke ụkpụrụ omume ya, ọ na-agbahapụ, na-akpali ma na-eme ka àgwà ya dịkwalite
Ọ na-ahụ na'onye na-etinye ndụ ya n'okpuru ihe nlereanya mpụga enweghị ike inwe ịhụnanya ọ bụla ọzọ nke ihe nlereanya ahọpụtara na-enyeghị, nke ọ na-ewu ebe ịchụàjà n'obi ya dị ka chi

Ya mere, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere ike ikwusa ịhụnanya, ọ gaghị abụ ịhụnanya; ọbụlagodi na ọ nwere ikike ikwu maka nnwere onwe, ọ ga-eche banyere nnwere onwe nke nke a ma ọ bụ nke na-achịkwa ya, na nnwere onwe ahụ nwere ụdị ịgba ohu ọ bụla okpukpe nke jikọtara ndụ ya na nkwenkwe mpụga, nke na-edo ya n'okpuru

Igualada na-ekpughe echiche siri ike nke udo mgbe ọ na-eche na 'Mgbe m na-ekwu na site na agha ụmụ mmadụ agaghị ahụ udo, ana m akwado nkwenye m n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ndị na-eme udo karị bụ ndị kwere ekwe kacha nta, yabụonye nwere ike ikwenye na ụbọchị obi ụtọ nke agha (okpukpe bụ bellicosity) na-apụ n'uche, udo ga-adị n'ụlọ ụmụ mmadụ, ebe ọ bụ na site na ịma nkwe nkwe ndị a agaghị ewepụta ya nke ọma kama site na agụmakwụkwọ ọ bụla, ọ bụghị naanị site na-enweghị isi
Ya mere, ọ na-ekwu maka anarchism nke ga-abụ 'onye udo, onye na-ede uri, nke na-emepụta ịdị mma, nkwekọrịta na ịma mma, nke na'azụlite ezi mmetụta nke ibi ndụ n'udo, ihe ịrịba ama, nke ike na ọmụmụ

site n'ebe ahụ onye ọ bụla na-enweghị nkwekọrịta (onye agha na-eme ihe ike), onye ọ bụla ga-eme ka, n'ụdị ọ bụla, na-achịkwa onye ọ bụla yiri ya, abụghị onye anarchist, ebe ọ bụ na-akwanyere ùgwù n'ụzọ dị otú a ga-ezi ihe n'ezi ihe nke ahụ, nke mere na ọ gaghị eme ka onye ọ bụrụ ohu nke echiche ya
Igualada's emphasis abụghị n' akụ na ụba, mana enwere ike ịghọta echiche akụ na ụba ya n'ụzọ na-esonụ

Ọ na-ahụ na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya bụ mmetụta nke gọọmentị; ọpụpụ nke gọọmentụ pụtara na ọchịchị onye ọchụnta ego si na ntọala ya daa n'ụzọ dị egwuIhe anyị na-akpọ akụrụngwa abụghị ihe ọzọ kama ọ bụ ngwaahịa nke steeti, nke naanị ihe a na-ebugharị n'ihu bụ uru, nke ọma ma ọ bụ nke ọjọọ
Ya mere, ịlụ ọgụ megide ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya bụ ọrụ na-enweghị isi, ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ ọchịchị onye kwuo ego nke steeti ma ọ bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ, ọ bụrụhaala na gọọmentị dị, iji ego eme ihe ga-adị
Agha mana nke ịma ihe, bụ megide steeti
Echiche ya banyere ihe onwunwe na teknụzụ dị ka ndị a 'Ihe onwunwe? Ọ bụghị nsogbu

Ebe ọ bụ na mgbe ọ dịghị onye na-arụrụ onye ọzọ ọrụ, onye na-erite uru site na akụ na ụba na-apụ n'anya, dịka gọọmentị ga-apụ n'anya mgbe ọ dịghị mmadụ na-elebara ndị mụtara ihe anọ na mahadum anya ma site n'eziokwu ahụ ha na-eme ka ha na-achị ụmụ mmadụ
Ndị ikom ga-agbanwe, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na nnukwu njikọ ebe onye ọ bụla ga-arụ ọrụ ma nụ ụtọ ngwaahịa nke ọrụ ha

Ma site na- nsogbu ndị dị mfe ma mara mma anarchism na-emeso na onye na-etinye ha n'ọrụ ma na-ebi ndụ ha bụ anarchistsIhe kachasị mkpa nke onye anarchist ga-eme n'enweghị ezumike bụ nke na ọ dịghị onye ga-erigbu onye ọ bụla, ọ dịghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwoke ọ bụla, ebe ọ bụ na enweghị mmegbu ahụ ga-eduga na njedebe nke ihe onwunwe maka mkpa onwe onye
Mikael Chukwuma Owunna (amụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese foto nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
A mụrụ Owunna na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, nke Naijiria na Swedish
Dị ka onye ntorobịa ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Ohio, ebe a na-emegbu ya mgbe ọ pụtara
Na kọleji ọ gụrụ injinia, nweta nzere na Injinia Biomedical na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Duke
N'afọ 2009 ọ natara Rothermere Scholarship na Mahadum Oxford, n'afọ 2012 a kpọrọ ya Fulbright Scholar
Ọ nọrọ afọ Fulbright ya na Taiwan
Ka ọ na-agba mbọ ịnakwere mmekọahụ ya (ọ na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike) ọ chọpụtara foto, nke ghọrọ ma ụzọ okike ma ụzọ mgbapụ
O kwuru na Octavia Butler na Chinua Achebe nwere mmetụta n'ọrụ ya
Ọ na-ekwu maka ihe ngosi nke ọrụ Zanele Muholi dị ka 'oge mbụ m hụrụ onyinyo nke onye Afrịka ọzọ na-eme ihe,' yana dịka akụkụ nke mkpali maka ọrụ mbụ ya, Limitless Africans
Owunna na-asụ Bekee, French na Mandarin Chinese

Banyere ọrụ ya, Owunna na-ekwu, sị 'M na-eche mgbe niile banyere otu m ga-esi chepụta ma chegharịa eluigwe na ala ebe ndị mmadụ si n'ebe ndị a na-anọghị n'ebe dị iche iche, ọkachasị ndị ojii na ndị LGBTQ nwere ike ịbụ ndị zuru ezu na ndị zuru oke

N'afọ 2013 Owunna malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Limitless Africans Akwụkwọ ahụ were afọ isii na ọkara iji mepụta, n'oge ahụ Owunna gara mba iri gafee North America, Europe na Caribbean iji dekọọ ahụmịhe nke ndị mbịarambịa LGBTQ Afrịka na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ
'Mgbe m na-etolite, a gwara m na ọ bụ 'ihe éjị mara ndị Afrịka ịbụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ịbe ya ma burukwa ihe mba ọzọ na abụghị ọdịbendị anyị
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke ikewapụ onwe m site na ihe nketa Naijiria m na usoro nchụpụ mmụọ ọjọọ na Naijiria, amalitere m Limitless iji weghachite African-ness na queerness m n'okwu nke m

' The New York Times kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka 'ihe ịma aka na nke na-ejide, ihe ịma aka banyere ihe ndị mmadụ na-eme ihe ọ bụla dị ka ha, ihe ndị Afrịka dị ka ha na amara nke na-abịa site n'ịhụ onwe ha n'anya'
Ọrụ ya Infinite Essence sitere na nkụda mmụọ na foto mgbasa ozi na-adịgide adịgide nke ahụ ojii dị ka ebe ime ihe ike na ọnwụ

'Gịnị bụ mmetụta ọ na-enwe mgbe ị hụrụ onye yiri ka a na-egbu gị oge niile?' Ebumnuche nke ọrụ ahụ bụ 'igbochi ihe mgbu nke foto ndị ahụ, ịmepụta ihe oyiyi nke na-egosi ahụ ojii ọ bụghị dị ka ebe ọnwụ kama dị ka ebe anwansi
' N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019 ọ natara onyinye $ 20,000 site na Greater Pittsburgh Arts Council iji mezue ọrụ ahụ
E gosipụtara ọrụ Owunna na United States, Canada, na Belgium, ma nata ọtụtụ onyinye na aro gụnyere YWCA Racial Justice Award for Creativity and Innovation
Na mgbakwunye na onyinye Greater Pittsburgh Arts Council a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu, ọ nwetakwala onyinye site na Fine Foundation, Pittsburgh Endowment, na AW Mellon Educational and Charitable Trust Fund
N'afọ 2018, e nyere ya Kathryn Davis Fellowship for Peace site na Middlebury College
Mikano International Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria nwere mmasị na mmepụta ike, ụlọ na ụlọ
Ụlọ ọrụ a na-enye ahịa, mmezi, mgbakọ na nkesa nke ngwaahịa mmepụta ike, mmepe ala, na ahịa nke ngwá ọrụ iwu ihe

N'ịbụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Lagos, Naijiria, Mikano na-achịkọta usoro na-emepụta ike site na ndị na-emepụta; MTU Onsite Energy (Germany), Perkins na Stamford alternator (United Kingdom), na-enye diesel na gas na-emepụta site na 9kva ruo 20,000kva maka ụlọ na ụlọ ọrụ
E guzobere ya na afọ 1993 na-elekwasị anya na mbubata, ịrụ ọrụ, na mmezi nke ndị na-emepụta ihe, Mikano malitere ịhazi usoro mmepụta na Naịjirịa
Mikano emela ka ọrụ ya dị iche iche site na Power Generation gaa n'ime imepụta ígwè, Electrical & Lightings, na ụlọ ọrụ iwu ihe
N'afọ 2016, ọ gbasaa ọrụ ya n'ime ụlọ na ụlọ na Karameh City Project, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na Naịjirịa nwere ụlọ nkwakọba ihe asatọ na-atụle 7,200 square mita, nke dị na Warewa, Ogun steeti

Site na mmasị mbụ na mmepụta ike, Mikano emeela ka ọrụ azụmahịa ya dị iche iche n'ime imepụta ígwè, Electrical & Lightings, na ụlọ ọrụ Real Estate / Construction, na-arụkọ ọrụ na Schneider Electric, ABB, Raychem si TE Connectivity- ịbụ onye na-ere ngwaahịa MV & HV ha; Philips Lightings- dị ka onye na-eweta ngwaahịa Fittings & lightings na Siemens maka Type-Tested Compact Sub-Station

Dị ka onye na-achịkọta usoro na-emepụta ike maka ụlọ na ụlọ ọrụ, Mikano nwere ngwọta dị iche iche na-arụ ọrụ [buzzword] gụnyere Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) usoro na-enye ike, usoro na-arụpụta ike Bi-fuel na-arụarụ ọrụ na 70% gas na 30% diesel na 30% Independent Power Producer (IPP) ngwọta ụlọ ọrụ ike [buzzwords] na nhọrọ mmepụta ike Gas / Diesel, na-enye ihe ruru 60MW
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bịanyere aka na MTU Onsite Energy; ya mere na-eji MTU German Engine maka ọnụọgụ generator site na 300KVA 意3500KVA
Mikano na-enyekwa MAN Diesel na Gas generators ruo 20,000 KVA

N'afọ 2015, Mikano guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ígwè iji gbakwunye mgbasara ya n'ime ngalaba ebe ọ na-emepụta ma na-emepụta atụmatụ ígwè maka ọkụ-ìhè n'okporo ámá, Warehouse-racks, Supermarket Shelves na ihe mgbochi ụda nke ndị na-emepụta ihe niile

Na mmekorita ya na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa ike dị ka ABB & Schneider Electric, Mikano na-etinye aka na ire ere na nkesa nke ngwaahịa voltaji [buzzword] na ngwá ọrụ na nkesa eletrik, ọrụ na mmezi nke Generator-control / Customized Panels na-eme ka nweta nke ngwaahịa ndị a dị na ahịa Naijiria

Mikano na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-eke Hyundai Engineering & Construction Equipment na Forklifts na-ekesa na ịrụ ọrụ; Hyundai Hydraulic Excavators, Wheel Loader, Skid Steer Loader, Backhoe Loader na Forklits (Diesel, Battery & LPG / Petrol) na ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ na-ejikwa ihe
Ọrụ a bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe mbụ ya na Naịjirịa nwere ụlọ nkwakọba ihe asatọ na-atụle 7,200 square mita, nke dị na Warewa, Ogun steeti
Ngalaba Mikano Construction na-ejikwa mmepe na mmezu nke ụlọ obibi na ụlọ elu dị elu iji gbanwee mmepe na ọrụ akụrụngwa zuru oke

Mikano emeela atụmatụ dị iche iche nke ọrụ ọha na eze na-elekwasị anya na STEM Projects na ọzụzụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ Naijiria, na ndị uwe ojii Naijiria site na onyinye nke ndị uwe ojii na-agafe na mba ahụ, yana nkwado maka ndị na-enweghị ihe ùgwù na ndị na-adịghị mma nke ọha mmadụ

Mike & Keys (nke a maara n'oge gara-aga aga dị ka The Futuristiks) bụ ndị America na-emepụta hip hop na ndị na-ede egwu si Los Angeles, California nke nwéré Money Mike (onye amụrụ Michael Ray Cox, Jr) na J-Keys (ónyé amuru John Groover)
J-Keys, amụrụ na South Sacramento na Money Mike amụrụ na Hammond, Louisiana na-akpọ ụka na ezinụlọ dị ka ndị nwéré nnukwu mmetụta na mmepe nke nkà egwu ha
Ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Los Angeles Recording School na Hollywood, CA, ndị duo mbụ zuru oke mmepụta ego bịara na 2009 na Before I Self Destruct màkà ónyé na-eti egwu 50 Cent

Mgbe ha rụchara ọrụ ọzọ na 2010 na abọm hip hop dị ka Dom Kennedy Kings From the Westside with Love, II, Redman'sReggie na Sheek Louch Kings Donnie G Don Gorilla, The Futuristiks ghọrọ otu mmepụta ama màkà ndị na-ese hip-hop, R&B na Gospel

N'ịbụ afọ na-agbanwe ndụ màkà The Futuristiks, na 2011, ọrụ ha sitere na ndekọ hip hop na ndị na-ese ihe na-ese onyinyo Eminem, Royce da 5ş9 na Ras Kass yana ihe ndị ọzọ a ma ama dị ka Strong Arm Steady na Mitchy Slick
N'afọ 2011, ha mepụtara ónyé na-eti egwu bụ 'Last Love' maka mixtape a na-ebipụtaghị Plan B nke nwetara vidiyo na BETX 106 & Park na-eme na Top Ten Countdown na vidiyo ndị ọzọ
Ọzọkwa, n'afọ 2011, ha mepụtara egwu ndị isi màkà Dom Kennedy bụ The Original Dom Kennedy na Skemeys mixtapes The Statement na Before My Next Statement
N'ịga n'ihu na uto ha, ndị na-emepụta ihe malitere iso ndị na-ese R&B Jeremih na-arụ ọrụ na Late Nights na Jeremih Mixtape, yana ọrụ izizi màkà ndị na-eme R&B TeeFlii na Elijah Blake
N'ahapụghị mgbọrọgwụ hip hop ha, na 2012, ha abụọ mepụtara egwu màkà ndị rapper TI, Freddie Gibbs, Fat Joe, Bad Lucc, 8Ball, Jay Rock, Curren$y na OverDoz
The Futuristiks mèrè Billboard Top 100 na 2012 maka mmepụta ha na Capitol Records Tito Lopezs song Mama Proud
Ha mekwara 200, Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums chart na Top Rap Album màkà mmepụta ha na Grand Hustle/Atlantic Records artist TIz Trouble Man Heavy Is the Head

Ka ụda ha na-etolite ma na-agbasawanye ókèala na 2013, a họpụtara Futuristiks màkà onyinye Grammy nke mbụ ha na Best Rap Album maka onyinye ha nyere na Lupe Fiascoz Food & Liquor II The Great American Rap Album, Pt
Lupe's II nọ n'elu Top R&B / Hip-Hop Albums na Rap Albums chaatị, mgbe ọ na-amalite ma na-arị elu na No
5 na Billboard 200
The Futuristiks malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Epic Records / Roc Nation Management artist Casey Veggies, na-eduzi egwu aha na egwu isii na 2013 Life Changes
N'afọ 2013, ha mepụtara egwu màkà Master P, Juelz Santana, Adonis the Ace, Drumma Boy, Zeke na KRoosevelt
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta ihe, The Futuristiks, ewerewo ọrụ zuru oke ma na nso nso a wepụ ndị isi mmepụta na Nipsey Hussleńs, October 8, 2013 wepụtara Crenshaw
Na mgbakwunye, Futuristiks nwèrè ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe na Dom Kennedy, 2013 release Get Home Safely
Ọmarịcha ha dị mma màkà ịdakwasị n'elu, na ịgbà na-agbadata na ihe nlele gbagọrọ agbagọ nke na-adịghị eme ka ọsọ dị elu maka ọkwa nri Domīs
Chief Michael Adeniyi Agbolade Ishola Adenuga Jr CSG GCON (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 29 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1953) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, na onye nke atọ kasị baa ọgaranya n'Africa
Ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Globacom bụ onye ọrụ telecom nke abụọ kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa ma nweekwa ọnụnọ na Ghana na Benin
O nwere osisi na Equitorial Trust Bank na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha mmanụ Conoil (nke bụbu Consolidated Oil Company)
Forbes emeela atụmatụ na ọnụ ahịa ya ruru ijeri dọla isii na abụọ na Mee 2021
Nna ya, Oloye Michael Agbolade Adenuga Sr, bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe nne ya, Omoba Juliana Oyindamola Adenuga (née Onashile, nke Okesopin, Ijebu Igbo), bụ nwanyị na-azụ ahịa nke eze Ijebu
Adenuga gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ibadan Grammar School, Ibadan, Oyo State, Nigeria na Comprehensive High School, Aiyetoro, maka asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị (HSC)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala iji nyere aka nweta ego maka agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Northwestern Oklahoma State University na Pace University, New York, na nzere na Business Administration
Adenuga nwetara nde mbụ ya na 1979, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na isii, na-ere lace ma na-ekesa ihe ọṅụṅụ dị nro
N'afọ 1990, ọ natara ikikere igwu ala na 1991, Consolidated Oil ya kụrụ mmanụ na mmiri na-emighị emi nke Southwestern Ondo Steeti, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ obodo mbụ mere nke a na ọnụ ọgụgụ azụmahịa
E nyere ya ikikere GSM na 1999; mgbe a kagburu ya, ọ natara nke abụọ mgbe gọọmentị mere ahịa ọzọ na 2003
Ụlọ ọrụ telecom ya bụ Globacom gbasara ngwa ngwa wee malite ịma nnukwu MTN Group aka
Ọ malitere ọrụ na Benin n'afọ 2008, ma gaa n'ihu na-agbasa ya na Ghana na Côte d'Ivoire, ebe a na-atụ anya ikikere ndị ọzọ ugbu a na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka
A kpọrọ ya African Entrepreneur of The Year na African Telecoms Awards (ATA) nke mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2007
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, Adenuga mere atụmatụ ịzụta onye na-ahụ maka ekwentị mkpanaaka nke Ivorian Comium Côte d'Ivoire maka nde $ 600
N'afọ 2012, gọọmentị Naịjirịa mere ya Grand Commander of the Order of the Niger
O nwere ọkwa onye isi agbụrụ Yoruba dị ka Otunba Apesin nke ezinụlọ Ijebu
N'afọ 2018, onye isi ala Emmanuel Macron nke France ji akara nke ọchịagha nke Legion of Honour chọọ ya mma
E hotara Adenuga dị ka otu n'ime Top 100 kasị nwee mmetụta n'Afrịka site na magazin New African na 2019
Mike Akhigbe bula onye Rear Admiral na Navy Naigeria
Enwere ike kpo ya onye Vice President Naigeria, maka mgbe Abdulsalami Abubakar bula onye ishi military di rulu Naigeria na 1998, obu la enyi soto ya, tupu mgbe ndi military hapuru government na 1999
Mike Abayomi Bamiloye (a mụrụ na 13 Eprel 1960) bụ onye na-eme ejije onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi
Ọ bụ Drama Evangelist, Onye guzobere nakwa Onye isi oche nke Mount Zion Faith Ministries na Mount Zion Television
A mụrụ Mike Bamiloye na 13 Eprel afọ 1960, na Ilesa, obodo dị na Osun Steeti n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa mana o si Ijebu-Ijesa na Osun Steeti
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye, Pastọ
Oriakụ Felicia Adepeju Adesiyan lekọtara ya ruo mgbe o toruru ilekọta onwe ya
A zụrụ ya na Divisional Teachers' Training College na Ipetumodu ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya
Mike Bamiloye hiwere Ugwu Zayọn na 5 Ọgọstụ afọ 1985
O gosipụtala, mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ozioma Naịjirịa kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
N'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985, Oriakụ nabatara atụmatụ Mike
Gloria Bamiloye nke gosipụtara mmalite nke ozi ha (Ugwu Zayọn)
Ọ lụrụ Gloria Bamiloye, onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ezisa ozi ọma, ma mụọ ụmụ atọ (Damilola, Joshua, na Darasimi Mike-Bamiloye)
Mike Eghan (amụrụ na 14 Machị n'afọ 1936) bụ onye mgbasa ozi na Ghana, nke a makwaara dị ka 'The Magnificent Emperor'
Ọ bụ onye isi nke ememe maka egwu akụkọ ihe mere eme na Ghana Soul to Soul, nke mere na Black Star Square na 1971 ma gosipụta ọtụtụ ndị omenkà Africa-America a ma ama n'akụkụ ndị egwu Ghana
E bipụtara akụkọ ndụ Eghan, The 'Emperor's' akuko si na etiti nwa ewepụtara n'afọ 2019
N'okwu Anis Haffar 'Ihe ọmụma kaleidoscopic nke nwoke ahụ banyere azụmahịa ngosi, mgbasa ozi, ntụrụndụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-abanye n'ọwara nke izute onwe onye
Ọ na-ekerịta akụkọ ihe mere eme site n'echiche atụmatụ nke ọrụ ya n'ime ya

A mụrụ ya na Sekondi-Takoradi, Gold Coast (nke bu Ghana ugbua), nke ise n'ime ụmụnne itoolu, Eghan sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke nna ya na-arụ ọrụ gọọmentị Ben Eghan nwere mmasị na redio iji sonye na Ghana Broadcasting Corporation (GBC) na 1961, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ na Barclays Bank nke e nwetara maka ya
na ọtụtụ afọ Foto Eghan e sere n'oge a so n'ọrụ ndị a ma ama nke onye na-ese foto na Ghana bụ James Barnor

O kwuru, sị 'Otu n'ime ihe ndị dị ịrịba ama n'ọrụ m dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-egosi redio bụ ọrụ m dị ka emcee (onye isi nke ememe) maka egwu egwu egwu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke akpọrọ 'Soul to Soul'
Ebumnuche nke egwu egwu a bụ ime ka ndị Afrịka na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Afrịka na Amerịka gbakọọ aka ka ha na-eme egwu na kọntinent Afrịka iji weghachite akụkọ ihe mere eme ha
Ekwenyere na mgbalị dị otú ahụ ga-akpali ndị isi ojii n'ụwa niile yana ọhụụ Osagyefo Dr Kwame Nkrumah nwere maka Black Race

' Ndị otu mkpụrụ obi, ndị ozioma na ndị na-agba egwu sonyere na Soul to Soul, nke mere na Black Star Square (nke bụ Independence Square ugbu a), gụnyere Wilson Pickett, Ike na Tina Turner, Les McCann, Eddie Harris, The Staple Singers, Carlos Santana, Roberta Flack, Willie Bobo, Voices of East Harlem, na ndị ọzọ
Eghan's popular 1970s talk show, The Mike Eghan Show, gosipụtara ndị ọbịa gụnyere Miriam Makeba, Ephraim Amu na Captain J
Tachie-Menson
ọ laghachiri Ghana, ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ na GBC, ma mesịa na-elekọta Sundown Hotel

Ọ gosiputara akwụkwọ ncheta ya, The 'Emperor' Story From the Centre of the World, mgbe ọ dị afọ 83 na Accra n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019 na Mahadum nke Ghana's Institute of African Studies, oge nke Prọfesọ Esi Sutherland-Addy duziri
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri iji sọpụrụ Eghan, nke Andrew Gyawu-Mensah mepụtara, na Machị n'afọ 2017
Ihe nrite Eghan gụnyere Grand Medal iji kwado ọrụ ya dị mma na mgbasa ozi

Nnukwu ụlọ ụka Nke Sakaramenti dikasiri Ngozi ( Portuguese Ọzọkwa Ulouka nke Efigenia di aso bụ ụlọ okpupkere Katọlik dị na akuku Casper Libero Avenue na Santa Ifigenia Street, nke dị na mpaghara otu aha ahụ n'obodo Sao Paulo na ndịda Brazil
Santa Ifigenia viaduct na-akwụsị n'ihu ụka
N’ebe di nso na Ndagwurugwu Anhangabaú, e wuru ulouka Santa Ifigenia ugbua na saịtị nke otu n’ime ụlọ ekpere ochie nke obodo ahụ, Isi-iyi nke Nwanyị Nwanyị nke Oche, nke ewuru tutu afọ 1720
E mezigharịrị ụlọ ụka mbụ a na 1794, sitekwa n'ụkpụrụ nke onye isi ahụ bụ Don João VI, na 1809 parish nke Nwanyị Nwanyị Nkwenye na Santa Ifigenia pụtara
Mike Ezuruonye (mụrụ 21 September 1981), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nigeria
Mike bụ onye Uzoakoli na Abia State, Nigeria
A mụrụ ya na Septemba 21, 1981 na Lagos
Ọ gara Federal Government College, Wukari, Taraba na Archbishop Aggey Memorial school, Lagos tupu ọ mụọ Accounting na Nnamdi Azikiwe University
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ tupu ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
O meela n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood
A họpụtara ya maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ọrụ ndu maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 'The Assassin' na Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2009
na nhọpụta maka Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Ọ lụrụ Nkechi Nnorom, nweekwa nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Reynold Nkembuchim Ezuruonye
O nwere nwanne nwanyị tọrọ, Chichi, onye bụ dibia bekee na United Kingdom
Mikely Wilhelm Adam (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 8, 1992), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Mike Free, bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, DJ, na ónyé na-ede egwu si South Central, Los Angeles
Mgbè ọ na-aga Mahadum Hampton na Virginia, Free malitere iso DJ Mustard rụọ ọrụ, ónyé mèrè ka ọ mata ndị na-ese ihe na Los Angeles gụnyere YG na Ty Dolla Sign
Ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ nke Free bịara site na ọrụ mmepụta ya na Tygaʹs 'Rack City' na DJ Mustard, nke ụlọ ọrụ Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) kwadoro ugboro anọ platinum
Michael Godson Ifeanyichukwu, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Mike Godson (amụrụ na October 10, 1985) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọchụnta ego
A mụrụ ya na Kano Steeti, Naịjirịa mana ọ bụ onye Imo Steeti
Godson gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Jos, Plateau Steeti ma nwee nzere bachelọ na ihe nkiri
Mike Godson malitere ime ihe nkiri na 2009 ma kemgbe ahụ ka a maara ya maka ịkọwa ọrụ ịhụnanya na Nollywood
Godson apụtala na ihe karịrị 100 ihe nkiri
O gosipụtara na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka Pete Edochie, Clem Ohameze, Kenneth Okonkwo, Van Vicker na John Dumelo
Ọ bịara n'ihu ọha na 2015 mgbe o mere ihe nkiri akpọrọ 7 Books of Moses N'afọ 2018, Godson bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na ndị otu mmepụta Bollywood jikọtara ya na Zee World
Godson na-ejikwa ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nhazi ọrụ ugbo na azụmaahịa
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na-enye ya mkpa ya, Godson atụwo aro na ọ nwere ike ọ gaghị enwe ike inye ya nchekwa ego
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa site na Independent National Electoral Commission n'afọ 2015
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, a katọrọ Godson maka ịkwa ndị Naijiria dara ogbenye emo n'oge mkpọchi ọrịa COVID-19
Michael Akhaine Osebhajimete Omoighe (11 Julaị 1958 - 23 Jenụwarị 2021), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Mike Omoighe, bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye nlekọta, onye nkatọ nka na onye nkuzi nka
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Opoji Ekpoma nke Edo Steeti na Naịjirịa, ọ tolitere ma biri na Lagos, Naịjirịa ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya

Omoighe gụrụ akwụkwọ na Yaba College of Technology (1978, ND); na Auchi Polytechnic, Auchi (1980, HND); na Mahadum Lagos - UNILAG (1987, Certificate in Polytechnic Management (CPM) NBTE)) na Mahadum Ibadan (1994, Master's degree in Visual Arts Communication) MCA) Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ese ihe osise, Bruce Onobrakpeya

Site na 1986 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Omoighe kụziri eserese na ise ihe na Yaba College of Technology, ebe ọ bụ onye isi nke Ngalaba Fine Art, Dean of School of Art, Design and Printing na Dean of Student Affairs na Yaba College of Technology, Lagos Nigeria
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ala Naịjirịa nke International Association of Art Critics, AICA
Omoighe lụrụ onye na-ese ihe bụ Titi Omoighe, nwere ụmụ
Ọ nwụrụ site na nsogbu COVID-19 na Jenụwarị 23, 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na abụọ

Michael Len Williams II (amụrụ na Machị 23, 1989), nke a maara dịka Mike Will Made It (nke a na-akpọkarị Mike WiLL Made-It) ma ọ bụ naanị Mike Will, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-eti egwu, ónyé na'ede egwu na DJ

A maara ya nke ọma maka imepụta egwu egwu màkà ọtụtụ ndị Southern hip hop na ndị na-ese egwu pop na egwu dị iche iche na-aga nke ọma, gụnyere 'Black Beatles' na 'Powerglide' nke Rae Sremmurd, 'Mercy' nke Kanye West, 'No Lie' nke 2 Chainz, 'Bandz a Make Her Dance' nke Juicy J, 'Pour It Up' nke Rihanna, 'Love Me' nke Lil Wayne, 'Body Party' nke Ciara, 'We Can't Stop' nke Miley Cyrus, 'Formation' nke Beyoncé, na 'Lum'
O weputara mixtapes isii na otu studio album, Ransom 2
A mụrụ Williams na Marietta, Georgia, nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ atọ; o nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ tọrọ ya
Nna ya, Michael Williams Sr, bụ ónyé isi IBM nke rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye DJ klọb na 1970s
Nne ya, Shirley Williams, ónyé bụbu ónyé na-agbazinye ego n'ụlọ akụ, nọ n'otu òtù ozioma, na-abụ abụ màkà Dottie Peoples
Ọ tolitere n'ezinụlọ na-agụ egwú ebe nwanne nna ya bụ onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na otu n'ime ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị tọrọ ya bụ onye isi na-akụ ụbọ akhara n'egwuregwu Olimpik
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, Mike Will bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu, na-ekere òkè n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu, gụnyere basketball, baseball, na bọọlụ, na nrọ nke ịghọ ónyé na-ese egwuregwu
Ndụ ya na-elekwasịkwa anya n'ịhụnanya maka egwu hip-hop
Mike Will bu ụzọ zụlite nkà ya màkà egwu site n'ịkpọghachi ngwá egwu ndị a ma ama ọ nụrụ na redio mgbè ya na ndị enyi ya ga-agwa ha ihe n'efu

N'ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ, Will kwuru, ọkachasị, na-akpọghachi ngwá ọrụ màkà 'Still Fly', abụ a ma ama site n'aka ndị otu rap nke ndịda Big Tymers, na keyboard Casio, ma kwuo na ọ na-akpọ 'Young'n (Holla Back) ' site n'onye na-eti egwu New York bụ Fabolous na ngwá ọrụ mmepụta na ụlọ ahịa egwu dị n'ógbè ahụ
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, Mike Will malitere ịzụlite ụda nke ya na Korg ES1 beat machine, nke nna ya zụtara ya dị ka ònyìnyé Krismas site na ụlọ ahịa egwu Mars Music
Ka Mike Will na-aghọwanye ónyé rụzuru, ọ malitekwara iji ngwá ọrụ mmepụta, gụnyere Korg Triton, Akai MPC1000, Yamaha Motif, na Roland Fantom
Ka ọ na-erule mgbè Mike Will dị afọ iri na isii, ọ na-etinye ógè na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ dị na Atlanta, na-anwa ịzụta ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama
A leghaara ya anya na mbụ, mana n'ikpeazụ otu n'ime teepu ya batara n'aka Gucci Mane, ónyé kpọrọ Mike Will na Patchwerk studios, ụlọ ndekọ Atlanta
William Michael Coleman (amụrụ na Julaị 8, 1992), nkè a maara dị ka Mike Zombie, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na ónyé na-eti egwu si Willingboro Township, New Jersey
Kemgbe afọ 2012, Coleman bụ ónyé na-emepụta ihe n'ụlọ maka akara Drake bụ OVO Sound
Ihe kachasị ukwuu o mepụtara maka akara ahụ bụ 'Started from the Bottom' na 2013
Ihe ọzọ dị mkpà o mepụtara bụ 'Ha anaghị ahụ gị n'anya' nke DJ Khaled, wepụtara otu afọ ka e mesịrị
A maara ya nke ọma màkà mmepụta nke egwu Drake 'Started from the Bottom'
O gosipụtara egwu akpọrọ 'Ambessence piano & drones 1' nke Bruno Sanfilippo & Mathias Grassow màkà abụ ahụ
'Started from the Bottom' bụ onye mmeri nke 'Track of the Year' na 2013 BET Hip Hop Awards
A na-akpọ egwu ahụ n'oge NBA All-Star Weekend, LeBron James' 'LeBron Face' Sprite commercial', egwuregwu vidio NBA 2K14, na egwuregwu vidio Assassin's Creed 4
A họpụtakwara abụ ahụ maka 'Best Rap Song' na 56th Annual Grammy Awards
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013, BET kpọrọ ya otu n'ime 'ndị na-eto eto iri na-emepụta ihe kachasị mma'
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2013, Complex kpọrọ ya otu n'ime 'ndị mmepụta ọhụrụ iri abụọ na ise ị ga-ele ányà'
Ya na ónyé na-eti egwu agha bụ Hollow Da Don rụkọtara ọrụ na mbụ na Hollow keere òkè dị mkpa na-etinye Drake na Mike Zombie
Mikki Osei Berko (a mụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri

O mere Master Richard na usoro TV Taxi Driver na Dada Boat na Dada Boat Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nnọchi anya maka mpaghara ntuli aka Ayidiki maka otu oge, ọ bụkwa onye isi nchịkwa nke Mediagold Productions na GhanaMikki Osei Berko rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma na Radio Gold, ụlọ ọrụ redio nke onwe ya nke dị na Accra, nke ọ hapụrụ na July afọ 2003 iji sonye na Happy FM
O mechara gosipụta na Kessben FM
Ọ bụ ụbụrụ no n'azụ ọganihu Kente Radio, ụlọ ọrụ redio n'ịntanetị nke Pan-Africa
Dị ka onye nduzi
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Mawougno Mila Ami Aziablé, nke a na-akpọkarị Mila Aziablé
Ọ bụ onye injinia na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Togo, onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya Minista na Onye isi ala maka ike na ogbunigwe na Cabinet nke Togo, kemgbe ọnwa 1 Ọktoba na afọ 2020
Mila bụ nwa afọ Togo, amụrụ n'ihe dị ka afọ 1991
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lomé
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Lomé, na National School of Engineering (ENSI)
N'ihi ịdị mma agụmakwụkwọ, e nyere Mila agụmakwụkwọ iji mụọ injinia na Metz, France
N'afọ 2012, Mila gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na injinia igwe na École Nationale d'Ingénieurs de Metz (ENIM), (National Engineering School of Metz), ụlọ akwụkwọ injinia ọha
N'afọ sochirinụ, a nabatara ya na Ecole Nationale Supérieure des Mines de Paris (Paris National Superior College of Mines), nke a na-akpọkarị Mines ParisTech
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ bụ ọkachamara na Gas Engineering and Management
N'afọ 2018, a nabatara ya na Paris Institute of Political Studies (Sciences Po), na-agụsị akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ na nzere masta na mmepe na usoro nchịkwa
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Mila were ọrụ dị ka 'onye injinia na-ahụ maka ọrụ gas' na GRTgaz, onye enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke mba France ENGIE
N'ọnwa Ọktoba na afọ 2020, a họpụtara Mila, onye dị afọ iri abụọ na itoolu n'oge ahụ, dịka onye nnọchi anya onye isi ala nke Republic of Togo, onye na-ahụ maka ike na oghere
Ọ bụ onye kachasị nta n'ime ndị otu kansụl
Ọ nọchiri Marc Ably Bidamon onye jere ozi n'ọrụ ahụ n'etiti afọ 2015 na afọ 2020
Mila Horvat (amụrụ ya na June 4, 1981) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onyonyo nke Croatia nke na-apụta na Croatian Radiotelevision (HRT)
A mụrụ Horvat na Celje, Slovenia
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Hum na Sutli, SR Croatia, SFR Yugoslavia ma mụọ akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadum Zagreb (Croatian Studies program) ebe ọ nwetara nzere Nna-ukwu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ n'afọ 2005

Horvat malitere ịrụ ọrụ na HRT n'afọ 2002 wee bụrụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi ụtụtụ Dobro yar, Hrvatska (Good Morning, Croatia) yana ịnabata ihe omume egwuregwu na mmemme akụkọ (Goleo, Arena, Olimp, na Volim nogomet)
Ọ kwadoro Dora 2010 na Opatija yana mmemme Afrovizija nke FIFA World Cup nke afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2010, Mila na onye ya na ya na-agba egwú, Robert Schubert, mechara bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Ples sa zvijezdama, nsụgharị asụsụ Croatia nke Dancing with the Stars
Margaretha Murray (aha ogbo Milan Murray ) (30 Ọktoba 1974) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri na ode nkeSouth Africa
Ọhaneze South Africa mara ya nke ọma maka agwa ngosipụta ya na soap opera dị iche iche, mana o meela ma gosipụ̀ta n'ihe nkiri ma mekwa ihe omume nkwago
Na mgbakwunye, ọ na- akwado Ontbytsake, ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ kwa izu na kykNET, nhazi nlereanya nke ndị Afrikaa na DStv
Ya na di ya, Schalk van der Merwe, nwa ya nwoke Steph na Lua nwa ya nwaanyị, bi na Johannesburg
A zụlitere ya na Cape Province, nke South Africa
Milan gụrụ gbasara omume ihe nkiri na Pretoria Technicon, ma mụọkwa ya n'ụlọ ihe nkiri ụfọdụ na New York City, United States
Nnukwu ezumike Milan nwere bụ na 1999 mgbe etinyere ya ọrụ na soap opera nke South Africa, bụ

Ọ gosipụtara nwa agbọghọ nnupụisi aha ya bụ Dusty da Silva site na 1998 ruo 2001, mgbe edepụrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ, mana ọ mere nlọghachi na-egosipụta otu agwa ahụ mana dị ka nwa akwụkwọ mahadum site na 2003 ruo 2004
Milan gosipụtara kwa na obere ihe nkiri ntụ egwu abụọ, Slash (banyere otu udu a na-akpọ 'Slash', nke ọ n'egosiputa dị ka Karen) na Snake Island (ihe nkiri ntụ egwu nke o gosipụtara dị ka Carrie)
Ọ gosipụtara dika onye ndu ihunanya 'Sage' na ihe nkiri M-Net Murmur
N'ọrụ ndị a ọ sụrụ asụsụ bekee, mana asụsụ obodo ya bụ Afrikaan
Nnukwu ọrụ Afrikaan mbụ ya bụ na ihe nkiri telivishọn bụ Song vir Katryn, bụ nke o gosipụtara dị ka onye nta akụkọ mpụ
Ọrụ ihe nkiri Afrikaans ndị ọzọ gụnyere Soao opera bụ Binnelanders (Frankie van Niekerk) na ihe nkiri telivishọn Dit Wat Stom bụ (Melanie van den Berg)
Milan esonyela n'ọtụtụ mmepụta ogbo
O mere ihe nkiri n'ime ihe ngosi otu onye nke ya,' n Pers hoed vir Mrs Brown
Na 2005, o gosipụtara ọrụ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Hollywood aha ya bụ Christel Humanin the stage production Kom terug, Saartjie, nke rụrụ na Klein- Karoo Nasionele Kunstefees nke afọ ahụ
Ihe omume a dabere na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ndụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụCharlize Theron
Na 2010, ọ gosipụtara na mmepụta abụọ na ABSA Klein-Karoo Nasionale Kunstefees Taraboemdery na Vergenoeg, na Sandra Prinsloo
Milan bụ onye na-akwado ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ kykNET Ontbytsake ma bụrụkwa onye gosiputara agwa na ejijeM-Net bụ The Wild - nke edobere na ụlọ egwuregwu ntụ okwe na South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Kate, nne nke nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri bụ onye tinyeworo obi ụtọ nke ya na azụ azụ maka mmasị di ya nwere maka nchekwa anụ ọhịa
Milan hapụrụ ihe omume soap a na oge nke abụọ ya wee laghachi maka ebe ndị ọbịa ole na ole na afọ ikpeazụ nke Wild wee laghachi ọzọ maka njedebe ya na Maachị 2013
Murray wepụtakwara akwụkwọ mbụ ya akpọrọ 'Koemelaat 'n Sanity-joernaal van'n Nuwe Ma', nke na-ekwu maka okwu gbasara ịbụ nne mbụ
Mildred Fahrni (1900-1992) bụ onye Canada na-ahụ maka udo na Socialist, onye ghọrọ enyi Gandhi na Martin Luther King Jr
Ọ bụ onye ndú nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF) na Fellowship of Reconciliation
Fahrni megidere Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na xenophobia nke dugara n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ndị Japan na Canada na ụlọ mkpọrọ ụmụaka Dukhobor
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Amụrụ Mildred Osterhout n'ime ime obodo Manitoba n'ụbọchị 2 Jenụwarị 1900 na Reverend Abram na Hattie Osterhout
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara British Columbia n'afọ 1914
N'etiti afọ 1919 ruo n'afọ 1923 ọ gara Mahadum nke British Columbia (UBC), nweta Bachelor of Arts na Bekee na nkà ihe ọmụma
Ọ gara n'ihu mezue Master's na Philosophy n'afọ 1923, kwa na UBC

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Osterhout malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ maka alaka Vancouver nke YMCA na Canadian Memorial Church (CMC), mana meriri agụmakwụkwọ na Bryn Mawr College, n'afọ 1930 ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Pennsylvania, ọ zutere Muriel Lester ma kpọọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ọnwa isii na Kingsley Hall na London
N'ụzọ doro anya, mbata Osterhout na London kwekọrọ na Nzukọ Round Table na nnwere onwe India
Mahatma Gandhi, onye na-aga nzukọ ahụ, nọkwa na Kingsley Hall, na nzukọ ya na ya, gbanwere ụzọ ndụ Osterhout
Ọ laghachiri Canada n'afọ 1933 wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gara Nzukọ Njikọ Commonwealth Federation na Regina, nke guzobere otu ahụ ma malite Regina Manifesto
Ọ gbara ọsọ maka ọfịs gọọmentị etiti na ntuli aka 1933 na 1938 na tiketi CCF, na-efunahụ ugboro abụọ ahụ, na-ekpebi mgbe ọ nwụsịrị nke abụọ ileta Gandhi na India
Mgbe nleta ya gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Canada, were ọrụ nkuzi na Carleton Elementary School n'afọ 1939 ma lekọta nna ya na-arịa ọrịa, onye nwụrụ na afọ 1940
N'afọ 1941, Osterhout lụrụ Walter Fahrni wee malite njem nleta gafee Canada na-akụzi banyere udo na mmegide megide itinye aka Canada na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
N'ịbụ onye na-egbochi itinye aka na imegide xenophobia nke gọọmentị, Fahrni wepụtara onwe ya ịkụzi n'akwụghị ụgwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na New Denver na ndị Japan Canada
N'ime afọ 1940 na 1950, Mildred gara mba ụwa maka ihe ndị na-eme udo

Ọ gara nzukọ ntọala nke United Nations na 1945 wee gaa na 1947 Primer Congreso Interamericano de Mujeres nke emere na Guatemala City dị ka onye nnọchi anya Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF)

Na mbido 1947, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke alaka Vancouver nke WILPF mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 1948 mgbe ọ kwagara Toronto iji nabata ọkwa dị ka odeakwụkwọ mba nke Fellowship of Reconciliation (FOR)
Mgbe afọ ise gasịrị, ọ kwagara Vancouver, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ maka FOR
N'afọ sochirinụ, 1949, Fahrni gara India, iji sonye na Nzukọ Ndị Pacifist Ụwa
Ọ bụ onye na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha na-ekwu maka isiokwu ndị na-abụghị ime ihe ike, ịda ogbenye, na mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya yana ibipụta isiokwu gbasara isiokwu ndị ahụ
N'afọ 1950, o dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ maka Doukhobor Inquirer ma nwee ọmịiko maka mkpagbu ha
N'agbata afọ 1953 na 1959, gọọmentị Canada tinyere ụmụaka Doukhobor n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi dị na New Denver na Fahrni nyekwara ya ọrụ nkuzi ọzọ
N'afọ 1955, Fahrni gara njem dị ka onye nnọchi anya Fellowship of Reconciliation na Montgomery, Alabama iji sonye na mkpagbu bọs Montgomery
Onye na-enwe mmasị na Martin Luther King Jr
n'ihi njikọ ya na Gandhi, ha ghọrọ ndị enyi ma na-edegara akwụkwọ ozi gbasara nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na pacifism ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Di ya nwụrụ na 1958 ma Fahrni gbazitere ndị bi na ụmụ akwụkwọ ọnụ ụlọ, na-ebi n'ụdị obodo
N'agbata afọ 1963 na afọ 1979, ọ nọrọ n'oge oyi na Casa de los Amigos nke Quakers na Mexico City, na-arụ ọrụ obodo
Site na 1970 gaa n'ihu, Fahrni jere ozi dị ka onye ọbịa maka Servas, otu udo mba ụwa, nke na-eji njem na ezinụlọ na-elekọta ya iji kwalite udo
Ya na Servas mere njem site na South America
N'afọ 1991, e nyere ya onyinye udo nke Vancouver
Fahrni nwụrụ na 13 Eprel 1992 na Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
Mildred Howard (amụrụ n'afọ 1945) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na nchịkọta mgbasa ozi

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na gallery na Boston, Los Angeles na New York, na mbà ụwa na ebe dị na Berlin, Cairo, London, Paris, na Venice, na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Oakland Museum of California, de Young Museum, SFMOMA, San Jose Museum of Art, na Museum of the African Diaspora
A na-arụ ọrụ Howard na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere San Francisco Museum of Modern Art, Oakland Museum of California, na Ulrich Museum of Art
A mụrụ Howard na 1945 na Rolly na Mable Howard na San Francisco, California, ma zụlite ya na South Berkeley, California
Nné na nnà Howard nwèrè azụmahịa ihe ochie ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na òtù ndị ọrụ, ọgụ màkà ikike obodo na nsogbu ndị ọzọ nke ọbọdọ
Howard ebiela na Berkeley kemgbe 1949
Ọ bụ ónyé otu SNCC na CORE ma sonye dị ka ónyé ntorobịa na ngagharị iwe megide ịkpa ókè n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Berkeley
O nwetara nzèrè Associate of Arts na Certificate in Fashion Arts na College of Alameda na 1977
Howard gàrà n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya wee nweta nzèrè MFA na 1985 site na Fiberworks Center site na Textile Arts na Mahadum John F
Kennedy nke dị na Orinda, California
Howard malitere ndụ okike ya dị ka ónyé na-agba egwú, tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ na nka anya
Na mbido afọ 1980, ntinye Howard weere ụdị windo eji eme ihe site na ụlọ ahịa na ụlọ ụka
Ha mechara ghọọ ébé óbíbí ndị e wuru ewu nke nyéré ébé óbíbí ndị a na-agagharị agagharị

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na 1990 Howard mepụtara ụlọ e ji karama na ájá mee na atrium nke Afro-American Museum na Los Angeles; ọrụ a sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke akwụkwọ Autobiography of an Ex-Colored Man nke James Weldon Johnson ma na-ezo aka n'ụlọ karama nke Johnson kọwara n'akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ 2005, o mepụtara ma tinye ụlọ e ji ugegbe na-acha ọbara ọbara mee na Museum of Glass na Tacoma, Washington
N'afọ 2019, e gosipụtara ọrụ Howard 'TAP Investigation of Memory' na Oakland Museum nke California
Ihe ngosi ahụ bụ ihe ngosi multimedia dị ike nke na-enyocha isiokwu nke njirimara, omenala ụka, gentrification, ịgba egwu, ime ihe, na ihe ndị ọzọ
https //museumcaorg/exhibit/mildred-howards-tap-investigation-memory

N'afọ 1991, Howard natara Adaline Kent Award site na San Francisco Art Institute màkà ntinye ya Ten Little Children (otu ka a gbagburu ma mgbè ahụ enwere itoolu), ọrụ na-anọchite anya ili ozu nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ogbugbu Soweto
Ọ bụ ónyé natara Rockefeller Fellowships abụọ na Bellagio, Ịtali (1996 na 2007); Joan Mitchell Award; NEA Fellowship in Sculpture; na Flintridge Foundation Award for Visual Art
N'afọ 2011, a kwanyeere Howard ugwu na Berkeley City Hall Chambers ébé ónyé isi ọbọdọ Berkeley Tom Bates kwupụtara na Tuesday, March 29, 2011 bụ Mildred Howard Day
N'afọ 2012, Howard natara onyinye SPUR, nke a kọwara dị ka 'ihe Nríte ọbọdọ kachasị ukwuu na nke a ma ama kwa afọ' nke San Francisco, site na San Francisco Planning and Urban Research Association
Safụ Ụlọ (2005)
'Ụlọ nke Na-agaghị Aghata Maka Agba Ọ bụla Karịa nke Ya' - (2011)
'Ụlọ nke Na-agaghị Aghata Maka Agba Ọ bụla Karịa nke Ya' - (2011)
'Ụlọ nke Na-agaghị agafe maka Agba Ọ bụla karịa nke ya' - (2011)- gosipụtara ebe a na 2020, arụnyere na Battery Park City, NYC
Mildred Howard n'ime Ụlọ nke Na-agaghị agafe maka Agba Ọ bụla karịa nke ya, Eprel 2022
Howard - 2022
Nelisiwe Mildred Oliphant bụ Minista Ọrụ nke South Africa site n'ọnwa Oktober 2010 ruo n'ọnwa Mee 2019
Mildred Jean Thompson (ubochí irí na abụọ n'ọnwa Machị, 1936 rụo ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba, 2003) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke rụrụ ọrụ na eserese, eserese, obibi akwụkwọ, ihe ọkpụkpụ na foto

Ndị nkatọ ejikọtala nka ya na akwa West Africa na ihe owuwu Alakụba; ha kwukwara na German Expressionism, egwu (ma jazz America ma European oge ochie) na ọgụgụ Thompson na astronomy, spiritualism na metaphysics dị ka mmetụta nka dị mkpa
O dekwara ma bụrụ ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ màkà magazin Art Papers

Thompson nwèrè ihe ngosi onwé ya na Goethe-Institut, Agnes Scott College, Howard University, Harvard University, Museum of Contemporary Art Jacksonville, na Leopold Hoesch Museum, Düren na Hochschule für Kunst und Design na Halle, Germany, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Mgbè ọ nwụsịrị, ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nkè ihe ngosi 2017 'Magnetic Fields Expanding American Abstraction,' na Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art, na Kansas City, Missouri

Na mgbakwunye na ndị dị na gallery ya Galerie Lelong na New York City, e nwere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na New Orleans Museum of Art na Berlin Biennale na 2018 na Spelman College Museum of Fine Art na 2019
A mụrụ Mildred Jean Thompson na Machị 12, 1936 na Jacksonville, Florida ma too n'ebe ahụ
Ọzụzụ nka ya malitere na 1953 mgbè ọ banyèrè Mahadum Howard na Washington, DC
ebe a zụrụ ya n'okpuru James A
Porter (1905-1970), ónyé isi nke ngalaba nka nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
O mèrè ndokwa ka Thompson nweta agụmakwụkwọ màkà ọmụmụ ógè okpomọkụ na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture na Maine
Mgbè Thompson natara Bachelor of Arts site na Howard na 1957, Porter nyeere ya aka ịbanye na Brooklyn Museum of Art School na Max Beckmann Scholarship
Ọ malitere igosi ihe, a nabatara ọrụ ya maka ihe ngosi Art USA
Xia58 na Madison Square Garden
Mgbè afọ atọ gachara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na mbido 1961, Thompson laghachiri New York City iji malite ọrụ ọkachamara ya na United States
Otú ọ dị, a pụghị ịchọta nkwenye ọha na eze na nka ọ nwèrè na Europe ọbụna n'ọtụtụ obodo ndị America
N'oge na-adịghị ányá, Thompson ghọtara na n'ihi na ọ bụ nwanyị ojii, a jụrụ ya ihe ngosi na ihe ngosi nke ọ chere na ọrụ ya kwesịrị
N'akwụkwọ édémédé akụkọ ndụ nke afọ 1977, Thompson dere na 'Otu nwanyị na-ere ahịa
kwuru na ọ gaghị ekwe omume ka m nwee ihe ngosi na New York dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
[Onye ọzọ nwe ụlọ ngosi ihe nkírí kwuru]na ọ ga-aka mma ma ọ bụrụ na enwere m enyi ọcha iji were ọrụ m, ónyé ga-eme ka ọ bụrụ Mildred Thompson

' Otú ọ dị, o nwetara ndị na-ege ya ntị na William Lieberman, nwa nke onye na-ese ihe German Expressionist Max Liebermann; Lieberman (1923 Sri 2005) bụ ónyé nlekọta nwere mmetụta na Museum of Modern Art
A zụrụ abụọ n'ime mbipụta Thompson màkà nchịkọta ahụ na aro ya
E nyèrè Thompson ihe ngosi onwé ya n'ọbọdọ ya na Museum of Contemporary Art na Jacksonville, Florida na 1997
Onye nlekọta ahụ, Henry Flood Roberts Jr, kwuru na 'Ndị mmadụ nwèrè nnukwu ihe osise mara mma nke Mildred na otu ụlọ jupụtara na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya yiri nnụnụ
' Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, o nwèrè ihe ngosi onwe ya na Georgia Perimeter College na Atlanta
Thompson nwụrụ na úbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba, 2003 na Hospice Atlanta n'ihi ọrịa kansa
N'afọ 2009, Leopold Hoesch Museum na Schloss Burgau, na Düren, Germany, ebe ọ bi, gosipụtara ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya nke akpọrọ, 'Mildred Thompson A Life Long Exploration'

N'afọ sochirinụ, Galerie l'Aquarium na Valenciennes, France, gosipụtara ihe osise osisi ya na Tubman African American Museum na Macon, Georgia, 'Making the Invisible Visible Photographs and Works on Paper by Mildred Thompson
' N'afọ 2015 Michael C
Carlos Museum of Art na Atlanta gosipụtara ihe ngosi nkè ihe osise ya
N'afọ 1987, ihe ngosi Thompson 'In and Out of Germany,' na Goethe Institute dị na Atlanta, nwere ihe osise 42 e mere na Germany, France, na United States
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Atlanta Creative Loafing kwuru na usoro Thompson kachasị ọhụrụ nke eserese pensụl na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, Objective Music, dabere na njikọ ya nke nka na egwu
O kwukwara banyere mmetụta ya nke agba na usoro ụda dị ka Wassily Kandinsky nwere mmetụta
Nnyocha ọzọ nke oge a nke ihe ngosi ahụ na Art Papers kwukwara na Kandinsky bụ mmetụta, yana mmasị Thompson na akụkọ ifo nke Hermann Hesse na echiche Jungian nke amaghị ihe
Mana mmetụta Thompson nwere maka egwu yiri ka ọ nwere mmetụta kachasị ike na ọrụ na ngosi ahụ
Ónyé nyocha ahụ, Leslie Schworm, dere na 'ụzọ Thompson bụ ịdọrọ egwu ma ọ bụ ụda
O kwenyere na usoro dị na egwu so n'ime ihe ndị kachasị ọcha, na-enye ohere ịnweta ihe dị mkpà
Thompson nwèrè nwanne nwanyị, Ruth, na ónyé mmekọ, Donna Jackson
N'afọ ndị ọ nọ na Atlanta, a maara ya màkà Afro na-acha odo odo
Ọ bụrụ abụ ma kpọọ ụbọ akwara n'otu òtù a na-akpọ We Do Blues, nke Jackson nọkwa na ya, nke na-akpọkarị na Daddy D'Z, ébé a na-eri nri, na n'oge nri ehihie na Woodruff Park
'Mildred kwadoro ihe m ga-akpọ 'happy blues' - ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ihe 'My Baby Done Left Me',' ka onye otu egwu Kerry Davis kwùrù
'O dere egwu na-akpali akpali dị ka 'A Peacock in the Ghetto', nke bụ ọkacha mmasị m
Egwú ya jupụtara na ọchị na ịma mma mana ọ ka nwere ụda bluesy

Ọrụ Thompson dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Smithsonian American Art Museum, National Museum of Women in the Arts, na Howard University, niile dị na Washington, DC, Museum of Modern Art, Brooklyn Museum; Mott-Warsh Collection, Birmingham Museum of Art, Johnson Museum of Art na Cornell University, Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, Emory University, na Leopold Hoesch Museum, Düren, na Hamburg Museum, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Milika Limwanya (amụrụ na 8 Jenụwarị 1996) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti
Ọ bụ onye otu ụmụ nwanyị mba Zambia
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ ngwaahịa nke Chiparamba Youth Soccer Academy, Limwanya agbaala bọọlụ maka ZESCO United FC
Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ maka Red Arrows Women Football Team
Ọ bụ otu n'ime prospectshaving a chọpụtara site na Airtel Rising Stars nke mekwara ka ndị dị ka Patson Daka, Enoch Mwepu na ndị ọzọ pụta ìhè
Limwanya gbara ọsọ maka Zambia na afo 2017 COSAFA Women's Championship
Beatrice Chinery a maara dị ka Miliky MiCool (c
1996- June 10, 2020) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na mmalite afọ 2000 maka ọrụ ya na usoro telivishọn bụ Kejetia, ma mesịa gosipụta na ihe omume Yolo
Ọ malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1993
MiCool rụrụ ọrụ na usoro telivishọn ama ama Kejetia na mmalite afọ 2000
Ọ gara n'ihu na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere Jamestown Fisherman na Yolo
MiCool nwụrụ site na nsogbu nke ọbara mgbali elu na Korle-Bu Teaching Hospital na Accra na June 10, 2020
Nwanne nwoke MiCool bụ Robert kwuru na ọ rịara ọrịa ruo ọnwa ole na ole mana ihe bịara ka njọ ma akpọrọ ya gawa n'ụlọ ọgwụ mana ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ bịarutere

Ojiji ndị agha na-eji ụlọ akwụkwọ bụ okwu eji eme ihe iji zoo aka na ọrụ dị iche iche nke ndị agha mba na ndị agha na-abụghị nke steeti na-arụ n'ime na gburugburu ụlọ akwụkwọ, mahadum, na ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, iji kwado mbọ ndị agha ha

Ihe atụ nke a gụnyere iji ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ mahadum dị ka ogige ma ọ bụ ntọala, maka mwakpo ma ọ bụ nchebe, maka ịchekwa ngwá agha ma ọ bụ mgbọ, maka ọzụzụ ndị agha nke ndị agha, dị ka ebe nlele, na dị ka ụlọ mkpọrọ
Kọmitii Nchebe nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu agbaala mba niile ume ka ha mee ihe ndị siri ike iji gbochie ndị agha iji ụlọ akwụkwọ dị otú ahụ
Dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otú UN si kwuo 'Ojiji nke ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ebumnuche agha na-etinye ụmụaka n'ihe ize ndụ nke mwakpo ma na-egbochi ikike ụmụaka agụmakwụkwọ

Ojiji ụlọ akwụkwọ dị otú ahụ abụghị naanị na ọ na-eme ka ndebanye aha belata na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke nkwụsị, ọkachasị n'etiti ụmụagbọghọ, kamakwa ọ nwere ike ime ka a na-ewere ụlọ akwụkwọ dị ka ihe mgbaru ọsọ ziri ezi maka mwakpo

Dị ka Global Coalition to Protect Education from Attack si kwuo, n'agbata afọ 2005 nakwa afọ 2015 enwere oge ndị agha jiri ụlọ akwụkwọ na mba Afghanistan, mba Burma / Myanmar, Central African Republic, Chad, Colombia, Côte d'Ivoire, Democratic Republic of Congo, Egypt, Ethiopia, Georgia, India, Indonesia, Iraq, Israel / Occupied Palestinian Territory, Kenya, Libya, Mali, Myanmar, Nepal, Nigeria, Pakistan, Philippines, Somalia, South Sudan, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Syria, mba Thailand, Uganda, Ukraine, mba Yemen nakwa mba Zimbabwe

Dị ka akụkọ ahụ si kwuo, ndị otu na-esonụ jiri ụlọ akwụkwọ mee ihe maka ebumnuche agha n'oge afọ 2015 Afghan National Defence and Security Forces yana ndị Taliban na otu ISIL na Afghanistan; ndị bụbu ndị otu Séléka na Central African Republic; ndị agha Colombia na FARC-EP na mba Colombia; ndị agha Congo na ndị agha na mba Democratic Republic of the Congo; ndị agha nchekwa mba Iraq na ISIL na Iraq; Darnah Mujahideen Shura Council na Libya; ndị agha na mba Mali; Tatmadaw (ndị agha gọọmentị) na mba Myanmar; ndị agha nchekwa Nigeria na Boko Haram na mba Nigeria; ndị agha nke Philippines na ndị agha, na Bangsamoro Islamic Freedom Fighters na mba Philippines; ndị agha mba Somalia; ndị agha Sudan People's Liberation Army na ndị ọzọ na Sudan Peoples Liberation Movement / Army in Opposition na South Sudan; ndị agha gọọmentị na mba South Sudan; ndị agha mba Houthi, kọmitii a ma ama, na mba Yemen

N'okpuru United Nations Security Council Resolution 1998 n'afọ 2011, Security Council gbara 'ndị otu na-alụ agha ume ka ha zere ime ihe ndị na-egbochi ụmụaka ịnweta agụmakwụkwọ,' ma rịọ ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke UN 'na-enyocha ma na-akọ
banyere iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe n'ụzọ megidere iwu enyemaka mba ụwa'

N'okpuru mkpebi nke afọ 2143 nke United Nations Security Council n'afọ 2014, Security Council gosipụtara 'nchegbu miri emi na iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe n'ụzọ megidere iwu mba ụwa, na-aghọta na ojiji dị otú ahụ nwere ike ime ka ụlọ akwụkwọ bụrụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ ziri ezi nke mwakpo, si otú a na-etinye nchekwa ụmụaka na ndị nkụzi yana agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka n'ihe ize ndụ

' Ọzọkwa, Kansụl Nchebe gbara 'ndị niile nọ n'agha ume ka ha kwanyere àgwà ndị nkịtị nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ùgwù dịka iwu enyemaka mba ụwa si dị;' gbara ndị otu mba ume ka ha tụlee ihe ndị doro anya iji gbochie ndị agha na ndị agha na-abụghị ndị agha iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe megidere iwu mba ụwa na-emetụta;' gbara ndị otu mba ume ka ha hụ na a na-enyocha mwakpo ụlọ akwụkwọ na-emegide iwu enyemaka mba ụwa ma na-ekpe ndị na-ahụ maka ya ikpe n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị;' ma kpọọ ndị ọrụ mba United Nations ka ha meziwanye nlekota na ịkọ akụkọ banyere iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe
N'afọ 2015, Kansụl Nchebe wusiri asụsụ ya ike ma na Mkpebi afọ 2225 gbara ndị niile 'Member States ume ka ha mee ihe ndị doro anya iji gbochie ndị agha na ndị agha iji ụlọ akwụkwọ dị otú ahụ
Iwu nke iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe n'agha na-achịkwa ngwakọta nke iwu enyemaka mba ụwa (nke a makwaara na 'iwu nke agha'), iwu ruuru mmadụ nke mba ụwa, na iwu obodo
A na-egbochi iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe ndị agha, mana ọ bụghị mgbe niile, site na iwu enyemaka mba ụwa

A chọrọ ndị otu agha agha, ruo n'ókè kachasị ekwe omume, iji a) zere ịchọta ebumnuche ndị agha n'ime ma ọ bụ na nso ebe ndị mmadụ bi, gụnyere ebe ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum nwere ike ịdị; b) gbalịsie ike iwepụ ndị nkịtị, ndị nkịtị n'otu n'otu na ihe ndị nkịtị nọ n'okpuru njikwa ha site na nso ebumnuche ndị agha; na c) mee nlezianya ndị ọzọ dị mkpa iji chebe ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum ndị ahụ dị n'okpuru njikwa ha megide ihe ize ndụ sitere na ọrụ ndị agha

Dị ka onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke otú UN na odeakwụkwọ ukwu na-ahụ maka ụmụaka na agha si kwuo 'Iwu enyemaka mba ụwa machibidoro ndị agha na ndị otu iji ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ụmụaka na ndị nkụzi na-eji ha eme ihe maka agụmakwụkwọ
' Dịkwa ka Human Rights Watch si kwuo, ọ bụ 'iwu na-akwadoghị iji ụlọ akwụkwọ n'otu oge dị ka ebe e wusiri ike na ebe agụmakwụkwọ'

N'okpuru nkwekọrịta mba Geneva nke anọ, nke na-arụ ọrụ n'oge agha mba ụwa, ike na-achị ga-eji, site na mmekorita nke ndị ọchịchị mba na nke obodo, 'na-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ niile na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma maka nlekọta na agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka
N'okpuru Mgbakwunye Protocol II, nke na-emetụta n'oge agha agha na-abụghị nke mba ụwa, ọ bụ 'nkwado bụ isi' na ụmụaka ga-enweta agụmakwụkwọ, n'ikwekọ na ọchịchọ nke ndị mụrụ ha
Nkwekọrịta Roerich na-ekwu na '[E]ducational
ụlọ ọrụ ga-ewere dị ka ndị na-anọpụ iche ma dị ka ndị dị otú ahụ na-akwanyere ùgwù ma na-echebe site n'aka ndị na-alụ ọgụ
A ga-enye otu nkwanye ùgwù na nchedo
ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ
n'oge udo yana n'agha
Iwu ruuru mmadụ nke mba ụwa na-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ, ndị nkụzi, na ndị ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ikike ibi ndụ, nnwere onwe, na nchekwa
A na-achọkwa steeti iji hụ na ndụ na mmepe nke ụmụaka ruo n'ókè o kwere mee
Ọzọkwa, onye ọ bụla nwere ikike agụmakwụkwọ

N'iburu n'uche iji nweta mmezu zuru oke nke ikike a, steeti ga-eme ka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị bụrụ iwu ma dịrị mmadụ niile n'efu; agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị dị n'ozuzu ya ma nwee ike ịnweta mmadụ niile; na agụmakwụkwọ ka elu n'otu aka ahụ maka mmadụ niile dabere na ikike
N'okpuru Convention on the Rights of the Child, a chọrọ ka steeti mee ihe iji gbaa ụmụaka ume ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe niile na ibelata ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụaka na-ahapụ akwụkwọ

N'ịkọwa ikike agụmakwụkwọ nke ọgbụgba ndụ mba ụwa maka ikike akụ na ụba, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọdịbendị, Kọmitii otu UN na-ahụ maka ikike akụ na ụba, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọdịbendị ekwuola na 'E nwere echiche siri ike nke enweghị ikike nke ihe ọ bụla na-alaghachi azụ e mere n'ihe gbasara ikike agụmakwụkwọ

Ọ bụrụ na e mee ihe ọ bụla a kpachaara anya na-alaghachi azụ, ndị otu Steeti nwere ibu ọrụ nke igosi na e webatara ha mgbe ha tụlechara nlezianya nke ọma ihe ndị ọzọ niile nakwa na ha ziri ezi site n'izo aka na ikike niile e nyere na ọgbụgba ndụ ahụ na n'ọnọdụ nke iji ihe onwunwe kachasị dị na ya mee ihe n'ụzọ zuru oke

Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ikike nke nwatakịrị, otu ndị ọkachamara nọọrọ onwe ha na-enyocha njigide mba na nkwekọrịta maka ikike nke nwatakịrị, azaghachila ihe akaebe nke iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe site n'ịkpọ oku ka a kwụsị ya, nyocha na ikpe na-adịghị ele mmadụ anya n'ihu nke ndị na-ahụ maka ya,; maka mmebi ọ bụla e weghachiri ngwa ngwa na n'ụzọ zuru ezu
na maka mmachibido iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe n'iwu obodo

Kọmitii na-ahụ maka iwepụ ịkpa ókè megide ụmụ nwanyị, otu ndị ọkachamara nọọrọ onwe ha na-enyocha mba na-agbaso nkwekọrịta mba ụwa maka ikpochapụ ụdị ịkpa ókè niile megide ụmụnwanyị, akpọwokwa oku ka ndị ọrụ nchekwa machibido ụlọ akwụkwọ na mpaghara ndị agha metụtara, na nzaghachi maka ihe akaebe nke iyi egwu mmekọahụ nke ụmụ agbọghọ na ịhapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ihi ọnụnọ nke ndị ọrụ nchekwa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na maka mmachibido iji ụlọ akwụkwọ eme ihe agha na iwu ụlọ
Mba ụfọdụ anabatala iwu machibidoro ma ọ bụ gbochie iji ụlọ akwụkwọ na / ma ọ bụ mahadum eme ihe
Ụfọdụ ndị agha mba na ndị agha na-abụghị nke steeti amachibidoro ma ọ bụ chịkwaa omume ahụ, site na akwụkwọ ntuziaka ndị agha ma ọ bụ iwu n'ozuzu
Ka ọ dịgodị, ụlọ ikpe obodo akpọkuola ndị agha mba ka ha hapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ

Iwu agụmakwụkwọ ka elu nke Argentina (1995) 'Ndị agha ọha na eze enweghị ike ịbanye na mahadum mba ahụ n'enweghị iwu edere site n'aka ụlọ ikpe ruru eru ma ọ bụ arịrịọ sitere n'aka ndị isi mahadum iwu kwadoro'
Central African Republic's Child Protection Code (2020) 'A machibidoro ọrụ ọ bụla
nke ụlọ akwụkwọ
iwu
A na-ata onye ọ bụla
nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
ahụhụ site na ịtụ mkpọrọ afọ iri (10) ruo afọ iri abụọ (20) na / ma ọ bụ ụgwọ nke 5,000,000 ruo 20,000,000 francs
Iwu agụmakwụkwọ ka elu nke Ecuador (2010) 'Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke mahadum na polytechnics enweghị ike imebi
Mgbe nchebe nke ndị agha ọha na eze dị mkpa, onye nnọchi anya iwu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-arịọ enyemaka dị mkpa
A ga-akwado ndị na-emebi ogige ndị a dịka iwu si dị
India's Requisitioning and Acquisition of Immovable Property Act (1952) '[N]o property or part thereof
exclusively used
as a school,
or for the purpose of accommodation of persons connected with the management of
such school,
shall be requisitioned'
Iwu Nchebe nke Ireland (1954) 'Ọ dịghị ihe dị na ngalaba a [na mmegharị ndị agha] ga-enye ikike
ịbanye ma ọ bụ ntinye aka na (ma e wezụga ruo n'ókè nke iji okporo ụzọ ọ bụla) ụlọ akwụkwọ
ọ bụla
[ma ọ bụ] ala jikọtara na ụlọ akwụkwọ
ọ bụla
Iwu Philippines nke na-enye ihe mgbochi siri ike na nchebe pụrụ iche megide mmegbu ụmụaka, mmegbu, na ịkpa ókè (1992) 'A gaghị eji akụrụngwa ọha na eze dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ
mee ihe maka ebumnuche ndị agha dị ka ebe ndị isi, ogige ndị agha, ndị otu, na ebe nchekwa ihe
Philippines, Special Protection of Children in Situations of Armed Conflict Act (2019) 'Onye ọ bụla a mara ikpe maka ime [ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ọgba aghara nke ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ]

ga-ata ahụhụ nke ịtụ mkpọrọ nke na-erughị afọ iri na anọ (14) ma ọ bụghị ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ (20) na ụgwọ nke na-erughị otu nde pesos (P 1,000,00000) ma ọ bụghị ihe karịrị nde pesos abụọ pesos (P2,000,00000)
Mba Poland's Armed Forces of Poland Accommodation Act (1995) 'Ụdị ezigbo ihe onwunwe ndị a adịghị n'okpuru nkwụsịtụ nwa oge
ezigbo ihe onwunwe nke ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ka elu

Colombia, General Commander of the Military Forces order of 6 July 2010 'N'ịtụle ụkpụrụ iwu mba ụwa, a na-ewere ya dị ka mmebi doro anya nke Ụkpụrụ nke Ọdịiche na Ụkpụrụ nke ịkpachara anya na mwakpo, ya mere nnukwu mmejọ, eziokwu ahụ bụ na onye ọchịagha na-anọ ma ọ bụ na-enye ndị agha ya ohere ka ndị agha ya weghara ya, nke
ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze dị ka ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ
Mba New Zealand, Manual of Armed Forces Law, 2019 '[New Zealand Defence Forces] ndị ọchịagha ga-eme ihe niile dị irè iji chebe ikike ụmụaka agụmakwụkwọ
Ojiji na ọrụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ndị ọzọ doro anya na-egbochi iji ikike a eme ihe, a ga-ezere ya ebe ọ bụla o kwere mee

Ebe, n'ihi ihe ndị agha, ọ dị mkpa ka ndị agha jiri ụlọ ọrụ dị otú ahụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ maka ịnabata ndị ọrụ, ịchekwa ihe onwunwe ma ọ bụ dịka akụkụ nke ọnọdụ nchebe, a ghaghị ime ihe niile nwere ike ime, na mkparịta ụka ya na ndị ọchịchị obodo, iji hụ na a na-ebelata ọgba aghara na agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka dịka o kwere mee
Nke a nwere ike ịgụnye ịchọpụta ma mee ka ojiji nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ kwesịrị ekwesị maka ebumnuche ndị dị otú ahụ
Ndị otu NZDF agaghị eji ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ maka ebumnuche agha ọ gwụla ma ọ dị mkpa
Philippines, Armed Forces of the Philippines Letter Directive No
34, 24 Nọvemba 2009 'Iji mezuo ebumnuche a, ndị ọrụ niile [Ndị agha nke Philippines] ga-agbaso ma na-akwanyere ihe ndị a ùgwù
A gaghị eji akụrụngwa ndị dị mkpa dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ
mee ihe maka ebumnuche ndị agha dị ka ebe ndị isi, ogige ndị agha, ndị otu, na ebe nchekwa ihe nkesa

South Sudan, Order from Deputy Chief of General Staff for Moral Orientation, 16 Eprel n'afọ 2012 'Ọrụ a nke ọrụ [nke ụlọ akwụkwọ site n'aka ndị agha anyị] bụ ihe jọgburu onwe ya ma ọ bụ [na] imebi iwu ala anyị
E wezụga nke ahụ, ị na-anapụ ụmụ anyị agụmakwụkwọ dị mkpa
Ana m enye gị iwu ka ị gbapụ ngwa ngwa
ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị agha nọ n'okpuru iwu gị kpọmkwem
Ịghara ịpụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu ga-eduga n'omume ịdọ aka ná ntị siri ike na omume ahụ bụ mmebi iwu nke ala anyị nke ga-enwe mmetụta dị mwute
United Kingdom Joint Service Manual of the Law of Armed Conflict (2004) '[T] echiche ka mma bụ na iwu ahụ machibidoro
iji ihe onwunwe ọdịbendị maka ebumnuche nke nwere ike ikpughe ya na mbibi ma ọ bụ mmebi na agha agha, ọ gwụla ma ọ nweghị ihe ọzọ ga-ekwe omume iji mee ihe dị otú ahụ
Ihe onwunwe ọdịbendị gụnyere
ụlọ ọrụ raara onwe ha nye
Ụlọ Akwụkwọ
agụmakwụkwọ
Akwụkwọ mba United States Field Manual 27-10 (1956) 'United States na ụfọdụ n'ime American Republics bụ ndị so na nkwekọrịta a na-akpọ [Roerich], nke na-enye ọnọdụ na-anọpụ iche ma na-echebe
ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ
ma ọ bụrụ na agha dị n'etiti mba ndị dị otú ahụ
Ụlọ ikpe iwu nke mba Colombia, Yenys Osuna Montes v

Mayor of Zambrano Municipality '[T] onye isi obodo kwesịrị igbochi ndị otu ndị ọrụ nchekwa Steeti ịbanye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iji mee omume, ọzụzụ ma ọ bụ iji bulie ngwá agha, mgbọ ma ọ bụ tinye ndị ọrụ agha, n'ihi na nke a ga-eme ka ihe ize ndụ dị n'obodo ụmụakwụkwọ
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke India, Mmegbu nke Ụmụaka na Orphanages na Steeti Tamil Nadu v
Union of India na ndị ọzọ '[I]t kwesịrị ijide n'aka na ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ nkwari akụ anaghị ekwe ka ndị agha ma ọ bụ ndị ọrụ nchekwa nọrọ n'ọdịnihu maka nzube ọ bụla
Iwu enyemaka mba ụwa na-ejikọta ndị agha na-abụghị nke steeti na-alụ ọgụ
Iji chịkwaa omume nke ndị agha ha, ọtụtụ ndị otu dị otú ahụ na-enye iwu, ntụziaka, ụkpụrụ, iwu, ma ọ bụ kwupụta ebumnuche ha ịgbaso ụkpụrụ ụfọdụ
The Free Syrian Army, Syria '[O]ccupation [nke ụlọ akwụkwọ] site n'aka ndị agha na-anọchite anya mmebi iwu nke obodo na nke mba ụwa
[T] ndị agha mba Siria nweere onwe ha taa na-ekwu ọnọdụ ya na-amachibido agha nke ụlọ akwụkwọ na
ma ga-agbanwe Nkwupụta Ụkpụrụ ya iji gosipụta otu ihe ahụ
A ga-ekesa nkwupụta a n'etiti ndị agha anyị niile ma duzie omume nke ndị otu anyị
A ga-aza onye ọ bụla a hụrụ na ọ na-emebi ụkpụrụ ndị edepụtara na nkwupụta anyị ajụjụ, dịka iwu mba ụwa si dị
National Coalition of Syrian Revolution and Opposition Forces, Syria 'Anyị na-akwado ọrụ anyị ịsọpụrụ Iwu Mba Nile nke Ndị Mmadụ n'oge niile gụnyere
ibu ọrụ
[ịkwanyere ma chebe ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọgwụ, ma zere iji ha na-akwado mgbalị ndị agha, gụnyere site na ịchọta ebumnuche ndị agha n'ime ma ọ bụ na nso ha
' - National Coalition of Syrian Revolution and Opposition Forces, Declaration of Commitment on Compliance with IHL and the Facilitation of Humanitarian Assistance, 2014

Ndị ọrụ iri na atọ na-abụghị ndị steeti bịanyere aka na 'Deed of Commitment for the Protection of Children from the Effects of Armed Conflict' nke nzukọ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị Geneva Call mepụtara, nke gụnyere ndokwa 'Anyị ga
zere iji ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ogige ụmụaka na-ejikarị eme ihe maka ebumnuche ndị agha

Ka ọ na-erule Machị 23, 2015, ndị otu na-esonụ bịanyere aka na ngwá ọrụ a Chin National Front / Army (CNF / CNA) [Burma / Myanmar]; Karen National Union / Karen National Liberation Army (KNU / KNLA) [Burman / Myanmar]; Karenni National Progressive Party / Karenni Army (KNPP / KA) [Burma / Myanmar] ; New Mon State Party / Mon National Liberation Army (NMSP / MNLA) [Burma / Myanmar]; Pa'O National Liberation Organization / Pa-o National Liberation Army (PNLO / PNLA) [Burma / Myanmar]; National Socialist Council of Nagaland (Khole-Kitovi) (NSCN-KK) [India]; Democratic Party of Iranian Kurdistan (PDKI) [Iran]; Komala Party of Iranian Kurdistan (KPIK) [Iran], Komala Party of Kurdistan (KPK) [Iran], Komalah-The Kurdistan Organization of the Communist Party

Site n'ụbọchị 26–28 nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2012, ndị ọkachamara si gburugburu ụwa zutere na mba Lucens Castle na steeti Lucens, nke Switzerland, iji kwurịta ịmepụta ụkpụrụ nduzi mba ụwa iji chebe ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum nke ọma site na iji ndị agha
A maara akwụkwọ a dị ka Draft Lucens Guidelines for Protecting Schools and Universities from Military Use during Armed Conflict

Onye dere Draft Lucens Guidelines bụ Prọfesọ Steven Haines, Onye isi oche nke Iwu Mba Nile na Mahadum Greenwich nakwa nke London onye jere ozi ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ dị ka onye ọrụ na ndị agha Britain
N'ime usoro nhazi ahụ, ihe karịrị steeti iri atọ (30) na òtù mba ụwa kwuru okwu n'ihu ọha iji kwado atụmatụ ahụ
N'ọnwa Juun nke afọ 2014, Norway kwupụtara na ọ ga-eduga usoro iji mezue Nduzi ma kwalite nkwado na mmejuputa ha
E kpughere ntuziaka ikpeazụ maka ichebe ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum site na iji ndị agha eme ihe n'oge agha agha n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2014 na mba Geneva na nzukọ nke Norway na Argentina haziri
Nduzi ndị ahụ na-agba ndị agha ume ka ha ghara iji ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum maka nzube ọ bụla iji kwado mbọ agha ha

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ekweta na ụfọdụ ojiji agaghị emegide iwu nke agha agha, Nduzi ahụ na-akọwapụta ihe ndị a kapịrị ọnụ dị ka nduzi maka omume kwesịrị ekwesị maka ndị niile na-alụ ọgụ iji zere imetụta nchekwa na agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ akwụkwọ
E mepụtara Nkwupụta Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Nchebe site na mkparịta ụka nke Norway na Argentina duziri n'ime ọkara mbụ nke afọ 2015
Nkwupụta ahụ na-enye Steeti ohere igosipụta nkwado ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị sara mbara maka nchebe na ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ na agha agha, na maka mmejuputa Nduzi
E mepere Nkwupụta Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Nchebe maka nkwado na ogbako mba ụwa na Oslo na Mee 29, 2015

N'ime akụkọ ya kwa afọ 2014 nye otu UN Human Rights Council, Leila Zerrougui, onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu maka ụmụaka na agha agha, nabatara ntọhapụ nke Nduzi maka ichebe ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum site na iji ndị agha eme ihe n'oge agha ma gbaa mba ndị otu ume ịnakwere ha
Milka Chepkorir (amụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye na-amụ banyere ụmụ mmadụ, ihu igwe na ikike mmadụ
A makwaara ọrụ ya mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Sengwer People ndị bi gburugburu Embobut na Kapolet Forest iji chebe ikike ha mgbe Kenya Forest Service (KFS) chụpụrụ ha n'ike
Chepkorir bụ nke ndị Sengwer si n'ọhịa Kapolet
Ọ bi na Kitale, Kenya
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Anthropology na Mahadum Maseno Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ na-aga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya site n'ịga Masters na Gender and Development Studies na Mahadum Nairobi n'okpuru onyinye JHW
Mgbalị ya malitere mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
N'agbanyeghị nkea makwaara ọrụ ya mgbe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị otu UN Human Rights Office Indigenous Fellowship Programme na 2016

Site na mkpakọrịta a, ọ gara 16th United Nation Permanent Forum on Indigenous Issues na New York ma kọọ enweghị mmejuputa ikike ụmụ amaala site na UN site na ịnọchite anya Forest Peoples Programme, Natural Justice na òtù 20 ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-ekwukwa mmebi iwu nke KFS ebe ha gbara ụlọ ịrị itoolu nke ndị Sengwer ọkụ nke malitere mgbe European Union na ụlọ akụ ụwa na-akwado ha
Ọ laghachiri na 17th United Nation Permanent Forum on Indigenous Issues na 2018 wee kọọ mmeso ọjọọ nke ụlọọrụ Kenya Forest Service site n'ịchụpụ ndị Sengwer n'ala nna nna ha
Ndị Sengwer na-eche nchụpụ nke sitere na Water Towers Protection na Climate Change Mitigation and Adaptation Programme nke European Union kwadoro
Ọ bụ KFS na nkwupụta Chepkorir mere nchụpụ a
'Ha kpọọrọ nwa nwoke dị afọ isii wee soro ya gbaa ụlọ ọkụ mgbe nne ya gbapụrụ
Ha hapụrụ naanị ya n'ime ọhịa n'abalị'
N'ịgbaso akụkọ a, EU kwụsịrị ọrụ ahụ
Ugbu a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi nke Community Land Action NOW! (CLAN), onye nhazi maka nchekwa mpaghara ndụ na onye ndụmọdụ maka ego Agroecology

A mille-feuille (French pronunciation [mil fœj], 'thousand-sheets'), nke a makwaara site na aha Napoleon, vanilla slice, na custard slice, bụ ihe oriri e ji achịcha puff mee nke e ji mmiri ara ehi kpuchie
Ọdịdị ya nke oge a nwere mmetụta site na mmelite nke Marie-Antoine Carême mere
Dị ka omenala si dị, a na-eji okpukpu atọ nke achịcha puff (pâte feuilletée), na-agbanwe agbanwe na okpukpu abụọ nke mmiri ara ehi (crème pâtissière)
A na-emecha okpokoro achịcha dị n'elu n'ụzọ dị iche iche mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-etinye ya na mmiri ara ehi, ma ọ bụ enwere ike iji shuga ice, koko, ihe nkedo, ma ọ bụrụ almond a pịrị apị mee ya

A pụkwara iji ice ma ọ bụ fondant naanị ya mee ka ọ dị ọcha, ma ọ bụ na-agbanwe agbanwe na-acha ọcha (icing) na-acha nchara nchara (chocolate) ma ọ bụ akara ndị ọzọ na-acha uhie uhie, ma na-agbanye iji mepụta mmetụta marble
Ihe niile dị na ntụziaka ahụ dị n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nri kemgbe ọ dịkarịa ala narị afọ nke iri na isii, mana a maghị kpọmkwem mmalite nke mille-feuille
Dị ka Oxford Companion to Sugar and Sweets si kwuo, usoro nri mille-feuille sitere na narị afọ nke iri na asaa nke French na narị afọ iri na asatọ nke English bụ ihe na-ebute ụzọ na-ekpuchi achịcha
Nkwupụta mbụ nke aha 'mille-feuille' n'onwe ya pụtara na 1733 n'akwụkwọ nri asụsụ Bekee nke onye isi nri French Vincent La Chapelle dere
A na-enye mille-feuille nke narị afọ nke iri na asatọ na jam na marmalade kama imeju
N'asụsụ French, aha mbụ nke mille-feuille pụtara obere oge ka e mesịrị, na 1749, n'akwụkwọ nri nke Menon

Iji mee achịcha mille-feuille, ị na-aṅụ achịcha puff, jiri ya mee achịcha ise hà nhata, & nke ịdị arọ nke mkpụrụ ego abụọ, na nke ikpeazụ ị ga-eme oghere n'etiti n'ụdị obe Knight, gbasara ogo ị ga-adabere na efere ị ga-eji mee ihe maka ọrụ, sie ha n'ọkụ

Mgbe a na-eme ha ma na-eme ka ha jụọ oyi, tinye ha n'otu n'otu, nke nwere oghere n'elu, & jams n'etiti achịcha ọ bụla, [okwu a na-edochaghị anya, ma eleghị anya na-ezo aka na ikpuchi akụkụ niile na jam] & ice ha n'ebe niile na ice ọcha ka ha wee yie ka ha bụ otu iberibe; ị nwere ike iji jelly currant na-acha ọbara ọbara, akpụkpọ lemon na pistachio, na-enye ha n'elu efere
A naghị eji okwu 'mille-feuille' mee ihe ọzọ n'akwụkwọ ntụziaka nke narị afọ nke iri na asatọ
Otú ọ dị, n'okpuru ọchịchị Napoleon Bonaparte, ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ahịa achịcha kachasị mma na Paris yiri ka ha rere achịcha ahụ
N'ime narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ntụziaka niile na-akọwa achịcha ahụ dị ka nke jupụtara na jam, ma e wezụga ntụziaka 1876 nke Urbain Dubois, ebe a na-enye ya na mmiri ara ehi Bavaria
Dị ka Alan Davidson si kwuo na Oxford Companion to Food, a na-ekwukarị na Szeged, Hungary, mepụtara ụdị ahụ (ma ọ bụghị nke achịcha n'onwe ya), ebe a na-akpọ 'Szegediner Torte'
Dị ka omenala si dị, a na-eji okpukpu atọ nke achịcha puff, na okpukpu abụọ nke crème pâtissière
A na-ekpuchi elu ya na shuga ntụ ntụ
Na ọdịiche ndị ọzọ, a na-eji icing na-egbuke egbuke n'elu ya, na-agbanwe agbanwe na-acha ọcha (icing) na-acha nchara nchara (chocolate), wee kpochapụ ya
Taa, e nwekwara mille-feuille na-atọ ụtọ, na cheese na spinach ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ na-atọ ọchị
[citation needed]
Dị ka La Varenne si kwuo, a na-akpọbu ya gâteau de mille-feuilles ('achịcha nke otu puku akwụkwọ'), na-ezo aka n'ọtụtụ akwa achịcha
N'iji achịcha ọdịnala, nke e ji okpukpu isii nke okpukpu atọ mee, ọ nwere okpukpu 729; na ụfọdụ usoro nri nke oge a ọ nwere ike ịnwe ihe ruru 2,048
Na France, a na-eji okpukpu abụọ jikọtara ọnụ nke pâte feuilletée jupụtara na frangipane eme achịcha a na-akpọ Napoleon
N'Australia, ụdị nke mille-feuille bụ custard slice, nke a makwaara dị ka vanilla slice; n'ikwu okwu, a na-akpọ ya mgbe ụfọdụ 'snot block' ma ọ bụ 'pus pie'
A na-eme ya site na iji crème pâtissière, na n'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, passionfruit icing
'French Vanilla slice' na-ezo aka na ngwaahịa yiri nke ahụ na-enweghị fondant icing
Na New Zealand, a maara ya n'ụzọ dị iche iche dị ka 'custard slice', 'custart square', 'vanilla slice', ma ọ bụ, na passion-fruit icing, 'passion-fruit slice'
A na-akpọ ụdị dị otú ahụ krempita na Serbia na Bosnia na Herzegovina, kremna rezina ma ọ bụ kremšnita na Slovenia na Croatia, na krémeš na Slovakia
Na Belgium na Netherlands, tompouce ma ọ bụ tompoes bụ ihe yiri ya

E nwere ọtụtụ ọdịiche dị na Belgium, mana na Netherlands ọ nwetala ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọnọdụ ihe ngosi, na obere ọdịiche a na-ahụ na ọdịdị, nha, ihe ndị mejupụtara na agba (na-abụkarị okpukpu abụọ nke achịcha, ihe fọrọ nke ọma mgbe niile na-acha pinki, mana oroma gburugburu ememme mba)
A na-akpọ onye na-ese ihe nkiri Tom Puss nke Marten Toonder aha ya site na tompouce
Na mba Canada, a na-akpọkarị mille-feuille gâteaux Napoléon, ma ọ bụ 'Napoleon slice' na Bekee Canada
A na-ere ya ma ọ bụ na custard, cream, ma ọ bụ ha abụọ, n'etiti okpukpu atọ nke achịcha puff; almond paste bụ ihe a na-ejikarị eme ihe
Ụzọ French Canadian nke ime mille-feuille na-ahụ ya na-eji graham crackers mee ya kama ọ bụ puff pastry, na pudding dochie anya custard layer
N'akụkụ na-asụ German nke Switzerland nakwa na Austria, a na-akpọ ya Cremeschnitte
N'Izrel, a maara ya site na ọdịiche nke aha ahụ, kremshnit (קרמשניט)
Na Gris, a na-akpọ achịcha ahụ Fangφέιγ, ntụgharị nke okwu 'mille-feuille' site na iji mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Grik
Ihe a na-etinye n'etiti okpokoro ndị ahụ bụ mmiri ara ehi [nkọwa dị mkpa] ebe a na-eji mmiri ara ehi Chantilly eme n'elu achịcha
[citation needed]
Na Hong Kong, a na-etinye buttercream, meringue na walnuts na-ekpuchi (naa4 po3 leon4, 'Napoleon')

Na Mainland China, ngwaahịa yiri nke a na-erekwa dị ka (拿破ī; Nápòlún, ma ọ bụ karịa, 法式千層ī) dịgasị iche n'etiti mpaghara na ụlọ ọrụ na-eme achịcha n'otu n'otu, mana ọ na-enwekarị elu na ala nke achịcha puff siri ike, nke a na'iji akwụkwọ nri mee ka ọ dị mkpirikpi kama bọta, na achịcha sponge na ihe eji emeju bọta
Na Hungary, a na-akpọ ya krémes
Otu nsụgharị, francia krémes (French Napoleon), na-eji mmiri ara ehi na caramel kpuchie ya
N'Ịtali, a maara mille-feuille dị ka mille foglie, ma nwee ihe yiri ya
Ụdị Italian na-atọ ụtọ na-agụnye achịcha na-atọ ọchị nke jupụtara na spinach, cheese ma ọ bụ pesto, n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ

Ihe ọzọ dị mkpa dị iche iche nke ụdị Italian bụ na ọ na-enwekarị akwa nke achịcha puff na akwa nke sponge cake (dịka site na ala ruo n'elu, achịcha puf, sponge cake strawberries na cream na mgbe ahụ achịcha puft)

Mimi Chakib ma ọ bụ Mimi Shakib (25 Disemba 1913 20 Mee 1983) a mụrụ Ameena Chakib, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-arụkarị ọrụ nke abụọ, ma pụta na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri otu narị na iri ise n'etiti afọ 1940 na mmalite afọ 1980
Ọ banyere na ihe nkiri na 1934 wee pụta na ihe nkiri dịka Nahw El-Magd na 1949

Mimi Cherono Ng'ok (a mụrụ n'afọ 1983) bụ onye Kenya na-ese foto, bi na Nairobi
'Foto ya bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ pụtara ihe nke ahụmịhe na mmetụta uche na-apụta site na ndụ ya n'ime njem '
E gosipụtara ọrụ Ng'ok na Hayward Gallery, Berlin Biennale, Carnegie International na African Photography Encounters, ma emere ya na Walther Collection
Ng'ok tolitere n'ime ime obodo dị na Nairobi, Kenya
N'afọ 2006, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BFA na Michaelis School of Fine Art na Mahadum Cape Town na South Africa
Usoro ya nke afọ 2008 bụ I am Home, na ndị mbịarambịa Afrịka bi na South Africa, na-ekwu maka 'nsogbu nke ụlọ, mbugharị, ọnwụ, na njirimara'

Ọrụ malitere n'afọ 2013, nke emere na mba ebe o biri ma ebe ome gasịrị njem, Alexandra Genova kọwara ya na Time dị ka 'usoro ihe ngosi banyere ncheta, ọnwụ na agụụ mmekọahụ kpughere site na ahụmịhe Ng'ok'
N'iburu n'uche na Ng'ok kwenyere na ụlọ abụghị ebe, kama ọ bụ ọnọdụ uche, Genova dere na ọrụ ahụ 'na-enyocha oge a site na njikọ nke ndị mmadụ na ebe obibi'

Diane Smyth na British Journal of Photography kọwara ọrụ Ng'ok na ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Africa State of Mind dị ka inye 'nkọwa onwe onye nke ebe obibi, n'ụzọ dị iche na ebumnuche doro anya nke foto ihe nkiri'

Mgbe ọ nọ na New York, ọ zutere onye na-ese foto Anthony Barboza, onye nwere mmetụta mbụ
Ụzọ Smith si ese foto gụnyere usoro dị na igwefoto dịka ịji focus gwu egwu, usoro ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị dị ka ngosipụta okpukpu abụọ, usoro collage na eserese na mbipụta
Ọrụ ya anaghị etinye aka na akwụkwọ nke ihe omume karịa na ngosipụta nke ahụmịhe
A kọwawo ya dị ka ihe na-enweghị isi na ihe na-adịghị adị, dị ka New York Times kwuru 'Ọrụ ya, nke onwe ya na nke na-ekwupụta, sitere n'ọtụtụ ebe nka, nke kachasị surrealism

O jirila usoro dịgasị iche iche mee ihe ise foto ya site na akụkụ dị iche iche, na-agbapụ ma ọ bụ site na mmetụta ikuku dị ka alụlụ na onyinyo, na-egwuri egwu na juxtapositions pụrụ iche, ọbụna na-agbanwe ma ọ bụ na-ese ihe n'elu mbipụta
' Ọrụ mbụ Smith nwere foto ndị a gbara ngwa ngwa iji mepụta ihe nkiri dị iche iche, n'ihi usoro a ọtụtụ foto ya nwere ụbọchị abụọ
O jirila usoro nke ịpị aka mee ihe na ụfọdụ ọrụ ya, ọkachasị usoro Transcendence ya
