A na-ewere foto ndị a site na iji ụdị akwụkwọ iji see foto ndị a
Smith eseela ọtụtụ ndị isi ojii dị mkpa n'oge ọrụ ya, gụnyere Alvin Ailey na Nina Simone
N'afọ 1973, e gosipụtara Smith na mpịakọta mbụ nke Black Photographers Annual, akwụkwọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Black Arts Movement nke afọ ndị 1960s na mmalite afọ ndị 1970s
Smith nwere ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Cinandre, ụlọ ntutu isi, n'afọ 1973
Na Cinandre, ọ zutere Grace Jones, onye ọ na-ese foto na-eyi tutu ojii na ọcha mgbe ụfọdụ
Smith na-echeta na ya na Jones ga-ekwu maka ịlanarị dị ka ndị na-ese ihe ojii
Smith tụgharịrị uche na ncheta site n'ikwu, sị 'Anyị si na Jim Crow pụta
Ya mere, ịbịa New York ma gbalịa ịbụ ihe nlereanya ma ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla bụ ihe ọhụrụ
' Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị (1975), Smith ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ so na otu foto nke Harlem bụ Kamoinge, n'okpuru onye nduzi Roy DeCarava
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ Kamoinge na New York n'afọ 1963 iji kwado ọrụ nke ndị na-ese foto ojii n'ọhịa ndị ọcha na-achịkwa mgbe ahụ
Ìgwè ahụ, nke ka dị taa, emeela ọtụtụ ihe, gụnyere ihe ngosi, nkuzi, ogbako, na mbipụta nke portfolios maka nkesa na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie
Smith sonyere na Kamoinge na ihe ngosi atọ na New York na Guyana
Smith wepụrụ akwụkwọ na Museum of Modern Art (MOMA), ebe onye na-anabata ndị ọbịa weere ya dị ka onye ozi
Mgbe ọ laghachiri, a kpọgara ya n'ọfịs onye nlekọta
Susan Kismaric kpọrọ ọnụahịa maka ọrụ Smith, nke Smith jụrụ n'ihi ọnụahịa anaghị akwụ ụgwọ ya
Kismaric gwara Smith ka ọ tụgharịa uche, nke o mechara mee
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ na-ese foto nke a gụnyere na nchịkọta nke Museum of Modern Art (MOMA) na New York City
Na mgbakwunye na MOMA, e gosipụtara nka Smith na Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture na Smithsonian Anacostia Museum & Center for African American History and Culture na Washington, DC
Smith egosila ugboro abụọ na Bellvue Hospital Centre na Morristown, New Jersey, site na ngosi nka ha na Atrium
Nke mbụ bụ n'afọ 1995, maka Cultural Images Sweet Potato Pie, ihe ngosi nke Russell A
Murray haziri
N'afọ 2008, o nyere aka dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi New York City In Focus, akụkụ nke Creative Destinations 2008 Exhibition of African American Art
A gụnyere foto Smith na akwụkwọ Ntozake Shange nke afọ 2004 The Sweet Breath of Life A Poetic Narrative of the African-American Family and Life
N'afọ 2010, e tinyere ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi MOMA Pictures by Women A History of Modern Photography Ihe ngosi a weghachiri ọrụ Smith na nke Diane Arbus ma gosipụta mmasị na-arịwanye elu na ọrụ Smith
N'ịbụ nke onye nlekọta Roxana Marcoci haziri, Sarah Meister haziri ya site na Ngalaba Foto
N'afọ 2017, e mere nnukwu ihe ngosi nyocha nke ọrụ Smith na Steven Kasher Gallery na New York
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ihe osise ojii na-acha ọcha 75 nke na-anọchite anya ọrụ Smith
Mingang Doso (Məŋgáŋ Dosó) bụ asụsụ nke obodo Adamawa dị na mba Naijiria
== Edensibia
Ministri ahụike nke okwa étíti mba Russia (Russian Министерство salud Российской Федерации, na mkpirikpi Russian Минздрав России, ) bụ ozi nke Gọọmentị Russia na-ahụ maka nlekọta ahụike na ahụike ọha
Ministri ahụike na-ahụ maka iwu na iwu nke ahụike na Russia, gụnyere ọgwụ, usoro nlekọta ahụike ọha na eze, mkpuchi ahụike, mmezigharị ahụike, ịdị ọcha, mgbochi ọrịa, na mgbasa nke ọgwụ
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Tverskoy District, Moscow

E guzobere Ministrị ahụike na 2012 site na Ministrị Ahụike na Mmepe Ọha nke e kewara ụzọ abụọ n'okpuru Praịm Minista Dmitry Medvedev, na ngalaba nchekwa ọha na eze na-emepụta Ministrị Ọrụ na Mmekọrịta Ọha
Ọrụ amaara na ndị isi ga eme bu ndia
ọrịa shuga, ụkwara nta, nkwalite ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ ahụike, mgbochi ọrịa wdg
Minna bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Minna bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Niger (Niger State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 335,000 (2015; e mere atụmatụ ịbụ)
Minnaar nwere ike izo aka na ihe ndia
Minnesota bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Minnette Vári (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma màkà ntinye vidiyo ya
A mụrụ ya na Pretoria, Vári gụrụ nka márá mmá na Mahadum Pretoria ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta ya
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg
Vári egosila ọrụ ya kemgbe mmalite afọ iri itoolu, na-ekere òkè na ihe ngosi dị ka Johannesburg Biennale nke Abụọ (1997), Venice Biennale (2001 na 2007), na 10th Biennale of Havana (2009)

Ihe ngosi ya n'onwe ya gụnyere ihe ngosi nke onwe ya na Art Museum Lucerne, Switzerland (2004), Vigil na Elga Wimmer Gallery, New York (2007), Chimera na Basel Art Unlimited (2003) na nsó nsó a, Songs of Excavation na Goodman Gallery na Johannesburg (2013)
Kemgbe afọ 1998 Vári na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dijitalụ na nnukwu ihe ngosi vidiyo, na-agụnyekarị ihe arụmọrụ site na itinye ahụ nke ya n'ime mgbasa ozi na akụkọ ihe méré eme
Na mgbakwunye, Vári na-emepụta usoro ihe osise na ihe osise ndị jikọtara ya na ọrụ vidiyo ya
A na-ejikọta ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi na nzukọ na-enyocha isiokwu nke njirimara na ahụ, mgbanwe, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akụkọ ifo, trauma na akụkọ ihe méré eme
A tụlere ọrụ ya n'akwụkwọ ndị dị ka Art cities of the future, South African Art Now n'afọ iri Artists otu narị, Art in a Democratic South Africa
Minenhle Dlamini (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1990), nke a maara dị ka Minnie Dlamini, bụ onye South Afrika na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nlereanya
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ngosi ọhụrụ maka SABC 1 Friday live-music show Live Amp
A mụrụ ya na Jabulani na Queen Dlamini na Durban, KwaZulu-Natal Province nke South Afrika
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Northlands Girls 'High School tupu ọ gaa Mahadum nke Cape Town ebe ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri, mgbasa ozi, ihe nkiri na akụ na ụba

Na 8 Julaị na afo 2017, ọ lụrụ Quinton Jones n'alụmdi na nwunye ọdịnala nke weere ọnọdụ na Glenn Hills, Durban North; tupu mgbe ahụ, ha gara n'ihu ime agbamakwụkwọ ọcha na 16 Septemba na ikike mkpuchi pụrụ iche rere Multichoice maka R6-million
Na 13 afo Ọktọba, site na Vuzu Amp na DStv, ọ malitere ihe omume mbụ nke Minnie Dlamini Becoming Mrs Jones, usoro ihe nkiri atọ nke na-edekọ njem ya tupu agbamakwụkwọ na mgbe agbamakwụkwọ gasịrị
Na 19 afo Ọktoba, VuzuTV kwupụtara site na Twitter, na ihe omume mbụ nke Minnie Dlamini Becoming Mrs Jones ghọrọ ihe ngosi kachasị elu na akụkọ ihe mere eme Vuzu Amp
Ná mmalite afọ 2022, a kọrọ na Minenhle na Quinton gbara akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm mgbe afọ anọ nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị mgbe ekwuru na ya na onye ọchụnta ego Edwin Sodi ghọgburu

Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town, Dlamini bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi maka LIVE na 16 June na afo 2010, mgbe ọ pụtara na ihuenyo mbụ ya mgbe ọ na-ekpuchi 'Youth Day' na 'World Cup celebrations' shows'
O mechara kwado Mzansi Insider, ihe ngosi ndụ nke SABC 1
N'afọ 2012, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na ihe ngosi ahụ iji nweta ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2013, Minnie gbanwere na mgbasa ozi egwuregwu site n'iso Thomas Mlambo na-akwado Soccerzone, ruo n'afọ 2016 mgbe SABC 1 gbanwere usoro ihe ngosi ahụ
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ mmemme onyinye obodo na mba ụwa, gụnyere 14th Metro FM Music Awards, 2016 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards, PSL Awards na South African Film and Television Awards
N'afọ 2010, Dlamini bidoro dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Generations, ihe nkiri SABC 1 TV nke ọ pụtara dị ka Miranda
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Zintle Lebone na ncha The Wild na dị ka Nosipho Bogatsu na Rockville
Na Septemba afo 2011, a mara ọkwa Dlamini dị ka ihu ọhụrụ nke ụlọ ahịa LEGit nke South Afrika, ya na ụdị ejiji ya, Minnie-Series
N'afọ 2014, Dlamini hiwere Minnie Dlamini Foundation, otu nzukọ ọrụ ebere nke e guzobere iji nyere ụmụ agbọghọ South Africa aka inweta ezigbo agụmakwụkwọ
Na 15 Julaị afo 2015, ọ kwupụtara site na Twitter na ntọala ya ga-akwado ụmụ akwụkwọ 29 na ụgwọ mahadum ha
Minnie Sue Coleman (Ọktoba 11, 1926 na Jenụwarị 3, 2012) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme akwa akwa Gee's Bend, ya na nné ya, Minder Coleman
N'afọ 2006, ihe nríte 'Pig in a Pen' ya pụtara na stampụ ọrụ US Postal dị ka akụkụ nke usoro na-echeta ihe ndị na-eme ka Gee nwee nkwonkwo
Otu nta, site na nkọwa mbụ ya, na-ezo aka na otu ndị omume, agbụrụ, okpukperechi, agbụrụ, ma ọ bụ njirimara ndị ọzọ dị ole na ole karịa otu ndị bụ isi nke nhazi ndị ahụ
Agbanyeghị, na sociology nke oge a, otu pere mpe na- ezo aka n'ụdị ndị mmadụ na-enwe nhụsianya dịtụ ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị otu na-achị ọha

Ndị otu pere mpe na-adaberekarị na ndịiche dị na njirimara ma ọ bụ omume a na-ahụ anya, dị ka agbụrụ (obere agbụrụ), agbụrụ (obere agbụrụ), okpukpere chi ( obere okpukpe ), usoro mmekọahụ ( ntakịrị mmekọahụ ), ma ọ bụ nkwarụ
N'iji usoro nke intersectionality, ọ dị mkpa ịghọta na mmadụ nwere ike ijide otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu dị iche iche (dịka ma agbụrụ na okpukpe nta)
N'otu aka mmadụ n'otu n'otu nwekwara ike ịbụ akụkụ nke otu pere mpe n'ihe gbasara njirimara ụfọdụ, mana akụkụ nke otu na-achị achị n'ihe gbasara ndị ọzọ
Okwu 'ntakịrị otu' na-emekarị n'ime okwu nke ikike obodo na ikike mkpokọta, dị ka ndị òtù nke nta dị iche iche na-enwekarị ọgwụgwọ dị iche iche na mba na obodo ha bi
Ndị otu pere mpe na-enwekarị ịkpa oke n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ndụ ọha, gụnyere ụlọ, ọrụ, ahụike, na agụmakwụkwọ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu nwere ike ịkpa oke, ọ nwekwara ike ime site na ahaghị nhata n'usoro, nke ikike na ohere na-enweghị ike ịnweta mmadụ niile
A na-ejikarị asụsụ nke ikike pere mpe kparịta iwu ndị e mere iji kpuchido ndị pere mpe pụọ na ịkpa oke ma nye ha ohere nha anya n'ọha obodo n'otu ndị na-achị

Louis Wirth kọwara otu nta dị ka 'otu ndị, n'ihi ọdịdị anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ omenala ha, bụ ndị a na-akpọpụta na ndị ọzọ nọ n'ime obodo ha na-ebi maka mmeso dị iche na nke na-enweghị aha, ya mere na-ewere onwe ha dị ka ihe nke mkpokọta
ịkpa ókè'

Nkọwa a gụnyere ma ebumnobi na njirisi nke onwe otu n'ime otu pere mpe bụ nke ọha mmadụ kwadoro nke ọma, dabere na njirimara anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ omume mmadụ; A na-ejikwa ya n'ụzọ doro anya ndị òtù ya, ndị nwere ike iji ọnọdụ ha mee ihe ndabere nke njirimara otu ma ọ bụ ịdị n'otu
Yabụ, ọkwa otu pere mpe bụ categorical onye gosipụtara njirimara anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ omume nke otu pere mpe ka enyere ọkwa nke otu ahụ ma bụrụkwa otu ọgwụgwọ ahụ dịka ndị otu ahụ ndị ọzọ nọ

Joe Feagin, na-ekwu na otu obere ìgwè nwere àgwà ise (1) na-ata ahụhụ ịkpa ókè na nrubeisi, (2) àgwà anụ ahụ na / ma ọ bụ omenala nke na-ekewa ha, na nke ndị na-achị achị anabataghị, (3) echiche nkekọrịta
njirimara mkpokọta na ibu ọnụ, (4) iwu mmekọrịta ọha na eze gbasara onye bụ na onye na-anaghị ekpebi ọkwa pere mpe, na (5) ọchịchọ ịlụ di na nwunye n'ime otu
Enwere esemokwu n'iji okwu ahụ pere mpe, dịka o nwere mkpokọta na ojiji agụmakwụkwọ
Ojiji a na-ejikarị okwu a na-egosi ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta; Otú ọ dị, ndị ọkà mmụta na-ezo aka na ike dị iche iche n'etiti otu dị iche iche karịa ndịiche na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ n'etiti otu
Nkatọ a dị n'elu dabeere n'echiche bụ na a pụrụ iwere otu ìgwè dị ka ndị dị nta ọbụna ma ọ bụrụ na ọ gụnyere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ndị mmadụ na ọ bụghị ọnụọgụgụ na ọha mmadụ

Ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze akatọwo echiche nke 'obere / ọtụtụ', na-arụ ụka na asụsụ a na-ewepu ma ọ bụ na-eleghara ọdịdị omenala na-agbanwe ma ọ bụ na-akwụghị ụgwọ, yana mmekọ omenala gafee oke mba

Dị ka ndị dị otú ahụ, a na-ejikarị okwu a na-ewepụ akụkọ ihe mere eme (HEGs) mee ihe n'otu aka ahụ iji gosipụta ọrụ mmegbu na nchịkwa nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, na otú nke a si arụpụta enweghị nnọchite nke otu dị iche iche n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke ndụ mmadụ
A na-ejikarị okwu a bụ obere mba na-akparịta ụka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba ụwa na nke mba
Mba niile nwere ogo dị iche iche nke agbụrụ, agbụrụ ma ọ bụ asụsụ
Na mgbakwunye, ndị pere mpe nwekwara ike ịbụ ndị mbata, ụmụ amaala ma ọ bụ obodo na-enweghị ala
Nke a na-ebutekarị mgbanwe dị iche iche n'asụsụ, omenala, nkwenkwe, omume, nke na-eme ka ụfọdụ dị iche na ndị isi
Dị ka a na-aghọtakarị ndịiche ndị a n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma, nke a na-ebute ọdịda nke ọha mmadụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị òtù nke nta

Enweghị nkọwa iwu gbasara ndị pere mpe na mba n'iwu mba ụwa, n'agbanyeghị na nkwupụta mba United Nations maka ikike mmadụ bụ nke mba ma ọ bụ agbụrụ, okpukperechi na asụsụ akọwapụtara nchebe nke otu pere mpe
Iwu mpụ mba ụwa nwere ike ichekwa ikike nke agbụrụ ma ọ bụ agbụrụ n'ọtụtụ ụzọ
Ikike nke ikpebiri onwe ya bụ isi okwu
Kansụl nke Europe na-ahazi ikike ndị pere mpe na European Charter maka asụsụ mpaghara ma ọ bụ nke pere mpe yana Nkwekọrịta Framework maka nchekwa nke ndị pere mpe nke mba
N'ebe ụfọdụ, agbụrụ ndị nọ n'okpuru nwere ike ịbụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu, dị ka ndị ojii na South Africa n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Na United States, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị ọcha na-abụghị ndị Hispanic bụ ihe ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ (634%) na agbụrụ na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ niile ( Mexican, African Americans, Asian America, American Indian, na Native Hawaiians ) bụ nkewa dị ka 'ndị nta'
Ọ bụrụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọcha na-abụghị ndị Hispanic dara n'okpuru 50% otu ahụ ga-abụ naanị ọtụtụ, ọ bụghị ọtụtụ

Enweghi ihe akaebe na-ezighi ezi ma mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi na-elekwasị anya n'obere agbụrụ dị irè karị n'ịgbanwe omume ahụike dịka ịkwụsị ise siga, mbelata ibu arọ, na àgwà nri ma e jiri ya tụnyere mgbasa ozi ezubere maka ọha mmadụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-ewere ndị Romani, nke a makwaara dị ka Gypsies dị ka obere agbụrụ na Europe
Ndị Romani bụ agbụrụ kacha ukwuu na Europe

Otu obere mba bụ otu ọha mmadụ n'ime steeti dị iche na ọtụtụ na / ma ọ bụ ndị na-achị achị n'ihe gbasara agbụrụ, asụsụ, omenala, ma ọ bụ okpukperechi, mana ọ na-achọkwa inwe njikọ chiri anya na mpaghara akọwapụtara nke ndị pere mpe
otu mmekọrịta si
A makwaara dị ka 'obere obere castelike', ndị pere mpe na-achọghị onwe ha bụ okwu maka ndị ebuteburu n'obodo ọ bụla megidere ọchịchọ ha
Na United States, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ gụnyere mana ọnweghị oke na ndị amaala America, ụmụ amaala Hawaii, Puerto Ricans, ndị America America, na ndị America America mụrụ
N'ihi ihe ndị dị iche n'ọdịbendị, ndị pere mpe na-achọghị onwe ha nwere ike ịnwe ihe isi ike n'ụlọ akwụkwọ karịa ndị otu obere ndị ọzọ (na-ewepụta onwe ha)
Ego ọha na eze na-enyere ụmụaka aka iso ndị ọgbọ dị iche iche na-ekerịta otu ebumnuche
Ndị kwabatara na-ewere ọnọdụ dị nta na obodo ọhụrụ ha, na-enwekarị olileanya maka ọdịnihu ka mma n'ụzọ akụ na ụba, agụmakwụkwọ, na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị karịa n'ala nna ha
N'ihi na ha na-elekwasị anya na ihe ịga nke ọma, ndị obere afọ ofufo nwere ike ime nke ọma n'ụlọ akwụkwọ karịa ndị ọzọ na-akwaga ọzọ
Ime mgbanwe n'ọdịbendị na asụsụ dị iche na-eme ka ihe isi ike na mmalite nke ndụ na mba ọhụrụ ahụ
Ndị kwabatara n'afọ ofufo anaghị enwe mmetụta nke kewara ekewa dịka ndị pere mpe na-achọghị onwe ha ma na-enwekarị ọgaranya n'isi obodo n'ihi ọchịchọ mmụta ha
Otu nnukwu ndị mbata na United States gụnyere ndị Mexico, Central na South America, ndị Cuban, ndị Africa, East Asia, na South Asia
Ndị na-eme nchọpụta ahụike ọha na-ejikarị okwu ahụ bụ obere mmekọahụ eme ihe iji mata ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-eme omume mmekọahụ, gụnyere ndị na-amaghị n'okpuru nche anwụ LGBTQ+
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị ikom na-enwe mmekọahụ na ndị ikom (MSM), ma ha anaghị akọwapụta dị ka nwoke nwere mmasị nwoke
Na mgbakwunye, okwu ahụ pere mpe nwere ike ịgụnye ụdị dị iche iche nke nwoke na nwanyị, dị ka ndị na- emekọrịta ihe, ndị transgender, ma ọ bụ ndị na-abụghị ọnụọgụ abụọ
Agbanyeghị, ndị LGBTQ+ anaghị ahọrọ okwu ndị a na-enwekarị mmekọahụ na nwoke na nwanyị, n'ihi na ha na-anọchi anya ngalaba ahụike karịa njirimara onye ọ bụla

Ọ bụ ezie na ndị nwanyị nwere mmasị nwanyị, nwoke nwere mmasị nwoke, bisexual, transgender, na queer (LGBTQ+) dị adị n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mmadụ, mmegharị ikike LGBTQ+ n'ọtụtụ mba ọdịda anyanwụ mere ka a nabata ndị LGBTQ+ dị ka ndị otu obere
Ndị LGBTQ+ na-anọchi anya ọnụọgụgụ na ọha mmadụ
Ha na-enweta ọtụtụ ahaghị nhata n'etiti ọha na eze sitere na otu ha dị ka ndị LGBTQ+
Enweghị nhata ndị a na-agụnye ịkpa ókè na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ohere na-enweghị ike inweta nlekọta ahụike, ọrụ, na ụlọ, na ahụmahụ na-adịghị mma nke uche na ahụike anụ ahụ n'ihi ahụmahụ ndị a
Na-eduga na Iwu ikike mmadụ 1998 na UK, ịrị elu na mmata gbasara otu esi emeso ndị nwere nkwarụ malitere
Ọtụtụ ndị malitere ikweta na a napụrụ ha ihe ndị bụ́ isi ruuru mmadụ
Omume a nwere akụkụ nke kwuru na ọ bụrụ na ndị ọchịchị echebeghị ndị nwere nkwarụ mmụta site na omume ndị ọzọ dị ka mmejọ ma ọ bụ nleghara anya, mgbe ahụ enwere ike gbaa ha akwụkwọ
Otu ikike ikike nkwarụ nyere aka n'ịghọta ndị nwere nkwarụ dị ka obere ma ọ bụ njikọ nke obere ndị ọha mmadụ na-enwe nsogbu, ọ bụghị naanị dị ka ndị na-enweghị nsogbu n'ihi adịghị ike ha
Ndị na-akwado ikike nkwarụ na-ekwusi ike na ọdịiche dị na arụ ọrụ anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ nke uche, kama ịdị ala
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ụfọdụ ndị nwere autism na-arụ ụka maka ịnakwere neurodiversity, dị ka ndị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na-arụ ụka maka ịnakwere agbụrụ dị iche iche
A na-elekarị ndị ogbi anya dị ka ndị na-asụ asụsụ na omenala ole na ole kama ịbụ otu nwere nkwarụ, ụfọdụ ndị ogbi anaghị ahụkwa onwe ha dị ka ndị nwere nkwarụ ma ọlị
Kama nke ahụ, teknụzụ na ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze emebere iji gboo ndị na-achị achị na-emebi ha
( Lee Nkwekọrịta Maka ikike nke ndị nwere nkwarụ
Ndị nọ n'okpukpe dị nta nwere okwukwe dị iche na nke ọtụtụ ndị nwere
Ọtụtụ mba n'ụwa nwere obere okpukpe

A nabatarala ugbu a n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na ndị mmadụ kwesịrị inwe nnwere onwe ịhọrọ okpukpe ha, gụnyere enweghị okpukpe ọ bụla ( ekweghị na Chineke na / ma ọ bụ ekweghị na Chineke ), na gụnyere ikike ịtụgharị site n'otu okpukpe gaa na nke ọzọ
Otú ọ dị, n'ọtụtụ mba, a kpachibidoro nnwere onwe a
N'Ijipt, usoro ọhụrụ nke kaadị njirimara chọrọ ka ụmụ amaala niile kwupụta okpukpe ha - na naanị nhọrọ bụ Islam, Christianity, ma ọ bụ okpukpe ndị Juu (Lee esemokwu kaadị njirimara Egypt )
Ihe atụ ọzọ bụ ikpe nke mbelata ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị pere mpe na Pakistan, ebe a na-atụgharị ha n'ike ma ọ bụ gbuo ha
N'ọtụtụ obodo, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ndị nwoke na ndị nwanyị enweghị nhata
Ọ bụ ezie na ụmụ nwanyị abụghị obere obere, ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị dị ka otu ndị nọ n'okpuru emela ka ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na-amụ gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya mụọ ha dị ka otu obere
N'agbanyeghi na ikike na ọkwa ụmụ nwanyị nwere n'iwu dịgasị iche iche n'ofe mba, ụmụ nwanyị na-enweta enweghị ahaghị nhata n'etiti ndị nwoke n'ọtụtụ obodo
A na-ajụkarị ụmụ nwanyị ohere agụmakwụkwọ, na-eme ihe ike, na enweghị ohere inweta otu ohere akụ na ụba nke ụmụ nwoke
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mba ụfọdụ, 'obere' bụ agbụrụ nke iwu kwadoro ma nwee ikike ndị akọwapụtara
Ndị na- asụ asụsụ pere mpe nke iwu kwadoro, dịka ọmụmaatụ, nwere ike ịnwe ikike mmụta ma ọ bụ nkwurịta okwu na gọọmentị n'asụsụ ala nna ha
Mba ndị nwere onyinye pụrụ iche maka ndị pere mpe gụnyere Canada, China, Ethiopia, Germany, India, Netherlands, Poland, Romania, Russia, Croatia, na United Kingdom
A naghị enye ndị otu pere mpe dị iche iche n'otu obodo otu nha
Otu dị iche iche pere mpe ma ọ bụ enweghị nkọwa iji nweta nchekwa pere mpe
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, enwere ike ịmanye onye otu obere agbụrụ ka ọ lelee 'Ndị ọzọ' na ndepụta nlele nke nzụlite dị iche iche wee nweta ohere dị nta karịa onye so na otu akọwapụtara
Ọtụtụ gọọmentị nke oge a na-ahọrọ iche na ndị ha na-achị ha niile sitere n'otu obodo kama ịbụ ndị dị iche iche dabere na agbụrụ
United States na-arịọ maka agbụrụ na agbụrụ n'ụdị ọnụ ọgụgụ gọọmentị ya, nke na-ekewa ma na-ahazi ndị bi na ya gaa n'ìgwè dị iche iche, bụ agbụrụ agbụrụ karịa mba

Spain anaghị ekewa ndị obodo ya site n'agbụrụ ma ọ bụ obere mba, n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-ejigide echiche gọọmentị nke asụsụ pere mpe, nke ahụ bụ otu n'ime njirisi maka ikpebi obere mba, n'elu Nkwekọrịta Framework for Protection of National Minorities
Ụfọdụ ndị pere mpe ma ọ bụ ndị siri ike na-enweta nchebe zuru oke na nnọchite anya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Bosnia na Herzegovina bụbu Yugoslavia nabatara mba atọ mejupụtara, ọ nweghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ha mejupụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu (lee mba Bosnia na Herzegovina )
Agbanyeghị, ndị ọzọ pere mpe dị ka Romani na ndị Juu, bụ ndị akpọrọ “ndị mba ọzọ” na ewepụrụ na ọtụtụ n'ime nchekwa ndị a
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, enwere ike ịwepụ ha n'ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, gụnyere onyeisi oche
A na-arụrịta ụka maka ịnakwere otu obere na ihe ùgwù ha

Otu echiche bụ na itinye ikike pụrụ iche nye ndị pere mpe nwere ike imerụ ụfọdụ mba, dị ka steeti ọhụrụ dị n'Africa ma ọ bụ Latin America esiteghị na ụkpụrụ mba Europe, ebe ọ bụ na nnabata pere mpe nwere ike igbochi iguzobe njirimara obodo
O nwere ike mebie njikọ nke ndị pere mpe n'ime ọha mmadụ, ikekwe na-ebute nkewa ma ọ bụ nke ukwuu
Na Canada, ụfọdụ chere na ọdịda nke ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na- asụ Bekee emeghị ka ndị Canada bụ́ French kpasuo ikewapụ ndị Quebec

Ndị ọzọ na-ekwusi ike na ndị pere mpe na-achọ nchekwa kpọmkwem iji hụ na ewepụghị ha dịka ọmụmaatụ, mmụta asụsụ abụọ nwere ike ịdị mkpa ka ndị pere mpe na-asụ asụsụ wee banye n'usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ wee zọọ mpi otu n'ime ọha
N'echiche a, ikike maka ndị pere mpe na-ewusi ọrụ iwu obodo ike, ebe ndị otu pere mpe na-ahụ ọdịmma ha nke ọma, ma jiri obi ha niile nabata ikike nke mba ahụ na ntinye ha (ọ bụghị nnabata) n'ime ya
Mirand Otto (múrú ya na 16 Önwa iri abuöö 1967) bu omeka nke nwayi onye Ostraliya
Nwa nwanyi oméka Lindsay na Barry Otto na nwanne nwayi oméka Gracie Otto, Miranda bịdọrọ iméka mgbe o di afọr iri na asato, na o na á mela onyo-na-ga imerime
Onyo-na-ga ka o di mbu, nke di ukwu, mẹrẹ na afọr 1986 nke ha na kpó Emma's War, o mẹrẹ ka agbogho nwayi gárá ohia Ostraliya mgbe Agha Uwà II

Mgbe afọr iri gụchạrạ na mgbe o di na onyo-na-ga ndi madu hụrụ si o di mkpà na obodo Ostraliya, o bu mgbe Hollwood túfùrù a ónu mgbe o mere oméka nke nkwádo na onyo-na-ga The Thin Red Line (1998) na What Lies Beneath (2000)
Nke diri ya nke ukwu di na afọr 2002, mgbe omẹrẹ ka Éowyn na aka áto The Lord of the Rings
Mgbe ogẹ di nso, o rürü nke nlélé kpkpando na égwụrégwụ ngwa-enyo nke basiálá ubwá, Cashmere Mafia na enyo Ostraliya di ka In Her Skin na Blessed

Mireille Batamuliza bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Rwanda na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na Ministry of Gender and Family Promotion (MIGEPROF) na Rwanda kemgbe n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2021

O nwere nzere masta na Social Work na Mahadum ụmụ nwanyị nke China, nhọrọ nke idu ndú ụmụ nwanyị na mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na nzere bachelọ na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze, ọ nwekwara nzụlite nọọsụ
Mireille Nguimgo (amụrụ na 7 Nọvemba, na afọ 1976) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba ọsọ nke maara nke ọma na mita 400
Ọ naghị asọmpi n'ọkwa kachasị elu kemgbe afọ 2004
O nwekwara ihe ndekọ mba na 4 × 400 mita relay na 3 2708 nkeji, ya na ndị otu Carole Kaboud Mebam, Delphine Atangana na Hortense Béwouda nwetara n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2003 na Paris

Mireille Mary Wenger (amụrụ n'afọ 1980 ma ọ bụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ego na ohere akụ na ụba na Western Cape Provincial kemgbe Mee 2022 na onye otu Democratic Alliance (DA) onye otu Western Cape Províncial Parliament kemgbe Mee 2014
Ọ bụ Chief Whip nke Majority Party site na Mee 2019 ruo Mee 2022
Wenger nwere Master of Arts na International Studies site na Mahadum Stellenbosch na Master of Philosophy (MPhil) na Criminology, Law and Society site na Machị Cape Town
O nwetara diplọma na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Sociology site na Sciences Po na France
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Western Cape Provincial dị ka onye otu Democratic Alliance
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka MPP na 21 Mee 2014
A họpụtara Wenger ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke kọmitii nchekwa obodo
Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na 2019, a họpụtara ọ ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ụtarị nke DA caucus ma si otú a bụrụ onye isi nke Majority Party
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 22 Mee 2019
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, a họpụtara Wenger dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ad-Hoc nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Provincial na COVID-19

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, onye isi ala Alan Winde kwupụtara na Wenger ga-esonye na kansụl mpaghara n'ụbọchị iri na isii n'ọnwarị afọ 2022 dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ego na ohere akụ na ụba dị ka Minisita na-ahụ anya David Maynier ga-aga n'ọkwa agụmakwụkwọ iji dochie Debbie Schäfer, onye kwupụtara ọpụpụ ya na gọọmentị mpaghara
Kọmitii Ad-Hoc nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Provincial na COVID-19 gbasara na 10 Mee 2022
Onye otu DA Lorraine Botha nọchiri Wenger dị ka Chief Whip nke Majority Party
A ṅụrụ Wenger iyi n'ọkwa n'ụbọchị iri na isii nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2022
Wenger lụrụ Craig Kesson

Miria Rukoza Koburunga Matembe, LLD (honoris causa) (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1953) bụ onye bụbu onye otu ndị omeiwu Pan-African si Uganda
Mgbe ọ na-eje ozi n'ebe ahụ, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii na Iwu, Ihe Nketa na Ịdọ Aka ná Ntị bụ kọmitii na-adịgide adịgide nke ndị omeiwu
Na onwa June na afọ 2006, ọ ghọrọ onye Reagan-Fascell Democracy Fellow na National Endowment for Democracy
Matembe bụ onye isi oche nke Citizen coalition on electoral democracy in Uganda (CCEDU) ugbu a
A mụrụ Matembe na Bwizi Bwera, Kashari, na Mbarara, na Samuel na Eseza Rukooza bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo
Matembe bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụnne itoolu, ụmụ nwoke ise na ụmụ nwanyị anọ
Matembe gara Rutooma uloakwukwo utakara, ebe ọ sonyeere Bweranyangi Girls maka O-Level ya
Ọ gara kọleji Namasagali maka ọkwa A ya
Ọ natara nzere Bachelor of Laws (LLB) na Mahadum Makerere na nzere Master of Laws, LLM na Mahadim Warwick
Matembe malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọka iwu steeti ụmụ akwụkwọ na Ngalaba nke DPP Ministry of Justice
Mgbe ahụ, ọ kwagara nkuzi na Makerere University Business School(MUBS) nke bụ Uganda College of Commerce n'oge ahụ
Mgbe afọ 5 gasịrị, ọ kwagara na Central Bank of Uganda
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu nke Mbarara District Woman Member site n'afọ 2001 ruo na afọ 2006
Ọ bụ NRM Peggy Waako meriri ya na ntuli aka ndị okenye nke afọ 2021 ebe ọ na-achọ ịnọchite anya ndị agadi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu
Miria Matembe abụwo onye nkwado siri ike na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Uganda
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ malite na afọ 1989, ọ bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Uganda

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na gọọmentị Uganda dị ka minista maka ụkpụrụ omume na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe site na afọ 1998 ruo na afọ 2003, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndị omeiwu Pan-African na-anọchite anya Uganda

N'afọ 1995, ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii Iwu nke mepụtara Iwu Ugandan ma Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara si Uganda na Kenya nke nyochara ma mee atụmatụ maka Iwu Iwu nke Tanzania ma nye Kọmitii Warioba nchọpụta ha n'afọ 2015, n'okpuru nkwado nke Kituo cha Katiba
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke Action for Development, otu na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na Uganda, otu o guzobere
N'afọ 1990, ọ bụ osote onye isi nke Pan-African Congress nke e mere na Kampala
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na iwu na Bekee na Chartered Institute of Bankers, kwa na Kampala
Onye ọka iwu site na ọrụ, Matembe bụkwa onye dere ọtụtụ isiokwu na akwụkwọ, Miria Matembe Gender, Politics, and Constitution Making in Uganda, on women in politics
N'ọnwa Ọktoba na afọ 2006, Matembe kwuru okwu akpọrọ 'Women, War, Peace Politics in Peacebuilding' na Mahadum San Diego's Joan B
Kroc Institute for Peace & Justice Distinguished Lecture Series

N'afọ 2011, o kwuru okwu dị mkpa na 11th Sarah Ntiro Lecture and Award nke emere na Grand Imperial Hotel, Kampala -Uganda nye ụmụ nwanyị ndị bụ ndị na-akpali akpali ma ọ bụ ndị rụrụ ọrụ iji mee ka agụmakwụkwọ nwa agbọghọ dị mfe na Forum for African Women Educationalists (Fawe) haziri ihe omume na, maka nwa agbọghọ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma

Ihe nrite ndị bụ isi bịara n'ụdị abụọ; ihe nrite 'Woman of Distinction' nke na-amata ụmụ nwanyị ọrụ ha na-akwalite agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka, na ihe nrite Model of Excellence nke na-enye ụmụ nwanyị na-eme nke ọma bụ ndị setịpụrụ ezigbo ihe nlereanya maka ụmụ agbọghọ
Matembe onye bụ otu n'ime ndị a na-asọpụrụ maka mbọ siri ike ọ na-agba ịkwalite agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka nwanyị kelere chi mgbe ọ na-anabata onyinye ahụ
O kwuru na amaghị ihe na enweghị ihe onwunwe bụ ụfọdụ n'ime nsogbu ndị na-egbochi ọganihu nke agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka nwanyị
Ọ lụrụ Nekemia Matembe ma ha mutara ụmụ nwoke anọ, aha ha bụ Godwin, Gilbert, Gideon, na Grace
Miria Obote (née Kalule; amụrụ na 16 Julaị 1936) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda bụ onye isi nwanyị nke Uganda, na nwunye di ya nke onye bụbu praịm minista na onye isi ala Milton Obote
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa na ntuli aka nke afọ 2006 na Uganda
A mụrụ Miria Kalule na Kawempe, n'aka Bulasio Kalule, onye ọrụ gọọmentị nke na-arụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Nlekọta Okporo ụzọ na Ministry of Works na nwunye ya Malita
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị Gayaza ma mesịa gaa Mahadum Makerere
Miria Obote si Zambia laghachi Uganda n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2005, mgbe afọ 20 gachara, iji lie di ya
Mgbe ọnwa abụọ gachara, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nke Uganda People's Congress (UPC) na dịka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala maka ntuli aka ọzọ
Ọ bụ di ya guzobere UPC ma duzie ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
O nwetara 06% nke votu na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke February 23, 2006, nke onye isi ala nọ n'ọkwa, Yoweri Museveni meriri
Miria lụrụ Milton Obote na Nọvemba 1963 ma ha nwere ụmụ anọ n'etiti ha gụnyere Jimmy Akena, onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya obodo Lira

Zenzile Miriam Makeba (4 Machị 1932 - 9 Nọvemba 2008), onye a na-akpọ Mama Africa, bụ onye na-agụ egwu, na-ede egwu, na-emekwa ihe nkiri, na onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ na obodo South Africa
Ejirimara ya bụ na ụdị egwu gụnyere Afropop, jazz, na egwu ụwa dị ka ana-akpọ ha, ọ bụ onye kwuputara okwu megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ọchịchị ndị ọcha na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Johannesburg na ezinụlọ Swazi na Xhosa, a madoro Makeba ịchọta ọrụ mgbe ọ bụ nwata mgbe nna ya nwụrụ
Alụlụ-di nke mbu ya mgbe ọ di afọ 17, nke asi emekpara ya ahụ bụ ebe ọnọ mmụta otu mkpụrụ nwa ya na afọ 1950 ma nyaa ọrịa Kansa nke arā

A matara nkà olu ọma ya mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, ọ malitekwara ọrụ ịbụ abụ n'afọ 1950, ya na ndị òtù a na akpọ Cuban Brothers, ndị Manhattan Brothers, na otu ụmụ nwanyị niile, ndị Skylarks, na-eme ihe ma na ngwakọta egwu jazz, abụ ọdịnala ndị Afrịka, na egwu ọdịda anyanwụ ndị na ewu-ewu
N'afọ 1959, Makeba were ọrụ dị nkenke na ihe nkiri na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke akpọrọ Come Back, Africa, nke mere mba ụwa ji mata onye ọ bụ, ma mee ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Venice, London, na New York City
Na London, ọ zutere onye America na-agụ egwu Harry Belafonte, onye ghọrọ onye nduzi na onye ọrụ ibe ya
Ọ kwagara New York City, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama ozugbo, ma dekọọ abọm mbụ n'onwe ya na afọ 1960
Gọọmentị mba ahụ gbochiri mgbalị ya ịlaghachi South Africa n'afọ ahụ maka olili ozu nne ya
Ọrụ Makeba nwere ọganihu na United States, ọ weputara ọtụtụ abọm na egwu, nke kachasị ewu ewu bụ 'Pata Pata' (1967)
Ya na Belafonte, nwetara ihe rite nke Grammy akpọrọ 'Best Folk Recording' maka album ha nke 1965 akpọrọ 'An Evening with Belafonte/Makeba'
Ọ gbara akaebe megide gọọmentị South Africa na United Nations wee tinye aka na mmegharị ikike obodo
Ọ lụrụ Stokely Carmichael, onye ndú nke òtù akpọrọ Black Panther Party, na 1968, n'ihi ya, ọtụtụ ndị ọcha America kwụsịrị ikwado ya
Gọọmentị US kagburu visa ya mgbe ọ na-aga mba ọzọ, nke mere ya na Carmichael ji kwaga Guinea
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri, ọkachasị na mba ndị Afrịka, gụnyere ọtụtụ emume nnwere onwe
Ọ malitere ide ma na-eme egwu n'ụzọ doro anya na-ekwuto ịkpa ókè agbụrụ; abụ nke 1977 'Soweto Blues', nke Di mbụ ya ana akpọ Hugh Masekela dere, bụ makaọgba aghara Soweto
Mgbe e wepụrụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na 1990, Makeba laghachiri South Africa
Ọ gara n'ihu na-edekọ ma na-eme ihe nkiri, gụnyere abọm nke 1991 ya na Nina Simone na Dizzy Gillespie, wee pụta na ihe nkiri Sarafina!
A kpọrọ ya onye nnọchi anya FAO Goodwill na 1999, ma mee mkpọsa maka ọrụ ebere
Ọ nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi n'oge egwu 2008 na Ịtali
Makeba so n'ime ndị egwu Afrịka mbụ natara nkwado zuru ụwa ọnụ
O gosiri ndi Ọdida Anyanwụ egwu Afrịka, ma mee ka egwu ụwa na ụdị Afropop bụrụ ihe a ma ama

N'agbanyeghị nzụlite ya na mba ụwa, ndị na-ege ya ntị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ na-ele ya anya gburu-gburu dị ka onye nnọchitere anya Africa a na-ahụkwa ya dị ka ihe ngosi ejiji na South Africa na Odida Anyanwụ
Makeba mere ka ọtụtụ abụ na-ekwuto ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ewu ewu, ma ghọọ onye nnọchianya nke mmegid usoro ahụ, ọkachasị mgbe e wepụrụ ikike ya ịlaghachi
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, onye wubu onye isi ala South Africa bụ Nelson Mandela kwuru na 'egwú ya kpaliri anyị niile inwe olileanya dị ike'
A mụrụ Zenzile Miriam Makeba na 4 Machị 1932 na obodo ojii nke Prospect, nọ nda Johannesburg, dị ka otu mkpụrụ nwa nna ya na nwa isii nke nne ya
Nna ya bụ onye Xhosa, Caswell Makeba, bụ onye nkuzi; ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Nne ya onye Swazi, Christina Makeba, bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ; ọ kewapụrụ onwe ya na ndụ di mbụ ya wee zute ma lụọ Caswell n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Àtụ Sfn Àtụ Sfn Makeba mechara kwuo na tupu a tụọ ime ya, a dọrọ nne ya aka ná ntị na ime ọzọ nwere ike igbu ya
Ọ dighị ka Miriam ma ọbụ nne ya ga-adị ndụ mgbe ha ga bigara ọmụmụ rara ahụ
Nne-nne Miriam, onye gara ọmụmụ ahụ, na-ekwukarị 'uzenzile', okwu Xhosa nke pụtara 'ị wetaara nke a n'onwe gị', n'ihụ nne Miriam n'oge ọ na-agbake, nke kpaliri mụọ ya inye nwa ya nwanyị aha 'Zenzile'
Mgbe Makeba gbara ụbọchị iri na asatọ, e jidere nne ya ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ ọnwa isii maka ire umqombothi, biya emere n'ụlọ nke e ji malt na ọka mee
Ezinụlọ ha enweghị ego ịkwụ ụgwọ dị iwụ eriri ya iji zere mkpọrọ, Miriam nọrọ ọnwa isii nke mbụ na ndụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ

Àtụ Sfn Àtụ Sfn Àtụ Sfn Ka ọ na-erule oge a tọhapụrụ nne ya n'Ụlọ mkpọrọ, nna Makeba, onye osiri ya ike ịchọta ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi, enwetala ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na Shell Oil Company na Nelspruit (nke bụ Mbombela ugbu a) ma ezinụlọ ya sooro ya kwaga Pretoria mgbe ahụ
Mgbe nna ya nwụrụ ọ gàrà biri na ụlọ nne-nne nọ na Riverside Township ma igbafe Pretoria, ya na ụmụnne ya ma nne nọ na arụ ọrụ na ezinụlọ ndị ọcha na Johannesburg ikwado ezinụlọ ya

Princess Miriam Odinaka Onuoha bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke All Progressives Congress si Steeti Imo, Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye otu Ụlọ nnọchiteanya Omebe Iwu Naijiria si Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Okigwe Federal constituency
Ọ meriri na ntuli aka elu ọzọ na ụlọ ndị nnọchi anya omebe iwu gọọmentị etiti na ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị abụọ (2020)

E kwuputara Obinna Onwubuariri nke PDP dịka onye meriri na ntuliaka nke puku abụọ na ịrị na iteghete (2019), mana ụlọ ikpe mkpesa nhọpụta nke ọgbakọ omebe iwu na Owerri na Septemba afọ puku abụọ na iteghete (2019), chụrụ Obinna Onwubuariri, ma nye iwu ka e mee ntuliaka ọhụrụ maka Jenụwarị 2020
Ọ meriri ntuliaka ọzọ mgbe ụlọ ikpe mkpesa ntụliaka nọ na Ọgọst 2020 kwadoro mmeri ya na ntuliaka Jenụwarị 2020
Princess Miriam bụ onye Umunachi Osu-Ama na Insiala Mbano Loca Govamenti Area nke Steeti Imo
Ọ malitere akwụkwọ nwata ya na Central School Umunachi Osu-Ama mesia gaa Tilley Gyado College Markudi na Steeti Benue
Ọ gara Aquinas Model Sekọndri Skuul Osu-Ama na ebe ahụ ka o nwetara akwụkwọ satifiketi sekọndrị ya
Ọ gakwara n'ihu ịgụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos wee gụchaa nweta nzere na Esteti Manejiementi
Ọ gara mahadum nke Abuja wee gụchaa nzere masta na Nhazi gburugburu ebe obibi na Nchekwa
Tupu ọ banye n'ụlọ ndị nnọchi anya gọọmentị etiti, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka pụrụiche nye Gọvanọ Bayelsa steeti n'ihe gbasara mmepe mba ụwa n'etiti ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ndị ọzọ gara aga

Miriam Bridelia Soljak (née Cummings; N'ụbọchị 15 June 1879 na 28 March 1971) bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ New Zealand feminist, onye Kọmunist, onye na-ahụ maka ikike ndị na-enweghị ọrụ na onye na-akwado atụmatụ ezinụlọ
A mụrụ ya na Thames, New Zealand, a zụlitere ya dị ka onye Katọlik ma mụọ ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi
Site n'afọ 1898 ruo afọ 1912, ọ kụziri ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị obodo, na-amụta banyere ọdịbendị Maori ma na-asụ asụsụ nke ọma
N'afọ 1908, ọ lụrụ Peter Soljak, onye si Dalmatia, nke bụzi akụkụ nke Croatia, mana n'oge ahụ bụ akụkụ nke Alaeze Ukwu Austria
N'afọ 1919, n'ihi iwu agha, a chụpụrụ ya ma manye ya idebanye aha dị ka onye iro, n'ihi alụmdi na nwunye ya
N'agbanyeghị ịgba alụkwaghịm ha n'afọ 1939, Soljak enweghị ike iweghachite nwa amaala Britain ya
Iji mee mkpesa, Soljak duziri mkpọsa nke were ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ maka ụmụ nwanyị inwe mba nke ha na New Zealand
O tinyere aka na nsogbu ahụike nke gụnyere ọdịmma ụmụaka, atụmatụ ezinụlọ na igbochi afọ ime, ọnwụ nwa ọhụrụ na nne, na agụmakwụkwọ mmekọahụ

Nchegbu akụ na ụba dị ka onyinye nne, ezumike nká maka ndị okenye na ndị nwere nkwarụ, ụgwọ ọrụ enweghị ọrụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, yana iwu ndị nyeere ụmụ nwanyị na-enweghị ebe obibi aka, ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ, na ụmụ nwanyị kewara ekewa bụkwa ihe a na-elekwasị anya n'ọrụ Soljak
Ọ gbakwara mbọ ịkwado obodo ndị nwe obodo, na-etinye aka na nchedo nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ Maori na òtù nnwere onwe Samoa, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye na-eme udo
N'afọ 1946, New Zealand gbanwere iwu mba, na-agbanwe iwu na nwanyị na-enweta nwa amaala di ya mgbe ọ lụrụ di
Miriam Tlali (11 Nọvemba 1933 - 24 Febrụwarị 2017) bụ onye edemede South Africa
Ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ na South Africa bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ Bekee, Between Worlds, n'afọ 1975
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị mbụ dere banyere Soweto
Ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ South Africa machibidoro ọtụtụ n'ime ihe odide ya na mbụ
Miriam Masoli Tlali mụrụ na Doornfontein, Johannesburg, ma tolite na Sophiatown
Ọ gara St Cyprian's Anglican School wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Madibane

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand ruo mgbe e mechiri ya nye ndị ojii n'oge oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ; o mechara gaa na National University of Lesotho (nke a na-akpọ Pius the XII University) na Roma, Lesotho
N'ịbụ onye hapụrụ ebe ahụ n'ihi ụkọ ego, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ odeakwụkwọ ma nweta ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ n'otu ụlọ ahịa ngwá ụlọ na Johannesburg
Tlali dọtara ahụmahụ ya dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ maka akwụkwọ mbụ ya, Muriel at Metropolitan, akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe omimi nke 'echiche ya bụ nke ọhụrụ na akwụkwọ South Africa'
Ọ bụ ezie na e dere ya n'afọ 1969, e ebipụtaghị ya ruo afọ isii, bụ́ nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na South Africa jụrụ
N'afọ 1975 Ravan Press bipụtara Muriel na Metropolitan 'naanị mgbe ha wepụrụ ụfọdụ ihe ndị ha chere na ọ ga-akpasu Board Censorship - ndị na-ahụ maka akwụkwọ edemede South Africa

Mana n'agbanyeghị mbọ a, amachibidoro akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ozugbo e bipụtara ya n'ihi na Board Censorship kwuru na ọ dịghị mma na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa' Akwụkwọ ahụ ruru ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị ka e bipụtasịrị ya n'afọ 1979 site n'aka Longman n'okpuru aha n'etiti ụwa abụọ, na nsụgharị ya na-esote n'asụsụ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Japanese, Polish, German na Dutch
N’afọ 1988, Tlali kwuru n’akwụkwọ e nyere na Amsterdam n’ihu Kọmitii Na-emegide Ịnahụ Nnyocha “Nye ndị Filistia, ọkọlọtọ akwụkwọ, ndị nkatọ
Anyị na-ede akwụkwọ ojii South Africa (ndị na-eche ọrụ nke ime ka ndị mmadụ na anyị onwe anyị aka na-ede akwụkwọ maka ndị anyị maara bụ ndị na-ege ntị kwesịrị ekwesị
Anyị agaghị ede ka anyị wee ruo eru na nkọwa gị nke ihe ị kọwara dị ka 'ezi nka'
Ọrụ anyị bụ idere ndị anyị na ha akwụkwọ”
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Amandla, bụ nke dabere n'afọ 1976 Soweto ọgba aghara, machibidokwara na South Africa obere oge ka e bipụtara ya n'afọ 1980

Akwụkwọ ndị Tlali mechara gụnyere Mihloti (nke pụtara 'Anya mmiri'), nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirisi, ajụjụ ọnụ na akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, bipụtara n'afọ 1984 site n'aka ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ ojii Skotaville, bụ nke o mebere
Ewepụghị akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na 1986
Akwụkwọ ya 1989 Footprints in the Quag, nke David Philip bipụtara na South Africa, bụ nke Pandora Press weputara n'okpuru aha Soweto Stories
Tlali kwadoro ma nye aka na magazin Staffrider, bụ nke o dere otu kọlụm oge niile, 'Soweto Talk', yana ide maka akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ South Africa, gụnyere Rand Daily Mail
Ihe omume edemede Tlali kpọgara ya n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke ụwa, gụnyere Netherlands, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ, na USA

N'afọ 1978, o sonyere na mmemme ide ihe mba ụwa na Mahadum steeti Iowa, na-enye nkuzi na San Francisco, Atlanta, Washington DC, na New York, na n'etiti afọ 1989 na 1990 bụ ọkà mmụta nleta na South Africa Research Programme na Mahadum Yale
N'afọ 1995, ngalaba gọọmentị South Africa nke Arts, Culture, Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ kwanyere Tlali ugwu site na nturu ugo mmeri nke ndụ ndụ
N 2008 ọ natara Ikhamanga Silver President award
Na 11 Nọvemba 2018, Google ji doodle mata ya
Miriem Bensalah-Chaqroun (a mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Nọvemba 14, 1962) bụ onye omere ahia Moroccan
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Confedération générale des entreprises du Maroc site na 2012 ruo 2018
Ọ natara Wissam Al-Moukafa Al-Watania (Order of National Merit) na 2013, Order of Civil Merit na 2017 na Legion of Honor na 2020
A mụrụ Bensalah-Chaqroun n'ọnwa Nọvemba 14, 1962 na Casablanca, Morocco, n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ ise
Ọ bụ ada Abdelkader Bensalah, otu n'ime ndị debanyere aha nke 1944 Manifesto of Independence na onye guzobere otu Holmarcom, nwụrụ n'afọ 1993, na nwanne Holmarcom CEO Mohamed Hassan Bensalah
Na 1986, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ESCP Europe na Mahadum Dallas na MBA na njikwa na ego mba ụwa
O nwere ụmụ atọ ma bụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ Harley-Davidson, yana onye ọkwọ ụgbọ elu nwere ikike
N'oge njem na Rabat n'ọnwa Februari nke afọ 2019, Prince Harry, Duke nke Sussex na Meghan, Duchess nke Sussex, nwere mkparịta ụka na ọtụtụ ndị ọchụnta ego a ma ama gụnyere Bensalah-Chaqroun
Na Mee 2012, Confedération générale des entreprises du Maroc (CGEM) họpụtara Bensalah-Chaqroun ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ ga-abụ onye isi nzukọ a

Ka emechara ntuli aka ọzọ n'afọ 2015, Eze Mohammed VI zigaara ekele ya ma chọọ ka ọ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma, na-ekwu maka 'ezi ịhụ mba n'anya' na 'nkwenye nke mkparịta ụka bara uru na ndị mmekọ akụ na ụba, mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mba Morocco'
N'okpuru onye isi oche ya, Bensalah-Chaqroun nwetara ọkwa onye na-ahụ maka CGEM na 2016 United Nations Climate Change Conference na Marrakech
Ọ chịchara nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ ya dị ka onye isi ala n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2018
Na Nọvemba 2012, Bensalah-Chaqroun sonyeere ndị isi oche nke onye ọrụ satịlaịtị Europe Eutelsat
Na Juun 15, 2017, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nduzi nke Renault, na ọ ga-agbada dị ka onye nduzi nke Eutelsat iji nweta ọkwa ahụ
A kpọrọ Bensalah-Chaqroun na 2017 G20 Hamburg nzuko site n'aka onyeisi oche nke World Bank, Jim Yong Kim, iji nyere aka malite Ụlọ akụ Ụwa nke Women's Entrepreneur Finance Initiative
O sonyekwara na panel nke Chrystia Freeland kwadoro ebe o welitere okwu chere ụmụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego ihu na Middle East na Africa
Bensalah-Chaqroun ugbu a bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Les Eaux Minérales d'Oulmès, na onye nduzi nke Holmarcom
Na Julaị 30, 2013, na nnabata ụbọchị ocheeze, Eze Mohammed VI nyere Bensalah-Chaqroun na Wissam Al-Moukafa Al-Watania (Order of National Merit) na ọkwa nke Grand Officer

Na ememe na January 9, 2017, onye nnọchianya Spanish Ricardo Díez-Hochleitner, n'aha Eze Felipe VI, nyere Bensalah-Chaqroun na Order nke Civil Merit maka onyinye ya na mmekọrịta akụ na ụba n'etiti Spain na Morocco
Na Machị 29, 2019, Bensalah-Chaqroun nwetara onyinye nturu ugo Fès Gate 2019 n'aka Idriss Azami Al Idrissi

Forbes Middle East edepụtala Bensalah-Chaqroun dị ka nwanyị Arab nke iri na ise kachasị ike n'okpuru ụdị azụmaahịa ezinụlọ na 2014, ndị inyom Arab siri ike nke iri atọ na 2017, na iri abụọ na isii kacha nwee mmetụta
nwanyị na 2018
Na Machị 10, 2020, emere ya mma ka Knight of the Legion of Honor
Matodzi Mirriam Ramadwa bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu African National Congress, a họpụtara ya na Limpopo Provincial Legislature na 2009
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka egwuregwu, nka na ọdịbendị
A họpụtara Ramada dị ka ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu mpaghara na 2014
N'afọ 2015, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka ọkà okwu
A họpụtara Ramadwa ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba South Africa n'afọ 2019
Ramadwa bụ nọọsụ site na ọrụ
O nwetara asambodo na Leadership na Governance na asambodo na Labour Law na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
Site na Mahadum nke Western Cape, ọ nwetara diplọma na Economic Management Science
Ramadwa jere ozi na kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara (PEC) na kọmiti na-arụ ọrụ mpaghara (PWC) nke African National Congress na Limpopo
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Congress of South African Trade Unions (COASTU) na mpaghara ahụ
A họpụtara Ramadwa ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Limpopo Provincial na 2009
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013, onye isi ala Stanley Mathabatha họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka egwuregwu, nka na ọdịbendị
Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 2014 gasịrị, a họpụtara Ramadwa dị ka ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu mpaghara
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, ANC nyere Ramadwa iwu ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm dị ka ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu mpaghara, ka onye omeiwu ANC Polly Boshielo wee nwee ike ịnọchi ya
Ọ jụrụ ịhapụ ọrụ dịka ọkà okwu
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, ndị ANC kwụsịtụrụ ịbụ onye otu ya ka ha na-echere ịdọ aka ná ntị
Ramadwa mechara gbaa arụkwaghịm dị ka ọkà okwu na 29 Septemba 2015, n'otu ụbọchị ahụ ka a ga-arụrịta ụka na ndị omeiwu mpaghara maka iwepụ ya dị ka ọkà mmụta
E wepụrụ nkwụsịtụ nke ndị otu ANC ya na 18 Nọvemba 2015
Ọ gara n'ihu dị ka onye otu nkịtị nke ndị omeiwu mpaghara ruo na ntuli aka 2019
Na ntuli aka 2019, a họpụtara Ramadwa ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke South Africa site na ndepụta Limpopo nke ANC
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, a kpughere na Ramadwa ahapụla oge a kara aka ịpụ n'obodo ndị omeiwu dị na Polokwane
O kwuru na o degaara ndị omeiwu na ngalaba ọrụ ọha na eze akwụkwọ na-arịọ ka a gbatịkwuo oge ọ nọrọ n'ihi na ọ dị ya mkpa ịchọ ụlọ akwụkwọ na Cape Town maka ụmụ mgbei abụọ ọ na-elekọta

Misan Harriman (a mụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Britain amụrụ Naịjịrịa onye na-ese foto, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-akwado mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Nakwa ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto kachasị ekerịta nke Black Lives Matter movement, Harriman bụ onye isi ojii mbụ sere mkpuchi nke British n'afọ nke otu narị na anọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Na Julaị 2021 Harriman malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Southbank Centre, London
A mụrụ Harriman na Calabar, Nigeria, n'afọ 1977
Ọ bụ nwa Chief Hope Harriman (onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si Warri na Delta Steeti Naịjirịa)
Ọ gara Stubbington House School na Bradfield College na England
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Harriman rụrụ ọrụ na ntinye akwụkwọ na City of London
Harriman nwere mmasị na foto site na nwata, nke a gụnyere inye ihe ngosi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Stanley Kubrick ji ìhè mee ihe na Barry Lyndon (1975) dị afọ itoolu
N'afọ 2016, Harriman guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi n'Ịntanet nke a kpọrọ What We Seee
Ọ malitere ịse foto n'afọ 2017 ma bụrụ onye nkuzi onwe ya

Ọrụ foto Harriman gụnyere ịse foto ndepụta dị iche iche nke ndị ama ama, nke gụnyere Meghan Markle, Rihanna, Stormzy, Olivia Colman, Princess Beatrice, Cate Blanchett, Chiwetel Ejiofor, na Tom Cruise, yana idekọ The Extinction Rebellion, ọgụ ihu igwe na ngagharị iwe megide Trump na 2019

Mkpuchi nke Harriman maka mbipụta ọnwa Septemba nke Vogue—nke bụ mbipụta kachasị mkpa nke afọ—gụnyere ihe onyonyo Adwoa Aboah, Marcus Rashford na ndị nkwado mmadụ iri na asatọ ndị ọzọ metụtara otu Black Lives Matter si gburugburu ụwa
Ndị na-ese foto abụọ, Cornelius Walker na Ron Timehin nyeere ya aka
Ná mmalite afọ 2021 Harriman were foto ahụ iji kwupụta afọ ime nke Meghan, Duchess nke Sussex
Na Julaị 2021, Harriman malitere nhọpụta nke onye isi oche nke ndị nlekọta nke Southbank Centre
Harriman lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Miship, ma ọ bụ Chip, bụ asụsụ ndi obodo Afro-Asia nke a na-asụ na Plateau Steeti, mba Naijiria
Doka bụ olumba
Blench depụtara asụsụ abụọ Longmaar na Jiɓaam
A na-ahụ ndị Chip na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo Pankshin
Ọrụ ọdịnala nke ndị Chip bụ ọrụ ugbo
Ndị mmadụ na-efe Na'an (Chineke)
Ọtụtụ aha chọọ enweghị ndiche oke na nwunye, ya bụ iji mee ka nwoke na nwanyị dị iche, a na- etinye agbakwunye Na na aha nwanyị ahụ ma tinye Da na nke nwoke ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, maka nwoke na nwanyị na-ekerịta Nandi, nwoke ahụ ga-abụ Danan, ebe nwanyị ga abụzị Nanan
A na-eji Lu ('anụ') eme ihe iji gosiputa nke ọma na anụ sitere na anụmanụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, 'okpukpu' ga-abụ Lu Co
Mishqah Parthiephal (a mụrụ na 21 Septemba 1989) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, ihe nlereanya na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na telivishọn na mgbasa ozi ruo n'afọ 2015
N'èzí South Africa, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka onye ọka iwu Priya Seghal na usoro CTV / Netflix The Indian Detective
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Verulam, n'ebe ugwu Durban, Parthiepal bụ onye Alakụba sitere na India n'akụkụ nna ya na Malay n'akụkụ nne ya
Ọ gara Durban Girls' High School
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal tupu ọ kwaga Johannesburg

Misozi Chisha Rachael Zulu (amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti maka otu Turkish Women's Super League club Hakkarigücü Spor na otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia
Zulu gara Kazakhstan na onwa Julai, na afọ 2019, wee sonye na klọb BIIK Kazygurt nke dị na Shymkent na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ọnwa isii
O sonyere na afo 2019 20 UEFA Women's Champions League maka ndị otu Kazakhi
Na klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka National Assembly FC
na Green Buffaloes FC na Zambia
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Disemba, na afọ 2021, ọ kwagara Turkey wee sonye na Hakkarigücü Spor iji gbaa bọọlụ na afo 2021 Turkcell Super League
Ọ bụ onye otu na onye isi nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Zambia
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2014 African Women's Championship
Asọmpi Miss Alaska bụ asọmupi agụmakwụkwọ nke na-ahọpụta onye nnọchi anya steeti Alaska na asọmupi Miss America
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ọkwa ọkwa steeti na usoro Miss America, Alaska na-enye nwanyị ọ bụla ruru eru ohere ịbanye na asọmupi Miss Alaska n'ebughị ụzọ merie asọmupi ruru eru nke obodo
Emma Broyles nke Anchorage bụ onye okpueze Miss Alaska 2021 na June 17, n'afọ 2021, na Alaska Center for the Performing Arts na Anchorage, Alaska
O meriri aha Miss America 2022 na Disemba 16, n'afo 2021, nke mbụ maka steeti Alaska
Onye nke mbụ ya, Elle Adkins, ketara aha Miss Alaska na Disemba 22, n'afọ 2021 mgbe Broyles meriri Miss America 2022 maka oge fọdụrụ n'ọchịchị Miss Alaska 2021
Ihe na-esonụ bụ nchịkọta anya nke nsonaazụ gara aga nke ndị nwe aha Miss Alaska na asọmupi Miss America nke mba
Afọ dị na nne na nna na-egosi afọ nke asọmupi mba nke e nwetara ntinye na / ma ọ bụ onyinye, ọ bụghị afọ jikọtara na aha steeti onye asọmupi ahụ
Asọmpi Miss California Teen USA bụ asọmupi nke na-ahọpụta onye nnọchi anya steeti California na asọmupi Miss Teen USA
Ihe ngosi a bụ akụkụ nke Miss Universe Organization, nke William Morris Endeavor (nke a makwaara dị ka WME) nwere
California nọ n'elu steeti ise kachasị aga n'ihu na Miss Teen USA n'ihe gbasara ọnụ ọgụgụ na uru nke ntinye
A kpọrọ ndị na-akpọ Miss California Teen USA ka ha gaa na-eme ihe nkiri na-acha uhie uhie, dịka nke Santa Clause 3 nke Kylee Lin gara, na She's the Man, nke Jessica Powell gara
E chiri Cameron Doan nke Anaheim Miss California Teen USA 2021 na Septemba 12, n'afọ 2021 na San Gabriel Mission Playhouse na San Gabriel, California
Ọ nọchitere anya California maka aha Miss Teen USA 2021, wee banye n'elu iri na isii
Na oge afọ 1980s, Richard Guy na Rex Holt duziri asọmupi ahụ, bụ ndị lekọtakwara Miss California USA, Miss Texas USA na Miss Texas Teen USA
Ha tụfuru nkwekọrịta ahụ na 1990, mgbe ọ bịara maka mmegharị
Asọmupi Miss Delaware Teen USA bụ asọmupi nke na-ahọpụta onye nnọchi anya steeti Delaware na asọmpi Miss Teen USA
Ọ bụ Crown Productions duziri ya site na 1993 ruo 2007, mgbe ahụ D&D Productions duziri ya site na 2007 ruo 2018
CW Productions ghọrọ ndị nduzi ọhụrụ maka asọmpi ahụ malite na 2019
N'afọ 2020, a kwụsịrị CW Productions
E nyere ikike iji mepụta asọmpi steeti 2021 na V&M Productions, LLC n'ime onye nduzi nke Vincenza Carrieri-Russo
Nke a bụ naanị oge nke abụọ onye bụbu Miss Delaware USA mepụtara asọmpi ahụ
Onye nwe aha ugbu a bụ Ava MacMurray nke Hockessin ma e chiri ya okpueze na Eprel 3, n'afọ 2022 na Laird Performing Arts Center na Tatnall School na Wilmington
Ọ ga-anọchite anya Delaware maka aha Miss Teen USA 2022
N'ihe banyere ọnụ ọgụgụ ntinye na ihe onyinye, Delaware bụ otu n'ime steeti atubianya na oga emeriri na Miss Teen USA
Otú ọ dị, Ashley Coleman mebiri akpụ ahụ iji merie okpueze Miss Teen USA na 1999
Miss Delaware Teen USA 2000, Carrie Aiken, na 2001, Christie Aiken, bụ ụmụnne nwanyị
Miss Delaware Teen USA 1997, Cheryl Crowe, bụ onye mbụ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma Delaware gafere na Miss Delaware USA
Ebe ọ bụ na Cheryl, Kelsey Miller (2009), Mia Jones (2014) na Sierra Wright (2015) gara n'ihu merie Miss Delaware USA, na 2014, 2017 na 2018 n'otu n'otu

Miss Delaware Teen USA 2011, Amanda Debus, bụ onye mbụ, ma ruo ugbu a naanị, onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma Delaware gafere site na Miss Delaware's Outstanding Teen title, ọ bụkwa naanị ihe ịga nke ọma MAO / MIO crossover na Delaware
Amanda Debus bụ onye mbụ USA meriri Miss Delaware na usoro Miss America
Na Febụwarị 26, n'afọ 2013, Melissa King gbara arụkwaghịm na okpueze ya mgbe ọ na-eche vidio na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ ihu; A kwụrụ onye bụbu Miss Delaware Teen USA $ 1,500 maka ihe nkiri porn
Site na nne na nna Burundian na Rwanda Nwa ada Erica tolitere na Kigali
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O mere egwu izizi ya na 2011 dị ka onye otu Kora Entertainment na mmekorita ya na Best Life Music
N'afọ 2016, Miss Erica na Lacia guzobere duo ma soro egwu ya na Burundian Superstar Sat-B akpọrọ Joto
Ọtụtụ n'ime egwu mbụ ya dị n'ụdị dancehall mana Miss Erica tụrụ ya n'anya na-eso ya na egwu dị elu Angalia na July 2017, na-egosi ndị na-ese egwu Kiwundo Vampino, Rabadaba, Diplomate na Milly
Egwú ndị ọzọ dị n'egwú ya gụnyere Buzira, Give me love na Mon Amour
Miss Ethiopia bịdọrọ na 1963
Mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ Miss Addis Ababa mere na 1964 na 1964
E nwere mbipụta abụọ n'oge ahụ ma emesịa megharịa ya dị ka asọmupi Miss Ethiopia na 1988 site n'aka Ethio American Entertainment Inc
N'oge a, asọmupi Miss Ethiopia nke Murad Mohammed nwere

Onye isi oche Miss Ethiopia bụ Murad Mohammed, onye nduzi nke Ethiopian Village Adventure Playground, nke na-ekwu na ọ bụ ya nwe Miss Ethiopia, ekwuputala ugboro ugboro na ndị Miss Ethiopia queens ga-esonye na asọmupi mba ụwa dị ka Miss International, Miss Earth, Miss Progress, wdg
n'agbanyeghị na ha enweghị ikike maka asọmupi ahụ
A naghị eme ọtụtụ ikpe ahụ n'ihu ọha, ya mere ndị mmadụ n'ozuzu ha enweghị ike ịgbaso usoro ahụ site na mmalite ruo n'isi, ma ọ bụ hụ ihe omume ikpeazụ na-ewere ọnọdụ

A na-ebo Mohammed ebubo na ọ na-akpọsa ihe nrite ụgha ugboro ugboro maka ụdị Miss Ethiopia ya, dị ka ego, nkwekọrịta ịme ngosi, ụgbọala, na ọla, ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ha nwere ike ịchọpụta na e nyere ya
Melkam Michael Endale, onye e chiri Miss Ethiopia 2010, ka e mesịrị họpụta Miss World Ethiopia na 2012 n'esoghị na asọmupi maka ebumnuche nke ịga Miss World 2012
Ọ bịaghị ihe omume ahụ
E dekwara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya Ethiopia na Miss Intercontinental Pageant 2012, mana egosighi ọzọ
Miss Gabon bụ asọmupi ịma mma mba na Gabon
Défis de femmes guzobere asọmupi ahụ n'afọ 2001
Miss Gabon aghọwo onye ọrụ gọọmentị nke Miss Universe na Libreville kemgbe 2012
Onye mmeri na-ekwupụta na-akpaghị aka dị ka Miss Universe Gabon ma na-anọchite anya Gabon na asọmupi Miss Universe
N'oge ụfọdụ, mgbe onye mmeri erughị eru (n'ihi afọ) maka asọmupi ọ bụla, a na-eziga onye na-esote
Miss Grand International bụ asọmpi ịma mma ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa nke dabeere na Thailand nke e guzobere na 2013
Bọtịnụ agba
Na akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndị asọmupi a ma ama bụ Evelyn Miot na Gerthie David
Na Julaị 14, 1962, Evelyn Miot bụ onye isi ojii mbụ na-asọmupi ịbụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri na ise ọkara ikpeazụ na Miss Universe Pageant Nke a bụ nzukọ mba ụwa mbụ nke Miss Haiti
Gerthie David sọrọ mpi na Miss Universe Pageant n'afọ 1975 ma tinye ya na ngwụcha, bụrụ onye na-esote Miss Finland, Anne Marie Pohtamo meriri n'afọ 1975
N'afọ 1975, Gerthie ghọrọ nwanyị ojii nke abụọ e debere na njedebe
N'afọ 1975, a kpọrọ Joelle Apollon Miss Haiti World ka ọ nọchite anya mba ahụ na Miss World Pageant, ọ fọdụrụ dị ka onye ikpeazụ nke ise, bụ naanị oge Haiti zigara onye ga-azọ ọkwa Miss World
E wepụrụ onye nnọchi anya Miss Haiti Universe nke 1968, Claudie Paquin, na agba nke mbụ nke Miss Universe
Oge ikpeazụ Miss Haiti Universe sọrọ mpi na Miss Universe tupu 2010 bụ na 1989, onye nnọchiteanya bụ Glaphyra Jean-Louis
N'afọ 2010, Haiti laghachiri na asọmupi Miss Universe n'okpuru Magali Febles, onye bụkwa onye nwe ikike ịtu na Miss Universe na Dominican Republic
Ọ ga-ejedebe na-enwe franchise ruo n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2016, e nyere ikikere nke Miss Universe nye Chris Puesan onye nkuzi asọmpi si Dominican Republic, ma mechaa nwee ikike ahụ ruo 2018
Tupu e mepụta Miss Haiti Organization abụghị ihe a na-ahụkarị ịhụ Haiti na-asọmupi na asọmupi mba ụwa mana mgbe emechara asọmupi mba ahụ, Haiti na-esonyere ọtụtụ n'ime asọmupi ahụ n'ụwa niile
Chris Puesan na Sabine Désir na-ahazi Miss Haiti

Òtù ahụ na-achọta ụmụ agbọghọ sitere na ngalaba iri nke Haiti site na asọmpi mbụ (Concours Miss Haiti Departementaux) Ndị mmeri na ndị mbụ na-agba ọsọ na-esonyere Miss Haiti ugbu a na Port-au-Prince maka otu ọnwa nkwadebe isonye na Miss Haiti Pageant nke a na-eme n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ
Ndị na-aga ọkara ikpeazụ na-ekere òkè na The Grand Coronation
Onye meriri na Miss Haiti bụ onye okpueze dịka Miss Universe Haiti ma na-asọmpi na Miss Universe
Ndị asọmupi fọdụrụnụ na-aga n'ihu na asọmupi Miss International, onye mmeri ya na-asọmupi dịka Miss International Haiti
Na ngwụsị afọ 1920, e mere Queen Esther Beauty Pageant na Tel Aviv na-elekwasị anya na ezumike nke Purim
Miss Israel Pageant nke mbụ mere na 1950, afọ abụọ ka e mepụtara Steeti Israel
Kemgbe ahụ, Miss Israel bụ onye nwe ikike mba maka Miss Universe, Miss World na Miss International
Onye mmeri na-anọchite anya Israel na asọmupi Miss Universe na ndị na-agba ọsọ na asọmupi Miss World, Miss International na Miss Europe

Mgbe ụfọdụ, onye mmeri na-asọmupi na asọmupi mba ụwa ndị ọzọ, dị ka asọmupi Miss World na 1953, 1968, 1992, 1996–1998, na asọmupi Miss International na 1963, Miss Asia Pacific (International), na Miss Earth
N'afọ 2001, Miss Israel ghọrọ onye nwe ikike mba maka asọmupi Miss Earth wee ruo n'afọ 2009
N'afọ 2010, asọmupi Miss Israel ezigaghị onye ga-azọ ọkwa Miss Earth
N'afọ 2006, Miss Israel họọrọ usoro ọfụrụ na-enye okpueze anọ
Ndị na-asọmupi ga-abụrịrị sentimita 170 ma ọ bụ karịa, afọ iri asatọ ruo afọ iri abụo na anọ, ma ọ dịghị mgbe ha lụrụ di ma ọ bụ mụọ ụmụ
Miss Lebanon (Arabic , , 'Queen of Beauty of Lebanon') bụ asọmupi ịma mma mba na Lebanon
Miss Lebanon ugbu a bụ Maya Reaidy bụ onye e chiri echichi na 29 Septemba n'afọ 2018
A na-agbasa Miss Lebanon na Lebanon Broadcasting Corporation (LBC) kemgbe 1975 ma ruo ụbọchị anyị ugbu a, a ga-eziga onye mmeri ya na Miss Universe
Ọ bụ kọmitii Miss Lebanon 'Mr Antoine Maksoud' haziri ya ugbu a
A kagbuola asọmupi ahụ ugboro ole na ole n'ihi agha obodo, esemokwu ya na Israel na enweghị nchebe maka ndị nnọchiteanya
Onye mmeri na-anọchite anya Lebanon na Miss Universe na Miss World
Miss Lebanon Organization na-enye onyinye mmeri ya ihe karịrị $ 400,000
Kwa afọ, asọmpi Miss Lebanon na-ewere usoro ọhụrụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ọhụrụ nke ndị na-asọmupi
Ihe ngosi a ewerewo ụdị otu abalị gala, ọtụtụ primes, na ọbụna telivishọn
N'okpuru ebe a bụ nkọwa nke afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya nke usoro asọmpi ahụ
Onye mmeri Miss Lebanon na-asọmupi na Miss World na Miss Universe
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-eziga onye na-agba ọsọ
N'ebe a, asọmpi mba ụwa n'okpuru Miss Lebanon Organization; Miss Lebanon na Miss Lebanon Emigrant bụ ndị ga-aga asọmpi Miss International
Ndị a bụ Miss World, Miss Universe, Miss International na Miss Earth
Miss Meyers (1949 rụo March 1963) bụ American Quarter Horse racehorse na broodmare, 1953 World Champion Quarter Running Horse
Ọ meriri $ 28,725 (nke ya na $ 291,000 ) ya na ọsọ iri na asaa ogbara
Dị ka nwa, ọ mepụtara, ma ọ bụ bụrụ nne nke, onye mmeri kachasị elu nke American Quarter Horse Association (AQHA), Kid Meyers
Ọ bụbu nne nke ụmụ atọ ndị ọzọ, a kpọbatakwara ya na AQHA Hall of Fame n'afọ 2009
Miss Meyers bụ nne na-acha nchara nchara nke amụrụ na n'afọ1949 ma mụọ, ma ọ bụ nna, site na Leo, onye otu AQHA Hall of Fame
Nwaanyị Miss Meyers, ma ọ bụ nne, bụ Lou nke Star
Nna Lou nke Star bụ Oklahoma Star P-6, onye ọzọ AQHA Hall of Fame
Ọ bụ O
Meyer zụlitere ya, Bruce A
Green mechara bụrụ onye nwe ya
Miss Meyers gbara ọsọ site na 1952 wee ruo 1955 wee merie agbụrụ asaa, bụrụ nke abụọ na asaa ndị ọzọ, na nke atọ na abụọ ọzọ
Ọ meriri mmadụ iri na asaa n'ime iri ise na iteghete ọ malitere n'okporo ụzọ ọsọ
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na agbụrụ iri na ise ọzọ na nke atọ na ise
Ngụkọta ego ọ nwetara n'okporo ụzọ ahụ bụ $ 28,727 (nke ya na $ 290,600 )

N'etiti mmeri ya na agbụrụ osisi bụ 1952 Buttons na Bows Stakes, 1953 California Championship, 1953 Billy Anson Stakes, 1953, Rocky Mountain Quarter Horse Association World Championship Dash, 1955 Bart B Stakes, 1955 Barbara B Stakes na 1955 Traveler Stakes
O setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ anọ, ugboro abụọ na 350 yards (320 m), otu ugboro na 400 yards (370 ), na otu ugboro na 440 yards (400 )
N'afọ 1953, a kpọrọ ya AQHA World Champion Quarter Running Horse, yana High Money Earning Horse; AQHA nyekwara ya aha nke Superior Race Horse n'afọ 1954
Nkọwa ọsọ kachasị elu ọ nwetara, ihe atụ nke ngwa ngwa o nwere ike ịgba ọsọ, n'oge ọrụ ịgba ọsọ ya bụ AAAT, nke kachasị elu n'oge ahụ
Ọ bụghị ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, n'afọ 1953, na Miss Meyers rụrụ nke ọma wee malite mmeri n'okporo ụzọ
N'afọ ahụ, ọ meriri $ 15,398 (nke ya na $ 156,000 ), ihe karịrị ọkara ego ọ na-enweta na ndụ ya, yana asaa n'ime mmeri iri na asaa ọ meriri
Mgbe Miss Meyers lara ezumike nká n'okporo ụzọ agbụrụ, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke onye mmeri kachasị elu nke AQHA, Kid Meyers, nke onye otu Hall of Famer Three Bars, a Thoroughbred mụrụ
(Onye mmeri kachasị elu bụ ịnyịnya nke pụtara ìhè n'okporo ụzọ ọsọ, dị ka ịnyịnya na-agba ịnyịnya na ihe ngosi ịnyịnya nakwa n'ụzọ kwekọrọ ekwekọ, ma ọ bụ etu ịnyịnya ahụ si jikọta ọnụ)
Kid Meyers bụ onye na-agba ịnyịnya na 1963 ma wee 23 na racetrack, na-emeri ugboro 6
O nwetara ngụkọta nke $ 10,655 (nke ya na $ 89,000 ) na egwu ahụ
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'okporo ụzọ, ọ nwetara onye mmeri AQHA ya na 1966 na onye mmeri kachasị elu nke AQHA na 1967
Nkọwa ọsọ ya kachasị elu bụ AAA
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ụmụ ịnyịnya ibu, ndị na-enye nwa ara ọtụtụ ọnwa mgbe amuchara, Kid Meyers ghọrọ nwa mgbe ọ dị otu ọnwa na Machị n'afọ 1963
Miss Meyers nwere ụmụ atọ ọzọ

Oh My Oh, a 1957 bay mare mụrụ site na Thoroughbred stallion Spotted Bull, malitere ugboro iri atọ, na-emeri agbụrụ asatọ maka ngụkọta ego nke $ 12,592 (nke ya na $ 114,200 ) ma na-abịa na nke abụọ na agbụrụ
Ọ nwetara akara ọsọ AAAT
Dị ka nwa ara, ọ bụ onye mmeri nke All American Futurity Three Oh's
Nwa ehi Miss Meyers nke 1958 bụ Maazị Meyers, nwa ịnyịnya nke onye otu Hall of Famer Go Man Go mụrụ, onye malitere ugboro 41, merie ugboro 9 ma bụrụ nke atọ na agbụrụ anọ
Ngụkọta ego ọ nwetara n'ọsọ ya bụ $ 25,656 (nke ya na $ 229,900 )
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta aha AQHA Champion tinyere ihe nrite Superior Race Horse, iji gaa na akara ọsọ ọsọ AAAT ya
Maazị Meyers ghọrọ ịnyịnya na-azụlite nke ọma
Nwa ehi nke anọ nke Miss Meyers bụ nwa ehi chestnut nke 1959 aha ya bụ Milpool nke Vandy mụrụ
Milpool enwetụbeghị ọsọ ma ọ bụ banye na ihe ngosi ịnyịnya
Miss Meyers nwụrụ na Machị n'afọ 1963, obere oge ka ọ mụsịrị Kid Meyers
A nabatara ya n'ime ụlọ nzukọ American Quarter Horse Hall of Fame nke AQHA na 2009
Asọmupi Miss Michigan USA bụ asọmupi nke na-ahọpụta onye nnọchi anya steeti Michigan na asọmupi Miss USA
Ọ bụ Proctor Productions na-eduzi ya ugbu a
Mmeri Miss USA mbụ ha bụ n'afọ 1990, ma bụrụ nke ama ama n'ihi na Carole Gist bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ meriri aha ahụ
Na isoyere nzọụkwụ ya, Kenya Moore, onye bụkwa onye Afrịka-Amerịka, meriri aha ahụ n'afọ 1993
N'afọ 2010, Rima Fakih nke Michigan ghọrọ onye Arab-American mbụ meriri aha ahụ
Ntinye kachasị ọhụrụ bụ Elizabeth Johnson na 2018, nke e debere n'elu 15
Ruo n'afọ 2012, ọ dịghị onye nnọchi anya Michigan na-asọmupi na Miss Michigan ma ọ bụ Miss Michigan Teen USA iji pụta na crossover na Miss USA
Kristen Danyal ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Michigan mbụ nwere Teen to Miss crossover na Miss USA
Aria Hutchinson nke Plymouth bụ onye okpueze Miss Michigan USA 2022 na Mee 28, n'afo 2022, na McMorran Place Sports & Entertainment Center na Port Huron
Ọ ga-anọchite anya Michigan maka aha Miss USA 2022
Asọmupi Miss Nebraska USA bụ asọmupi nke na-ahọpụta onye nnọchi anya steeti Nebraska na asọmupi Miss USA
Ọ bụ Vanbros & Associates, nke isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Lenexa, Kansas, duziri asọmupi ahụ
N'afọ 2002, Nebraska sonyeere otu Vanbros nke steeti maka usoro Miss USA na Teen USA
Nebraska bụ otu n'ime steeti ndị na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na Miss USA, ebe ọ debere naanị ugboro iri na atọ
Ha nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na oge 1950s, na-etinye ugboro isii, na atọ na-agba ọsọ
Ruo n'afọ 2018, ọnọdụ ha kachasị elu bụ na 1955 nke bụ onye nke abụọ
Ntinye Belinda Wright n'elu iri na ise n'afọ 2010 bụ ebe mbụ Nebraska tinyere na ọkara ikpeazụ kemgbe 1980 na nke mbụ iji merie Miss Congeniality
N'afọ 2018, Sarah Rose Summers ghọrọ Miss Nebraska USA mbụ meriri Miss USA ma bụrụ steeti nke iri atọ na ise nwere aha Miss USA na nke mbụ ya
N'afọ 2020, Megan Swanson bu onye nnọchi anya Miss Nebraska mbụ meriri aha steeti ahụ
Ọzọkwa, ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Allie Swanson, Miss Nebraska 2019, ghọrọ ụmụnne nwanyị mbụ jidere Miss USA na Miss America n'otu oge
Natalie Pieper nke Omaha bụ onye okpueze Miss Nebraska USA 2022 na Machị 6, n'afọ 2022 na Rose Blumkin Performing Arts Center na Omaha
Ọ ga-anọchite anya Nebraska maka aha Miss USA 2022

Miss Sahhara (nke a na-akpọ Miss saHHara, nke a na-akpọ dị ka Sahara) bụ eze nwanyị mara mma nke Britain na Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe ngosi ejiji, onye na-agụ egwu / onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-akwado nweta ikike mmadụ
A maara ya maka ịnọchite anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi ịgosi mma mba ụwa iji dọta uche na nsogbu nke ndị LGBTQI + na Afrịka
N'afọ 2011, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị gbanwere ọdịdị ịbụ nwanyí mbụ si Naijiria pụtara n'ihu ọha na mgbasa ozi mba ụwa n'oge asọmpi ịgosi mma Miss International Queen na Pattaya, Thailand
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2014, e chiri ya onye mbụ Super Sireyna Worldwide na Manila, Philippines
Nke mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nwanyí isi ojii mbụ gbanwere ọdịdị ya e chiri onye mmeri na asọmpi ịgosi mma mba ụwa

Mgbe o meriri Super Sireyna Worldwide, o hiwere otu ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi gbasara ndị gbanwere ọdịdị ha zuru ụwa ọnụ nke a na-akpọ TransValid Ọ bụkwa onye nkatọ iwu mkpọrọ afọ iri na anọ nke ndị LGBTQI + na Naịjirịa
Onye kọwara onwe ya dị ka'onye ọ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi maka ejiji na ngosi mma', nzere ya na mbipụta ya sitere na izu ejiji ruo na mkpuchi nke magazin na mba ụwa
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, o kwuru n'ụzọ a ma ama na ọ dịghị mgbe ọ dabara n'echiche okpukpe na nke nchekwa nke Naịjirịa
Ibi n'ime ime obodo Naịjirịa mere ka ọ ghara ịma banyere ọnọdụ ahụike ya nke a maara dị ka gender dysphoria
O kwuru na mmetụta ọ na-enwe mgbe niile nke ịchọrọ igosipụta onwe ya dị ka nwanyị mere ka ọ dị ya ka ọ furu efu, dị ka a ga-asị na e nwere ihe na-adịghị mma na ya
Ọ chọrọ Okpukpere chi ga-enye ya olileanya ọgwụgwọ, na-ekpegara Chineke ekpere ka o mee ya nwanyị mgbe ọ tolitere

N'ịbụ onye nwere nsogbu njirimara ya, o kpebiri ịwere ndụ ya, ebe ọ bụ na ndị pastọ nọ na chọọchị ya na ndị gbara ya gburugburu nọgidere na-agwa ya na e nwere ihe na-adịghị mma banyere njirimara nwanyị ya
O kwuru na ọ nwaala igbu onwe ya ugboro abụọ ma lanarị
Mgbalị igbu onwe ya mere ka o kpebisie ike ịhapụ Naịjirịa gaa n'obodo na-anabata ma ọ bụ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'igbu onwe ya na mgbalị igbu onwe ya nke atọ
Ọ malitere ịchọ azịza maka ọnọdụ ya na otu o nwere ike isi jisie okwukwe ya na onye ọ na-atụ anya ịbụ n'ọdịnihu
Ọ chọtara udo na nchọpụta na ọ dịghị mkpa ka ọ bụrụ onye okpukpe iji bie ndụ dị mma
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, a kpọchiri ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Naijiria n'ihi omume nwanyị ya
Ịbụ onye a tụrụ mkpọrọ gbara ya ume ịhapụ Naịjirịa, n'ihi na ihe ọzọ gaara eme ka ọ kwụsị ndụ ya nke ọma

O chetara ahụmahụ ya na edemede a na-emetụ n'ahụ o dere maka Gay Star News na Transgender Day of Remembrance n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, nke ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi n'ịntanetị bipụtara ọzọ
Ọ dị m ka m nwee ike ịgwa onwe na-eto eto onye nwara igbu onwe ya ugboro abụọ na ndụ na-akawanye mma na nrọ na-abịakea na mmezu
Echeghị m na ndụ nwere ike ịbụ ihe ijuanya ọtụtụ afọ gara aga mgbe a tọhapụrụ m n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dị egwu nke Naijiria maka ịdị iche
Mgbe ahụ, naanị ihe m nwere ike iche bụ na m nwere ike ịnwụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ a ma ọ dịghị onye ga-ama ma ọ bụ lekọta ya
Ịbụ onye a tụrụ mkpọrọ chere na ọ bụ ihe ziri ezi, na-atụle na a na-ata m ahụhụ maka ịbụ 'onye na-edina ụdị onwe ya' dịka ha chere n'ihi ọdịdị nwanyị m na omume m
Abụghị m nwoke n'edina nwoke, abụ m nwanyị a mụrụ n'ụzọ dị iche n'ihi nkwarụ okike
Ihe m chere adabaghị n'ọdịdị m

Ịbụ nwoke mgbe a mụrụ m anaghị eme ka m bụrụ nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, ọ dịghị onye amụrụ nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, a mụrụ gị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, mgbe ahụ ị na-etolite n'ime nwoke ị họọrọ ka ị na-etolite wee mee ka ị bụrụ nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị
Nye m, nwoke na nwanyị ahụ bụ nwanyị
A mụrụ m nwoke mana ụbụrụ m, mmegharị aka m, atụmatụ m na mbuli ahum m na-arụ ọrụ dị ka nke nwanyị
Ịzụlite na amaghị ihe na-eme n'ahụ m mere ka m nwee mgbagwoju anya ma tọọ n'echiche
Enweghị m ike iso ndị ezinụlọ m kwurịta ya n'ihi na a na-akatọ ọdịdị nwanyị m anya n'ihi okpukpe ha ma enweghị m ike ịgwa ndị enyi m okwu n'ihi na ha agaghị aghọta ihe m na-agabiga
Enwetara m nkasi obi na egwu na nrọ
Enwere m olileanya nke ịbụ onye nweere onwe m , enweghị mkparị, enweghị ikpe na enweghị nsogbu
Ngabiga ya na ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa mere ka ọ chọọ ebe mgbaba na London, United Kingdom
Ọ hapụrụ Naịjirịa n'afọ 2004 iji biri na United Kingdom
Mgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara echiche sara mbara banyere gender dysphoria ya
Ọ malitere ịhụ ndị dọkịta nyeere ya aka site na njem ya ibụ nwanyị
O kwuru na ndụ ọhụrụ ya na UK dị ka eluigwe nọ n'ụwa n'ihi na ọ na-ebi ugbu a dị ka ezi onwe ya
O nwetara ebe obibi nke abụ abụ na Madam Jojo's Kitsch Cabaret na Soho, West End nke London
O mere ngosipụta oru ebe ahụ afọ iri ruo n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014 mgbe emechiri ebe ahụ
Ya na Scott Houzet dere ma mepụta ụfọdụ egwu na ọrụ egwu nke mbụ ya
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi catwalk na London na ndị ọzọ
O mere ihe ngosi nlereanya ejiji nye Ziad Ghanem na London Fashion Week maka oge engosi jiji nke anọ
O sonyekwara na njiharị ejiji ruo ihe karịrị afọ ise ma gosipụta otu oge atụmatụ ejiji ya
Miss sahhara gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere masta na mgbasa ozi dijitalụ na Mahadum London Metropolitan
O kwuru na ibe mgbasa ozi ya na ọ chọrọ ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na ọmụmụ gbasara nwoke na nwanyị na mmekọahụ n'ọdịnihu
Ikekwe, nke ga enye ya olu a pụrụ ịtụkwasị obi mgbe ọ na-akụziri ndị mmadụ banyere Mmekọahụ na mmekọahụ
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ akụkọ Naịjirịa na ndị na-ede blọgụ na-arụtụ aka ugboro ugboro na tweet Ebuka Obi-Uchendu, nke o kwuru na ọ maara Miss saHHara dị ka 'Clifford Oche'
Miss saHHara jụrụ nkwupụta ahụ ma jụ ibipụta aha ọmụmụ ya n'ozuzu, ọ siri ọnwụ na ibipụta aha ochie ya na foto ya enweghị mkpa maka onye ọ ghọrọ ibu

Ọ kowara na ọjọọ aha echefu ru echefu na onye ndi gbanwere ọdịdị okike ha nnọchịanya n'ekwesighi ha nwere ogho ọma eweta nke bu akpọmasi na ikpa oke site n' enweghị ezi nhọpụta banyere ndị gbanwere ọdịdị ha na gburugburu ụwa

O kwukwara na Ọrịa Sahhara Henson abụghị aha aguru ya,na Hensonbụ njirimara nnọchịanya o kepụtara iji kwụsị ndị n'éfè blogg I gbasa aha yaya mere ọ kpebiri na ọ gaghị egosiputa ezi aha ya ma ka egwu n'atu ya n'ihi ụdị mmaja transphobia na mmaja ọnwụ ọ n'enweta na websaiti
A maara ya maka esemokwu ya na ndị na-ede blọgụ Naịjirịa
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime arụmụka ya na ha sitere na akụkọ ha bipụtara banyere ya, nke o kwuru na ọ bụ 'ụgha', na edemede transphobic doro anya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ịkpọ ya 'nwoke gbanwere ọdịdị ya' na ịjụ iji nnọchiaha nwanyị kọwaa ya
Ọ na-aga na Facebook ya mgbe niile iji bipụta nzaghachi banyere isiokwu ndị ọ na-ewere dị ka transphobic na imebi ndị gbanwere ọdịdị ekere ha
O siri ọnwụ na nzaghachi ya abụghị mkparị, kama ọ bụ nkuzi ịnụ ọkụ n'obi nye ndị na-ede ma na-ekwu okwu banyere ndị gbanwere ọdịdị okike ha na ngalaba ọha
Usoro 'mmụta' ya dị ka ọ dịrị kwuo nwere ike mgbe ụfọdụ jedebe na arụmụka kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ ma ọ bụ agha okwu nye ya na ndị na-akwado ya
Okwu ya megide okpukpe emebeghị nke ọma na nti ndị Naijiria
Mgbe ọ bụla ọ na-ede isiokwu ọ bụla metụtara okpukpe, ihe odide ya na-adọta nzaghachi iwe
O kwuru na okpukpe niile bụ mmegbu ma bụrụ ihe ochie
Ọ nwetara nkatọ site n'aka ndị nkwado ya ha na-ekwu na ọ aka mmá ya ilekwasị anya n'ọrụ nkwado ya kama ikwupụta echiche ya banyere isiokwu ndị na-akpata nkewa dịka okpukpe
N'enweghị nsogbu site na nkatọ ahụ, ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ekwupụta obi nkoropụ ya banyere ihe mere ndị Afrịka ji jụ ịjụ okwukwe ha nke ọ kpọrọ 'Colonial relic'

Miss saHHara gara na peeji mgbasa ozi ya iji kụziere ndị na-ede blọgụ, ebe ọ boro ha ebubo na ha na-akwalite transphobia site n'ịkọ akụkọ na-ezighi ezi; 'Nke a abụghị mkparị, kama ọ bụ nkuzi' O mere ka o doo anya na ọ dịghị mgbe ọ bụ nwoke, na ndowe onwe ya dị ka nwanyị esiteghị n'aka onye ọ bụla ma e wezụga onwe ya
Ihe odide ahụ nwetara ihe karịrị otu narị okwu iji kwado ma megide nkwupụta ya
Ọrụ asọmpi ya malitere mgbe ọ kwagara London, England n'afọ 2004
O kwuru na ịhụnanya ya gbasara ịgosi mma na ije nsere ọkpa ya nọgidere na-abawanye kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ na-eji 'tmkpisi ọnụ ọkpa', n'ihi na a naghị ekwe ka ọ na-eyi akpụkpọ ụkwụ dị elu na Naịjirịa
Ọ kụziri nsere ọkpa na ịgosi mma n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma tupu ọ kwaga United Kingdom
Ọ bụ onye soro sọọ asọmpi na Andrew Logan 's Alternative Miss World mgbe mbụ ọ kwagara London, na-anọchite anya Nigeria
Ọ gbara onye nke abụọ
N'oge asọmpi ahụ, ọ pụtara na mgbasa ozi ụwa dị ka nwanyị gbanwere ọdịdị ya nke Naijiria luru ọgụ maka nnabata na ịha nhata nke LGBTQI + ndị ọzọ na Africa

N'afọ 2014, o meriri aha mbụ ya na mba ụwa, Eat Bulaga!'s Super Sireyna Worldwide 2014 na Manila, Philippines Ihe ngosi a bụ asọmpi ịma mma transgender, nke na-ewere ọnọdụ na ihe ngosi telivishọn kachasị ogologo n'ehihie n'ụwa, Eat Bulaga! Ọ bụ onye guzobere Miss Trans Global, asọmpi transgender dijitalụ, a malitere n'afọ 2020 iji mee ka a mara maka nsogbu nke ndị LGBTIQ n'ụwa niile
Mbipụta mbụ nke asọmpi ahụ ka emere n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na 12th nke Septemba, afọ 2020
Miss saHHara malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ gbasara ndị gbanwere ọdịdị okike ha a na-akpọ TransValid n'afọ 2014

Òtù ahụ malitere na mkpasa ozi #IamValid na #YouAreValid, ebe ndị gbanwere ọdịdị okike ha na ndị nsonye ha mere vidiyo nke onwe ha na-ekwupụta nkwado ha maka ndị gbanwere ọdịdị okike ha Dị ka nkwupụta ozi nke nzukọ ahụ si kwuo, ha nwere olileanya 'ịkwado echiche na-ezighị ezi, egwu, na ịkpọasị nke ndị transgender n'ụwa niile
Site na TransValid, ọ na-atụ anya ịkụziri ndị mmadụ ihe gbasara nsogbu mgbanwe ọdịdị okike site na iji mgbasa ozi dị iche iche na nnọkọ ọha na eze

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015, Miss saHHara mepụtara obere ihe nkiri maka TransValid nke akpọrọ The Deadly Price of Transphobia na Brazil, Vidio ahụ gosipụtara ihe isi ike na ihe ize ndụ nke ibi na Brazil dị ka nwanyị gbanwere ọdịdị okike ya

N'abalị́ iri atọ na otu nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2016,bụ International Transgender Day of Visibility, ya na Aleika Barros, Miss Trans Universe 2015 na ndị ọzọ gbanwere ọdịdị okike ha mara mma iji mee ka ndị gbanwere ọdịdị okike ha mara maka obodo gburugburu ụwa site na mgbasa ozi akpọrọ 'Abụ m Trans na enwere m ikike ibi ndụ'
Miss USA 2013 bụ asọmupi Miss USA nke iri isii na abụọ, nke emere na June 16, 2013 na The AXIS na Las Vegas, Nevada
Steeti iri ise na District of Columbia sọrọ mpi maka aha ahụ ma a na-egosi asọmupi ahụ na NBC
Onye na-apụ apụ bụ Nana Meriwether nke Maryland kpuchiri onye nọchiri ya bụ Erin Brady nke Connecticut na njedebe nke ihe omume ahụ

Jessica Billings, Miss Pennsylvania USA, onye meriri na ntuli aka a meriri n'elu iri na ise n'abalị ikpeazụ
Miss Texas USA, Alexandria Nugent, meriri votu Twitter kachasị n'etiti mmadụ iri kachasị elu, na-eme ka ọ nọrọ n'ime mmadụ isii kachasị elu
A họpụtara otu onye nnọchi anya si na steeti ọ bụla na District of Columbia na asọmupi steeti emere nke malitere na Julaị 2012 wee kwụsị na Jenụwarị 2013
Asọmupi steeti mbụ bụ Florida, nke emere na Julaị 14, 2012 dị ka e mere atụmatụ
Asọmupi ikpeazụ bụ Maine na Nevada, ha abụọ mere na Jenụwarị 27, n'afo 2013
Ndị nnọchi anya iri bụbu ndị mmeri Miss Teen USA steeti, ebe mmadụ abụọ bụbu ndị mmeri Miss America steeti na mmadụ abụọ ndị ọzọ bụkwa ndị mmeri Miss America's Outstanding Teen state
Courtney Gifford ghọrọ onye mbụ bụbu Miss America's Outstanding Teen contestant na-emeri Miss USA state title
Tupu telecast ikpeazụ, ndị nnọchiteanya ahụ sọrọ mpi na asọmpi mbụ, nke gụnyere ajụjụ ọnụ nzuzo na ndị ọka ikpe na ihe ngosi ngosi ebe ha na-asọmupi na uwe igwu mmiri na uwe mgbede
Asọmpi izizi ahụ weere ọnọdụ na June 12, n'afọ 2013, na elekere iri nke abalị (ET) nke Chet Buchanan na Nana Meriwether kwadoro, ma gbasaa ya n'ịntanetị na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Miss USA site na iyi

N'oge asọmupi ikpeazụ, mmadụ iri na ise kachasị elu sọrọ mpi n'uwe igwu mmiri, ebe mmadụ iri kachasị elu sọrọ mpi uwe mgbede, mmadụ isii kachasị elu sọrọ mpi na ajụjụ ikpeazụ nke otu ndị ọka ikpe bịanyere aka na ya
E kpebiri onye ikpeazụ nke isii site na ntuli aka Twitter

Miss World 2008, mbipụta nke 58 nke asọmupi Miss World, emere na 13 Disemba n'afo 2008 na Sandton Convention Centre na Johannesburg, South Africa
