Nna ya kwenyere na nka abụghị ọrụ, naanị ihe ntụrụndụ, ya mere Nasr chọtara onwe ya na-amụ ihe gbasara akụ na ụba na Mahadum Alexandria
Ntinye mbụ nke Nasr n'ime ihe nkiri nka Ijipt mere na 1995 mgbe ọ banyere n'ọrụ ya na asọmpi nke Ngalaba Ọdịbendị Ijipt haziri ma nata ihe nrite nke atọ
Otú ọ dị, ndị na-ese ihe ibe ya katọrọ ya maka ịbụ 'onye na-anọghị' na nka, ebe ọ na-amụbeghị ya na agụmakwụkwọ
Nasr banyere n'ihe nkiri nka mba ụwa na 2001 mgbe otu n'ime ụlọ ngosi nka ndị isi Itali, Galleria Continua, gosipụtara ọrụ ya

Nasr esonyewo n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi kemgbe ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye nke gụnyere ọnọdụ nke atọ na 7th Salon of Youth, asọmpi nke Ministry of Culture haziri na 1995, ihe nrite nke eserese na ihe ngosi Heliorama site na French Cultural Center na Cairo na 1997, Grand Prize na 8th International Cairo Biennale na 2001, ihe nrite Biennale site na Dakar Biennale nke Senegal na 2002, ihe nrite Ministri nke Ọdịbendị, Dakart Biennale, Dakar, Senegal na 2004 na Grand Prize, Sharjah Bienniale, UAE na 2005
Na Nọvemba 2008, Nasr guzobere otu Darb 1718

Darb 1718 bụ ebe nka na ọdịbendị nke oge a nke Ijipt nke dị na mpaghara Fustat nke Old Cairo Ọ bụ òtù na-enweghị uru edebanyere aha nke nwere ebumnuche nke ịbụ 'trampoline iji kwalite ọrụ nka nke oge a na-eto eto na Egypt'

Ọ na-ezube igosi nka nke oge a na nke mba ụwa, idebe ihe osise na idebe nchekwa data zuru oke nke nka na Egypt na mpaghara MENA, yana ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ihu agụmakwụkwọ site n'inye ụlọ ọrụ, ọrụ na ihe nkiri
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-achọkwa itinye aka na obodo Fustat site na ọrụ obodo na mmemme mgbasa ozi
Nasr sonyere na 2017 Venice Biennial na ntinye vidiyo na Egypt pavilion
Moawad GadElrab (5 Septemba 1929 - 23 Ọgọst 1983), bu ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara ahụike nke Ijipt
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ese ihe, onye edemede na prọfesọ nke anatomy nka na Faculty of Art Education, Zamalek (Mahadum Helwan) na 1950s na 1960s nke narị afọ gara aga
O sonyekwala n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka, ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ gọọmentị nwetara ihe osise ya, e gosipụtara ụfọdụ ihe osise ya na kọleji ahụike Kasr El Aini Hospital
A gbanwere ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya maka egwuregwu telivishọn, akụkọ ya na-apụta mgbe niile na akwụkwọ akụkọ n'akụkụ kọlụm kwa izu na akwụkwọ akụkọ Watani
Moba ma ọ bụ MobańBimoba bụ asụsụ bụ isi nke ndị Moba nke Togo na Ghana
Agbanyeghị, na Ghana, naanị
asentc iri isi isiiSP
nke agbụrụ Bimoba na-asụ asụsụ ahụ
E nwekwara ihe dị ka ndị na-asụ Moba puku abụọ na Burkina Faso
O nwere olumba abụọ (Moba Na Togo na Burkina Faso na Bimoba na Ghana)
A makwaara ìgwè asụsụ ahụ dị ka MobaīBimoba

ATM (Algérie Télécom Mobile) Mobilis ma ọ bụ naanị Mobilis (Arabic موبيليس, , styled mobilis in its logo), a subsidiary of Groupe Télécom Algérie [fr], bụ onye mbụ na otu n'ime ndị isi ọrụ ekwentị atọ na Algeria
Ọ ghọrọ onye nweere onwe ya n'August 2003
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2016, Mobilis bụ onye ọrụ mbụ na Algeria ka e nyere ya ikikere iji malite netwọk 4G

2016 na Ouargla na Hassi Messaoud, wee gbasaa na mpaghara ndị ọzọ Tlemcen, Constantine, Batna, Bordj Bou Arreridj, El Oued, Biskra, Boumerdes, Tipaza, Blida, Tizi Ouzou na Sidi Bel-Abbes, na 21 Disemba
N'afọ 2017, Mobilis nwere 4006% nke ngụkọta ahịa ekwentị mkpanaaka nke mba ahụ, na 10,204,002 3G debanyere aha na ihe na-erughị 3,505,803 4G debanyesiri aha (4726% na 3553% ahịa ahịa, n'otu n'otu)
Àtụ Mobile networks in Algeria
Mobolaji Akiode (ka amụrụ na Mee 12, 1982) bụ onye amụrụ n'Amerịka bụbu onye egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
A mụrụ ya na New Jersey, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Naịjirịa obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị
Akiode laghachiri United States mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu ma zụlite ya na Maplewood, New Jersey
A na-emegbu ya maka ịdị elu ya, mana ọ gara nke ọma n'agụmakwụkwọ na n'egwuregwu ma duru Columbia High School gaa asọmpi steeti 1998 tupu ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1999
Akiode nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji gbaa bọọlụ basketball na Mahadum Fordham
Na Fordham, Akiode meriri nkwanye ugwu niile n'afọ ya ma bụrụ onye ọkpụkpọ Fordham nke asatọ dekọọ akara 1,000 na 500 rebounds na ọrụ ya
O nwetakwara nnwale na WNBA's Detroit Shock na-esote ọrụ kọleji ya
Akiode gụrụ Accounting na Gabelli School of business, Fordham University, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2004
O nwetara nzere Mastas na ngalaba Business Administration na New York University Stern School of Business n'afọ 2014
Akiode nwetara agụmakwụkwọ iji gbaa bọọlụ basketball na Mahadum Fordham
Na Fordham, Akiode meriri nkwanye ugwu niile n'afọ ya ma bụrụ onye ọkpụkpọ Fordham nke asatọ dekọọ akara 1,000 na 500 rebounds na ọrụ ya
O nwetakwara nnwale na WNBA's Detroit Shock na-esote ọrụ kọleji ya
A kpọbatara ya na Fordhams University basketball Hall of fame n'afọ 2014
Isi IyiÀtụ NBA player statistics legend
Akiode bụ onye otu egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na 2004 Summer Olympics na 2006 Commonwealth Games
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fordham na nzere na ndekọ ego
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ nwetara ọrụ iji rụọ ọrụ na ESPN
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 2010 iji malite ogige basketball
N'afọ 2014, a kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ESPNW's Impact 25
Akiode na-ahazi ogige basketball kwa afọ nke a na-akpọ Hope for Girls basketball camp nke na-achọ ịzụlite ma nye ụmụ agbọghọ ndụmọdụ na ihe ọmụma nke basketball
O meela ohere maka ụmụ nwanyị igwu basketball na ịmụ ihe na mpụga Naịjirịa
Mode Gakuen Cocoon Tower(Japanese モード学園コクーンタワー)- ulọ elu dị elu na Tokyo(Isi obodo Japan)
Emechara na 2008
Onye bu Moderate bu onye no n'etiti echiche abuo, na choro iso wo eso maka otu ha diwo emee he
Na ekpere chi na politics, ndi moderate bu ndi bu n'etiti ndi Liberal ma ndi Conservative
Ha nwere ike so onye ha choro
Modern Arab Association (Arabic) bụ ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ Ijipt
Hamdi Mustafa hiwere ya na 1960, o bipụtara akwụkwọ ntụnye na ngbanwe maka ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ Egypt, gụnyere usoro Silāḥ al-Tilmīdh (Ngwa ngwa nke ụmụ akwụkwo)
Na 1984 ọ malitere ibipụta ọtụtụ usoro akwụkwọ n'asụsụ Arabic n'okpuru aha Rewayat (Egypt Pocket Novels)
Usoro usoro ahụ bụ ihe ewu ewu karịsịa 'n'ime afọ 1980 na 1990'
Modern Arab Association abụwo onye na-ebipụta ma na-ekesa Rewayat n'ụwa niile na-asụ Arabic
Ndị edemede mbụ dere maka Modern Arab Association n'oge a bụ Nabil Farouk na Sharif Shawqi
E bipụtara ihe karịrị usoro Iri anọ gụnyere

Okwu bụ ejiji nchekwa ahụ ma ọ bụ ejiji dị mma na-arụtụ aka n'ụdị ejiji nke ụmụ nwanyị na-eyi uwe n'ekpugheghi ahụ ha, ọkachasị n'ụzọ ga-akwalite mmụọ nsọ nke onwe onye nke okwukwe ha kwadokwara nke bụ okpukpe ma ọ bụ mmasị onwe onye
Nkọwa ziri ezi nke 'ikpụchi onwe' dịgasị iche na ọdịbendị na mba
Enweghị nkọwa doro anya n'ihi na ọ na-emetụta ọdịbendị na ọdịbendị nke mba ọ bụla

E wezụga nkọwa dị iche iche, ha niile kwenyere n'echiche ahụ na ejiji ikpuchi ahụ pụtara uwe na-enweghị ka ó si jide mmadụ n'ahụ, ejiji dị mma na ikpuchi ahụ dịka onye siri chọọ na nnagide onye ahụ si dị
Okwu ahụ bụ 'nchekwaba' nwere ike ịnwe nkọwa dịgasị iche iche gafee nke okpukpe na ọbụna n'ime ha

Nyitewara nwekwara ike ịdị; dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị Ndị otu Kraịst, ndị Juu, na ndị Alakụba na-ekpuchi isi ha, ụmụ nwanyị Ndị Ụzọ Kraịst na-ekpu ichafu isi, ụmụ nwanyị ndị Juu na-eyi tichel, na ụmụ nwanyị Alakụba nwere hijab
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2015, e mere mkparịta ụka ndị ọrụ ụwa na Turin na ebumnuche nke ịkọwa ntuziaka maka ejiji mkpuchi onwe
Ndị ọkà mmụta dị ka prọfesọ Britain Reina Lewis nke London College of Fashion amụọla ihe a na-abawanye
N'etiti ọrụ ya na isiokwu ahụ anyị nwere ike ịhọta 'Modest Fashion Styling Bodies, Mediating Faith' (2013) na 'Muslim Fashion Contemporary Style Cultures' (2015)
Ndị Alakụba na ndị Juu na-eyi uwe ejiji iji soro ntuziaka okpukpe
Ọ bụ ezie na nke a na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ụdị inye ike

A ka nwere 'echiche na-ezighi ezi n'ozuzu na uwe ejiji mkpuchi bụ mmegbu, ka Michelle Honig, onye nta akụkọ ejiji ndị Ọtọdọks nke ndị Juu na onye isi okwu n'oge ọnwa ejiji na Mahadum New York maka nzukọ site na nhazi ejiji
Ma ọ bụrụ na ụmụ nwanyị nọ nọ na mba ndị nwere onwe ha ka na-ahọrọ ikpuchi ahụ ha, mgbe ahụ ha emeela nhọrọ nke onwe Ha nwere ụlọ ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, ụfọdụ ndị na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị akatọwo ejiji mkpuchi ahụ, na-ewere ya dị ka echiche 'na-enweghị isi'

N'afọ 2019, mgbe obere ihe ngosi ejiji nke e mere na Frankfurt, Germany, Inge Bell nke otu Terre des Femmes kwuru na ọ bụ 'nkatọ n'ihu ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị n'ụwa niile na-achọghị iyi okpu isi ma ọ bụ chọọ iwepụ ya'

Akwụkwọ ozi onye na-eme ngagharị iwe zigara na magazin Emma kpọrọ ihe ngosi ahụ mwakpo a na-awakpo ma ndị na-eme ihe gbasara ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'ụlọ ma ndị mba ọzọ, na-ekwukwa na 'n'afọ ọ bụla, a na-ata ọtụtụ puku ụmụ nwanyị nọ na Iran ahụhụ maka imebi iwu ejiji a'
Uwe ejiji mkpuchi n'ofe okpukpe na-egosipụta nkwekọrịta na ekwesighi ịnwale ya dị ka ihe na-egbochi ejiji
Akara na-emepụta atụmatụ na nchịkọta nke onye Alakụba, onye Juu, Onye Kraịst, onye Hindu nwere ike iyi n'ụdị
Dolce & Gabbana, H&M, na Uniqlo bụ naanị aha ole na ole batara n'akụkụ ejiji mkpuchi ahụ, na-eme uwe na-ekpuchi akụkụ ka ukwuu nke ahụ ka ọ na-enye ụmụ nwanyị ohere ịnwale ihe ọhụrụ
[mgbe?]

Modupe Adeyeye listen (amụrụ na 29 Julaị 1992) bụ onye England na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlerẹanya, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya dị ka Faith Olubunmi na EastEnders na EastEndors E20 na Blessing Chambers na Hollyoakslisten (help·info)
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na London, aha ya 'Modupe' pụtara 'M na-eto ma ọ bụ na-ekele Chineke' na Yoruba
Ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri Our Girl and My Murder, yaṅa ndị dọkịta
O mechara pụta na ihe nkiri 2014 Honeytrap, n'akụkụ onye bụbu onye E20 Tosin Cole
Na 21 Febụwarị 2014, Adeyeye sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Hollyoaks dị ka Blessing Chambers, e mechara kpughee na àgwà ya bụ transgender

Blessing malitere mmekọrịta ya na Dennis Savage (Joe Tracini), ma mesịa chọta onwe ya na nwunye Dennis nwụrụ aṅwụ Leanne Holiday (Jessica Forrest) na-asọ mpi, onye ajọ onye na-edina mmadụ n'ike bụ Finn O'Connor (Keith Rice) wakporo ya n'ụzọ obi ọjọọ wee malite imerụ onwe ya ahụ mgbe ezinụlọ ya gọnahụrụ ya maka ịbụ transgender
Ọ pụtara n'oge ikpeazụ ya na 21 Nọvemba 2014
Modupe Omo-Eboh (1922 na 25 Febụwarị 2002) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ọka iwu Naịjịrịa bụ onye ọka ikpe nwanyị mbụ nke mba ahụ
A mụrụ Modupe Akingbehin na Lagos Steeti na 1922
Nne ya bụ nwa nwa nke onye aristọcrat Lagos Oshodi Tapa na nwa nwa nke Bishop Samuel Ajayi Crowther, onye n'onwe ya bụ nwa Eze Abiodun nke Oyo
Onye na-ahụ mba n'anya Herbert Macaulay bụ nwanne nna nne ya
Ọ gara Queen's College, Lagos tupu ọ mụọ iwu na London
A kpọrọ Omo-Eboh ka ọ bịa n'ụlọ mmanya Bekee na Lincoln's Inn na 14 Machị 1953

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu, onye majie, onye isi majie, nchịkwa-ọchịchị na onye nlekọta ọha na eze, onyé nduzi nke ndị ọkàiwụ ọha na eze na onye na-arụ ọrụ onye ọka ikpe na Benin City na Thursday 13 November 1969, nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa
N'afọ 1976, a họpụtara ya na ndị ọka ikpe Lagos
Omo-Eboh nwụrụ na 25 Febụwarị 2002
E nwere Justice Modupe Omo-Eboh Street na Lagos aha ya
[citation needed]
Di Omo-Eboh bụ onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe site na Edo State

Modupe Oshikoya (amụrụ na 2 Mee 1954) bụ onye bụbu nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu track and field si Naijirịa, onye na-asọmpi na sprint ụmụ nwanyị na ihe omume ogologo oge n'oge ọrụ ya
Ọ bụ onye otu oge Olympic (1972), ma sọkwara mpi na heptathlon
Oshikoya ritere ihe nrite ọla edo ise na All-Africa Games (1973 na 1978)
Oshikoya meriri ma merie ọla edo maka Mahadum ya na USA, UCLA na mita 100, Long Jump, 100 mita hurdles na hepthatlon na asọmpi NCAA na 1982
Àtụ Footer Commonwealth Champions Long Jump WomenÀtụ Footer All-Africa Champions High Jump WomenÀtụ Footer All-Africa Champions Long Jump Women
Modupe Ozolua (amụrụ na 10 Ọktọba 1973, na Benin City, Nigeria) bụ onye ọrụ ebere na onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Body Enhancement Ltd, ọ bụkwa onye isi oche guzobere Empower 54 Project Initiatives (Empower 54) nke a maara dị ka Body Enhanement Annual Reconstructive Surgery (BEARS) Foundation
Ozolua bụ nwa nke Oba (Eze) Ozolua nke alaeze Benin, Edo State, Nigeria
Ozolua bụ nwa ìkpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne anọ nke Prince Julius I
Ozolua, onye nkuzi, na Princess Olua Mary S
Ozolue (née Otaru), nwa eze na onye ọchụnta ego si Ososo, Akoko-Edo LGA, Edo State
Aha ya 'Modupe' pụtara 'M na-ekele' na Yoruba
Ọ tolitere n'ụlọ́ eze nke alaeze Benin, ebe nna nna ya, Oba Ozolua chịrị dị ka eze
Ozolua gụrụ njikwa azùmahịa na California, USA

Na Southwestern College, a kpọbatara ya na Alpha Pi Epsilon, isi nke Phi Theta Kappa ma mara ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ pụtara ìhè site na Southwestern Dean's Honorary List na National Dean's List (1994 - 1995)
Ozolua nwere nwa nwoké, Prince Oluwaseun Ozolua-Osunbade, ma na-agagharị n'etiti Naịjirịa na Atlanta
Ozolua laghachiri Naịjịrịa n'afọ 2001 wee malite Body Enhancements Ltd, ụlọ ọrụ ịwa ahụ ịchọ mma
N'agbanyeghị ịma aka nke inwe ọrụ esemokwu na mba Afrịka na-agbaso omenala, Body Enhancement Ltd ghọrọ onye ọsụ ụzọ na ngalaba ịma mma na ahụike na Naịjirị
Ozolua jiri ikpo okwu nke azụmahịa ya nyere iji kụziere ọha na eze banyere nchekwa nke ịwa ahụ plastik, na-emebi akụkọ ifo ndị a ma ama n'oge ahụ
[citation needed]

N'afọ 2003, o guzobere Empower 54, nke a maara n'oge gara aga dị ka Body Enhancement Foundation, ma ọ bụ Body Enhancing Annual Reconstructive Surgery (BEARS), otu mba ụwa na-ahụ maka enyemaka nke raara onwé ya nye inye enyemaka enyemaka dịka ọrụ ahụike, mkpochapụ agụụ, agụmakwụkwọ, inye ụmụ nwanyị ike, na mmemme ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ nye ndị Afrịka na-enweghị ihe ọgaranya
Achịbishọp Desmond Tutu bụ onye nkwado nke Empower 54
Enyemaka enyemaka niile enyere site na Empower 54 bụ n'efu nye ndị na-erite uru

N'okpuru nduzi Ozolua, atụmatụ 'Rise Above Terror' nke Empower 54 anọwo na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịmezigharị ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka ndị lanarịrị otu ndị na-eyi ọha egwu Boko Haram na Naịjịrịa, site na ọrụ onwe onye na agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụaka nọ n'ogige IDP
Ozolua n'onwe ya na-eduga ndị otu Empower 54 n'ime obodo ndị Boko Haram wakporo n'akụkụ ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ nke North-East Nigeria iji nyere ndị lanarịrị mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu aka

N'otu n'ime ọrụ nke ntọala ahụ, ọ chọpụtara ụmụaka na-eri nri na-adịghị mma nke ukwuu a napụtara n'agbụ Boko Haram ma mee ka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Empower 54 na Gọọmentị Steeti Borno dị mfe ịkwaga ha na Maiduguri maka ọgwụgwọ CMAM ngwa ngwa
A kpọpụrụ ụmụaka 1,500 na Bama, tinyere ezinụlọ ha

Modupeola Fadugba (a mụrụ n'afọ 1985, Togo) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria, na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Nigeria
Modupeola Fadugba gụrụ maka injinia, akụnụba, na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ natara nzere MA na Economics na Mahadum Delaware, ma nwee MEd na Mahadum Harvard
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Diplomats Naijiria
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ntorobịa ya na England na United States
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya
Usoro ya Dreams from the Deep End, nke o mepụtara n'oge obibi na International Studio na Curatorial Program na New York, bụ nke a gụnyere na ihe ngosi o mere naanị ya na Gallery 1957

Ihe ngosi ya gụnyere Heads Up, Keep Swimming na Temple Muse na Lagos n'afọ 2017, Synchronised Swimming & Drowning na Ed Cross Fine Art na London na 2017, Prayers, Players & Swimmers na Cité internationale des arts na Paris na 2017, na Dreams from the Deep End na New York na 2018, nke a tụlere na ArtForum International
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ otu na-eme ihe ngosi, nke gụnyere Royal Academy Summer Exhibition na London na 2017, Afriques Capitales na Lille, France na 2017, na Art Energy na London na 2015
A họpụtara ọrụ ya na 2016 Dakar Biennale, ebe e nyere ya nnukwu ihe nrite site n'aka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta na Senegal
Ọrụ ya bụ The People's Algorithm natara ihe nrite 2014 El Anatsu's Outstanding Production Prize
Ihe osise Modupeola Fadugba Teach Us How To Shoki In Pink pụtara n'ihu mkpuchi nke Arabia's Harper's Bazaar n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Smithsonian National Museum of African Art, Mahadum Delaware, Sindika Dokolo Foundation na Onye isi ala Liberia, Ellen Johnson Sirleaf
Fadugba nwere Smithsonian Institute Research Fellowship na 2020
N'otu afọ ahụ, o nwere ebe obibi na Headlands Center for the Arts
N'oge okpomọkụ nke afọ 2018, Modupeola Fadugba nọrọ oge ụfọdụ na Harlem Honeys & Bears, mgbe ọ na-aga mmemme obibi na International Studio na Curatorial Program na New York
Dreams from The Deep End bụ usoro eserese na ntinye, nke mbụ e gosipụtara na Gallery 1957 na Accra, Ghana
Harlem Honeys & Bears bụ ndị otu ndị oji niile na-egwu mmiri maka ụmụ amaala ndị agadi na-ezukọ na Hansborough Recreation Center na New York City

Ndị otu a anọwo kemgbe afọ 1979, na ka ọ na-erule afọ 2018, ha nwere ndị otu ịrị abụọ na anọ nọ n'ọrụ ndị di afọ sitere na afọ iri ise na asatọ ruo ịrị itoolu na ise, ndị na-ezụkọ ma na-asọmpi mgbe niile
Usoro eserese ahụ dabere na nyocha Fadugba na otu ahụ, bụ nke onwe ya ma jikọta ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị njirimara nke Black America
A na-ejikọta igwu mmiri na agbụrụ, na ikpe ziri ezi na US
Nnyocha sitere na CDC na-egosi na mmiri mgbagbu n'etiti ụmụaka ojii dị okpukpu 14 karịa ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụaka ọcha
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ na-arịgo ruo ọdịiche dị ugboro 55 mgbe nnyocha ahụ na-atụle ọnwụ mmiri ọdọ mmiri

Ọdịiche ahụ bụ ihe nketa nke nkewa na US, ebe a na-egbochi obodo ndị isi ojii ịnweta ọdọ mmiri ọha na ezeMaka onye na-ese ihe, igwu mmiri na-ejikọta ya na egwu nwata nke oké osimiri, nke ọ meriri naanị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, a manyere ya ịga ọmụmụ igwu mmiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Dreams from the Deep End na-egosi ndị Harlem Honeys & Bears na-egwu mmiri na gburugburu ọdọ mmiri ahụ
N'ime ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ndị ahụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ahụ na-enweghị ihu, onye na-ese ihe na-ejikarị agba pastel, na usoro ntinye aka ya
N'ime ndị ọzọ, ọ na-egosi ihu ndị na-egwu mmiri nke eserese ndị ahụ dabeere na ya, mgbe ụfọdụ na-eji usoro ọkụ, mgbe ụfọdụ na-enweghị
Mmiri ọdọ mmiri na-abụkarị monochromatic acha anụnụ anụnụ, oji, ma ọ bụ ọlaedo, na-eme ka ndị na-egwu mmiri pụta ìhè site na azụ

Moesha Buduong bụ onye na - egosi ihe na TV Ghana, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlere anya bụ onye amakwara maka inye onye nta akụkọ CNN Christiane Amanpour ajụjụ na-akpata esemokwu gbasara mmekọahụ, ịhụnanya na okike
N'April 2018, Buduong nwetara nkatọ sitere n'aka ndị Ghana
maka ajụjụ ọnụ na-akpata arụmụka ọ gwara onye nta akụkọ CNN Christiane Amanpour
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a, Buduong kwuru na ụmụ nwanyị Ghana na- eji ụmụ nwoke dịka isi ihe ha ji-akpata ego, ebe ọ bụ na akụ na ụba siri ike
Ha na-eme nke a site n’iso ndị ikom na-enwe mmekọahụ
A na-ehota ya na o kwuru na 'Na Ghana, akụ na ụba anyị bụ otú ị ga-achọ riri onye ga-elekọta gị
Ị gaghị enweta ego zuru oke dịka nwanyị ebe a

N'ihi na ọbụlagodi mgbe ịchọrọ ị nweta ụlọ, na Ghana ha na ga were ụgwụ afọ abụọ, m ka amalite ọrụ ebee ebe ka m ga-enweta ego ịkwụ ụgwọ?' Okwu ya nwetara nkatọ kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ site n'aka ma ndị nwoke ma ndị nwanyị bụ ndị chere na ọ na-ese onyinyo na-adịghị mma banyere ụmụ nwanyị Ghana (na site na mgbakwunye) ụmụ nwanyị Africa
Ndị a ma ama dị ka John Dumelo, Lydia Forson, Eazzy, DKB na Afia Odo na-ekerịta echiche ha na Twitter, ọtụtụ n'ime ha adịghị mma
Buduong mechara rịọ mgbaghara n'ihu ọha
Ọtụtụ ndị chere na echiche Buduong na-esemeokwu a bụ n'ihi ndị ihe nna nna juru ebe niile n'ọtụtụ obodo taa, ọkachasị na Ghana
Ọtụtụ ndị inyom katọrọ Buduong, na-arụ ụka na e nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị Ghana na-arụsi ọrụ ike bụ ndị nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na-enweghị nkwado ego nwoke
N'okpuru Moesha Foundation ya, o jiri ụbọchị ọmụmụ 29th ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Bilaw Basic School na Upper East Region, bụ ebe obodo ya dị
O nyere akpa ụlọ akwụkwọ, akwụkwọ na ihe mmụta ndị ọzọ dị mkpa

Laura Monyeazo Abebe (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 29 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1989), nke a maara dịka Moet Abebe, bụ onye egwuregwu vidio na Naijiria, onye na-egosi telivishọn, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ahụ maka nri
Njem ya n'ime ihe a ma ama bịara mgbe o kpebiri ịlaghachi Naịjirịa iji nweta ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi TV
Ọnwa atọ mgbe ọ laghachiri Lagos, Nigeria, ọ gara nyocha maka Soundcity TV, ọ gafere nyocha ahụ wee malite ịrụ ọrụ maka Soundcity TV dị ka onye na-eweta TV na onye mmepụta
Ọ ghọrọ ihu a ma ama na Soundcity TV dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi otu na otu, Body & Soul na ihe ngosi ngụkọ zuru ụwa ọnụ
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Soundcity, o nwere ohere inweta ihe nkiri ole na ole na usoro TV dịka Red Card, Oasis na Living Arrangement
N'afọ 2016, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Soundcity Radio 985fm ebe ọ na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi a ma ama n'ehihie a na-akpọ 'The Takeover' site na 2-6pm Monday ruo ubochi Friday
Ya na nne ya mepere ụlọ ọrụ Event Management and Catering Company nke a na-akpọ LM Occasions
A mụrụ ya na United Kingdom, ọ gara Corona Ikoyi Primary School maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, Dowen College maka otu afọ ebe ọ gara akụkụ nke agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ gara Woldingham School na St
Teresa's Secondary School dịkwa na Surrey ebe ọ gara GCSEs na A-Levels

N'afọ 2008, ọ banyere na Mahadum nke Manchester, ebe ọ gụrụ Iwu Mgbe ọ nọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ nwere mmasị dị ukwuu n'ọtụtụ ihe omume ndị ọzọ dịka ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha, ime ihe nkiri, egwuregwu na ịgba egwu nke mụbara ma zụlite echiche okike ya nke ga-abara ya uru dị ukwuu mgbe e mesịrị na ndụ
Abebe sonyeere Soundcity TV, ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn na-egwu egwu n'obodo ukwu, ebe ọ nwetara ndị na-eso ya
O gosipụtara ndị egwu Naịjirịa kachasị elu na ihe ngosi redio ya dịka Vector (rapper), 2Baba, Olamide, Chidinma na D'banj
Abebe gosipụtara njirimara ya na ntụrụndụ mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na TV ole na ole nke gụnyere Red Card, Oasis na Living Arrangement
Ime ihe nkiri ya enyewo ya ohere na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ na mgbasa ozi Nijiria

Abebe emeela ọtụtụ ihe omume red carpet, ụfọdụ dị ka onye ọbịa na ndị ọzọ dị ka onye na-elekọta kapeeti uhie, Meets media enyela ya onyinye dị ka 'Personality of the Month' ma họpụta ya maka ọtụtụ onyinye dịka onye na-egosi TV nke afọ site na Exquuisite Magazine na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Moffat Takadiwa (b
1983) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe n'oge a
A mụrụ Moffat Takadiwa na Tengwe, na mpaghara ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Hurungwe ebe ọ tolitere
Mgbe ahụ, ọ kwagara n'obodo Harare, ebe a maara ya dị ka 'nwoke mkpofu ime mmụọ' n'ihi nrụnye ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ọ na-emepụta site na ihe mkpofu
Takadiwa bikwara na South Africa nwa oge
Ọ bụ ebe o mepụtara njikọ aka na mmekorita nke na-eme ka ọrụ nka ya marawanye
Ọ na-ekwu maka ọdịbendị ihe onwunwe, ọnọdụ ime mmụọ na gburugburu ebe obibi
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ gbanwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke a gbahapụrụ n'afọ ndị na-adịgide adịgide ka ọ bụrụ ebe nka na-aga nke ọma na obodo Mbare
A na-akpọ oghere ahụ Mbare Art Space, ebe a ka o wuru ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, mana ọ na-akpọkwa ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ ka ha na ya rụọ ọrụ
Takadiwa malitere igosi ọrụ ya n'ụzọ ọkachamara n'afọ 2008, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-amalite First Floor Gallery na Harare, nke bụzi ụlọ ngosi dị mkpa nke onwe ya
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ
Takadiwa, onye ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na obodo, na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a site na Mbare Art Space
N'ịbụ onye chọtara ndekọ pụrụ iche iji wuo ọrụ ya, Takadiwa, bụ ugbu a otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na Zimbabwe nke oge a
A na-egosi ọrụ ya n'ebe dị iche iche site na Los Angeles ruo Johannesburg; Harare ruo Tokyo na ọtụtụ ebe dị n'etiti
Takadiwa bụ onye a zụkwara na Harare Polytechnic ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta nzere BA Honors na Fine Art
Otu n'ime ihe ndị o dere dị ugbu a na nchịkọta Jay Z
2018 - Framed in Colonial Lenses, Raw Spot Gallery, Mahadum Rhodes
2017 - Say Hello to English, Tyburn Gallery, London
2016 - Across Borders, Whatiftheworld, Cape Town
2015 - Foreign Objects, Tyburn Gallery, London
2012 - Africa not reachable, First Floor Gallery, Harare
Chief Mofia Tonjo Akobo (nwụrụ n'afọ 2020) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye na-eme mkpọsa na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi na nchịkwa akụ
Ọ bụ Minista mbụ nke Petroleum Resources na gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa
Akobo ghọrọ Onye isi oche nke Southern Minorities Movement ma hazie nguzobe nke Union of Niger Delta
A mụrụ ya na Abonnema n'ezinụlọ Mary John Fyneface nke Abonnema na Nathaniel Tonjo Akobo nke Tombia
Agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya gụnyere ịmụ ihe na Bishop Crowther Memorial School Abonnema, Central school Eha-Amufu na Tombia School, Tombia
Agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya dị na Government College Umuahia site n'afọ 1949 ruo n'afọ 1955 ebe ọ ghọrọ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ (1954/1955)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dị elu na Mahadum Ibadan site n'afọ 1956 ruo 1960
Ọ gakwara ụlọ ọgwụ Mahadum site na 1960 ruo 1963, ma rụọ ọrụ Internship Medical na Lagos University Teaching Hospital site n'afọ 1963 ruo 1964
N'afọ 1955, e nyere ya Elder Demster Lines nke Unilever Brothers Group scholarship na United Kingdom maka njem agụmakwụkwọ izu atọ gafee London, Liverpool, Brighton na North Wales
Ọ lụrụ Data Ine Akobo, nke a mụrụ Amachree, onye osote onye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ nke Rivers State University of Science and Technology ma nwee ụmụ na ụmụ

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Royal Orthopedic Hospital Igbobi Yaba, General Hospital Marina, Lagos, Federal Airport Medical Unit Kano, Five Battalions MRS Kano site n'afọ 1964 ruo n'afọ 1966, General Hospital Yenegoa, Eastern Nigeria site n'afọ 1966 ruo 1968, General Hospital Aba site na Eprel 1968-August 1968 na 3rd Nigerian Army Medical Corps site na Septemba 1968 ruo Jenụwarị 1970
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1969, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche, Rivers State Sports Council na onye otu Nigeria National Sports Commission, site n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1972 na Ọgọọst afọ 1973
Ọ bụ Kọmishọna maka Ọrụ ma mesịa bụrụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ego na Rivers State Executive Council n'etiti afọ 1973 na 1974
N'afọ 1967 na 1969, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị agha nke atọ nke Benjamin Adekunle duziri
N'afọ 1975, a họpụtara ya n'ime Kọmitii Federal dị ka minista mbụ na-ahụ maka Ngalaba Petroleum na Energy nke e mepụtara ọhụrụ
Na Disemba afọ 1975, dị ka minista OPEC na Vienna, Akobo so na ndị minista e jidere n'oge ndị na-eyi ọha egwu Carlos
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kansụl ndị isi nke General Murtala Mohammed ma onye isi ala ọhụrụ General Olusegun Obasanjo jidere ya mana e zighachiri ya na ngalaba nke atụmatụ akụ na ụba na mmepe ruo 1977
O mechiri ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nke ụlọ nrụpụta Warri ma kwalite mmepe nke ụlọ nrụnye Kaduna
O sonyere n'ịmepụta ECOWAS na ọkwa minista na nguzobe nke Niger Delta Basin Development Authority
N'afọ 1978, ọ laghachiri Port Harcourt ka ọ bụrụ onye isi otu ọrụ ahụike nke TEME Clinic Association na Port-Harcourt nke ya na ndị isi ya, George Organ na Peterside guzobere
N'inwe mmasị dị ukwuu na mmepe nke mpaghara Niger Delta, Akobo tinyere aka n'ịmepụta IZON National Congress ebe ọ bụ onye guzobere (1991/92)
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Movement for National Reformation n'okpuru onyeisi oche nke Chief Anthony Enahoro CFR, na Southern Minorities Movement nke General David Ejoor duziri

Akobo mechara bụrụ Onye isi oche nke Southern Minorities Movement ma hazie nguzobe nke Union of Niger Delta nke bụ njikọ nke mpaghara Niger Delta dị ka Southern Minorities Mouement, Commonwealth of the Niger Delta Coalition, MOSOP na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ agbụrụ pere mpe na mpaghara ahụ
N'etiti ndị ọzọ na-etinye aka dị ka onye na-eme ngagharị iwe gụnyere
Akobo nwụrụ na 13 Machị 2020 mgbe ọ rịasịrị obere ọrịa ma lie ya na Satọdee 10 Ọktoba 2020 n'obodo ya dị na Tombia, Degema Local Government Area Of Rivers State
Mofu bụ aha maka agbụrụ dị iche iche na asụsụ ha na-asụ n'ebe okirikiri ugwu Cameroon, nso ókèala(àgbàtà) ya na Naịjirịa
Ndị otu Mofu bi na Ugwu Mandara nke Far North Province nke Cameroon
Ụfọdụ n'ime ìgwè ndị a na-anabata aha 'Mofu', dịka ọmụmaatụ Mofu-Duvangar, Mofu- Durum, Mofu -Wazang, Mofu, Meri, na Mofu-Gudur
Ndị ọzọ anaghị eji aha 'Mofu'
Ha na-eji naanị Zulgo, Gemjek, Mbuko, ma ọ bụ Moloko
Ha na-eji aha ndị ahụ na-ezo aka n'onwe ha na asụsụ ha
Ọtụtụ n'ime ìgwè ndị nwere akara Mofu na-akpọ onwe ha 'Ndị Ugwu' ma ọ bụ asụsụ ha dị ka 'Asụsụ Ugwu'
Asụsụ Mofu bụ asụsụ dị iche iche nke alaka BiuńMandara nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Chadic
E gosipụtara Mofu-Wazan na 2007 documentary Master of the Killer Ants, ihe omume Nova
Mofu bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Afamdi wu aha otu ezinulo Africa
Aha ofodu ndi ezinulo nka bu Afam, Ahmadi, Amara, Emecca, Halimnye, Isa, Mmadu, Nnadi, Nnamdi, Nnenadi, Onwa na ndi ozo
Ezinulo Afamdi choro ka Niger na Nigeria di etu South Africa diri; Etu ndi South Africa bu ndi Beke na ndi oji otu ahu ka ndi ezinulo Afamdi choro ka ndi Niger na Nigeria bu ndi Arab na ndi Oji
Cheta na oburo ndi Arab nile but ndi Muslim, ndi Muslim nile a bughi ndi Arab
Afamdi bu okwu na dialect Anioma, nwota aha nka bu na Aha mu diri
Mgbe ha muru otu nwata bu mgbe ezinulo Afamdi ji but ihe ezie

Nwata nka ha muru mesi nyere onwe ya aha nke o choro Mana na izizi, nwata nka te were aha nnanna nne ya Wu Mogbue nuhi na ndi umu Mogbue Wu ndi xuo ya site na mgbe nwata nka di afo other mana nne nwata nka ekwero ya ka nwata ji iwe kwuru na 'Gi ka mu jiri aha nnanna nne mu ga eme ma Afamdi?'

Mohale Mashigo, amụrụ Kgomotso Carol Mashigo (nke a makwaara ya na aha ogbo ya ' Black Porcelain ') bụ onye South Afrika nwetara ihe nrite onye na-abụ abụ, onye na-agụ abụ, onye edemede na onye bụbu onye mgbasa ozi redio

Akwụkwọ akụkọ mpụta mbụ ya The Yearning (Pan Macmillan, 2016) meriri afo 2017 University of Johannesburg Prize for South Afrikan Debut Writing wee depụta aha ya maka International Dublin Literary Award 2018
O bi na Cape Town
A mụrụ Mohale na Mapetla, Soweto, na afo 1983
Ọ na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ na-eji usoro egwu na okwu okwu eme ihe
Dị ka onye na-egwu egwu, ọ na-eme ihe n'okpuru aha Black Porcelain
Edepụtara egwu ya na mba 36 yana album mpụta mbụ, Invincible Summer, meriri abụọ Wawela Music Awards na June afo 2013
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mpụta mbụ nke Mashigo, The Yearning, nke Pan Macmillan bipụtara na Mee afo 2016

A kọwawo ya dị ka 'mgbakwụnye mgbanaka na ọganihu agụmagụ South Africa ugbu a', akụkọ a kọrọ 'na-adọrọ mmasị, njirimara enweghị ngwa agha, amamihe nke aghụghọ na ọchị aghụghọ' Mashigo kwuru na o dere ya 'dị ka akụkọ ọgwụgwọ bụ maka onwe m

Akwụkwọ ahụ dum gbasara ihe nzuzo na ka anyị si gwọọ onwe anyị site n'oge gara aga' Ọ meriri ihe nrite afo 2016 nke Mahadum Johannesburg maka South Africa Debut Writing wee depụta aha ya maka International Dublin Literary Award afo 2018
Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na-agụnye Intruders (Picador Africa, 2018), nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi na-enweghị atụ, na N'ofe Osimiri, ihe ngosi nke ihe nkiri ahụ n'otu aha ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ede akwụkwọ maka Kwezi, usoro akwụkwọ egwu egwu nke edobere na obodo South Afrika nke oge a
Mashigo meriri ihe nrite akwukwo mbu Philida na afo 2020
Mohamadou Sumareh (amụrụ na 20 Septemba 1994) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu maka otu Malaysia Super League Johor Darul Ta'zim
A mụrụ ya na Gambia, ọ na-anọchite anya ndị otu mba Malaysia
Sumareh nwetara nwa amaala Malaysia site na ịbụ nwa amaala na 2018 ma nọchite anya ndị otu mba ha kemgbe ahụ
Ndị na-akwado Pahang akpọwo ya 'Keliboy'
Mohamadou Sumareh malitere ọrụ ya na Terengganu na Jenụwarị 2012
Sumareh kwagara Polis Di Raja Malaysia na December 2012
Na December 2015 o sonyeere Perlis, na-eme egwuregwu 19 egwuregwu na-ebute ihe mgbaru ọsọ 5
Okwu Sumareh na Perlis akwụsịghị ogologo oge na na December 2016 ọ sonyeere Pahang, na-eme egwuregwu 98 na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ 17 na afọ 5
Sumareh sonyeere ọgbakọ Johor Darul Ta'zim ugbu a na February 2021
N'ihe gbasara otuto onwe onye, Sumareh nwere otu nturu ugo nturu ugo Malaysian Midfielder nke Year n'aha ya
Mohamed Aamer (Arabic) (a mụrụ na Machị 17, 1986) bụ onye Ijipt na-eme ihe nkiri
Na mbido ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya, ọ pụtara na usoro a ma ama dịka Khatem Sulaiman

Mgbe o mere ọrụ ahụ nke mere ka ọ mata ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ya ntị bụ ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Khaled Elsawi, mgbe ahụ ọ pụtara na usoro a ma ama 'Bab Al Khalq' dịka nwoke siri ike, nke yiri ka ọ bụ ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, mgbe ahụ o gosipụtara ihe ngosi TV na mmemme dịka 'El Zaffa 2' na ndị ọzọ
Mohamed Akkari (Arabic محمد العكاري, a mụrụ n'afọ 1978 na Tunis - nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2017 na Mahdia) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na Redio
Mohamed Akkari nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi mgbe a wasịrị ya
E liri ya na Mahdia Marine Cemetery n'ihu ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-akwado ya
Rabaa Essefi kwuru na usoro ikpeazụ nke Dawama soap opera nke e mere na Mohamed mere na Sfax otu izu tupu ọnwụ ya
Mohamed Lamine Alhousseini Alhassan (amụrụ ya na Julaị 22, 1978) bụ onye Nijeria na-egwu egwuregwu mmiri
O sonyere na Summer Olympics nke afọ 2008na Men's 50m Freestyle event
O tinyere nọmba 4 na okpomọkụ nke abụọ nke agba nke mbụ na oge nke 3090 sekọnd ma tinye onye nke iri itoolu na ise n'ozuzu
Mohamed Amin MBE (29 Ọgọst 1943 - 23 Nọvemba 1996) bụ onye Kenya na-ese foto
Amin nwụrụ na Nọvemba 1996 mgbe e weghaara ụgbọ elu Ethiopian Airlines Flight 961 ma daa n'óké Osimiri India na nso Grande Comore
A mụrụ Amin na 29 August 1943 na Eastleigh, Nairobi
Ọ zụlitere mmasị ya na foto mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Camerapix na 1963 na Dar es Salaam wee kwaga ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Nairobi afọ atọ ka e mesịrị

N'ime afọ ndị 1970, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto n'akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrịka a na-adabere na ya, na-akọ akụkọ banyere agha na nnupụisi na kọntinent ahụ dum, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọdịda anyanwụ na-ejikarị foto ya eme ihe

Oge kachasị emetụta nke Amin bịara mgbe ihe nkiri ya, tinyere akụkọ Michael Buerk banyere ụnwụ nri nke Etiopia nke afọ 1984 mere ka mba ụwa mara nsogbu ahụ ma mesịa nyere aka ịmalite ọrụ ebere nke dugara na kọntaktị Live Aid

Ewezuga ụnwụ na ụkọ nri nke Etiopia, o nyere foto pụrụ iche nke ọdịda Idi Amin na nke Mengistu Haile Mariam, ma bụrụkwa onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, nke gụnyere Journey Through Pakistan, Pilgrimage to Mecca, ma kpuchie isiokwu dị iche iche dị ka East African Wildlife na Uganda Railway
Amin bipụtakwara mbipụta nke Selamta, magazin ụgbọelu nke Ethiopia
Amin na-arụsi ọrụ ike ọ bụghị naanị n'Africa, kamakwa na Middle East
Ọ kpuchiri nnupụisi Black September nke Palestine iji weghara Jọdan na Septemba 1970
O nwere ike ịgagharị n'etiti ndị agha Palestine ebe ndị nta akụkọ ọdịda anyanwụ enweghị ike
N'afọ 1991, Amin tụfuru aka ekpe ya n'oge mgbawa nke mgbọ na Ethiopia n'oge Agha Obodo Etiopia

Amin banyere ụgbọ elu Ethiopian Airlines Flight 961 na Nọvemba 23, 1996, ya na Brian Tetley dị afọ iri isii na otu, onye ọrụ ibe ya nke dere ederede maka akwụkwọ foto Amin, iji gaa Nairobi mgbe njem azụmahịa na Ethiopia gasịrị

Ndị na-apụnara mmadụ ihe wakporo oche ụgbọelu ET-AIZ, ụgbọelu Ethiopian Airlines Boeing B767-260ER jiri maka ụgbọ elu ahụ, ma manye onye na-anya ụgbọelu, Leul Abate, ka ọ felie n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ n'elu Oké Osimiri India gaa Australia
Amin gbalịrị ịhazi ndị njem ka ha wakpo ndị ohi ma chee ndị ohi ihu, na-anwa ịkwụsị ihe omume ahụ
Mmanụ ala gwụrụ n'ụgbọelu ET-AIZ ahụ ma Abate tụfuru ụgbọelu ahụ n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke Comoros Islands
ET-AIZ gbawara, ka Amin guzo ọtọ, ozu ya kụrụ mgbidi ụgbọelu na-akpata ọnwụ ya
Ọ dị afọ 53
Tetley anwụghịkwa n'ihe mberede ahụ
Na June 2006, Mo and Me, ihe nkiri Al Jazeera banyere Amin gosipụtara
Ọ meriri Best International Documentary na Los Angeles International Film Festival
Al Jazeera na Camerapix kwadoro ihe nkiri ahụ
Nwa Amin, Salim Amin, na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ Camerapix site na 2008
Mo Amin bụ ihe na-akpali akpali maka ọwa akụkọ A24, a na-atụ aro onwe onye pan-African 24-hour 'African voice for Africa' nke malitere mgbasa ozi site na Nairobi na 19 Septemba 2008
Mohamed Amin so ọtụtụ ndị nta akụkọ na ndị edemede rụọ ọrụ, nke gụnyere Tahir Shah na Colin Blane, yana Michael Buerk
Mohamed Amin bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt
The Night Baghdad Fell (2006) bụ echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide America, na-elekwasị anya na mmeghachi omume nke ezinụlọ nọ n'ọkwá dị elu na Cairo na mwakpo Iraq
Two Girls' from Egypt (2010) na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na-alụbeghị di na mbido afọ iri atọ, na-enyocha isiokwu nke spinsterhood, ahụmịhe mmekọahụ, enweghị ọrụ na nrụrụ aka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A machibidoro ihe nkiri ahụ n'obodo Kuwait
Alhaji Mohamed B
Daramy (amụrụ n'afọ 1955 na Panguma, Lower Bambara Chiefdom, Kenema District, British Sierra Leone ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sierra Leone

Daramy nwere ọtụtụ afọ nke ahụmahụ na ụlọ ọrụ, ụlọ ọrụ nkeonwe na gọọmentị ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Mịnịsta nke Ọrụ, Mịnịsta nke Azụmahịa, Mịnịsta nke Ụgbọ njem, Mịnịsta nke Ego na nso nso a Mịnịsta nke Mmepe na Atụmatụ akụ na ụba

A mụrụ Daramy na late Alhaji Kemoh Daramy na Hadja Nmama Turay Daramy na Panguma, Lower Bambara Chiefdom, Kenema District n'ime Eastern Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Kailahun Primary School na Kailahun ma mesịa gaa Bo Government Secondary School na Bo ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ọkwa O na A nke ọma
Daramy kwagara United States ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Business Administration, nzere masta na Business Administration na isi ego
Ọ bụkwa Certified Public Accountant (CPA) na Certified Internal Auditor (CIA)
Ọ bụbu ezigbo onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke nwetara ọkwa All-American mgbe ọ nọ na Elizabethtown College na Pennsylvania
A họpụtara ya ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ ọkachamara mana ọ jụrụ onyinye ahụ iji lekwasị anya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mohamed Bangoura, bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Guinea nke bi na Sydney
A họpụtara abọm ya Djembe Kan maka afọ 2004 ARIA Award maka Best World Music Album

Mohamed Banka ( ka amụrụ na 24 Septemba 1984) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke Tanzania lara ezumike nká
Mohamed Ben Attia, amụrụ na Jenụwarị 5, 1976, na Tunis, bụ onye nduzi na odee Tunisia
A mụrụ ya na 1976 na Tunis, Tunisia, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute of Higher Commercial Studies nke Carthage na 1998
Mgbe ahụ, o mere atụmatụ ọrụ ihe nkiri ma gbalịa ịbanye La Femis na Paris, nke a jụrụ ya ịnweta mgbe agba nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ nke nhọrọ ahụ gasịrị
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Ben Attia nwere diplọma nke agụmakwụkwọ dị elu pụrụ iche na nkwurịta okwu ọdịyo na anya nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum nke Valenciennes
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị iche iche na mmepụta ihe nkiri, e mechara were ya n'ọrụ ruo afọ iri na abụọ n'ọkwa azụmahịa na nyocha na ụlọ ahịa ụgbọ ala na Tunis
A zụrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ edemede Sud Écriture na Tunis, ọ malitere ide ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo dị mkpirikpi, malite na Romantisme deux comprimés matin et soir na 2005
E mepụtara ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke abụọ ya bụ Comme les autres (Kif Lokhrim) n'afọ 2006
Mgbe Mouja, kpughere na Carthage Film Festival 2010 ma họrọ ya na CinemAfrica 2011 na Stockholm, ọ duziri Loi 76 (2011), obere ihe nkiri ya nke anọ, mgbe ahụ Selma (2013)

Ọ banyere na ihe nkiri na 2016 na Hedi, ikuku nke nnwere onwe nke Dora Bouchoucha (Nomadis Images) mepụtara na nke ụmụnne Dardenne (Les Films du Fleuve) jikọrọ aka mepụta, kwenyesiri ike na obere ihe nkiri na edemede ya kachasị ọhụrụ
N'afọ 2018, o sonyere na Cannes Film Festival ebe a na-egosi ihe nkiri ya Dear Son na Directors' Fortnight
Mohamed Bouchaïb (Arabic) (Benghazi, a mụrụ n'abalị 17 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1984) bụ onye Libya na onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Mascarades (Arabic مسخرة) nke Lyes Salem (Arabic) duziri
Bouchaïb meriri Lumières Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na Mascarades
Mohamed Bouchaïb zutere Biyouna na fr Salah Aougrout mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, na-enye mmeghe maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri TV Algeria a ma ama Nass Mlah City (Arabic) nke Djafaar Gassem duziri
Mohamed Boumerdassi (Arabic محمد بومرداسي ), (March 18, 1936, na Ouled Boumerdès December 7, 2010, na Thénia) dị ka nnukwu onye isi nke egwu Bedouin, Malhun na egwu Algeria
A mụrụ ya na Maachị 18, 1936, n'okpuru aha Mohamed ben Mustapha al-Boumerdassi na obodo Ouled Boumerdès n'ime mpaghara Boumerdés
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ya na Zawiyet Sidi Boumerdassi n'obodo ya bụ Ouled Boumerdès, ebe ọ mụtara kor'an
Ọ bụ onye nwere mmasị dị ukwuu na Sheikh Ben Ahmed al-Boumerdassi, nke a maara mgbe ahụ maka qasida nke madih nabawi na uri na-eto Muhammad
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eso Sheikh al-Miliani, onye họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Bedouin Song (machiakha) mgbe ọ chọpụtara olu ya nke ọ masịrị ya nke ukwuu
A maara ya nke ọma maka abụ ya bụ Hammam Alouane ma Minista ọendị Algnke eria kwụrụ ya ụtụ n'afọ 2004 maka 'ememme mba nke abụ Bedouin na uri a ma ama'
Ọ nwụrụ na mgbede Tuesday, December 7, 2010, mgbe ọ dị afọ 74 n'ụlọ ya dị na Yahia Boushaki Boulevard na Thénia ma lie ya n'echi ya n'ebe ili ozu Bourouiche n'ebe ugwu nke otu obodo ahụ

Ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị nke ndị enyi nke onye ahụ nwụrụ anwụ, ezinụlọ ya na ndị nnọchi anya Ministry of Culture na ndị ọchịchị nke Boumerdès Province nọchitere anya, sonyeere Sheikh al-Boumerdassi n'ụlọ ikpeazụ ya
Mohamed Camara (amụrụ n'afọ 1959 na Conakry) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Guinea nke bi na France
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Atelier Blanche Salant na Paris
Ọ nyochara isiokwu ndị na-ese okwu na fim ya dị ka mmekọahụ (Denko), igbu onwe ụmụaka (Minka) na ndina ụdị onwe (Dakan)
1997's Dakan a kpọrọ ihe nkiri mbụ banyere ndina ụdị onwe site n'aka onye ojii Africa
Camara enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa maka ihe nkiri ya
Nke a gụnyere Grand Jury Award for Outstanding Foreign Narrative Feature na LA Outfest maka Dakan
Na North America, a maara Camara nke ọma maka arụmọrụ ya dị ka Ousmane na usoro agụmakwụkwọ a ma ama French in Action
Mohamed Chabâa ( Arabic ; 1935–2013) bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ onye otu Casablanca School na onye ndu nke nka ọgbara ọhụrụ na ihe ọgbara ọhụrụ na Global South
Ụzọ ya dị iche iche maka nka ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya nke ọdịbendị nke e mere na Morocco n'oge na-esote njedebe nke French Protectorate
A mụrụ ya na Tangier n'afọ 1935

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of Fine Arts nke Tetuan Site na 1962 ruo 1964, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Accademia di Belle Arti di Roma N'afọ 1966, e goro ya dị ka prọfesọ na School of Fine Arts nke Casablanca na National School of Architecture na Rabat

Ọ na-emegide nhazi nke nka Morocco dị ka 'akụkọ ifo' ma ọ bụ nka na-enweghị isi, ma bipụta echiche ya na magazin edemede Ya na ndị enyi ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya Mohamed Melehi, Farid Belkahia, na ndị ọzọ, Chabâa sonyeere n'òtù ọgbara ọhụrụ a maara dị ka Casablanca School
Mohamed Francisco Chikoto (amụrụ ya n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Nijeria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba na otu egwuregwu Algeria ASM Oran
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'oge gara aga na nọmba 3 na uwe elu maka Sahel SC wee sonye na August 2011 na Platinum Stars FC
na South African Premier Soccer League
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, Chikoto sonyeere otu AS Marsa nke Ligue Professionnelle 1 nke Tunisia
Ọ hapụrụ Tunisia gaa na Coton Sport nke Cameroon na July 2013
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2014, Chikoto sonyeere ndị Algeria Ligue Professionnelle 1 ASM Oran
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Nijee
Ọ nyere otu n'ime goolu abụọ dị mkpa megide Guinea, nke nyere Nijee aka iru eru maka iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2013
Mohamed Chouikh (a mụrụ n'afọ 1943) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme egwuregwu
A mụrụ Mohamed Chouikh na Mostaganem, Algeria n'abalị 3 ọnwa Septemba afọ 1943, ebe ọ ga-aghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na otu ndị otu nke mechara ghọọ Algeria National Theatre
N'afọ 1965, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu n'ime ihe nkiri kachasị ukwuu na Algeria, L'Aube des damnés nke René Vautier na Ahmed Rachedi
N'afọ 1966, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Lakhdar (nwa nwoke) na Le vent des Aurès nke Mohamed Lakhdar Hamina
N'afọ 1972 ọ duziri L'Embouchure maka Algeria TV, Les Paumés (1974) sochiri ya n'afọ 1974
N'afọ 1982, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Rupture, ma na-arụ ọrụ edemede na onye nduzi kemgbe ahụ
Mohamed Driss (a mụrụ n'afọ 1944) bụ onye edemede Tunisia, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Kemgbe afọ 1988 ọ bụ onye nduzi nke National Theatre of Tunisia
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1961 ma bụrụ, n'ikpeazụ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ma onye na-amụrụ ihe ma onye ọkachamara, nwa akwụkwọ na Tunis na Paris, onye na'emepụta ihe, na onye nduzi
Site n'afọ 1969 ruo afọ 1972, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-enyere aka na Théâtre de la Tempête nke Jean-Marie Serreau duziri, nke o dere
'N'oge ahụ, amalitere m igwu egwu n'ihe nkiri ndị Tunisia, mana ọnọdụ ihe nkiri na esemokwu m na-aga n'ihu na ndị na-ahụ maka ya adịghị mma
Otu ụbọchị, n'etiti ịda mbà n'obi, m kpọrọ Serreau na ekwentị ma mee mkpesa maka ọnọdụ m
Ọ gwara m na oge eruola ka ị banye n'ihe nkiri dịka onye ọkachamara
Bịa sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri'
(Ntụgharị Bekee siri ike) 'N'oge a, amalitere m ịrụ ọrụ nke abụọ na ihe nkiri nke Tunisia, mana ọnọdụ nke ihe nkiri na esemokwu m na-aga n'ihu na ndị na-ahụ maka ya adịghị agba ume
Otu ụbọchị n'oké ịda mbà n'obi, enwere m Serreau na ekwentị wee mee mkpesa nye ya maka ọnọdụ m
O kwuru na oge eruola ịmalite ihe nkiri dịka ọkachamara
Bịa sonye na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri m'

O ji aka ya chụga onwe ya na France ruo n'afọ 1985 wee laghachi Tunisia n'afọ 1988 iji duzie National Theatre of Tunisia mgbe Driss dere Ismaïl Pacha (1986) na Salut l'instit O mere ihe iji mezigharịa ihe nkiri nke Tunisia ma tinye aka n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na ọrụ ihe nkiri
Otú ọ dị, Driss nwekwara mmasị n'ụdị nka ndị ọzọ ma, n'afọ 2003, o guzobere National School of Circus Arts-Tunis, nke o kwuru
'Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ atụmatụ na mkpebi onye isi ala nke na-eme ka ọrụ nka circus nwere ike ịrụ na ọdịbendị ndị Arab pụta ìhè
N'ebe a, e nwere ihe nkiri, egwu, ịgba egwú, nka na ihe nkiri nka'
(Ntụgharị Bekee siri ike) 'Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ọrụ na mkpebi onye isi ala nke na-arụ ọrụ iji mee ka ọrụ nka nke circus na omenala ndị Arab pụta ìhè
N'ime ụlọ ọrụ a bụ ihe nkiri, egwu, ịgba egwu, nka anya na nka circus
N'afọ 2005, o guzobere National Centre of Circus Arts and Visual Arts ma duzie 12th Theatre Days of Carthage
Driss kwanyekwara ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Ibn Khaldoun otuto site n'ide opera iji sọpụrụ ya
Mohamed El Habachi (1939, Casablanca - 22 Nọvemba 2013 na Casablanca) bụ onye obodo Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị malitere ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na Morocco, a makwaara ya maka arụmọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Moroccan dịka Blood Wedding na The Barber of the Poor Quarter
Mohamed El Jem (Arabic, a mụrụ na Septemba 3, 1948 na Salé) bụ onye Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri, TV na ihe nkiri na na-eme ọchị
A mụrụ Mohamed El Jem n'ọnwa Septemba 3, afọ 1948, n'obodo ochie nke obodo Salé dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri, na Northwestern Morocco
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na-abụ abụ Houcine Slaoui ma na-eṅomi ndị nkuzi ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ruo mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'etiti ndị enyi ya dịka onye na-eme ihe ọchị n'ógbè ahụ
N'ịchọpụta nkà ya maka ime ihe ọchị, ọ sonyeere ndị agha ihe nkiri mpaghara wee malite ime ihe nkiri dị iche iche malite n'afọ 1970
Nabyl Lahlou duziri egwuregwu ọkachamara mbụ ọ rụrụ, onye mere ka ọ mata ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1975, El Jem sonyeere ụlọ ihe nkiri mba, ebe a maara ya dịka onye na-eme ihe ọchị, site na egwuregwu dị iche iche ọ sonyere
Kemgbe ahụ, El Jem gbasaa ọrụ ya, na-esokwa na usoro TV yana ihe nkiri, ma malite ide ihe nkiri n'onwe ya
N'afọ 2007, ọ malitere ihe ngosi okwu ya nke a na-akpọ Jwa men Jem, ebe ọ gbara onwe ya ajụjụ ọnụ na TV
Mohamed Adel Mohamed Emam (Arabic; amụrụ na 16 Septemba 1984) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ si n'ezinụlọ na-ese ihe dịka nna ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Adel Emam
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ onye nduzi Ramy Imam
Mohamed gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Jesuites (CSF) tupu ọ banye na Mahadum America dị na Cairo
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri, ma rụọ ọtụtụ ọrụ na mahadum
Otu n'ime ha bụ Atawa na egwuregwu El Maghmati maka onye nduzi Mahmoud El Lozy
Imam rụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya na mahadum mgbe ọ sonyere na usoro ndị Ijipt Kanaria na Shorkah dịka Ashraf Sayed El Ousy (Hany Awaad Abd El Mohsen)
Onye nduzi Ijipt bụ Marwan Hammed họọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ Taha na The Yacoubian Building (2006), dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke otu aha ahụ
Hassan na Marcus (2008) bụ ihe nkiri ya ọzọ
Isiokwu ihe nkiri ahụ bụ esemokwu dị n'etiti ndị Alakụba na Ndị Kraịst
Imam gosipụtara ihe odide abụọ, nwoke Onye Kraịst Girgis Boulus na Emad Hassan, nwa El Sheikh Hassan
E gosipụtara Hassan na Marcus na London Film Festival n'ọnwa October 18, 2008 n'ụlọ zuru ezu
Imam ritere ihe nrite site na Alexandria International Film Festival n'afọ 2008 maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2012, ọ pụtara dịka Ibrahim na Ferqit Naji Attalah na Adel Emam
O mekwara ihe nkiri dịka Seif na Saheb Elsa3ada n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2014
Ya na Adel Emam, Lebleba, Edward, Amina Khalil, Tara Emad, Khaled Zaki, Angy Wegdan na Lotfy Labib
N'oge ọkọchị ahụ, ya na Maii Ezz Eldeen nọkwa na Dalaa3 banat
O nwekwara ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ na ihe nkiri mbụ ya 'captin Egypt' na 'hell in India' na 2018 Lelyt Hana w Sror

Mohamed Ahmed Saeed Ahmed El Fadul (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1997), onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Mohamed Ering bụ onye Sudan na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere Al-Hilal Omdurman na ndị otu bọọlụ mba Sudan

Mohamed Fawzi (Egyptian Arabic محمد فوزى, a mụrụ Mohamed Fawzi Abbas Elhaw, August 15, 1918 - October 20, 1966) bụ onye Egypt na-agụ egwu na-ede egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ na onye na-ahụ maka ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri egwu nke Egypt n'afọ ndi 1940 na 1950
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ El-Sharq El-Awsat n'ọnwa Eprel 30, 1959, wee gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ Sono Cairo / Sound El Qahira (Olu nke Cairo) Records na Jenụwarị 6, 1964
Fawzi dere egwu maka 'Kassaman', ukwe mba Algeria, nke nwere okwu nke Algeria Revolution Moufdi Zakaria
A mụrụ ya n'obodo nta Kafr Abou Gendi, mpaghara Qutour na Gharbia Governorate
Ọ bụ nwa nke iri abụọ na otu n'ime ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ na ise, nke ikpeazụ gụnyere ndị na-agụ egwu Huda Sultan na Hend Allam
Ọ bụ onye egwuregwu Oud mgbe ọ dị obere
Nwanne ya nwanyị bụ onye a ma ama na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu Huda Sultan
Fawzi gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na Tanta, Egypt, ebe ya na enyi ya, onye na-agbanyụ ọkụ Mahmoud El Kharbaty, na-amụ egwu ngwa ngwa
El Kharbaty kpọtara Fawzi ka ọ bụrụ abụ n'ụbọchị ọmụmụ, abalị, na agbamakwụkwọ, ebe abụ Mohamed Abdel Wahab na Umm Kulthum metụtara ya

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nkwadebe, ọ sonyeere King Fuad I Institute of Music na Cairo, mana ọ hapụrụ ọmụmụ ya afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị iji rụọ ọrụ na klọb abalị nke ụmụnne nwanyị Ratiba na Ensaf Rushdie

N'ịbụ onye Badia Masabniʹs disco were n'ọrụ, ọ zutere ndị ama ama dịka Farid El Atrash, Mohamed Abd El Mottleb, na Mahmoud El Sherief, bụ ndị ya na ha rụkọtara ọrụ n'ide na ịbụ abụ maka sketches na revues
O mere ule redio n'afọ 1938 mgbe ọ dị afọ 20, na-ada otu afọ mgbe El Atrash nwere ihe ịga nke ọma
Ihe ịga nke ọma Mahmoud El Sherief na-aga n'ụzọ ide ihe mbụ mere ka Fawzi họrọ usoro ahụ

Mgbe o rutere na Cairo n'afọ 1938, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị, gụnyere nke Badia Masabni na Fatima Rushdi, wee gaa na 'Egyptian National Theatre' ebe ụzọ ya maka ịbụ onye a ma ama malitere ịpụta
Na ihe nkiri 36 (na mgbakwunye na cameo na Layali Al-Qahira n'afọ 1939), ọ ga-abụrịrị nwoke na-abụ abụ kachasị n'oge ahụ
Ọ bụrụ abụ ndị ọzọ na ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ya, gụnyere Qabelni Ya Abi, Nargis, Thawrat El-Madinah, na Leila, Bint El-Shatie, ebe Mohamed Abdel Wahab na Farid al-Atrash dere egwu nke ha niile
Fawzi mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'etiti afọ 1947 na 1959, nke niile gosipụtara ya ma e wezụga Fatawat el Husseinia na The Absent Lady
Fawzi bụ nwanne onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu Huda Sultan na onye na na-agụ egwú Hend Allam
N'afọ 1943, Fawzi lụrụ nwunye mbụ ya, Mrs
Hedaya, onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ injinia Nabil (a mụrụ na 1944), injinia Samir (a mụrụ n'afọ 1946), na dọkịta Mounir (a muru n'afọ 1948)
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1952, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Madiha Yousri ma mụọ nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Amr n'afọ 1955 na otu nwa nwoke ọzọ
N'afọ 1959, ọ gbara alụkwaghịm ọzọ wee lụọ nwunye ya nke atọ, Karima, onye ya na ya mụrụ nwa ya nwanyị nke nta Iman n'afọ 1961
Ha nọgidere na-emekọ ihe ọnụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Mohamed Fouad Abd El Hamid Hassan (Arabic ; a mụrụ na Disemba 20, 1961) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwu n'Egypt
O mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya 'Agla Min Hayaty' n'afọ 2010, ma kwado ihe ngosi telivisheneng 'Khush Ala Fońsh' n'afọ 2014
Mohamed Ibrahim Mohamed El Hamaki (Arabic [mæˈħæmmæd ebɾɑˈhiːm elˈħæˈmæːʔi]; a mụrụ na 4 Nọvemba 1975) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Egypt
N'afọ 2010, o nwetara ihe nrite 'Best Arabia Act' site na MTV Europe Music Awards na Music Award n'afọ 2006, maka 'Ahla Haga Fiki'
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na The Voice Ahla Sawt (oge 5) n'afọ 2019
A mụrụ Mohamed Hamaki n'abalị 4, ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1975
Na Julaị 3, 2011, a kpọgara Hamaki n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe ọ nwesịrị ọtụtụ ọrịa obi mgbe ọ na-edekọ otu n'ime abọm ọhụrụ ya
N'ọnwa Septemba 2021, Hamaki so ụlọ ọrụ America Epic Games rụkọọ ọrụ maka kọntaktị n'ụdị okike nke egwuregwu vidio Fortnite

N'egwuregwu a, enwere ike ịnụ ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ya, egwu ya bụ Leilet El Omr gosipụtara n'otu egwu ahụ, yana nke a na-eme ka emote nwere akụkụ nke egwu a dị maka ịzụta na Ụlọ Ahịa Ihe nke egwuregwu ahụ
Na Disemba 7, 2011 Hamaki lụrụ Nahla El Hagry
Ha mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2014
N'ọnwa Eprel 2016, afọ abụọ mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ha gasịrị, Hamaki na Nahla Doziri Ma Lukọkwaa ọzọ
Hamaki kwupụtara na nwunye ya amụọla nwa nwanyị na June 6, 2017 onye ọ gụrụ Fatma
Mohamed Hamri (August 27, 1932 - August 29, 2000), nke a maara dịka Hamri, bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe na onye edemede
N'ịbụ onye akọwapụtara onwe ya dị ka 'Onye na-ese ihe na Morocco,' Hamri bụ otu n'ime ndị Morocco ole na ole sonyere na Tangier Beat scene
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1932 na Jajouka, obodo nta dị na nsọtụ ndịda nke ugwu Rif dị nso na Ksar el-Kebir, n'ebe mpaghara ugwu nke Morocco
Nna ya bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ese ihe eji emepụta ihe nke na-ese ihe ya na-agbaso ọdịnala oge ochie
A mụrụ nne Hamri n'ime ezinụlọ Attar nke ndị egwu Zahjouka
Nwanne nna ya bụ onye ndú nke Master Musicians nke Joujouka
Hamri bụ nna Sanaa Hamri, nwanyị Morocco mbụ duziri ihe nkiri Hollywood
Hamri nyeere ndị Master Musicians nke Joujouka aka ịdi adị site n'iweta ha na Tangier igwu egwu
N'afọ 1951, onye edemede Paul Bowles zutere Hamri dị afọ iri na asatọ na ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Tanger
O mechara zute onye na-ese ihe Brion Gysin - onye mepụtara usoro The Cut-up - onye kụziiri ya ma mee ka ọ mara ndị na-ese ihe na Europe nke oge a
Gysin na Hamri nwere ihe ngosi nkwonkwo na 1952
Mgbe Hamri webatara Gysin n'obodo Zahjouka, Gysin ghọrọ onye na-akwalite ndụ ya niile nke ndị Sufi trance master musicians bi n'ebe ahụ
Ya na Gysin, Hamri guzobere '1001 Nights Restaurant' na Tangier na Hamri dị ka onye na-esi nri na ebe Gysin were ndị Master Musicians rụọ ọrụ igwu egwu
Na 1958 Gysin zụtara mmasị Hamri na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ maka $ 10,000 mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ funahụrụ ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya, o mepere 1001 Nights ọhụrụ na Asilah -40 kilomita n'ebe ndịda Tangier - ebe mbụ ọ zutere Brian Jones ma mesịa kpọta ya Zahjouka
Onye guzobere Rolling Stones na onye na-egwu ọtụtụ egwu Brian Jones zutere Hamri mgbe ọ gara Morocco na 1967
Ha wee bụrụ ezigbo enyi

N'afọ 1968, Gysin na Hamri kpọọrọ Jones gaa n'obodo nta ahụ iji dekọọ ndị egwu ukwu na ntọhapụ Brian Jones Presents the Pipes of Pan na Joujouka, onye mkpuchi mbụ ya gosipụtara eserese nke Jones na The Master Musicians of Joujouka site n'aka Hamri tupu nhazigharị afọ 1990

N'afọ 1975, akwụkwọ Hamri bụ Tales of Joujouka, nke kọrọ akụkọ sitere n'obodo nta ahụ, nke gụnyere 'The Legend of Boujeloud', ọkara ewu / ọkara mmadụ e kere eke a na-eme ememe kwa afọ, bụ Capra Press bipụtara na Santa Barbara
Site na 1980 gaa n'ihu, Hamri kewara oge ya n'etiti Tangier na Zahjouka
Mgbe Hadj Abdesalam Attar nwụsịrị, nwa ya nwoke Bachir Attar gara n'ihu n'ijigidesi otu egwu nna ya na The Master Musicians of Jajouka nke Bachir Attar duziri
Na ezumike site na Morocco n'etiti 1974 na 1978 iji gbasoo ọrụ eserese ya, Hamri bipụtara Tales of Joujouka
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Morocco Hamri wuru ụlọ ọhụrụ na Zahjouka, nke ghọrọ ebe ndị egwu na-ezukọta
N'iji aha ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ kpọrọ ha ka ha bịa ihe ngosi mgbe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gosipụta dị ka onye na-ese ihe
N'afọ 1991, ọ kpọtara ndị otu ahụ n'Ịtali
Na 1992, Hamri sonyere na The Here to Go Show na Dublin, Ireland
Ihe ngosi ahụ, ememe nke William Burroughs, Brion Gysin na Tangier beat scene, edere na ihe nkiri Destroy all Rational Thought, nke Joe Ambrose na Frank Rynne duziri
N'afọ 1994, Hamri mere ndokwa ka ndị Master Musicians nke Joujouka dekọọ CD mbụ ha wepụtara Joujouka Black Eyes
Ọ bụ Frank Rynne mepụtara ndekọ ahụ n'okpuru nlekọta Hamri
Hamri nwere ihe ngosi iri ise nke eserese ya na Morocco, Spain, Lebanon, Canary Islands, Germany, United States, UK na Ireland n'oge ndụ ya
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2000 e wee lie ya n'etiti obodo ahụ, n'akụkụ ili nke onye nsọ ndị Alakụba Sidi Ahmed Sheikh
Emere ihe ngosi na nso nso a na Laurence-Arnott Gallery na Tangier
Achọpụtala nnukwu nchịkọta nke ihe osise ya nke afọ 1950 na nso nso a na United States
Mohamed Henedi Ahmed Abdel Gawad (Arabic ) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe ọchị nke a mụrụ na Giza, Egypt, na 1 February 1965, ma nweta nzere bachelọ nke ihe nkiri
Henedi malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1991 na obere ihe nkiri na sinima, ọ nwetakwara nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na ihe nkiri abụọ ya Esma'eleya Rayeh Gaii na Sa'ede Fel Gam'a Al Amrekya
O mechara mee ihe nkiri Hamam fi Amsterdam, Belya we Demagho el Alya, Saheb Sahbo na Andaleeb Al Dokki
Mohamed Henedi kpọkwara olu Timon, Mike Wazowski na Homer Simpson maka nsụgharị ndị Egypt nke The Lion King, Monsters, Inc, na The Simpsons
Yasmine El-Reshidi nke The Wall Street Journal kwuru na a 'ewere Henedi dịka Robert De Niro nke Middle East'
Mohamed Hilmi (abalị 15, ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1931- abalị 5, ọnwa Jenụwarị, afọ 2022) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Ọ bụ nwanne nwoke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Saïd Hilmi
Hilmi gara ihe ngosi mbụ ya, Diviser pour régner, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Ọ hapụrụ obodo ya Azzefoun mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ gaa biri na Algiers, ebe ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ịnshọransị
N'afọ 1947, ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ na egwuregwu Ould Ellil
Mahieddine Bachtarzi ga-etinye ya naanị na obere ọrụ, ya mere Hilmi sonyeere Rédha Falaki na redio n'afọ 1949
Otú ọ dị, ọ tụgharịrị gaa na ihuenyo n'afọ sochirinụ, na-ede telivishọn, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, na ihe nkiri dị n'etiti
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, El Ouelf Essaib
Hilmi nwụrụ na Algiers na 5 Jenụwarị 2022, mgbe ọ dị afọ 90
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'Ijipt, ọ gara n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ na London School of Film Technique (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka The London International Film School) n'etiti afọ 1962 na 1963
Ọ duziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri 8mm
N'afọ 1963, ọ laghachiri Ijipt wee rụọ ọrụ na ngalaba edemede nke General Egyptian Film Organization
N'agbata afọ 1964 na 1966, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye nduzi na Lebanọn
Ọ kwagara ọzọ n'England, ebe o dere akwụkwọ ya 'An Introduction to the Egyptian Cinema', nke Informatics bipụtara na 1969
O dezigharịrị akwụkwọ ọzọ akpọrọ 'Okporo Akụkụ nke Cinema Czechoslovakian', nke Informatics bipụtara na 1971
E tinyere ihe nkiri ya nke 1983 The Street Player n'ime ememe 13th Moscow International Film Festival
Dị ka akwụkwọ Bibliotheca Alexandrina wepụtara na Disemba 2007, Ahlam Hind we Kamilia (1988) nke Khan bụ otu n'ime ihe ngosi otu narị na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ihe nkiri Egypt
O nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Nadine, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, na otu nwa nwoke, Hassan, onye na-ese ihe na onye na-eti egwu

Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ugboro abụọ nke mbụ ya na Zeinab Khalifa, onye Egypt Jeweller a ma ama na mgbe ahụ na Wessam Soliman, onye Egypt na-ede ihe nkiri nke dere atọ n'ime ihe nkiri ya Banat Wust el-Balad (Downtown Girls), Fi-Sha'et Masr el-Guedida (In a Heliopolis Apartment), na Fatat el-Masna' (The Factory Girl)
Mohammed Melehi (12 Nọvemba 1936 - 28 Ọktoba 2020) bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe na ụlọ akwụkwọ Casablanca, otu ndị na-arụ ọrụ na 1960s na Morocco
A mụrụ Melehi Asilah, Morocco

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of Fine Arts of Tetuan (1953 - 1955), mgbe ahụ na Real Academia de Bellas Artes de Santa Isabel de Hungría na Seville (1955), Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando (1956), Accademia di Belle Arti di Roma (1960), na Académie des Beaux-Arts (1957-1960)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na École nationale supérieure des Beaux-Arts na Paris
Ọ kwagara Minneapolis na-enwe olileanya ịmụ gbasara ihe owuwu, mana ọ malitere ịkụzi eserese na Minneapolis School of Art kama
Mgbe ahụ, ọ natara Rockefeller Foundation fellowship wee gaa Mahadum Columbia na New York (1962-1964)
Melehi ghọrọ prọfesọ na School of Fine Arts nke Casablanca, ebe ọ kụziri eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na foto (1964 - 1969)
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụ Farid Belkahia duziri ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, onye Melehi ga-eso mepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ Casablanca
Ọ nwụrụ na Paris

N'afọ 1969, Melehi na ndị ọrụ ibe ya nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Casablanca, nke gụnyere Farid Belkahia na Mohamed Chabâa, haziri ihe ngosi-manifeste, ma ọ bụ ihe ngosi ngagharị iwe, nke akpọrọ Présence plastique Ndị na-ese ihe gosipụtara ọrụ ha na Jemaa el-Fnaa na Marrakesh medina, na-eleghara ụlọ ọrụ nka nke Morocco anya n'otu oge ahụ
A na-ewere ihe ngosi a dị ka oge ntọala nke oge a na Morocco
'Anyị weere ọnọdụ megide gọọmentị,' ka Melehi kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Guardian, 'Ọrụ anyị nọ na Jemaa el-Fnaa square ruo otu izu, na-ekpughe anyanwụ na ifufe
Ọ bụ ozi echiche banyere ihe nka nwere ike ịbụ
Melehi nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ Ambroise Paré dị na Boulogne-Billancourt dị nso na Paris mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na anọ ụbọchị ole na ole mgbe ọ butere ọrịa COVID-19 n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na France
Mohamed Mohsen (Àtụ Lang-ar; born 10 May 1989) is the chairman and managing director of Exclusive Movies and an Egyptian producer

He had graduated from The Higher Institute of Cinema in 2002, and chosen to work in documentary films since his graduation as a producer, and he also worked in Directing Commercials, and directed film, and the first movie he directed was 'The Party'
, He began his directing career primarily with short movies and commercials, after which he shifted to full-length movies
He is the Executive Manager and Chairman of Exclusive Movies Company
Graduated from Higher Institute of Cinema , and worked as an executive producer in a number of television productions and theatrical performances

His debut as a director was in the twenty-first century, and he directed the movie “The Party”, which was shown in 2013 and starring Ahmed Ezz, then his work in cinema and television continued, and he presented in his series “Wish Thani”, which was shown in 2015, then he turned to film production, and in 2020 he founded the “Exclusive Movies” company, which It produced a number of successful films such as “Under the threat of the weapon” and “Toxic”, and the first film produced by the company was the movie “They went out and did not return», whose story was written by Wael youssef and starring Hosny Sheta , Wezo and was shown in 2022
Mohamed Mohsen released his first feature movie, Keep Meet Me , in 2009
The Series was enthusiastically received among critics, and was the movie for which Mohamed Mohsen was awarded the title of 'Best New Director in 2009'
