Mohamed Mounir (Arabic محمد منير; a mụrụ n'October 10, 1954) bụ onye Egypt na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nke nwere ọrụ egwu karịrị afọ iri anọ
Ọ na-etinye ụdị dị iche iche n'ime egwu ya, gụnyere egwu ndị Egypt oge ochie, egwu Nubian, blues, jazz na reggae
A maara okwu ya maka ọdịnaya nkà ihe ọmụma ha na nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha
Ndị na-akwado ya maara ya nke ọma dịka 'The King' na-ezo aka na abọm ya na egwu 'El Malek Howwa El Malek' (The King is The King)
Ezinụlọ Mounir si Nubia, Southern Aswan, Egypt
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2021, ọ pụtara na usoro egwu mmeghe dịka onye na-abụ abụ maka Fero's Golden Parade n'ụgbọ mmiri olili ozu ndị Egypt n'ọdọ mmiri ahụ n'ihu National Museum of Egyptian Civilization
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Nubian na Aswan, Mounir nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'obodo Manshyat Al Nubia, ebe ọ nwekọrọ mmasị nna ya na egwu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Dịka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, a manyere ya na ezinụlọ ya ịkwaga Cairo mgbe obodo ya furu efu na idei mmiri nke sochiri iwu Aswan Dam
Ọ bụ ebe a ka ọ gụrụ foto na Faculty of Applied Arts na Mahadum Helwan
N'oge a, ọ na-abụkarị abụ maka ndị enyi na ezinụlọ na nnọkọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Onye na-ede abụ bụ Abdel-Rehim Mansour chọpụtara olu abụ ya, onye ga-aga n'ihu na-ewebata Mounir na onye na-agụ egwú a ma ama bụ Ahmed Mounib
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, a kpọrọ ya maka ozi agha n'afọ 1974, n'oge ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ egwu ya site n'ịrụ ọrụ na kọntaktị dị iche iche
O mere egwu egwu mbụ ya n'afọ 1975
Ọ bụ ezie na ọha na eze katọrọ Mounir na mbụ maka ịrụ ọrụ na ejiji nkịtị n'oge a na-atụ anya ka ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwú Egypt na-eyi uwe, ha mechara mee ka ọ dị mma
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ agha ya, Mounir wepụtara abọm mbụ ya n'afọ 1977 bụ Alemony Eneeki na akara ndekọ Sonar
Mounir gara n'ihu wepụta abọm ise ọzọ na-aga n'ihu ma gosipụta ya n'otu abọm ụda n'okpuru akara Sonar
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Mounir ewepụtala ngụkọta 22 nke abọm gọọmentị ma gosipụta ya na abọm ụda isii n'okpuru ọtụtụ akara ndekọ dị iche iche
Tinyere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-agụ egwú a ma ama, Mounir nwekwara ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri iri na abụọ, usoro telivishọn anọ na egwuregwu atọ
Ọrụ ihe nkiri ya malitere n'afọ 1982, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Youssef Chahine 'Hadouta Masreia (An Egyptian Story), nke a na-egosikwa na album soundtrack

N'afọ 1997, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ọzọ nke Youssef Chahine, ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke France na Egypt Al Maseer (Destiny), nke e gosipụtara na asọmpi na 1997 Cannes Film Festival

Mounir rụrụ ọrụ nke prọfesọ na-ede uri kpuru ìsì 'Bashir' na ihe nkiri na-ese okwu nke afọ 2005 Dunia, nke na-elekwasị anya na onye na-ede egwu Dunia, onye na-agba egwu afọ na onye na'ede uri nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt bụ Hanan Tork

Mgbe egosiri ihe nkiri ahụ na 2005 Cairo International Film Festival, ọ hapụrụ ndị na-ege ntị kewaa n'etiti ndị na-akwado oku ihe nkiri ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ozi ya megide igbu ọkpụkpụ ụmụ nwanyị, na ndị na-anabataghị ma ọ bụ ọchịchọ onye na-ese onyinyo ahụ iji gosipụta onwe ya site na ịgba egwu, ma ọ bụ nke ihe nkiri ndị a gbara na ogige Cairo, nke a na-ekpe ikpe dị ka ihe na-emebi onyinyo mba Egypt

Mohamed Mrad (Arabic محمد مراد, a mụrụ na Septemba 15, 1990 na Tunis) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya nke Mahdi Ben Salem na usoro telivishọn Naouret El Hawa
A mụrụ ya na Septemba 15, 1990 na Tunis, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Carthage High Commercial Studies Institute na Tunis
N'afọ 2013 bụ ahụmahụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn 'Layem' ihe nkiri tebụl a ma ama nke Ramadan afọ 2013 ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ Skander, nwa okorobịa bara ọgaranya nke nwere àgwà ọjọọ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, o mere mkpuchi nke magazin ndị mmadụ Tunivisions
A makwaara Mrad maka ọrụ ya na 'L'Enfant du soleil' nke Taïeb Louhichi na 'Fausse note' nke Majdi Smiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya nke Mahdi Ben Salem na usoro telivishọn Naouret El Hawa
N'afọ 2015, Mohamed Mourad sonyere na Arab Casting

N'afọ 2019, Mohamed Mrad rụrụ ọrụ onye uwe ojii na-ahụ maka nyocha ikpe nke ga-abanye na mmekọrịta ịhụnanya na ụwa nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na usoro telivishọn 'L'affaire 460' nke Majdi Smiri, nke e mere na Russia

Mohamed Ramadan Mahmoud Hijazi (Arabic ; a mụrụ na 23 Mee 1988 ), nke a maara nke ọma dịka Mohamed Ramadan, bụ onye Egypt na-eme nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'eti egwu, onye egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe
Mohamed Ramadan malitere ime ihe nkiri n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ natara ihe nrite maka talent kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ ugboro atọ n'usoro, ihe a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na obere ọrụ na usoro TV dịka The Cindrella, ruo mgbe ọ nwere nnukwu ezumike ya na Yousry Nasrallah's Ehky Ya Sharazad (Gwa m, Shahrazad)
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri nke ndị na-emepụta ihe n'Ijipt bụ Mohamed na Ahmed El Sobky mepụtara, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme egwuregwu kachasị mma na etiti ọwụwa anyanwụ
Mohamed Ramadan bụ ma eleghị anya naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ijipt nke onye na-ese ihe nkiri Omar Sharif toro, onye kwuru na ọ họọrọ Mohamed ka ọ nọgide na-eme ya
Ramadan sooro onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu French bụ Gims rụkọọ ọrụ n'abụ 'Ya Habibi'
N'afọ 2020, ọwa Youtube ya bụ otu n'ime ndị a na-elekarị anya na Middle East
Ramadan lụrụ nwanyị ugboro abụọ, ebe ọ mụrụ nwa ya nwanyị Haneen site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya
Mgbe ahụ ọ lụrụ Nesreen El Sayed Abd El Fattah, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ Ali na Kenz
(A ga-ahọrọ
Aha Arabic n'ime oghere)

Mohamed Saad Abdel-Hamid Ibrahim (amụrụ na 14 Disemba 1968) (Arabic محمد سعد عبد الحميد إبراهيم, IPA ˈsææææd ˈæħmæd]) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị, na-arụsi ọrụ ike kemgbe afọ 1988
Saad a maara maka ọrụ na-atọ ọchị
Saad malitere ọrụ ya na-eme ọtụtụ ọrụ nkwado, ọganihu mbụ ya bụ n'ihu onye na-eme ihe nkiri Salah Zulfikar na Road To Eilat (1994)
Ọrụ ya nke abụọ nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama bụ na El Nazer (2000)
Mgbe ahụ Saad butere ụzọ na El-Limby (2002; aha, nke Saad, bụ egwuregwu na aha otu n'ime ndị na-achị Egypt, High Commissioner Edmund Allenby)

N'ịrụ ọrụ ihe nkiri ahụ dịka dike 'na-amaghị nke a na-akọ, nke na-adịghị arụ ọrụ nke ọma, nke na'adịghị arụ ọrụ, nke a na'oké ihe na-egbu egbu, Saad 'na-etinye ọrụ mbụ ya na ike anụ ahụ, karịsịa na usoro ịgba egwu'
N'agbata afọ 2003 na afọ 2005, Saad gosipụtara ihe odide yiri ya na ihe nkiri atọ ọzọ, gụnyere otu n'ime ihe nkiri ya kachasị mma Ely Baly Balak
N'afọ 2006, Saad pụtara na Katkout (The Chick), ebe ọ na-eme ka onye Upper Egyptian na-enweghị olileanya nke na-abanye n'ọrụ dịka onye ọkpọ na onye na-alụ ọgụ mpụ
Magazin Cairo nke dị n'ịntanetị bụ Yallabina katọrọ ihe nkiri ahụ maka ịdabere na ihe ọchị anụ ahụ nke Saad na-efu akụkọ na edemede

Mohamed Sahnoun (Arabic) (8 Eprel 1931 - 20 Septemba 2018) bụ onye nnọchi anya mba Algeria nke jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchianya Algeria na Germany, France, United States na Morocco yana onye nnọchi ala Algeria na United Nations

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Organisation of African Unity, osote ode akwụkwọ ukwu nke Arab League, odeakwụkwọ ukwu onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke United Nations maka Somalia n'afọ 1992 na odeakwụkwọ ukwu ukwu nke onye nnọchianya pụrụ iche nke UN maka mpaghara Great Lakes nke Africa n'afọ 1997 tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka udo na ime udo site na ọrụ ebere dị iche metụtara UN ma ọ bụ nke onwe ya
O lekwasịrị anya karịsịa n'ịmepụta mkparịta ụka ọdịbendị na okpukpe na ịgwọ ihe ncheta merụrụ ahụ site na esemokwu gara aga

A mụrụ Mohamed Sahnoun n'afọ 1931 na Chlef (nke a maara dị ka Castellum Tingitanum n'oge ndị Rom, Al Asnam n'oge oge Umayyad Caliphate na site n'afọ 1962 ruo afọ 1980 yana Orléansville n'oge French colonization), na Algeria
O bu ụzọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Lycée nke Algiers wee gaa na Sorbonne na Paris
Ọ nọ ebe ahụ n'ụbọchị agha mbụ nke Agha Algeria (1 Nọvemba 1954)

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike nke FLN, ọ zaghachiri oku maka ọgbaghara nke Union générale des étudiants musulmans algériens (Ugema) malitere n'ụbọchị 19 Mee 1956, kwụsịrị ịmụ ihe na Paris wee laghachi n'ụlọ na Algeria
Mohamed Salah (bu onye amụrụ n'afọ 1992) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Ijipt nke na-agbara klọb Liverpool na ndị otu mba Ijipt bọọlụ
Mohamed Salah nwekwara ike ịpụta
Mohamed Sayari (a mụrụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 31, afọ 1957 na Béja) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka ihe nkiri ama ama, usoro TV na egwuregwu
Mohamed Mahmoud Sobhy (Arabic; a mụrụ na Machị 3, 1948) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na n'elu nkwago na onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Egypt, nke a maara maka ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Egypt
A mụrụ Mohamed Mahmoud Sobhi na Cairo
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute of Drama n'afọ 1970 wee gaa n'ihu na-akụzi ruo afọ 1984
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke gosipụtara na Egyptian Dream 2 TV na Machị 8, 2014 (dịka ndị Israel guzobere MEMRI sụgharịrị), Sobhi kwuru na 'Benjamin Franklin kwuru okwu [na 1787], nke ghọrọ ihe a ma ama
Mụ onwe m jiri ya mee ihe n'asụsụ Horseman na-enweghị ịnyịnya
[Ndị America] hụrụ na ọdachi dị nso, n'ihi echiche Setan nke otu ndị na-eyi ọha egwu ahụ
Ọ bụ mgbe ahụ ka Franklin gwara ndị America okwu ya
O kwuru, sị 'Anya m adọ gị aka ná ntị na ọ bụrụ na ìgwè ndị Juu a na-eyi ọha egwu agbakọta America, ha ga-achịkwa mkpebi ndị America n'ime otu narị afọ
Ha ga-achịkwa America n'onwe ya, ma zọgide anyị n'okpuru ụkwụ
' Sobhi kwukwara na 'Ị ga-ahụ mgbe ị na-agụ Protocols of the Elders of Zion'
Mohamed Soumaïla (bu onye amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 30 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Nigerien na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke 3 Bulgnéville Contrex Vittel na ndị otu mba Niger bọọlụ
O so na ndị otu Niger nke gbara bọọlụ na 2012 na 2013 Africa Cup of Nations
Asọmpi na Olympic Niamey
Mohamed Tahar Fergani (9 Mee 1928 7 Disemba 2016) bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu, onye na-akpọ violin na onye na-ede egwu, nke a na-akpọ Nightingale nke Constantine
A mụrụ ya na Constantine
Nna ukwu nke egwu Malouf nke Constantine
Mohamed Tahar Fergani bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú ole na ole na-akọwa ihe ndị e dere na octaves anọ
Na mgbakwunye Malouf, ọ na-akọwa Mahjouz (ụdị Constantinois a ma ama nke sitere na MalouF), Zjoul (ụdị egwu dị ka Malouf), constantinois) na Hawzi (ụdị a ma ama sitere na Tlemcen Gharnati)
Nna ya Hamou Fergani bụ onye na-agụ egwu nke Hawzi
Mohamed Tahar malitere na egwu ọwụwa anyanwụ, o mechara gbanwee ụdị na-eru nso Malouf
Ndị isi ya abụọ bụ Cheîkh Hassouna na Cheîkh Baba Abid
Ndị Malouf na-ewere ndị Ferganies nke ukwuu
Nwanne ya nwanyị Z'hor bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu ebe nwa ya nwoke Salim bụkwa onye cheîkh nke Malouf a ma ama
Mohamed Tahar nwere ọtụtụ narị ndekọ ma natakwa ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa
O mepụtara Orchestra ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya nke Constantine
Otu n'ime abụ ya a maara na Algeria 'Ed Dhalma' (onye na-ezighị ezi) nke onye na-ede uri, Henni Bengenoune
Ọ nwụrụ na Paris mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asatọ na 7 Disemba 2016
Mohamed Temam ma ọ bụ Mohamed Temmam (23 Febụwarị 1915 Algiers - 15 Julaị 1988 Algiers) bụ onye Algeria na-ese obere ihe na onye na-eme ihe na-enwu ọkụ
E gosipụtara obere ihe osise ya nke Kaaba na Mecca na stampụ ncheta nke Algeria wepụtara n'afọ 1978
Amadou Djibo Mohamed Wonkoye (amụrụ ya na 19 Mee 1994) bụ onye Nijeria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba n'etiti ma ọ bụ onye na-aga n'ihu maka Horoya
Dị ka onye na-eto eto na egwuregwu bọọlụ, Wonkoye sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ntorobịa nke otu Ghana WAFA
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ bịanyere aka na ASEC na Ivory Coast
Tupu ọkara nke abụọ nke afọ 2014/15, ọ bịnyere aka na klọb nke abụọ nke Portugal Braga B
N'afọ 2017, Wonkoye bịanyere aka na Horoya na Guinea
Mohamed Zouaoui (Arabic محمد الزواوي), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Tunisia nke bi na Ịtali
N'afọ 2004, ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya na telivishọn, nweta ọrụ mbụ ya na miniseries TV Posso chiamarti amore?
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Nassiryia - Per non dimensicare (Nasiriyah - Ka anyị ghara ichefu), Capri, na RIS Delitti Imperfetti (Scientific Investigations Unit Imperfect Crimes)
N'afọ 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na miniseries Liberi di giocare
N'afọ 2009, ọ pụtara na I mostri oggi, n'afọ 2010 pụtara na The Father and the Foreigner
N'afọ 2010 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na I fiori di Kirkuk, nke Fariborz Kamkari duziri
Maka ọrụ a, o nwetara ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere 'Golden Globe' 2011 Globo d'Oro maka Best New Actor
N'afọ 2012, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri onwe ya Carta Bianca, nke onye nduzi Colombian Andreas Maldonado, ihe nkiri dabeere na akụkọ eziokwu
N'etiti afọ 2014 na 2016 Zouaoui na-ekere òkè n'ọtụtụ ọrụ gụnyere, Movies, obere ihe nkiri, na usoro TV
N'afọ 2018 o sonyere na ihe nkiri Beirut, nke Brad Anderson duziri na Jon Hamm nakwa Rosamund Pike

N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ bụ onye isi ihe nkiri Italian-Moroccan Catharsys maọbụbụ The Afina Tales of the Lost World, nke e gosipụtara na asọmpi n'ọtụtụ mmemme dị mkpa gụnyere Turin Film Festival na Marrakech International Film Festival
N'afọ 2019 ya na Claudia Gerini gbara ihe nkiri Burraco Fatale nke Giuliana Gamba
Mohamed Zran (amụrụ na 23 Ọgọstụ nke afọ 1959) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede ihe nkiri na Tunisia
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ya a kpọrọ 'Le casseur de pierres' na ngalaba Un Certain Regard na 1990 Cannes Film Festival

Mohammed Abaamran (n'asụsụ Arabic) (1932, Ait Erkha 20 Febụwarị 2020, Casablanca) nke a makwaara dịka Da Hmad Butfunast, na-atụ aka na njirimara Butfunast (onye nwe ehi) ọ rụrụ na fim, bụ onye Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu, na-eme na Tachelhit
Abaamran malitere ọrụ ya na Jemaa el-Fnaa square na Marrakesh, ebe ọ malitere ịbụ abụ tupu a hụ ya ma ọ ghọọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Abaamran ghọrọ onye a ma ama na Morocco maka ọrụ ya dịka Butfunast na ihe nkiri nwere otu aha ahụ, nke a gbara n'afọ ndi 1990
Mohammed Abaamran nwụrụ na Casablanca n'ọnwa Febụwarị 20, 2020, mgbe ọ lụsịrị ọgụ ogologo oge na ọrịa

Mohammed Abba Gana (amụrụ n'afọ 1943) jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na Civil Society nye osote onye isi ala Naijiria Atiku Abubakar ruo 22 Juun, na afọ 2006, mgbe onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo chụpụrụ ya
Ọ rụburu ọrụ dị ka Minista Federal Capital Territory site na 8 Febụwarị, na afọ 2001 ruo 17 Julaị, na afọ 2003
A mụrụ Gana na afọ 1943 na Damboa, Borno Steeti
Ọ gara Yelwa Boarding Senior Primary School, Maiduguri (1956 - 1958), Government College, Zaria, ugbu a Barewa College (1959 - 1963) na Okene-Provincial Secondary School (1964 - 1965)
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria (1966 - 1969) ebe ọ nwetara nzere na injinia eletrik
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi injinia na Ministry of Works and Housing nke North-Eastern State
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1979, gọmentị Great Nigeria People's Party (GNPP) nke Borno State n'okpuru Gọvanọ Mohammed Goni họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna nke Ọrụ na Ụlọ nke Borno Steeti
N'afọ 1983 ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke GNPP na Borno Steeti
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ ọ nọ na bọọdụ nke National Electric Power Authority (NEPA)
Mohamed Abdel Wahab (Arabic), nke a na-akpọkwa Mohamed Abd El-Wahhab (March 13, 1902 May 4, 1991), bụ onye a ma ama na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede egwu na narị afọ nke iri abụọ
A maara ya nke ọma maka abụ ịhụnanya na nke ndị Ijipt

A maara ya maka abụ mba Ijipt ya na nke mgbanwe dịka 'Ya Masr tam El-Hanna' (Oh Egypt, obi ụtọ dị ebe a), 'Hay Ala El-Falah' (Ọkpụkpọ ọrụ), 'El Watan El Akbar', 'Masr Nadetna falbena El-nedaa' (Ijipt akpọwo anyị ma n'ezie anyị zara oku ahụ), 'Oulo le Masr' (Kwuo Ijipt), 'Hob El-watan Fard Alyi', 'Sout-Gamaheer', 'Ya Ness El-Horria'd', 'Ya' (Sawe Men'Horria'
O nyekwara aka ma dee abụ mba nke Tunisia, 'Humat al-Hima', United Arab Emirates, 'Īsiy Bilādī', na 'Libya' nke sitere n'afọ 1951 ruo 1969 na ọzọ kemgbe afọ 2011
A mụrụ Mohamed Abdel Wahab n'afọ 1902 na Cairo, Egypt, n'ógbè a na-akpọ Bab El-Sheriyah, ebe e nwere ihe oyiyi ya ugbu a
Ọ malitere ọrụ ịbụ abụ ya mgbe ọ dị obere ma mee ihe ngosi ihu ọha mbụ ya mgbe ọ gbara afọ asaa na mmepụta mpaghara
Ọ dị afọ iri na atọ mgbe o mere ndekọ mbụ ya
Mohamed Abdel Wahab bụ ezigbo enyi onye na-agụ egwu obodo ya bụ Abdel Halim Hafez
N'afọ 1933, Abdel Wahab malitere ide ụdị egwu egwu nke ya n'ihe nkiri Egypt mgbe ọ gachara Paris ma mara ihe nkiri egwu French
O webatara ụdị ihe nkiri egwu na-atọ ụtọ na ọdịbendị Ijipt ma mechaa dee egwu asatọ n'etiti afọ 1933 na 1949
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1934 The White Flower nke mebiri ndekọ na ndị bịara ma ka na-eme ihe nkiri ugboro ugboro na ụlọ ihe nkiri Ijipt
N'afọ 1950, Abdel Wahab hapụrụ ihe nkiri iji lekwasị anya n'ịbụ onye na-agụ egwu
Abdel Wahab dere ihe karịrị abụ 1820
A na-ewere Abdel Wahab dịka otu n'ime ndị egwu Ijipt kachasị ọhụrụ n'oge niile, na-atọ ntọala maka oge ọhụrụ nke egwu Ijipt site na iji ụda ndị na-abụghị nke obodo na egwu oud dị mma
N'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na Abdel Wahab dere ọtụtụ abụ na egwu egwu Arabic oge ochie, a katọrọ ya nke ọma maka ntụziaka ya na egwu ọdịda anyanwụ
N'ezie, o webatara ụda ọdịda anyanwụ na abụ ndị Ijipt n'ụzọ dabara adaba na ụdị abụ ndị Ijipti a ma ama n'oge ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'afọ 1941, o webatara ụda waltz n'abụ ya 'El Gandol,' ma, n'ọnwa 1957, o webatara egwu rock na roll n'abụ Abdel Halim Hafez 'Ya Albi Ya Khali'
O dere ụfọdụ n'ime egwu kachasị mma nke Nagat El Saghira, gụnyere uri anọ nke Nizar Qabbani
Abdel Wahab na-akpọ oud n'ihu onye Egypt a ma ama na-ede uri, Ahmed Shawqi, ma mee ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
O dere egwu iri maka Umm Kulthum
Ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú Ijipt mbụ si n'oge na-adịghị ekwu okwu gaa n'ịbụ abụ
Abdel Wahab dekwara egwu maka ihe oyiyi Lebanọn Fairuz onye ọ kpọrọ 'Onye nnọchi anya anyị na kpakpando' ma kwuo n'afọ ndi 1950 na ọ bụ onye ndú nke klọb ndị na-akwado ya na Cairo
Mohamed Abdel Wahab nwụrụ n'obodo ya bụ Cairo, Egypt site na ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ n'ọnwa Mee 4, 1991
Abdel Wahab bụ isi n'ịtọlite oge ọhụrụ nke egwu Ijipt n'ala nna ya na n'ofe ụwa ndị Arab
Ọ hapụkwara akara na ụwa ọdịda anyanwụ site n'ikpughe egwu ndị Ijipt na omenala ọdịda anyanwụ na ọdịnala ndị a ma ama
O dere abụ mba Tunisia (Humat al-Hima) na Libya (Libya, Libya, Libya)
Na Machị 13, 2012, Google mere emume ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ 110 na Google Doodle
Egwú Mohammed 'Abd al-Wahhab ahọpụtara site na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ YouTube

Mohammed Abubakar Adamu (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1961) bụ onye uwe ojii Naijiria lara ezumike nka nke Ọ bụ onye isi nyocha iri abụọ nke ndị uwe ojii Naijiria Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya n'ụbọchị iri na ise n'ọnwa Jenụwari afọ 2019 dochie Ibrahim Kpotun Idris (rtd) nke Niger Steeti
Mohammed Adamu bụ onye Lafia, na Nasarawa Steeti
Eji Usman Alkali Baba dochie ya n'ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Eprel afo 021

Tupu a họpụta ya dịka onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii, ọ bụ onye enyemaka onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii na Benin City, Edo Steeti ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka njikwa na arụmọrụ nke NPF Mpaghara nke ise gụnyere Bayelsa, Delta na Edo Steeti
na ụbọchi iri na asaa n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1961 wee banye na ọrụ uwe ojii nke Naijiria na-afọ 1986, mgbe ọ gụchara akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria o nwetara nzere bachelor (Hons) na Geography
O nwekwara asambodo nke ukwu na Sistemụ ikpe ziri ezi ndị omempụ na mba nile na na Mahadum Portsmouth, England

Site na1983 ruo 1984, Adamu mere National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) ya na Wamba di na Nasarawa State ebe ọ kuziri Geography na Government Teachers College, Wamba di na Plateau State, n'oge ọrụ otu afọ, mgbe ahụ site na 1984 ruo1986, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nkuzi Geography ma mesịa bulie ya na-okwa mee ya osote onye isi na Government Day Secondary School, Gunduma, Keffi di na Plateau State, dị ugbu a na Nasarawa steeti

Dịka afọ ole na ole gasịrị, o sonyere ndị uwe ojii na-ahụ maka ndị uwe ojii dị ka Cadet Assistant Superintendent nke ndị uwe ojii na-afo 1986, a zụrụ ya na koleji nke ndị uwe ojii dị na Ikeja, Lagos Steeti ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ nkewa mpụ na nhazi na ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Mgbidi na Mgbidi dị na Imo Steeti
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọkwa dịka onye isi ihe nchọpụta nile dị n'aka na NPF mpaghara nke isii n'isi ụlọ ọrụ dị na Calabar
Adamu nwere ọtụtụ ahụmịhe mba ụwa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na NCB ndi Interpol nke di na Lagos site na-afo 1989 ruo afo 1997
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na Naijiria a akwadoro na Interpol General Secretariat di na Lyon na-afo 1997 ebe o jere ozi dị ka onye ọrụ ọkachamara na mpụ akụ na ụba na ego, Sub-directorate site 1997 ruo 2002
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ojii nke mbụ ojii na Africa a họpụtara dika osote onye isi nchịkwa na-ahụ maka African Sub-Directorate site na 2002 ruo 2005
Ọ bụkwa onye mbụ na mba Afrika nọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na INTERPOL Dika onye isi mgbe a họpụtara ya onye ntụzi nke ọrụ NCB na mmepe I-24/7 site na-afo 2005 ruo afo 2007
Mgbe ọ laghachitere Naịjirịa, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi na-ahụ maka nchekwa udo na ọzụzụ na isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Naijiria dị na Abuja
N'etiti afọ 2013 na 2015, a họpụtara ya ịbụ osote kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii na kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii na iwu nke dị n'Enugu Steeti
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nọchiri anya onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii na ụbọchi iri na ise n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afo 2019, iji nọchie Ibrahim Idris
Ibrahim Idris

N'Ụbọchi iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afo 2019, ka Adamu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nyocha ọhụrụ nke ndị uwe ojii nyefere aha mmadụ isii bụ osote ndị nyocha ọhụrụ nke ndị uwe ojii na kọmịshọna ndị uwe ojii maka nnabata izugbe
Nhọpụta ya zuru oke dị ka onye isi nyocha iri abụọ nke ụmụ amaala gosipụtara site n'aka Muhammadu Buhari, GCFR, Onye isi ala nke Nigeria na ụbọchi iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Mee afo 2019

Mohammed Sanusi Daggash (a mụrụ n'abalị 22 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1960) bụ onye Naijiria na-ewu ụlọ na onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke a họpụtara dịka onye otu ụlọ omebeiwu na 1999, wee bụrụ Onye nnọchite anya maka Borno North (Borno State) na 2003
Onye isi ala Umaru Yar'Adua họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka National Planning Commission of Nigeria na July 2007, ma wepụ ya n'ọkwa ya na October 2008
Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara ya ọzọ dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọrụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010
A mụrụ Mohammed Sanusi Daggash na 22 Disemba 1960 na Kironewa, Marte Local Government Area, Borno State
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Capacity School, Kaduna (1966–1973) na King's College, Lagos (1973–1978)
Ọ gara Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria na 1978, nweta MSc na Osisentọala na 1984
Daggash jere ozi n'okpuru atụmatụ NYSC (1984–1985) na Ministry of Works and Housing na Borno State
N'afọ 1985, ọ ghọrọ Commonwealth Scholar, na-aga University College, London ebe o nwetara MSc na Development Economics n'afọ 1986
Ọ mekwara ọmụmụ agụsịaakwụkwọ na Mahadum Harvard na 1988
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 1986, Daggash guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ (Mass Consult - Nigeria) na Kaduna
N'afọ 1989, a họpụtara ya na Nigeria Football Association Board maka afọ anọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche na ndụmọdụ na iwu ụlọ ruo mgbe ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge Sani Abacha
N'afọ 1995, ọ malitere ịmụ maka Masters na Public Administration, e nyekwara ya ákàrà ugo mmụta na 1998
Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii Ego nke United Nigeria Congress Party (UNCP)
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ bụ onye guzobere People's Democratic Party (PDP) ma jee ozi na National Establishment Committee
A hoputara ya n'ụlọ ndị nnọchi anya na 1999 maka mpaghara Marte, Monguno, na Nganzi nke Borno Steeti
N'okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party (PDP), a họpụtara Daggash dị ka onye omeiwu na 5th (2003–2007) National Assembly na-anọchite anya Borno North Senatorial District
Onye ya na zọrọ ọkwa ya na ANPP, Hajia Fati Ibrahim Bulama rịọrọ arịrịọ maka nsonaazụ ahụ, ma na-esote arịrịọ dị iche iche, ntuli aka Daggash kagburu na Nọvemba 2003
Otú ọ dị, ụlọ ikpe ahụ chọpụtakwara na Bulama erughị eru ịzọ ọkwa maka ntuli aka
Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Juun afọ 2004, Independent National Electoral Commission ka haziri ntuli aka ọhụrụ maka oche ahụ
N'ikpeazụ, Daggash nọgidere n'oche ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii Sineti iri dị iche iche n'oge ọchịchị ya
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche, Kọmitii Senate na Ọnụọgụgụ mmadụ na ID
Card, na onye otu Kọmitii Senate na FCT, Capital Market, Loans and Debt, Banking, Currency and Finance Parliamentary Network On World Bank (PNWB)
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị isi nke Guinea Insurance Company

Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa PDP maka Borno North na ntuli aka Senate nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2007, mana ọ hapụrụ asọmpi ahụ ụbọchị ole na ole na ntuli aka iji mee mkpesa maka nnukwu aghụghọ nke ANPP na-achị achị nke gosipụtara ntuli aka gọvanọ bu ụzọ
E mesịrị kwupụta na oche sineti bụ nke All Nigeria People's Party (ANPP) Maina Maaji Lawan meriri
A họpụtara Daggash ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka atụmatụ mba na ọnwa July afọ 2007
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2008, o so na ndị nnọchi anya Naịjirịa nke Shamsudeen Usman, Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego, nke gara China
Mgbe nzukọ ahụ gasịrị, osote Mịnịsta Yu bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta abụọ ya na Daggash
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2008, Daggash kwupụtara na Naịjirịa ebelatawo ọnụ ahịa mmanụ na mmefu ego nke afọ 2009 ruo $ 45 kwa paụnd n'ihi ọdịda dị ukwuu na ọnụ ahịa mmanụ ala ụwa
Mgbe e mesịrị n'ọnwa ahụ, a napụrụ ya n'ọkwa ya
N'afọ 2008, Daggash ghọọrọ onye isi nke Effectivo Capital, ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ego na njikwa akụ nke dị na Abuja

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2009, Daggash so na 'ndị nlekọta' na Borno Steeti PDP bụ ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe megide ihe ndị isi otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mba ahụ mere ịmanye ndị isi oche na ndị isi na steeti ahụ
A họpụtara Daggash ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọrụ na ụlọ na 6 Eprel 2010
Mohammed Kaghat (1942-2001) bụ onye mba Morocco na-ede egwuregwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
O nyekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ma dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gbasara ihe nkiri na ekwuǹkà na Morocco
Mohammed Kaghat dere ma duzie ihe dịka egwuregwu iri atọ
E bipụtakwara ụfọdụ n'ime egwuregwu ya
Mohammed Kaghat mere ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn ndị a
Mohammed Karim (1896 - 1972) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe
Karim mere ka Faten Hamama bụrụ onye a ma ama na ihe nkiri Yawm Said
E tinyere ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1946 bụ Dunia n'ime emume ihe nkiri Cannes nke afọ 1946
Mohammed Mana (amụrụ n'abalị asaa nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1950) bụ onye nchịkwa agha nke Plateau Steeti n'agbata ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 1993 na ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1996 n'oge ọchịchị ọchịagha Sani Abacha
A hoputara ya dịka Sịnetọ n'ahụ maka ugwu Adamawa n'afọ 2007 n'okpuru otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party (PDP)
A mụrụ Mana n'abalị asaa nke ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ 1950
Ọ gara kọleji gọọmentị, Keffi
O nwetara akara diplọma na teknụzụ mmanụ site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ quartermaster Ndị agha US n'afọ 1976
N'afọ 1987, ọ nwetara akara diplọma na nchịkwa ọhaneze na mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria
Dị ka Gọvanọ Plateau Steeti, n'afọ 1994, Lt
Col
Mohammed Mana hiwere kọmishọn ga-eleba anya n'ime nsogbu agbụrụ dị na Jos
Nsogbu ndị a bụ n'ihi esemokwu dị n'etiti Berom, Anaguta, na Afizere n'otu akụkụ, na agbụrụ Hausa -Fulani n'aka nke ọzọ
Ihe butere ọgbaghara bụ nhọpụta Mana họpụtara onye Hausa ka ọ bụrụ 'onye isi oche Kọmitii nlekọta' Jos
Mana lara ezumike nká na ndị agha n'ọnwa June nke afọ 1999 mgbe Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo nyere iwu na ndị niile bụ ndị nchịkwa ndị agha ga ala ezumike nka
Mgbe ọ bụrụ Sịnetọ n'onwa Mee nke afọ 2007, a họpụtara Mana ka ọ bụrụ onye otu kọmitii na Nhọrọ, Ike, Njikọta na Imekọ Ihe ọnụ
A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ụtarị nke Sineti
Ọ kwadoro nkwado mmezi iwu n'ụlọ ọrụ n'ahụ maka oke ala n'afọ 2009 yana akwụkwọ iwu maka njikwa ụtaba, n'afọ 2009

Mgbe ọ na -ekwu okwu n'onwa Maachị nke afọ 2009 na mkpesa Ndozigharị ntuli aka nke kọmitii nke ikpe ziri ezi nke Mohammed Uwais na-achị ọ tụrụ aro ka ndị isi otu ahụ họpụta onye isi Ụlọ ọrụ Ntuli Aka Mba, mana a ga -enyocha nyocha ikpe

Dika emechara Nnapụ ọchịchị n'ke nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2010 na Niger, onye isi sineti David Mark rịọrọ Mohammed Mana na Sịnetọ John Shagaya nke Plateau Steeti ka ha jiri njikọ chiri anya ha na ndị isi ndị agha ọhụrụ nke Niger gbaa ha ume ka ha nabata ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2010, a họpụtara Mana ka ọ bụrụ otu onye n'ime kọmitii mmadụ iri abụọ ga achọta ụzọ isi dozie nsogbu nke Jos na- enwe, ebe e nwere ọgba aghara na-enweghị atụ n'etiti ndị Alakụba na Ndị Kraịst
Na ntuli aka nke ntuli mba emere n'ụbọchị itooly nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, Mana bụ onye na-asọ mpi na ntuliaka PDP ka ọ bụrụkwa onye ga-anọchite mpaghara ọchịchị sineti nke ugwu Adamawa
Agbanyeghị, ọ tụfuru nhọpụta
Mana tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa megide nhọpụta Umar Bindo Jibrilla dị ka onye ga -azọ ntụli aka nke ugwu Adamawa
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 2011, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke dị n'Abuja kagburu mkpesa ahụ dị ka enweghị uru
Mana rịọrọ mkpesa a
Onye mere ntụli aka n'okpuru otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Congress for Progressive Change (CPC), Abba Mohammed, nwetara vootu puku iri abụọ na abụọ, narị asatọ na iri isii na isii
Ụlọọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) kọkwara nke a n'ụbọchị iri na isii nke ọnwa Eprel
Agbanyeghị, ka ọ na -eru ụbọchị iri abụọ n'ato nke ọnwa Eprel, Njikọ Ntuli akaNaịjirịa na -akọ na Mana bụ onye otu PDP meriri ntuli aka ahụ
Mohammed Muyei (bu onye amụrụ na Febụwarị 7, 1975 na Niamey ) bụ onye Nigerien na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ na-agbara New Edubiase United bọọlụ ugbu a
Muyei gbara bọọlụ site na 2001 ruo 2003 maka Sekondi Hasaacas FC, n'oge gara aga ọ gbakwara Kelantan FA (01072003-01012005) ma mesịa maka Stade Malien (Bamako, Mali)
Ọ bụkwa onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger egwuregwu abụọ ọ gbara na World Cup Qualification 2006 na 11 Ọktoba na 14 Nọvemba 2003 megide otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Algeria
Mohammed Salam bụ onye Sudanese a mụrụ na Qatar na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba maka klọb Qatari Al Kharitiyath na Qatar Stars League Ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-agbachitere ma na-eyi nọmba 14
Mohammed Sani Saleh bụ onye ọchịagha lara ezumike nká na onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya Senator na-anọchite mpaghara etiti Kaduna na ọgbakọ mba dị na Abuja
Naịjirịa, a họpụtara ya n'ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel 2011 n'oge ntuli aka mba na okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Congress for Progressive Change (CPC)

Na ntuli aka nke ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, ndị ọmụma aka Saleh bụ onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Ego mmepe teknụzụ mmanụ ala, Hamisu Yusuf Abubakar (Mairago) nke otuPeople's Democratic Party (PDP), na Hajia Halima Aminu Turaki nke otu Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN)

Mgbe ekwusịrị onye mmeri ntuli aka, Saleh toro Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) maka omume ntuli aka ahụ, na-ekwu na 'ọ rụọla ọrụ nkwenye nke ọma n'oge a, dị mma nke ukwuu, enwere m olileanya na a ga na-eme ya na ntuli aka ndị ọzọ'

N'oge ntuli aka onye isi ala na n'ụbọchị iri na isii nke ọnwa prel afọ 2011, e nwere mbọ ndị ntorobịa nọ na Kaduna kpalitere mgbe osote onye isi ala Namadi Sambo nke PDP rutere ebe a na-eme ntuli aka ịtụ vootu
Saleh kwadoro ndị isi na igbochi ihe ahụ merenụ, na-ekwu 'Anyị ga-asọpụrụ ikike emebere
Ọbụnadi ọdịnala anyị gwara anyị ka anyị sọpụrụ ndị okenye anyị ”
O tokwara etu ntuli aka ahụ si gaa, na-akọwa ya dịka ihe nlere anya
Mohammed Salih Ali Soulah ( Arabic , a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 29 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Libya na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbara klọb Al-Arabi SC nke Kuwaiti bọọlụ

Mohau Mokoatle ( née Cele) (amụrụ Septemba 28, 1991) bụ onye omere na onye na-agụ egwú South Africa
Ọ gbara Bongi na MTV Shuga gụnyere obere usoro 2020 akpọrọ MTV Shuga Alone Together
A zụlitere Cele na Soweto mana amuru na Matatiele na 1991
Ọ nwere ike ịsụ Bekee, Sesotho, IsiZulu, IsiXhosa na Setswana
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Wiwaterrand
Ọrụ izizi ya bụ MTV Shuga nke ọ sonyere na oge 4 dị ka Bongi
O nwetara ihe ngosi n'ihi na ha na-achọ onye na-agụ egwú
O meela ihe nkiri na mahadum, mana ọrụ izizi ọkachamara mbụ ya gụnyere ime njem site na South Africa gaa Nigeria ebe emere ihe onyonyo nke 4 ihe karịrị izu isii
Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation na UNICEF kwadoro usoro nkuzi a
Ọ bụ agwa na usoro Thuli noThulani maka SABC na 2017 ebe ọ gbara osote onye isi
Ọ nọ na usoro 4, 5 na 7 nke MTV Shuga na etinyere ya mgbe ọ banyere na obere usoro akpọrọ MTV Shuga Naanị ọnụ na- akọwapụta nsogbu nke Coronavirus na 20 Eprel 2020
Tunde Aladese na Nkiru Njoku dere ma duzie usoro a ma gbasaa kwa izu kwa ụbọchị, United Nations só na ndị na-akwado ya
Usoro a ga-adabere na Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya na Côte d'Ivoire na akụkọ ga-aga n'ihu site na iji mkparịta ụka ịntanetị n'etiti ndị agwa
Mohombi Nzasi Moupondo (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1986) bụ onye egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, onye edemede na onye na-agba egwu na Congolese-Swedish
Ọ tolitere na Norsborg na Kista nso Stockholm
Mohombi bụ RedOne mbụ bịanyere aka na 2101 Records na njikọ aka na Universal Music Group
Site na 2000 ruo 2008, Mohombi so n'òtù hip hop Swedish Avalon na nwanne ya nwoke Djo Moupondo
Mohombi wepụtara egwu izizi ya 'Bumpy Ride' n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010
Otu ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama n'ụwa niile, ma depụta n'elu iri n'ọtụtụ mba, ma soro ya na abọm studio mbụ ya MoveMeant na Febụwarị 2011
A mụrụ Mohombi n'aka nne Swedish na nna Congolese
O nwere ụmụnne iri na anọ
Mohombi na ezinụlọ ya hapụrụ Congo agha mebiri emebi wee kwaga Stockholm, Sweden na 1999 mgbe Mohombi dị afọ 13
Mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri abụọ, Mohombi gbazitere otu ọnụ ụlọ n'ụlọ Simon B nke Radio 1 UAE maka nwata iji mata ya nke ọma

Nne na nna ya na-ekpughekarị ya mmetụta egwu dịgasị iche iche site na nwata Mohombi gụrụ akwụkwọ na Rytmus Music High School na Stockholm wee pụta n'oge ọ nọ n'elu ikpo okwu, na 2002 na mweghachi Swedish nke Wild Side Story Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na egwu na Royal College of Music, Stockholm
Ọ na-asụ Bekee, French, Lingala, Spanish, Swahili na Swedish

Na Stockholm, Mohombi na nwanne ya nwoke Djo Moupondo, onye DJ klọb dị n'ógbè ahụ a maara dị ka DJ Djo guzobere otu Avalon [isi iyi na-abụghị isi dị mkpa] na-ejikọta dancehall na hip hop nke oge ahụ na ọdịiche Africa nke a zụlitere ha

Site n'afọ 2004 ruo n'afọ 2008, otu ahụ rere ihe karịrị ọkara nde ndekọ wee merie All African Kora Awards, nke Afrịka yiri Grammy maka ụdị Best Group São Diaspora Europe / Caribbean, ebe Mohombi ghọrọ onye na-ede egwu na onwe ya
N'oge a, egwu bụ naanị ọrụ nwa oge, na ịchọ ihe ọzọ, Mohombi gara Los Angeles iji gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ya

Na afọ 2005, Avalon sonyere na Melodifestivalen, na mgbalị iru eru maka Eurovision Song Contest 2005 na-anọchite anya Sweden na egwu Bekee na French 'Big Up' nke gụnyekwara okwu mmeghe na asụsụ Lingala
Na afọ 2005, ndị Avalon sonyere na ihe ngosi 'sthlm', mmemme egwu kwa afọ nke a haziri na Lava Kulturhuset
Na 2 June ọnwa nke afọ 2007, Avalon sonyere na Hoodsfredsfestivalen na Kista
Na 21 ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2007, Avalon weputara abọm studio ya Afro-Viking nke e mere maka ahịa Afrịka
Avalon esorola ndị na-ese ihe / ndị na-ede egwu dịka Bob Sinclar, Million Stylez, Mohaamed Lamine, Silver Room, Alexander Papadimas na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ rụkọọ ọrụ
Mohombi sooro onye na-eti egwu Sweden bụ Lazee rụkọọ ọrụ na 'Do It', nke a tọhapụrụ na Sweden na 31 Mee 2010
Ọ malitere na ọnụọgụ itoolu na Swedish Singles Chart
Na Los Angeles, e mere ka Mohombi mara site n'aka ndị enyi na onye na-emepụta ihe na Sweden-Morocco RedOne
Otu egwu izizi nke onye na-agụ egwu ahụ, 'Bumpy Ride' bụ nke mbụ a tọhapụrụ na akara RedOne 2101 Records, njikọ aka na Universal
A tọhapụrụ ya na United States na 24 August 2010
Mohombi wepụtara 'Miss Me' dị ka egwu izizi ya na United Kingdom na 31 October 2010
Ọ na-egosi onye America na-eti egwu Nelly
E wepụtara egwu nke atọ ya akpọrọ 'Dirty Situation' na Europe na 11 ọnwa Nọvemba ma gosipụta onye na-agụ egwu R&B Akon
A na-akpọ 'Dirty Situation' na mbido ma mesịa ọzọ na etiti vidiyo egwu maka 'Miss Me'
A tọhapụrụ abọm izizi Mohombi, MoveMeant na Europe Mọnde 28 ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2011 na US na ngwụcha afọ 2011
Mohombi gosipụtara na egwu 'Hoola Hoop', egwu na 2011 Stella Mwangi album Kinanda
Otu egwu Mohombi, 'Coconut Tree' gosipụtara olu Nicole Scherzinger
Na afọ 2011, Mohombi pụtara nke mbụ ya kwa afọ na MAD Video Music Awards, na Athens, Gris, ya na Katerína Stikoúdi na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, na 'Coconut Tree Make Me Stay'
Na 2 ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2011, Mohombi wepụtara egwu ọzọ akpọrọ 'Maraca' na iTunes na Sweden
Mohombi dekwara egwu 'Suave (Kiss Me)' na Nayer & Pitbull
A họpụtara ya maka Best Swedish Act na 2011 European Music Awards na Belfast
Nke a ga-abụ Pop depụtara ya nke asaa na Top 10 nke afọ 2012
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Disemba na afọ 2011, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ọbịa egwu na oge nke mbụ nke The Voice of Romania
Na afọ 2014, Mohombi kpebiri ịhapụ Universal Music ma guzobe akara egwu nke ya, La Clique Music, wepụta abọm ya bụ Universe
A kpọrọ Mohombi na ọnwa Julaị bu ubochi nke afọ 2015 ka ọ nọchite anya ndị ntorobịa mba ya na nzukọ nke United Nations haziri na New York City
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị ọka ikpe nke 2015 Best of the Best All Stair season, nnukwu ihe ngosi nka na Democratic Republic of Congo
Na afọ 2015, Mohombi sonyeere Pitbull na 'Baddest Girl in Town' na wisin
Na afọ 2016, Mohombi sonyeere Joey Montana na Picky (remix) na Akon
Na afọ 2016, Mohombi nwetakwara onyinye Grammy maka òkè ya na album Pitbull Dale maka ụdị Best album of the year
O sonyere na Melodifestivalen 2019 na egwu 'Hello', ebe o mere ya na njedebe ikpeazụ na nke ise
Na afọ 2020, o sonyere na Melodifestivalen 2020 na egwu 'Winners'
O ruru na ngwụcha, ebe ọ gwụchara na ọnọdụ nke iri na abụọ, na-enweta ngụkọta nke akara 26
N'ọnwa Disemba 2022, Mohombi kwuputara ndoro-ndoro ochichi ya maka ntuli aka onye isi ala 2023 dika onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi nwere onwe ya
Àtụ Mohombi
Moi moi bụ ezigbo nri na Naịjirịa, a na-eji agwa akwọrọ akwọ wee mee ya na ngwa nri pụrụ iche
Enwere usoro eji esi moi moi n'ụzọ dị iche iche, usoro ana-ahụkarị bụ isi nri moi moi na ọkwá, aluminom foil akpa, akwụkwọ banana, naịlọn
ọ bụ nri na-agbanwe agbanwe nke ọma, ụfọdụ na-agbakwunye azụ, akwa esiri esi, iji tinye na ụtọ ya
E nwere ụị moị mọị dị iche iche, mọị mọị ọka, mọị mọi ọgede na mọị mọị agwa akwọrọ akwọ

Moin-Moin ma ọ bụ Moimoi bụ nri a na-esi ísì ụtọ ma ọ bụ na-esi nri nke a na-eme site na ngwakọta nke agwa ojii na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, nke a na'ejikọkarị ya na yabasị na ose na-acha ọbara ọbara (nke a na-ejikarị ngwakọta nke ose, chili ma ọ bụ bonnet Scotch)
Ọ bụ nri jupụtara na protein nke bụ ihe dị mkpa na Naịjirịa
Na Ghana na Sierra Leone, a na-akpọkarị ya 'Alele' ma ọ bụ 'Olele'
A na-ejikarị ya na Hausa koko
Tubaani (nke a na-akpọkwa Tubani) bụ nri yiri nke a na-ahụ na Northern Ghana

Black-eyed ma ọ bụ brown beans, tatashe (red bell pepper), scotch bonnet pepper( atarodo / fresh pepper), nri nri nri nri akwụkwọ nri, tomato puree (maka ụcha ọzọ, mana nhọrọ), Tablespoonful ground Crayfish, nnukwu onions bulbs, àkwá, ma ọ bụ anụ e siri esi ma ọ bụ Ọkpụkpụ ma ọ bụ Corned beef ma ọ bụ deboned fish e siri esi e siri esi ozu ma ọ bụ azụ̀ e siri esi esi esi esi, bouillon / stock cubes maka Nri (dị ka ọ dị mkpa), iji mee nnu
A na-akwadebe Moin-Moin site na ibu ụzọ tinye ya na mmiri oyi ruo mgbe ha dị nro iji wepụ ezigbo mkpuchi ma ọ bụ akpụkpọ
Mgbe ahụ, a na-egweri ha ma ọ bụ gwakọta ha (iji blender) ruo mgbe a ga-enweta ezigbo paste
A na-agbakwunye nnu, cube bouillon, crayfish kpọrọ nkụ, mmanụ akwụkwọ nri (ma ọ bụ mmanụ ọ bụla a na-eri eri dị ka mmanụ nkwụ) na ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ụfọdụ na-agbakwunye sardines, anụ ehi, àkwá e siri esi, ma ọ bụ ngwakọta nke ndị a na 'garnishes' ndị ọzọ iji mee ka Moin-Moin dị ndụ
A na-akpọ nke a dị ka inwe 'x' ọnụọgụ ndụ, 'x' na-anọchite anya ọnụọgụ nke ihe ịchọ mma agbakwunyere
Nke a na-akwalite bụ Moin-Moin elemi, nke na-asụgharị Moin-moin nwere ndụ asaa
Moin-Moin na-abịakarị n'ụdị pyramid, ọdịdị cylindrical, ọdịdị cone na ọdịdị ọ bụla a chọrọ n'ihi ebu a na-awụnye ya tupu esi nri

Ọdịdị pyramid ahụ sitere na 'ewe eran' (Thaumatococcus daniellii) ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ unere nke a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ cone n'ime nkwụ mmadụ, mgbe ahụ, a na-awụnye mmiri a na-etinye n'ime akwụkwọ, nke a na'agbakọta
Ọdịdị cylindrical sitere na ite mmiri ara ehi ma ọ bụ tomato sauce nke a na-eji akwadebe nri ndị ọzọ
Ozugbo ọ dị n'ime ebu ya, a na-etinye ya n'ime nnukwu ite ihe dị ka otu ụzọ n'ụzọ iri jupụtara na mmiri
Mmiri bụ isi iyi nke anwụrụ ọkụ nke na-esi nri na Moin-Moin
A na-eri Moin-Moin naanị ya ma ọ bụ na achịcha dị ka nri, na osikapa dị ka nri ma ọ bụ ogi maka nri ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ nri abalị

A pụkwara iwere ya na garri n'ehihieUsoro Moin-Moin dị ka e mere ka ọ dị mfe site na ịgwakọta ọka na ntụ ọka a na-akpọkwa ntụ ọka ọka, usoro ntụ ọka a dị ka mbelata nrụgide nke ịkpụ ọka na ịsa ahụ ọtụtụ ugboro, ihe niile dị mkpa bụ ịgwakọta ntụ ọka na mmiri, ịgbakwunye ihe na nnu iji nụ ụtọ, azụ, stocks, pawns, wdg
Moira Lister Gachassin-Lafite, Viscountess of Orthez (6 August 1923 意 27 October 2007) bụ onye South African-British na-eme ihe nkiri, na telivishọn na onye edemede
A mụrụ ya na Cape Town na Major James Lister na Margaret (née Hogan), Lister gụrụ akwụkwọ na Parktown Convent of the Holy Family, Johannesburg
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ ihe nkiri nke Anna Romain Hoffman, onye ya na di ya Arthur Hoffman guzobere The Johannesburg Repertory Theatre
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'elu ikpo okwu na South Africa wee gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri na London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
Lister malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri n'afọ 1943, ma pụta n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'ime ọtụtụ iri afọ
Ndị a ma ama n'ime ndị a bụ maka Ealing Studios, dịka Another Shore (1948), A Run for Your Money (1949), Pool of London (1951) na The Cruel Sea (1953)
Ọ pụtara na Peter Ustinov's long-running 1951 play The Love of Four Colonels in the West End
(N'ikpeazụ, usoro ihe omume a kpọrọ The Very Merry Widow na How!) Lister pụtakwara na usoro ihe nkiri British TV ndị ọzọ dịka Danger Man na The Avengers ('The See-Through Man', 1967)
N'afọ 1980, ọ pụtara dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na sitcom Only When I Laugh
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke This Is Your Life n'afọ 1971 mgbe Eamonn Andrews juru ya anya
Lister ka na-eme ihe ruo afọ atọ tupu ọnwụ ya, na-agagharị na otu nwanyị ya na-egosi banyere Noël Coward
Ọ bụ onye British Catholic Stage Guild
N'afọ 1946, Lister so Neville Heath, onye bụbu onyeisi ndị agha ụgbọelu South Africa, gaa London, onye gburu ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na London naanị ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị
A mara Heath ikpe mgbe e kpesịrị ya ikpe dị egwu, a kwụgbukwara ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1946
N'afọ 1951, Moira Lister lụrụ onye Belgo-French aristocrat Jacques Gachassin-Lafite, Viscount of Orthez, nwa André Gachassin -Lafite (Viscount of Ortchez) na Louise van Dievoet
Jacques bụ onye ọrụ French nke Spahis, onye nwe ubi vaịn champagne na dike nke agha Rif; ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Chantal na Christobel
Lister nwekwara ụmụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Christina d'Orthez na Marina d'Otthez
Moira Lister nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 84 n'afọ 2007
E liri ya na di ya na chọọchị St Edward's Catholic Church na Sutton Green, Surrey
Moji Olaiya (27 February 1975 – 17 May 2017) was a Nigerian actress
Ada Highlife musician Victor Olaiya, Moji Olaiya malitere orụ ya na ulụ orụ Wale Adenuga 's nke mere Super Story
O putara na otutu ihe nkiri Nollywood nke emere na Yoruba na Bekee
A ma ya maka ọrụ ya na ihe onyonyo dịka No Pains No Gains, nke o a ha ya na ịhe oyonyo ahu by Ireti, Sade Blade (2005), Nkan adun (2008) na Omo iya meta leyi (2009)
O sokazi me ịhe oyonyo a na kpọ Agunbaniro
Na 2003 a họpụtara ya maka Reel Award Best Supporting Actress of the year, a ma turugo nke Best New Actress Award
N’afọ 2016, Olaiya wepụtara otu ihe nkiri, Iya Okomi, bụ Foluke Daramola na Funsho Adeolu nke ga-amalite na Lagos na Julaị
Olaiya lụrụ Bayo Okesola na 2007 ha mecha kewa
Ọ bayere ba uka alakụba na 2014

Olaiya wuru na ụbosi iri na asatọ to ọwa may afo 2017 an oria obi nke mere na obodo Canada ebe ọno muo nwa nke abua ya ọnwa nabo grar aga Enịrị ya na ubosi asa na ọwa June afọ 2017 ka ndị uka alakuba si elị nmaduKpọpụta njehie The opening tag is malformed or has a bad name

Moji Solar-Wilson (amụrụ 1968 na Ijero-Ekiti, Ekiti State) bụ onye na-ere ahịa ụlọ ala Naịjirịa bi na United Kingdom, onye na-akwado LGBTQIA+, onye na-ekwu maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye isi oche nke Solar Worldwide Realty Inc
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị hụrụ nwanyị nwanyị n'anya, Margaret Wilson, na 2017, ghọrọ di na nwunye mbụ ama ama ama ama ama na Naịjirịa
Mojisola Adekunle-Obasanjo onye amụrụ na 10 August 1944 - June 4, 2009) bụ onye isi ala nke ndị agha Naijiria 'Nigerian army' nke lara ezum ike nka
Ọ kwadoro nzukọ 'Masses Movement of Nigeria na 1998 makwa dọọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchichi onye isi ala na Masses Movement of Nigeria (MMN) na 2003
Ọ bụ ya bụ Nwanyi nani nọ na nhoputa maka ntuli aka 2007 presidential elections
Ọ bụburu nwunye onye isiala nke Naijiria gara aga Olusegun Obasanjo site n'afọ 1991–1998)
Adekunle-Obasanjo nwụrụ na Tọzdai, abali anọ n'ọnwa isii n'afọ 2009 n'ụlọ nwa ya nwanyi nke di n' Ikoyi Lagos ebe ọriachara obere ọria
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ anọ (4) na ọtụtụ ụmụ ụmụ
Àtụ Infobox sportsperson
Mojisola Oluwa (amụrụ na 27 Machị 1973 bụ onye Naijirịa na-ebu ibu
O sonyere na 1996 Summer Olympics na ihe omume ụmụ nwoke 70 kilogram Ọ meriri ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 70 kilogram na 1994 Commonwealth Games

Mojisolaoluwa malitere ọrụ ya na nta akụkọ na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi n'afo 1997 dị ka onye ọkwa ọrụ maka Redio Legọs /Eko FM (1997-1999) , ọ rụrụ ọrụ ozugbo nke ahụ dịka onye mgbasa ozi onye mgbasa ozi / onye ngosi na MITV/STAR FM afọ atọ ( 1999–2001), wee gaa na NTA 2 Channel 5 ka onye nyocha akụkọ, onye na-eweta akụkọ na onye nrụpụta (2001–2002)
Ọ zọọrọ dịka onye ndụmọdụ na WARD B1, Amuwo Odofin n'okpuru Action Congress nke Naijiria wee merie na (2010 -2013)
Ọ bụkwa onye bụbu osote onye isi, Amuwo Odofin Legislative Council, mpaghara ọchịchị obodo nke Amuwo Odofin
N'afọ 2019 O meriri wee merie na Amuwo Odofin Constituency 1
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye otu na ọgbakọ omebe iwu 9th, ụlọ nzukọ nke Legọs Steeti

Mokgabo Onneile Thanda (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ato n'ọnwa Eprel, n'afọ 1993) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Motswana nke na-agba dịka onye na-eme bọọlụ n'etiti maka klọb Zambia Yasa FC na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Botswana
Thanda agbaala bọọlụ maka Yasa na Zambia
Thanda gbara ọsọ maka Botswana na ọkwa dị elu n'oge mbipụta COSAFA Women's Championship abụọ na afọ (2020 na 2021)
Mokgweetsi Masisi bụ nwa Edison Masisi (1921 Tian 2003), onye omeiwu Moshupa ogologo oge na onye otu kansụl ọtụtụ oge
Masisi nke obere tolitere na Gaborone, na-aga Thornhill Primary School na Maru A Pula School
Otu n'ime ụmụnne ya atọ, Tshelang, bụ onye omeiwu maka Francistown West ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ebe onye ọzọ bụ ọchịagha ndị agha lara ezumike nká
O nwekwara nwanne nwanyị, Phadi
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ, Masisi na-asọ mpi na bọọlụ na tenis, mana n'ikpeazụ ọ chọpụtara na ime ihe nkiri bụ ọkpụkpọ ya
N'afọ 1984, ọ nwetara otuto maka ngosipụta ya nke ọrụ ndu na mmepụta Gaborone nke Cry the Beloved Country O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri South Africa
N'afọ 1980, Masisi ghọrọ onye nkuzi ọmụmụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Botswana n'afọ 1984 na Bekee na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ọ kụziri na Mmanaana Secondary School n'afọ 1984 n'obodo Moshupa tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Botswana n'afọ 1987 dị ka ọkachamara na mmepe usoro mmụta

N'afọ 1989, ọ gara Mahadum Steeti Florida iji nweta nzere masta na agụmakwụkwọ sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mgbe Masisi zutere ụfọdụ ndị otu FSU na-arụ ọrụ na Botswana maka Junior Secondary Education Improvement Project
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, UNICEF were ya n'ọrụ na Botswana
Masisi enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na-achọ nhọpụta nke ndị na-achị Botswana Democratic Party (BDP) ka ha guzo na mpaghara Moshupa na ntuli aka nke afọ 2004
Otú ọ dị, ọ nwetara nhọpụta BDP maka otu oche ahụ tupu ntuli aka afọ 2009 wee merie oche ahụ
A họpụtara ya ozugbo dị ka osote minista maka ihe gbasara onye isi ala na nchịkwa ọha na eze n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009
Mgbe ihe karịrị otu afọ dị ka osote minista, a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara onye isi ala na nchịkwa ọha na eze n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2011
Masisi ghọrọ Minista nke Mmụta na Mmepe Nkà na ikike ime ihe n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'oche ya na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2014, a họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Mmụta na Mmepe Nkà n'ụbọchị 28 Ọktobe n'afọ 2014
Onye isi ala Ian Khama họpụtara Masisi dị ka osote onye isi ala nke Botswana n'ụbọchị 12 Nọvemba 2014 mgbe ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ya dị ka Minista nke Mmụta
President Khama appointed Masisi as the Chancellor of the University of Botswana on July 5, 2017
The appointment, which was in consonance with Section 7 of the University of Botswana Act of 2008, was for a period of five years
It followed the death of former President Quett Masire, who served as the Chancellor until he died on June 22, 2017

Mesuli bụ aha South Africa nyere
Ndị ama nwere aha
Omolara Ogundipe-Leslie (27 Disemba 1940 - 18 June 2019), onye a makwaara dị ka Molara Ogundipe, bụ onye Naijiria na- ede uri, onye nkatọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, nwanyị na onye na-akwado ya

N'ịbụ onye a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ndị edemede mbụ na African Feminism, ọmụmụ nwoke na nwanyị na nkà mmụta akwụkwọ, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ onye a bịara mara dị ka ikike dị irè na ụmụ nwanyị Africa n'etiti ndị inyom ojii na ndị inyom n'ozuzu
O nyere mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ 'Ọ bụghị Spinning na Axis of Maleness' na 1984 anthology Sisterhood Is Global The International Women's Movement Anthology, nke Robin Morgan deziri
A na-emere ya emume nke ọma maka iwepụta okwu STIWA ma ọ bụ mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha na eze n'Africa gụnyere ụmụ nwanyị
Abiodun Omolara Ogundipe bụ onye a mụrụ na Lagos, Nigeria, mụbanye na ezinụlọ nke ndị nkuzi na ndị ụkọchukwu
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Queen, Ede, wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nwetara akara ugo mmụta BA Honours na bekee na mahadum kọleji Ibadan, na kwa kọleji nke Mahadum London
O mechara nweta akara ugo mmụta doctorate na Narratology (theory of narrative) na Mahadum Leiden, otu n'ime mahadum kacha ochie na Europe

Ọ kuziri ọmụmụ asụsụ bekee, Ide ederede, Comparative Literature na Gender site n'echiche nke ọmụmụ omenala na mmepe na mahadum dị na kọntinent dị iche iche, ma bụrụkwa Prọfesọ nke English na Comparative Literature na Mahadum Port Harcourt, Rivers State Nigeria
Ọ malitere ịbụ onye a ma ama n'isi mmalite ọrụ ya n'etiti ọrụ nka nke nwoke na-achị na-eche banyere nsogbu na-akpa ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị Africa nsogbu
Akọwapụtara Molara Ogundipe dị ka onye 'bụ onye na-ebute ụzọ n'usoro echiche nke na-apụta n'ime mmụọ nwanyị Africa

O nwere nghọta omenaala siri ike na nke gbanyere mgbọrọgwụ maka mgbanwe nke mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị n'ime ọha ndị Yoruba tupu oge ọchịchị na colonial dị ka ihe ndabere maka echiche', N'ime ọtụtụ afọ, ọ bụ onye na-akatọ mmegbu a na-emegbu ụmụ nwanyị ma kwuo na a na-emegbu ụmụ nwanyị Africa karịa n'ọkwa na ọrụ ha dịka nwunye
N'ihi ọtụtụ njirimara ha, na ụfọdụ n'ime njirimara ha na-enwe mmasị n'ọkwa, ihe ùgwù, nkwado na ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ katọrọ ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka nọ n'ihi mmetụta nke ihe owuwu ndị ọchịchị na-achị amachibidoro na nke ọhụrụ na-etinyekarị ụmụ nwoke Africa n'ogo nke mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Ọnọdụ ha bụkwa n'ihi ntinye nke ndị isi obodo site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị Africa n'onwe ha

Otú ọ dị, ọ siri ọnwụ na nghọta nke mgbagwoju anya nke statuses nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa na omenala ha tupu oge ọchịchị na nke ụmụ amaala maka mkparịta ụka ọ bụla bara uru ma ọ bụ ọmụmụ banyere ụmụ nwanyị Africa
Ogundipe nọ na-edu ndú nke mmegide nwanyị na ọmụmụ nwoke na nwanyị na Africa ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi nke Foundation for International Education and Mentoring, bụ nke a raara nye ịkụziri ụmụ agbọghọ ozizi na omume ọma nke echiche nwanyị na nha anya nwoke na nwanyị

O biri ma rụọ ọrụ na West Africa, bụ ebe o hibere ebe a na-ede akwụkwọ na mahadum, na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ, okike na ihe nkiri, na-atụnye ụtụ na ntinye aka ya na agụmakwụkwọ n'etiti ọha na eze
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na asatọ n'ụlọ ya dị na Ijebu-Igbo, Ogun State, Naịjirịa na June 2019
Ọ bụ ụmụ ya nwanyị abụọ ka ọ nwụghara Dr
(Ts'gye Maryam) Rachel Titilayo Leslie, onye ọkà mmụta okpukpe na Africa bụ onye na-ede banyere mkpa ihe nketa Africa dị maka omenala ụwa, na Dr
Isis Imotara Leslie, PhD, onye na-ahụ maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
onye kuzirilarị ihe n'ọtụtụ mahadum US

Ụmụ ụmụ ya bụ Askia Tristan Folajimi Leslie, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kọmputa Engineering na Coding na Mahadum California, Berkeley, na Joshua Tolu Victoriano, onye e chiri echichi na nso nso a dị ka dikọn na Chọọchị Ọtọdọks nke Etiopia na Etiopia
Mọlara Ogundipe bụ onye ndu nke ọmụmụ gbasara nwanyị na nwoke na nwanyị na Africa kemgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1963 na Mahadum London
O dere maka ọtụtụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ na izugbe, ma bipụtakwara akwụkwọ akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo yana mkpokọta uri

Ọrụ ya gụnyere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke edemede ụmụ nwanyị ibe ya 'Ọ bụghị ịtụgharị na axis nke nwoke' dị na 1984 anthology Sisterhood Is Global The International Women's Movement Anthology, nke Robin Morgan deziri, na uri ya nọ na ya
1992 anthology Daughters of Africa, nke Margaret Busby deziri
Dịka onye ọkà mmụta Naijiria, onye nkatọ, onye nkụzi na onye na-akwado ya, a ghọtara Ogundipe dị ka otu n'ime ndị edemede mbụ na ụmụ nwanyị Africa na ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ rụrụ ụka maka feminism gbadoro ụkwụ n'Africa nke ọ kpọrọ 'Stiwanism' (Social Transformation in Africa Including Women) n'akwụkwọ ya Recreating Ourselves
Ọkammụta a ma ama na onye na-agụ akwụkwọ, o bipụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ uri na nkatọ agụmagụ na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya ndị edepụtara n'okpuru

Stiwanism na-eche banyere ụkpụrụ asaa 'STIWA' 1) na-emegide Western feminism 2) na-enye kpọmkwem nlebara anya na ụmụ nwanyị Africa n'oge a dịkọrọ ndụ 3) na-ebute ụzọ n'ihu ụmụ nwanyị ụmụ amaala nke dịkwa adị na Africa 4) kwenyere na nsonye na itinye aka na ya

Mgbanwe ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke kọntinent Africa 5) na-emegide ahụ nwanyị, ọnọdụ mmadụ, obodo, na ọha mmadụ yana otu o si arụ ọrụ n'ime usoro mmekọrịta ọha na eze na akụ na ụba 6) kpachapụrụ anya maka onye ọ bụla na njirimara mkpokọta (dika okpukperechi, klaasị na ọnọdụ alụmdi na nwunye) 7) ghọtara na e nwere ọtụtụ ihe na njirimara na Africa na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ dị iche iche na ndị na-emegiderịta onwe ha
Ogundipe, na mbụ n'ọrụ ya ekwupụtala na ezigbo onye ode akwụkwọ nwanyị kwesịrị ịghọta ma ọ bụ kọwaa nke ọma echiche nwanyị na otu esi akọ akụkọ gbasara nwanyị
O kwenyesiri ike na ikpugheghachi ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze na Naijiria nwere ike bụrụ ụzọ kacha mma isi meziwanye ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahụ
A maara ya dị ka onye edemede nke ọrụ ya dọtara nke ọma mgbagwoju anya nke ndụ Africa
N'imeghachi Onwe Anyị Ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka na Mgbanwe Dị Mkpa, o dere nke ọma gbasara nsogbu dị n'ịde n'asụsụ ọdịnala ya na nguzogide ụmụ nwoke na-emegide ịha nhatanha nwoke na nwanyị

Site na nnukwu ahụmahụ agụmagụ na ọtụtụ ihe odide metụtara nwoke na nwanyị, Ogundipe nyere 'oeuvre dị mgbagwoju anya' nke na-enyere ndị inyom Africa aka itinye aka n'iweta mgbanwe bara uru n'okwu metụtara okike, ezinụlọ na ọha mmadụ nke nwere ike ịkwalite mmepe mba na kọntinent
Molara Wood (onye amuru n'afọ 1967) bu onye odee ihe okike Naijiria, odeakụkọ na onye nkatọ
A kọwawo ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị ama ama na Arts na Naịjirịa'
Ndị a gụnyere akwụkwọ ndị Africa taa, Chimurenga, Farafina Magazine, Sentinel Poetry, DrumVoices Revue, Sable LitMag, Eclectica Magazine, The New Gong Book of New Nigerian Short Stories (ed
Chris Brazier; New Internationalist, 2009)
O bi ugbu a na Lagos
Molara Wood, onye amụrụ na Naịjirịa ebiela ihe ọ kọwara dịka 'ndụ nke na-emebi emebi', gụnyere afọ iri abụọ na Britain, ebe ọ gara akwụkwọ na mbụ ('Afọ atọ ma ọ bụ anọ karịsịa, bụ atụmatụ ya')
Ma ndụ na-eme
Ị naghị ahụ ka afọ na-atụgharị n'ime ibe ya, mgbe ahụ, i teeta otu ụbọchị, ọ bụrụ na ị nọọla na England afọ iri abụọ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2015 nke ya na Oyebade Dosunmu maka Aké Review, Wood kọwara 'Ọbụna ogologo oge tupu ụbọchị UK m, ebielam na Northern na South-Western Naịjirịa ya na Los Angeles - niile site na afọ iri na otu ma ọ bụ iri na abụọ
Enwere echiche nke na ị naghị enwe oge mgbe niile, enweghịkwa ọnọdụ - na afọ ndị a na Britain na-eme ka nke ahụ dịkwuo ukwuu
Mmetụta ahụ anaghị apụ na ịlaghachi Nigeria, ọ bụ naanị na-agbanwe agbanwe, dịka ndị mmadụ na-ekwu banyere m na-abịa dịka onye si 'pụọ', ọbụlagodi mgbe m na-agbalị ịbanye
Ya mere enwere m mmetụta nke ọma maka mwepu nke dislocation na ntinyeghachi
London bụụrụ m nnukwu tebụl ka m wee lelee ụlọ ihe nkiri a nke ahụmịhe mmadụ n'ihe gbasara ndị mbịara Naịjirịa'
N'afọ 2007 ka a toro akụkọ ifo ya nke ukwuu na asọmpi nkenke akụkọ nke Commonwealth Broadcasting Association ,
N'afọ 2008, ọ meriri asọmpi nkenke akụkọ nke John La Rose Memorial
Kemgbe ọ laghachiri na Nigeria, ọ bụ Arts na Culture Editor nke akwụkwọ akụkọ na- esote (nke kwụsịrị mbipụta na 2011), ma na-ede ugbu a otu kọlụm Arts maka The Guardian na Lagos, ebe ọ nọ ugbu a
N'oge ya na Ọzọ ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ Teju Cole 's Letters to a Young Writer series
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ede blọgụ
Nchịkọta nkenke akụkọ ya, Indigo, bipụtara n'afọ 2013 site na Parrésia Publishers
A nabatara Indigo nke ọma, na Critical Literature Review kpọrọ ya 'ihe ụtọ onye na-agụ'
Dị ka Oyebade Dosunmu si ede 'Osisi na-akọ akụkọ banyere ndị mmadụ bi n'etiti oghere 'indigo' ókèala mbata na ọpụpụ, mba onye na-abụghị nke omenala multicultural na ókè nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ụwa ndị a na-agbaba n'ime ibe ha na ndị bi na ha na-agbagharị, na-akparịta ụka n'ụzọ dị ukwuu nke ọnọdụ ụmụ mmadụ - amụghị nwa, ịchụso ịma mma, ara, ọnwụ - mgba, mgbe niile, ịkụ mgbọrọgwụ n'ájá na-agbanwe agbanwe' Ọtụtụ n'ime akụkọ ndị ahụ metụtara ndụ ụmụ nwanyị Africa na-akparịta ụka maka nsogbu dịka ịmụ nwa, ịlụ otu nwanyị na ịlụ nwanyị di ha nwụrụ
Wood kwuru na 'ndị a bụ ihe odide nke nwanyị na nwanyị
Enwere m mmetụta ọmịiko dị ukwuu, mmetụta dị mma maka ihe ụmụ nwanyị na-agabiga
Echeghị m na a n'enye ndị a ọgwụgwọ zuru oke n'akwụkwọ ndị nwoke na-ede akwụkwọ, ya mere ọ dị anyị n'aka, bụ ndị inyom na-ede akwụkwọ, inye ihe ùgwù na olu na ahụmihe ụmụ nwanyị'
Wood bụ onye ọka ikpe maka afọ 2015 Etisalat Prize for Literature
Ọ nọ na Board Advisory of Aké Arts and Book Festival wee sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe odide gụnyere akwụkwọ Lagos & Art Festival

Mollie Jepsen (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1999) bụ onye Canada na-agba ọsọ n'elu ugwu
A mụrụ Jepsen na West Vancouver, British Columbia na-enweghị ọtụtụ mkpịsị aka n'aka ekpe ya
Ọ mụtara ịgba ọsọ mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ ma na-aga ọmụmụ ihe egwuregwu mmega ahụ
Ka ọ na-etolite, ọ gara Secondịrị West Vancouver nke ọ gụsịrịakwụkwọ na 2017
A kpaliri ya ịmalite asọmpi ski mgbe ọ kiriri Olympik winter nke afọ 2010 wee sonye na Whistler Mountain Ski Club
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ dọwara nkwonkwo aka nri ya (ACL) na ọzọ mgbe ọ dị iri na ise
N'agbanyeghị nke a, a họpụtara ya ka ọ sọọ mpi na Team Canada n'oge nke 2018 na 2019
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na British Columbia mgbe ọ sonyere n'ogige ọzụzụ oge okpomọkụ nke Team Canada na Chile, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa Crohnās
O ruru ogo nke 2018 Winter Paralympics na PyeongChang, South Korea, ebe ọ meriri nrite ọla edo mbụ ya na ihe omume jikọtara ọnụ
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọlaọcha na slalom na ọla nchara abụọ na downhill na giant slalom
Na 2022 Beijing Winter Paralympics, ọ ritere ọla edo na Para Alpine Skiing
A kpọrọ ya Female Para-Alpine Athlete nke afọ na Audi 2018 Canadian Ski Racing Awards na Best Female Athlete na 2018 Canadian Paralympic Sport Awards
O meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị na-agbadata n'elu ugwu na 2022 Winter Paralympics nke emere na Beijing, China
Molly Burhans (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1989) bụ onye America na-ese map, onye sayensị data, na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ bụ onye guzobere GoodLands, otu nzukọ nke na-ezube ịkpali Chọọchị Katọlik iji ala ya mee ihe maka ebumnuche ikpe ziri ezi na gburugburu ebe obibi
Burhans bụ Chief Cartographer maka map dijitalụ mbụ nke Chọọchị Katọlik n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, nke emere na Vatican na 2016
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eduga mmepe nke nyocha Katọlik zuru ụwa ọnụ, dị ka akara carbon nke Chọọchị na ikike nchekwa
United Nations nyere ya Young Champion of the Earth n'afọ 2019
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Encyclopædia Britannica's 2022 Under 40 Young Shapers of the Future na ngalaba nke agụmakwụkwọ na echiche
N'afọ 2021, Sierra Club sọpụrụ Burhans na EarthCare Award, nke e nyere ndị dị ka Wangari Maathai na Sir David Attenborough
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya na Ashoka Fellowship maka ihe ọhụrụ ya na itinye teknụzụ ọhụrụ iji meghachi omume na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ bụkwa onye National Geographic Emerging Explorer na klas nke afọ 2021
A mụrụ Burhans na New York City, New York na Debra, prọfesọ nke sayensị kọmputa, na William, onye nchọpụta na molecular oncology, onye nwụrụ na 2019
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gara chọọchị mgbe ọ ka na-eto eto, ọ ghọghị onye na-ekpe okpukpe Katọlik ruo mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum

Mgbe ọ na-eleta ebe obibi ndị mọnk dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Pennsylvania n'oge njem ije ozi na-ewe izu, ọ chọpụtara na ebe obibi ndị mọnk ahụ enweghị atụmatụ nlekọta ala zuru oke, wee malite nyocha ụzọ isi meziwanye njikwa ala nke ebe ndị Katọlik zuru ụwa ọnụ nwere ike inye aka na gburugburu ebe obibiaka
N'afọ 2015, Burhans nwetara nzere masta na Ecological Design site na Conway School, ebe ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka Sustainable Communities Initiative Fellow, na nzere na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Canisius College
Ọ bịara nwekwuo mmasị na ohere gburugburu ebe obibi nke mawapụta na ime ka ihe ndị dị ndụ na-arụ ọrụ nke Chọọchị Katọlik zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na City Honors School na Buffalo, NY
Ọ nọrọ oge na GIS software ụlọ ọrụ Esri dị ka onye nleta na-eme nchọpụta ma nata onyinye n'aka ha
Ụlọ ọrụ ya, GoodLands, na-ejizi eserese dị iche iche, nhazi na teknụzụ
Nhazi

Molly Lanyero (amụrụ na 24 Febụwarị na afo 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan nke a họpụtara na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke 10 (na afo 2016 ruo na afo 2021), dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti na-anọchite anya distrikti Lamwo
N'ọnwa Julaị na afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke otu ndị omeiwu Acholi nke nwere mmadụ iri abụọ na ise, nke gụnyere ndị omeiwu si n'ógbè Acholi na 10th Parliament
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Lanyero na-eje ozi na Kọmitii Ndị omeiwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na Kọmiti Ndị omeiwu maka agụmakwụkwọ na egwuregwu, ọ bụkwa onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)
Molly Lanyero gara Shimoni Demonstration School ruo na afo 1988
N'afọ 1992, ọ nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda (UCE) site na St
Joseph's Senior Secondary School Naggalama N'afọ 1995, ọ nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE), site na Bweranyangi Girls' Senior Secondary School
Mgbe ahụ na afo 1997, ọ nwetara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị site na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo (ITEK), nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Kyambogo
Lanyero gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere E nyere ya nzere Bachelor of Arts na Social Sciences na afo 2001 na Master of Arts na Peace and Conflict Studies na afo 2008
N'agbata afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2009, Ms Lanyero jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Hillside High School na Bunamwaya, mpaghara Kampala, isi obodo Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu oge ahụ dị ka onye nhazi ọrụ maka Foundation for Early Childhood Education & Development, site na 2005 ruo 2007
Site na afo 2013 ruo na afo 2014, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa maka Regional Associates for Community Development, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị
N'afọ 2014 na afo 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ enyemaka na Embassy nke Japan na Kampala, Uganda

Na Jenụwarị na afo 2018, a kwụsịtụrụ Molly Lanyero, na ndị omeiwu anọ ndị ọzọ (Beatrice Atim Anywar, Edward Otto Makmot, Catherine Lamwaka na Margaret Odwa), n'òtù ndị omeiwu Acholi (APG), maka ịkwado iwelite afọ ole onye isi ala
Molly Musiime Asiimwe bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan na nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwụ maka mpaghara Rwampara n'oge ntuli aka nke Uganda n'afọ 2021
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị
Molly Musiime Asiimwe bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan na nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na nzuko omeiwụ maka mpaghara Rwampara n'oge ntuli aka nke Uganda n'afọ 2021
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị
Sarah Margaret 'Molly' Scott Cato (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 21 Mee 1963) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị British Green, onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na onye na-eme ihe ike
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu European Parliament (MEP) maka South West England[lower-alpha 1] site n'afọ 2014 ruo afọ 2020
Site n'afọ 2012, ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye MEP, ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Strategy na Sustainability na Mahadum Roehampton
Scott Cato na-ekwu maka Green Party na ego na EU, a makwaara ya maka ọrụ ya n'ọhịa ọmụmụ ihe
O bipụtara na green economics, localism na anti-capitalism, ma nye aka n'ọrụ gbasara ihe ize ndụ nke ike nuklia, nke ọ na-emegide ya n'ụzọ siri ike
A mụrụ Molly Scott Cato n'ụbọchị 21 Mee 1963 ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Bath High School for Girls, tupu ọ gụọ Philosophy, Politics and Economics (PPE) na Oxford
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta, n'afọ 2001 ọ nwetara PhD
ya na Mahadum Wales, Aberystwyth (nke bụzi Mahadum Aberystwyth) na thesis banyere iwu ọrụ na South Wales Valleys, gụnyere nyocha n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọrụ Tower Colliery
Akwụkwọ ya, The Pit and the Pendulum, dabeere na nyocha a
O nwere MSc na usoro nyocha mmekọrịta ọha na eze dị elu site na Mahadum Open
Moloi bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere

Mombasan Rupee bụ Rupee British East African Protectorate a nabatara dị ka otu aha na ego mkpụrụ nke Imperial British East Africa Company wepụtara, nke dị na Bombay n'afọ 1888 ka Queen Victoria nyere ya akwụkwọ ikike iji zụọ ahịa na East Africa
A nabatara iwu azụmahịa India, iwu Insolvency, Stamp, Designs na Rupee India bụ ego East Africa ruo afọ 1920
Rupee Mombasa nke e ji ọlaọcha 0917 dị ọcha mee ma dị ihe dị ka gram 1166
Momo Wandel Soumah (1926 - June 15, 2003) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-akpọ saxophon si Guinea, nke a na-amata site na ọlụ ya
Soumah malitere n'afọ ndị 1950 na-egwu n'òtù ịgba egwu, mana ọ kwagara na egwu Guinea nke oge a na-esote mgbanwe ọdịbendị
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Syli Orchestra nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu (nke bụ Syli Orchestre National) nke e guzobere n'okpuru ntụziaka nke onye isi ala mbụ a họpụtara bụ Sekou Toure

A họpụtara otu ndị egwu Guinea ka ha gaa njem na Guinea niile ma kpalie ma nye ndị egwu ntụziaka gafee mba ahụ ma nyere aka guzobe ndị egwu mpaghara bụ isi ihe na mmemme 'Authenticité' nke Sekou Toure iji kwalite ma gbasaa egwu ọdịnala 'ezi' nke Guinea mgbe ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị gasịrị
Site n'etiti afọ 1980 Soumah mepụtara ngwakọta jazz na egwu ọdịnala Afrịka
Ọ nwụrụ na mberede na June 15, 2003
N'oge ọnwụ ya, Soumah bụ onye nduzi egwụ nke Circus Baobab
Momo Wandel Soumah (iri abụọ nọwa Eprel 1977 na 13 Febụwarị 2017) bụ onye Guinea na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu
Ọ gbara bọọlụ iri na atọ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Guinea site n'afọ 1996 ruo 1998
A kpọkwara ya aha na ndị otu Guinea maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 1998
Soumah nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi na 2017 n'oge ọzụzụ ịghọ onye ọka ikpe bọọlụ
Ndị nne na -alụ agha bụ ihe nkiri ejije ihe ọchị nke afọ 2018 nke Omoni Oboli duziri
Ọ na -akọ akụkọ nne abụọ na -asọrịta mpi megide onwe ha na ndị ọzọ iji hụ na ihe ịga nke ọma na ndụ ụmụ ha, ọkachasị asọmpi agụmakwụkwọ
Omoni Oboli na -ekwu na mmụọ ya kpaliri ya ime ihe nkiri maka ihe ọ gabigara oge ọ bu nwata
Ọ gosiputara Funke Akindele na Michelle Dede, ọ bụkwa mmekorita n'etiti Inkblot, Filmone na Dioni Visions
Emere ya na Ọgọstụ 2018 na sinima ihe nkiri dị na Lekki, Lagos
E wepụtara ya na Ọgọst 17, 2018
Mona Hala (amụrụ na 25 Ọktoba 1984) bụ onye Egypt-Austria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nchịkwa
A mụrụ ya n'Ijipt nye nna Austrian na nne Ijipt, nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abuo
Ya na nne ya nọrọ n'Ijipt mana ọ nọgidere bụrụ nwa amaala Austria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ain Shams nweta nzere na nsụgharị German-Arabic
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-elekọta TV Children Shows

Ọrụ mbụ ya na ime ihe nkiri bụ na usoro Lucky guys na 2001, mgbe ahụ ọ pụtara na usoro TV The Imperator na Hussein Fahmi na Ilham Chahine, ọ rụrụ Fawzia Fuad nke Egypt na King Farouq na 2008 na A queen in exile na 2010
Na ihe nkiri ọ na-eme na Seb wana seeb na 2004, Zaki shan na 2005, Seven colors of sky na 2007, By nature colors na 2009, The Glimpse na 2009, Radio Love na 2011
A maara Mona Hala dị ka otu n'ime ndị ama ama sonyere na mgbanwe ọchịchị Ijipt nke afọ 2011
A maara ya maka echiche aka ekpe ya, ọ bụ onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-ahụ maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ọ na-agbachitekwa ikike nwoke idina nwoke
N'afọ 2018 ọ lụrụ enyi ya nwoke onye America aha ya bụ Tomas, ọ gbanwere gaa okpukpe Islam maka ebumnuche alụmdi na nwunye, ọ ghọrọ vegan mgbe ya na enyi ya nwoke zutere
Mona Ali Mohamed Zaki (amụrụ na 18 Nọvemba 1976) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Mona Zaki nye nne na nna ya Ali Mohamed Zaki na Tahani na Nọvemba 18, 1976
Ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ biri na Kuwait
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, mgbe ọ hụchara mgbasa ozi nke Mohamed Sobhi maka ihu ọhụrụ, ọ tinyere akwụkwọ naanị n'olileanya nke inweta ohere izute onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Egypt a ma ama
Sobhi gosipụtakwara Zaki ma nwee ọrụ mbụ ya na egwuregwu ya Bel Araby El Faseeh
Mona nọrọ otu semester na United States na-amụ ihr na New Orleans n'okpuru nkuzi nke Dr
Malak Abou-Hargah
Ọ laghachiri Ijipt ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya
Mgbe oge ruru ka Mona gaa mahadum, ọ debara aha ya na Faculty of Mass Communication, Mahadum Cairo
N'oge ahụ, a kọwaara ya onye nduzi Ismail Abdel Hafez onye họọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na El A'elah, usoro Ramadan nke gosipụtara mmalite TV ya

Ime ihe nkiri ghọrọ ihe karịrị naanị ihe ntụrụndụ nye Mona mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị; o mechara rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro TV a ma ama Khalti Safiya wel Deir, Nisf Rabi' El Akhar, Ahalina, Ded El Tayyar na El Daw' El Sharid
Ọrụ TV nke ya na-ekwe nkwa meghere ọnụ ụzọ nke nnukwu ihuenyo maka ya

Mona wakporo ihe nkiri sinima ya na El Katl ElLaziz, ya na Mervat Amin, wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Idhak El Soura Titla' Hilwa ihe ngosi nke ọ natara onyinye, Sa'idi fil Gam'a Al-Amrikiya, Omar 2000, El Hobb El Awal, na Leih Khallitni Ahibbak nke niile bụ ihe nkiri ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ Jehan Sadat na ọrụ nka The Days of Sadat (maka Onye isi ala Ijipt Anwar Sadat)
Onye isi ala Hosni Mubarak nyere nwa agbọghọ ahụ na-eme ihe nkiri ihe nrite, tinyere ndị ọzọ na-eme fim ahụ
Ihe ịga nke ọma nọgidere na-eru nso, nraranye ya nwetara ụgwọ ọrụ nke ọma site na nnukwu iwu ewu nke ihe nkiri ya ọzọ, Africano na Mafia
Ọ gara n'ihu site n'otu ihe nkiri gaa na nke ọzọ, na-egosi Sleepless Nights, Men Nazret Ein, Khalti Faransa, na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
N'agbanyeghị nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ihe nkiri sinima, Mona mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, n'etiti ha bụ Le'b Eyal, Ya Messafer Wahdak, Afrouto, na Keda OK
Mona lụrụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri Ahmed Helmy
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ Lilly (2003), Selim (2014), na Younis (2016)
Mona Zaki na-akwadebe isonye na mkpọsa ọrụ ebere ọhụrụ Know your Blood type

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Al-Ahram na-akọ na ọ bụ Mona Zaki malitere mkpọsa ahụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya Yanabee El-Hayah na njikọ aka na Yanabee El'Hayah maka onyinye ọbara na imekọ ihe ọnụ na United Nations Public Health Arm, World Health Organization
Mona El Shazly ( Arabic , IPA ( ʃˈʃˈʃæzli] ) bụ onye Ijipt na-eme ihe ngosi okwu
A maara ya ama maka ihe ngosi okwu ya Al Ashira Masa'an (10 O'Clock) ebe o kwuru banyere akụkọ nke ụbọchị ahụ ma gbaa ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ijipt na ndị mba ọzọ na ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ajụjụ ọnụ
El Shazly gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na United Arab Emirates wee gụọ MASS COM na Political Science na Mahadum America dị na Cairo
El Shazly rụrụ ọrụ na Mmekọrịta Ọha na Arab Contractors Company
Ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ mmemme na Saudi-owned Arab Radio na Television Network Channel
Ọ na-akwadokwa ya na mmemme, Ma3kom Mona El Shazly, na ọwa TV
nke Ijipt a mara ama, CBC
Ọ nọ kemgbe na Dream 2 Channel site na afọ 2006, na-akwado Al Ashira Masa'an
Dream TV bụ ọwa satellite nke Ijipt na-ewu ewu
'Site na atụmatụ nke ya, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ kachasị elu na telivishọn satellite Arabic,' otu akụkọ kwuru
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Na-ekwu maka nrụgide gọọmentị na ndị nta akụkọ n'Ijipt [;] 'Ha aghọtaghị na onye na-eme ihe ngosi abụghị ọnụ na-ekwuchitere gọọmentị ma ọ bụ ọchịchị,' ka o kwuru
'Abụghị m ọnụ na-ekwuru m
Ma ị na-enwe nsogbu a mgbe niile
