Audrey Winifred Morakane Ketlhoilwe Mosupyoe, nke a maara dị ka Morakane Mosupyoe
Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Gauteng nke Executive Council (MEC) maka egwuregwu, nka, ọdịbendị na ntụrụndụ kemgbe Ọktoba, na afọ 2022

Ọ bụ MEC maka mmepe akụ na ụba, ọrụ ugbo na gburugburu ebe obibi site n'Oktoba, na afọ 2019 ruo Desemba, na afọ 2020 yana Gauteng MEC maka Mmepe Ọha site na Desemba, na afọ 2020 ruo Oktoba, na afọ 2022
Tupu a họpụta ya na Gauteng Provincial Legislature na afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl obodo Tshwane
Mosupyoe bụ onye otu African National Congress
Mosupyoe sonyeere African National Congress na afọ 2002 mgbe ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị bịakwutere ya
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl obodo Tshwane n'afọ 2006
N'oge mbụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu kọmitii onye isi obodo (MMC) maka ebe obibi mmadụ ruo n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009 mgbe a họpụtara ya na MMC maka ahụike na mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na kọmitii nchịkwa mpaghara nke ANC na kọmiti ọrụ mpaghara
Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara nke ANC na kọmitii ọrụ mpaghara ugbu a
Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na Mee, na afọ 2011, a họpụtara ọ dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-ekwu okwu na kansụl ahụ
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa a ruo mgbe ntuli aka 2016, mgbe ọ hapụrụ kansụl ahụ
A họpụtara Mosupyoe ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Gauteng Provincial na Mee, na afọ 2019
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke kọmitii mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndị omeiwu

N'ọnwa Julaị, na afọ 2019, Kọmitii Nchịkwa Mba nke ANC kpebiri na onye isi ala Gauteng bụ David Makhura ga-achụpụ otu n'ime ndị MEC ya nwoke ka ndị isi ya wee mezuo mkpebi ha mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị na mpaghara nwere onye isi ala nwoke, pasent 60 nke ndị otu ndị isi ga-abụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2019, Makhura kwupụtara na MEC maka mmepe akụ na ụba, ọrụ ugbo na gburugburu ebe obibi, Kgosientso Ramokgopa, agbaala arụkwaghịm na gọọmentị mpaghara
N'ihi ya, ọ họpụtara Mosupyoe ka ọ bụrụ Ramokgopa
A ṅụrụ ya iyi n'ikpeazụ n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
N'ime mgbanwe nke kansụl na Disemba, na afọ 2020, Makhura họpụtara ya dị ka MEC maka Mmepe Ọha
Na 27 Juun, na afọ 2022, a họpụtara Mosupyoe dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke ANC na Gauteng
Mosupyoe tolitere na Atteridgeville na ụmụnne ya ise
Moray Tornadoes bụ otu egwuregwu hockey ice nke Scotland nke na-egwu na Scottish Njikọ mba
Ha na-egwu egwuregwu ha na Ebe ntụrụndụ Moray na ElginÀtụ British ice hockey
Morayo Afolabi-Brown bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na TV na naanị nwa nwanyị nke ọnye isi oche Nigeria Bar Association, Alao Aka-Bashorun
Ọ bụ osote ọnye nduzi nke mmemme na TVC News na onye na-eme ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ Your View tupu ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm na Mee 2019

Morayo Afolabi-Brown gụrụ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Rutgers, Mahadum Steeti nke New Jersey Ka ọ na-etolite, ọ na-ese onwe ya n'ụdị nne ya tupu akwụkwọ ndị ọ gụrụ banyere Abike Dabiri, Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, Ibukun Awosika, Oprah Winfrey, na Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie, na ikiri okwu ha

Afolabi-Brown malitere ọrụ ya na mgbasa ozi na 2005 dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ ndị ahịa na CMC Connect (ụlọ ọrụ PR), tupu ọ gawa CUE Media, ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ọdịnaya dị ka ọnye isi nke ọdịnaya na mmepe, ma mesịa ghọọ ọnye isi nchịkwa, ahịa na nyocha
Ọ nọ n'azụ ọtụtụ echiche dị ka Girlfriends (usoro ihe nkiri TV), Changing Lives (Talk Show), na Shop Easy
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa mmepe azụmaahịa ma mesịa bụrụ ọnye isi nke ọdịnaya na ọwa na HiTV, onye na-eweta ụlọ ọrụ cable mbụ na Naịjirịa tupu e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka osote ọnye nduzi mmemme na TVC

N'afọ 2020, a kpọrọ aha Afolabi-Brown dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri abua na ise kachasị ike na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Naịjirịa, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na asatọ na ndepụta nke Women in Journalism Africa chịkọtara

Mordechai Vanunu (Hibru מרדכי旁נונו; amụrụ na 14 Ọktoba 1952), nke a makwaara dịka John Crossman, bụ onye Israel bụbu onye na-ahụ maka nuklia na onye na-eme udo, onye, na-ekwu maka mmegide ya megide ngwá agha na-ebibi ihe, kpughere nkọwa nke usoro ngwá agha nuklia nke Israel na ndị nta akụkọ Britain n'afọ 1986
Ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo nke Israel bụ Mossad mechara dọta ya gaa Ịtali, ebe a na-aṅụ ọgwụ ọjọọ ma tọọrọ ya
E bugara ya na nzuzo na Israel ma mesịa maa ya ikpe n'ikpe a na-ekpe n'azụ ụlọ

Vanunu nọrọ afọ iri na asatọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, gụnyere ihe karịrị afọ iri na otu n'ụlọ ọgwụ naanị ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị ihe mgbochi dị otú ahụ a kpọtụrụ aha na iwu ntaramahụhụ nke Israel, ma ọ bụ nke ikpe ya

N'ịbụ onye a tọhapụrụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'afọ 2004, a nọgidere na-etinye ọtụtụ ihe mgbochi na okwu ya na mmegharị ya, ma jide ya ọtụtụ ugboro maka imebi usoro ịgba ya, na-agba ndị nta akụkọ mba ọzọ ajụjụ ọnụ ma na-anwa ịhapụ Israel
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ tara ahụhụ 'mmeso obi ọjọọ na obi ọjọọ' n'aka ndị isi ụlọ mkpọrọ, ma na-atụ aro na ndị a gaara adị iche ma ọ bụrụ na ọ tọghataghị Iso Ụzọ Kraịst
N'afọ 2007, a mara Vanunu ikpe ịga mkpọrọ ọnwa isii maka imebi usoro nke parole ya
A na-ewere ikpe ahụ dịka ihe siri ike n'ụzọ a na-adịghị ahụkebe ọbụna site n'aka ndị ọkàiwu, bụ ndị na-atụ anya ikpe a kwụsịtụrụ
Otú ọ dị, na Mee afọ 2010, e jidere Vanunu ọzọ ma maa ya ikpe ọnwa atọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'ebubo na ọ zutere ndị mba ọzọ, na-emebi ọnọdụ nke ntọhapụ ya n'afọ 2004 n'ụlọ ikpe

Na nzaghachi, Amnesty International wepụtara nkwupụta mgbasa ozi na July 2007, na-ekwu na 'Òtù ahụ na-ewere Mordechai Vanunu dịka onye mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche ma na-akpọ maka ntọhapụ ya ozugbo na n'enweghị ihe mgbochi'
A kọwaala Vanunu na mba ụwa dịka onye na-eme mkpesa na Israel dịka onye sabo
Daniel Ellsberg zoro aka na ya dịka 'onye dike a ma ama n'oge nuklia'
N'afọ 1987, e nyere ya Right Livelihood Award maka 'obi ike ya na ịchụ onwe ya n'àjà n'ịkpughe oke mmemme ngwá agha nuklia nke Israel'
A mụrụ Vanunu na Marrakesh, Morocco, nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ iri na otu a mụrụ n'ezinụlọ ndị Juu Ọtọdọks bi na Mellah, ma ọ bụ mpaghara ndị Juu
Nna ya, Shlomo, na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa nri, nne ya, Mazal, bụ onye na-elekọta ezinụlọ
Vanunu gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ Alliance française, na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị okpukpe ndị Juu, ma ọ bụ cheder
N'afọ 1963, mgbe mmụba nke mmetụta ndị na-emegide ndị Juu na Morocco, nna Vanunu rere azụmahịa ya, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Israel
Vanunu dị afọ iri n'oge ahụ
Ezinụlọ ahụ gafere France, nọrọ otu ọnwa n'ogige dị na Marseille tupu e jiri ụgbọ mmiri kpọga ha Israel
Mgbe ha rutere Israel, ụlọ ọrụ ndị Juu zigara ezinụlọ ahụ ka ha biri na Beersheba, nke n'oge ahụ bụ obodo ọzara dara ogbenye
N'ime afọ mbụ ha n'Izrel, ezinụlọ ahụ biri n'otu obere ụlọ e ji osisi rụọ na-enweghị ọkụ eletrik
Nna Vanunu zụrụ obere ụlọ ahịa na mpaghara ahịa obodo ahụ, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara n'otu ụlọ
Nna Vanunu tinyere oge ezumike ya na ọmụmụ okpukpe
A bịara were ya dịka onye rabaị, na-enweta nkwanye ùgwù n'ahịa
E zigara Vanunu na Yeshiva Tichonit, ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị okpukpe dị na mpụga obodo ahụ, nke jikọtara ọmụmụ okpukpe na nke omenala
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị klas nke asatọ, ndị mụrụ ya debara aha ya na yeshiva, mana mgbe ọnwa atọ gasịrị, e wepụrụ ya
Maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Vanunu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị Yeshivat Ohel Shlomo, ụlọ akwụkwọ Bnei Akiva, ebe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ magburu onwe ya, na-enweta nsọpụrụ
Dịka Vanunu si kwuo, mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, o nwere nsogbu onwe onye nke mere ka o kpebie ịghara idebe okpukpe ndị Juu
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, o kwuru na 'n'oge a, ekpebiri m ịpụ n'okpukpe ndị Juu, mana achọghị m ka mụ na ndị mụrụ m nwee esemokwu n'ihi na achọrọ m ịgụcha akwụkwọ m'
Ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na matriculation nke nta
Nne na nna Vanunu chọrọ ka ọ gaa yeshiva dị elu; ọ kwetara mana ọ hapụrụ mgbe otu izu gasịrị
Mgbe ahụ, ọ chọtara ọrụ nwa oge n'ebe nchekwa ihe ochie nke ụlọ ikpe
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1971, e debara aha ya n'akwụkwọ n'ime ndị agha Israel Defense Forces
Ọ gbalịrị isonyere ndị agha ụgbọelu Israel dịka onye na-anya ụgbọelu, mana mgbe ndị nyocha jụrụ ya, ha zigara ya na Combat Engineering Corps, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye na-agba ọsọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ bụ isi, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ndị ọchịagha na-eto eto, mgbe ahụ ọ gụsịrị ọrụ ndị isi na-abụghị ndị ọrụ, e nyekwara ya ọkwa Sergeant-Major
Ọ nọ n'ebe ugwu ma hụ ọrụ n'oge Agha Yom Kippur nke afọ 1973
N'afọ 1974, o sonyere n'ịkwatu ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha n'ógbè Golan nke a ga-eweghachi n'aka ndị Siria
A na-enye Vanunu ọrụ na-adịgide adịgide na ndị agha dịka onye agha na-arụ ọrụ, mana ọ jụrụ onyinye ahụ, a chụpụkwara ya n'ụzọ nkwanye ùgwù n'afọ 1974
Mgbe ahụ, ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Tel Aviv wee banye n'ọmụmụ ihe tupu agụmakwụkwọ, mechaa matriculation ya, wee malite ịmụ physics
N'oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe dị iche iche, gụnyere n'ụlọ achịcha na ụlọ ezumike nká

Mgbe ọ dara ule abụọ na ngwụcha afọ mbụ ya ma ghọta na ọrụ oge niile ọ chọrọ iji kwụọ ụgwọ agụmakwụkwọ ya gbochiri ọmụmụ ya, Vanunu kwụsịrị ọmụmụ ya wee laghachi n'ụlọ ndị mụrụ ya na Beersheba, ebe ọ chọtara ọrụ nwa oge
Moremi Ajasoro, Princess of the Yoruba ( Yoruba Mọ́remí Àjàsorò ) bụ onye ama ama dị ezigbo mkpa n’akụkọ ndị Yoruba nke West Africa
Amụrụ ya adaeze, ọ bụ nwanyị nwere obi ike nke ama ama ya nyere aka mee ka ndị Yoruba merie ndị agbataobi ha
Moremi bụ onye sitere na alụm di na nwunye nke ezinụlọ eze Oduduwa, nna na-ahụ maka nna nna ndị Yoruba
Ayaba Moremi biri na narị afọ iri abụọ, ọ bụ onye Offa, wee lụọ Oranmiyan, onye bụ onye nketa nke eze Ife ma bụrụ nna nna ndị Yoruba, Oduduwa
Ile-Ife bụ mba nke e kwuru na ha na ebo ọzọ amaara dika Forest people na-alụ agha
(Ìgbò n'asụsụ Yoruba, n'agbanyeghị agbụrụ ndị ọkà mmụta ahụ kwenyere na o nweghị ihe ọ bụla jikọrọ ya na Ìgbòs nke oge a na Nigeria)
Ọtụtụ ndị ụmụ amaala ahụ bụ ndị ohu, n'ihi nke a, ndị obodo Yoruba na-eleda ha anya
Moremi bụ nwanyị nwere obi ike ma mara mma nke iji wee merie nsogbu chere ndị ya ihu, kwere nkwa na mmụọ nke osimiri Esimirin nke ukwuu ka ọ wee nwee ike ịchọpụta ike nke ndị iro mba ya
E kwuru na ndi Igbo kpọrọla ya dika Ohu, maka mma ya emee onye eze ha jiri lụọ ya dika ugoeze ya ètere mmanụ
Mgbe ọ matachara ihe nzuzo gbasara ndi agha di ya, ọ gbafuru gbalaga Ile-Ife gaa gwa ndị Yoruba nke a ndị mechara merie ha
Mgbe aghaagha ahụ gachara, ọ laghachitere di mbụ ya, Ọba Oramiyan nke Ife (ma mesịa Oyo ), bụ onye mere ka edobeghachi ya ozugbo ka ọ bụrụ eze nwanyi ya
Iji mezuo nkwa ahụ o kwere Esimirin tupu ịmalite ọrụ ya, enyere ya nwa ya Oluorogbo dika ihe ịchụ àjà maka Mụọ ahụ n'ihi na nke a bụ ihe ọ rịọrọ maka ya mgbe ọ laghachitere n'ụlọ nsọ ya
Ekwuru na amalitelarị Emume Edi dịka ụzọ iji mee ememe maka aja ahụ ọchụrụ ndị ala Yoruba
Ọzọkwa, a na-akpọ aha ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ọha na eze ugbu a na Nigeria, dịka ụlọ ezumike, ụlọ obibi ụmụ nwanyị na Mahadum Lagos na Obafemi Awolowo
N’afọ 2017, Oba Ogunwusi, onye Ooni nke Ile Ife, Osun Steeti guzobere akpụrụ akpụ Moremi n’ụlọ ya
Ihe akpụrụ akpụ a bụ ugwu kachasị elu na Naịjirịa, na-achụpụ onye nweburu ihe ndekọ ahụ (akpụrụ akpụ na Owerri, isi obodo Imo State)
Ọ bụkwa nke anọ kachasị ogologo n ’Africa
Morgan (Ọnwa Febụwarị 16, afọ 1910 - rụọ ọnwa Febụwarị 17, afọ 1993) na Marvin Smith, (Ọnwa Febụwarị 16, afọ 1910 - rụọ afọ 2003) bụ ụmụ ejima ndị Afrịka na Amerịka
Ha bụ ndị na-ese foto na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a maara maka idepụta ndụ Harlem n'afọ ndị 1930s ruo 1950s
A mụrụ ụmụnne ahụ na Nicholasville, Kentucky, n'aka ndị ọrụ ugbo Charles na Allena Smith
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Lexington, mgbe Morgan na Marvin dị afọ iri na abụọ
Ha na-enyere ndị mụrụ ha aka ugboro ugboro ịghọrọ ihe ọkụkụ ma na-egosipụta nkà ha na-ese ihe site na nwata site na ịchọta foto sitere na katalọgụ Sears
Mgbe ha nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Morgan na Marvin Smith zụlitere nkà ha site na iji ihe osise mmanụ na ncha iji mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ
Ha rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ dị iche iche mgbe ha nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, nke mere ka ha na ndị ọgaranya, ndị ọcha nwee njikọ ma nye ha ohere ịkwalite ebumnuche nka ha
Ha nwetara igwefoto mbụ ha n'aka onye na-ese foto n'ógbè ahụ ma kụziere onwe ha otu esi eji ya
Ha bụ ndị mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'ezinụlọ ha ma họrọ ịchụso ọrụ nka n'agbanyeghị na ha nwetara agụmakwụkwọ bọọlụ n'ọtụtụ kọleji ndị isi ojii
Ụmụ ejima ahụ kwagara New York City n'afọ 1933 n'ihi enweghị ohere maka ndị Ojiị na-ese ihe na Kentucky
Tupu ha achọta ọnọdụ ha dị ka ndị na-ese foto na Harlem, ha rụrụ ọrụ maka Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọganihu na-ewu ogige ma na-ese ihe osise
Marvin na Morgan zutere ụmụnne ejima Anna na Florence McLean
Di na nwunye abụọ ahụ lụrụ n'otu ụbọchị n'afọ 1936 ma di na nwunye abụọ gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1939
Morgan lụrụ nwanyị ọzọ bụ Monica Mais n'afọ 1950 ma nwee otu nwa nwanyị, Monica Smith Bolden
Marvin Smith alụghị di ọzọ
Ndị Smith kpebiri itinye onwe ha na mgbasa ozi nke foto n'afọ 1937 wee were nkuzi nka n'efu nke onye na-ese ihe Augusta Savage kụziiri
N'ebe ahụ, ha zutere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe gụnyere Jacob Lawrence na Romare Bearden
Morgan ghọrọ onye ọrụ mbụ na-ese foto maka New York Amsterdam News n'afọ 1937, akwụkwọ akụkọ Ojiị kachasị ewu ewu n'oge ahụ
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ha meghere ụlọ ọrụ foto nke ha, M & M Smith Studios, n'akụkụ ụlọ ihe nkiri Apollo a ma ama na 125th Street
Ụmụ ejima ahụ bụ ndị na-ese foto nke ihe nkiri ahụ ma site na ọrụ a zutere ndị nlereanya, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-emepụta ihe
Ụlọ ọrụ ha ghọrọ ebe ọrụ maka ndị na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ na ndị edemede, yana ebe ọtụtụ foto ha dị
Ha sere foto George Washington Carver na Billie Holiday, n'etiti ndị Ojiị na-ese ihe na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, yana ndụ n'okporo ámá na Harlem n'oge a
Ndị Smith sere foto na ebumnuche nke igosi akụkụ dị iche iche nke ndụ ndị isi ojii
Tinyere ijide mmegharị nke ikike obodo na ngagharị iwe megide igbu ọchụ, ụmụnne ahụ so na ndị mbụ weghaara ndụ dị egwu nke ndị bi na Harlem
E nweela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na akwụkwọ e dere banyere ụmụnne ahụ, gụnyere Harlem The Vision of Morgan na Marvin Smith nke James na Morgan Smith dere, n'ọnwa Nọvemba 13, afọ 1997
Moridja Kitenge Banza bụ onye na-ese ihe a mụrụ na Kinshasa, Congo n'afọ 1980
Ugbu a [mgbe?] O bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Montreal, Quebec
Ihe osise ya na-eji usoro mgbasa ozi dị iche iche gụnyere eserese, ite agba, foto na ntinye

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Académie des beaux-arts de Kinshasa na l'École supérieure des beaux-arts de Nantes Métropole N'afọ 2010, e nyere Moridja Kitenge Banza ihe nrite nke mbụ na Biennale of Contemporary African Art, DAK'ART na Sénégal
O so na ndị meriri na 2020 Sobey Art Award Hugues Charbonneau Art Gallery na Montréal nọchitere anya ọrụ ya
Omume nka nke Banza na-agbasa na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche gụnyere eserese, foto, ihe nkiri, ite agba, collage, ntinye na ihe ngosiputa

Ọdịiche a na-egosipụtakwa ọtụtụ njirimara nke onye a na-ese ihe n'onwe ya Ọrụ ya na-eji usoro nka dị iche iche nke nhazi, itinye ego na ihe ọchị iji lebara nsogbu gburugburu ncheta, ọdịbendị na akụkọ ihe mere eme anya

A na-anọchite anya ihe osise nke Banza na nchịkọta dị iche iche gụnyere National Gallery of Canada, Montréal Museum of Fine Arts, Art Gallery of Ontario, yana ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere TD Bank Corporate Art Collection na Bank of Montréal Collection

Ọrụ Christ Pantocrator na-emepụta usoro eserese nke na-etinye ihe nnọchianya nke ihe mkpuchi Africa n'elu ihe oyiyi nke Byzantine Christian iconography nke Christ Pantocrator Site na ọrụ a, Kitenge Banza jikọtara akụkụ okpukpe ọdịnala nke nkwenkwe Congo na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst

Ihe osise ndị dị na usoro a na-atụgharị ihe nnọchianya dị nsọ iji kpughee usoro ọchịchị nke dugara na izu ohi nke ihe emume Afrịka site n'aka ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke ọdịda anyanwụ, yana iji ihe ndị a eme ihe n'ọnọdụ nka ọgbara ọhụrụ
Foto ndị dị na usoro Authentique gosipụtara onye a na-ese ihe na-edowe onwe ya n'azụ ụlọ ya dị na Montréal, na ọrụ na usoro Christ Pantocrator nke ejiri ákwà wax na-acha uhie uhie chọọ mma

Nkọwa dị oke mkpa nke ihe odide ndị a eleela usoro a anya dị ka nkọwa banyere njirimara ọdịbendị dị mgbagwoju anya nke ndị mbịarambịa ga-agagharị na ya, yana nlele dị oke mkpa na nnọchi anya nke oge a na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke njirimara Afrịka

Moritz Bergstein Shoddy Mill na ụlọ nkwakọba ihe bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe abụọ dị na Mmiri anaghị aga aga, Minnesota, United States, ebe onye Juu German si mba ọzọ Moritz Berg Stein na-arụ ọrụ n'ihe Mmiri anaghị aga aga dị ka 1890 ruo 1910 na-enye ihe maka matarasị
E wuru ha na Oak ogige elu, Minnesota, n'ihe dị ka 1890 ma kwaga na dị nso na 2012 iji mee ka e nwee ohere maka iwu àkwà mmiri St
Croix ngafe
E depụtara ihe onwunwe ahụ n'ebe nile site n'aka ndị ogbi na ime ahụ na Ndebanye aha obodo nke Ebe akụkọ ihe mere eme na 2008 maka mkpa obodo ya na isiokwu nke ụlọ ọrụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme
A họpụtara ya dị ka ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke ndị Juu mbịarambịa na Minnesota na ntinye aka ha ugboro ugboro na azụmaahịa ihe mkpofu
Ndị nwe ya, Moritz na Bertha Bergstein, biri na Oak ogige elu(nke a maara dị ka Oak ogige n'oge ahụ) na 1890
Ha nọ n'ọrụ nke imegharị ihe mkpofu
A na-eji ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị ogbi ozi esighi zuru ihe na-adịghị mma, ụlọ nkume, eme ihe iji megharịa ákwà mkpofu n'ime ihe iji tinye matarasị
A maara Moritz Bergstein dị ka 'nwoke mkpofu' na Mmiri anaghị aga aga , na mgbakwunye na ime matarasị ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ nzọpụta
Ọ na-emegharị akwụkwọ mkpofu, akwa, ihe mkpofu, na ịkpụ osisi, o wuru igwe nke dọwara akwa ahụ
O were ọtụtụ ndị ji ụkwụ gaa na anyị si nọrọ ụmụ nwanyị n'ọrụ iji mepụta matarasị
Bergstein mechara soro nwanne ya nwoke, Ignatz, nwee mmekọrịta iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta matarasị
Ọ bụ ezie na Moritz mechara kwụsị ime matarasị na Oak ogige elu ọ gara n'ihu na-azụta ma na-ere ihe mkpofu, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ihe mkpofu
Mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1923 ọ hapụrụ 'ihe dị ka tọn 500 nke ígwè na ihe mkpofu ochie', nke ruru ihe dị ka $ 3,000
Nke Mmiri anaghị aga aga kwa ụbọchị Gazette kpọrọ ya 'otu n'ime ndị ikom a ma ama na mmiri anaghị aga aga' ma kwuo na ọ 'na-akwụwa aka ọtọ ma na-aga n'ihu na omume ya'
E nwere ndị Juu ole na ole bi na Minnesota n'oge ọsụ ụzọ, ya mere akụkọ Bergsteins na-enye nghọta banyere ndụ ndị Juu na Minnesota
Ndị Bergstein si Europe kwapụ na 1880, n'oge ọtụtụ ndị Juu si n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Europe kwapụ, mana a mụrụ Moritz na Germany ma a mụrụ Bertha na Bohemia

Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ndị Juu si mba ọzọ kwabata na-ere ahịa na ihe ndị e ji eme ihe na ihe ndị a rụgharịrị arụgharị, ndị Bergsteins bụ ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'ihi na ha bi n'obodo dị anya site na ndị Juu ndị ọzọ, na-arụ ọrụ n'ime ụlọ ọkụ, nwere ihe onwunwe n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ha kwagara Minnesota, ma were ndị ọrụ na-abụghị ndị Juu n'ọrụ
Na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri abụọ, ụlọ ọrụ Bergstein Mill guzo nso na nkwonkwo nke Minnesota State Highway 36 na State Highway 95, ebe a na-ele anya maka àkwà mmiri ọhụrụ gafee Osimiri St
Croix
Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Njem na Minnesota (Mn / DOT) nwetara ma wepụ ụlọ 66 na 1996, mana naanị onye nwe ala Bergstein, onye na-arụ ọrụ nrụzi ụgbọala site na ha
Mn / DOT kwadoro nyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke kpebiri na ihe igwe ihe na ụlọ nkwakọba ihe bara uru ichekwa ma ọ bụrụ na enwere ike ịchọta ebe ọhụrụ
E kwekọrịtara na ebe ọhụrụ dị na njedebe ndịda nke Stillwater nwere àgwà yiri nke ochie na 2005
E depụtara Bergstein Mill na Warehouse na National Register of Historic Places na 2008
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ sochirinụ, onye nwe ụlọ ahụ eruola afọ ezumike nká ma nabata onyinye ọhụrụ ịpụ
N'ofe okporo ụzọ ahụ, ụlọ nkwakọba ihe, na ụlọ abụọ nke Bergsteins kwatuchara, ebe a kwagara ụlọ abụọ echekwara na Nọvemba 2012

A na-emepe saịtị ọhụrụ ahụ dị ka Bridgeview Park, a na-emekwa ka ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè dị n'akụkụ ya bụrụ akụkụ nke ụzọ ịnyịnya ígwè nke ga-agbagharị n'etiti Stillwater na ụsọ mmiri Wisconsin na-eji àkwà mmiri Stillwater Lift
Obodo a ka na-amụ ihe ndị nwere ike iji ihe igwe ihe na ụlọ nkwakọba ihe, dị ka ụlọ ahịa na-arụzi ịnyịnya ígwè, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ ọrụ kayak, ma ọ bụ ebe ndị nleta
Morjana Alaoui (Arabic; a mụrụ na Nọvemba 30, 1982) bụ onye Moroccan-French na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara na Marock, ihe nkiri egwu nke Pascal Laugier Martyrs, na Rock the Casbah
Alaoui biri ndụ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ógbè Anfa nke Casablanca, Morocco, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Casablanca American School
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Alaoui kwagara Paris, France, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum America nke Paris
Mgbe ọ na-aga mahadum, ọ zutere onye nduzi Laila Marrakchi, onye nyere ya ọrụ na ihe nkiri Marock (2005)
A nabatara Marock nke ọma ma nye Alaoui aha mba
N'afọ 2007, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri Martyrs, nke a makwaara ya maka ya
N'afọ 2016, Alaoui pụtara na ihe egwu na-akpali akpali nke Shaun Robert Smith duziri
Morkel bụ aha nke nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Moro bụ asụsụ East Kainji nke Naijiria nke sitere na ụyọkọ Shammo
A na-asụ Moro na Plateau, Bauchi, Kaduna, na n'ime Kano steeti
E nwere ihe dị ka obodo nta iri abụọ, nke bụ
Moroccan dirham (Arabic, romanized , Moroccan Arabic درهم, derhem; asụsụ Berber XVI, ; akara DH; koodu MAD) bụ ego gọọmentị nke Obodo Morocco
Ọ bụ ulo aku Al-Maghrib, ụlọ akụ etiti nke obodo Morocco na-ewepụta ya
A na-ekewa otu dirham Moroccan n'ime otu nari santimat (otu santim; Arabic)
Okwu dirham sitere na ego Grik, drachma
Idrissid dirham, mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha, mepụtara na obodo Morocco n'okpuru usoro ndị eze Idrisid site na narị afọ nke asato ruo nke iri
Tupu ewebata mkpụrụ ego nke oge a na afo 1882, obodo Morocco wepụtara mkpụrụ ego ọla kọpa a na-akpọ falus, mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha a na-enye dirham, na mkpụrụ ego ọla edo a na-ede benduqi
Site na afo 1882, dirham ghọrọ nkewa nke Moroccan rial, na Mazunas nari ise = dirham iri = otu rial
Mgbe ọtụtụ n'ime obodo Morocco ghọrọ ndị France na-echebe na afo 1912 ọ gbanwere na franc Moroccan
E weghachiri dirham na oge 16 Ọktoba 1960
Ọ nọchiri franc dị ka isi ego ma, ruo 1974, franc nọgidere na-agagharị, na otu dirham = otu nari francs
N'afọ 1974, centime nọchiri Anya franc
N'afọ 1960, e webatara mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha otu dirham
Mkpụrụ ego nickel otu dirham na ọlaọcha ise dirham sochiri ha na afo 1965
N'afọ 1974, site na iwebata santim, e webatara mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ na ụdị otu, ise, iri, iri abuo na iri ise santimat na mkpụrụ ego otu na dirham ise
Mkpụrụ ego otu santim bụ aluminum, ise ruo iri na abuo santimat bụ ndị e ji ọla mee, na okpukpu atọ kachasị elu na cupro-nickel
A gbakwunyere mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ cupro-nickel ise dirham na afo 1980 ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ mkpụrụ ego abụọ na afo 1987
Mkpụrụ ego abụọ ahụ nwere akara afọ abụọ maka ụbọchị mbipụta - 1987 na kalenda Gregorian na afo 1407 na kalenda Islam
A na-emepụta santim naanị ruo afo 1987 mgbe ewepụtara atụmatụ ọhụrụ, na 1⁄2 dirham na-anọchi santimat iri ise n'agbanweghị nha maọbụ ihe mejupụtara
Mkpụrụ ego dirham ise ọhụrụ bụ bimetallic, dị ka mkpụrụ ego dirham iri nke e webatara na afo 1995
E webatara mkpụrụ ego Cupro-nickel dirham abuo n'afọ 2002
N'afọ 2012, e wepụtara usoro mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ, na mkpụrụ ego dirham ise na iri na-eji onyinyo zoro ezo dịka njirimara nchebe
Franc (Arabic) bụ ego nke ndi Obodo French Morocco site na afo 1921
Ọ ghọrọ ego nke Morocco niile na afo 1957 ma gbasaa ruo afo 1974
E kewara ya na cents otu nari (Arabic)
Tupu Agha Ụwa Mbụ, rial Moroccan ruru French francs ise
Otú ọ dị, mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọnụ ahịa franc dara, nke mere na mgbe franc nọchiri rial, ọ dị na ọnụego nke francs iri = otu rial
Franc Moroccan hà nhata na franc French
Mgbe Obodo Spanish Morocco jikọtara ya na Morocco ndị ọzọ, franc nọchiri peseta Spanish na ọnụego nke otu peseta = francs iri
N'afọ 1960, e webatakwara dirham
E kewara ya na otu nari francs
A gbanwere franc dịka nkewa nke dirham site na centime na afo 1974
N'afọ 1921, e webatara mkpụrụ ego n'okpuru ọchịchị Yusuf, na iri abuo na ise na centimes iri ise na otu franc

centimes iri abuo na ise bụ mkpụrụ ego nwere oghere, cupro-nickel, ma na-abịa na ụdị akara nzuzo atọ enweghị akara nzuzo, nke e mepụtara na afo 1921 na Obodo Paris, akara nzuzo nke égbè eluigwe nke e mebiri na afo 1924 na Poissy, na akara nzuzo nke e mepere na afo 1924 na poissy
E mepụtara centimes iri ise na franc na afo 1921 na Obodo Paris, na afo 1924 na Poissy na akara nzuzo nke égbè eluigwe
N'afọ 1928, n'okpuru ọchịchị Mohammed V, e webatara mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha ise, iri na iri abuo francs
A na-emepụta mkpụrụ ego ndị a, na mkpụrụ ego niile na-esonụ, na Paris
N'agbata afọ 1945 na 1947, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego aluminum-bronze centimes iri ise, otu, abuo na ise francs na cupro-nickel iri na iri abuo francs
Mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ ọzọ sochiri n'etiti afo 1951 na 1953 na denominations nke otu, abuo na ise francs na aluminum, 10, 20 na 50 francs na aluminium-bronze, na ọlaọcha 100 na 200 francs
E wepụtara mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha 500 francs na afo 1956
E mepụtara mkpụrụ ego nke 1951 na 1952 nke dị na 1, 2, 5, 10, 20 na 50 francs n'enweghị mgbanwe nke ụbọchị ruo afo 1974, mgbe e ji santim dochie ha

Ihe ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'oge a gụnyere KM#51a, mkpụrụ ego AH1371 50 francs na ọlaedo (a na-emekarị ya na Aluminum-Bronze)) Ihe ọzọ dị ụkọ bụ KM#A54, mkpụrụ ego AH1370 100 francs nke e ji ọlaọcha mee
Krause na-ekwu na e mepụtara nde 10 nke mkpụrụ ego ndị a, mana ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ha niile gbazere
Taa, ọ bụ naanị otu nari ka a maara
(dịka akwụkwọ Krause Mishler si kwuo)
A na-amata mkpụrụ ego igwe niile n'ụzọ dị mfe dịka mkpụrụ ego nke oge French Moroccan site na ọnụnọ nke akụkọ 'Empire Cherifien' maọbụ akụkọ 'Moroc'
Mkpụrụ ego niile ga-enwe otu akụkọ maọbụ nke ọzọ, na mgbe mgbe ha abụọ
Mkpụrụ ego niile ga-enwekwa maọbụ pentagram maọbụ ụdị hexagram nke akara Solomọn gosipụtara n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè na ngwaọrụ, na mgbe ụfọdụ ha abụọ
Rial bụ ego nke obodo Morocco n'agbata n’ime afọ 1882 na 1921
E kewara ya na dirham iri, nke ọ bụla n'ime mazuna iri ise
E webatara rial mgbe Obodo Morocco nakweere ụdị mkpụrụ ego nke oge a na afo 1882
Ọ nọchiri usoro nke nwere falus ọla kọpa, dirham ọlaọcha na benduqi ọlaedo
Na Spanish Morocco, e ji peseta Spanish dochie anya rial na afo 1912 na ọnụego nke otu rial = pesetas ise
Na obodo French Morocco, a gbanwere rial na afo 1921 site na franc na ọnụego nke otu rial = francs iri
N'afọ 1882, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha ⁄, , 2 1⁄2 na 5 dirham na 1 rial ebe, n'afọ 1902, e webatara ọla nchara máximas otu, abuo, ise na iri
Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ọtụtụ mgbanwe nhazi, okpukpe ndị a nọgidere na-agbanwe agbanwe ruo n’afo 1921
Nanị ego akwụkwọ e wepụtara nke a na-akpọ rial bụ nke ndi State Bank of Morocco wepụtara n'etiti afo 1910 na 1917
A na-akpọkwa ndị a na francs, na okpukpu nke rials ano (francs iri ano) na rials iri abuo (francs nari abuo)

Ógbè Morogoro bụ otu n'ime ógbè 31 nke obodo Tanzania
Isi obodo mpaghara bụ obodo Morogoro
Dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ mba nke afọ 2012 si kwuo, mpaghara ahụ nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 2,218,492, nke dị elu karịa atụmatụ ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke 2,209,072

peeji nke 2 Maka na afọ 2002 , ọnụ ọgụgụ mmụba nke 24 pasent nke mmụba kwa afọ nke mpaghara ahụ bụ nke iri na anọ kachasị elu na mba ahụ peeji nke 4 Ọ bụkwa mpaghara nke iri abuo na abụọ kacha nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ iri atọ na otu kwa square kilomita peeji nke 6
Ógbè Morogoro nwere ókèala n'ebe ugwu site na Ógbè Tanga, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ site na Ókèala Pwani na Lindi, n'akụkụ ndịda site na Óù Ruvuma na n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ site na ógbè Iringa na Dodoma

E nwekwara kọleji dịka Morogoro Teachers' College, Dakawa Teachers' University, na Land College
Mpaghara Morogoro nwekwara ọtụtụ anụ ọhịa, ụfọdụ n'ime ha dị na The Big Five na Mikumi National Park, Udzungwa Mountains National Park na Selous Game reserve
Morris Nolton Turner (Disemba 11, 1923 - Jenụwarị 25, 2014) bụ onye America na-ese ihe osise, onye keputara ihe nkiri Wee Pals, American syndicated strip nke mbụ na njikọta nke ndị otu
A zụlitere Turner na Oakland, California, ọ bụ nwa nke ikpeazụ nke nna Pullman porter na nne onye na-elekọta ụlọ nọọsụ
Ọ gara Cole Elementary School na McClymonds High School na Oakland na Berkeley High School
Turner nwetara ọzụzụ mbụ ya na eserese site na akwụkwọ ozi

N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụzi ígwè na Tuskegee Airmen, ihe osise ya pụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ Stars and Stripes Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Ngalaba ndị uwe ojii Oakland, o mepụtara ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke a kpọrọ Baker's Helper
Mgbe Turner malitere ịjụ ihe mere na e nweghị ndị nta na katụụn, onye ndụmọdụ ya, Peanuts cartoonist Charles M
Schulz, tụrụ aro ka o mepụta otu

Mgbalị mbụ nke Morris, Dinky Fellas, gosipụtara ndị isi ojii niile, mana ebipụtara ya na naanị otu akwụkwọ akụkọ, Chicago Defender Turner jikọtara ihe nkiri ahụ, na-akpọ ya Wee Pals, na 1965 ọ ghọrọ ihe nkiri mbụ na-atọ ọchị nke America nwere agbụrụ dị iche iche
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ naanị akwụkwọ akụkọ ise na-ebu ihe nkiri ahụ, ihe karịrị otu narị mmadụ weghaara ya mgbe e gbusịrị Martin Luther King Jr
n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1968
N'afọ 1970, Turner ghọrọ onye isi oche nke White House Conference on Children and Youth
Turner pụtara ugboro abụọ dị ka onye ọbịa na Mister Rogers' Neighborhood, na Mee 7, 1971 na Mee 14, 1973
Na nleta ya n'afọ 1971, Turner tụlere ihe nkiri ọchị ya na otú e si kpọọ aha onye ọ bụla n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ndị o dere, ka ọ na-ese ihe atụ nke ndị o dere
Mgbe ọ lọtara n'afọ 1973, o gosiri Fred Rogers foto o sere nke ọtụtụ ndị agbata obi na mpaghara telivishọn Fred
Turner gosikwara ihe nkiri sitere na usoro ihe nkiri Kid Power ya, nke gosipụtara ụtụtụ Satọdee na ABC n'oge ahụ
N'otu aka ahụ, n'oge oge telivishọn 1972-73, Wee Pals on the Go bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ABC nwere ma na-arụ ọrụ na San Francisco, KGO-TV gosipụtara
Ihe ngosi ụtụtụ Sọnde a gosipụtara ụmụaka na-eme ihe nkiri bụ ndị gosipụtara ndị isi ihe nkiri Turner Nipper, Randy, Sybil, Connie na Oliver
Site na ụmụaka, Turner nyochara ebe, ihe omume na ihe ndị dị ka ụlọ ọrụ swiiti na ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Ka ihe nkiri ahụ na-atọ ọchị na-aga n'ihu, Turner gbakwunyere ndị agbụrụ ndị ọzọ, yana nwatakịrị nwere nkwarụ anụ ahụ
N'oge Agha Vietnam, Turner na mmadụ ise ndị ọzọ so na National Cartoonist Society gara South Vietnam, ebe ha nọrọ otu ọnwa na-ese ihe karịrị ihe mkpa ọchị pụkụ atọ nke ndị ọrụ
Maka egwu nke Bay Area Little Symphony nke Oakland, California, Turner sere foto na egwu na nke ụmụaka nọ na ndị na-ege ntị
Turner malitere nke mbụ n'ime usoro ihe ngosi nka nke oge okpomọkụ na East Oakland Youth Development Center (EOYDC) na June 10, 1995
Turner lụrụ Letha Mae Harvey na Eprel 6, 1946; ha jikọrọ aka na 'Soul Corner', ihe mgbakwunye kwa izu na Wee Pals
Morrie na Letha muru otu nwa nwoke, Morrie Jr; Letha nwụrụ na 1994
N'oge ndụ ya, onye ibe Turner bụ Karol Trachtenburg nke Sacramento
Turner nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 25, 2014, mgbe ọ dị afọ 90
N'afọ 1967, onye na-ese ihe osise bụ Bil Keane kere agwa Family Circus bụ Morrie, onye egwuregwu nke Billy na naanị onye ojii na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ, dabere na Turner
N'afọ 2003, National Cartoonists Society nabatara Turner maka ọrụ ya na Wee Pals na ndị ọzọ na Milton Caniff Lifetime Achievement Award
N'oge ọrụ ya niile, Turner nwetara ihe nrite na ọdịiche obodo
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ natara onyinye Brotherhood site na National Conference of Christians and Jews na Inter-Group Relations Award site na Anti-Defamation League nke Bnai Brith
N'afọ 1971, ọ natara Alameda County (California) Education Association Layman's Annual Award
N'afọ 2000, Cartoon Art Museum nyere Turner Sparky Award, aha ya bụ maka nsọpụrụ Charles Schulz
A kwanyeere Turner ugwu ọtụtụ ugboro na San Diego Comic-Con na 1981, e nyere ya Inkpot Award; na 2012 e nyere ya Bob Clampett Humanitarian Award
Morten Eilifsen (amụrụ na ọnwa Jenụwarị 6, na afọ 1984) bụ onye Norwegian cross-country skier onye gbara ọsọ n'etiti afọ 2004 na 2014
Ihe kacha mma o mere na World Cup bụ nke itoolu na ihe omume kilomita 15 na Norway na 2007
Nanị mmeri Eilifsen meriri bụ na 4 × 10 km relay na Sweden na 2008
A họpụtabeghị ya ka ọ soro sọọ mpi na Olympic Games ma ọ bụ FIS Nordic World Ski Championships
Mosadi Seboko (amụrụ na 7 Junn, na afọ 1950) bụ Kgosikgolo nke ndị Balete na Botswana
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ kgosikgolo n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Botswana
A mụrụ Mosadi Seboko na Juun, na afọ 1950 na Ramotswa, 30 kilota (19 mi) n'ebe ndịda Gaborone
Aha ya Mosadi pụtara 'nwaanyị' n'ụzọ nkịtị na Setswana, e nyekwara ya aha Bekee 'Muriel'
Nna ya, Mokgosi nke Abụọ, tụrụ anya na nwa nwoke ga-abụ nwa mbụ ya, mana mgbe ọ hụrụ nwa ya nwanyị, o kwuru, 'Ọ dị mma, ọ bụ nwanyị
Gịnị ka m nwere ike ime? Ọ bụ nwa m
' N'afọ 1969, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Moeding College
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkwa ngalaba na Barclay's Bank
Ọ kwụsịrị alụmdi na nwunye afọ isii ya na di ya na-emegbu ya na afọ 1978
Nwanne Mosadi Seboko bụ kgosikgolo site na 1 Juun, na afọ 1996 ruo 17 Juun, na afọ 2001 mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa
Tumelo Seboko, nwanne nna Mosadi, ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kgosikpole site na 21 Juun, na afọ 2001 ruo 7 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2002
Nne na ụmụnne nwanyị Mosadi gbara ya ume ka ọ bụrụ kgosikgolo ọzọ n'oge a, nke ga-emebi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke naanị nwoke dikgosikgolo
N'oge nrụnye ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ala na Century Office Supplies na Broadhurst
Mosadi dabeere na nkwupụta ya maka bogosi [lower-alpha 2] na 'ịha ọmụmụ'; ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ nwa mbụ, ọ ga-ebute ụzọ ịghọ kgosikbolo
Seboko nwere ọtụtụ ndị nkatọ n'ihi na ọ bụ nwanyị

Nwanne nna ya Tumelo chọrọ ka Tsimane Mokgosi, nwa nwanne nne Mosadi, bụrụ kgosikgolo kama, ndị ọzọ so na kgotla gbalịrị igbu oge n'ịtinye ya site n'ikwu na o nweghị nkà iduzi ịchụ nta agụ owuru ọdịnala ma ọ bụ itinye aka na emume 'ime mmiri ozuzo', nke abụọ ahụ dị mkpa iji gosipụta ikike nke kgosikologo
Mosadi gbaghaara arụmụka ahụ, na-ekwu na ọtụtụ n'ime omenala ndị ahụ dara n'ụzọ a na-adịghịzi mgbe Iso Ụzọ Kraịst bịara Botswana
Nrịgo ya bụ ihe na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ihi na ọ kwaturu ọdịnala ebe a na-ekwe ka ụmụ nwanyị banye na kgotla (mgbakọ obodo) naanị ma ọ bụrụ na nwoke kpọrọ ha
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 7 Jenụwarị na afọ 2002 wee bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Ntlo ya Dikgosi na 28 Febụwarị, na afọ 2002
E kpuwere ya okpueze na 30 Ọgọst 2003 ma nata onyinye ọdịnala nke ehi, na ụgbọala Toyota pickup, igwe ịsa ahụ, vacuumer, kọmputa, na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ dị ọcha
N'oge okpuefe ya, ọ chọpụtara mgbanwe nke agbụrụ ya
Ụdị idu ndú ya abụghị nke omenala ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị nwoke bu ya ụzọ ọ na-ekwu n'ihu ọha banyere di ya na-emegbu ya, ikike mmekọahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, na nsogbu HIV / AIDS na agbagọ elu
Ndị nkatọ boro ya ebubo na ọ 'na-agbachitere ụmụ nwanyị', mana Mosadi Seboko zaghachiri na ọ 'nwere iwe n'ebe ụmụ nwanyị nọ [] maka ịghara ịchịkwa ọnọdụ nke ha
Àtụ Notelist
Mosbolletjies bụ omenala Afrikana, ma ọ bụ Cape Doch sweet-bun ma ọ bụ achịcha a na-eme n'ebe na-emepụta mmanya nke mpaghara Western Cape nke South Afrịka
Aha ahụ bụ Afrikaans na mmalite ma bụrụ ngwakọta nke mos (Afrikaans maka mkpụrụ mmiri vaịn na-agbari agbari) na bolletjies (Afrikaans Maka 'bọọlụ' ma ọ bụ 'buns')
Enwere ike ịcha mkpụrụ osisi Mosbolletjies iji mee rusks
A na-ejikarị tii ma ọ bụ kọfị enye achịcha ahụ
Achịcha sitere n'aka ndị French Huguenot gbara ọsọ ndụ bụ ndị biri n'obodo Franschhoek n' afọ otu puku, narị isi na iri asatọ na asatọ (1688) webatara ubi vaịn na mpaghara ahụ
A na-emekarị Mosbolletjies n'oge mgbe a na-eme mmanya mgbe isi ihe mejupụtara ya dị mfe
Dị ka omenala si dị, a ga-eji mkpụrụ vaịn fọdụrụ site na mmepụta mmanya mee ihe dị ka ihe na-eko achịcha ma tinye ya na ntụ ọka
A na-agbakwunye ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ dị ka aniseed ma mee ntụ ọka a gwakọtara agwakọta
N'oge a, a na-ejikarị mmiri vaịn na ihe iko achịcha eme ihe kama iji mkpụrụ vaịn mee ihe
A na-atụgharị ntụ ọka nke achịcha ahụ n'ime bọọlụ ma tinye ya n'ime ite na-eme achịcha na-enye ya usoro mkpọtụ na-agbanwe agbanwe nke a na-eme ka ọ dị mfe ịdọrọ otu ọ bụla
Ọ bụ otu ihe na nri America a na-akpọ Monkey Bread
Àtụ South African cuisine
Mose Se Sengo (“Fan Fan”) (16 Ọktoba 1945 - 3 Mee 2019) bụ onye na-egwu egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye isi otu egwu si Democratic Republic of Congo
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke Congolese Soukous
A mụrụ Mose Se Sengo, na Kinshasa nke ugbu a, Democratic Republic of the Congo, n'ụbọchị 16 Ọktoba n'afọ 1945
Ọ malitere ịkpọ ụbọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na Kinanga
Ya na Franco na TPOK Jazz gbara egwu, nke ọ sonyeere n'afọ 1968
O mechara sonye na otu egwu Lovy du Zaire, nke Victor 'Vicky' Longomba guzobere n'afọ 1971 ma ọ bụ n'afọ 1972, onye bụbu onye guzobere OK Jazz ma mesịa bụrụ onye otu African Jazz

Ndị egwu ndị ọzọ a ma ama na Lovy du Zaire gụnyere Bumba Massa, Youlou Mabiala na Syran Mbenza Dị ka otu isi iyi si kwuo, Otú ọ dị, ọ 'enweghị ike ịnagide ihu abụọ nke onye ndu ahụ ma kwụsị n'oge na-adịghị anya'
N'afọ 1974, o si Zaire gaa East Africa, buru ụzọ biri na Tanzania ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Na ngwụsị afọ ndị 1970, o guzobere nsụgharị ọhụrụ nke ndị otu ya Somo Somo, nke a sụgharịrị dịka Double Trouble, na-eme n'asụsụ Lingala
Ndị otu a rụrụ na Tanzania, Zambia na Kenya
Ná mmalite afọ 1980, ọ kwagara Kenya, ebe ọ rụgharịrị Somo Somo ma dekọọ ọtụtụ abọm
N'afọ 1983 'Fan Fan' rutere London, England na-agwakọta egwu ya na ndị egwu jazz Bekee
N'afọ ndị 1990, ọ sonyeere Bana OK, otu egwu egwu maka Franco Luambo Makiadi nke TPOK Jazz
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2000 ruo ugbu a 'Fan Fan' alaghachila na mgbọrọgwụ nke ụdị Acoustic Rumba
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 2010, ọ bi na London ma nweta nwa amaala Britain mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Na 3 Mee 2019, Mose Se Sengo nọ na njem ndekọ na Nairobi, Kenya, mgbe ọ dara ma nwụọ n'ihi nkụchi obi a na-enyo enyo
Fan Fan, onye nọ n'otu ụlọ dị na Thika Superhighway, e bugara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Kasarani dị na Nairobi, ebe e kwuru na ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ bịarutere
Onye na-emepụta egwu ahụ, Tabu Osusa, kwuru na Fan Fan nọ n'obodo ahụ na-edekọ egwu ọhụrụ ya na ndị na-eti egwu na Nairobi gụnyere Paddy Makani na Disco Longwa
Mose Fan Fan, onye ebe obibi ya dị na London, hụrụ Nairobi n'anya ma na-eleta Kenya mgbe niile kemgbe afọ 2016
Ọnwụ ya bịara otu ụbọchị tupu e lie onye egwu Congo ọzọ nke oge ya, Lutumba SImaro, onye ha na ya gbara egwu na TPOK Jazz band
Atụmatụ na-aga n'ihu, site n'ụbọchị 11 Mee 2019, iji weghachite ozu ya na mba United Kingdom maka olili ikpeazụ
Moses Ernest Tolliver (ubochí anọ n'ọnwa Julaị, 1918-20 rụo ụbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 2006) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A maara ya dị ka 'Mose T', mgbe a bịanyere ákà na ihe osise ya, jiri 's' azụ bịanye ákà
A mụrụ Tolliver otu n'ime ụmụ iri na abụọ nke ndị ọrụ ugbo Ike na Laney Tolliver na ọbọdọ Pike Road, nso Montgomery, Alabama
A maghị kpọmkwem afọ a mụrụ ya, ọ bụ ezie na a maara na a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke anọ nke ọnwa Julaị nakwa n'etiti afọ 1920-25
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ naanị ruo na klas nke atọ n'ihi enweghị mmasị na agụmakwụkwọ
N'afọ 1930, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Montgomery, Alabama ébé o nyèrè aka kwado ndị mụrụ ya na nnukwu ezinụlọ ha site n'ịrụ ọrụ dị iche iche
Na mbido afọ 1940 ọ lụrụ enyi ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata, Willie Mae Thomas, ma nwee ụmụ iri na atọ, iri na otu n'ime ha dị ndụ ruo mgbè ha toro
N'ime ngwụcha afọ 1960, mgbè ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ McLendon, o nwèrè nnukwu mmerụ ahụ ebe ụkwụ ya gbajiri mgbè ọkara tọn marble gbanwere wee daa site na forklift ka ọ na-ekpocha ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ
Mgbe ihe omume a gasịrị, ọ tụgharịrị gaa na eserese iji lụso ike ọgwụgwụ, ihe mgbu na ogologo ógè nke enweghị ọrụ ọgụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ na-ekwu na ọrụ ya malitere mgbe ihe mberede ahụ gasịrị, Tolliver na-ekwu ete ọ na-ese ihe tupu oge eruo
Ọ na-agbakarị ihe osise ya n'elu ma na-ese foto nke ma eleghị anya anụmanụ na ala dị n'akụkụ dị iche iche
Utu aha Tolliver dịgasị iche iche; dịka, 'Smoke Charlies', 'Scopper Bugs' ma ọ bụ 'Jick Jack Suzy Satisfying her own Self'
N'ubochí irí atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 2006, Tolliver nwụrụ site na oyi bàrà ya n'ahụ na Montgomery, Alabama
Mgbè ihe ahụ mèrè na McLendon, Tolliver hụrụ ihe osise nke nwanne McLendon nwoke, Raymond, o wee kpebie na ya nwekwara ike ime nke ahụ
Mclendon kwuru na ya ga-azụta ya ihe ma kụziere ya mana ọ jụrụ ịchọ ịmepụta ụdị nke ya
Nke a bụ ebe Tolliver malitere ịbịanye aka n'ọrụ ya, 'Mose T' na 's' azụ
Ihe osise Tolliver na-egosipụtakarị ụdị okike, anụmanụ, ma ọ bụ ọbụna foto onwe ónyé nke onwe ya
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ mgbè niile na 'pure house paint' na plywood, na ihe ndị dị ka ọnụ ụzọ, ma ọ bụ elu tebụl, na-emepụta foto na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ na mgbè ụfọdụ nke anụmanụ, ụmụ mmadụ, na osisi
Isiokwu ya a ma ama gụnyekwara mmiri na nnụnụ
A na-akpọ ụdị ihe osise Tolliver dị larịị, ihu zuru ezu ma ọ bụ profaịlụ kwụ ọtọ na palette dị jụụ
O mepụtara ihe ndị a na-akwụnye n'elu màkà ọrụ ya, ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya mechara gosipụta soda nwèrè ike ịpị maka ebumnuche ngosi
'Quail Bird' nwere ike ịfe n'elu ubi ogho, ma ọ bụ 'Diana' ma ọ bụ'Moose Lady' nwere ike ịnọ n'elu ebe a na-emega ahụ
Enweghị ike ịga ije nke ọma mgbe mmerụ ahụ ya gasịrị, o ji mkpara see ọtụtụ foto onwe ya ma ọ bụ nọdụ ala n'àkwà ya ma kwado ihe ọ bụla ọ na-ese, n'ikpere ya
E si na ahụmịhe nke Tolliver nweta isiokwu ya
E gosipụtara ọrụ Tolliver na Smithsonian American Art Museum na Washington, DC, na Philadelphia College of Art, Montgomery Museum of Fine Arts, na Corcoran Gallery of Art
Ndị ikwu Tolliver ṅomiri ụdị ya ma bịanye aka n'ọrụ ha dịka o mere, na-eme ka ọ sie ike mgbe ụfọdụ màkà ndị na-anakọta ihe osise mbụ
Nwa ya nwanyị Annie bụkwa ónyé na-ese ihe
Mose Tolliver so n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka na-adịgide adịgide gụnyere
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ egosila ọrụ Mose Tolliver gụnyere
Moser Gender Planning Framework bụ ngwá ọrụ maka nyocha nwoke na nwanyị na atụmatụ mmepe
Ọ bụ Caroline Moser mepụtara ya
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ bụ ịtọhapụ ụmụnwanyị site n'ịdị n'okpuru ma nye ha ohere inweta nha nhata, ịkwụwa aka ọtọ, na ike
Moser mepụtara usoro Framework for a Gender and Development (GAD) maka atụmatụ mmepe na 1980s mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Development Planning Unit (DPU) nke Mahadum London
Ya na Caren Levy na-arụ ọrụ, ọ gbasaa ya n'ime usoro maka iwu nwoke na nwanyị na atụmatụ
Moser na Levy bipụtara A Theory and Method of Gender Planning - Meeting Women's Practical and Strategic Needs dị ka akwụkwọ ọrụ DPU na 1986
Usoro a dabere na echiche Moser banyere ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị na mkpa nwoke na nwanyị, na echiche ya banyere ụzọ iwu kwesịrị isi bịaruo nwoke na nwanyị na atụmatụ mmepe
Usoro Moser na-agbaso usoro Gender na Development na-ekwusi ike mkpa mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị
Dị ka ọ dị na WID dabeere na Harvard Analytical Framework, ọ gụnyere nchịkọta nke eziokwu dị ukwuu
N'ịga n'ihu, ọ na-enyocha ihe kpatara ya na usoro ndị na-eduga na nkwekọrịta nke ịnweta na njikwa

Usoro Moser gụnyere njirimara ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị, nyocha mkpa nwoke na nwanyị, ịhazi njikwa nke akụ na ụba na ime mkpebi n'ime ezinụlọ, ime atụmatụ maka ịhazi ọrụ atọ ahụ, ịmata ọdịiche dị n'etiti ebumnuche dị iche iche na ntinye aka na itinye ụmụnwanyị na òtù ndị maara nwoke na nwanyị na atụmatụ
Usoro ahụ na-ekweta ihe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na atụmatụ nwoke na nwanyị, ma na-eche na usoro ahụ ga-edozi esemokwu
Usoro ahụ dabere na echiche atọ bụ isi ọrụ atọ nke ụmụnwanyị, mkpa nwoke na nwanyị dị irè na atụmatụ na ụdị usoro iwu WID / GAD
Ọrụ atọ ahụ gụnyere ọrụ ịmụ nwa, mmepụta ihe na njikwa obodo
Mkpa ndị bara uru bụ ndị, ma ọ bụrụ na a gboo ha, na-enyere ụmụnwanyị aka n'ọrụ ndị dị ugbu a
Mkpa atụmatụ bụ mkpa ndị, ma ọ bụrụ na a na-egbo ha, na-agbanwe nguzozi nke ike n'etiti ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwanyị
Ụdị dị iche iche nke usoro iwu WID / GAD, nke nwere ike ma ọ bụ nwere ike ọ gaghị adaba, gụnyere ọdịmma (nnyefe elu), ịkwụwa aka ọtọ, mgbochi ịda ogbenye, arụmọrụ na ike
Usoro ahụ na-enye ngwá ọrụ isii
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-eji usoro ahụ eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe, a na-akatọ usoro ahụ
Echiche nke ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị nwere ike ikpuchi echiche nke mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị
Ọ nwere ike inye echiche nke nguzozi kwụsiri ike, nnabata nke ọrụ na ikike nkịtị nke onye ọ bụla, mgbe n'ezie enwere mkparịta ụka na-aga n'ihu, esemokwu na nkwekọrịta
Usoro ahụ anaghị atụle mgbanwe nke usoro mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ka oge na-aga
Usoro ahụ na-ekwu maka enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị ma ghara ịtụle ụdị enweghị nhata ndị ọzọ dịka caste, ogo ma ọ bụ agbụrụ
Naila Kabeer ekwuola na echiche ọrụ atọ na-ekpuchi ọdịiche dị n'etiti ọrụ na nsonaazụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, nne n'ụlọ, site na ụlọ ọrụ obodo ma ọ bụ site na ụlọ ọrụ onwe onye ma ọ bụ nke steeti na-akwụ ụgwọ
Ndị a dị nnọọ iche n'ihe gbasara mmetụta ha na ụmụnwanyị
Moses Armah 'Parker' bụ onye na-ahụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ Ghana nke ọchụnta ego ma bụrụkwa onye nwe na onyeisi oche Medeama SC yana onye isi oche Mospacka Group nke ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Medeama
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2010, onye ọchụnta ego ahụ mechara weghara Kessben FC maka ego a kọrọ na US$600,000 wee degharịa ya Medeama SC
N'oge ntuli aka izugbe nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Ghana nke afọ 2019, Moses Armah nọchitere Medeama SC onye nnọchi anya wee tụnye votu n'aha klọb

Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Ghana kọrọ na ya na onye bụbu onye ọkpọ egwuregwu AC Milan Sulley Ali Muntari na-ese okwu n'oge Ghana'2014 FIFA World Cup mkpọsa na Brazil Ka ọ dị ugbu a, n'ajụjụ ọnụ 2016 ya na ụlọ ọrụ redio Ghana Happy FM Moses Armah kwuru na ya agbagharala Muntari maka ihe ahụ merenụE zigara Muntari n'isi ụtụtụ site na ogige Ghana yana Kevin-Prince Board n'ihi ihe ahụ merenụ
Onye bụbu onye nkuzi Ghana James Kwesi Appiah kpughere nkọwa gbasara ihe mere n'akwụkwọ ya akpọrọ Leaders Don't have to Yell

Moses Khabane Khongoana bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Mosotho na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Khabane Moses Khongoana bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke nwere nkà dị ịrịba ama nke na-etinye onwe ya n'ọrụ ya, meriri Ihe nrite asatọ na International Entrepreneurial and Filmmaking Awards na asambodo nke ekele ịrị na ato

Khongoana gụrụ Media, Communication na Broadcasting n'okpuru Degree na Television na Film Production na Limkokwing University of Creative Technology na ihe nkiri onwe ya mbụ ya nke nwetara ihe nrite a kpọrọ 'Bullet' sonyere n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa nke gụnyere Luxor African Film Festival dị ka mmemme ihe nkiri nke mba ụwa iji gosipụta ya
O nwekwara asambodo na Business Studies nke City na Guilds nke London Institute

Moses Kottler (1896-1977) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-akpụ ihe na South Africa
A na-ewere ya n'ọtụtụ ebe, tinyere Anton van Wouw na Lippy Lipshitz, dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa
Triumvirate nkeá nwèrè ọdịiche nke ịbụ onye na-eme nke ọma n'iji mgbasa ozi eserese; Lipshitz na monotypes na Van Wouw na eserese na eserese
Ọrụ Kottler na mmanụ mere ka a nwekwuo echiche dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Moses Kottler, ónyé a na-akpọ Moshe, bụ nwa nke asatọ nke Joseph Kottler na Zirla Solin
Nnà ya bụ ónyé na-ere ahịa ihe ugbo na ụlọ ha n'ihu ụlọ nzukọ o yiri ka ọ bàrà ọgaranya site na ụkpụrụ ndị Juu na Czarist Russia
Asụsụ ha bụ Yiddish, mana Moses nwetakwara ikike nke German na Russian n'oge ọ bụ nwata
O gosipụtara nkà aka na ikike ise ihe dị elu site na nwata
N'oge na-adịghị anya, nwanne nna ya, Haim Israel Sacks, onye bụ onye isi Zionist, dọtara uche ya n'ọrụ Moses
O sere foto nke onye snow Moses mepụtara, ma gosi ya onye na-ese ihe, Ilya Jakovlevich Günzburg, mgbè ọ nọ na nnọkọ ndị Zionist na Vilnius
Günzburg dụrụ nwata nwoke ahụ ọdụ ka a zụọ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
Moses Kottler rutere Cape Town na Disemba 1916 iji bírí na ya
Ọnọdụ dị n'ụwa nka dị njọ, na-enweghị ndị na-ere ihe osise, ụlọ ngosi, ndị na-anakọta ihe nwere ebumnuche siri ike na, màkà ónyé na-ese ihe, foundries màkà ịkpụ ọla nchara
Ndị kachasị emetụta na eserese bụ J
Morland, Crosland Robinson, Constance Penstone, Gwelo Goodman na Edward Roworth
Ha bụ ndị na-agbaso ọdịnala, na-emegide ndị na-eme ihe nkiri avant garde na-apụta na France na Germany
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1940, Edward Roworth toro Adolf Hitler n'ihu ọha mgbochi nke Modern Art na Germany
South African Society of Artists bụ nzukọ kachasị emetụta n'oge ahụ
E hiwere ya n'ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Septemba 1902 ma mee ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Drill Hall, Cape Town na ngwụcha afọ ahụ
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị otu na 1917 bụ otu narị na iri abụọ na otu, gụnyere Hendrik Pierneef, Anton van Wouw, Nita Spilhaus, Ruth Prowse, Florence Zerffi na Moses Kottler, bụ ndị sonyeere n'afọ ahụ 380 Xi 381
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1921, Kottler rụchara bust nke General Christiaan de Wet, nke ọ gara Klipfontein, ugbo General na Orange Free State
Ọrụ ahụ, na General na-arịa ọrịa, ejirila ụbọchị iri na abụọ mànà hapụrụ mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide na Kottler banyéré àgwà nke ónyé ndú ndị agha
N'ọnwa Juun 1921, o dechara bust nke Lord de Villiers, nke e debere ọla nchara na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, Cape Town na Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị, Bloemfontein
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, ọ rụchara ọla nchara nke Max Michaelis, ugbu a n'ogige nke Old Town House, Cape Town
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị mkpà ga-eso na 1928, bust nke Earl of Athlone, V
Srinivasa Sastri, General Louis Botha na Sir George Edward Cory; na 1929, ónyé ísì ọbọdọ Cape Town, Hyman Liberman
Na June 1928, ọ lụrụ Eva Goldberg
Na Jenụwarị 1929, Kottler kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịhapụ Union of South Africa, na-akpata iwe na Cape Times, Die Burger na The Cape, akwụkwọ akụkọ mpaghara niile
N'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Mee 1929, ha ji ụgbọ mmiri gaa Europe, naanị iji laghachi na 1932
Mgbè ọ laghachiri South Africa na 1932, Kottler biri na Johannesburg

Ọ sonyeere New Group, jere ozi na kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke Johannesburg Art Gallery n'etiti 1956 na 1965, e nyere ya Medal for Sculpture (1962) site na Suid-Afrikaanse Akademie vir Wetenskap en Kuns na, na 1974/5 e nyèrè ya nsọpụrụ na Prestige Retrospective Exhibition site na Pretoria Art Museum, South African National Gallery na Johannesburg Art Gallery
Moses Masaya (1947–1995) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Masaya ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ Joram Mariga na 1957 ma soro ya rụọ ọrụ afọ abụọ
N'afọ 1970, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ studiyo ezi nke Frank McEwen na Nyanga, nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo 1974
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya sitere na mkpali nke agbụrụ Shona ya
Masaya akụziela ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, gụnyere nwa nwanne nna ya Eddie
Masaya egosipụtala ihe ngosi n'ọtụtụ ebe na mba ụwa
Lucky Office, onye na-eto eto na-achọ ịkpụ ihe, zutere Masaya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, ma kemgbe ahụ, ọ tolitere ghọọ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na Zimbabwe

Moses Daddy-Ajala Simon (a mụrụ na abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Julaị n'ime otu puku afọ na narị iteghete na iri iteghete na ịse (1995) bu onye Naijiria bụ okacha mara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agba ihu na otu egwuregwu Nantes Ligue 1 na otu egwuregwu mba Nigeria
A mụrụ na Jos, nna ya jere ozi na ndị agha Naịjirịa tupu ọ laa ezumike nka
Simon bụ ngwaahịa sitere na GBS Academy a ma ama, otu ụlọ akwụkwọ egwuregwu bọọlụ ahụ na Nigeria nke zụpụtara ndị dika Ahmed Musa
E jikọtara ya na ụlọ ọgbakọ Premier League nke Nigeria Kaduna United, n'ihi na ọtụtụ klọb ndị ọkachamara n'ụwa niile chọkwara ịbịnye aka na ya

Na abalị iri nke ọnwa May ọfọ puku abụọ na ịrị na atọ (2013), a mara ọkwa na Simon abanyela na nkwekọrịta ya na otu egwuregwu Dutch AFC Ajax isonyere ha na ọzụzụ oge tupu oge, ebe e jikọtaburu ya na Liverpool FC na Tottenham Hotspur

Ọ pụtara ìhè nke mbụ ya maka Ajax na abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Julị na afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na atọ (2013) na asọmpi nkwado nke enyi megide De Graafschap, na-abata dị ka onye eji gbanwe onye ọzọ ma sụnye ọkpụ goolu nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ, na mmeri goolu atọ asatara nanị otu

Ọ pụtarakwara ọzọ na abalị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Julaị, gbaara ndị ọnọ na oche Jong Ajax na egwuregwu enyi na enyi nkwado oge megide Voorschoten '97, ebe ọ sụnyere goolu nke abụọ na mmeri ụlọ ha nwetara site na ọkpụ goolu ise asaghị asa
Na ịrị abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Julaị, afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na atọ, a mara ọkwa na otu egwuregwu Ajax agaghị ebinye aka na akwụkwọ ịkọrọ nwa okorobịa Naijiria a, ma hapụ ya site na nchịkọta oge tupu oge
Mgbe mkparita ụka nke nkwupụta a bidorochara ha na AS Trenčín; otu egwuregwu ha na Ajax na emekọri na Slovakia nke onye nwe ya bụ onye gbagburu Ajax bọọlụ Tschen La Ling
Na abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na anọ (13 Jenụwarị 2014), Simon bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na otu egwuregwu AS Trenčín
nKe SlovakỌ ga-eso onye ogbo ya Kingsley Madu
O mere egwuregwu mpụta mbụ ya na asọmpi ha gbara otu ọkpụ otu ọkpụ megide MFK Košice malite na nku aka nri ya na Gino van Kessel onye nọ lonu sitere na otu egwuregwu Ajax

O mere mpụta mbụ nke mba ụwa na klọb ya n'oge mkpọsa Trenčín's 2014–15 UEFA Europa League, mgbe ewebatara ya n'oge asọmpi mbido nke abụọ, na egwuregwu ụlọ megide Vojvodina Novi Sad si Serbia (nke e gwuritara na ama egwuregwu dị na Dubnica, Slovakia) Simon sụnyere okpu goolu atọ na mpụta mbụ ya na mmeri ha ji ọkpụ anọ asaghị asa wee merie n'ụlọ
Dika Trenčín ga-emecha kpochapụ na agba na-esote, n'ihi enwetaghi mmeri n'ụlọ, nakwa mmeri ndị otu Hull City
jiri ọkpụ goolu abụọ asatara otu merie ha n'ụlọ nke ha

Na ọnwa Octooba afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na anọ (October 2014) egwuregwu ESPN kwadoro akụkọ nnyocha maka Moses Simon nke jikọtara ọgba ákụkụ ahụ na ịkwaga otu egwuregwu Liverpool, Tottenham Hotspur, Hull City tinyere nnukwu ihe nnweta nyere otu egwuregwu Ajax
Ọnọdụ ahụ ghọrọ nnukwu agha n'etiti Dutch club SC Heerenveen na KAA Gent, nke otu egwuregwu nke abụọ ahụ mesịrị nwee nkwekọrịta ka ọgba ákụkụ ahụ sonyeere otu egwuregwu ha afọ atọ
Na abalị isii nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ịse (6 Jenụwarị 2015), a mara ọkwa na KAA Gent abịanyela aka na akwụkwọ maka Moses Simon na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ

Ọ mere mpụta mbụ ya maka Gent na abalị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ise (17 Jenụwarị 2015) na mmeri ọkpụ atọ asatara otu (3–1) megide Royal Mouscron-Péruwelz na egwuregwu liigi
Mpụtara ya nke abụọ mere ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị na mmeri ụlọ ha ji otu ọkpụ asaghị asa meria Sporting Lokeren na Iko ndị Belgian , bụ nke a chụpụrụ Simon na tinkọm tinkọm ole e jiri webata ya
N'egwuregwu liigi nke atọ ya megide Sporting Lokeren, Simon sụnyere ọkpụ goolu atọ, nke mere e jiri kpọọ ya onye ọkpụkpọ egwuregwu Belgium nke izu ahụ
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọkpụkpọ isi ngwa ngwa na nhazi onye nchịkwa Hein Vanhaezebrouck wee nyere Gent aka imeri aha asọmpi mba mbụ ha na Mee afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ise
Ọnwa abụọ ka e mesịrị, Simon nyere Laurent Depoitre aka na ọkpụ mmeri ọ sụnyere na Nnukwu Iko Belgian nke afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ise megide ndị mmeri iko Club Brugge
Na abalị isii nke ọnwa Ọgọst afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ ( 6 August 2018), Simon sonyeere Levante otu egwuregwu si Spanish La Liga na nkwekọrịta afọ ise
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na iteghete (2019) o kwuru na obi dị ya ụtọ na ọ na-agbara otu egwuregwu ahụ
Na abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Ọgọst afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na iteghete (15 Ọgọst 2019), enyefere Simon n'aka otu egwuregwu Ligue 1 FC Nantes
Na njedebe nke oge, Nantes kpalitere nhọrọ ịzụta Simon
Ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na otu egwuregwu ahụ

Simon nwetara ọkpụkpọ oku mbụ ya na ndị otu egwuregwu mba Nigeria site n'aka onye nchịkwa Daniel Amokachi na ọnwa Maashị afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ịse (March 2015) wee mee mpụta mbụ ya na abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa ahụ na egwuregwu enyị na enyi nke ụwa megide Uganda, mgbe ọ nọchiri Anthony Ujah mgbe nkeji iri ise na iteghete gasịrị na egwuregwu ahụ

Simon nyere goolu mbụ ya maka Naijiria na egwuregwu enyi na enyi mba ụwa megide Niger na abalị asatọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na ịse (8 September 2015), nke abụọ na mmeri ọkpụ goolu abụọ asaghị asa (2–0)
Naijiria họpụtara ya maka ndị otu ha dị mmadụ iri atọ na ise maka asọmpi Olimpiks Summer nke afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na isii (2016)
N'ọnwa Mee afọ puku abụọ na ịrị na asatọ (2018), a kpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu egwuregwu iri atọ mbụ Naịjirịa maka asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa nke afọ 2018 na Russia
Agbanyeghị, o soghị na mmadụ iri abụo na atọ ikpeazụ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Agụnyere ya na otu nwoke iri abụọ na atọ nke mba ahụ maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2019

Moses Tladi (1903-1959) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya bụ ónyé na'ese ihe ojii mbụ nwere ihe ngosi na South Africa na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri ojii mbụ gosipụtara na South African National Gallery
A mụrụ Moses Tladi ma zụlite ya na 1903 Lobethal, GaPhahla, n'akụkụ ugwu nke South Africa
Ọ bụ nwa nke ónyé na-agwọ ọrịa ọdịnala nke na-enweta ihe ọ na-eri site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'ụzọ okike na ígwè, na nne bụ ónyé ọkpụite nwèrè onyinye
Tladi nọrọ n'afọ ndị mbụ ya na-azụ ehi
Nné na nnà ya ghọrọ Ndị Kraịst n'okpuru mmetụta nke Berlin Missionary Society, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lobethal Mission na mpaghara Limpopo ugbu a
Tladi, dị ka ọtụtụ ụmụ okorobịa n'oge ahụ, gara Johannesburg ịchọ ọrụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'etiti afọ 1920, ọ chọtara ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ubi na Lokshoek, ụlọ ónyé ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe n'ala, Herbert Read na mpaghara Parktown
Tladi bịdọrọ ise ihe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na osisi
Ónyé wéré ya n'ọrụ, Read, hụrụ nkà ya màkà ise ihe, ónyé malitere inye ya ihe ndị na-ese ihe
Read kọwakwara Tladi ónyé nchịkọta na ónyé ọrụ ebere Howard Pim, onye bụbu onye isi obodo Johannesburg, ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpà n'ịmepụta ụlọ ngosi nka Johannesburg
Ma Read na Pim kwalitere Tladi na ngosi ọha na eze site na 1929 gaa n'ihu
N'afọ 1931, Tladi ghọrọ onye isi ojii mbụ na-ese ihe na South African National Gallery
N'afọ 1939, ọ bụ ónyé Black African Artist mbụ gosipụtara ọrụ ya na National Gallery na Johannesburg, ebe ihe osise ya nwetara otuto

Tladi jere ozi na mbà ya n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ma gaa n'ihu na-ese ihe rụọ 1956, mgbè a manyere ya ịpụ n'ụlọ nke ya na mpaghara Johannesburg nke Kensington B gaa Soweto n'ihi iwu ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke National Party, ọkachasị Iwu Group Areas
Ọ nwụrụ na 1959, mgbè ọ dị afọ irí isé na isii
Nnukwu ihe ngosi mbụ nke South Africa nke ọrụ ónyé na-ese ihe, Moses Tladi, meghere na Iziko South African National Gallery na Cape Town na Heritage Day, 24 Septemba 2015
Ihe ngosi akpọrọ Moses Tladi Unearthed, nyere ónyé nleta ohere pụrụ iche ile ọrụ ya anya
N'ịbụ ónyé a kpọtụrụ aha dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ojii mbụ gosipụtara na South Africa, Moses Tladi (1903-1959) mepụtara aha dị ka ezigbo ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri
N'oge ndụ ya, ọ bụ ónyé ísì ojii mbụ na-ese ihe na Iziko South African National Gallery, n'oge na-adịghị ányá mgbè emeghechara ụlọ dị ugbu a, nke mbụ na 1931 na 1933
Ihe karịrị ọkara narị afọ mgbè ọ nwụsịrị na 1959, ihe ngosi a na-eme ka ọha na eze hụ ihe dị mkpà ọrụ ya pụtara
E bugara ihe ngosi ahụ na Grahamstown na June 2016 ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke National Arts Festival
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ihe dị ka ihe osise Tladi irí àtó, nke sitere na ụlọ ọrụ na nchịkọta onwé ónyé na South Africa na mba ofesi
A na-agụnye usoro na-egosi ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ yiri nke ahụ, ma ọ bụ n'otu oge ahụ
