Moshchena bụ ogbè no na Obodo Békè ala ana-kpo Yukrain
Moshe Matalon bụ onye injinia Israel-Amirika na onye na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ, ugbu a katapiila na ahazi ọrụ dịka profeso na Mahadum Illinois na Urbana-Champaign
Ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ na masta ya na Mahadum Tel Aviv na 1973 wee gụchaa PhD ya na 1977 na Mahadim Cornell, n'okpuru nlekọta nke Geoffrey SS
Ludford
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Mahadum New York Tandon School of Engineering site na 1978 ruo 1980 wee gaa Mahadum Northwestern site na 1980 ruo 2006
O mechara kwaga Mahadum Illinois na Urbana-Champaign na 2007
Mpaghara nyocha ya gụnyere ọkụ na mmiri

A họpụtara Matalon dịka onye so na otu na ahu maka mpaghara nke nke obodo (APS) na 1995, otu onye so na Institut nke phisiks (IOP) na 1999, Fellow nke Amirika Institut na ahụ maka ụgbọelu nakwa Astronautics (AIAA) na 2012, na otu onye nke na ahụ maka combushon Institut na afo 2018

Ọ bụ onye mmekọ nke UIUC centa na ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ nke ndi gbagoro agbagọ na onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere AIAA Pendray Aerospace Literature Award (2010), AIAA Fluid Dynamics Award (2016), ihe nrite Numa Manson nke Institut nke the Dynamik nakwa mgbasasi nke sistem dị iche iche (2017), na Ya
Zeldovich Gold Medal nke Combustion Institute (2020)
Matalon na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke Combustion Theory and Modelling
Moshekwa Langa (amụrụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke ọrụ ya gụnyere eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ, arụmọrụ, vidiyo, na foto
A mụrụ Moshekwa Langa na South Africa n'afọ 1975
Ọ malitere ịmụ gbasara akụkọ ihe mere eme mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, nke mere ka ọ chọọ ịghọ onye na-ese ihe
Oge ụfọdụ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ bịara lee ime nka anya dị ka ohere ịghọ akụkụ nke 'akụkọ na-aga n'ihu'
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Rijksakademie van Beeldende Kunsten (State Academy of Fine Arts) na Amsterdam
Langa kwuru banyere ọrụ ya, 'Ọ bụrụ na m ga-akọwara ihe m na-eme onye ọ bụla, m ga-asị na m na-emepụta ụdị nrọ
Ana m agbalị idekọ akụkụ nke oge ịmụrụ anya na oge ihi ụra
' Otu onye nkatọ kwuru na ọrụ ya 'ajụọla ala na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọha na eze ajụjụ na nke onwe ya site na eserese nke ókèala na gburugburu ọdịbendị'
Moshoeshoe Chabeli (nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 30, 2013) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
O gosipụtara Harold na ihe nkiri 2003, Stander na Thomas Jane
O gosikwara onye ụkọchukwu na ihe nkiri 2013, The Forgotten Kingdom Na telivishọn ọ pụtara na sitcom, Mponeng, nke bụ South African adaptation nke British sitcom, Keeping Up Appearances
Ọ bụ nwa eze nke Moshoeshoe I
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2013 mgbe ọ lụsịrị ọrịa kansa
Moshood Kashimawo Olawale Abiola GCFR, nke a makwaara dị ka M
Abiola (24 Ọgọst 1937 - 7 Jụlaị 1998) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ Aare Ona Kankafo nke iri na anọ nke ala Yoruba na onye aristocrat nke ezinụlọ Egba
MKO
Abiola zọrọ ọkwa onye isi ala na 1993, nke onye isi agha bu ụzọ bụ Ibrahim Babangida kagburu nsonaazụ ntuli aka ya n'ihi ebubo na ha bụ ndị nrụrụ aka na ndị na-ezighị ezi
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari nyere Abiola GCFR mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na 6 June 2018 ma gbanwee ụbọchị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke Naijiria ka ọ bụrụ Jụn 12
Abiola bụ enyi nke Ibrahim Babangida onye a na-ekwenye na ọ kwadoro ọbịbịa Babangida n'ọchịchị
Nkwado Abiola na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke Jụn 1993 gafere mpaghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị niile na nkewa okpukpe, n'etiti ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ole na ole iji mezuo mgbasa dị otú ahụ n'oge ya
Ka ọ na-erule oge ọnwụ ya, ọ ghọwo ihe nnọchianya a na-atụghị anya ya nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
A mụrụ M
Abiola na Abeokuta, Ogun State n'ezinụlọ Salawu na Suliat Wuraola Abiola
Nna ya bụ onye na-ere ihe ọkụkụ nke na-ere koko, nne ya na-ere mkpụrụ osisi ọjị
Aha ya, Kashimawo, pụtara 'Ka anyị chere ma hụ'
Moshood Abiola bụ nwa iri abụọ na atọ nke nna ya, mana nke mbụ n'ime ha dị ndụ site na nwa ọhụrụ, ya mere aha 'Kashimawo'
Ọ bụghị ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise ka nne na nna ya kpọrọ ya Moshood
Abiola gara African Central School, Abeokuta maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya

Dị ka nwatakịrị nwoke, ọ nyeere nna ya aka n'ahịa koko, mana ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha afọ 1946, azụmahịa nna ya dara n'ihi mbibi nke nkesa koko nke onye nyocha mmepụta kwuru na ọ dị njọ ma erughị eru maka mbupụ na ibibi ya ozugbo
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, ọ malitere azụmahịa mbụ ya na-ere nkụ a chịkọtara n'oké ọhịa n'isi ụtụtụ tupu ụlọ akwụkwọ, iji kwado nna ya na ụmụnne ya
Abiola guzobere otu egwu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise ma ga-eme emume dị iche iche iji gbanwere nri
Abiola mechara nwee ike ịchọ ịkwụ ụgwọ maka arụmọrụ ya, ma jiri ego ahụ kwado ezinụlọ ya na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Baptist Boys High School Abeokuta
Abiola bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin ụlọ akwụkwọ The Trumpeter, Olusegun Obasanjo bụ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, ọ sonyeere National Council of Nigeria na Cameroons n'ihi na ọ bụ onye siri ike na-esote ndị Naijiria ma e jiri ya tụnyere Obafemi Awolowo-led Action Group
N'afọ 1960, ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị iji gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Glasgow, ebe o mechara nweta akara ugo mmụta na ndekọ ego ma ruo eruo dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndekọ ego
O mechara bụrụ Fellow nke Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN)
N'afọ 1956, Moshood Abiola malitere ndụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ ụlọ akụ na Barclays Bank na Ibadan, mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjịrịa
Mgbe afọ abụọ gachara, ọ sonyeere Western Region Finance Corporation dị ka onye isi ego, tupu ọ gaa Glasgow, Scotland, iji gaa gụọ akwụkwọ dị elu
Site na Mahadum Glasgow, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ na ndekọ ego, ọ nwetakwara ọdịiche site na Institute of Chartered Accountants of Scotland

Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa, Abiola rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka ego na Mahadum Lagos Teaching Hospital, wee gaa na ụlọ ọrụ US Pfizer, tupu ọ banye na ITT Corporation, ebe o mechara bụrụ osote onye isi ala, Africa na Middle-East
Abiola na-etinye oge ya dị ukwuu, ma mee ọtụtụ ego ya, na United States, ka ọ na-ejigide ọkwa onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Mgbe Abiola na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka Naijiria nke Pfizer smile pharmaceuticals, ọchịchọ ya bụ inwe ụfọdụ ego na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mana nhọrọ ndị ọ nwere adịghị amasị ya
Mgbe ahụ, o tinyere akwụkwọ maka ndepụta ọrụ na-achọ onye na-ahụ maka ego a zụrụ azụ, ọ bụ n'oge ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ ka ọ chọpụtara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ITT Corporation
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ were Abiola n'ọrụ ma otu n'ime ọrụ ya ozugbo bụ iwepụ ụgwọ ndị agha ji ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Nzukọ ọfịs ya na onye nyocha nke mgbaàmà ndị agha, Murtala Mohammed iji chọọ ngwọta nke ụgwọ ahụ mere ka arụmụka ọnụ nke onye isi ndị agha Hassan Usman Katsina nụrụ
Ntinye aka nke Katsina mechara bụrụ ihe dị mma nye Abiola ka e nyere ya akwụkwọ ndọrọ ego iji kwụọ ụgwọ ahụ

Abiola jiri mkpebi siri ike ya kwụọ ụgwọ dị ka ngwá ọrụ nkwekọrịta maka ọrụ ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, na mbụ o nwere ike iwepụ onye njikwa mba ọzọ mana enweghị ike inweta 50% nke arịrịọ na aka Naijiria nke ITT

Abiola mechara guzobe Radio Communication (RCN) dị ka azụmaahịa dị n'akụkụ, a zụrụ ndị ọrụ ọhụrụ na ahịa nke ngwá ọrụ telivishọn ma Abiola lekwasịrị anya na ndị agha na-anọchi ngwá ọrụ agha oge agha obodo dị ka ndị ahịa azụmaahịa
Atụmatụ ahịa ya tụrụ aro ọzụzụ nke ndị ọrụ agha na iji belata ịdabere na ndị na-ere ahịa n'èzí maka mmezi, atụmatụ a nwetara ihu ọma na ndị agha nchebe
Abiola nwetara nkwekọrịta iji nye ndị agha nke nwetara ngwaike nke ITT ma nye ya 49% nke ngwá agha ya
RCN gara n'ihu mepụta netwọk nkwukọrịta kwụ otu ebe maka ndị agha na nkwukọrịta satellite nke Naịjirịa
N'afọ 1975, ITT na ndị mmekọ nwetara nkwekọrịta dị mkpa iji nye mgbanwe ekwentị na-akpaghị aka n'ọtụtụ ebe n'ime mba ahụ
Na mgbakwunye ọrụ ya na Middle-East na Africa, Abiola tinyere ego dị ukwuu na Naịjirịa na West Africa
O guzobere Abiola Farms, Abiola Bookshops, Radio Communications Nigeria, Wonder Bakeries, Concord Press, Concord Airlines, Summit Oil International Ltd, Africa Ocean Lines, Habib Bank, Decca WA
Ltd, na Abiola football club

Ọ bụkwa Onye isi oche nke kansụl azụmahịa G15, Onye isi oche nke ụlọọrụ Nigerian Stock Exchange, Onye Nlekọta nke Kwame Nkrumah Foundation, Onye Nche nke WEB Du Bois foundation, onye nlekọta nke Martin Luther King Foundation, na onye nduzi nke International Press Institute
N'afọ 1983, ya na Shehu Musa Yar'Adua, Bamanga Tukur na Raymond Dokpesi jikọrọ aka wee guzobe Africa Ocean Lines
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere ọrụ na 1984 site na iji ụgbọ mmiri ndị a na-akwụ ụgwọ tupu ọ nweta ụgbọ mmiri abụọ na 1986 nwere ikike maka 958 TEUs
Ụzọ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ jikọtara nnukwu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri West Africa na United Kingdom na Northern Europe
Mmekọrịta Abiola na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị malitere n'oge ọ dị obere mgbe ọ sonyeere National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroons (NCNC) mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu
N'afọ 1979, gọọmentị ndị agha mezuru okwu ya ma nyefee ndị nkịtị ike
Dị ka Abiola etinyelarị aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ sonyeere National Party of Nigeria (NPN) na-achị na 1980 ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi oche steeti nke pati ya

A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ 1983 ma ihe niile yiri ihe na-ekwe nkwa ebe ọ bụ na onye isi ala a họpụtara ọzọ sitere na pati Abiola ma dabere na ezi mgbanwe n'ike n'afọ 1979; Abiola ruru eru ịga n'ọkwa onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala mgbe oge onye isi ala ahụ a họpụtara
Otú ọ dị, olileanya ya ịghọ onye isi ala lara n'iyi n'oge na-adịghị anya na nke mbụ ya na 1983 mgbe ndị agha wepụrụ onye isi ala a họpụtara ọzọ nke pati ya ma kwụsị ọchịchị ndị nkịtị na mba ahụ
Abiola bụ onye otu Ansar Ud Deen na Naịjirịa

N'afọ 1980, site na akwụkwọ akụkọ National Concord ya, Abiola kwadoro ihe ndị Alakụba kwenyere nke gụnyere iwebata ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị Sharia na Southwestern Nigeria na ntinye Naịjirịa na Organization of Islamic Countries
Nkwado e nyere nke ikpeazụ nwetara nzaghachi dị ala site n'aka ụfọdụ ndị na-agụ National Concord
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọ na-etinye aka na nhazi na ọrụ nke Kọmitii Sharia nke Mba
N'afọ 1984, otu kọmitii ndị ụkọchukwu Alakụba nyere ya utu aha Baba Adinni nke Yorubaland
Nkwado ya maka Islam na Southern Nigeria mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na mpaghara Northern nke mba ahụ
N'obodo ya bụ Abeokuta, Abiola wuru ụlọ ọzụzụ kor'an nke akpọrọ aha nne ya Zulihat Abiola
Mgbe afọ iri nke ọchịchị ndị agha gasịrị, General Ibrahim Babangida nọ n'okpuru nrụgide iji weghachite ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naịjirịa

Mgbe ntuli aka mbụ a kwụsịrị, Abiola guzoro maka nhọpụta onye isi ala nke Social Democratic Party (SDP) ma merie Ambassador Baba Gana Kingibe na Alhaji Atiku Abubakar iji nweta nhọpụta onyeisiala nke SDP tupu ntuli aka onye isi ala 12 Jụn 1993
Abiola jisiri ike rụọ ọrụ ike si n'ịda ogbenye pụta site n'ịrụsi ọrụ ike

O guzobere ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ Abiola iji nye akwụkwọ ọgụgụ dị ọnụ ala, nke a na-emepụta n'ógbè ahụ n'afọ ndị 1980 mgbe akwụkwọ ọgụgụ ndị si mba ọzọ na-enweghị ike iru ndị Naijiria nkịtị ka a na-eme ka naira dị ala
O mekwara ka ihe ndị dị mkpa kwa ụbọchị dị ka osikapa na ncha dị ọnụ ala n'ahịa
Abiola kwupụtara na ọ bụ onye isi ala na Febụwarị 1993, nke a bụ mgbe onye isi ala ndị agha bụ Babangida kagburu ntuli aka nke onye isi ala gara aga
Òtù ọ họọrọ bụ SDP, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye si n'èzí bụ onye ọhụrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị n'ime òtù ahụ nke n'oge ahụ nwere nnukwu òtù abụọ, People's Front(PF) na PSP
Ma SDP na ndị na-emegide ya, NRC mere ntuli aka onye isi ala na Machị 1993
E mere ntuli aka nke SDP na Jos ma bụrụkwa asọmpi atọ n'etiti Abiola, Kingibe na Atiku n'agbanyeghị na e nwere ndị ọzọ na-achọ
Ndị otu People's Solidarity (PSP) n'ime SDP kwadoro Abiola nke ukwuu ebe ndị otu PF nke Yar'Adua na-eduzi kwadoro Atiku na ndị otu Kingibe kwadoro ya
N'oge ntuli aka mbụ, Abiola nwere ike ị nweta obere vootu nke 3,617 na Kingibe's 3,225
E meriri agba nke abụọ ka e mesịrị ma Abiola meriri ọzọ na obere mmeri wee bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke pati ahụ maka ntuli aka Jụn 12
Ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Abiola bụ ọdịnihu nwere nchekwube maka Naịjirịa na okwu ndị dị ka 'N'ikpeazụ! Ìhè nke Olileanya anyị' na 'ibu nke Ịga akwụkwọ'

Iwu akụ na ụba ya gụnyere mkparịta ụka ya na ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ mba ọzọ na njikwa ka mma nke ụgwọ mba ụwa nke mba ahụ, na mgbakwunye, mmụba mmekọrịta ya na ndị mba ọzọ ka ọ na-egosi onwe ya dị ka onye ndị mba ụwa nwere ike ịtụkwasị obi
Maka ntuli aka onye isi ala nke 12 June 1993, onye ibe Abiola bụ onye isi ya bụ Baba Gana Kingibe
O meriri onye iro ya, Bashir Tofa nke National Republican Convention
Ndị na-ekiri mba na mba ụwa kwupụtara ntuli aka ahụ dị ka ntuli aka onye isi ala kacha nweere onwe ya na nke kachasị mma na Naịjirịa, ọbụna Abiola meriri na steeti Kano nke onye iro ya dị n'ebe ugwu
Abiola meriri n'isi obodo mba ahụ, Abuja, ụlọ ntuli aka ndị agha, na ihe karịrị ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke steeti Naịjirịa

Ndị ikom si n'ebe ugwu na-achịkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa kemgbe nnwere onwe; Moshood Abiola, onye Alakụba nke ọdịda anyanwụ, nwere ike inweta ikike mba n'efu na n'ụzọ ziri ezi, nke a na-ahụtụbeghị na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naịjiria
Otú ọ dị, Ibrahim Babangida kagburu ntuli aka ahụ, na-akpata nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mere ka General Sani Abacha weghara ọchịchị n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
N'oge nkwadebe maka ntuli aka onye isi ala Naịjirịa nke afọ 2011 enwere oku sitere n'ọtụtụ ebe iji cheta MKO Abiola
Ndị a bụ nsonaazụ ndị a na-akwadoghị
N'afọ 1994, Moshood Abiola, MKO
kwupụtara onwe ya dịka onye isi ala Naijiria n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na mpaghara Epetedo nke agwaetiti Lagos, mpaghara ndị (Yoruba) sị Lagos bi
Ọ lọtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya site na njem iji nweta nkwado nke mba ụwa maka ọrụ ya

Mgbe o kwupụtara onwe ya dị ka onye isi ala, a mara ya dị ka a na-achọ ya ma bo ya ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru ma jide ya na iwu nke onye isi ala ndị agha General Sani Abacha, onye zigara ụgbọala ndị uwe ojii narị abụọ iji jide ya
A na-akpọ MKO
Abiola onye ọchịchị kacha ukwuu na Naịjirịa
E gburu nwunye ya nke abụọ Alhaja Kudirat Abiola na Lagos na 1996 mgbe o kwupụtara nkwado ọha na eze maka di ya
E jidere Moshood Abiola ruo afọ anọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ naanị ya na Bible, kor'an, na ndị nche iri na anọ dị ka ndị enyi
N'oge ahụ, Popu John Paul nke Abụọ, Achịbishọp Desmond Tutu na ndị na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ si n'akụkụ ụwa niile gbara gọọmentị Naijiria ume ka a tọhapụ ya
Nanị ọnọdụ metụtara ntọhapụ nke Chief Abiola bụ na ọ ga-ahapụ ikike ya, ihe ọ jụrụ ime, ọ bụ ezie na gọọmentị ndị agha nyere ya ịkwụ ụgwọ ma kwụọ ụgwọ nnukwu ego ntuli aka ya
N'ihi nke a, Chief Abiola nwere nnukwu nsogbu mgbe Kofi Annan na Emeka Anyaoku gwara ụwa na ọ kwetara ịhapụ ọrụ ya mgbe ha zutere ya iji gwa ya na ụwa agaghị anabata ntuli aka afọ ise
Moshood Abiola nwụrụ na mberede, obere oge ka General Abacha nwụsịrị, n'ụbọchị e kwụrụ na a ga-ahapụ ya
Mgbe ọ na-ezute otu ndị nnọchi anya mba Amerịka gụnyere Thomas Pickering na Susan Rice n'ụlọ ndị ọbịa gọọmentị na Abuja, Abiola dara ọrịa ma nwụọ
Rice nyere Abiola tii obere oge tupu ọdịda ya, ma mesịa dee banyere nkwenye na-adịgide adịgide na Naịjirịa na o nyere Abiola nsí
Nnyocha nke ndị dọkịta na ndị na-ahụ maka ọrịa sitere na gọọmentị Naijiria, Nigerian Medical Association, Canada, UK na US mere ma hụkwa ihe akaebe siri ike nke ọrịa obi ogologo oge

Onye isi nchekwa nke General Abacha, Hamza al-Mustapha ekwuola na e tiri Moshood Abiola ihe ruo ọnwụ n'ezie ọ bụ ezie na Al-Mustaph na-ekwu na o nwere vidiyo na teepu na-egosi otú e si tie Abiola ihe ruo ọnwụ, ọ ka na-abịa n'ihu na ntọhapụ nke teepu dị otú ahụ ma ọ bụ otu esi enweta ya na mbụ
N'agbanyeghi kpọmkwem ọnọdụ nke ọnwụ ya, o doro anya na Chief Abiola enwetaghị nlekọta ahụike zuru oke maka ọnọdụ ahụike ya

N'ihi ya, ihe ọ bụla Al-Mustapha kwuru na ọ ga-abụrịrị na ọ gafere ndị ọzọ na-ata ụta na ndị ọzọ karịa onwe ya na onye isi ya nwụrụ anwụ (General Sani Abacha) nwere ike ịbụ ihe na-abaghị uru ma ọ bụ n'ụzọ kachasị mma laghachi azụ na ha dị ka ndị na-egbu MKO
E nwere ọtụtụ echiche dị iche iche banyere ọnwụ Abiola
O kwenyesiri ike n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na Abiola nwere nsí, ọ bụ ezie na ozi gbasara ihe ndị dị n'azụ nsí ahụ, ka na-apụtaghị ìhè
Kofi Annan, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke asaa nke United Nations nke ya na Abiola nwere nzukọ na Abuja na 29 nke June 1998, kwuru na ekweghị ka Abiola nwee nlekọta ahụike zuru oke n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Nke a bụ n'ụzọ ụfọdụ na nchọpụta nke otu ndị na-ahụ maka ọrịa mba ụwa bụ ndị kwuru na ọrịa obi bụ ihe kpatara ọnwụ Abiola

Otu Human Rights Violation Investigation Commission nke Nigeria, duziri usoro ikpe iji chọpụta eziokwu nke ihe omume ndị dugara n'ọnwụ Abiola, na-ekwubi na ọchịchị Abubakar nwere ike ịmara karịa ka ọ kpughere
A na-eme emume ncheta Chief MKO
Abiola na Naijiria na mba ụwa
Kemgbe ọnwụ ya, Gọọmentị Steeti Lagos kwupụtara Jụn 12 dị ka ụbọchị ezumike ọha
N'afọ 2018, steeti ndị ọzọ gụnyere Ogun, Oyo na Osun, mara ọkwa Jụn 12 dị ka ezumike ọha na eze iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri abụọ na ise nke ntuli aka onye isi ala a kagburu na 1993
Jụn 12 ka bụ ezumike ọha na eze na Naijiria malite na 12 June 2019, a ga-eme ya dị ka ụbọchị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, na-anọchi Mee 29
A na-ahazi ihe ncheta na Naịjirịa
A na-akpọ MKO Abiola Stadium na Moshood Abiola Polytechnic aha iji sọpụrụ ya, a na-akpọkwa oku maka nkwenye onye isi ala mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
E guzobere ihe oyiyi, MKO Abiola Statue iji sọpụrụ ya
Ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị nkatọ katọkwara MKO
Abiola

Esemokwu sitere n'abụ nke onye egwu Naijiria, Fela Kuti, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, nke a ma ama maka ịbụ onye na-ebute ụzọ na egwu Afrobeat na onye na-ese okwu n'ihi ụdị ndụ ya pụrụ iche na o doro anya na ojiji ọgwụ ọjọọ
Ekwenyere na Kuti abanyela na esemokwu siri ike metụtara nkwekọrịta ya na akara ndekọ MKO
Abiola
O jiri mkpirisi nke International Telephone & Telegraph (IT&T) mee ihe n'abụ na-akatọ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mba dị iche iche
Abụ ahụ, ITT, na-ebo ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị otú ahụ ebubo na ha na-emebi akụ Afrịka ma kwuo 'ha malitere izuru ego dịka Obasanjo na Abiola'
Na 29 Mee 2012, onye bụbu onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan, mara ọkwa na a ga-agbanwe aha Mahadum Lagos a ma ama iji cheta Abiola dị ka Mahadum Moshood Abiola nke Lagos (MAULAG)
Nke a nwetara mmeghachi omume na-adịghị mma site n'aka ụmụ akwụkwọ, Alumni na ndị otu ọha na eze nke mere ka a ghara inwe mgbanwe a
Na 6 Juun 2018, Muhammadu Buhari, Onye isi ala Naijiria kwupụtara 12 Juun dị ka ụbọchị ọhụrụ maka ememe ụbọchị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

A na-eme emume ụbọchị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naịjirịa na 29 Mee ọ bụla, ụbọchị na 1999 nke onye bụbu onye isi ala ndị agha, Abdulsalami Abubakar, nyere onye isi ala a họpụtara ahọpụta, Olusegun Obasanjo nke People's Democratic Party (PDP) na ụbọchị mgbe, maka oge nke abụọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naịjiria, onye ọchịchị ndị nkịtị a họpụtara eweghara ọchịchị ndị agha

Na 6 June 2018, Muhammadu Buhari na nkwupụta ọha na eze gbanwere Ụbọchị Ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na June 12 iji sọpụrụ ntuli aka onye isi ala nke June 12, 1993 na onye mmeri ya, Moshood Abiola, onye nwụrụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Nkwupụta Buhari na-agụ n'akụkụ ụfọdụ 'n'ime afọ iri na asatọ gara aga, ndị Naijiria anọwo na-eme emume Mee 29, dị ka Ụbọchị Ọchịchị Onye kwuo uche ya
Nke ahụ bụ ụbọchị mgbe, maka oge nke abụọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme anyị, gọọmentị ndị nkịtị a họpụtara ahọpụta na-eweghara ọchịchị n'aka ndị agha
Oge mbụ nke a mere bụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1979
Mana n'echiche nke ndị Naijiria, dị ka ọchịchị ya si kwuo, Juun 12, 1993, bụ ihe nnọchianya nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naijiria karịa May 29 ma ọ bụ ọbụna October 1
Juun 12, 1993 bụ ụbọchị ndị Naijiria na ọtụtụ nde gosipụtara uche ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'ihe doro anya na ọ bụ ntuli aka kachasị nnweere onwe ya, nke ziri ezi na nke udo kemgbe nnwere onwe anyị
Eziokwu ahụ bụ na gọọmentị ndị agha nke oge ahụ anaghị akwado nsonaazụ nke ntuli aka ahụ anaghị adọpụ uche na asambodo ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke usoro ahụ
N'ihi ya, mgbe mkparịta ụka kwesịrị ekwesị gasịrị, Gọọmentị etiti ekpebiela, site ugbu a gaa n'ihu, a ga-eme emume Juun 12 dị ka Ụbọchị Ọchịchị Onye kwuo uche ya
Ya mere, gọọmentị ekpebiela inye GCFR nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke ala ahụ, onye isi MKO
Abiola nwụrụ anwụ, onye a na-eche na ọ bụ onye mmeri nke ntuli aka June 12, 1993 nke a kagburu akagbu'
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, Muhammadu Buhari kwetara n'iguzobe iwu na-agbanwe Mee 29 nke e wepụtara dị ka ezumike ọha maka ememe ahụ

Nzukọ nke Mba Naịjirịa weputara iwu mmezigharị ezumike ọha na eze na-esote iwu nke Kayode Oladele, onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na onye otu House of Representatives (Nzukọ nke asatọ) na-anọchite anya Yewa North / Imeko-Afon Federal Constituency nke Ogun State weputara ma kwado
A họpụtara Moshood Abiola ugboro abụọ dị ka onye ọchụnta ego mba ụwa nke afọ, ma nata ọtụtụ nzere nsọpụrụ PhD site na mahadum gburugburu ụwa

N'afọ 1987, e nyere ya mkpịsị ugodi ọla edo nke obodo Washington, DC, e nyekwara ya onyinye sitere na NAACP na King center na US, yana Kọmitii Mba Nile na Mmụta maka Ịkụzi na Paris, n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Na Na Naijiria, e mere Oloye Abiola ka ọ bụrụ Aare Ona Kakanfo nke Yorubaland, utu aha kachasị elu nke ndị nkịtị nwere n'etiti ndị Yoruba
N'oge e buliri ya elu, ọ bụ naanị ugboro iri na atọ ka agbụrụ ahụ nyere ya aha ahụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ya
Nke a n'ezie mere ka Abiola bụrụ onye nnọchi anya agha nke ndị agbụrụ ya niile

Dabere n'akụkọ ọdịnala nke agbụrụ ahụ dị ka ndị okenye Yoruba si kọọ, a na-atụ anya na Aare Ona Kakanfo ga-anwụ dịka onye agha na-agbachitere mba ya iji gosipụta onwe ya n'anya nke chi na nke na-anwụ anwụ dị ka onye ruru aha ya
E nyere ya nsọpụrụ nke atọ kachasị elu nke mba, Commander of the Federal Republic, na 1998
E nyekwara ya nsọpụrụ kachasị elu nke mba Naịjịrịa, Grand Commander of the Federal Republic ma ọ bụ GCFR na 2018
Ụbọchị ntuli aka a kagburu, June 12, mekwara ka ọ bụrụ Ụbọchị Ọchịchị Onye kwuo uche ya nke Naịjirịa

Moshood Abiola lụrụ ọtụtụ nwanyị; ndị a ma ama n'ime ha gụnyere Simibiat Atinuke Shoaga n'afọ 1960, Simbiat Abiola Kudirat Olayinka Adeyemi n'afọ 1973, Adebisi Olawunmi Oshin n'afọ 1974, Doyinsola (Doyin) Abiola Aboaba n'afọ 1981, Modupe Onitiri-Abiola na Remi Abiola
Ọ bu nna nke ọtụtụ ụmụ
Moshood Abiola malitere ịghọ onye ama ama na mba Naịjịrịa na mba ụwa n'ihi ọrụ ebere ya
Ndị Black Caucus nke United States of America nyere ụtụ na-esonụ maka Moshood Abiola
N'ihi nwoke a, enwere ma ihe kpatara olileanya na obi ike na ihe mgbu na mkpesa nke ndị na-ata ahụhụ ikpe na-ezighị ezi ga-eme ka udo na ùgwù mmadụ
Ụmụ ụwa ga-ama nnukwu ọrụ nke onye ndú a pụrụ iche na ọrụ ya siri ike iji dozie ihe ọjọọ, mee ikpe ziri ezi, na ijere ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ ozi
Ndị iro nke na-etinye ọdịnihu nke ọgbọ ndị na-abịa n'ihe ize ndụ ịda ogbenye, amaghị ihe, ọrịa, agụụ, na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ahụla mmetụta nke ọrụ obi ike nke Chief Abiola
Site n'aka ya na ndị ọzọ dị ka ya, nnwere onwe agaghị anọ n'okpuru ndị ole na ole ọzọ
Anyị, ndị otu Black Caucus nke Congress na-ekele ya n'ụbọchị a dị ka dike na nchụso zuru ụwa ọnụ iji chekwaa akụkọ ihe mere eme na ihe nketa nke ndị Afrịka

Site na 1972 ruo ọnwụ ya, obodo ịrị ịsịị na asatọ dị iche iche na Naịjirịa nyere Moshood Abiola utu aha ọdịnala otu narị na iri itoolu na asaa, na nzaghachi maka enyemaka ego ya n'iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ịrị ịsịị na atọ, ụlọ alakụba na ụka otu narị na iri abụọ na otu, ọbá akwụkwọ ịrị anọ na otu, ọrụ mmiri ịrị abụọ na otu, na steeti ịrị abụọ na anọ nke Naịjiria, ọ bụkwa nnukwu onye nkwado maka otu dị otu narị na iri anọ na itoolu na Naịjịrịa

Na mgbakwunye nke ọrụ ya na Naịjirịa, Moshood Abiola kwadoro ndị Southern African Liberation movements site na 1970s, ọ kwadoro mkpọsa ahụ iji nweta nkwụghachi ụgwọ maka ịgba ohu na ọchịchị na Africa na diaspora
Ya na onye isi ala ọ bụla nke Afrịka kwurịtara okwu n'onwe ya, na onye isi obodo ọ bụla nọ na ndị isi ojii na-anọghị na mba ọzọ iji hụ na ndị Afrịka ga-eji otu olu kwuo okwu n'okwu ndị ahụ

Mosleh Zamani (Persian , nke a na-akpọ Moslah Zamani) bụ onye Kurd Iran dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ nke e gburu na Disemba 17, n'afọ 2009 maka inwe 'mmekọrịta na-akwadoghị ya na enyi ya nwanyị' mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
Dị ka òtù ndí Amnesty International si wéé kwuo, a mara Zamani ikpe maka ịtọrọ otu nwanyị tọrọ ya ọtụtụ afọ (onye ya na ya nwere mmekọrịta nkwekọrịta na mbụ) na idina ya n'ike
Amnesty International kwukwara na Zamani nwere ike ọ gaghị enwe onye nnọchi anya iwu n'ụlọ ikpe
Ewere ikpe Zamani dị ka ihe na eweta esemokwu n'ihi ụdị mpụ ya na eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ bụ nwata n'oge ọ mere
N'ihi ya, gọọmentị Iran bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mba ụwa maka ikike obodo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nkwekọrịta maka ikike nke nwatakịrị; nke dugara n'ịkwụsị ikpe ọnwụ nye ụmụaka na Iran

Motaung bụ aha nna sitere na Afrịka nke nwere ike ịpụta
Nne bụ nne nne nke nwa
Enwere ike iwere nwanyị dị ka nne site na ịmụ nwa, site na azụlite nwa nke nwere ike ma ọ bụ na ọ gaghị abụ nwa ya, ma ọ bụ site na inye ya àkwá maka ime ime ime na ihe gbasara ime ime ime ime
Nne nkuchi bụ nwanyị nke ghọrọ nne na nna nwa ahụ site na usoro iwu nke nkuchi
Nne nke anụ ahụ bụ nwanyị na-enye aka na imepụta nwa ọhụrụ, site na mmekọahụ ma ọ bụ onyinye àkwá
Nne nwere ike ịnwe ọrụ iwu n'ebe nwa ọ zụlitere, dị ka ọrụ nkwado ego
Nne a na-ekwu na ọ bụ nwanyị nke a na-ebo ebubo na ya na nwatakịrị nwere mmekọrịta ma emeghị ya
Nne nne bụ nwanyị lụrụ nna nwatakịrị ma ha nwere ike ịmepụta ezinụlọ, mana na ozuzu ha enweghị ikike na ibu ọrụ nke nne na nna n'ihe gbasara nwatakịrị ahụ
Nna bụ nwoke yiri nne
A pụrụ ịkpọ ụmụ nwanyị dị ime dị ka ndị nne dị ime ma ọ bụ ndị nne ga-abụ, ọ bụ ezie na aha ndị dị otú ahụ anaghị adị mfe itinye aka na ndị nna (biological) ma ọ bụ nne na nna nkuchi
A na-akpọ usoro nke ịghọ nne 'matrescence'
Adjective 'nne' na-ezo aka na nne ma jiri ya tụnyere 'nna' maka nna
Ngwaa 'nne' pụtara ịmụ nwa ma ọ bụ ịmụ nwa, ma ọ bụ ilekọta nwa, nke sitere na aha 'nne'
Okwu ndị metụtara ịhụnanya bụ nne (mama, mommy), mama (mother), mothery, mamacita (ma, mam) na mama
A na-akpọ ihe nlereanya nwanyị nke ụmụaka nwere ike ile anya mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka nne
Motlalepula Ziphora Rosho bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu African National Congress, a họpụtara ya dịka osote onye isi oche nke North West Provincial Legislature na 2010
N'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka mmepe akụ na ụba, gburugburu ebe obibi, nchekwa na njem nleta na Gọọmentị North West Provincial

A chụpụrụ Rosho na kansụl ndị isi na 2014 wee jee ozi na ndị omeiwu mpaghara dị ka onye isi oche kọmitii ruo na Disemba 2018, mgbe ọ laghachiri na ndị isi dị ka MEC maka Gọọmentị Obodo na Nkwado Mmadụ
A họpụtara Rosho dị ka MEC maka ego mgbe ntuli aka 2019 gasịrị
Rosho nwere nzere BA na nkwukọrịta, yana diplọma postgraduate na iwu ọha na eze na ọmụmụ Africa
N'afọ 1989, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kansụl nnọchiteanya ụmụ akwụkwọ na Botoka Comprehension School
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Congress of South African Students na 1986 na African National Congress Youth League na 1992
N'afọ sochirinụ, Rosho sonyeere ndị ọrụ nzuzo na nchekwa nke ANC wee gaa ọzụzụ na sayensị nzuzo na nchekwa na Egypt na 1994

Ọ bụkwa onye nta akụkọ nyocha maka South African National Civic Organization n'etiti 1990 na 1994 na onye nhazi mgbasa ozi maka Western Transvaal na Northern Cape Provinces na onye otu kọmitii nke mmekọrịta mgbasa ozi na SANCO na ANC Western Transvael
Rosho ghọrọ onye otu njikwa atụmatụ iji jikọta nchịkwa Bophuthatswana na nchịkwa Cape Province na nchịkwa Transvaal Province mgbe ntuli aka 1994 gasịrị
N'afọ 1995, Rosho ghọrọ onye nchọpụta maka National Intelligence Agency
Ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ANC Western Transvaal nke Moelatlhoko na onye otu African Union for Journalists
Rosho ghọrọ ọnụ na-ekwuru MEC maka Ọrụ Ugbo, Nchekwa na Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na 2004 wee jee ozi dị ka onye isi njikwa maka ọtụtụ ndị nduzi njikwa
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara Rosho dị ka onye otu ANC nke North West Provincial Legislature
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Standing Committee on Public Accounts
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara ya dị ka osote ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu mpaghara

A họpụtara Rosho na gọọmentị mpaghara dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka ngalaba mpaghara nke Economic Development, Environment, Conservation and Tourism site n'aka onye isi ala Thandi Modise na Mee 2012
Mgbe ntuli aka mpaghara nke afọ 2014 gasịrị, a họpụtara Supra Mahumapelo dịka onye isi ala
A họpụtaghị Rosho ọzọ na kansụl ndị isi mpaghara
A họpụtara Rosho ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Finance, Economy & Enterprise Development

N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Gọọmentị Obodo na Nkwado MmadụỌ laghachiri na kansụl ndị isi na Disemba 2018, mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka MEC maka Gọọmentị Obodo na Human Settlement site n'aka onye isi ala Job Mokgoro
Mgbe ntuli aka 2019 gasịrị, Mokgoro kpọgara ya na ngalaba ego nke kansụl ndị isi

N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2021, Rosho bụ otu n'ime mmadụ atọ kọmitii mpaghara nke ANC nyere Kọmitii Ọrụ Mba nke ANC iji dochie Mokgoro dị ka onye isi ala mgbe Mokgoro jụrụ ịhapụ ọrụ n'agbanyeghị na ndị otu ANC nke mpaghara na nke mba gwara ya ka o mee ya
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2021, a mara ọkwa Bushy Maape dị ka onye ANC họọrọ iji dochie Mokgoro dị ka onye isi ala
Mokgoro gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka praịm n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ ma ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jiri otu olu họpụta ya dị ka onye na-anọchite anya praịm
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe a họpụtara Maape ma ṅụọ iyi dị ka onye isi ala na 7 Septemba
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2022, a mara ọkwa Rosho dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi oche mpaghara ANC
A ga-eme nzukọ ntuli aka nke mpaghara ahụ na ngwụcha Machị 2022
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị na-achọ
Àtụ Members of the North West Provincial Legislature
Moto Goldmines Limited
A chọpụtara ebe a na-egwupụta ọlaedo na Moto na 1903 ma malite igwu ala na 1905
Otu ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị na-achị ala ahụ nke a na-akpọ Kilo-Moto jiri ego ahụ mee ihe site na 1905 ruo 1919
Steeti na-achị achị natara ndị ọrụ si n'ime ime obodo Afrịka ka ha rụọ ọrụ n'ebe a na-egwupụta ihe
N'afọ 1919, a haziri Kilo-Moto dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-achị onwe ya nke nwere ndị nduzi na Brussels nke Minista nke ógbè ahụ họpụtara
Ụlọ ọrụ a rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ onwe onye malite na 1926 ma lanarị nnyefe nye ọchịchị Congo nwere onwe ya na 1961, mana steeti Zairian weghaara ya na 1967
A ka na-echekwa ihe ndekọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo 1967 na Brussels
Moto Goldmines Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ nchọgharị ọla edo na nke na-egwupụta akụ na-arụ ọrụ na belt Kilo-Moto greenstone dị na Haut-Uele Province na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Democratic Republic of Congo
Exchange nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Moto Goldmines nwetara site n'aka Randgold Resources na 2009, nke mechara jikọta ya na Barrick Gold na Disemba 2018
Njikọ aka ahụ mepụtara Kibali Gold Mine
Motshile wa Nthodi, nke a makwaara dị ka Motshile Nthodi, bụ onye na-ese osisi na South Africa, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ede uri na onye edemede
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya 'From the Calabash' nke Lufthansa Airlines nyere ikike
A mụrụ Motshile na 27 Machị 1948, na Lady Selbourne, Pretoria
Nne nne ya bụ onye na-akpụ osisi na onye na-eme ite, nke metụtara mkpebi ya ịghọ onye na-ese ihe
Ọ gụrụ gbasara nka na Ecole Nationale Superieur des Beaux Arts na Paris wee mechaa nweta nzere masta ya na nka na Ecola Des Arts Visuele na Geneva
Richard Friemelt, onye nduzi nke Schweickerdt Arts Gallery na Pretoria duziri ya ruo afọ iri na ise
Motshile emeela ihe ngosi onwe onye na otu karịrị iri asatọ na Switzerland, England, France, Germany, Austria & na South Africa
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze na nke onwe na Africa, Europe na US
A họọrọ ọrụ ya 'Ndebele bronze rings' maka ihu nke 'Trends in Phraseology' London
Ọ bụ onye otu New York Contemporary Art Museum na onye sonyere na International Visitor Leadership Program (IVLP)
Ihe osise na omenala ọdịnala nke afọ 1960 metụtara ọrụ Motshile

Ọrụ ya na-egosi ọdịnala nke agbụrụ Ndebele, Shangan na Napadi nke South Africa, na ojiji ọ na-eji agba dị ka oji na-anọchi anya ndụ, ọbara ọbara bụ ndị nna nna ya na odo na-anọchite anya ahụ eluigwe, na calabash na-anọchikwa nri
Site na Calabash, usoro ihe osise na ederede, nke na-egosi usoro ndụ n'ime obodo Ndebele
Moufida Bourguiba née Mathilde Lorrain (Arabic; 24 Jenụwarị 1890 15 Nọvemba 1976) bụ nwunye mbụ nke Onye isi ala Tunisia, Habib Bourguiva, na nwanyị mbụ nke Tunisia site na 1957 ruo 1961
A mụrụ Mathilde Lorrain na France na 1890 na Saint-Maur-des-Fossés, Val-de-Marne
Ọ lụrụ onye agha French, Colonel le Fras onye e gburu na ngwụ cha Agha Ụwa Mbụ na 11 Nọvemba 1918
Ọ zutere Habib Bourguiba na 1925 mgbe ọ na-amụ iwu na Mahadum Paris
A mụrụ naanị nwa ha nwoke, nke bụkwa Habib, n'ọnwa Eprel 1927 ma ha lụrụ na ọnwa Ọgọst 1927
Mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye Alakụba ma were aha 'Moufida' na 25 Ọktoba 1958
[citation needed] Di ya nyere ya ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ mana a na-azọrọ na o kwuru na ọ na-eme naanị maka ya na mba ya
Di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm na 1961
Ọ nwụrụ na Monastir n'afọ 1976
Di ya lụrụ Wassila Ben Ammar ọzọ
Moufida Tlatli (4 August 1947 7 February 2021) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye edemede, na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Tunisia
A maara ya maka ihe nkiri ya The Silences of the Palace na 1994, nke ritere ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa
Ọ gara n'ihu duzie ihe nkiri abụọ ọzọ The Season of Men (2000) na Nadia and Sarra (2004)
A mụrụ Moufida Tlatli na Sidi Bou Said, nke dịpụrụ adịpụ n'isi obodo Tunis, na 4 Ọgọst 1947
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi nkà ihe ọmụma ya kpaliri mmasị ya na ihe nkiri

Ọ kwagara Paris na 1965, ebe ọ gụrụ nhazi ihe nkiri na edemede n'ụlọakwụkwọ Institut des hautes études cinématographiques O mechara laghachi Tunisia n'afọ 1972 wee malite dị ka onye nchịkọta ihe nkiri
Otu n'ime ihe nkiri ama ama ọ dezigharịrị bụ Halfaouine Child of the Terraces (1990) nke Férid Boughedir
Moufida Tlatli mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye nduzi na The Silences of the Palace (1994)
O nwetara mkpali maka ihe nkiri ahụ site na ahụmahụ siri ike nne ya tachiri obi dị ka nwanyị Arab

A nabatara ihe nkiri ahụ nke ọma nke mere ka o nweta ọtụtụ onyinye Cannes Film Festival's Golden Camera, Carthage Film Festivals Golden Tanit, British Film Institute's Sutherland Trophy, Toronto Film Festival'S International Critics' Award, na Istanbul International Film Festival'tti Golden Tulip
E mechara họpụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe nkiri iri kachasị mma site n'Africa site n'aka onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye nkatọ Mark Cousins na Septemba 2012
Arab World Institute nyere ya Grand Prix, yana onyinye na mmemme ihe nkiri emere na Namur, Valencia, Torino, na Stuttgart
O mechara nọrọ dị ka onye ọka ikpe nke Cannes Film Festival
Ọ ghọrọ naanị onye nduzi nke abụọ si Maghreb mere nke a, mgbe Boughedir otu afọ iri tupu mgbe ahụ
Gọọmentị Tunisia họpụtara Tlatli dị ka Minista nke Ọdịbendị n'afọ 2011, mgbe mgbanwe Tunisia na ịchụpụ onye isi ala Zine El Abidine Ben Ali
Tlatli nwụrụ na COVID-19 na 7 Febụwarị 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na atọ
Di ya, Mohamed Tlatli, nwa ya nwanyị Selima Chaffai na nwa ya nwoke, Walid, na ụmụ ụmụ ise hapụrụ ya
Moumouni Siuley (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Naijiria na-akụ ọkpọ
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwoke na Summer Olympics nke afọ 1988
Mouna Fettou (Arabic; a mụrụ n'abalị 28 nke ọnwa Nọvemba, afọ 1970) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, egwuregwu, na ihe ngosi TV
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ na fim À la recherche du mari de ma femme [fr] (1995), na Women
and Women (1997)
Ọ lụrụ Saad ash-Shraibi, onye mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ya
Ọ na-akwado ihe ngosi TV Jari Ya Jari na Media 1
A na-asọpụrụ ya na nkwanye ùgwù pụrụ iche na 2019 Marrakech International Film Festival maka afọ 30 ya nke ime ihe nkiri
Mouna Noureddine (Arabic منى نور الدين, a mụrụ Saadia Oueslati, n'abalị 23 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1937), bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Mohamed Hedi Remnissi, onye na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ihe nkiri Bizerte, tụrụ aro aha nzuzo nke Mouna Noureddine
Mouna Noureddine gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị nke ụmụ agbọghọ Alakụba na Hammam-Lif
N'oge a, ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na mpaghara a na-akpọ 'Ennahdha ettamthilia' (mmụba ụmụ akwụkwọ)
Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya n'afọ 1952 wee banye na kọleji ndị nkuzi nke Tunis
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ gbanwere gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri Arabic nke Tunis

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Mouna, mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ, zutere n'oge ntụgharị nke The Merchant of Venice nke William Shakespeare na-eto eto na-eme ihe ọchị Noureddine Kasbaoui onye ọ lụrụ mgbe e mesịrị
Mouna Noureddine mụrụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị anọ N'afọ 1954, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'òtù ihe nkiri Arabic nke Zeki Touleïmat duziri
N'afọ sochirinụ, Mohamed Agrebi, onye nduzi nke ndị otu Tunis Municipality, họọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na ndị otu ya, na n'oge ọ ghọrọ onye ga-ahọrọ maka ọrụ ndị isi na ọtụtụ egwuregwu
Mouni Abderrahim (amụrụ na Nọvemba 19, 1985, na Béjaïa) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu egwuregwu volleyball nke Algeria ugboro abụọ, n'ime 2008 na 2012

Mounir Mourad ma Monir Morad (Arabic منير مراد a mụrụ n'abalị 13 nke ọnwa Jenụwarị, afọ 1922 - nwụọ n'abalị 17 nke ọnwa Ọktoba, afọ 1981), a mụrụ Maurice Zaki Mourad Mordechai bụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede egwu
Ihe ndị o dere gụnyere abụ abụọ maka Shadia na Abdel Halim Hafez
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri Egypt olenaole, nke a ma ama bụ 'Of the Good Day' (Naharak Sa'id)

Nna ya bụ Ibrahim Zaki Mourad Mordechai bụ onye Juu Egypt a ma ama na-agụ egwu, na onye na-ede egwu na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ, nne ya bụ onye Juu Egypt aha ya bụ Gamilah Ibrahim Roushou, nwa nwanyị nke Ibrahim Rousho, onye na'ụlọ ọrụ nkwekọrịta na mmalite narị narị afọ nke 20 nke na-edebanye aha Zaki Moorad ka ọ bụrụ abụ na kọntaktị na oriri agbamakwụkwọ
A mụrụ Mourad na Cairo
Mgbe Mounir na-etolite, nwanne ya nwanyị, onye na-ese ihe Leila Mourad bụ onye a ma ama ma na-abụ abụ na redio Egypt
na ọ banyere Islam naanị iji lụọ Soher Al Bably

Mounir Murad nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1981 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na itoolu, mgbe ọ nwesịrị nkụchi obi, ọnwụ Mounir bịara n'ihi nkụchiobi mberede, mana o doro anya na ọ bụ nsonaazụ sitere n'okike mgbe ogologo ụbọchị nke ịda mbà n'obi nke mba ahụ hụrụ na mmetụta dị egwu nke ihe ga-abịa na ihe a na-amaghị ama, na mgbakwunye na nnukwu nsogbu ọ na-agafe n'onwe ya
Mounkaïla Aïssata bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
N'otu oge ọ bụ naanị nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu, Aïssata bụkwa onye otu ndị omeiwu Pan-Afrika
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Pan-Afrika, ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii na elekota ndị obodo ha nile
Mounkaïla Garike Idé Barkiré (ka amụrụ na 19 Jenụwarị 1972), nke a makwaara aha ya bụ Bappa, bụ onye Nigerien bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ
Site na 1992 ruo 1998, o nyere goolu asaa na egwuregwu iri na atọ maka ndị otu mba Niger
Sahel SC
Africa Sports d'Abidjan
Ugwu Saịnaị (Hibru Har Sīnay; Aramaic), nke a makwaara dị ka Jabal Musa (Arabic جَبَل مُوسَىٰ, nsụgharị Ugwu Mozis), bụ ugwu dị na Peninsula Saịna nke Ijipt
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ebe nwere ike ịbụ nke Ugwu Saịnaị nke Bible, ebe, dị ka Torah, Bible, na kor'an si kwuo, Mozis natara Iwu Iri ahụ
Ọ bụ mita 2,285 (7,497 ft), ugwu dị oke oke n'akụkụ obodo Saint Catherine na mpaghara a maara taa dị ka Peninsula Saịnaị
A na-agba ya gburugburu n'akụkụ niile site na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ugwu ugwu nke ọ bụ akụkụ ya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ dị n'akụkụ Ugwu Catherine nke, na 2,629 m ma ọ bụ 8,625 ft, bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu n'Ijipt
Ewubere nkume ugwu Saịnaị n'oge ngwụcha mmalite mmalite nke Ọta Arabian-Nubian
Ugwu Saịnaị na-egosiputa mgbanaka mgbanaka nke mejupụtara granite alkaline batara n'ụdị okwute dị iche iche, gụnyere mgbawa ugwu
Ihe granite dị na ngwakọta sitere na syenogranite ruo alkali feldspar granite
Nkume mgbawa ugwu bụ alkaline ruo peralkaline, na mmiri na-asọpụta na mgbawa na ugwu mgbawa na-anọchi anya ha
N'ozuzu, ọdịdị nke nkume ndị e kpuchiri ekpuchi n'Ugwu Saịnaị na-egosi na e mere ha n'omimi dị iche iche site n'ebe ibe ha nọ
Ozugbo ugwu ugwu ahụ bụ ebe obibi ndị mọnk Saint Catherine nke narị afọ nke isii
Nzuko ahụ nwere ụlọ alakụba nke ndị Alakụba ka na-eji, na ụlọ ụka Ọtọdọks nke Gris, nke e wuru na 1934 na mkpọmkpọ ebe nke chọọchị narị afọ nke 16, bụ́ nke a na-adịghị emeghe ọha na eze
Ụlọ ụka ahụ gbachiri nkume ahụ nke a na-ewere dị ka ebe e si nweta mbadamba nkume nkume nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ
N'elu ugwu ahụ bụkwa 'ọgba Moses', ebe a sịrị na Moses chere ịnata Iwu Iri ahụ
A na-ejikọta Jabal Musa na onye amụma Alakụba bụ Musa (Moses)
Karịsịa, ọtụtụ ebe a na-ezo aka na Jabal Musa dị na kor'an, ebe a na'akpọ ya Ṭūr Saināʾ, Ṭūr Sīn, na aṭ-Ṭūr na al-Jabal (nke abụọ pụtara 'Ugwu')
Banyere Wād Ṭuwā (Ndagwurugwu Tuwa) dị nso, a na-ewere ya dị ka onye dị nsọ, a na'akpọkwa akụkụ ya Al-Buqʿah Al-Mubārakah ('Ebe A gọziri agọzi')

Mourad Zaoui (Arabic; a mụrụ na 23 Eprel 1980) bụ onye mba Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Mourad Zaoui na mpaghara Aïn Sebaâ nke Casablanca, Morocco, n'abalị 23 ọnwa Eprel afọ 1980
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke abụọ Mostapha na Khadija Zaoui mụrụ
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere bachelọ ya na nkwukọrịta azụmahịa na Lycée Elbilia na Casablanca n'afọ 1999, ọ kwagara New York City iji mụọ Bekee na Queens College
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ chọpụtara mmasị ya maka ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri sinima
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2002, a chọpụtara na nna Mourad na-arịa ọrịa kansa akpa ume, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Mourad laghachiri Morocco iji lekọta nna ya ma weghara azụmahịa ezinụlọ ya na-emepụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị n'afọ 2004, Mourad kpebiri ịchụso nrọ ya nke ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2005, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise, a họpụtara Mourad dịka onye isi na ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Wake Up Morocco
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya gosipụtara na ọ bụ ahụmahụ siri ike, ebe Mourad nwere mmerụ ahụ site na ihe mberede ọgba tum tum tupu ime ihe nkiri, yana mwakpo appendicitis n'oge ime ihe nkiri
N'agbanyeghị ihe mgbochi ndị a, Mourad nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya, na-aga n'ihu na-etinye ya na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri na telivishọn 60 na Morocco na gburugburu ụwa
Mgbe ọ na-adịghị eme ihe nkiri, Mourd na-enwe mmasị ịnya ụgbọ mmiri, ejiji, egwuregwu ụgbọala, na nkà ọgụ

Mmemme Qingming ma ọ bụ Mmemme Ching Ming, nke a makwaara dị ka Tomb-Sweeping Day na bekee (nke a na-akpọkwa ụbọchị ncheta ndị China ma ọ bụ ụbọchị nna ochie ), bụ emume ọdịnala ndị China nke Han Chinese nke China China na-ahụ
Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macau, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand na ndị China agbụrụ Malaysia na Singapore
Ọ dabara n'ụbọchị mbụ nke usoro anyanwụ nke ise nke kalenda lunisolar ọdịnala ndị China
Nke a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ụbọchị 15th ka mmiri Equinox gasịrị, ma ọ bụ 4, 5 ma ọ bụ ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa nke anọ n'ime otu afọ
N'oge Qingming, ezinụlọ ndị China na-aga n'ili nke ndị nna nna ha iji hichaa ili, kpegara ndị nna nna ha ekpere ma na-eme ihe omume
Àjà ga-agụnyekarị efere nri ọdịnala na ọkụ osisi joss na akwụkwọ joss ọkụ
Ememe ahụ na-amata nkwanye ùgwù ọdịnala nke ndị nna nna mmadụ na omenala ndị China
Ndị China na-eme Mmemme Qingming kemgbe ihe karịrị afọ 2500, n'agbanyeghị na emume a agbanweela nke ukwuu
Ọ ghọrọ ezumike ọha na eze na China na 2008, ebe a na-ejikọta ya na oriri nke qingtuan, dumplings na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke osikapa glutinous na Chinese mugwort ma ọ bụ ọka bali
Na Taiwan, a na- eme ezumike ọha n'oge gara aga na ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa nke anọ iji sọpụrụ ọnwụ Chiang Kai-shek n'ụbọchị ahụ na 1975, mana ka ewu ewu Chiang na-ebelata, a naghị eme mgbakọ a
A na-eri nri a na-akpọ caozaiguo ma ọ bụ shuchuguo, nke ejiri ahịhịa Jersey mee, ebe ahụ
A na-eme Mmemme yiri nke ahụ n'agwaetiti Ryukyu, nke a na-akpọ Shīmī n'asụsụ obodo
Mmemme a sitere na nri oyi ma ọ bụ mmemme Hanshi nke chetara Jie Zitui, onye ama ama steeti Jin ( Shanxi nke oge a) n'oge oge opupu ihe ubi na oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ
N'ime ọgba aghara Li Ji, ọ soro nna ya ukwu Prince Chong'er na 655 BC ịga biri n'etiti ebo Di na gburugburu China
A bibipụkwa anụ n’apata ụkwụ ya ka o wetere onyenwe ya ofe
N'afọ 636 BC, Duke Mu nke Qin wakporo Jin wee nọkwasị Chong'er n'ocheeze ya, ebe ọ na-emesapụ aka n'ịkwụghachi ndị nyeere ya aka n'oge mkpa ya
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi ịdị elu nke onwe ya ma ọ bụ n'ihi nleghara nke Duke, Jie agafeela ogologo oge
O mechara laa n'oké ọhịa dị n'akụkụ Ugwu Mian na nne ya merela agadi
Duke gara n'ime ọhịa na 636 BC mana ọ hụghị ha
O wee nye ndị na-eso ụzọ ya iwu ka ha gbaa ọkụ n’ime ọhịa ka ha manye Jie pụọ
Mgbe e gburu Jie na nne ya kama, Duke ahụ nwere mwute ma wuo ụlọ nsọ maka nsọpụrụ ya

Ndị Shanxi mechara kwanyere Jie ugwu dị ka onye na- adịghị anwụ anwụ ma zere ịgbanye ọkụ ruo ogologo oge otu ọnwa n'ime omimi nke oyi, omume na-emerụ ụmụaka na ndị agadi ahụ nke na ndị ọchịchị mpaghara ahụ nwara igbochi ya ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ
Nkwekọrịta mechara mepụta ebe amachibidoro ya ka ọ bụrụ ụbọchị 3 gburugburu oge anyanwụ Qingming n'etiti oge opupu ihe ubi
Ihe dị mkpa nke ezumike ugbu a bụ Emperor Xuanzong nke Tang
A kọrọ na ụmụ amaala ndị bara ọgaranya na China na-eme ọtụtụ ememe oké ọnụ na oké ọnụ ahịa iji sọpụrụ ndị nna nna ha
Na AD 732, Xuanzong chọrọ ịkwụsị omume a site n'ikwu na a ga-akwụ ụgwọ ndị dị otú ahụ naanị otu ugboro n'afọ, na Qingming
Mmemme Qingming bụ mgbe ndị China na-eleta ili ndị nna ochie iji zachaa ha
Omenala a bụ ndị eze ukwu wuru nkume ili ndị dị ebube maka usoro eze ọ bụla

Ruo ọtụtụ puku afọ, ndị eze ukwu China, ndị isi, ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị ahịa gbakọtara ọnụ icheta ndụ nke ndị ahụ hapụrụ, ịga leta ili ha iji mee nsọpụrụ ofufe Confucian site n'ịgba ili, ileta ili ozu, ili ma ọ bụ n'obodo mepere emepe nke oge a, obodo columbaria, ịrụ ndezi ala na mmezi na ime ka ha na-ekpe ekpere maka ndị nna nna ha na pụrụ iche Chinese echiche banyere ndụ mgbe a nwụsịrị na-enye ncheta nke ndị nna nna ha ndụ ọbara ndị ikwu, ha kith na ndị ikwu
N’ebe ụfọdụ, ndị mmadụ kweere na a na-ekwe ka a na-ekpocha ili ahụ nanị n’oge mmemme a, n’ihi na ha kwenyere na ọ ga-ewute ndị nwụrụ anwụ ma ọ bụrụ na a na-ekpocha ya n’ụbọchị ndị ọzọ

Ụmụntakịrị na ndị okenye na-egbu ikpere n’ala kpee ekpere n’ihu ili ndị nna nna ha, na-esure joss n’ụdị osisi incense ( joss-sticks ) na akwụkwọ e ji ọlaọcha mee ( joss paper ), zachaa ili na inye nri
tii, mmanya, chopstick, na/ma ọ bụ nhunye maka ncheta nke ndị nna ochie
Dabere n'okpukpe nke ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri, ụfọdụ na-ekpegara chi dị elu ekpere ka ọ sọpụrụ ndị nna nna ha, ebe ndị ọzọ nwere ike ikpegara mmụọ ndị nna ochie ekpere
Ememe ndị a nwere ọdịnala dị ogologo na Eshia, ọkachasị n'etiti ndị eze ukwu bụ ndị nyere iwu mmemme ndị a ka ha bụrụ okpukperechi mba

Ndị ọrụ ugbo chekwara ha karịsịa ma ndị ọrụ ugbo na-ewu ewu taa, bụ́ ndị kwenyere na ịnọgide na-eme ememe ga-eme ka a na-enwe ihe ubi na-amị mkpụrụ n'ọdịnihu site n'ime ka obi dị ndị mmụọ nọ n'ụwa ọzọ obi
Ihe nnọchianya okpukpe nke ịdị ọcha nke ememe, dị ka alaka pọmigranet na willow, na-ewu ewu n'oge a
Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ na-ebu alaka willow na Qingming ma ọ bụ tinye alaka willow n'ọnụ ụzọ ámá na/ma ọ bụ n'ọnụ ụzọ ha
Enwere myirịta na akwụkwọ nkwụ a na-eji n'ụbọchị nkwụ n'Iso Ụzọ Kraịst; Ha abụọ bụ ememe okpukpe
Ọzọkwa, nkwenye ahụ bụ na alaka willow ga-enyere aka ịchụpụ mmụọ na-enweghị obi ụtọ, nsogbu na nsogbu, na/ma ọ bụ mmụọ ọjọọ ndị nwere ike na-awagharị n'ime ala ụwa na Qingming

Mgbe ha gbakọchara na Qingming ka ha rụọ ọrụ agbụrụ na ezinụlọ Confucian na nkume ili, ili ma ọ bụ columbaria, ndị sonyere na-anọ ụbọchị fọdụrụnụ na njem ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ ezinụlọ, tupu ha amalite ịkọ ubi
Ha na-abụkarị abụ ma na-agba egwú
Qingming bụkwa oge ndị di na nwunye na-eto eto na-amalite na-akpa
Ihe ọzọ a na-ewu ewu na-eme bụ ife efe n'ụdị anụmanụ ma ọ bụ agwa sitere na opera ndị China
Ihe ọzọ a na-emekarị bụ ibu okooko osisi kama ịbụ akwụkwọ, ihe nsure ọkụ na-esi ísì ụtọ, ma ọ bụ ihe mgbaka ọkụ
N'ọdịnala, otu ezinụlọ ga-agba ego mmụọ na akwụkwọ mpempe akwụkwọ dị ka ụgbọ ala, ụlọ, ekwentị na ndị ọrụ akwụkwọ
Na omenala ndị China, a kwenyere na ndị mmadụ ka chọrọ ihe ndị ahụ niile na ndụ mgbe a nwụsịrị
Mgbe ahụ, ndị òtù ezinụlọ na-atụgharị na kowtow ugboro atọ ruo itoolu (dabere na ezinụlọ na-agbaso ụkpụrụ ọdịnala) n'ihu ili nke ndị nna ochie
A na-eme ememe Kowtowing n'ihu ili n'usoro nke nna ochie n'ime ezinụlọ

Mgbe ndị nna ochie fee ofufe n’ebe a na-eli ozu, ezinụlọ dum ma ọ bụ ezinụlọ dum na-eri nri na ihe ọṅụṅụ ha wetara maka ofufe n’ebe ahụ ma ọ bụ n’ubi ndị dị nso n’ogige ncheta, bụ́ nke na-egosi na ezinụlọ ahụ na ndị nna nna ha ga-ezukọta
Ememe ọzọ metụtara ememme ahụ bụ ọgụ ọkụ, yana ịdị adị n'ime ọnọdụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịnala ahụ na Kaifeng Millennium City Park (Ogige Ogige Qingming Riverside Landscape)
A na-ejikarị ndị mmadụ na-asọpụrụ ndị a na-ewere dị ka ndị dike mba ma ọ bụ ndị dike ma ọ bụ ndị China na-esetịpụ ihe atụ bụ ndị nwụrụ n'ihe omume ndị a na-ewere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Mwagharị nke Eprel ise na ihe omume Tiananmen bụ nnukwu mmemme na akụkọ ntolite China nke mere na Qingming
Mgbe onye isi ala Zhou Enlai nwụsịrị na 1976, ọtụtụ puku mmadụ kwanyere ya ugwu n'oge ememme ahụ iji kwanyere ha ùgwù
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asọpụrụkwa ndị ngagharị iwe Tiananmen Square na 1989 na Zhao Ziyang metụtara

N'agbanyeghị mmemme ahụ enweghị ọkwa gọọmentị, obodo ndị China si mba ofesi dị na mba ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia, dị ka ndị nọ na Singapore na Malaysia, ji ememme a kpọrọ ihe ma na-edebe ọdịnala ya n'ikwesị ntụkwasị obi

Ụfọdụ emume Qingming na ihe ịchọ mma ndị nna ochie nke ndị China si mba ofesi na Malaysia na Singapore na-ahụ nwere ike ịmalite na usoro ndị eze Ming na Qing, n'ihi na mgbanwe omenala na Mainland China emetụtaghị obodo ndị si mba ọzọ

Qingming na Malaysia bụ ọrụ ezinaụlọ ma ọ bụ oriri ezinụlọ (nke ndị otu agbụrụ na-ahazi) iji cheta na sọpụrụ ndị ikwu nwụrụ anwụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'ebe ili ha na ndị nna ochie dị anya si China n'ebe ịchụàjà ụlọ, ụlọ arụsị ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ ebe ịchụàjà arụrụ arụ na Buddha ma ọ bụ Taoist
ụlọ nsọ
Maka ndị obodo China si mba ofesi, mmemme Qingming bụ emume ezinaụlọ na, n'otu oge ahụ, ọrụ ezinaụlọ
Ha na-ahụ ememme a dị ka oge ịtụgharị uche maka ịsọpụrụ na inye ndị nna nna ha ekele
Ndị China si mba ofesi na-agakarị ili ndị ikwu ha nwụrụ anwụ na ngwụcha izu kacha nso ụbọchị ahụ
Dịka omenala oge ochie siri dị, a na-anabata ịsọpụrụ ebe ili ozu naanị ụbọchị iri tupu ma emechaa Ememme Qingming
Ọ bụrụ na nleta a abụghị n'ụbọchị ahụ, a na-akwado ịsọpụrụ Qingming
Ememme Qingming na Malaysia na Singapore na-amalitekarị n'isi ụtụtụ site n'ịkwanyere ndị nna nna dị anya si China n'ebe ịchụàjà ụlọ
Nke a na-esochi ya ịga leta ili nke ezigbo ndị ikwu na mba ahụ
Ụfọdụ na-agbaso echiche nke nsọpụrụ ofufe ruo n'ókè nke ịga ili nke ndị nna nna ha na China China

N'oge usoro ndị eze Tang, Emperor Xuanzong nke Tang kwalitere nnukwu egwuregwu agha, na-eji eriri ruru 167 metres (548 ft) na eriri dị mkpụmkpụ jikọtara yana ihe karịrị mmadụ 500 na njedebe ọ bụla nke eriri
Akụkụ nke ọ bụla nwekwara ndị na-akụ ọkpọ nke ya iji gbaa ndị sonyere ya ume
N'ịsọpụrụ omenala ndị a, ezinaụlọ na-agakarị ịnya ụkwụ ma ọ bụ kiting, na-egwu bọl ndị China ma ọ bụ agha na-akụ osisi
Mmemme Qingming bụkwa akụkụ nke omume mmụọ na okpukperechi na China
Dị ka ihe atụ, okpukpe Buddha na-akụzi na ndị na-anwụ na obi amamikpe enweghị ike iri nri na ndụ mgbe a nwụsịrị, ma e wezụga n'ụbọchị nke mmemme Qingming
Mmemme Qingming nwere mkpa na omenala tii ndị China ebe ọ bụ na ụbọchị a kapịrị ọnụ na-ekewa teas green ọhụrụ site na ụbọchị ha na-ahọrọ
A na-enye teas akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke emere site na akwụkwọ ewepụtara tupu ụbọchị a aha 'pre-qinging' () nke na-enye iwu mkpado ọnụahịa dị elu
A na-eji teas ndị a kpọrọ ihe maka inwe ísì ụtọ dị nro ma dị nro karịa nke a na-ahọrọ ma emesịa
A na-ewere mmemme Qingming dị ka ụbọchị ihu igwe kacha mma n'oge opupu ihe ubi, mgbe ọtụtụ mmadụ na-apụ na njem
Akwụkwọ ochie nke Tang na-akọwa omenala a ma kwuo banyere ya nwere ike dị na uri oge ochie

Akwụkwọ mpịakọta Qingming ama ama nke Zhang Zeduan dere bụ ihe osise ndị China oge ochie nke na-egosi ọnọdụ obodo Kaifeng, isi obodo usoro ndị eze Song n'oge mmemme QingmingÀtụ Wide imageÀtụ Wide image
A na-akpọkarị Qingming aha n'akwụkwọ ndị China
N'ime ndị a, nke a kacha mara amara bụ abụ Du Mu (nke akpọrọ 'Qingming')

Ọ bụ ezie na ụbọchị abụghị ugbu a ezumike na Vietnam, a na-akpọ ememe Qingming (n'okpuru aha Thanh Minh ) na uri epic The Tale of Kieu, mgbe onye na-eme ihe nkiri Kieu zutere mmụọ nke nwanyị ochie nwụrụ anwụ
Nkọwa nke ebe nkiri n'oge mmemme a bụ otu n'ime akụkụ akwụkwọ ndị Vietnam kacha mara amara
Moushira Mahmoud Khattab bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na òkpé udo mba Egypt a mụrụ n'afọ 1944
Ọ n'arụ ọrụ dịka onye isi na ụlọ ọrụ National Council for Human Rights, nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ n'ahụ maka as ghara ịnapụ ndị mmadụ Ihe ruwere ha

Ọ rụburu ọrụ dịka minista n'ahụ maka ezinụlọ na ọha mmadụ, osote minista n'ahụ maka ihe n'eme na mba ndị ọzọ, Onye nnọchiteanya Ijipt na mba South Africa, Czech Republic na Slovakia, nọrọkwa n'òtù okpe udo Ijipt na mba Australia, Hungary, Austria na United Nations in New York City and Vienna
Ọ bụkwa onye nkwuchite ọnụ ndị mmadụ, ekwuchite ọnụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Ọ rụbukwara dika osota onye isi na ụlọ ọrụ UN Committee on the Rights of the Child nke dị na isi ụlọ ọrụ UN dị na Geneva
Na abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2016, praịm Minista Egypt kwupụtara na Moushira Khattab ga-abụ onye nke ga-esi Egypt na ndị ga-abụ onye isi UNESCO na ntuli aka a ga-eme n'afọ 2017
Khattab ji nzere PhD na ikikere nke nwa site na Mahadum Cairo, nzere MA
na International Relations site na MahadumNorth Carolina dị na Chapel Hill at Chapel Hill, NC, USA, ya na nzere BA
na political science site na Mahadum Cairo[Tinye edensibịa]
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nnọchiteanya mbụ nke Ijipt na mba South Africa ma tutuu nkea, ọ rụburu dịka onye nnọchiteanya na mba Czechoslovakia mgbe ha kewara n'udo ịghọ Czech Republic and Slovakia
Khattab rụrụ ọrụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ikpeazụ ya dịka osote minista ihe n'eme na mba ndị ọzọ na ngalaba international cultural relations
Khattab rụkwara ọrụ dịka otu onye n'ime ndị òtù nnọchiteanya Ijipt na Budapest, Vienna na Melbourne rukwaa ọrụ n'isi ozi UN dị na New York ya na UNIDO headquarters dị na Vienna
Site na Machị 2009 ruo Febụwarị 2011, Khattab jere ozi dị ka minista nke steeti maka ezinụlọ na ọha mmadụ
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke International Bureau for Children's Rights 'IBCR'
Khattab na-anọchite anya MENA Region na Board of Child Helpline International na ndị isi oche nke Kọmitii Mba na Kọmitii Na-eduzi nke Middle East & North Africa na ime ihe ike megide ụmụaka
Khattab jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche, onye na-akọ akụkọ na onye otu Kọmitii UN na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụaka site na 2002 ruo 2010
Ọ bụ onye otu n'ọtụtụ njikọ gụnyere Women Leadership Council iji lụso ịzụ ahịa mmadụ ọgụ gụnyere ụmụaka, UNGIFT- Vienna 2008
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke otu ndị ọkachamara UN intergovernmental nke wepụtara ntuziaka UN na Okwu Ikpe Ziri Ezi metụtara ụmụaka na ndị akaebe maka mpụ nke ECOSOC nabatara na 2005

Khattab bụ osote onye isi oche nke Aflatoun Child Savings International nke dị na Amsterdam ma bụrụkwa onye nkuzi oge niile gbasara ikike ụmụaka nwere ndị uwe ojii, ndị ọka ikpe, òtù ụmụ nwanyị na mgbasa ozi
Kemgbe afọ 2011, onye nnọchi anya Khattab abụwo ọkà okwu na onye nnọchianya na ihe omume ndị dị mkpa metụtara ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ikike ụmụaka na mmepe yana omume mba ụwa ndị ọzọ
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2016, Praịm Minista Ijipt kwupụtara na Khattab ga-abụ onye Egypt ga-azọ ọkwa onye isi nchịkwa UNESCO na ntuli aka a ga-eme n'afọ 2017

E mere ọkwa ahụ n'azụ ihe ngosi nka Ijipt iji gosipụta ọdịbendị siri ike nke Ijipt na ihe nketa bara ọgaranya yana dịka otu n'ime ndị guzobere UNESCO na ndị mmekọ mbụ nke gụnyere ịkwaga ụlọ nsọ Abu Simbel na 1964 n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
African Union kwadoro nnọchite anya Khattab na nzukọ nke iri na asaa ya nke AU nke e mere na Kigali site na 10-18 Julaị 2016
Otú ọ dị, n'ikpeazụ, mgbalị Khattab ịghọ onye isi nchịkwa UNESCO amịtaghị mkpụrụ
N'afọ 1999, onye isi ala mba South Africa kwanyeere Khattab ùgwù , nye ya nturu ugo Order of Good Hope , nke bụ ùgwù kacha dị elu enwere ike inye onye Ọbụla n'abụghị nwa afọ ala South Africa
N'afọ 2010, Onye isi ala Ịtali nyere Khattab Knight Grand Cross nke Italian Republic
N'afọ 2008, Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Mba US nyere ya onyinye International Women of Courage Award
N'afọ 2007, e nyere ya Commander of the Order of Merit nke Italian Republic
Pierre Mustapha 'Mouss' Diouf (28 Ọktoba 1964 7 Julaị 2012) bụ onye France-Senegalese na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ọchị na onye na-atọ ọchị
A mụrụ ya na Dakar, a maara Diouf maka ọrụ ya na The Beast (La bête) na ihe nkiri Baba na Asterix & Obelix Mission Cleopatra
Ọ nwụrụ na 7 Julaị 2012 site na nsogbu nke ọrịa mkpọnwụ ahụ
Moussa (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụgharị Mousa) bụ aha enyere na aha nna
Ọ bụ mkpoputa nke aha Arabik Mūsā (Arabic موسی, 'Moses')
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Moussa Kanfideni bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ n'afọ ndị 1970 na 1980
Otu onye ọkpọ egwuregwu, Kanfideni nọ mgbe ọ bụla na mkpọsa ntozu Iko Mbaụwa nke Niger nke 1978 na 1982, na asọmpi nke ikpeazụ bụ asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa kacha ama ama na Niger ruo taa
Ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu Niger n'afọ ndị 1980

Ouwo Moussa Maâzou(amụrụ ya n'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1988) nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Moussa Maôzou, bụ onye Nijeria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba n'ihu na klọb ndị France FC Bassin Piennois
Maazou malitere ọrụ ya dị elu dị ka onye egwuregwu na klọb ndị agha Niger, ASFAN nke Niamey
N'afọ 2005, 2006 Maazou gbara goolu iri na asaa
N'afọ 2006 na ASFAN, ọ gbara goolu iri abụọ na egwuregwu iri atọ na anọ
Na Jenụwarị 2008, akụkụ Belgian Sporting Lokeren bịanyere aka na ya
Ọ gbara ọkpụ isii n'ime egwuregwu itoolu mbụ ya
Na 3 January 2009 Maâzou bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta na CSKA Moscow
Klọb ahụ kwụrụ Sporting Lokeren €48m maka Maâzou
Enyere ya ego ozugbo na Lokeren ruo 1 Julaị 2009
Mgbe CSKA ruru eru maka agba nke iri na isii nke UEFA Cup 2008[[09, a kpọrọ ya site na mgbazinye ego ma na 12 Machị 2009 edebanye aha ya dị ka onye egwuregwu CSKA
Na Jenụwarị 2010 Maâzou hapụrụ Russia, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ọnwa isii, yana nhọrọ maka ịkwaga na-adịgide adịgide mgbe mgbazinye ego ya kwụsịrị, na AS Monaco
N'afọ sochirinụ, Maâzou sonyeere FC Girondins de Bordeaux na mgbazinye otu afọ, ọzọ na nhọrọ ịzụta
Na ngwụcha Jenụwarị 2011 Maâzou laghachiri na AS Monaco na ọnwa isii ọzọ, mana mgbe naanị otu egwuregwu merụrụ ikpere ya n'ọzụzụ ma chọọ ịwa ahụ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012, Maâzou bịanyere aka na Le Mans na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ọnwa isii, tupu ọ kwaga n'akụkụ Tunisia bụ Étoile du Sahel na nkwekọ afọ atọ n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2012
Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị nkwekọrịta ya na otu egwuregwu Tunisia bụ Étoile du Sahel, Maâzou bịnyere aka na Vitória Guimarães na Portugal na July 2013
Ọ gbanwere na otu egwuregwu Portuguese ọzọ, Marítimo n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2014
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2015, n'oge ahụ, onye nke abụọ na-agba goolu n'elu ụgbọ elu Portuguese n'oge a na goolu itoolu, Maâzou gafere na Changchun Yatai nke China Super League
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2016, Maâzou kwagara n'akụkụ Danish Randers
N'ọnwa Julaị 2016, AC Ajaccio kwupụtara mbinye aka nke Maâzou na nkwekọrịta otu afọ, yana nhọrọ nke afọ ọzọ
Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, na 31 Ọgọst 2017, Maâzou bịayere aka na RC Lens na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, o kwetara na nkwekọrịta ya na RC Lens ga-akwụsị
Na 23 Septemba 2019 bịnyere aka na otu egwuregwu Israel Premier League Sektzia Ness Ziona
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015, Maâzou kwupụtara ezumike nká ya n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na isii, mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ihe nrite iri atọ ma gbaa goolu mba asaa
O kwuru na ọ chụpụrụ onye njikwa Gernot Rohr n'ọnwa Ọktoba gara aga dịka ihe kpatara mkpebi ya
Otú ọ dị, n'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ laghachiri n'òtù egwuregwu mba ahụ, wee nye goolu abụọ megide otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Somalia na mkpọsa maka asọmpi nke egwuregwu bọọlụ ụwa niile nke afọ 2018
Moussa Maaskri (Arabic) (a mụrụ n'abalị 15 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1962) bụ onye Algeria a mụrụ na France
Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 70 kemgbe afọ 1991
Moussa Narry (amụrụ Moses Narh na 19 Eprel 1986) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke gbara bọọlụ ikpeazụ dị ka onye na-agbachitere Riffa SC
A mụrụ ya na Maradi, Niger, Narry malitere ọrụ ya na Sahel SC tupu ọ banye na klọb Tunisia Étoile Sportive du Sahel na 2006
Mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị maka Étoile du Sahel, n'oge ọ meriri CAF Champions League na ndị otu ahụ, ọ bịanyere aka na AJ Auxerre na July 2008
Narry bụ nhọrọ ijuanya dị ka onye mba Ghana n'ihi na a na-eche mgbe niile na ọ bụ onye agbata obi Niger
Otú ọ dị, nyocha banyere ihe nketa ya kpughere na a mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Ghana

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2007, o mere egwuregwu nke mbụ ya na mba Ghana na mmeri 2–0 megide Togo na n'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2007, Ghana kpọrọ Narry dịka akụkụ nke ndị otu mmadụ iri anọ maka ogige ọzụzụ tupu 2008 Africa Cup of Nations Ọ so kwara gbaa bọọlụ na 2010 Africa Cup of Nations
Nanị egwuregwu ya bụ mmeri 3–1 nke obodo Ivory Coast meriri
Moussa Ouwo (amụrụ ya na Mee 29, 1976 na Niger) bụ onye na-agbachitere bọọlụ Nijeria
Ọ nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger
Moussa Yahaya (bu onye amụrụ na 4 Jenụwarị 1975) bụ onye Nigerien lara ezumike nká na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ nọchitere anya ndị otu mba Niger ugboro iri na isii
A mụrụ ya na Agadez, Yahaya malitere igwu egwu na JS du Ténéré

N'afọ 1995, ọ malitere njem na mba ofesi nke ga-adịru ihe karịrị afọ iri, nke mbụ ya na Sokół Tychy mgbe ahụ ya na Hutnik Kraków - ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ọrụ ya na Poland, na-achịkọta Ekstraklasa ngụkọta nke egwuregwu 77 na ihe mgbaru ọsọ 17 n'ime oge isii

Mgbe afọ abụọ na ọkara gasịrị na mmetụta dị iche na Albacete Balompié (ngalaba nke abụọ nke Spanish), na-agba ugboro iri na atọ site na egwuregwu asọmpi iri asaa na abụọ, na obere oge na Trikala FC nke Gris, Yahaya laghachiri Poland, na-anọchite anya GKS Katowice (2001, 2003–05) na Legia Warsaw (2001–02)
Site n'afọ 2005 gaa n'ihu, ọ gara n'ihu na mba nke ikpeazụ, mana na ọkwa amateur (nke anọ), ya na Rega-Merida Trzebiatów (otu oge) na Mazur Karczew
Yahaya bụkwa onye mba Niger zuru oke na 90s
Moustafa Amar (Arabic; a mụrụ na 22 Septemba 1966) bụ onye egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Ijipt
Abụ mbụ Amar bụ 'Wala Yabou Khad Gameel', nke e wepụtara na abọm
N'afọ 1990, o wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Wassaf

Ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nilly ('Papa Noel') rụkọtara ọrụ, n'afọ 1993 ọ wepụtara abọm ya nke atọ skeet el 3ash2een
N'afọ 1994, abọm Eftekerny

Moustapha Abdoulaye Hima (amụrụ ya na 1 Jenụwarị 1992) bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Nijeria
O sonyere Niger na Summer Olympics nke afọ 2012 dị ka onye na-agba ti ọkpọ (69 kilogram)
Abdoulaye Hima bụ onye na-eburu ọkọlọtọ Niger n'ememe mmeghe
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị, Abdoulaye Hima meriri Cameron Hammond nke Australia site na mkpebi 6-13 na agba nke iri atọ na abụọ

Moustapha Ngae A-Bissene (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 21 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Kamerun na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Sacachispas bọọlụ
A-Bissene malitere ọrụ ya na Cameroon na ngalaba dị ala, na-adọta mmasị site na mba ndị ọzọ ọ bụ ezie na mmerụ ahụ kwụsịrị ihe ọ bụla nwere ike ime
Ya na Huracán kwagara Argentina na 2017, na-agbaso nzọụkwụ nwanne ya nwoke
A-Bissene, site na ikpe Tigre, kwagara Sacachispas na 2018
O mere nke mbụ ya na 4 Febụwarị megide Defensores de Belgrano, na-abịa site na bench na Primera B Metropolitana iji dochie Lucas Fernández na mmeri 2-1
A nọchiri A-Bissene ugboro iri ọzọ n'afọ 2017–18 na 2018–19, tupu mmalite mbụ ya abịa na 24 Machị 2019 megide Talleres; ọ bụ ezie na a chụpụrụ ya mgbe nkeji iri ise na isii gasịrị
A-Bissene nyere goolu mbụ ya na 28 Septemba, ka o nyere goolu mmeri na mmeri nke Flandria
Nwanne A-Bissene, Arouna Dang Bissene, bụkwa onye egwuregwu bọọlụ

Otu ndí ntorobia na-ahú maka ihu eluigwe nke akpọrọ Youth Climate Movement (YouNGO) ma ọ bụ International Youth Climate Mouvement (IYCM) ndí mbu nóbi ha bú ijikó aka ónú ikwalite, ịkwado na ịkpọkọba ndị ntorobịa maka ọru nchekwa gburugburu n'ụzọ ziri ezi

Kemgbe ọgbakọ Rio Earth Summit n'afọ 1992, ndị ntorobịa n'onwe ha anọwo na-ekere òkè na mkparịta ụka mba ụwa dị iche maka ihe metụtara nsogbu dị iche iche nke gburugburu ebe obibi na nke a kpọrọ sustainable development

Site na-ịguzobe European Youth Forum n'afọ 1996, na otu ndị ntorobịa SustainUS n'afọ 2001, òtù ndị ntorobịa malitere iziga ndị nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa ka ha sonye na mkparịta ụka na mba ụwa dị iche iche, karịsịa site na United Nations

Ndị ntorobịa anọwo na-ekere òkè na United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change na site n' ụzọ ọgbara ọhụụ ha si esonye na ịtụ alo,ndị ntorobịa malitere ịchọpụta atụmaro nke ihu igwe UN dị ka nzukọ ọhụrụ iji mụbaa ụzọ ndị ntorobịaga esi tinye uchu

Site na ka ọnwa Nọvemba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ wee ruo ka ọnwa Disemba dị na mkpụrụ iteolu,n'afọ 2005, E mere nzukọ nke United Nations (UN) Climate Change Convention (COP 11 ma ọ bụ COP / MOP 1) naPalais des congrès de Montréal in Montreal, Quebec, Canada
Ndị nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa si mba ndị so na ya, gụnyere mba Amerika (site na SustainUS), Canada, na Australia, bịarakwara ịkwado ndị ntorobịa

N'ihi ya, e bu ụzọ gosipụta echiche nke International Youth Climate Movement, ọ bụ ezie na a na-akpọ ya na mbụ dị ka International Youth Delegation, na-ezo aka na ndị nnọchiteanya ntorobịa na mkparịta ụka ihu igwe mba ụwa
N'ịgbaso nke a na Septemba n'afọ 2006, a malitere nke akpọrọ Canadian Youth Climate Coalition, nke nwere òtù ndị ntorobịa 48 si n'ofe mba ahụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Australian Youth Climate Coalition sochiri nke a na Nọvemba, nke n'onwe ya bụ njikọ nke òtù ndị ntorobịa 27 si n'ofe Australia

N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2008, otu Indian Youth Climate Network sonyeere Global Youth Climate Movement ebe na June 2008, ndị nnọchi anya United Kingdom na World Wide Fund for Nature's Voyage for the Future, Emma Biermann na Casper ter Kuile, mepụtara UK Youth Climate Coalition (UKYCC), mgbe ha si Arctic lọta iji hụ mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, e guzobere njikọ aka na Africa, China, Japan, Pacific Islands na South Asia na otu nkwupụta ebumnuche ahụ dị ka International Youth Climate Movement
N'ụwa niile, e nwere òtù ndị ntorobịa guzobere ndị na ejikọ aka mee ihe dị mma na mgbanwe ihu igwe, dị ka ndị otu UK Youth Climate Coalition, nke otu ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi kpamkpam
Climate Coalition ma ọ bụ Climate Network ọ bụla nwere njikọ na mpaghara ma ọ bụ kọntinent

Ndị a gụnyere African Youth Initiative on Climate Change; Caribbean Youth Environmental Network; European Youth Climate Movement; Project Survival Pacific; Nordic Youth Climate Action Movement; North East Asia Youth Environmental network; South American Youth Climate Coalition na South Asia Youth Environment Network
N'ihi ya, òtù ndị a dị n'ógbè, nke mba na nke kọntinent na-agbakọta ọnụ iji guzobe International Youth Climate Movement
Otu a kpọrọ International Youth Climate Movement, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ okwu nche anwụ maka mmegharị nke ndị na-eto eto na-ewere ọnọdụ n'ụwa niile, bụ ndị otu ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo na-achịkwa

Ìgwè ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo a na-ahazi onwe ha n'ime ìgwè ọrụ dị iche iche ma mepụta akụkụ dị n'etiti nke mmegharị ahụ, nke 'Bottomlining Team' na-a haziri nke na-enyere aka ịhazi mbọ ha, ọkachasị na mkparịta ụka ihu igwe mba ụwa
A na-akwado otu a site site na onyinye sitere n'aka ndị otu ya, yana onyinye oge ụfọdụ sitere n'aka òtù dị ka UNICEF na gọọmentị Netherlands

Ndị otu mba nke Youth Climate Movement gụnyere AYLCF Climate Action Network (France);Australian Youth Climate Coalition; Canadian Youth Climate Coalition otu Arab Youth Climate Mouvement, otu China Youth Climate Action network; ECO Singapore; Energy Action Coalition (USA), nke onye ndu ha bu otu SustainUS ndị ozọ gụnyeree otu Project Survival Pacific, Ghana National Youth Climate Change; Hong Kong Climate Change; Indian Youth Climate Network; Japan Youth Ecology League; Malaysian Youth climate Justice Network, Nature and Youth Denmark; New Zealand Youth Delegation; Nigerian Youth Green Coalition on Climate Change; Russian Youth Climate Movement; Taiwan Youth Climate Coalition; Bangladesh Youth Movement for Climate (BYMC); Young Friends of the Earth; World Alliance of YMCAs; World Association of Girl Guides and Girl Scouts; World Organisation of the Scout Movement, Malaysia Youth Delegation (MYD) na UK Youth Climate Coalition

N'akụkụ mgbasa ozi nke ichụ nta mba nke ndị otu nọn'ụlọ ọ, dị ka nzukọ akpọrọ Power Shift, ndị ntorobịa nke mba ụwa na-emekwa mgbasa zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ha, nke otu ndị ọrụ na-achịkọta ha bụ ndị na-eto eto
E mere Nzukọ nke Ndị Ntorobịa (COY) mbụ na 2005, na Montreal, Canada, obere oge tupu Nzukọ nke Iri na Otu nke Ndị Otu
Ihe omume ahụ na-eme ka ndị nnọchiteanya ntorobịa gbakọta maka ịkekọrịta ihe onwunwe, ọzụzụ, netwọk na mkparịta ụka
Ọ bụkwa ohere maka ndị ntorobịa na-ahụ maka ihu igwe ịhazi ọrụ ha n'oge mkparịta ụka na afọ na-esote

Nzukọ nke ise nke ndị ntorobịa mere na Mahadum Copenhagen site na mkpụrụ ụbọchị anọ wee ruo na mkpụrụ ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa 4 na 6 Disemba n'afọ 2009 ebe a kọrọ na ihe karịrị ndị ntorobịa Narị asaa si otu narị mba gara
E mere nke isii na Universidad del Caribe na nkwadebe maka mkparịta ụka ihu igwe Cancun

Ihe omume ụbọchị abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ na-ewere ọnọdụ kwa afọ, a na-ahazi ya kwa afọ ka a na-eme ya obere oge tupu Nzukọ nke United Nations, ebe mba na-ezukọta iji nyochaa ọganihu nke mkparịta ụka ihu igwe
Kemgbe afọ 2005, njikọ ma ọ bụ netwọk ọ bụla dị n'ime Youth Climate Movement ezigawo ndị nnọchiteanya na United Nations Climate Change Conference (UNFCCC) iji nọchite anya ndị na-eto eto na mba ha
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2009, òtù ndị ntorobịa na-ekere òkè na mkparịta ụka mgbanwe ihu igwe nke United Nations tinyere akwụkwọ ka ha bụrụ mpaghara
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2009, ndị Secretariat nke mgbanwe ihu igwe kwadoro ngwa mkpesa ahụ, na-eme ka ndị ntorobịa bụrụ mpaghara nke asaa iji sonye na mkparịta ụka ihu igwe
Aha gọọmentị maka ndị ntorobịa sonyere na mkparịta ụka ihu igwe bụ 'YOUNGO'

Ebe ndị mbụ a họpụtara maka YOUNGO bụ Wilson Ang (Singapore), nke SustainUS kwadoro, na Lina Li (China), nke 350org kwadoro, nke na-anọchite anya International Youth Climate Movement na ikike gọọmentị (n'agbanyeghị ọnọdụ nwa oge ruo 2011)

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ndị a họpụtara na-anọchite anya International Youth Climate Movement bụ Lauren Nutter (USA), nke SustainUS kwadoro, na Jean Paul Brice Affana (Cameroon), nke Jeunes Volontaires pour l'Environnement kwadoro
Ha na-eso 2010-2011 Focal Points, Sébastien Duyck (France), nke Service Civil International na Rishikesh Ram Bhandary (Nepal) kwadoro, nke SustainUS kwadoro
N'ime afọ niile, enwere ohere ndị ọzọ maka ndị otu International Youth Climate Movement iji gbakọọ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na International Youth Summit on Energy and Climate Change na Beijing, China
N'afọ 2021, otu ọrụ ahụike dị n'òtù ahụ chọrọ ka ndị na-eto eto na-ahụ maka ihu igwe sonye na mgbake ọrịa COVID-19, ebe ọ bụ na ọrịa a nwere ike ijikọta ya na mgbanwe ihu igwe

N'afọ 2009,ndị otu UK Youth Climate Coalitionna ndị Youth Movement rụkọọ ọrụ, ọkachasị European Youth Climate Movement na SustainUS iji malite mgbasa ozi 'Olee afọ ole ka ị ga-adị na 2050?' na mkparịta ụka ihu igwe nke United Nations na-ewere ọnọdụ na Bonn, Germany
Okwu a ejirila ya mee ihe site na Youth Movement kemgbe ahụ ma bụrụkwa ihe a na-elekwasị anya maka International Youth 'Young and Future Generations Day' na Disemba 2009

Mgbasa ozi ahụ na-achọ imesi mkpa ọ dị ibelata ikuku carbon site na 80% site na 2050 na ọkwa 1990, dịka ndị na-eto eto ga-abụ ndị ga-eketa ụwa a na mkpebi ndị e mere taa ga-emetụta ndụ ha n'ime afọ 40

N'afọ 2022, otu ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị bipụtara akụkọ akpọrọ 'Stockholm+50 Unlocking a Better Future', nke nyochara mmetụta nke Nzukọ Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu na gburugburu mmadụ na 1972 ma nye aro maka ọdịnihu
Ozi dị mkpa bụ 'ịkọwapụta mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụmụ mmadụ na okike, nweta ọganihu na-adịgide adịgide maka mmadụ niile, ma tinye ego n'ọdịnihu ka mma'
Na mgbakwunye, ndị na-eme nchọpụta na-eto eto wepụtara akụkọ ndị ntorobịa nke akụkọ ahụ 'Ịkọwa ọhụụ ndị ntorobịa maka ọdịnihu ziri ezi na nke na-adịgide adịgide'
Ozi ndị bụ isi bụ 'Ọdịmma ahụike na ịdị n'otu obodo, ibi ndụ n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na okike, ịdị n'ịdị n'otu mba ụwa dị ka otu ezinụlọ zuru ụwa ọnụ, ụwa mgbe mmadụ niile hà nhata
' Youth Climate Movement (YOUNGO) na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị otu ya nyere aka mepụta akụkọ ahụ
Mowalola Ogunlesi (amuru Maachị 25, 1995) bu onye ejiji Naijiri na onye ọbụ abụ na-aru oru ma biri na London
A maara ya maka iji ụdị akwa dị iche iche dị ka akpụkpọ anụ na PVC rụọ ọrụ iji mepụta silhouette di-iche sitere na mkpali nke ndị ntorobịa Naijiria na London
A mụrụ Ogunlesi nye ndị na-emepụta ejiji Naijiria abụọ, nne ya bụ ọkachamara na uwe ụmụaka na nna ya na-arụ ọrụ n'uwe ejiji omenala Naijiria
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, Ogunlesi si Naijiria kwaga ụlọ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ n’ime ime obodo Surrey
Ogunlesi nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Ejiji na Central Saint Martins - Mahadum nke Arts London, na-agbapụta mkpokọta na Ngụsị Akwụkwọ Mgbasa Ozi na 2017
Ọ debanyere aha na mmemme Master of Arts na Central Saint Martins n'afọ ahụ mana ọ hapụrụ ya na afo 2018 iji nweta nnwere onwe okike karịa n'ọrụ ya
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Central Saint Martins, Ogunlesi tinyere akwụkwọ na mmemme nkuzi na nkwado Ejiji East
Mpụta mbu izu ya nke London 2019 mere na ogbo Ejiji East
Enyochara Ogunlesi na Septemba 2019 mgbe a hụrụ Naomi Campbell ka o yi uwe Mowalola nwere ihe ọnya ọnya
A kọwara uwe ahụ dị ka nkwupụta na ime ihe ike egbe, mana na Instagram Ogunlesi mere ka uwe ahụ doo anya iji gosipụta echiche nke ịbụ onye na-eje ije a na ele anya
Ogunlesi adọtala uche ndị na eme ihe egwuregwu dị ka Drake, Solange, Steve Lacy, Kelela na Kanye West

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, Elle kpọrọ Ogunlesi dị ka otu n'ime 'Ụmụ nwanyị iri Na-agbanwe Ọdịnihu Ị Kwesịrị Ịmara', ndị ọzọ bụ Tobi Kyeremateng, Ngozi Onwurah, Simi Lindgren, Balanda Atis, Magdalene Abraha, Koffee, Holly Fischer, Celeste na Margaret Busby
N'afọ 2019, o mepụtara uwe maka ngosi egwu Skepta's ' Pure Water ' ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị nrụpụta isii nke British Vogue bịakwutere ka ha mee ụdị bebi Barbie maka ncheta afọ 60 nke ika ahụ
N'ọnwa June, n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na isii, n'afọ 2020 ekwuputala mmekorita afọ iri nke Yeezy GAP, nke West họpụtara Mowalola ka ọ bụrụ Onye isi Nhazi
Ogunlesi wepụtara egwu otu aha ka Mowalola
N'afọ 2021, ọ wepụtara abụ abụọ, 'Truck' na 'Wawa'
E mechara gosi ya na 'Banana Clip' nke Namasenda guru nanị ya

Obodo a dị naanị kilomita ole na ole site na Seme Border na ndị bi na ya dị ihe dị ka 78,897

N'ọnwa Disemba, afọ 2013, a kọrọ na ndị uwe ojii Naijiria bibiri ụlọ 600 e wuru n'ihe dị ka hekta 65 nke ala

Moyo Okediji bụ onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya nwere ọtụtụ ihe oyiyi na ihe ngosi nke akụkụ miri emi nke ọdịbendị Yoruba
O so na Ona, otu ndị na-ese ihe na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
A mụrụ Okediji na Lagos n'afọ 1956; ezinụlọ ya si n'obodo Oyo, na Oyo steeti
Nne na nna ya kwagara Ile-Ife mgbe Okediji dị obere ma ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ ntorobịa ya n'obodo ochie ahụ
N'afọ 1977, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ihe gbasara eserese na Mahadum nke Ife, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka mgbe ọgụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke nka na mahadum
Okediji mechara nweta nzere masers na Mahadum Benin wee laghachi na Mahadum Ife dị ka onye nkuzi
Mgbe ọ nọ na Benin, usoro nke onye na-ese ihe na Guyanese bụ Doris Rodgers metụtara ya, onye gụnyere ihe ịchọ mma nke sitere na Afrịka na ọrụ ya
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ 1980 na mmalite afọ 1990, Okediji, ya na Kunle Filani na ndị ọzọ so n'òtù nka a na-akpọ Ona, òtù ahụ chọrọ ịkọwa okwu ndị Yoruba, ilu
Echiche na ọrụ nka ha gbanwere na eziokwu nke oge a nke Naijiria nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ
N'oge ahụ, ọ dekwara obere magazin a na-akpọ Kurio Africana
Ndị otu ahụ mere ihe ngosi mbụ ha na Machị 1989 na Mahadum nke Ibadan
Okedeji gara n'ihu inweta PhD na Mahadum Wisconsin n'afọ 1995
Ọ bụ onye nlekọta nke African na Oceanic Arts na Denver Art Museum site na 2003 ruo 2008
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ nke Mahadum Texas, Austin

Metica (ọtụtụ meticas) bụ ego a tụrụ aro maka obodo Mozambique
E kewara ya na centimos otu nari
E mepụtara mkpụrụ ego e dere n'afọ 1975 na akwụkwọ ego e dere na afo 1976
Otú ọ dị, etinyeghị ndị a na mgbasa ma escudo nọgidere na-agagharị ruo afo 1980, mgbe ewepụtara metical
[citation needed]
The metical (Àtụ IPAc-en; plural meticais) is the currency of Mozambique, abbreviated with the symbol MZN or MT
It is nominally divided into 100 centavos
The name metical comes from Arabic مثقال (mithqāl), a unit of weight and an alternative name for the gold dinar coin that was used throughout much of Africa until the 19th century
Metical (MZM) nọchiri anya escudo na par na 16 Juun n’afo 1980
E kewara ya na centavos otu nari
Metical nwere nnukwu ịrị elu

Mgbe a gbanwere ego nke Romanian leu na 1 Julaị n’afo 2005, metical ghọrọ ego kacha nta, na uru nke ihe dịka 24,500 meticais kwa USD, ruo mgbe dollar nke obodo Zimbabwe weghaara aha ahụ na ngwụcha Ọgọst n’afo 2005
Na Julai 1, n’afo 2006, Mozambique gbanwere aha metical na ọnụego nke otu puku otu
Koodu ISO 4217 ọhụrụ bụ
E webatara mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ na akwụkwọ ego ọhụrụ na Julai 1, n’afo 2006, oge mgbanwe nke enwere ike iji meticais ochie na nke ọhụrụ mee ihe ruo Disemba 31, n’afo 2006
N'oge ntụgharị ahụ, a na-eme ka ego ọhụrụ ahụ dị mkpirikpi dịka MTn, mana kemgbe ahụ, ọ laghachiri na MT
Bank of Mozambique gbapụtara meticais ochie maka afọ isii, ruo na Disemba 31, n’afo 2012
N'afọ 1980, e webatara mkpụrụ ego na 50 centavos, 1, 2+1⁄2, 5, 10 na 20 meticais
A na-eji aluminum emepụta centavos iri ise, 2+⁄2 na meticais ise, na otu metical na ọla na iri na meticais iri abuo na cupro-nickel
N'afọ 1986, ewepụtara aluminum otu, iri, iri abuo na iri ise meticais
Mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ e wepụtara na afo 1994 nwere 1, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 500 na 1000 meticais, na okpukpu anọ dị ala na ọla kọpa na okpukpu ndị dị elu na nickel
E webatara mkpụrụ ego 5,000 meticais na afo 1998, 10,000 meticais sochiri na afo 2003
Mozambique bu otu obodo no na Afrịka
