Mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi bụ omume iwu na-akwadoghị nke na-emerụ gburugburu ebe obibi ozugbo
Ihe omume iwu na-akwadoghị gụnyere gburugburu ebe obibi, anụ ọhịa, ihe ndị dị ndụ na ihe ndị sitere n'okike
Òtù mba ụwa dị ka, G7, Interpol, European Union, United Nations Environment Programme, United Nations Interregional Crime na Justice Research Institute, amatala mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi ndị a
Mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi mejupụtara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke mpụ ndị otu dị ka; ụlọ ọrụ, mmekorita, otu, ntụkwasị obi, ego ezumike nka, na enweghị uru
Ọ bụ mpụ nke anọ kachasị n'ụwa ma na-abawanye site na pasent ise ruo asaa kwa afọ
Mpụ ndị a bụ ụgwọ maka ikpe
Interpol na-akwado nkwado ndị uwe ojii mba ụwa ma na-enyere mba ndị otu ya aka na mmanye nke ọma nke iwu na nkwekọrịta gburugburu ebe obibi nke mba na nke mba ụwa
Interpol malitere ịlụso mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi ọgụ na 1992
Ndị omekome mba ụwa na ndị otu na-alụ ọgụ na-erite uru site na ịkwakọrọ akụ ndị sitere n'okike na uru ndị a na-akwadoghị na-arị elu
Iyi ọha egwu na ọbụna agha obodo bụ ihe si na mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi pụta

Dị ka UNEP na Interpol si kwuo, na June 2016 uru mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi dị pasent 26 karịa atụmatụ ndị gara aga, na US $ 91-258, ma e jiri ya tụnyere US $ 70-213 na 2014, na-agafe ahia ahia na obere ngwa agha
Enwere ike ịsị na ihe karịrị ọkara nke ego a bụ igbutu osisi na igbutu osisi na-akwadoghị
Na Septemba 2016 a mara ọkwa na Ụlọikpe Criminal International nke dị na Hague ga-ekpe gọọmentị na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu maka mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi

Dị ka Case Select Criteria nke ekwuputara na akwụkwọ amụma na nhọrọ ikpe na ụzọ nke ICC na 15 Septemba 2016, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-echebara echiche maka ịgba akwụkwọ mpụ Rome Statute na-eme site na, ma ọ bụ nke na-akpata, 'inter alia, the mbibi nke gburugburu ebe obibi, iji ihe ndị sitere n'okike eme ihe n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị ma ọ bụ ịchụpụ ala n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị'
N'ime European Union, ụzọ iji nweta mmanye mmanye nke iwu mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi bụ ihe ọ bụla ma ọ bụghị nke kwụ ọtọ
A na-arụ nnukwu ọrụ site na ntuziaka mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi, ngwa 2008 ezubere ichebe gburugburu ebe obibi site na iji iwu mpụ

N'agbanyeghị na ụfọdụ ọmụmụ na-egosi na enweela mbelata nke anaghị agbaso iwu gburugburu ebe obibi site n'aka ndị otu, ka ihe karịrị afọ iri site na mbipụta nke mbụ Ntuziaka, dị ka akụkụ nke European Green Deal, European Commission nyefere |atụmatụ maka Ntuziaka ọhụrụ na ebumnuche nke iwusi mmanye na ịgba akwụkwọ maka mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi siri ike site n'iji nkọwa doro anya na mmachi ndị ọzọ karịa nra na nga na-ahụkarị
Ebe agbahapụla ma ọ bụ obere eji eme ihe bụ ebe a na-ekpofu ihe na America - ọkachasị okporo ụzọ ụgbọ oloko
A na-eji ihe karịrị nde $10 kwa afọ wepụ mkpofu n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na obodo ndị na-emetọ ihe na gburugburu ebe obibi
Otu obere ụlọ ọrụ, CSXT Police Environment Crimes Unit, amalitela ịkwụsị ikpofu okporo ụzọ ụgbọ oloko kpọmkwem
Kemgbe e hiwere ụlọ ọrụ mmanye mpụ na Environmental Protection Agency na 1982, enweela mmụba na-aga n'ihu na mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi gbara akwụkwọ
Nke a gụnyere ikpe ndị ụlọ ọrụ tufuru ma ọ bụ kpatara mwụfu mmanụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị

Na ọkwa gọọmenti etiti, mgbe EPA na-ahụ maka nyocha, Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi nke United States na-ebute ikpe ndị ahụ, site na ngalaba mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi, na / ma ọ bụ site na otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ 94 US Attorney's Office gafee mba ahụ
N'ime nyocha ikpe 2004, enwere ike zụta cylinder 30-paụnd nke CFC-12 na China maka US $ 40 wee ree ya n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na US maka US $ 600
N'afọ 2000, a mara onye nrụpụta ụlọ na California Eric Diesel ikpe ịga mkpọrọ ọnwa 6 ma nye ya iwu ka ọ kwụọ ụgwọ $ 300,000 maka inye akara okporo ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na ugwu Santa Cruz
Ihe atụ nke Ecomafia bụ nchịkwa ihe mkpofu Naples ebe a na-atụfu ihe n'ụzọ iwu na'afọ ndị 1980
Na Naijiria, nguzobe ụlọ ọrụ gburugburu ebe obibi malitere na 1988 ka ihe omume nke ndị na-ere ahịa mkpofu mba ụwa na-atụfu ihe ndị na-egbu egbu na mba ahụ (ihe ọjọọ Koko mere)
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ dịka National Environmental Standards and Regulations Enforcement Agency (Nigeria) bụ ndị iwu Naijiria nyere ikike ịhazi mpaghara gburugburu ebe obibi

Ụlọ ọrụ a na-arụkọ ọrụ na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke gọọmentị dịka kọstọm, ndị uwe ojii, ọgụgụ isi ndị agha, wdg, ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na-ejide ngwaahịa anụ ọhịa ndị a na-ere n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị ma gbaa ọtụtụ mmadụ ikpe, gụnyere ndị na-abụghị ndị obodo
Dị ka ebe a na-ere ahịa, Singapore nwere ike ịnweta ihe mgbochi na-ahụghị ya
Charles W
Schmidt na-akọwa otú China si ere CFC-12 iwu na-akwadoghị na United States site na Singapore n'ihi enweghị nyocha na nzuzo nke azụmahịa nkeonwe na Singapore
Mmebi nke iwu nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi Russia na-efu mba ahụ ihe karịrị nde $187 na 2018

N'ime ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 239 puku mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi edebara aha na Russia na 2018, ihe ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ metụtara; igbutu ihe ubi n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, nke ruru ihe ruru puku ikpe 138, na ịchụ nta n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, ebe a hụrụ ihe karịrị puku ikpe 19
Mmetụta dị irè nke iwu gburugburu ebe obibi dị mkpa maka usoro nchebe ọ bụla e mere iji chebe gburugburu
N'oge mbụ nke iwu gburugburu ebe obibi, mmebi iwu na-ebu obere ụgwọ na ntaramahụhụ
Iwu na ụkpụrụ mbụ nke gburugburu ebe obibi nwere obere ma ọ bụ enweghị mmetụta na-egbochi ụlọ ọrụ, ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, maọ bụ gọọmentị iji mezuo iwu gburugburu ụlọ obibi
N'ezie, isi ihe kpatara ọdịda nke iwu nchedo gburugburu ebe obibi nke US bụ ọdịdị obodo nke ọrụ mmanye gọọmentị etiti
Isi ntaramahụhụ ha bụ ịkwụ ụgwọ, nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ weere dị ka ihe na-efu iji mee azụmahịa
Iwu mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi na-ekpuchi ala dị warara
Isi ya nwere ndokwa mpụ nke iwu gọọmentị etiti asatọ e mere n'afọ ndị 1970 ma gbanwee ya n'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga

N'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, ọkachasị ụlọ ọrụ hụrụ na ọ dị oke ọnụ ahịa ịga n'ihu na-emetọ karịa ka iwu nyere ma kwụọ naanị ụgwọ ndị mmekọ ọ bụla ma ọ bụrụ n'ezie achọtara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma mara ya ikpe maka imebi iwu ma ọ bụ ụkpụrụ gburugburu ebe obibi
Kevin Tomkins kwenyere na ụlọ ọrụ nwere nkụda mmụọ irube isi n'iwu ma ọ bụ ụkpụrụ gburugburu ebe obibi n'ihi na nrube isi welitere ụgwọ ọrụ ha

A kọwara nke a dị ka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-erube isi n'iwu gburugburu ebe obibi, ma ọ bụ n'echiche nke ọrụ iwu ma ọ bụ ọrụ ọha, enweghị isi ma tụfuo oke asọmpi wee taa ahụhụ n'ọma ahịa nye ndị asọmpi na-eleghara iwu na ụkpụrụ gburugburu ebe obibi anya

N'ihi na iwu gburugburu ebe obibi adịghị ike na ịga n'ihu n'echiche ọha na eze na-adịghị mma gbasara njikwa gburugburu ebe obibi, ọtụtụ gọọmentị guzobere usoro dị iche iche mmanye gburugburu ebe obibi nke na-abawanye ike nke iwu nke ndị nyocha gburugburu ebe obibi
Ntinye nke mmachi ndị omempụ, mmụba dị ukwuu na nra yana mkpọrọ nwere ike ịbụ ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ gbanwere ihu ndị mmanye iwu gburugburu ebe obibi

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'etiti 1983 na 1990 Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi na United States nwetara $57,358,40400 na ntaramahụhụ mpụ wee nweta ntaramahụhụ mkpọrọ maka 55% nke ndị a na-azara ọnụ nke e boro ebubo mmebi iwu gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gburugburu ebe obibi na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ibelata mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi na ichekwa gburugburu ebe obibi site na iwu na ụkpụrụ gburugburu ebe obibi
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị a na-arụ ọrụ na ọkwa dịgasị iche iche site na mba ụwa, mpaghara, mba, steeti ruo na mpaghara, na-eme ka otu ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ n'otu ọkwa
A na-eji usoro mmanye dị iche iche nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị a iji nye nkwado n'usoro iwu na ụkpụrụ gburugburu ebe obibi
N'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ mmanye na-eji ihe a na-akpọ 'Command and Control' bụ usoro usoro iwu ọdịnala
N'ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ, ha nwere ike iji mkpali akụ na ụba na ngwakọ dabere, nke nwere abụọ
Ọzọkwa, ọ mụbara mkpa nkwado n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ uwe ojii dị iche iche
Ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu gburugburu ebe obibi na ọrụ ndị uwe ojii anaghị arụ ọrụ na oghere; Ngwa ndị omebe iwu nke usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-arụ na-achịkwa ọrụ ha na ọrụ ha n'ime ọha mmadụ
Agbanyeghị, o doro anya na ọ bụ ngwa omebe iwu nke gọọmentị mebere na-ekpebi ọtụtụ atụmatụ ndị ọrụ uwe ojii na-eji na-echekwa gburugburu ebe obibi

N'ozuzu, a haziri ngwa omebe iwu mba ụwa, mpaghara, mba na steeti iji hụ na ụlọ ọrụ, ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, na gọọmentị na-agbaso ọrụ dị iche iche gburugburu ebe obibi agbakwunyere n'ụkpụrụ na iwu obodo
E nwekwara akwụkwọ iwu na nkwekọrịta mba ụwa nke na-emetụtakwa ụzọ ndị ọchịchị mba ụwa si eme ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi

Nkà mmụta mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi na-enyocha echiche nke mpịakọta, mmebi iwu na omume na'ụzọ na na - emerụ ahụ megide gburugburu ma malite inyocha ọrụ ọha mmadụ gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ, gọọmentị na obodo na ya na Criminology na-amalite ugbu a ịghọta mmetụta ụmụ mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi na otu ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu na ndị ikpe si emebi gburugburu ma nye ndị omempụ ntaramahụhụ
Mpụ gburugburu ebe obibi anaghị emetụta ala, mmiri, ikuku, ọ na-emetụta ahụike ụmụaka

Dị ka otu isiokwu e bipụtara na Environmental Health Perspectives na 2016, si kwuo, 'Ọganihu na mgbasawanye nke nchekwa ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi ụmụaka n'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga abụwo ihe dị ịrịba ama

Na US EPA, emeela mgbalị dị ukwuu iji dozie nsogbu pụrụ iche nke ụmụaka, ọrụ anyị na-aga n'ihu na nchegbu gburugburu ebe obibi na - iji hụ na gburugburu ụmụaka enweghị ihe ize ndụ ma kwado mmepe dị mma
Blọọgụ MP3 bụ ụdị blọgụ nke onye okike na-eme faịlụ egwu, na-adịkarị na usoro MP3, dị maka nbudata
A makwaara ha dị ka blọọgụ egwu, audioblogs ma ọ bụ soundblogs (abụọ nke ikpeazụ nwekwara ike ịpụta pọdkastị)
Blọọgụ MP3 na-aghọwanye ewu ewu kemgbe 2003
Egwu ndị a na-ebipụta sitere na ụkọ ndị siri ike ịchọta nke a na-enyebeghị n'ime ọtụtụ afọ gaa na onyinye ndị ọzọ nke oge a, na nhọrọ na-abụkarị nanị otu ụdị egwu ma ọ bụ isiokwu
Ụfọdụ blọọgụ egwu na-enye egwu na Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) ma ọ bụ usoro Ogg
N'ime blọọgụ MP3 ole na ole mbụ bụ Tonspion, Buzzgrinder, Fluxblog, Stereogum, Stardombase na Said the Gramophone
Tonspion bụ blọgụ MP3 mbụ na Germany wee malite na 1998 site na nyocha na nbudata nke ndị nka na akara mba ụwa nyere n'efu na webụ
Buzzgrinder malitere na 2001 ka ụzọ onye egwu SethW mejupụta oge n'okporo ụzọ
Stereogum malitere dị ka LiveJournal metụtara egwu na 2002, n'agbanyeghị na usoro ya lekwasịrị anya na asịrị indie/pop karịa MP3

Fluxblog (nke tọrọ ntọala na 2002) opi LCD Soundsystem's 'Yeah (Stupid Version)' na mmalite 2004 wetara nlebara anya na blọọgụ MP3, ebe Montreal dabeere na Said the Gramophone, nke tọrọ ntọala na 2003, so na weebụsaịtị mbụ dere banyere ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Arcade
Ọkụ, Wolf Parade na Tune-Yards
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ịrịba ama nke akara egwu indie, ụlọ ọrụ nkwado na narị narị ndị na-ese ihe na-eziga CD mgbasa ozi na blọọgụ MP3 mgbe niile na-atụ anya inweta mgbasa ozi n'efu
Nnukwu akara ndị nwere obere omume iji kwalite agbalịala iji blọọgụ MP3
Na 2004, Warner Bros
nyere ikike maka egwu site na omume ha The Secret Machines ka a ga-ezitere site na MP3 blog Music (N'ihi na Robots)
Nke a dọọrọ uche ọ bụghị naanị maka egwu na akara na-enye ikike, kamakwa n'ihi na ọtụtụ okwu na-eto egwu ahụ sitere na adreesị IP dị na netwọk Warner Bros

Mgbasa ozi nke blọọgụ MP3 mere gafere ahịrị site na ịntanetị gaa na TV na mbido 2005, mgbe egosipụtara Music (Maka Robots) n'oge mmemme MTV Total Request Live maka iweta Hysterics, otu egwu egwu Brooklyn nke nwere afọ 14 na 15
ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ochie, na netwọk anya
N'afọ 2006, Sirius Satellite Radio malitere ịgbasa 'redio blọọgụ', ihe ngosi na ọwa kọleji/Indie Rock Left of Center
Ihe ngosi ahụ na-ahapụ ndị na-ede blọgụ egwu na-ekwu maka ihe kachasị ọhụrụ na ọnọdụ indie-rock
Aggregators dị ka The Hype Machine na Music Blogtrotter track MP3 blọọgụ posts na-egosipụta kasị ọhụrụ emelitere na ibe ya
Ọrụ ndị a bụ iji nye foto nke ihe na-eme na ịde blọgụ egwu wee mee ka ọ dị mfe ịchọ site na MP3 ebisara nso nso a
Igwe Hype na-egosipụta ndepụta egwu kachasị ewu ewu nke ụbọchị atọ gara aga, yana ndị egwu blọgụ kachasị na ọchụchọ kachasị ewu ewu

Na June 2009, a na-agbanwe ndepụta egwu ndị a ma ama nke mere na akaụntụ onye ọrụ nke dị ọtụtụ ụbọchị na-emetụta ya, mgbe achọpụtara na “ntụgharị obi” maka ọtụtụ egwu na-abụ nke na-eku ume site na akaụntụ dummy, na-emepụtakarị na
batches na-eru narị otu narị
Elbows nwere ndepụta njirimara yiri nke Bands, Tracks, na Videos dị ugbu a 'ọkụ' Otú ọ dị Elbo nke nọ na kemgbe 2005 mechie na mbubreyo 2013
Music Blog Aggregators emewo ka a ọganihu na MP3 blog readership na accessibility
Ndị nchịkọta na-eji teknụzụ RSS na-anakọta data sitere na blọọgụ MP3 wee jikọta na blọọgụ onye ọ bụla kama ịnọ na MP3 ozugbo
Igwe Hype anaghị edepụta blọgụ nke ndị odee ma ọ bụ ndị ndezi na-etinye aka na ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Ọtụtụ blọọgụ MP3 biputere ihe nwebiisinka dịka nbudata efu
Ọ bụ ezie na nke a bụ iwu na-akwadoghị, ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ na-atụgharịkarị anya n'ihi nkwenye na blọọgụ bụ mgbasa ozi efu
Ndị otu dị ka Clap Your Hands Say Ee na The National akọpụtala mmụba na ahịa n'ihi nlebara anya sitere na blọọgụ MP3, nke na-enyekarị njikọ na nbudata ọba akwụkwọ iwu
Ndị na-ede blọgụ MP3 na-ebipụtakarị mkpesa na-ekwupụta na e bu n'obi faịlụ niile naanị maka nlele, na-ewepụkarị faịlụ ndị ezigara n'ime obere oge
Mkpa akụ na ụba nke blọọgụ MP3 dị ntakịrị ma e jiri ya tụnyere netwọk ndị ọgbọ na ndị ọgbọ
Na mgbakwunye na ịnye egwu n'efu, ọtụtụ blọọgụ MP3 na-ewu ewu amalitela akara ndekọ DIY nke ha, na-enyekarị ọrụ mgbasa ozi n'efu ma ọ bụ obere ego

Mpabwa Sarah Patience (amụrụ n'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ otu puku narị itoolu iri isii na isii) bụ onye nnọchi anya ndị agha nchekwa ndị Uganda (UPDF) na onye omeiwu na nke itoolu nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke UPDF na nke itoolu

Ndị omeiwu UPDF ndị ọzọ a họpụtara na Nzukọ nke itoolu gụnyere Edward Katumba Wamala, Elly Tumwine Tuhirirwe, David Sejusa, onye nwụrụ anwụ Robert Aronda Nyakairima, Charles Angina, Jim Oweyeigire, Julius Oketta Facki, Brigadier Phinehas Manoni Katirima, na Susan Lakot
Mpaghara ọchịchị Mgbago Ugwu N'ekpuchi gọọmenti ọchịchị ime obodo atọ bụ Akwanga, Eggon na Wamba
Akwanga bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ (ebe nchịkọta) nke mpaghara ọchịchị ugwu Nasarawa
Onye na -anọchite anya mpaghara ugbu a bụ Godiya Akwashiki nke otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị All Progressives Congress, APC
CECO Environmental bụ ụlọ ọrụ e guzobere n'afọ 1966 ma ugbu a ọ dị na Cincinnati, Ohio

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enye teknụzụ nchịkwa mmetọ ikuku, ngwaahịa na ọrụ màkà ụlọ ọrụ dị íchè íchè, gụnyere aerospace, brik, simenti, ígwè, obibi akwụkwọ, nri, foundries, utilities, woodworking, chemical processing, iko, ụgbọala, ethanol, ọgwụ na refining
Ka ọ dị ugbu a (201312) ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwèrè ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka iri na abụọ
CECO Environmental nwetara Met-Pro Corporation n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2013
Ngwaahịa CECO Environmental nwèrè akụkụ abụọ Injinised Systems na Industrial Process Solutions
Mpaghara Hot Stain bụ mpaghara nke ụwa ebe mmiri ọṅụṅụ dị mma gwuru agwu
Okwu a nwere ike ịbụ onye na-ahụ maka mmiri nke Goldman Environmental Prize bụ Michal Kravcik chepụtara
Enwere ike ịchọta ntụpọ ọkụ na kọntinent ọ bụla, ma e wezụga Antarctica
Isi ihe kpatara ntụpọ na-ekpo ọkụ na-etolite bụ nrụgide ndị mmadụ
Ka ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na-abawanye, mmiri na-achọ na-ababawanye
Ọ bụ ezie na mmiri kpuchiri ụwa dị pasent ịrị itoolu na aasaa, naanị otu pasent nke mmiri ahụ dị mma maka ọṅụṅụ
Hot Stain nwere ike imebi ikike ọrụ ugbo nke mpaghara ma nwee ike iduga ụkọ nri, ụnwụ nri, na ọbụna ịhapụ mpaghara ahụ
Maude Barlow onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, onye isi nke Council of Canadians, na onye guzobere Blue Planet Project ejirila okwu 'hot stain' mee ihe gbasara ihe onwunwe mmiri
N'afọ 2005, Maude Barlow natara onyinye Right Livelihood Award nke Sweden
Mpaghara 'Hot stains' bụ otu okwu e nyere ebe mmiri na-apụ n'anya
Mpaghara ndị a gụnyere Middle East, Northern China, Mexico, California na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mba iri abụọ na abụọ n'Africa
Taa, mba iri atọ na otu na ihe karịrị otu ijeri mmadụ enweghị mmiri dị ọcha
Nsogbu mmiri dị ọcha zuru ụwa ọnụ dị ka otu n'ime nnukwu egwu na ndụ nke mbara ala anyị dịka Maude Barlow na Tony Clarke si kwuo n'otu isiokwu dị na magazin The Nation
Kabwata bụ mpaghara nke National Assembly nke Zambia
Ọ gụnyere mpaghara Lusaka nke Kabwata, Libala na Chilenje na Lusaka District nke Lusaka Province
N'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2001, e mere ntuli aka elu mgbe a chụpụrụ onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa Godfrey Miyanda na Movement for Multi-Party Democracy (MMD) na ndị minista itoolu

MMD (onye gosipụtara Dominic Laban Nyirongo), United National Independence Party (onye gosiputara Kamoyo Mwale) na Forum for Democracy and Development (onye gosipputara Richard Kachingwe) meriri ntuli aka ahụ
Kachingwe meriri na ntuli aka ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ naanị onye omeiwu maka ọnwa ole na ole ka a na-eme ntuli aka n'ozuzu na 27 Disemba 2001

Mpaghara parafacial (PZ) bụ usoro ụbụrụ dị n'ime ụbụrụ n'ime medulla oblongata nke dị n'ala ahụ n'ebe nile na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site e kwenyere na ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka nhazi ụra na-adịghị ngwa ngwa (nke na-abụghị REM), ọkachasị maka ịkpata ụra na-egbu oge

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ GABAergic ndi mádu ziri ezi ntụziaka oriri nri ụmụaka sleep-promoting nuclei na ụbụrụ, nke gụnyekwara ventrolateral preoptic area nke hypothalamus, nucleus accumbens core (karịsịa, medial spiny neurons nke D2-type nke na-egosipụta adenosine A2A receptors), na GABAergical nucleus na hypothalamus n'akụkụ nke na-ewepụta melanin-concentrating hormone

Mpaghara parafacial na-akwalite ụra na-adịghị ngwa ngwa site na igbochi glutamatergic parabrachial ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge ochie ma ọ bụrụ nucleus (otu akụkụ nke usoro na-arịgo reticular activating nke na-eme ka ịmụrụ anya na mkpali) site na ntọhapụ nke neurotransmitter inhibitory GABA na neurons ndị ahụ
Optogenetic activation nke GABAergic PZ neurons na-akpali ọrụ cortical slow-wave na ụra slow-wave n'ime ụmụ anụmanụ
N'ihe gbasara mmebi nke GABAergic transmizzion site na PZ na ụmụ oke, a hụrụ ụmụ oke ka ha na-agafe oge dị ogologo, na-adịgide adịgide
A na-ekwere na PZ neurons na-ehi ụra, ebe ha na-egosipụta c-Fos mgbe ha na-ebili ma ọ bụghị mgbe ha tetara
Parafacial dị n'ime medulla oblongata, n'akụkụ na n'azụ na akwara ihu
Ọ na-ejikọta na akụkụ alpha nke parvocellular reticular formation (PCRt), nke a na-eche na ọ na-achịkwa ọnọdụ nke ịma ihe yana ịchịkwa ihe mgbaàmà na usoro ụra
Agbanyeghị, a kwenyere na ọrụ PZ na PCRt dị iche iche
Mpaghara parafacial na-enweta ntinye site na mpaghara atọ hypothalamus, midbrain, na pons na medulla

Site na hypothalamus, PZ na-enweta ntinye site na mpaghara hypothalamic, zona incerta, na parasubthalamic nucleus; ebe ọrụ zona incerta na parasubtalamic nucleu ka bụ ihe a na-amaghị ama, a tụpụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ ha iji dozie nhọrọ ọrụ na njikọta limbic-motor
Site na etiti ụbụrụ, PZ na-enweta ntinye site na substantia nigra, pars reticulata, na deep mesencephalic nucleus

A na-ekwere na usoro ụbụrụ ndị a na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmegharị ahụ, yana ụgwọ ọrụ na mmeghachi omume na-amaghị ama; na mgbakwunye, edere par reticulata karịsịa iji gosipụta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ neurons GABAergic inhibitory niile
Ma site na pons na medulla, PZ na-enweta ntinye site na etiti reticular nucleus na medial vestibular nucleus (parvocellular), ebe ndị a na-eche na ha na-etinye aka na iku ume na usoro iku ume
PZ neurons na-arụ ọrụ na medial parabrachial nucleus, a wake na-akwalite neuron cluster nke bụ akụkụ nke na-arịgo reticular activating system

Iri atọ na anọ dị iche iche nuclei na-ekerịta echiche siri ike na PZ GABAergic neurons, gụnyere nuclei dị iche iche nke stria terminalis, mpaghara hypothalamic n'akụkụ, substantia nigra, zona incerta, na etiti amygdaloid nucleus
Ntụle ndị a siri ike na-atụ aro njikwa nzaghachi na ikike ịchịkwa ọrụ ụfọdụ
Mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ya ( AR ; China di mfe) bụ ọkwa mbụ nke ngalaba nhazi ọkwa nke China

Dị ka ógbè ndị China, mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ya nwere ọchịchị ime obodo nke ya, mana n'okpuru iwu ndị China, mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ya nwere ikike imebe iwu, dị ka ikike ịhazi ụkpụrụ nke onwe na ụkpụrụ ndị ọzọ dị iche
Mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ya bụ ọkwa kachasị elu nke agbụrụ pere mpe bụ ndị nweere onwe ha na China, nke nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu karịa nke otu agbụrụ pere mpe
E guzobere mpaghara ime obodo Mongolia nke kwụụrụ onwe ya n'afọ 1947, Xinjiang mere nnwere onwe n'afọ 1955, Guangxi na Ningxia bụ ndị kwụụrụ onwe ha n'afọ 1958
Edebere Tibet n'okpuru nchịkwa PRC n'afo 1951, ya na ụfọdụ ndị nlele ọdịda anyanwụ kpọrọ nke a annexation, a kpọkwara ya mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ya nke China n'afọ 1965

Nhọpụta Guangxi na Ningxia dị ka mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ya Zhuang na Hui, n'otu n'otu nke obodo mpaghara Ndị Han China jụrụ n'iwe, bụ ndị mejupụtara ụzọ abụọ n'ụzọ atọ nke ndị bi na mpaghara ọ bụla Ọ bụ ezie na ndị Mongol mejupụtara pasenti pere mpe nke Ime Mongolia karịa abụọ n'ime ndị a, agha agha obodo China sotere nyere obere ohere maka ngagharị iwe

Mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ha na China enweghị ikike iwu ikewapụ, n'adịghị ka na Soviet Union - Iwu nke ndị mba nke China na nnwere onwe agbụrụ dị iche iche, nke edere n'afọ 1984, na-ekwu na 'mpaghara agbụrụ ọ bụla kwụụrụ onwe ya bụ akụkụ na-enweghị ike ikewapụ site na Mba nkeChina, 'na' ụdị o bula [] nkewa [] bụ nke amachibidoro kpam kpam
Rịba ama Na kọlụm 'Otu nke Kasị Ukwuu' bụ agbụrụ e nyere na brackets, n'aha mpaghara kwụụrụ onwe ya na ndị Han
A na-ekewa steeti ndị so na African Union (AU) na mpaghara ise nke African Union
Ndị obodo Afrịka, nke gụnyere ndị sitere na Africa bi na mpụga kọntinent Africa, dị ka America, Australia, Eshia na Europe, AU nabatara n'ọchịchị dịka mpaghara nke isii ya

N'ime Iwu Iwu nke African Union, n'okpuru isiokwu 3 (q) nke Iwu ahụ (Ebumnuche), a na-ekwu ihe ndị a gbasara ndị Afrịka bi na mba ọzọ 'na-akpọ ma na-agba ume ka ndị Afrịka sonye na ya dịka akụkụ dị mkpa nke kọntinent anyị, n'iwu African Union'

Na mgbakwunye, African Union na-enye nkọwa maka echiche ya banyere ndị si mba Africa dị ka ndị a 'Ndị mba Africa nwere ndị si n'Africa bi na mpụga kọntinent ahụ, n'agbanyeghị agbanyeghị nwa amaala na obodo ha na ndị dị njikere inye aka na mmepe nke obodo kọntinent na owuwu nke African Union
Na 2016, African Union jụrụ ịbụ onye otu na Haiti n'ihi nnabata onye otu, dị ka edemede 291 nke Usoro iwu nke African Union, na-ejedebe na 'African State' ọ bụla
N'ime akwụkwọ ntuziaka African Union (2021), e nyela ndị a họpụtara ka ha nọchite anya ndị Afrịka bi na Nzukọ nke African Union ọnọdụ nke onye na-ekiri
Karịsịa, African Union Handbook (2021) na-ekwu, sị
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2008, ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tụrụ aro ka e mesoo ndị Afrịka dị iche iche dị ka mpaghara nke isii nke Afrịka ma mee ka òkè ha na akụkụ na ọrụ AU sie ike (EXCL/Dec406 (XII))

Nzukọ ahụ amatala diaspora dị ka ihe dị mkpa na-enye aka na mmepe akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke kọntinent ahụ ma kpọọ ndị nnọchi anya ya dị ka ndị na-ekiri ya na nnọkọ Nzukọ (lee Nzukọ / AU / Res1 (XVIII) nke Jenụwarị 2012)
African Union guzobekwara ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara, dị ka Western Hemisphere African Diaspora Network, na ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa, dị ka Economic, Social and Cultural Council, iji kwado mmekọrịta ndị si mba Africa

Tụkwasị na nke a, African Union na AfricaRecruit, Caribbean Community na Common Market, Commonwealth Business Council, International Organization for Migration, na World Bank na-arụkọ ọrụ iji mee ka mmekọrịta ndị Afrịka dị mfe, na mpaghara na mba ụwa
Ọzọkwa, mba dị iche iche (dịka, Ghana, Ethiopia, Nigeria, South Africa) n'Africa emeela mgbalị mba iji mee ka mmekọrịta ndị Afrịka dịkwuo mfe, na mba ụwa
Mpata bụ elu (na-emekarị n'ala) nke e mepụtara n'etiti ikpere na úkwù nke onye nwere ụkwụ abụọ mgbe ọ nọ ọdụ ma ọ bụ dina ala
Ana-ahụ ụkwụ nne maobụ onye a hụrụ n'anya dịka ebe dị mma n'ụzọ anụ ahụ na nke uche maka nwatakịrị ịnọdụ ala

Na mba ụfọdụ ebe a na-eme emume Krismas, ọ bụ omenala maka ụmụaka ịnọdụ ala n'apata ụkwụ nke onye yi uwe fada krismas iji gwa fada krismas ihe ha chọrọ maka Krismas, ma were foto ha, mana a na-ajụ omume a ajụjụ na ụfọdụ n'ime mba ndị a, ebe ụdị mmekọrịta a n'etiti ụmụaka na ndị okenye na-amaghị na-akpali nchegbu

N'etiti ndị okenye, onye na-anọdụ ala n'apata ụkwụ nke onye ọzọ na-egosipụtakarị mmekọrịta chiri anya ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta ịhụnanya n'etiti ha abụọ; nke a bụ ihe na-eme n'ihe omume na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ na klọb ndị a maara dị ka ịgba egwu, ebe otu onye na-agbagharị n'apataapata ụkwụ nke ọzọ ma na-agbapụ ụkwụ ha n'ụzọ na-akpasu iwe
Mboakwara ana edosa na mpata ụdị ígwè ana-akpọ n'ọnọdụ ịnọdụ ala na ngwá ọrụ a na-etinye n'akụkụ n'ofe ikpere onye ọkpụkpọ
Ogwe aka nwere ike ịbụ ebe bara uru maka ịrụ ọrụ mgbe tebụl adịghị
A na-akpọ kọmputa laptọọpụ ahụ n'ihi na a hụrụ ya dị ka nke nwere ike iji mee ihe n'apata ụkwụ onye ọrụ

Mpekere 67 maka ụbọchị Nelson Mandela bụ òtù mba ụwa na-enweghị uru nke e guzobere na South Africa iji chetara onye isi ala mbụ a họpụtara site na ọchịchị onye kwuo na ndị ọzọ na ímé ihe uche ya nke South Africa, Nelson Mandela
A malitere ọrụ ebere ahụ na Disemba 2013 mgbe onye na-enyere Nelson Mandela aka, Zelda la Grange, mara Carolyn Steyn aka ịkpa blanket 67 iji kwado ụbọchị Mandela kwa afọ iji nye ndị nọ na mkpa

Òtù Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu kwupụtara na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site n'aka ụmụaka hụrụ n'anya nwụrụ anwụ na ụdị Ụbọchị Mandela bụ ụbọchị mbà n'ime anyị ụwa kwa afọ na 2009, iji sọpụrụ Nelson Mandela, nke a na-eme kwa afọ na 18th July, bụ ụbọchị ọmụmụ Nelson Mandela
N'afọ 2015, Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ Mgbazi nke South Africa wepụtara 67 Blankets maka Ụbọchị Nelson Mandela dị ka akụkụ nke mmemme mmezigharị ndị omempụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ South Africa
Kemgbe e guzobere ya, 67 Blankets for Nelson Mandela Day etinyela Guinness World Records atọ, ya bụ

Iji cheta 100 afọ kemgbe a mụrụ Nelson Mandela, 67 Blankets maka Nelson Mandela Day jikọtara aka na Zonderwater Maximum Correctional Centre na Cullinan, South Africa na South African Department of Correctional Services iji mepụta ma gosipụta onyinyo nke Nelson Mandela nke nwere ihe dị ka 4,000 blanket

Na mmekorita ya na Johannesburg International Mozart Festival, 67 Blankets maka Nelson Mandela Day gbalịrị imebi Guinness World Record maka ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'otu ebe n'otu oge, na Linder Auditorium na Johannesburg
Na 9 June 2021, 67 Blankets for Nelson Mandela Day kpughere Bokke Blanket ya e ji aka ya kụzie ma kụzie ya iji sọpụrụ ndị otu rugby mba, Springboks, bụ ndị meriri 2019 Rugby World Cup na Japan
Mpenza bụ aha nna sitere na Afrịka
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Mpho Osei Tutu (a mụrụ na 31 Disemba 1981), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa na-eme na France na onye na-ese olu nke sitere na Ghanaian-Mosotho
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri telivishọn Seriously Single, Mrs Right Guy na The Jakes Are Missing
Ewezuga ime nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye edemede, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe
Tutu gosipụtakwara dịka onye isi nke usoro South African n'afọ 2018 a na-akpọ The Imposter nke bụ ọhụụ nke abụọ nke nwa nwoke na-esote ọhụụ nke nwa agbọghọ mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Tebogo na Gary Mokoena
A mụrụ ya na 31 Disemba 1981 na Paris, France na nna Ghana na nne Mosotho
N'ihi na ọ bụ onye mba dị iche iche, ọ ebiela n'ọtụtụ mba Lesotho, France, England, Togo na Ghana
N'afọ 1992, ezinụlọ ya biri na South Africa
Ọ malitere ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
O mechara nweta nzere BA
(Hons) na Dramatic Art na Mahadum Wits
Ọ lụrụ Tumi Morake, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'eme ihe ọchị na onye edemede
Ha lụrụ na 28 Nọvemba afọ 2009
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ atọ
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ebe ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Zakes Mda's The Mother Of All Eating, Pieter-Dirk Uys' MacBeki, Paul Slabolepsky's For Your Ears Only, The Island
Ya na nke ikpeazụ, ọ gara UK, US na Gris
Mgbe ahụ o mere Getting it On nke meriri Best Overall Short Cut Award na Multi Choice VUKA! Onyinye n'afọ 2006
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ihe odide na Convincing Carlos nke o dere n'onwe ya ebe ọ natara onyinye Standard Bank Ovation Award n'afọ 2010
Maka ọrụ 'La Fleche' na egwuregwu Sylvaine Strike The Miser ọ meriri Best Play na 2013 Naledi Theatre Awards
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ sonyeere telivishọn, na-eme ihe nkiri na ọtụtụ sitcoms Kota Life Crisis, High Rollers, Samsokolo; nke a họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme egwuregwu kacha mma na TV Comedy na 2014 SAFTAs
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara dịka 'Desmond' na International Emmy Nominated serial Home Affairs
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gosipụtara ọrụ 'Bomba' na ihe nkiri a ma ama na mba ụwa A Million Colors
A họpụtakwara ya maka onye na-akwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri n'afọ 2013 SAFTAs maka ihe nkiri a
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ese olu a ma ama ebe ọ sụgharịrị olu ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ redio

Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye na-ede ihe nkiri maka usoro telivishọn Ses Top La, Tempy Pushas, My Perfect Family ebe ọ họpụtara maka Best Writing in a TV Comedy na 2014 SAFTAs, yana Rhythm City nke meriri ihe nrite maka Best Writer in a TV Soap na SAFTAs na 2009, N'afọ 2010, o dere Hopeville ma họpụta ya maka International Emmy Award n'afọ 2010
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ pụtakwara dị ka onye nduzi na ihe nkiri Zone 14, Ga Re Dumele 4 na Kota Life Crisis
O mechara soro mepụta ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Joburg nke a họpụtara maka Sundance Film Festival n'afọ 2010
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri, 'What Not Entertainment' ma mesịa mepụta 2 Seasons nke sitcom Kota Life Crisis maka Mzansi Magic
Site n'afọ 2012 ruo 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na bọọdụ nke The South African Guild of Actors (SAGA)
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ bụ onye nhazi nke Repertory Amateur Players Society (RAPS) One Act Plays Festival, nke a na-ewere dị ka mmemme ihe nkiri kachasị ogologo na nke kachasị ewu ewu na South Africa
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị gbasara mmekọahụ Seriously Single nke Katleho Ramaphakela na Rethabile Ramaphakella duziri
A tọhapụrụ ya na July 31, 2020 na Netflix

Mpiima Dorothy Christine (amụrụ na 22 Julaị 1959) bụ onye omeiwu Ugandan nke jere ozi na omeiwu nke itoolu nke Uganda Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Resistance Movement nke Buikwe District
Na omeiwu nke itoolu, ọ bụ onye omeiwu maka Buikwe District
Christine Kasule Mugerwa tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa megide Mpiima Dorothy na-ajụ iru eru agụmakwụkwọ ya na maka ịgha ụgha n'oge mkpọsa ya na iri ngo maka ndị na-atụ vootu
Mgbe Kasule gosipụtaraghị ugboro atọ, onye bụbu onye isi ikpe, Justice Monica Mugenyi jụrụ akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ
Otú ọ dị, ụlọ ikpe dị elu na Jinja mechara weghachite mkpesa ahụ a jụrụ
N'afọ 2016, Judith Babirye tụfuru oche ya na Nzukọ nke iri
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi nwere diplọma tupu ọ banye na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu
Christine so na ndị a họpụtara National Resistance Movement Candidates na 2020 Primaries on the Electoral Commission wepụtara ndepụta

Mpumi bụ aha South Africa nyere
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Nompumelelo Thembekile Madisa (amụrụ 1980), nke a maara dị ka Mpumi Madisa, bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego South Africa

Na 8 Maachị 2019, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Bidvest Group, ọ bụkwa nwanyị ojii mbụ na nwanyị Africa ka ahọpụtara onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ so n'ụlọ ọrụ iri anọ dị elu Johannesburg Stock Exchange, nke a hụrụ dika ọ na-egosi ọganihu na mgbanwe ọhụụ gbasara nwoke na nwanyị n'azụmahịa na South Africa
A mụrụ Madisa na Mohlakeng, n'ọdịda anyanwụ Gauteng na South Africa
O tolitere na Sebokeng nke dị na ndịda Johannesburg
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụnne anọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Sancta Maria Junior High na Mondeor High School n'otu n'otu
Ọ gara n'ihu na Mahadum Wits ebe ọ gbanwere ihe ọ na-agu site na nkuzi sayensị gaa na mgbakọ na mwepụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ na akụnụba
Ugbu a o nwetara nzere bachelọ na Economics na Mathematics, nzere BComm na Economics na nzere masta na Finance and Investment, ha niile sitere na Mahadum Wits
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Hollard Insurance were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye inyeaka ịzụ ahịa ọzụzụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n’ebe ahụ ọnwa iri na asatọ wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Prestige, bụ́ ụlọ ọrụ Bidvest nke na-ahụ maka nhicha
Na Prestige, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye njikwa mmekọrịta ndị ahịa, ọnọdụ e mepụtara maka ya na mmalite nke usoro ọrụ
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, ọ hapụrụ Prestige ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ ọha na eze ebe ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa mgbanwe na ngalaba Gauteng nke ọrụ ugbo na mmepe ime obodo
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Prestige, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi ihe gbasara ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ngalaba anọ na onye isi ahịa
Ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, a kwalitere ya ịrụ ọrụ na ọkwa otu ma họpụta ya na bọọdụ Bidvest
Na 8 Maachị 2019, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara Chief Executive Officer nke Bidvest Group, ọkwá ọ ga-ewere nke ọma na Julaị 2020
Madisa lụrụ di ma mụta otu nwa
Mpudi Decca bụ onye Congo na-edekọ egwu na onye na-akpọ egwu na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
Ọ bụbu onye otu egwu Congo TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo afọ 1980s
Mpur bụ asụsụ a na-amaghị aha ya na nke a na-ejighị n'aka nke a na'obodo Tuluwe na njikọ nke Black na White Voltas, na Kusawgu Division
Ọ dị nso n'asụsụ Mpra nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke a na' asụ na'obodo nta Butie dị nso, nke nwere ike ịghọ asụsụ dịpụrụ adịpụ, ọ bụ ezie na ndị Mpra si n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ

Mongezi Thomas Stuurman (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1995 - ruo abali itoolu nke onwa ọgọstụ afọ 2021), nke a maara dị ka Mpura, bụ onye na-eti egwu rap na South Africa, onye na-emepụta ejiji na onye na-eme ihe ndekọ nke a maara nke ọma maka egwu ya 'Umsebenzi Wethu'
A mụrụ Mpura ma zụlite ya na Soweto, Gauteng
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Highlands North Boys High School
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, ọ na-etinye aka na ejiji ma guzobe ụlọ mmepụta ejiji ọ kpọrọ Mpura Designs, ụdị akara ejiji ma nwoke ma nwanyị
N'afọ 2018, o mere ngosi ejiji nke mbụ ya na izu ngosi ejiji nke South African Fashion , na-egosi nchịkọta ya nke Autumn / Winter 2019
N'abali iri na otu nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2020, eweputara ya na Busta 929 nke gosipụtara Lady Du, Reece Madlisa, Maazị JazziQ na Zuma otu Umsebenzi Wethu
Egwú ahụ ruru nọmba otu n'ime chaatị iTunes ma bụrụ platinum
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, Mpura nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala n'ụzọ ọ na-aga ime ihe omume na North West, n'akụkụ Killer Kau
Maazị Del (onye amụrụ Delmar H
Lawrence III; June 10, 1978) bụ ónyé America Christian rapper na onye na-emepụta egwu
Ọ bụ ónyé isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ ihe n'onwe ya Dedicated Music Group (DMG) / Universal Records
Ọ natara nhọpụta Grammy màkà Best Rock Gospel Album nke afọ na nhọpụta 2010 GMA Dove Award màkà Rap / Hip Hop Album nke afọ
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, The Future (EMI Gospel), n'afọ 2005 wee malite na No
15 na Billboard Gospel Chart
Hope Dealer, e wepụtara na 2007 wee ruo n'ọkwa nke 47 na Billboard Gospel Chart ma gosipụta onye egwu jazz America bụ Kirk Whalum
Thrilla (DMG / Universal Records), e wepụtara na 2009 ma malite na No
2 na Christian R&B / Hip Hop Chart
A mụrụ Maazị Del Delmar Lawrence na Memphis, TN
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya na-edekọ egwu ya na otu egwu rap Three 6 Mafia
Mgbè o nyechara ndụ ya nye Kraịst n'afọ 2000, ọ hapụrụ ụdị rap nke ụwa iji malite ozi nke ya na ákàrà ndekọ
Àtụ Infobox film

Maazị Funnybone bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị na Hong Kong nke 1976 nke Kuei Chih-Hung duziri dabere na manhua, Old Master Q, nke Alfonso Wong, onye sokwa dee edemede eji mebe ya bu ihe nkiri ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ, yana Wang Sha dị ka onye isi
Àtụ Kuei Chih-Hung
John Ikechukwu Okafor, (amụrụ 17 Ọktoba 1961) nke a maara dị ka Mr
Ibu, bụ onye omere na onye na-akpa ọchị na Naijiria
A na-ahụta Okafor dị ka otu n'ime ndị ama ama na onye ma ọrụ ọrụ ná Naịjirịa a kacha akwụ ụgwọ
A na-ejikarị ihe nzuzu mara omume ya na-atọ ọchị site na nzuzu, adịghị ike ma na na-atọ ọchị na nkwụsị dị nkọ site na eziokwu
Ọ si Nkanu West LG, Enugu State
Mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị gasịrị, na 1974, Okafor kwagara Sapele ka ya na nwanne ya nwoke nọrọ, mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị
Na Sapele, ọ rụrụ ọrụ áká ka o wee nwee ike ịkwado onwe ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma kwado ezinụlọ ya
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na- edozi ntutu isi, na-etinye aka na foto ma rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe aji etinye mmanya
Mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gasịrị, a nabatara ya na College nke Education, Yola, mana ọ kwụsịrị n'ihi nsogbu ego
O mechara debanye aha na Institute of Management and Technology (IMT) ozugbo ọ nwetere ego
O meela ihe karịrị 200 ihe nkiri NollyWood gụnyere MrIbu (2004), Mr
Ibu na His Son, Coffin Producers, Husband Suppliers, International Players, MrIbu in London (2004), Police Recruit (2003), 9 wives
(2005), Ibu in Prison (2006) na Keziah (2007)
Ibu na IMDb

Gregory Warmack, ónyé a maara nke ọma dị ka Maazị Imagination (n'ubochí irí atọ n'ọnwa Machị, 1948 na Maywood, Illinois rụo ụbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Mée, 2012 na Atlanta, Georgia) bụ onye America na-ese ihe n'èzí
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụdị dịgasị iche iche ma ọrụ ya na-ejikarị sandstone na bottlecaps na ihe ndị ọzọ a rụgharịrị arụgharị
Nwá nke atọ n'ezinụlọ nke mmadụ itoolu, Warmack tolitere na mpaghara Chicago ma enweghị ọzụzụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe, ọ bụ ezie na ọ malitere ime ihe nka n'oge ọ bụ nwata
N'afọ ndị 1970 ọ na-eme ma na-ere ihe osise n'okporo ámá
Mgbè ọ nọ na Chicago n'afọ 1978, a gbagburu ya n'afọ n'oge a na-apụnara ya ihe ma daa n'ọnọdụ coma
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ, o nwere ọhụụ ime mmụọ nke ọ kọwara dị ka 'nke udo, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na m na-eme njem n'akụkọ ihe méré eme ma na-ele ányà na mmepeanya ógè ochie'
Ihe omume ahụ kpaliri Warmack ka ọ gbanwee uche ya na nka ma gbasaa ọrụ ya, na obéré oge ka ọ malitere iji aha Maazị Imagination

E gosipụtara ọrụ Maazị Imagination na ihe ngosi na United States, n'ebe ndị dị ka Dallas Museum of Art, African American Museum na Dallas, Halsey Gallery na College of Charleston na Charleston, South Carolina, William Benton Museum of Art na Mahadum Connecticut, na Society for Contemporary Craft na Pittsburgh
E gosipụtakwara ya na mbà ụwa, gụnyere na Venice na Paris
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị o dèrè bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta nke Smithsonian American Art Museum, a na-egosikwa ya na American Visionary Art Museum, American Folk Art Museum, na High Museum of Art
E nyere ya ọrụ ime nsụgharị nke karama Coca-Cola dị mita iri na otu màkà 1996 Olympics na Atlanta, dinosaur nwèrè mpi na ngalaba DinoLand USA
nke ogige ntụrụndụ Disney's Animal Kingdom, yana oghere ịchọ mma maka ebe House of Blues na Orlando, Las Vegas, na Chicago
N'etiti ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ dị mkpa bụ ntinye ubi na National Botanical Gardens, otu ụwa na Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, na ngosipụta mgbidi màkà ụlọ njem na Winston-Salem, North Carolina
Absolut Vodka nyere iwu ka a sụgharịa karama ha n'ụdị ya
N'afọ 2009, e nyèrè Maazị Imagination ọrụ ịchọ ndị ọrụ ugbo ọbọdọ na Salina, Kansas mma, mana kansụl ọbọdọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ahụ n'etiti mmezu ma wepụ mpụga ndị a rụchara na jackhammers
Jeffrey Haynes (amụrụ na Disemba 28, 1977), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Maazị Lif, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu si Boston, Massachusetts
Mgbe a na-eto ya n'ihi okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, ọ wepụtara abọm studio abụọ na Definitive Jux na otu na Bloodbot Tactical Enterprises
Maazị Lif bụkwa ónyé otu hip hop The Perceptionists na ndị enyi na ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ ogologo ógè Akrobatik na DJ Fakts One
Haynes tolitere na mpaghara Brighton, Boston, Massachusetts
Mgbè ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye Dedham Noble and Greenough School, ọ gàrà Mahadum Colgate ruo afọ abụọ, o mechara hapụ ya
Ọ ghọrọ Onye na-eme ihe nkírí na 1994
Ezinụlọ nna Maazị Lif bụ Bajan
Haynes nakweere aha egwu 'Mr
Lif' mgbè ọ ṅụsịrị mushrooms psilocybin n'èzí Phish concert n'oge afọ mbụ ya na Mahadum Colgate na 1994
O chepụtara ónyé akụkọ ifo a na-akpọ The Liftedly Man mgbè ọ nọ n'okpuru mmetụta, nke méré ka 'Mr
Lif' pụta
O mechara kwuo n'ajụjụ ọnụ maka Times Colonist 'Amaghị m egwu Phish ọ bụla
Agara m na ihe ngosi ahụ, amabeghịkwa ihe ọ bụla gbasara ha ugbu a

N'ịbụ ndị MC ndị a ma ama dị ka Chuck D, KRS-One, na Rakim metụtara, Maazị Lif malitere ịtọhapụ egwu egwu na ngwụcha '90s, mgbè egwu rap na gangsta rap bụ ụdị kachasị màkà egwu hip hop, mana atụmatụ okwu nke Maazị lif bụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Maazị Lif wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, Elektro, na 1998, na-adọta uche nke akara Grand Royal na Definitive Jux
Na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ónyé na-emepụta ihe na onye isi akara Definitive Jux bụ El-P, Lif wepụtara usoro egwu na EP ndị a ma ama, malite na Enters the Colossus na 2000
N'afọ 2000 na 2001, ọ meriri Boston Music Award màkà Outstanding Rap/Hip Hop Act
Njem mere ka ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike maka afọ na-esote, mana ọ ka chọtara oge iji wepụta egwu Cro-Magnon na CD dị ndụ
Egwú ya 'Pull Out Your Cut' gosipụtara na soundtrack nke ESPN Video Game ESPN NFL 2K5
Peter Okoye (amụrụ na 18 Nọvemba 1981), onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Mr P, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'afọ 2000 dị ka onye otu P-Square duo ya na ejima ya nwoke Rudeboy ma n'afọ 2021 e nyere ya akara ugo mmụta Doctorate na Mahadum ESCAE dị na Benin Republic
Maazị P na ejima ya Rudeboy tolitere n'otu nnukwu ezinụlọ, na Jos na Plauteau Steeti, Naịjirịa
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Josephine Okoye na Mazi Moses Okoye
Peter na nwanne ya nwoke Paul sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu na ihe nkiri, ebe ha malitere ịgba egwu, ịbụ abụ ma na-eme egwu nke onye na-ese ihe a ma ama dị ka MC Hammer, Bobby Brown na Michael Jackson
N'afọ 2017, a gbahapụrụ P-Square ma ndị otu egwu abụọ ahụ kewara
Mr P bu ụzọ wepụta egwu ya akpọrọ 'For My Head', 'Cool It Down' n'afọ 2017
N'afọ 2018, Maazị P na Nyanda nke Brick & Lace rụkọrọ ọrụ n'otu egwu akpọrọ 'Wokie Wokie'

[isi iyi dị N'afọ 2021, Maazị P hiwere akara ndekọ nke ya nke a na-akpọ PClassic Label, akara ahụ bịanyere aka na onye na-eme ihe ike na onye na-egwu egwu DJ Switch na 2021, o wepụtara abọm izizi iri na isii akpọrọ, The Prodigal nke gosipụtara Tiwa Savage, Simi, Teni, Wande Coal, Tamar Braxton, Singah, Mohombi, DJ Switch, na OvieKelz
N'afọ 2013, Peter Okoye na enyi ya nwanyị n'oge ahụ, Lola Omotayo nabatara nwa ha nwanyị Aliona n'ụlọ ọgwụ San Francisco na United States
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, ha abụọ lụrụ di na nwunye na Ark dị na Lekki, Lagos, Nigeria
Na June 16, 2016, e mere Maazị P onye nnọchi anya ụgbọala Kia
E mekwara Maazị P onye nnọchi anya maka mmiri ara ehi Olympic, nke Nutricima limited mepụtara
Peter hiwere ihe ngosi TV nke akpọrọ Dance with Peter nke Globacom Telecommunication Limited kwadoro
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, ekpughere ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya Adidas, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nke na-ahụ maka akpụkpọ ụkwụ, uwe na ngwa
' Mazi Rager ' bụ egwu edere ma dekọọ nke onye na-edekọ ihe nkiri Amerikan Kid Cudi, nke e si na album studio nke abụọ ya, Man on the Moon II The Legend of Mr
Rager (2010)
E weputara egwu a, nke Emile mere, ka ewepụtara ya dị ka nbudata dijitalụ na Ọktoba 25, 2010
Abinye David Jumbo nke amaara site aha ọgbọ bụ Mr 2Kay, bụ onye Naịjirịa na- agụ egwú na odee egwu
debanyere aha ya na Grafton Entertainment
ma ọ hapụrụ lebeelụ ahụ na 2018 ka ọ mepee nke ya 'Better Life Entertainment'
A mụrụ Mr 2Kay na Port Harcourt
Mgbe amụchara ya, ezinulo ya kwagara Bonny Island, Rivers Steeti ebe o toro
2Kay bụkwa ezigbo onye omenkà ebe ọ na-ese ihe osise ka ọ na-etolite
Mazị 2Kay malitere ọrụ egwu ya na Port Harcourt mana mbupụta ya na Port Harcourt bụ waterside boy mana bupụtaghị ya na mba ọzọ were ruo 2012 mgbe Mr 2Kay wepụtara Bubugaga nke bupụtara ya na mba ọzọ
Egwu mpụta mbụ Mr 2Kay 'Bubugaga' pụtara na 8 Ọktoba 2012
Vidio egwu ahụ bụ 'Bubugaga' bụ na London, UK ka etiri ya nke Nosa Igbinedion duziri n'okpuru Grafton Entertainment
Nke bụ otu egwu zuru mba
Emepụtara mpụta egwu mbụ Mr 2Kay bụ 'Waterside Boy' na 21 Ọgụstụ 2011 n'okpuru Grafton Entertainment
Nke bụ egwu ya wuru ewu na Port Harcourt

Na 25 Ọktọba 2017, ndị ohi anọ ji egbe zuru Mr 2Kay n' ime ụlọ nkwari akụ ya na 'Eko Hotels na Suites' na Victoria Island, Legọọsụ mgbe ọ gosipụtachara egwu ya na kọnsaatị 2Baba nke 'Buckwyld na Breathless Kọnsaatị, nke mere na etiti mgbakọ ụlọ nkwarị akụ nke Eko
Ndi ohi ahụ merụrụ 2Kay ahụ nke sitere na izu ohi ahụ, kee ya agbụ, aka, ụkwụ na ọnụ wee zukọcha ihe ndị dị oke ọnụ nke gụnyere, uwe, ọla, ekwentị, mmanụ na-esi isi, na ego

Otu izu ezuru ohi gachara Mr 2Kay wepụtara egwu ọhụụ'Pray for me' nke a haziri maka ị pụta na ngwụcha Nọvemba tinyere abọm ya na-abịanụ akwụsịrị n'ihi ihe mere na ya, lebeelụ ya Grafton Records nyere ọtụtụ oge maka ị wepụta abọm ya
Na 7 Nọvemba 2017, Mr 2Kay gbara akwụkwọ gbara ndị ụlọ ọrụ nkwali akụ Eko akwụkwọ nde nari ise maka ihe ahụ mere ya na Ọktọba
Ọ rụrụla n'ọtụtụ ihe mmemme na-ewu ewu ma, ọ rụrụ na mmemme dịka
Na Sọnde, 17 Juunu 2018, na Aztech Arcum Stadium Road Port Harcourt, Rivers Steeti Naịjirịa

Mr 2Kay wepụtara kọnsaatị abọm 'Elevated' gụnyere ndị egwu,ndị ozi redio/ ndị na-ahaịpụ & DJ Timaya, Duncan Mighty, Harrysong, Charles Okocha, DJ Jimmy Jatt, DJ Neptune, DJ Big N, DJ Kev, Joenell, Ayi, Real Prince, Idahams, Doray, Young GreyC, Squeeze Tarela, Legendary Sunny, Ajebo Hustlers, King Perryy, M Trill, Korkormikor, Olisa Adibua, Shope Shopsy na Alex nke Big Brother Naija (oge 3)
E rere ihe nkiri ahụ na ikike nke karịrị 2000 (puku abụọ), e rere tiketi n'ime ọnụma nke (₦ 2,000-500,000)
Mr Bigg's bụ otu n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nri ngwa ngwa nke Naijiria

N'ịbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ United African Company of Nigeria PLC nke Naijiria nwere, enwere ihe dị ka ebe otu narị na iri asaa ugbu a na Naijiria, gụnyere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ mbụ na-agafe na mba ahụ, yana ebe anọ ọzọ na Ghana
N'afọ 2013, Famous Brands, South Africa, zụtara pasent ịrị anọ na itoolu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
A maara ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ maka atụmatụ ya na-acha ọbara ọbara na edo edo na anụ
N'afọ 1973, a gbanwere aha ụlọ ahịa ndị a ka ọ bụrụ Kingsway Rendezvous, nke ghọrọ Mr Bigg's n'afọ 1986
Akara ahụ hụrụ mmụba ngwa ngwa mgbe ọ ghọsịrị otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria mbụ na-ere franchises nye ndị na-etinye ego
Oluwatosin Ajibade (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1991), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Mr Eazi, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke egwu Banku, ngwakọta nke ụda ọ kọwara dị ka ngwakọta nke Ghanaian highlife na Nigerian chord progressions na patterns
Maazị Eazi kwagara Kumasi, Ghana n'afọ 2008 wee debanye aha na KNUST, ebe ọ malitere ịdebanye ndị na-ese ihe iji mee ihe na nnọkọ kọleji
O gosipụtara mmasị na egwu mgbe ọ dekọsịrị amaokwu ndị ọbịa na 'My Life', abụ nke nwetara traction wee bụrụ ihe ndekọ a ma ama na KNUST
Maazị Eazi wepụtara mixtape mbụ ya About to Blow na July 2013
O nwetara ndị na-ege ntị na mba ụwa mgbe a tọhapụrụ egwu Efya nyere aka 'Skin Tight'
E wepụtara mixtape ya nke abụọ Life Is Eazi, Vol
1 - Accra To Lagos na 10 Febụwarị 2017
A mụrụ Maazị Eazi na Port Harcourt, isi obodo na obodo kachasị ukwuu na Rivers State, Nigeria
O tolitere n'ụlọ azụmahịa
Nne ya nwere obere azụmahịa na nna ya bụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu
Nne na nna nke ikpeazụ guzobere ọrụ ndụmọdụ ụgbọelu nke onwe ya
Mgbe ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Lagos, Maazị Eazi nwere obere oge na ukwe ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
N'oge a zụlitere ya, ọ na-ege ntị na ndekọ nna ya ga-egwuri egwu maka ezinụlọ mgbe ọ na-eri nri ụtụtụ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Maazị Eazi kwagara Ghana iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya, na-edebanye aha na mmemme injinia na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST)
Maazị Eazi malitere idekọ egwu n'oge ọ nọ na KNUST
O nyere aka n'olu ndị ọbịa na egwu 'My Life', abụ nke nwetara traction wee bụrụ ihe ndekọ a ma ama na KNUST
Tupu nke ahụ, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nnọkọ na nkwalite a na-akpọ Swagger Entertainment
O jiri ikpo okwu a dee ihe ngosi ma kwalite ihe omume na campus nke KNUST
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ, ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa wee mepee ikpo okwu e-azụmahịa ya
Maazị Eazi gwara akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian na ọ rụrụ ọrụ obere oge maka Schlumberger mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa
Ọ gwakwara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ a kpọtụrụ aha na azụmahịa ya gụnyere mbubata ihe ọṅụṅụ dị nro, Ngwuputa ọla edo, na nkesa nri
Ọ gwara Highsnobiety na ọ malitere ihe dị ka azụmahịa isii
N'afọ 2014, Maazị Eazi kwụsịrị ịbụ onye na-akwalite klọb mgbe onye na-ese ihe na-abịaghị maka nnọkọ kachasị ukwuu ọ nwara ime
Maazị Eazi wepụtara mixtape izizi ya nke egwu iri na atọ About to Blow na July 2013
O mepụtara egwu abụọ 'Pipi Dance' na 'Bankulize'
A tọhapụrụ nke mbụ n'etiti afọ 2012, ebe a tọhapụrụ nke ikpeazụ na 2013
Maazị Eazi dekọrọ mixtape ya na onye mmepụta Klu ma wepụta ya n'ime otu izu
Magazin Fader na-akọwa mixtape dị ka 'ndepụta egwu SoundCloud na-adabere na dancehall'
Tupu ewepụta mixtape ahụ, Maazị Eazi na ndị na-emepụta ihe dịka Magnom, Peeweezle, Nshona, Klumonsta, D'Tunes, na E-Kelly rụkọrọ ọrụ
Ọzọkwa, e gosipụtara ya na Stay Jay's 'Baby Lace' na Lousika's 'Knockout'
N'afọ 2014, Maazị Eazi kwagara Naịjirịa
Onye na-emepụta ihe na Ghana nke UK bụ Juls kpọtụrụ ya, onye nwetara ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndekọ ya
N'ihi enweghị ike ịchọta faịlụ ọdịyo nke ihe ndekọ ochie ya, mgbalị Maazị Eazi na-arụ ọrụ na Juls kwụsịrị ogologo oge
Maazị Eazi mechara weghachite faịlụ ọdịyo ya ma zigara ha Juls, bụ onye mere egwu ọhụrụ ma mepụta ihe osise maka egwu mixtape nke abụọ 'Bankulize'
Egwu a nwere olu sitere n'aka onye egwu hiplife nke Ghana bụ Pappy Kojo ma wepụta ya na Nọvemba 2014
Remix nke 'Bankulize' gosipụtara Burna Boy ma wepụta ya na Septemba 2016
Maazị Eazi gosipụtara remix ahụ na Ebro Darden's Beats 1 redio show otu ọnwa tupu mgbe ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015, Maazị Eazi wepụtara egwu egwu 'Skin Tight'
Ọ na-egosi olu ndị ọbịa sitere n'aka onye na-agụ egwu Ghana bụ Efya ma DJ Juls mepụtara ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na magazin Complex, Maazị Eazi kọwara egwu a dị ka 'fusion'
O kwuru na ọ na-asụ pidgin Ghana na nnyefe ahụ ma jiri abụ ndị Naijiria
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2016, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na Naijiria bụ Cobhams Asuquo wepụtara nsụgharị nke egwu ahụ
DJ Caise wepụtara remix ụlọ nke egwu ahụ na Septemba 2016, ebe Terry G na Mr Eazi rụkọrọ ọrụ iji wepụta remix nke egwu ahụ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2017, e gosipụtara 'Skin Tight' na mgbasa ozi maka ụdị vodka Ciroc
E gosipụtara Maazị Eazi na egwu Eugy nke afọ 2016 'Dance for Me'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Guardian tinyere egwu ahụ na ndepụta ya nke egwu iri kachasị egwu Afrịka nke afọ 2016
Vidio egwu nke 'Dance for Me' bụ nke Vertex na Gabriella Kingsely duziri

Robin Murray nke magazin Clash kọwara egwu a dị ka 'ekele ihe nketa Ghana ha' Na 17 June 2016, Maazị Eazi wepụtara 'Anointing' nke sitere na R&B, abụ nke gosipụtara olu rap site n'aka onye egwu Ghana bụ Sarkodie
Maazị Eazi buru ụzọ kwupụta atụmatụ maka egwu ahụ na Mee 2016
A maara Maazị Eazi maka ịsụ ụzọ egwu Banku, ụda 'nke a na-egosipụta site na ụda olu na ụda olu na-enye na Ghanaian Pidgin English'
Egwú Mr Eazi dabara n'ụdị Afrobeats, ụdị pop nke West Africa nke na-alụ pop zuru ụwa ọnụ, Dancehall, highlife, na hip-hop
A kọwara egwu Maazị Eazi dị ka nke nwere àgwà R&B nke na-echetara ndị na-ese ihe dịka Beres Hammond na Gregory Isaacs
Lawrence Burney si Noiseycom kwuru na Maazị Eazi na-eji olu ya miri emi 'nye àgwà ndị dị ka ballad na mmepụta ịgba egwu n'ihu'
A maara Maazị Eazi na Temi Otedola, nwa nwanyị nke onye Naijiria ijeri Femi Otedola na nwanne nwanyị DJ Cuppy
Na 10 Eprel 2022, Maazị Eazi kwere Temi Otedola nkwa ọlụlụ
Chukwuemeka Emmanuel Ejekwu (amuru Jenụwarị 30, 1995) nke a na-akpọ Mr Funny, bụ onye Naijiria na- akpa ọchị, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye okike ọdịnaya na onye mgbasa ozi
Amụrụ ya na Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria, Maazị Funny gụrụ akwụkwọ mbụ na Port Harcourt, Rivers steeti wee nweta nzere bachelọ na mmụta asụsụ na nzikọrịta ozi na Mahadum Port Harcourt
Maazị Funny chọpụtara nkà ihe Ikpa ọchi ya mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ na-eme ngwa ngwa n'iji ya
Ọ malitere ime ihe ọchị mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum
Nke a bụ n'afọ 2015 n'ime otu izu ụka otu ụmụ akwụkwọ
Mazị Funny kpebiri ịga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya site na-ebugote ihe nkiri dị iche iche na-atọ ọchị na aka mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ya, ọkachasị Instagram
A họpụtara ya na mbipụta nwa agbọghọ 2021 nke The Humor Awards Academy n'akụkụ Basketmouth onya ikpa ọchi ibe ya
Mazị Funny nwetara onyinye nturu ugo Creative Social Media na 2021 site na DENSA
Debo Adedayo (amuru Mey 3, 1993 ), mara aha ogbo ya Mr Macaroni, bu onye nto ochi, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na- eme ihe n'aru Naijiria
A maara ya nke ọma maka vidiyo ihe nkiri Instagram ya, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke nna shuga
A mụrụ Adedayo na Lagos
Ọ si Ogun State, Nigeria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Redeemer's University Nigeria na 2018 ebe ọ gụrụ nka ihe nkiri na ọmụmụ ihe nkiri
Adedayo malitere dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nollywood tupu o mepụta vidiyo na-atọ ọchị
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na okwuru na ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ogologo oge site n'ime ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri usoro
O kwuru na ọrụ ihe nkiri anaghị abịa n'oge ụfọdụ na o were obere oge tupu o kpebie ịmalite ihe nkiri ịntanetị
Ihe ọchị Mr Macaroni na-ekwu maka ihe omume na ezigbo okwu na Africa
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ mgbe niile dị ka nna shuga
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Nigerian Tribune, o kwuru na ọ họọrọ ọrụ nke nna shuga n'ihi na ọ na-anọchite anya pasent dị mma nke ndị ikom na-adịghị mma bụ ndị na-enweghị ike ịchịkwa onwe ha
Maazi Macaroni, na mkparịtaụka ya na Punch Nigeria gbara ya, kwuru na ya nwere ihe ọchị mgbe ọ ga-eṅomi pastọ Chris Oyakhilome na onye ọ bụla ga-achị ọchị
Ọ bụ nnukwu onye na-akwado Cristiano Ronaldo, onye na-agba bọọlụ Portuguese na-ewu ewu
Adedayo na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ngagharị ịkwụsị SARS
Na Satọde, Febụwarị 13, 2021, ndị uwe ojii nwụchiri Debo na Lekki Toll Gate n'oge ngagharị iwe #OccupyLekkiTollgate na-aga n'ihu
Okechukwu Edwards Ukeje, onye ama aha ya bụ Mr Raw (onye bụbu Dat NIGGA Raw ), bụ onye na-agụ egwú si Abia steeti na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ Afrohighlife na Igbo rap, ụdị nke na ato ndị na-ege ntị sara mbara ugbu a
Amụrụ ya na zụlite n'Enugwu, ọ ghọrọ onye amara ofuma n'oge mmalite 2000s rapping n'asụsụ Igbo na Pidgin English
E wetara album studio mbụ nke Raw, Right & ezighi ezi, na 7 Ọgọst 2005
Album nke abụọ Ihe niile na-anọgide na-adị ndụ sochiri na 2007
E wetara album studio nke atọ ya End of Discussion na Ọktoba 2010
Album ahụ wepụtara egwu egwu egwu 'O! Chineike' onye ihe oyuyuegwu ya malitare Best Afro Hip Hop Video na NMVA Awards n onwa ahụ

N'afọ 2010, Raw kwuru na ya ga-agbanwe aha ya site na 'Dat Nigga Raw' (acronym nke 'Dat Nigerian Guy Anakpo Raw') gaa na 'Mazi Raw Nwanne', na-ekwu na nkọwa ọjọọ ndị metụtara okwu ahụ bụ ' nigga ' kpatara ya
n'aha ya ka a na-enyocha ya na mba ọzọ ma gbochie ndị mmadụ ịzụrụ egwu ya n'ịntanetị
oyuyuegwutụtụ ndị ọzọ egwu egwu tinyere Flavor N'abania, Duncan Mighty, Phyno, Illbliss, 2Face, M-Josh, Hype MC, BosaLin na Slowdog
Mrsho bụ aha Tanzania
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Mrouzia (Arabic) bụ otu n'ime nri kachasị mkpa nke nri Moroccan
Ọ bụ anụ tajine na-atọ ụtọ ma na-atọ nnu, na-ejikọta ngwakọta ras el hanout nke ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na mmanụ aṅụ, sinamọn na almond
A na-akwado ya na mba Tunisia, mana n'ụzọ dị iche
Na mba Morocco, tajine a bụ otu n'ime nri ọdịnala nke emume Eid al-Adha Alakụba (Ememme Ụjà)
A na-ejikarị nwa atụrụ mee ya site na anụmanụ ndị a na-achụ n'àjà n'oge ememme ahụ
Msipa bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
